GSP27moksop_u:3: divi bhūmau tathākāśe bahir antaś ca me vibhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5: aham baddho vimuktas syām iti yasyāsti niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9: yo vicārayati prājño na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate //MU_1,1.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11: etāṃs tu prathamaṃ kṛtvā purāham arimardana //MU_1,1.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13: ekāgro dattavān ramyān maṇīn abdhir ivārthine //MU_1,1.5//
GSP27moksop_u:20: yeneyaṃ janatā duḥkhān mucyate tad udāhara //MU_1,1.8//
GSP27moksop_u:24: tasmiñ jñāte naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:26: ity uktvā sa bharadvājaṃ parameṣṭhī mamāśramam /
GSP27moksop_u:34: vaktuṃ tavaitam evārtham aham āgatavān ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:35: kuru lokahitārthaṃ tvaṃ śāstram ity uktavān ajaḥ //MU_1,1.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36: mama puṇyāśramāt tasmāt kṣaṇād antardhim āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37: muhūrtād udyataḥ proccais taraṅga iva vāriṇaḥ //MU_1,1.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38: tasmin prayāte bhagavaty ahaṃ vismayam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39: punas tatra bharadvājam apṛcchaṃ svacchayā dhiyā //MU_1,1.17//
GSP27moksop_u:40: kim etad brahmaṇā proktam bharadvāja vadāśu me /
GSP27moksop_u:41: ity uktena punaḥ proktam bharadvājena me 'nagha //MU_1,1.18//
GSP27moksop_u:43: etad uktam bhagavatā yathā rāmāyaṇaṃ kuru /
GSP27moksop_u:45: mahyaṃ ca bhagavan brūhi kathaṃ saṃsārasaṅkaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:46: rāmo vyavahṛto 'py asmin bharataś ca mahāmanāḥ //MU_1,1.20//
GSP27moksop_u:47: śatrughno lakṣmaṇaś cāpi sītā cāpi yaśasvinī /
GSP27moksop_u:49: nirduḥkhatāṃ kathaṃ te tu prāptās tad brūhi me sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:52: tadā kartuṃ vibhor ājñām ahaṃ vaktuṃ pravṛttavān //MU_1,1.23//
GSP27moksop_u:53: śṛṇu vatsa bharadvāja yathāpṛṣṭaṃ vadāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:55: tathā vyavahara prājña yathā vyavahṛtas sukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:57: lakṣmaṇo bharataś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahāmanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:58: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca sītā daśarathas tathā //MU_1,1.26//
GSP27moksop_u:61: ghṛṣṭir vikunto bhāmaś ca satyavardhana eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:62: vibhīṣaṇas suṣeṇaś ca hanumān indrajit tathā //MU_1,1.28//
GSP27moksop_u:65: ebhir yathā hṛtaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītam uṣitaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:66: tathā ced vartase putra mukta evāsi saṅkaṭāt //MU_1,1.30//
GSP27moksop_u:68: na śokam āyāti na dainyam eti gatajvaras tiṣṭhati nityatṛptaḥ //MU_1,1.31//
GSP27moksop_u:73: kramāt kathaya me nityaṃ bhaviṣyāmi sukhī yathā //MU_1,2.1//
GSP27moksop_u:78: kadācit kenacin nāma sa bodho 'nviṣyatām ataḥ //MU_1,2.3//
GSP27moksop_u:79: sa ceha sambhavaty eva tadartham idam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:80: śāstram ākarṇayasi cet tattvaṃ prāpnoṣi nānyathā //MU_1,2.4//
GSP27moksop_u:84: sampannaṃ cet tad utpannā parā nirvāṇanirvṛtiḥ //MU_1,2.6//
GSP27moksop_u:86: bhavaty akṛtrimajñānā kalpair api na nirvṛtiḥ //MU_1,2.7//
GSP27moksop_u:89: kṣīṇāyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ tu mano galati satvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:93: vāsanā dvividhā proktā śuddhā ca malinā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:100: vāsanā vidyate śuddhā dehe cakra iva bhramaḥ //MU_1,2.14//
GSP27moksop_u:106: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tenaiva sarvaṃ jñāsyasi sarvathā //MU_1,2.17//
GSP27moksop_u:109: atha gacchati kāle 'tra pālayaty avaniṃ nṛpe /
GSP27moksop_u:114: haṃsaḥ padmāv iva navau jagrāha nakhakesarau //MU_1,2.21//
GSP27moksop_u:117: draṣṭum utkaṇṭhitaṃ tāta mamedaṃ hi bhṛśaṃ manaḥ //MU_1,2.22//
GSP27moksop_u:118: tad etām arthanāṃ pūrvāṃ saphalīkartum arhasi /
GSP27moksop_u:119: na so 'sti bhuvane tāta tvayā yo 'rthī vimānitaḥ //MU_1,2.23//
GSP27moksop_u:120: iti samprārthito rājā vasiṣṭhena samaṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:127: niragāt sa gṛhāt tasmāt tīrthayātrārtham udyataḥ //MU_1,2.27//
GSP27moksop_u:136: nadīs tīrthāni puṇyāni vanāny āyatanāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:140: veṇāṃ ca kṛṣṇaveṇāṃ ca nirvindhyāṃ sarayūṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:141: carmaṇvatīṃ vitastāṃ ca vipāśāṃ bāhudām api //MU_1,2.34//
GSP27moksop_u:142: prayāgaṃ naimiṣaṃ caiva dharmāraṇyaṃ gayāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:143: vārāṇasīṃ śrīgiriṃ ca kedāraṃ puṣkaraṃ tathā //MU_1,2.35//
GSP27moksop_u:152: rājarṣīṇāṃ ca mahatāṃ brahmarṣīṇāṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:153: devānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca pāvanān āśramāñ śubhān //MU_1,2.40//
GSP27moksop_u:154: bhūyo bhūyas sa babhrāma bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha mānadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:155: caturṣv api diganteṣu sarvān eva mahītaṭān //MU_1,2.41//
GSP27moksop_u:157: upayayau svagṛhaṃ raghunandano vihṛtadik śivalokam iveśvaraḥ //MU_1,2.42//
GSP27moksop_u:162: sa viveśa gṛhaṃ śrīmāñ jayanto viṣṭapaṃ yathā //MU_1,3.1//
GSP27moksop_u:165: suhṛdbhir mātṛbhiś caiva pitrā dvijagaṇena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:169: bahūny āsa dināny atra rāmāgamanam utsavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:171: uvāsa sa sukhaṃ gehe tataḥ prabhṛti rāghavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:173: prātar utthāya rāmo 'sau kṛtvā sandhyāṃ yathāvidhi /
GSP27moksop_u:179: tata āgatya sadane kṛtvā snānādikaṃ kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:191: pālayaty avaniṃ rājñi yathāvad akhilām imām //MU_1,4.2//
GSP27moksop_u:192: janyatrārthaṃ ca putrāṇāṃ pratyahaṃ saha mantribhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:196: kramād asya viśālākṣaṃ pāṇḍutāṃ mukham ādadhe /
GSP27moksop_u:205: ālokya bhrātarāv asya tām evāyayatur daśām //MU_1,4.9//
GSP27moksop_u:206: tathā teṣu tanūjeṣu khedavatsu kṛśeṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:208: kā te putra ghanā cintety evaṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:209: apṛcchat snigdhayā vācā na cākathayad asya saḥ //MU_1,4.11//
GSP27moksop_u:210: na kiñcit tāta me duḥkham ity uktvā pitur aṅkagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:211: rāmo rājīvapatrākṣas tūṣṇīm eva sma tiṣṭhati //MU_1,4.12//
GSP27moksop_u:212: tato daśaratho rājā rāmaḥ kiṃ khedavān iti /
GSP27moksop_u:214: asty atra kāraṇaṃ śrīman mā rājan duḥkham astu te /
GSP27moksop_u:215: ity uktaś cintayā yukto vasiṣṭhamuninā nṛpaḥ //MU_1,4.14//
GSP27moksop_u:216: kopaṃ viṣādakalanāṃ vitataṃ ca harṣaṃ nālpena kāraṇavaśena vahanti santaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:217: sargeṇa saṃhatijavena vinā jagatyāṃ bhūtāni bhūpa na mahānti vikārayanti //MU_1,4.15//
GSP27moksop_u:222: khedavaty āsthite maunaṃ kañcit kālaṃ pratīkṣiṇi //MU_1,5.1//
GSP27moksop_u:225: etasminn eva kāle tu viśvāmitra iti śrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:226: maharṣir āgamad draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāṃ narādhipam //MU_1,5.3//
GSP27moksop_u:227: tasya yajño 'tha rakṣobhis tadā vilulupe kila /
GSP27moksop_u:229: rakṣārthaṃ tasya yajñasya draṣṭum aicchat sa pārthivam /
GSP27moksop_u:230: na hi śakto hy avighnena tam āptuṃ sa muniḥ kratum //MU_1,5.5//
GSP27moksop_u:231: tatas teṣāṃ vināśārtham udyatas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:233: sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha /
GSP27moksop_u:234: śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinas sutam //MU_1,5.7//
GSP27moksop_u:235: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dvāssthā rājagṛhaṃ yayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:237: te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:244: kṛtavāṃs taṃ pradeśaṃ yas tejobhiḥ kīrṇakāñcanam //MU_1,5.12//
GSP27moksop_u:245: vakty asmān āśu yāṣṭīkā nivedayata rājani /
GSP27moksop_u:246: viśvāmitro muniḥ prāpta ity anuddhatayā girā //MU_1,5.13//
GSP27moksop_u:249: padātir eva mahatāṃ rājñāṃ vṛndena pālitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:257: upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptam apratighaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:266: ānandaṃ ca bhayaṃ cāntaḥ prayacchantam avekṣituḥ //MU_1,5.23//
GSP27moksop_u:269: munir apy avaner īśaṃ bhāsvān iva śatakratum /
GSP27moksop_u:276: yad anādi yad akṣubdhaṃ yad apāyavivarjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:277: tad ānandasukhaṃ prāptā adya tvaddarśanān mune //MU_1,5.28//
GSP27moksop_u:278: adya vartāmahe nūnaṃ dharmyāṇāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:282: sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ lakṣmyā bhītas tam ṛṣim āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:286: sa rājñā pūjitas tena prahṛṣṭavadanas tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:290: kṣaṇaṃ yathārham anyo'nyaṃ pūjayitvā sametya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:295: pādyam arghyaṃ ca gāś caiva bhūyo bhūyo nyavedayat //MU_1,5.37//
GSP27moksop_u:297: prāñjaliḥ prayato vākyam idaṃ prītamanā nṛpaḥ //MU_1,5.38//
GSP27moksop_u:304: yathā harṣo nabhogatyā mṛtasya punar āgamāt /
GSP27moksop_u:305: tathā tvadāgamād brahman svāgataṃ te mahāmune //MU_1,5.42//
GSP27moksop_u:306: brahmalokanivāso hi kasya na prītim āvahet /
GSP27moksop_u:307: mune tavāgamas tadvat satyam eva bravīmi te //MU_1,5.43//
GSP27moksop_u:308: kaś ca te paramaḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ ca te karavāṇy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:311: brahmarṣitvam anu prāptaḥ pūjyo 'si bhagavan mama //MU_1,5.45//
GSP27moksop_u:313: tathā tvaddarśanāt prītir antaś śītayatīva mām //MU_1,5.46//
GSP27moksop_u:315: idam atyadbhutaṃ brahman yad bhavān mām upāgataḥ //MU_1,5.47//
GSP27moksop_u:318: sākṣād iva brahmaṇo me tavābhyāgamanaṃ matam /
GSP27moksop_u:321: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ tat sujīvitam //MU_1,5.50//
GSP27moksop_u:322: tvām ihābhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā pratipūjya praṇamya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:323: ātmany eva namāmy antar dṛṣṭendur jaladhir yathā //MU_1,5.51//
GSP27moksop_u:324: yat kāryaṃ yena cārthena prāpto 'si munipuṅgava /
GSP27moksop_u:325: kṛtam ity eva tad viddhi mānyo 'si hi bhṛśaṃ mama //MU_1,5.52//
GSP27moksop_u:326: svakāryeṇa vimarśaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi kauśika /
GSP27moksop_u:327: bhagavan nāsty adeyaṃ hi tvayi yat pratipadyate //MU_1,5.53//
GSP27moksop_u:328: kāryasya ca vicāraṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:329: kartā cāham aśeṣaṃ te daivataṃ paramaṃ bhavān //MU_1,5.54//
GSP27moksop_u:330: idam atimadhuraṃ niśamya vākyaṃ śrutisukham arthavidā vinītam uktam /
GSP27moksop_u:331: prathitaguṇavaśād guṇair viśiṣṭaṃ munivṛṣabhaḥ paramaṃ jagāma harṣam //MU_1,5.55//
GSP27moksop_u:339: yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryavinirṇayam /
GSP27moksop_u:342: tasya vighnakarā ghorā rākṣasā mama saṃsthitāḥ //MU_1,6.4//
GSP27moksop_u:343: yadā yadā tu yajñena yaje 'haṃ vibudhavrajam /
GSP27moksop_u:344: tadā tadā me yajñaṃ taṃ vinighnanti niśācarāḥ //MU_1,6.5//
GSP27moksop_u:346: akiraṃs te mahīṃ yāge māṃsena rudhireṇa ca //MU_1,6.6//
GSP27moksop_u:349: na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva /
GSP27moksop_u:350: tathābhūtaṃ hi tat karma na śāpas tasya vidyate //MU_1,6.8//
GSP27moksop_u:351: īdṛśī ca kṣamā rājan mama tasmin mahākratau /
GSP27moksop_u:353: trātum arhasi mām ārtaṃ śaraṇārthinam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:354: arthināṃ yan nirāśatvaṃ satām abhibhavo hi saḥ //MU_1,6.10//
GSP27moksop_u:358: kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi //MU_1,6.12//
GSP27moksop_u:359: śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā /
GSP27moksop_u:362: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena pūjyo bhaviṣyati //MU_1,6.14//
GSP27moksop_u:363: na ca tena samāsādya sthātuṃ śaktā niśācarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:364: kruddhaṃ kesariṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe vana ivaiṇakāḥ //MU_1,6.15//
GSP27moksop_u:365: teṣāṃ nānyaś ca kākutsthād yoddhum utsahate pumān /
GSP27moksop_u:366: ṛte kesariṇaḥ kruddhān mattānāṃ kariṇām iva //MU_1,6.16//
GSP27moksop_u:367: vīryotsiktā hi te pāpāḥ kālakūṭopamā raṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:371: na ca putragataṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva /
GSP27moksop_u:372: na tad asti jagaty asmin yan na deyaṃ mahātmanaḥ //MU_1,6.19//
GSP27moksop_u:373: hanta nūnaṃ vijānāmi hatāṃs tān viddhi rākṣasān /
GSP27moksop_u:374: na hy asmadādayaḥ prājñās sandigdhe sampravṛttayaḥ //MU_1,6.20//
GSP27moksop_u:376: vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejā ye cānye dīrghadarśinaḥ //MU_1,6.21//
GSP27moksop_u:377: yadi dharmo mahattvaṃ ca yaśas te manasi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:378: tan mahyaṃ svam abhipretam ātmajaṃ dātum arhasi //MU_1,6.22//
GSP27moksop_u:379: daśarātraś ca me yajño yasmin rāmeṇa rākṣasāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:383: nātyeti kālaḥ kālajña yathāyaṃ mama rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:384: tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ //MU_1,6.25//
GSP27moksop_u:385: kāryam aṇv api kāle tu kṛtam ety upakāratām /
GSP27moksop_u:386: mahad apy upakāreṇa riktatām ety akālataḥ //MU_1,6.26//
GSP27moksop_u:387: ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:389: śrutvā vaco munivarasya mahāprabhāvas tūṣṇīm atiṣṭhad upapannam idaṃ sa vaktum /
GSP27moksop_u:390: no yuktiyuktakathanena vinaiti toṣaṃ dhīmān apūritamano'bhimataś ca lokaḥ //MU_1,6.28//
GSP27moksop_u:395: muhūrtam āsīn niśceṣṭas sadainyaṃ cedam abravīt //MU_1,7.1//
GSP27moksop_u:397: na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ //MU_1,7.2//
GSP27moksop_u:398: iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāḥ patir ahaṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:400: ime hi śūrā vikrāntā bhṛtyā astraviśāradāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:403: dadāmi yuddhaṃ mattānāṃ kariṇām iva kesarī //MU_1,7.5//
GSP27moksop_u:404: bālo rāmas tv anīkeṣu na jānāti balābalam /
GSP27moksop_u:406: na cāstraiḥ paramair yukto na ca yuddhaviśāradaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:412: adya tv atitarāṃ brahman mama bhāgyaviparyayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:414: nāttum annāni śaknoti na vihartuṃ gṛhāvanau /
GSP27moksop_u:419: kathaṃ dadāmi taṃ tubhyaṃ yoddhuṃ saha niśācaraiḥ //MU_1,7.13//
GSP27moksop_u:422: ye durantā mahārambhās triṣu lokeṣu khedadāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:423: putrasnehena santo 'pi kurvate te na saṃśrayam //MU_1,7.15//
GSP27moksop_u:424: asavo 'tha dhanaṃ dārās tyajyante mānavais sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:425: na putrā muniśārdūla svabhāvo hy eṣa jantuṣu //MU_1,7.16//
GSP27moksop_u:427: rāmas tān yodhayatv ittham uktir evātidussahā //MU_1,7.17//
GSP27moksop_u:428: viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe /
GSP27moksop_u:429: jīvituṃ jīvitākāṅkṣī na rāmaṃ netum arhasi //MU_1,7.18//
GSP27moksop_u:431: duḥkhenotpāditās tv ete catvāraḥ putrakā mayā //MU_1,7.19//
GSP27moksop_u:433: taṃ vinā te trayo 'py anye dhārayanti na jīvitam //MU_1,7.20//
GSP27moksop_u:434: sa eva rāmo bhavatā nīyate rākṣasān prati /
GSP27moksop_u:435: yadi tat putrahīnaṃ tvaṃ mṛtam evāśu viddhi mām //MU_1,7.21//
GSP27moksop_u:436: caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītir atra hi me parā /
GSP27moksop_u:437: jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamayaṃ tasmān na rāmaṃ netum arhasi //MU_1,7.22//
GSP27moksop_u:440: kiṃvīryā rākṣasās te tu kasya putrāḥ kathaṃ ca te /
GSP27moksop_u:441: kiyatpramāṇāḥ ke caite iti varṇaya me sphuṭam //MU_1,7.24//
GSP27moksop_u:442: kathaṃ tena prahartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām /
GSP27moksop_u:443: māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām //MU_1,7.25//
GSP27moksop_u:444: sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan yathā teṣāṃ mayā raṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:446: śrūyate hi mahāvīro rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:448: sa cet tava makhe vighnaṃ karoti kila durmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:449: tat saṅgrāme na śaktās smo vayaṃ tasya durātmanaḥ //MU_1,7.28//
GSP27moksop_u:451: bhūteṣv abhyudayaṃ yānti pralīyante ca kālataḥ //MU_1,7.29//
GSP27moksop_u:452: adyāsmiṃs te vayaṃ kāle rāvaṇādiṣu śatruṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:453: na samarthāḥ puras sthātuṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_1,7.30//
GSP27moksop_u:454: tasmāt prasādaṃ dharmajña kuru tvaṃ mama putrake /
GSP27moksop_u:457: na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ yoddhuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣā yudhi //MU_1,7.32//
GSP27moksop_u:459: tena sārdhaṃ na śaktās smas saṃyuge tasya vā varaiḥ //MU_1,7.33//
GSP27moksop_u:462: atha vā lavaṇaṃ brahman yajñaghnaṃ taṃ madhos sutam /
GSP27moksop_u:463: kathaya tvaṃ suraprakhya kveva mokṣyāmi putrakam //MU_1,7.35//
GSP27moksop_u:464: atha necchasi ced brahmaṃs tad vidheyo 'ham eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:465: anyathā tu na paśyāmi śāśvataṃ jayam ātmanaḥ //MU_1,7.36//
GSP27moksop_u:466: ity uktvā mṛduvacanaṃ bhayākulo 'sāv ālole munimatasaṃśaye nimagnaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:467: nājñāsīt kaṇam api niścayaṃ mahātmā prodvīcāv iva jaladhau samuhyamānaḥ //MU_1,7.37//
GSP27moksop_u:478: yadi tvaṃ na kṣamo rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:482: cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā surāś ca bhayam āviśan //MU_1,8.5//
GSP27moksop_u:484: dhṛtimān suvrato dhīmān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt //MU_1,8.6//
GSP27moksop_u:486: ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātas sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:488: nītimān suvrato bhūtvā na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi /
GSP27moksop_u:490: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmeṇa yaśasā yutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:491: svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi //MU_1,8.9//
GSP27moksop_u:492: kariṣyāmīti saṃśrutya tat te rājann akurvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:493: iṣṭāpūrtaḥ pated dharmas tasmād rāmaṃ visarjaya //MU_1,8.10//
GSP27moksop_u:495: kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ drakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ //MU_1,8.11//
GSP27moksop_u:497: na pālayasi ced vākyaṃ ko 'paraḥ pālayiṣyati //MU_1,8.12//
GSP27moksop_u:499: maryādāṃ na vimuñcanti tāṃ na hātum ihārhasi //MU_1,8.13//
GSP27moksop_u:500: eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:501: eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasāṃ ca parāyaṇaḥ //MU_1,8.14//
GSP27moksop_u:503: naitad anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyati kaścana //MU_1,8.15//
GSP27moksop_u:504: na ca devarṣayaḥ kecin nāmarā na ca rākṣasāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:507: kauśikāya purā dattaṃ yadā rājyaṃ samanvaśāt //MU_1,8.17//
GSP27moksop_u:510: jayā ca suprabhā caiva dākṣāyaṇyau sumadhyame /
GSP27moksop_u:511: tayos tu yāny apatyāni śataṃ paramadurjayam //MU_1,8.19//
GSP27moksop_u:512: pañcāśatas sutāñ jajñe jayā labdhavarā purā /
GSP27moksop_u:514: suprabhā janayām āsa putrān pañcāśataḥ parān /
GSP27moksop_u:517: na rāmagamane buddhiṃ viklavāṃ kartum arhasi //MU_1,8.22//
GSP27moksop_u:518: asmin mahāsattvamaye munīndre sthite samīpe puruṣas tu sādhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:519: prāpte 'pi mṛtyāv amaratvam eti mā dīnatāṃ gaccha yathā vimūḍhaḥ //MU_1,8.23//
GSP27moksop_u:523: tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathas sutam /
GSP27moksop_u:531: vimanās saṃsthito rātrau ṣaṭpadaḥ kamale yathā //MU_1,9.4//
GSP27moksop_u:533: na kasyacit sa nikaṭe sthātum icchati khinnadhīḥ //MU_1,9.5//
GSP27moksop_u:534: ity ukte tena bhūpālas taṃ rāmānucaraṃ janam /
GSP27moksop_u:535: sarvam āśvāsayām āsa papraccha ca yathākramam //MU_1,9.6//
GSP27moksop_u:536: kathaṃ kīdṛk sthito rāma iti pṛṣṭo mahībhṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:538: dehayaṣṭim imāṃ deva dhārayanta ime vayam /
GSP27moksop_u:539: khinnāḥ khedaparimlāne vibho rāme sute tava //MU_1,9.8//
GSP27moksop_u:543: sāyam amlānavadanaḥ karoti na karoti vā //MU_1,9.10//
GSP27moksop_u:545: prārthito 'pi hi nā tṛpter aśnāty aśanam īśvaraḥ //MU_1,9.11//
GSP27moksop_u:547: na ca krīḍati līlābhir dharādbhir iva cātakaḥ //MU_1,9.12//
GSP27moksop_u:549: nānandayati taṃ rājan dyauḥ pātavivaśaṃ yathā //MU_1,9.13//
GSP27moksop_u:552: yad ramyam ucitaṃ svādu peśalaṃ cittahāri vā /
GSP27moksop_u:556: bhojanaṃ śayanaṃ snānaṃ vilāsaṃ pānam āsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:558: kiṃ sampadā kiṃ vipadā kiṃ gehena kim īhitaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:559: sarvam evāsad ity uktvā tūṣṇīm eko 'vatiṣṭhate //MU_1,9.18//
GSP27moksop_u:561: na ca tiṣṭhati kāryeṣu maunam evāvalambate //MU_1,9.19//
GSP27moksop_u:563: nānandayanti taṃ nāryo mṛgyo vanataruṃ yathā //MU_1,9.20//
GSP27moksop_u:568: eka eva vasan deśe janaśūnye janeśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:569: na hasaty ekayā buddhyā na gāyati na roditi //MU_1,9.23//
GSP27moksop_u:574: na vidmaḥ kim asau jātaḥ kiṃ karoti kim īhate /
GSP27moksop_u:575: kiṃ dhyāyati kim āyāti kathaṃ kim anudhāvati //MU_1,9.26//
GSP27moksop_u:576: pratyahaṃ kṛśatāṃ yāti pratyahaṃ yāti pāṇḍutām /
GSP27moksop_u:577: virāgaṃ pratyahaṃ yāti śaradanta iva drumaḥ //MU_1,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:580: bhṛtyai rājabhir ambābhis sa pṛṣṭo 'pi punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:581: uktvā na kiñcid eveti tūṣṇīm āste nirīhitaḥ //MU_1,9.29//
GSP27moksop_u:587: ceṣṭitair eva kākalyā bhūyo bhūyaḥ pragāyati //MU_1,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:590: na proktam ākarṇayati prekṣate na purogatam /
GSP27moksop_u:591: karoty avajñāṃ sarvatra sumahaty api vastuni //MU_1,9.34//
GSP27moksop_u:593: ittham etat katham iti vismayo 'sya na jāyate //MU_1,9.35//
GSP27moksop_u:595: na bhedayanti durbhedaṃ dhārā iva mahopalam //MU_1,9.36//
GSP27moksop_u:596: āpadām ekam āvāsam abhivāñchasi kiṃ dhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:598: iyam āpad iyaṃ sampad ity ayaṃ kalpanāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:599: manasy abhyudito moha iti śokāt pragāyati //MU_1,9.38//
GSP27moksop_u:600: hā hato 'ham anātho 'ham ity ākrandaparo 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:601: na jano yāti vairāgyaṃ citram ity eva vakty asau //MU_1,9.39//
GSP27moksop_u:603: bhṛśam itthaṃ sthitenaiva vayaṃ khedam upāgatāḥ //MU_1,9.40//
GSP27moksop_u:604: na vidmaḥ kiṃ mahābāho tasya tādṛśacetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:605: kurmaḥ kamalapattrākṣa gatir atra hi no bhavān //MU_1,9.41//
GSP27moksop_u:606: rājānam atha vā vipram upadeṣṭāram agragam /
GSP27moksop_u:608: prapañco 'yam iha sphāraṃ jagannāma yad utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:609: naitad vastu na caivāham iti nirṇīya saṃsthitaḥ //MU_1,9.43//
GSP27moksop_u:610: nārau nātmani no mitre na rājye na ca mātari /
GSP27moksop_u:611: na sampadāpador nāntas tasyāsthā na vibhor bahiḥ //MU_1,9.44//
GSP27moksop_u:613: mohena ca vimukto 'sau tena tapyāmahe vayam //MU_1,9.45//
GSP27moksop_u:614: kiṃ dhanena kim ambābhiḥ kiṃ rājyena kim īhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:616: bhogeṣv āyuṣi rājye ca mitre pitari mātari /
GSP27moksop_u:620: tādṛśas syān mahāsattvaḥ ka ivāsmin mahītale /
GSP27moksop_u:621: prakṛte vyavahāre taṃ yo niveśayituṃ kṣamaḥ //MU_1,9.49//
GSP27moksop_u:623: āpat tām alam uddhartuṃ samudetu dayāparaḥ //MU_1,9.50//
GSP27moksop_u:624: manasi moham apāsya mahāmanās sakalam ārtimataḥ kila sādhutām /
GSP27moksop_u:625: saphalatāṃ nayatīha tamoharan dinakaro bhuvi bhāskaratām iva //MU_1,9.51//
GSP27moksop_u:629: evaṃ cet tan mahāprājñaṃ bhavanto raghunandanam /
GSP27moksop_u:631: eṣa moho raghupater nāpadbhyo na ca rāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:633: ihāyātu kṣaṇād rāmas tad ihaiva vayaṃ kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:635: etasmin mārjite yuktyā mohe ca raghunandanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:636: viśrāntim eṣyati pade tasmin vayam ivottame //MU_1,10.4//
GSP27moksop_u:637: satyatāṃ muditāṃ prajñāṃ viśrāntiṃ ca sametya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:647: vṛtaḥ katipayair bhṛtyair bhrātṛbhyāṃ cājagāma ha /
GSP27moksop_u:648: tat puṇyaṃ pitur āsthānaṃ svargaṃ surapater iva //MU_1,10.10//
GSP27moksop_u:649: dūrād eva dadarśāsau rāmo daśarathaṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:671: prathamaṃ pitaraṃ paścān munīn mānyaikam ānataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:672: tato viprāṃs tato bandhūṃs tato 'dhikaguṇān gurūn //MU_1,10.22//
GSP27moksop_u:673: jagrāha cātmanā dṛṣṭvā manāk svādugirā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:675: vihitāśīr munibhyāṃ tu rāmas sa śamamānasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:678: śirasy abhyāliliṅgāśu cucumba ca punaḥ punaḥ //MU_1,10.25//
GSP27moksop_u:681: utsaṅge vatsa tiṣṭheti vadaty atha mahīpatau /
GSP27moksop_u:684: putra prāptavivekas tvaṃ kalyāṇānāṃ ca bhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:685: janavaj jīrṇayā buddhyā khedāyātmā na dīyate //MU_1,10.28//
GSP27moksop_u:687: padam āsādyate puṇyaṃ na moham anudhāvatā //MU_1,10.29//
GSP27moksop_u:689: yāvad eva na mohasya prasaraḥ putra dīyate //MU_1,10.30//
GSP27moksop_u:691: rājaputra mahābāho śūras tvaṃ vijitās tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:693: kim atajjña ivājñānāṃ yogye vā mohasāgare /
GSP27moksop_u:697: brūhi cetaḥkṛtāṃ tyaktvā hetunā kena muhyasi //MU_1,10.33//
GSP27moksop_u:698: kiṃniṣṭhāḥ kiyatā kena kiyantaḥ kāraṇena te /
GSP27moksop_u:699: ādhayo nu vilumpanti mano geham ivākhavaḥ //MU_1,10.34//
GSP27moksop_u:700: manye nānucitānāṃ tvam ādhīnāṃ padam uttamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:701: āpatsu cāpto yo dhīro nirjitās tena cādhayaḥ //MU_1,10.35//
GSP27moksop_u:702: yathābhimatam āśu tvaṃ brūhi prāpsyasi cānagham /
GSP27moksop_u:703: sarvam eva punar yena tava bhetsyanti nādhayaḥ //MU_1,10.36//
GSP27moksop_u:704: ity uttamasya sa mune raghuvaṃśaketur ākarṇya vākyam ucitārthavilāsagarbham /
GSP27moksop_u:705: tatyāja khedam abhigarjati vārivāhe barhī yathābhyanumitābhimatārthasiddhiḥ //MU_1,10.37//
GSP27moksop_u:709: iti pṛṣṭo munīndreṇa samāśvāsya ca rāghavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:712: bhagavan bhavatā pṛṣṭo yathāvad adhunā kila /
GSP27moksop_u:713: kathayāmy aham ajño 'pi ko laṅghayati sadvacaḥ //MU_1,11.2//
GSP27moksop_u:714: ahaṃ tāvad ayaṃ jāto nije 'smin pitṛsadmani /
GSP27moksop_u:715: krameṇa vṛddhiṃ samprāptaḥ prāptavidyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ //MU_1,11.3//
GSP27moksop_u:722: kiṃ nāmedaṃ vata sukhaṃ yo 'yaṃ saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:723: jāyate mṛtaye loko mriyate jananāya ca //MU_1,11.7//
GSP27moksop_u:729: manaś cāsad ihābhāti kena smaḥ parimohitāḥ //MU_1,11.10//
GSP27moksop_u:732: na kenacic ca vikrītā vikrītā iva saṃsthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:733: vata mūḍhā vayaṃ sarve jānānā api śambaram //MU_1,11.12//
GSP27moksop_u:734: kim eteṣu prapañceṣu bhogā nāma sudurbhagāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:735: mudhaiva hi vayaṃ mohāt saṃsthitā baddhabhāvanāḥ //MU_1,11.13//
GSP27moksop_u:736: ajñāte bahukālena vyartha eva vayaṃ ghane /
GSP27moksop_u:737: mohe nipatitā mugdhāś śvabhre mugdhamṛgā iva //MU_1,11.14//
GSP27moksop_u:738: kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ bhogaiḥ ko 'haṃ kim idam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:739: yan mithyaivāstu tan mithyā kasya nāma kim āgatam //MU_1,11.15//
GSP27moksop_u:740: evaṃ vimṛśato brahman sarveṣv eva tato mama /
GSP27moksop_u:741: bhāveṣv aratir āyātā pathikasya maruṣv iva //MU_1,11.16//
GSP27moksop_u:742: tad etad bhagavan brūhi kim idaṃ parinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:743: kim idaṃ jāyate bhūyaḥ kim idaṃ parivardhate //MU_1,11.17//
GSP27moksop_u:744: jarāmaraṇam āpac ca jananaṃ sampadas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:746: bhāvais tair eva tair eva tucchair vayam ime kila /
GSP27moksop_u:747: paśya jarjaratāṃ nītā vātair iva giridrumāḥ //MU_1,11.19//
GSP27moksop_u:750: śāmyatīdaṃ kathaṃ duḥkham iti tapto 'smi cintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:763: mama na nirvṛtim eti mano mune nigaḍitasya yathā vanahastinaḥ //MU_1,11.27//
GSP27moksop_u:764: khalāḥ kāle kāle niśi niśitamohaikamihikāgatāloke loke viṣayahaṭhacaurās sucaturāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:765: pravṛttāḥ prodyuktā diśi diśi vivekaikaharaṇe raṇe śaktās teṣāṃ vadata vibudhāḥ ke 'dya subhaṭāḥ //MU_1,11.28//
GSP27moksop_u:770: śrīr mune parimohāya sāpi nūnam anarthadā //MU_1,12.1//
GSP27moksop_u:774: cañcalāḥ prabhavanty asyās taraṅgās sarito yathā //MU_1,12.3//
GSP27moksop_u:775: eṣā hi padam ekatra na nibadhnāti durbhagā /
GSP27moksop_u:783: tāvac chītamṛdusparśaḥ pare sve ca jane janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:784: vātyayeva himaṃ yāvac chriyā na paruṣīkṛtaḥ //MU_1,12.8//
GSP27moksop_u:785: prājñāś śūrāḥ kṛtajñāś ca peśalā mṛdavaś ca ye /
GSP27moksop_u:787: na śrīs sukhāya bhagavan duḥkhāyaiva hi kalpate /
GSP27moksop_u:788: guptaṃ vināśanaṃ dhatte mṛtiṃ viṣalatā yathā //MU_1,12.10//
GSP27moksop_u:789: śrīmān ajananindyaś ca śūraś cāpy avikatthanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:790: samadṛṣṭiḥ prabhuś caiva durlabhāḥ puruṣās trayaḥ //MU_1,12.11//
GSP27moksop_u:791: eṣā hi viṣamā duḥkhabhogināṃ gahanā guhā /
GSP27moksop_u:808: paśyāmy abhavyayā lakṣmyā kiñcid duḥkhād ṛte sukham //MU_1,12.20//
GSP27moksop_u:811: manoramā karṣati cittavṛttiṃ kadaryasādhyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurā ca /
GSP27moksop_u:817: unmattam iva santyajya yāty akāṇḍe śarīrakam //MU_1,13.1//
GSP27moksop_u:820: ye tu vijñātavijñeyā viśrāntā vitate pade /
GSP27moksop_u:825: grathanaṃ ca taraṅgāṇām āsthā nāyuṣi yujyate //MU_1,13.5//
GSP27moksop_u:829: grahītum āsthāṃ badhnāmi na tv āyuṣi gatasthitau //MU_1,13.7//
GSP27moksop_u:833: kāyavallyāṃ raso rājañ jīvitaṃ me na rocate //MU_1,13.9//
GSP27moksop_u:834: prāpyaṃ samprāpyate yena bhūyo yena na śocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:835: parāyā nirvṛtes sthānaṃ yat taj jīvitam ucyate //MU_1,13.10//
GSP27moksop_u:837: sa jīvati mano yasya mananena na jīvati //MU_1,13.11//
GSP27moksop_u:838: jātās ta eva jagati jantavas sādhujīvitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:839: ye punar neha jāyante śeṣā jānīta gardabhāḥ //MU_1,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:840: bhāro 'vivekinaś śāstraṃ bhāro jñānaṃ ca rāgiṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:841: aśāntaṃ ca mano bhāro bhāro 'nātmavido vapuḥ //MU_1,13.13//
GSP27moksop_u:842: rūpam āyur mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tathehitam /
GSP27moksop_u:846: pratyahaṃ khedam utsṛjya śanair alam anāratam /
GSP27moksop_u:847: āśv eva janmanaś śvabhraṃ kālena vinikhanyate //MU_1,13.16//
GSP27moksop_u:849: rogair nipīyate raudrair vyālair iva vanānilaḥ //MU_1,13.17//
GSP27moksop_u:851: duḥkhair ākṛṣyate krūrair ghuṇair iva jaraddrumaḥ //MU_1,13.18//
GSP27moksop_u:860: sthiratayā sukhahāritayā tayā satatam ujjhitam uttama phalgu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:861: jagati nāsti tathā guṇavarjitaṃ maraṇamārjitam āyur idaṃ yathā //MU_1,13.23//
GSP27moksop_u:872: na bhuñje na pibāmy ambhaḥ kim u bhogān bhaje mune //MU_1,14.4//
GSP27moksop_u:875: yāni duḥkhāni dīrghāṇi viṣamāṇi mahānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:876: ahaṅkārāt prasūtāni tāny agāt khadirā iva //MU_1,14.6//
GSP27moksop_u:879: nāhaṃ rāmo na me vāñchā bhāveṣu ca na me manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:880: śānta āsitum icchāmi svātmany eva jino yathā //MU_1,14.8//
GSP27moksop_u:881: ahaṅkāravaśād yad yan mayā bhuktaṃ kṛtaṃ hṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:882: sarvaṃ tu tad avastv eva vastv ahaṅkārariktatā //MU_1,14.9//
GSP27moksop_u:883: aham ity asti ced brahmann aham āpadi duḥkhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:894: yo 'yam ullasati sphāraṃ tenedaṃ jagad ātatam //MU_1,14.15//
GSP27moksop_u:899: pramārjite 'ham ity asmin pade svayam akhidyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:900: pramārjitā bhavanty eva sarva eva durādhayaḥ //MU_1,14.18//
GSP27moksop_u:901: aham ity ambude śānte śanais suśamaśālini /
GSP27moksop_u:904: yat kiñcid ucitaṃ brahmaṃs tad ākhyātum ihārhasi //MU_1,14.20//
GSP27moksop_u:905: sarvāpadāṃ nilayam adhruvam antarastham unmuktam uttamaguṇena na saṃśrayāmi /
GSP27moksop_u:906: yatnād ahaṅkṛtipadaṃ parito 'tiduḥkhaṃ śeṣeṇa māṃ samanuśādhi mahānubhāva //MU_1,14.21//
GSP27moksop_u:912: itaś cetaś ca suvyagraṃ vyartham evābhidhāvati /
GSP27moksop_u:913: dūrād dūrataraṃ dīnaṃ grāme kauleyako yathā //MU_1,15.2//
GSP27moksop_u:914: na prāpnoti kvacit kiñcit prāptair api mahādhanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:917: na manāṅ nirvṛtiṃ yāti mṛgo yūthād iva cyutaḥ //MU_1,15.4//
GSP27moksop_u:919: parityajya kṣaṇam api na mano yāti nirvṛtim //MU_1,15.5//
GSP27moksop_u:926: na kadācana me cetas tām ālūnaviśīrṇatām /
GSP27moksop_u:929: dhṛtiṃ badhnāti naikatra kesarī pañjare yathā //MU_1,15.10//
GSP27moksop_u:933: munīndra na prabudhyante tena tapto 'ham ākulaḥ //MU_1,15.12//
GSP27moksop_u:937: vahnineva tṛṇaṃ śuṣkaṃ mune dagdho 'smi cetasā //MU_1,15.14//
GSP27moksop_u:947: kūpakāṣṭhaṃ kudāmneva veṣṭito hy asmi cetasā //MU_1,15.19//
GSP27moksop_u:952: cetaḥ patati kāryeṣu vihagaś cāmiṣeṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:953: kṣaṇena viratiṃ yāti bālaḥ krīḍanakād iva //MU_1,15.22//
GSP27moksop_u:955: mano'bdhir īhitavyālo dūrān nayati tāta mām //MU_1,15.23//
GSP27moksop_u:958: cittaṃ kāraṇam arthānāṃ tasmin sati jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:959: tasmin kṣīṇe jagat kṣīṇaṃ tac cikitsyaṃ prayatnataḥ //MU_1,15.25//
GSP27moksop_u:960: cittād imāni sukhaduḥkhaśatāni nūnam abhyāgatāny agavarād iva kānanāni /
GSP27moksop_u:961: tasmin vivekavaśatas tanutāṃ prayāte manye mune nipuṇam eva galanti tāni //MU_1,15.26//
GSP27moksop_u:962: sakalaguṇajayāśā yatra baddhā mahadbhis tam arim iha vijetuṃ cittam abhyutthito 'ham /
GSP27moksop_u:963: vigataratitayāntar nābhinandāmi lakṣmīṃ jaḍamalinaviśālāṃ meghamālām ivenduḥ //MU_1,15.27//
GSP27moksop_u:981: yāṃ yām aham adhītāsthām āśrayāmi guṇaśriyam /
GSP27moksop_u:982: tāṃ tāṃ kṛntati me tṛṣṇā tantrīm iva kumūṣikā //MU_1,16.8//
GSP27moksop_u:989: dūraṃ dūram ito gatvā sametya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:996: khageṣv iva kirātyeha jālaṃ lokeṣu racyate //MU_1,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:997: bhāyayaty api dhīreham andhayaty api sekṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:998: khedayaty api sānandaṃ tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇeva śarvarī //MU_1,16.16//
GSP27moksop_u:1000: dahaty api manāk spṛṣṭā tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇeva bhoginī //MU_1,16.17//
GSP27moksop_u:1010: na cāpnoti phalaṃ kiñcit tṛṣṇā jīrṇeva kāminī //MU_1,16.22//
GSP27moksop_u:1015: yan na śaknoti tatrāpi dhatte tāṇḍavitāṃ gatim /
GSP27moksop_u:1017: bhṛśaṃ sphurati nīhāre śāmyaty āloka āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:1021: naṣṭam utsṛjya tiṣṭhantaṃ vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāparam /
GSP27moksop_u:1022: puruṣāt puruṣaṃ yāti tṛṣṇā loleva pakṣiṇī //MU_1,16.28//
GSP27moksop_u:1023: padaṃ karoty alaṅghye 'pi tṛptāpi phalam īhate /
GSP27moksop_u:1026: anārataṃ ca yatate tṛṣṇā ceṣṭeva daivikī //MU_1,16.30//
GSP27moksop_u:1027: kṣaṇam āyāti pātālaṃ kṣaṇaṃ yāti nabhastalam /
GSP27moksop_u:1049: tāvan muhyaty ayaṃ loko mūko vilulitāśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1054: ādadhānā sphuraty antas tṛṣṇā matsyī hrade yathā //MU_1,16.44//
GSP27moksop_u:1059: aho bata mahac citraṃ tṛṣṇām api mahādhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1062: tathā tīkṣṇā yathā brahmaṃs tṛṣṇeyaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitā //MU_1,16.48//
GSP27moksop_u:1065: api merūpamaṃ prājñam api śūram api sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:1070: tṛṣṇā sthitā jagati cañcalavīcimāle kṣīrārṇavāmbupaṭale madhureva śaktiḥ //MU_1,16.52//
GSP27moksop_u:1075: dehas sphurati saṃsāre so 'pi duḥkhāya kevalam //MU_1,17.1//
GSP27moksop_u:1077: yuktyā bhavyo 'py abhavyo me na jaḍo nāpi cetanaḥ //MU_1,17.2//
GSP27moksop_u:1079: na vivekī na mūḍhātmā moham eva prayacchati //MU_1,17.3//
GSP27moksop_u:1089: kasyātmīyaḥ kasya para āsthānāsthe kilātra ke //MU_1,17.8//
GSP27moksop_u:1091: nāvi dehalatāyāṃ ca kasya syād ātmabhāvanā //MU_1,17.9//
GSP27moksop_u:1109: luṭhatv abhyetu vā sthairyaṃ kim anena mune hi me //MU_1,17.18//
GSP27moksop_u:1139: kṣaṇaṃ vyāptaṃ prabhāpūrair neṣṭaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama //MU_1,17.33//
GSP27moksop_u:1146: kiṃ śriyā kiṃ ca kāyena kiṃ kāmena kim īhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:1147: dinaiḥ katipayair eva kālas sarvaṃ nikṛntati //MU_1,17.37//
GSP27moksop_u:1151: teṣu tāta kṛtaghneṣu kevāsthā vata dhīmataḥ //MU_1,17.39//
GSP27moksop_u:1153: na santyajati māṃ yāvat tāvad enaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_1,17.40//
GSP27moksop_u:1159: bhūyo 'py anubhavan kāyaḥ prākṛto hi na lajjate //MU_1,17.43//
GSP27moksop_u:1161: nocchrāyam eti na sthairyaṃ kāyaḥ kim iti pālyate //MU_1,17.44//
GSP27moksop_u:1162: jarākāle jarām eti mṛtyukāle tathā mṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:1167: saṃsārābdhāv ihohyante kañcit teṣu naraṃ viduḥ //MU_1,17.47//
GSP27moksop_u:1169: na dehalatayā kāryaṃ kiñcid asti vivekinaḥ //MU_1,17.48//
GSP27moksop_u:1170: majjan kardamakośeṣu jhagity eva jarāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1171: na jñāyate yāty acirāt kva kathaṃ dehadarduraḥ //MU_1,17.49//
GSP27moksop_u:1174: vāyor dīpasya manaso gacchato jñāyate gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1175: āgacchataś ca bhagavan na śarīraśarasya naḥ //MU_1,17.51//
GSP27moksop_u:1176: baddhāśā ye śarīreṣu baddhāśā ye jagatsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:1177: tān mohamadironmattān dhig dhig astu punaḥ punaḥ //MU_1,17.52//
GSP27moksop_u:1178: nāhaṃ dehasya no deho mama nāyam ahaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:1179: iti viśrāntacittā ye te mune puruṣottamāḥ //MU_1,17.53//
GSP27moksop_u:1186: na kiñcid api yasyāsti satyaṃ tena hatātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:1193: kāye sphuṭatarāpāye kṣaṇam āsthā na me dvija //MU_1,17.60//
GSP27moksop_u:1195: sthairyaṃ yena vinirṇītaṃ sa viśvasiti vigrahe //MU_1,17.61//
GSP27moksop_u:1197: sakaladoṣam idaṃ kukalevaraṃ tṛṇam ivāham upojjhya sukhaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_1,17.62//
GSP27moksop_u:1204: gṛdhnutā lolatā dainyaṃ sarvaṃ bālye pravartate //MU_1,18.2//
GSP27moksop_u:1206: daśāsu bandhanaṃ bālyam ālānaṃ kariṇīṣv iva //MU_1,18.3//
GSP27moksop_u:1207: na mṛtau na jarāroge na cāpadi na yauvane /
GSP27moksop_u:1208: tāś cintā vinikṛntanti hṛdayaṃ śaiśaveṣu yāḥ //MU_1,18.4//
GSP27moksop_u:1214: yad bhayaṃ śaiśave buddhyā kasyām āpadi tad bhavet //MU_1,18.7//
GSP27moksop_u:1219: ye doṣā ye durācārā duṣkramā ye durādhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1220: te sarve saṃsthitā bālye durgarta iva kauśikāḥ //MU_1,18.10//
GSP27moksop_u:1221: bālyaṃ ramyam iti vyarthabuddhayaḥ kathayanti ye /
GSP27moksop_u:1222: tān mūrkhapuruṣān brahman dhig astu hatacetasaḥ //MU_1,18.11//
GSP27moksop_u:1224: trailokyarājyam api tat kathaṃ bhavati tuṣṭaye //MU_1,18.12//
GSP27moksop_u:1225: sarveṣām eva sattvānāṃ sarvāvasthāsu caiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:1226: manaś cañcalatām eti bālye daśaguṇaṃ mune //MU_1,18.13//
GSP27moksop_u:1227: manaḥ prakṛtyaiva calaṃ bālyaṃ ca calatāvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:1230: cāpalaṃ śikṣitaṃ brahmañ śaiśavān manaso 'tha vā //MU_1,18.15//
GSP27moksop_u:1231: śaiśavaṃ ca manaś caiva sarvāsv eva hi vṛttiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:1235: navaṃ navaṃ prītikaraṃ na śiśuḥ pratyahaṃ yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:1236: prāpnoti tad asau yāti viṣavegasya mūrchanām //MU_1,18.18//
GSP27moksop_u:1238: amedhya eva ramate bālaḥ kauleyako yathā //MU_1,18.19//
GSP27moksop_u:1242: lolabuddhir vapur dhatte bālo duḥkhāya kevalam //MU_1,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:1244: duḥkham ety abalo bālo vinikṛtta ivāśaye //MU_1,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:1246: bālasya yāni duḥkhāni mune tāni na kasyacit //MU_1,18.23//
GSP27moksop_u:1253: sambhṛṣṭaṃ tuhinaṃ bhoktum indum ādātum ambarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:1254: vāñchyate yena maurkhyeṇa tat sukhāya kathaṃ bhavet //MU_1,18.27//
GSP27moksop_u:1259: śaiśave guruto bhītir mātṛtaḥ pitṛtas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:1262: iha na kasyacid eva mahāmune bhavati bālyam alaṃ parituṣṭidam //MU_1,18.31//
GSP27moksop_u:1269: vṛttīr anusaran yāti duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ jaḍaḥ //MU_1,19.2//
GSP27moksop_u:1273: arpayaty avaśaś ceto jvālānām ātmajaṃ yathā //MU_1,19.4//
GSP27moksop_u:1274: te te doṣā durārambhās tatra taṃ tādṛśāśayam /
GSP27moksop_u:1275: taruṇaṃ pravilumpanti dṛśyās te naiva ye mune //MU_1,19.5//
GSP27moksop_u:1277: yauvanena na ye naṣṭā naṣṭā nānyena te janāḥ //MU_1,19.6//
GSP27moksop_u:1279: bhīmā yauvanabhūr yena tīrṇā dhīras sa ucyate //MU_1,19.7//
GSP27moksop_u:1281: vidyutprakāśam aniśaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate //MU_1,19.8//
GSP27moksop_u:1283: taraṅgabhaṅguraṃ bhīmaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate //MU_1,19.9//
GSP27moksop_u:1287: dāhadoṣapradaṃ nityaṃ yauvanaṃ me na rocate //MU_1,19.11//
GSP27moksop_u:1288: madhuraṃ svādu tiktaṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ doṣabhūṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:1298: ye kecana durārambhās te sarve sarvaduḥkhadāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1299: tāruṇye sannidhiṃ yānti mahotpātā iva kṣaye //MU_1,19.17//
GSP27moksop_u:1305: yauvane dahyate jantus tarur dāvāgninā yathā //MU_1,19.20//
GSP27moksop_u:1306: vistīrṇāpi prasannāpi pāvany api hi yauvane /
GSP27moksop_u:1310: sā kāntā tau stanau pīnau te vilāsās tad ānanam /
GSP27moksop_u:1311: tāruṇya iti cintābhir yāti jarjaratāṃ janaḥ //MU_1,19.23//
GSP27moksop_u:1333: lagnam eva manobhṛṅgaṃ madayaty unnatiṃ gatā //MU_1,19.34//
GSP27moksop_u:1337: laharī jīvitāmbhodher yuvatā me na rocate //MU_1,19.36//
GSP27moksop_u:1339: yuvatāśarad asyāṃ hi na samāśvāsam arhatha //MU_1,19.37//
GSP27moksop_u:1340: jhagity eva prayāty eṣa śarīrād yuvatākhagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1342: yadā yadā parāṃ koṭim abhyārohati yauvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:1343: valganti sarasāḥ kāmās tadā nāśāya kevalam //MU_1,19.39//
GSP27moksop_u:1347: kāruṇyaṃ kuru tāruṇye mriyamāṇe sute yathā //MU_1,19.41//
GSP27moksop_u:1348: harṣam āyāti yo mohāt puruṣaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginā /
GSP27moksop_u:1349: yauvanena mahāmugdhas sa vai naramṛgas smṛtaḥ //MU_1,19.42//
GSP27moksop_u:1352: te dharmyās te mahātmānas ta eva puruṣā bhuvi /
GSP27moksop_u:1357: iha hi durlabham aṅga suyauvanaṃ jagati kānanam ambaragaṃ yathā //MU_1,19.46//
GSP27moksop_u:1364: samālokaya ramyaṃ cet kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi //MU_1,20.2//
GSP27moksop_u:1365: itaḥ keśā ito raktam itīyaṃ pramadātanuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1374: tathaivāṅgāni kāminyās tat praty api hi ko grahaḥ //MU_1,20.7//
GSP27moksop_u:1376: manye tad api nāsty atra mune mohaikakāraṇe //MU_1,20.8//
GSP27moksop_u:1378: ko viśeṣo vikāriṇyā madirāyā iha striyāḥ //MU_1,20.9//
GSP27moksop_u:1383: te vandyās te mahātmānas ta eva puruṣā bhuvi /
GSP27moksop_u:1385: jvalatām api dūre 'pi sarasā api nīrasam /
GSP27moksop_u:1386: striyo hi narakāgnīnāṃ dāru cāru ca dāruṇam //MU_1,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:1406: striyam āśritya saṃyātā parām iha hi saṃsthitim //MU_1,20.23//
GSP27moksop_u:1408: duḥkhaśṛṅkhalayā nityam alam astu mama striyā //MU_1,20.24//
GSP27moksop_u:1409: kiṃ stanena kim akṣṇā vā kiṃ nitambena kiṃ bhruvā /
GSP27moksop_u:1411: ito māṃsam ito raktam ito 'sthīni ca vāsaraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1412: brahman katipayair eva yāti strī viśarārutām //MU_1,20.26//
GSP27moksop_u:1413: yās tā niṣparuṣais tūlair lālitāḥ patibhis striyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1416: kāntena racitā brahmañ śīryate tat tu jaṅgale //MU_1,20.28//
GSP27moksop_u:1419: pibanti pāṃsavo raktaṃ kravyādāś cāpy anekaśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1422: sthitir mayā vaḥ kathitā kiṃ bhrāntim anudhāvatha //MU_1,20.31//
GSP27moksop_u:1424: rasād abhivahatv etat kathaṃ nāma dhiyānvitaḥ //MU_1,20.32//
GSP27moksop_u:1428: paraṃ moham upādatte yūthabhraṣṭo mṛgo yathā //MU_1,20.34//
GSP27moksop_u:1431: yasya strī tasya bhogecchā nisstrīkasya na bhogabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1432: striyaṃ tyaktvā jagat tyaktaṃ jagat tyaktvā sukhī bhavet //MU_1,20.36//
GSP27moksop_u:1434: brahman rame maraṇarogajarādibhītyā śāmyāmy ahaṃ param upaimi vanaṃ prayatnāt //MU_1,20.37//
GSP27moksop_u:1438: aparyāptaṃ hi bālatvaṃ bālyaṃ pibati yauvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:1439: yauvanaṃ ca jarā paścāt paśya karkaśatāṃ mithaḥ //MU_1,21.1//
GSP27moksop_u:1441: dehaṃ jarā jarayati sarit tīrataruṃ yathā //MU_1,21.2//
GSP27moksop_u:1443: samaṃ paśyanti kāminyaḥ puruṣaṃ karabhaṃ tathā //MU_1,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:1446: dāsāḥ putrās striyaś caiva bāndhavās suhṛdas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:1449: gṛdhro vṛkṣam ivādīrghaṃ gardho hy abhyeti vṛddhatām //MU_1,21.6//
GSP27moksop_u:1452: kartavyaṃ kiṃ mayā kaṣṭaṃ paratrety atidāruṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:1454: ko 'haṃ varākaḥ kim iva karomi katham eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:1466: śūnyaṃ nagaram ābhāti bhāti cchinnalato drumaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1467: bhāty anāvṛṣṭimān deśo na jarājarjaraṃ vapuḥ //MU_1,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:1471: pralunāti jarā dehaṃ kumārī kairavaṃ yathā //MU_1,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:1484: kācid asti jagaty asmin nāmaṅgalakarī tathā /

GSP27moksop_u:1978: ahaṅkāravaśād etat sa eva galito mama //MU_1,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:1980: ye lagnās tadvimokṣārthaṃ ye yatante ta uttamāḥ //MU_1,28.10//
GSP27moksop_u:1983: adya cet svasthayā buddhyā munīndra na cikitsyate /
GSP27moksop_u:1985: viṣaṃ viṣayavaiṣamyaṃ na viṣaṃ viṣam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:1987: na sukhāni na duḥkhāni na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:1988: na jīvitaṃ na maraṇaṃ bandhāya jñasya cetasaḥ //MU_1,28.14//
GSP27moksop_u:1989: tad bhavāmi yathā brahman pūrvāparavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:2000: troṭayāmy aham akrūrāṃ vāgurām iva kesarī //MU_1,28.20//
GSP27moksop_u:2003: vidyanta eveha na te mahātman durādhayo na kṣayam āpnuvanti /
GSP27moksop_u:2006: lolo yauvanalālanājalarayaś cety ākalayya drutaṃ mudraivādridṛḍhārpitā nanu mayā citte ciraṃ śāntaye //MU_1,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2020: nāvasthitim upāyāti na ca yāti yathepsitam /
GSP27moksop_u:2031: kiṃ tat sthitipadaṃ sādhu yatra śaṅkā na vidyate //MU_1,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2035: kathaṃ saṃsārapaṅkena pumān iha na lipyate //MU_1,29.13//
GSP27moksop_u:2042: saṃsāra eva nivasañ jano vyavaharann api /
GSP27moksop_u:2043: na bandhaṃ katham āyāti padmapattre payo yathā //MU_1,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2044: ātmavat tṛṇavad vedaṃ sakalaṃ janayañ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:2048: kiṃ tad yad ucitaṃ śreyaḥ kiṃ tat syād ucitaṃ phalam /
GSP27moksop_u:2050: tat tvaṃ kathaya me kiñcid yenāsya jagataḥ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:2053: yathā me jāyatāṃ brahmaṃs tathā nirvighnam ācara //MU_1,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:2054: kim iha syād upādeyaṃ kiṃ vā heyam athetarat /
GSP27moksop_u:2055: kathaṃ viśrāntim āyātu cetaś capalam adrivat //MU_1,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2060: prāpyāntaḥpūrṇatām antar na śocāmi yathā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2063: kadarthayantīha bhṛśaṃ vikalpāś śvāno vane deham ivālpajīvam //MU_1,29.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2077: ka upāyo gatiḥ kā vā kā cintā kas samāśrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2079: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:2080: sudhiyas tuccham apy etad yan na yāti naramyatām //MU_1,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:2082: kathaṃ susvādutām eti nīraso mūrkhatāṃ vinā //MU_1,30.8//
GSP27moksop_u:2091: kathaṃ ca vīravairāgnau patatāpi na dahyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2093: yasmāt kila jagaty asmin vyavahārakriyāṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:2094: na sthitis sambhavaty abdhau patitasyājalā yathā //MU_1,30.14//
GSP27moksop_u:2098: kṣayo yuktiṃ vinā nāsti brūta tām alam uttamāḥ //MU_1,30.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2099: vyavahāravato yuktyā duḥkhaṃ nāyāti me yayā /
GSP27moksop_u:2100: atha vāvyavahārasya brūta tāṃ gatim uttamām //MU_1,30.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2101: tat kathaṃ kena vā kiṃ vā kṛtam uttamacetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:2102: pūrvaṃ yenaiti viśrāmaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ manaḥ //MU_1,30.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2104: brūhi me sādhavo yena yūyaṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_1,30.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2105: atha vā tādṛśī brahman yuktir yadi na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2106: na vakti mama vā kaścid vidyamānām api sphuṭam //MU_1,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:2107: svayaṃ caiva na cāpnomi tāṃ viśrāntim anuttamām /
GSP27moksop_u:2109: na bhokṣye na pibāmy ambu nāhaṃ paridadhe 'mbaram /
GSP27moksop_u:2111: na ca tiṣṭhāmi kāryeṣu sampatsv āpaddaśāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:2112: na kiñcid abhivāñchāmi dehatyāgād ṛte mune //MU_1,30.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2117: nāham asya na me dehaś śāmyāmy asnehadīpavat /
GSP27moksop_u:2120: tūṣṇīṃ babhūva purato mahatāṃ ghanānāṃ kekāravaśramavaśād iva nīlakaṇṭhaḥ //MU_1,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2130: tā giro rāmabhadrasya tasya citrārpitair iva /
GSP27moksop_u:2136: tathā bhṛtyair amātyaiś ca pañjarasthaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2145: rāmasya tā vicitrārthā mahodārā giraś śrutāḥ //MU_1,31.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2171: apūrvam adya tv asmābhiś śrutaṃ śrutirasāyanam //MU_1,31.24//
GSP27moksop_u:2173: vītarāgatayā tad dhi vākpater apy agocaram //MU_1,31.25//
GSP27moksop_u:2174: aho vata mahat puṇyam adyāsmābhir idaṃ śrutam /
GSP27moksop_u:2177: kathitavān ucitaṃ raghunandanas sapadi tena vayaṃ pratibodhitāḥ //MU_1,31.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2185: patāmaḥ paritaḥ puṇyām etāṃ dāśarathīṃ sabhām /
GSP27moksop_u:2198: tārājāla ivāmbhodo vyāso hy atra vyarājata /
GSP27moksop_u:2201: āditya iva devānām aṅgirāś ca vyarājata //MU_1,32.10//
GSP27moksop_u:2219: rāmaṃ taṃ pūjayām āsuḥ puraḥ praṇatam āsthitam //MU_1,32.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2220: āsāṃ cakre ca tatrāsau rājalakṣmyā virājitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2221: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaś ca vāmadevaś ca mantriṇaḥ //MU_1,32.20//
GSP27moksop_u:2222: nārado devaputraś ca vyāsaś ca munipuṅgavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2223: marīcir atha durvāsā munir āṅgirasas tathā //MU_1,32.21//
GSP27moksop_u:2226: uddālaka ṛcīkaś ca śaryātiś cyavanas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:2227: ūṣmapāś ca ghṛtārciś ca śāluḍir vāluḍis tathā //MU_1,32.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2237: karoti rāghavaproktaṃ vacaḥ kasya na vismayam //MU_1,32.28//
GSP27moksop_u:2243: prajvalaty alam ālokakāriṇī sa pumān smṛtaḥ //MU_1,32.31//
GSP27moksop_u:2251: bhavyā hi viralā loke sahakāradrumā iva //MU_1,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:2253: asmin bhavyamatāv antar iyam anyeva dṛśyate //MU_1,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:2255: jāyante taravo deśe na tu candanapādapāḥ //MU_1,32.37//
GSP27moksop_u:2257: na tv apūrvacamatkāro lavaṅgas sulabhas sadā //MU_1,32.38//
GSP27moksop_u:2263: dhanyā dhuri satāṃ gaṇyās ta eva puruṣottamāḥ //MU_1,32.41//
GSP27moksop_u:2264: na rāmeṇa samo 'stīha triṣu lokeṣu kaścana /
GSP27moksop_u:2265: vivekavān udārātmā mahātmā ceti no matiḥ //MU_1,32.42//
GSP27moksop_u:2267: phalati no tad ime vayam eva hi sphuṭataraṃ munayo hatabuddhayaḥ //MU_1,32.43//
GSP27moksop_u:2274: rāmam agragataṃ prītyā viśvāmitro 'py uvāca ha //MU_2,1.1//
GSP27moksop_u:2276: tava rāghava nāsty anyaj jñeyaṃ jñānavatāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:2277: svayaiva sūkṣmayā buddhyā sarvaṃ vijñātavān asi //MU_2,1.2//
GSP27moksop_u:2284: dhiyāpy ādau na viśrāntaṃ viśrāntaṃ ca dhiyā punaḥ //MU_2,1.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2289: pārśve tava pitur vyāso bhagavān bhāskaradyutiḥ //MU_2,1.7//
GSP27moksop_u:2291: śuko nāma mahāprājño yajño mūrtyeva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_2,1.8//
GSP27moksop_u:2293: taveva kila tasyāpi viveka udabhūd bhṛśam //MU_2,1.9//
GSP27moksop_u:2295: vicārya suciraṃ cāru yat satyaṃ tad avāptavān //MU_2,1.10//
GSP27moksop_u:2296: svayaṃ prāpte pare vastuny aviśrāntamanās tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2297: nedaṃ vastv iti viśvāsaṃ nāsāv ātmany upāyayau //MU_2,1.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2303: kathaṃ ca praśamaṃ yāti kiyat kasya kadeti ca //MU_2,1.14//
GSP27moksop_u:2306: ajñāsiṣaṃ pūrvam etad aham ity atha tatpituḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2307: sa śukaś śuddhayā buddhyā na vākyaṃ bahv amanyata //MU_2,1.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2309: pratyuvāca punaḥ putraṃ nāhaṃ jānāmi tattvataḥ //MU_2,1.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2311: yathāvad vetty asau vedyaṃ tasmāt sarvam avāpsyasi //MU_2,1.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2312: pitrety uktaś śukaḥ prāyāt sumeror vasudhātalam /
GSP27moksop_u:2315: dvāri vyāsasuto rājañ śuko 'tra sthitavān iti //MU_2,1.20//
GSP27moksop_u:2317: uktvā babhūva janakas tūṣṇīṃ saptadināny api //MU_2,1.21//
GSP27moksop_u:2318: tataḥ praveśayām āsa janakaś śukam aṅganam /
GSP27moksop_u:2321: rājā na dṛśyate tāvad iti saptadināni tam //MU_2,1.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2324: te bhogās tāni duḥkhāni vyāsaputrasya tan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2327: atiṣṭhad atra sa śukas sampūrṇa iva candramāḥ //MU_2,1.26//
GSP27moksop_u:2328: parijñātasvabhāvaṃ taṃ śukaṃ sa janako nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2331: kim īpsitaṃ tavety āśu kṛtasvāgatam āha tam //MU_2,1.28//
GSP27moksop_u:2334: kathaṃ praśamam āyāti yathāvat kathayāśu me //MU_2,1.29//
GSP27moksop_u:2337: tad eva yat purā proktaṃ tasya pitrā mahātmanā //MU_2,1.30//
GSP27moksop_u:2339: svayam eva mayā pūrvam etaj jñātaṃ vivekataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2340: etāvad eva pṛṣṭena pitrā me samudāhṛtam //MU_2,1.31//
GSP27moksop_u:2341: bhavatāpy eṣa evārthaḥ kathito vāgvidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:2342: eṣa eva ca vākyārthaś śāstreṣu paridṛśyate //MU_2,1.32//
GSP27moksop_u:2345: tat kim etan mahābāho satyaṃ brūhi mamāmalam /
GSP27moksop_u:2346: tvatto viśrāmam āpnoti ceto mā bhramatāj jagat //MU_2,1.34//
GSP27moksop_u:2348: nātaḥ parataraḥ kaścin niścayo 'sty aparo mune /
GSP27moksop_u:2349: svayam etat tvayā jñātaṃ gurutaś ca punaś śrutam //MU_2,1.35//
GSP27moksop_u:2351: sa saṅkalpavaśād baddho nissaṅkalpaś ca mucyate //MU_2,1.36//
GSP27moksop_u:2352: yena tv etat sphuṭaṃ jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2353: bhogebhyo viratir jātā dṛśyād vā sakalād iha //MU_2,1.37//
GSP27moksop_u:2354: tava cālaṃ mahāvīra matir viratim āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:2357: tiṣṭhatas tapasi sphāre pitus tava yathā tava //MU_2,1.39//
GSP27moksop_u:2361: na dṛśye patasi brahman muktas tvaṃ bhrāntim utsṛja //MU_2,1.41//
GSP27moksop_u:2362: anuśiṣṭas sa ity evaṃ janakena mahātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:2369: salilakaṇa ivāmbudhau mahātmā vigalitabhedam athaikatāṃ jagāma //MU_2,1.45//
GSP27moksop_u:2376: svadante 'smai na yad bhogā rogā iva sumedhase //MU_2,2.2//
GSP27moksop_u:2377: jñātajñeyasya manaso nūnam etad dhi lakṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:2378: na svadante samagrāṇi bhogavṛndāni yat punaḥ //MU_2,2.3//
GSP27moksop_u:2380: tayaiva śāntayā yāti bandho jagati tānavam //MU_2,2.4//
GSP27moksop_u:2381: vāsanātānavaṃ rāma mokṣa ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2385: samyak paśyati yas tajjño jñātajñeyas tu paṇḍitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2386: na svadante balād eva tasmai bhogā mahātmane //MU_2,2.7//
GSP27moksop_u:2388: bhuvi bhogā na rocante sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_2,2.8//
GSP27moksop_u:2389: jñeyaṃ yāvan na vijñātaṃ tāvat tāta na jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2390: viṣayeṣv aratir jantor marubhūmau latā yathā //MU_2,2.9//
GSP27moksop_u:2391: ata eva hi vijñātajñeyaṃ viddhi raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:2392: yad enaṃ rañjayanty etā na ramyā bhogabhūmayaḥ //MU_2,2.10//
GSP27moksop_u:2393: rāmo yad etaj jānāti tad vastv ity eva sanmukhāt /
GSP27moksop_u:2398: yuktiṃ kathayatu śrīmān vasiṣṭho bhagavān ayam //MU_2,2.13//
GSP27moksop_u:2399: raghūṇām eṣa sarveṣāṃ prabhuḥ kulagurus sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:2401: vasiṣṭha bhagavan pūrvaṃ kaccit smarasi yat svayaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:2405: yena yuktimatā brahmañ jñāneneyaṃ hi vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:2406: saṃsārī nūnam āyāti śamaṃ śyāmeva bhāsvatā //MU_2,2.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2408: brahmann upadiśāśu tvaṃ yena viśrāntim eṣyati //MU_2,2.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2409: kadarthanā ca naivaiṣā rāmo hi gatakilbiṣaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2411: taj jñānaṃ sa ca śāstrārthas tad vaidagdhyam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:2414: tat prayāty apavitratvaṃ gokṣīraṃ śvadṛtāv iva //MU_2,2.21//
GSP27moksop_u:2416: vadanti tvādṛśā yat tu tatra viśrāmyatīha dhīḥ //MU_2,2.22//
GSP27moksop_u:2418: munayas te tam evārthaṃ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan //MU_2,2.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2420: brahmeva brahmaṇaḥ putro vasiṣṭho bhagavān muniḥ //MU_2,2.24//
GSP27moksop_u:2422: mune yad ādiśasi me tad avighnaṃ karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:2423: kas samarthas samartho 'pi satāṃ laṅghayituṃ vacaḥ //MU_2,2.25//
GSP27moksop_u:2427: niṣadhādrau purā proktaṃ yaj jñānaṃ padmajanmanā //MU_2,2.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2434: pūrvam uktaṃ bhagavatā yaj jñānaṃ padmajanmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:2435: sargādau lokaśāntyarthaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham //MU_2,3.1//
GSP27moksop_u:2438: imaṃ tāvat kṣaṇaṃ jātaṃ saṃśayaṃ me nivāraya //MU_2,3.2//
GSP27moksop_u:2439: pitā śukasya sarvajño gurur vyāso mahāmuniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2440: videhamukto na kathaṃ kathaṃ muktas suto 'sya saḥ //MU_2,3.3//
GSP27moksop_u:2443: utpatyotpatya līnā ye na saṅkhyām upayānti te //MU_2,3.4//
GSP27moksop_u:2445: śakyante naiva saṅkhyātuṃ tāś ca kāścana kenacit //MU_2,3.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2447: ye tāṃś ca parisaṅkhyātuṃ saṅkathaiva na vidyate //MU_2,3.6//
GSP27moksop_u:2450: tāsāṃ vicāraṇaṃ yuktaṃ vartamānāsu kā kathā //MU_2,3.7//
GSP27moksop_u:2456: evaṃ mṛtā mriyante ca mariṣyanti ca koṭayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2457: bhūtānāṃ yā jaganty āsām uditāni pṛthak pṛthak //MU_2,3.10//
GSP27moksop_u:2463: iha loko 'yam ity eva jīvākāśe vijṛmbhate //MU_2,3.13//
GSP27moksop_u:2465: paralokaṃ kalpayati mṛtas tatra tathā punaḥ //MU_2,3.14//
GSP27moksop_u:2466: tadantar anye puruṣās teṣām antas tathā pare /
GSP27moksop_u:2469: mṛtānāṃ santi tatrāpi tathāpy eṣāṃ jagadbhramāḥ //MU_2,3.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2473: bhūyo bhūyo vivartante ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ //MU_2,3.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2476: imaṃ vyāsamuniṃ tatra dvātriṃśaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:2483: utpadyante vilīyante kadācic ca pṛthak pṛthak //MU_2,3.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2485: sa evānyaś ca lokaś ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti vedmy aham //MU_2,3.24//
GSP27moksop_u:2490: bhāvyam adyāpy aneneha nanu vārāṣṭakaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2492: kṛtvā vedavibhāgaṃ ca nītvānena kulaṃ prathām /
GSP27moksop_u:2493: brahmatvaṃ ca tato gatvā bhāvyaṃ vaidehamokṣiṇā //MU_2,3.28//
GSP27moksop_u:2497: samāni santi bhūtāni sarge sarge punaḥ punaḥ //MU_2,3.30//
GSP27moksop_u:2498: kvacit sargaśatais tāni bhavanti na bhavanti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:2512: sadehā vāstv adehā vā muktatā viṣayena vaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2518: yad evāmbu taraṅgatve saumyatve 'pi tad eva tat //MU_2,4.4//
GSP27moksop_u:2520: saspando 'stv atha vāspando vāyur eva kilānilaḥ //MU_2,4.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2521: sadehā vā videhā vā muktatā na pramāspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:2522: asmākam asyās tu yadā svaikatāsty avibhāginī //MU_2,4.6//
GSP27moksop_u:2525: sarvam eveha hi sadā saṃsāre raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:2530: kalpitaṃ mohibhir mandair daivaṃ kiñcin na vidyate //MU_2,4.10//
GSP27moksop_u:2532: tat pauruṣaṃ tat saphalam anyad unmattaceṣṭitam //MU_2,4.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2533: yo yam arthaṃ kāmayate tad arthaṃ cehate kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:2534: avaśyaṃ tam avāpnoti na ced ardhān nivartate //MU_2,4.12//
GSP27moksop_u:2540: kaścid eva pumān eṣa puruṣottamatāṃ gataḥ //MU_2,4.15//
GSP27moksop_u:2543: prāktanaṃ caihikaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ viddhi pauruṣam /
GSP27moksop_u:2548: abhimataphalabharasiddhyai bhavati hi sānyā tv anarthāya //MU_2,4.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2549: kasyāñcit svayam ātmadussthitivaśāt puṃso daśāyāṃ śanair aṅgulyagranipīḍitaikaculukād ācāmabindur bahuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2550: kasyāñcij jalarāśiparvatapuradvīpāntarālaṅkṛtā kartavyocitasaṃvibhāgakaraṇe pṛthvī na pṛthvī bhavet //MU_2,4.20//
GSP27moksop_u:2556: manasā vāñchyate yat tu yathāśāstraṃ na karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:2559: svakarmaiveti vāstv anyā vyatiriktā na daivadṛk //MU_2,5.3//
GSP27moksop_u:2560: ucchāstraṃ śāstritaṃ ceti pauruṣaṃ dvividhaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:2562: dvau huḍāv iva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau /
GSP27moksop_u:2563: ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jayaty atibalas tayoḥ //MU_2,5.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2564: anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt /
GSP27moksop_u:2566: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan /
GSP27moksop_u:2569: balād adhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣād adhikā na sā //MU_2,5.8//
GSP27moksop_u:2571: prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvad aśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam //MU_2,5.9//
GSP27moksop_u:2574: asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:2583: vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt //MU_2,5.15//
GSP27moksop_u:2585: aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiñcana //MU_2,5.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2587: svabhujābhyām imau sarpāv iti prekṣya palāyatām //MU_2,5.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2588: daivaṃ samprerayati mām iti mugdhadhiyāṃ mukham /
GSP27moksop_u:2594: pauruṣaṃ ca na cānantaṃ na yan nāmābhivāñchyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2596: yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2605: guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthas samprāpyate hi taiḥ //MU_2,5.26//
GSP27moksop_u:2606: iti pratyakṣato dṛṣṭam anubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ kṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:2607: daivottham iti manyante ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ //MU_2,5.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2608: ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagaty anarthaḥ ko na syād bahudhaniko bahuśruto vā /
GSP27moksop_u:2609: ālasyād iyam avanis sasāgarāntā sampūrṇā narapaśubhiś ca nirdhanaiś ca //MU_2,5.28//
GSP27moksop_u:2613: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:2614: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_2,5.30//
GSP27moksop_u:2618: tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyat tat projjhya dūrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2620: yathā yathā prayatnas syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:2621: iti pauruṣam evāsti daivam astu tad eva vaḥ //MU_2,6.2//
GSP27moksop_u:2622: duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2623: hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyas tathā hā daivam ity api //MU_2,6.3//
GSP27moksop_u:2625: bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva taj jetum iha śakyate //MU_2,6.4//
GSP27moksop_u:2627: yathāśu śubhatāṃ yāti prāktanaṃ kukṛtaṃ tathā //MU_2,6.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2629: te mūḍhāḥ prākṛtā dīnās sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_2,6.6//
GSP27moksop_u:2630: pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivād yad abhinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:2634: yat prayānti jagadbhāvās saṃsiddhā api saṅkṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:2636: bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yat kriyate balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:2639: alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate //MU_2,6.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2641: yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat //MU_2,6.12//
GSP27moksop_u:2642: śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:2643: tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā //MU_2,6.13//
GSP27moksop_u:2645: tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ //MU_2,6.14//
GSP27moksop_u:2647: sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ //MU_2,6.15//
GSP27moksop_u:2651: daivaṃ jetum ato yatnair bālo yūneva śakyate //MU_2,6.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2652: meghena nīyate yad vā vatsaropārjitā kṛṣiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2654: krameṇopārjite 'py arthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā /
GSP27moksop_u:2655: na balaṃ yatra me śaktaṃ tatra kā paridevanā //MU_2,6.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2656: yan na śaknomi tasyārthe yadi duḥkhaṃ karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:2663: aihikaḥ puruṣārthaś ca jayaty abhyadhikas tayoḥ //MU_2,6.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2664: karma yaḥ prāktanaṃ tucchaṃ na nihanti śubhehitaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2667: sa niryāti jaganmohān mṛgendraḥ pañjarād iva //MU_2,6.25//
GSP27moksop_u:2668: kaścin māṃ prerayaty evam ity anarthakukalpane /
GSP27moksop_u:2669: yas sthito dṛṣṭam utsṛjya tyājyo 'sau dūrato 'dhamaḥ //MU_2,6.26//
GSP27moksop_u:2679: sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate 'tyantaṃ te sevyāś śāstrasādhavaḥ //MU_2,6.31//
GSP27moksop_u:2680: prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tac ced daivaśabdena kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2681: tad yuktam etad etasmin nāmni nāpavadāmahe //MU_2,6.32//
GSP27moksop_u:2682: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivam anyad yais te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2685: adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava //MU_2,6.34//
GSP27moksop_u:2686: karāmalakavad dṛṣṭaṃ pauruṣād eva yat phalam /
GSP27moksop_u:2689: tad anapekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam ātmanaḥ //MU_2,6.36//
GSP27moksop_u:2690: śāstrais sadācaritajṛṃbhitadeśadharmair yat kalpitaṃ phalam atīva ciraprarūḍham /
GSP27moksop_u:2691: tasmin hṛdi sphurati no 'param eti cittam aṅgāvalī tadanu pauruṣam etad āhuḥ //MU_2,6.37//
GSP27moksop_u:2692: buddhvaiva pauruṣaphalaṃ puruṣatvam etad ātmaprayatnaparataiva sadaiva kāryā /
GSP27moksop_u:2693: neyā tatas saphalatāṃ paramām athāsau sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena //MU_2,6.38//
GSP27moksop_u:2695: nityam eva jayatīti bhāvitaiḥ kārya āryajanasevanodyamaḥ //MU_2,6.39//
GSP27moksop_u:2696: janmaprabandhamayam āmayam eṣa jīvo buddhvaihikaṃ sahajapauruṣam eva siddhyai /
GSP27moksop_u:2697: śāntiṃ nayatv avitathena varauṣadhena pṛṣṭena tuṣṭiparapaṇḍitasevanena //MU_2,6.40//
GSP27moksop_u:2702: tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād yathā bhūyo na jāyate //MU_2,7.1//
GSP27moksop_u:2704: iha cāmutra ca jayet sa sampūrṇābhivāñchitam //MU_2,7.2//
GSP27moksop_u:2706: te dharmam arthakāmau ca nāśayanty ātmavidviṣaḥ //MU_2,7.3//
GSP27moksop_u:2711: ābālyam etat saṃsiddhaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:2712: daivaṃ tu na kvacid dṛṣṭam ato jayati pauruṣam //MU_2,7.6//
GSP27moksop_u:2721: śāstrato gurutaś caiva svataś ceti trisiddhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:2725: yac chreyo yad atucchaṃ ca yad apāyavivarjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:2726: tat tad ācara yatnena putreti guravas sthitāḥ //MU_2,7.13//
GSP27moksop_u:2727: yathā yathā prayatno me phalam āśu tathā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:2728: ity ahaṃ pauruṣād eva phalabhāṅ na tu daivataḥ //MU_2,7.14//
GSP27moksop_u:2729: pauruṣād dṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣo dhīmatāṃ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2733: bhoktā tṛpyati nābhoktā gantā gacchati nāgatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2734: vaktā vakti na cāvaktā pauruṣaṃ saphalaṃ nṛṇām //MU_2,7.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2737: yo yo yathā prayatate sa sa tadvat phalaikabhāk /
GSP27moksop_u:2738: na tu tūṣṇīṃ sthiteneha kenacit prāpyate phalam //MU_2,7.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2742: prāptā cireṇa śīghraṃ vā yāsau daivam iti smṛtā //MU_2,7.21//
GSP27moksop_u:2743: na daivaṃ dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca lokāntare sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:2744: uktaṃ daivābhidhānena svaṃ loke karmaṇaḥ phalam //MU_2,7.22//
GSP27moksop_u:2745: puruṣo jāyate loke vardhate kṣīyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2748: vyāpāraś ca tathāṅgānāṃ pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ //MU_2,7.24//
GSP27moksop_u:2756: tad yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt te sevyāś śāstrasādhavaḥ //MU_2,7.28//
GSP27moksop_u:2758: vardhete te mitho 'bhyāsāt sarobdāv iva kālataḥ //MU_2,7.29//
GSP27moksop_u:2762: racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ //MU_2,7.31//
GSP27moksop_u:2763: jagati puruṣakārakāraṇe 'smin kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam /
GSP27moksop_u:2764: vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅka eva //MU_2,7.32//
GSP27moksop_u:2768: nākṛtir na ca karmāṇi nāspadaṃ na parākramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2769: tan mithyājñānavat prauḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate //MU_2,8.1//
GSP27moksop_u:2775: adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava //MU_2,8.4//
GSP27moksop_u:2777: daivād dāho 'stu mā veti vaktavyaṃ tena pāvake //MU_2,8.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2778: daivam eveha cet karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā /
GSP27moksop_u:2780: kiṃ vā śāstropadeśena mūko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:2782: na ca nisspandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:2783: spandāś ca phalasamprāptis tasmād daivaṃ nirarthakam //MU_2,8.8//
GSP27moksop_u:2785: hastādīn īhataś caiva na daivena kvacit kṛtam //MU_2,8.9//
GSP27moksop_u:2787: āgopālaṃ kila prājñais tena daivam asat sadā //MU_2,8.10//
GSP27moksop_u:2788: buddheś cet pṛthag anyo 'rthas saiva cet kānyatā tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2789: kalpanā vā pramāṇaṃ cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate //MU_2,8.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2791: mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmād daivaṃ na vidyate //MU_2,8.12//
GSP27moksop_u:2792: viniyoktātha bhūtānām asty anyas taj jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:2796: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparās te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2797: prājñās tu puruṣārthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ //MU_2,8.15//
GSP27moksop_u:2798: ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2799: tais taiḥ kair iva loke 'smin vada daivaṃ pracakṣyate //MU_2,8.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2801: sa cej jīvati sañchinnaśirās tad daivam uttamam //MU_2,8.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2803: anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaś ced daivam uttamam //MU_2,8.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2806: amībhir aparai rāma puruṣair munitāṃ gataiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2812: rāma pauruṣayuktyaiva salilaṃ dhāryate na vā /
GSP27moksop_u:2813: ciraṃ karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam //MU_2,8.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2815: śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadher iva //MU_2,8.24//
GSP27moksop_u:2817: tvam anavekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam uttamam //MU_2,8.25//
GSP27moksop_u:2822: yal loke tad vada brahman daivam evaṃ kim ucyate //MU_2,9.1//
GSP27moksop_u:2825: phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam //MU_2,9.2//
GSP27moksop_u:2826: daivaṃ na kiñcit kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2831: prāptir iṣṭāpy aniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate //MU_2,9.5//
GSP27moksop_u:2834: na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacit kiñcid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:2835: daivam ākāśakalpaṃ hi karoti na karoti vā //MU_2,9.7//
GSP27moksop_u:2837: idam itthaṃ sthitir iti yoktis tad daivam ucyate //MU_2,9.8//
GSP27moksop_u:2838: itthaṃ mamābhavad buddhir itthaṃ me niścayo hy abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:2839: iti karmaphalāvāptir yoktis tad daivam ucyate //MU_2,9.9//
GSP27moksop_u:2844: tad etad daivam ity uktam apamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tvayā //MU_2,9.11//
GSP27moksop_u:2846: sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'khilam /
GSP27moksop_u:2847: daivaṃ nāstīti te yena sthirā buddhir bhaviṣyati //MU_2,9.12//
GSP27moksop_u:2848: yā magnā vāsanā pūrvaṃ babhūva kila bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2850: jantur yadvāsano nāma tatkarmā bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:2852: grāmago grāmam āpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam /
GSP27moksop_u:2853: yo yo yadvāsanas tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā //MU_2,9.15//
GSP27moksop_u:2854: yad eva tīvrasaṃvegād iha karma kṛtaṃ purā /
GSP27moksop_u:2855: tad eva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate //MU_2,9.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2856: evaṃ daivaṃ svakarmāṇi karma prauḍhā svavāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:2857: vāsanā manaso nānyā mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ //MU_2,9.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2858: yad daivaṃ tāni karmāṇi karma sādho mano hi tat /
GSP27moksop_u:2859: mano hi puruṣas tasmād daivaṃ nāstīti niścayaḥ //MU_2,9.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2860: ekam eva mano jantor yathā prayatate hi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:2861: nūnaṃ tat tad avāpnoti svata eva na daivataḥ //MU_2,9.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2862: manaś cittaṃ vāsanā ca karma daivaṃ svaniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2865: nityaṃ prayatate rāma phalam āpnoty alaṃ tathā //MU_2,9.21//
GSP27moksop_u:2867: prāpyate netareṇeha tasmāt sa śubhado 'stu te //MU_2,9.22//
GSP27moksop_u:2870: mune tathaiva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomy aham //MU_2,9.23//
GSP27moksop_u:2872: ata eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:2874: dvividho vāsanāvyūhaś śubhaś caivāśubhaś ca te /
GSP27moksop_u:2875: prāktano vidyate rāma dvayor ekataro 'tha vā //MU_2,9.25//
GSP27moksop_u:2876: vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase /
GSP27moksop_u:2877: tat krameṇa śubhenaiva padaṃ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam //MU_2,9.26//
GSP27moksop_u:2878: atha ced aśubho bhāvas tvāṃ yojayati saṅkaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:2879: prāktanas tad asau yatnāj jetavyo bhavatā balāt //MU_2,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2880: prājña cetanamātraṃ tvaṃ na dehas tvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2881: tad eva cetasy anyena cet tat tvaṃ kveva vidyase //MU_2,9.28//
GSP27moksop_u:2882: anyas tvāṃ cetayati cet tat tvayy asati ko 'paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2883: kam imaṃ cetayet tasmād anavasthā na vāstavī //MU_2,9.29//
GSP27moksop_u:2888: aśubhāc calitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmād apītarat /
GSP27moksop_u:2889: jantoś cittaṃ tu paśuvat tasmāt tat pālayet sadā //MU_2,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:2893: śubho vāpy aśubho rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru //MU_2,9.34//
GSP27moksop_u:2896: idānīm api te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:2898: pūrvaṃ ced ghanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāt tava vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:2899: vardhiṣyate tu nedānīm api tāta sukhī bhava //MU_2,9.37//
GSP27moksop_u:2900: sandigdhāyām api bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara /
GSP27moksop_u:2901: asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhād doṣo na kaścana //MU_2,9.38//
GSP27moksop_u:2902: yad yad abhyasyate loke tanmayenaiva bhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:2904: śubhavāsanayā yuktas tad atra bhava bhūtaye /
GSP27moksop_u:2909: śubho 'py asau tvayā tyājyo bhāvanaugho nirādhinā //MU_2,9.42//
GSP27moksop_u:2910: yad atisubhagam āryasevitaṃ tac chubham anusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā /
GSP27moksop_u:2911: adhigamaya padaṃ sadā viśokaṃ tad anu tad apy avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha //MU_2,9.43//
GSP27moksop_u:2916: ekāgraṃ kuru cittaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama //MU_2,10.1//
GSP27moksop_u:2926: mokṣopāyam ito rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ imaṃ śṛṇu //MU_2,10.6//
GSP27moksop_u:2927: imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvair vivekibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2928: padaṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate //MU_2,10.7//
GSP27moksop_u:2933: kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho //MU_2,10.9//
GSP27moksop_u:2942: so 'sṛjat sakalaṃ sargaṃ vikalpaughaṃ yathā manaḥ //MU_2,10.13//
GSP27moksop_u:2947: janasya tasya duḥkhaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā sakalalokakṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:2948: jagāma karuṇām īśaḥ putraduḥkhād yathā pitā //MU_2,10.16//
GSP27moksop_u:2950: syād iti kṣaṇam ekāgraś cintayām āsa bhūtapaḥ //MU_2,10.17//
GSP27moksop_u:2951: iti sañcintya bhagavān sasarja punar īśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2952: tapo dharmaṃ ca dānaṃ ca satyaṃ tīrthāni caiva ha //MU_2,10.18//
GSP27moksop_u:2953: etat sṛṣṭvā punar devaś cintayām āsa bhūtakṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:2954: puṃsāṃ nānena sarvasya duḥkhasyānta iti svayam //MU_2,10.19//
GSP27moksop_u:2955: nirvāṇaṃ nāma paramaṃ sukhaṃ yena punar janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2956: na jāyate na mriyate taj jñānād eva labhyate //MU_2,10.20//
GSP27moksop_u:2957: saṃsārottaraṇe jantor upāyo jñānam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:2958: tapo dānaṃ tathā tīrtham aṇūpāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //MU_2,10.21//
GSP27moksop_u:2964: pitus tasya puraś śīghram ūrmer ūrmir ivānagha //MU_2,10.24//
GSP27moksop_u:2967: ehi putreti mām uktvā sa svābjasyottare dale /
GSP27moksop_u:2968: śukle 'bhra iva śītāṃśuṃ yojayām āsa pāṇinā //MU_2,10.26//
GSP27moksop_u:2970: mām uvāca pitā brahmā sa haṃsas sārasaṃ yathā //MU_2,10.27//
GSP27moksop_u:2974: ahaṃ vismṛtavān sarvaṃ svarūpam amalaṃ dvijaḥ //MU_2,10.29//
GSP27moksop_u:2975: athāhaṃ dīnatāṃ yātas sthitas sambuddhayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:2978: iti cintitavān antas tūṣṇīm eva vyavasthitaḥ //MU_2,10.31//
GSP27moksop_u:2979: athābhyadhāt sa māṃ tātaḥ putra kiṃ duḥkhavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:2980: duḥkhopaghātaṃ māṃ pṛccha sukhī nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi //MU_2,10.32//
GSP27moksop_u:2981: tataḥ pṛṣṭas sa bhagavān mayā sakalalokakṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:2983: kathaṃ nāma mahad duḥkham ayaṃ saṃsāra āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2984: kathaṃ ca kṣīyate jantor iti pṛṣṭena tena me //MU_2,10.34//
GSP27moksop_u:2985: taj jñānaṃ subahu proktaṃ yaj jñātvā pāvanaṃ param /
GSP27moksop_u:2986: ahaṃ pitur api prāyaḥ kilādhika iva sthitaḥ //MU_2,10.35//
GSP27moksop_u:2989: śāpenājñapadaṃ nītvā pṛcchakas tvaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:2991: idānīṃ śāntaśāpas tvaṃ paraṃ bodham upāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3001: kartavyam asti mama neha hi kiñcid eva sthātavyam ity abhimanā bhuvi saṃsthito 'smi /
GSP27moksop_u:3002: saṃśāntayā satatasuptadhiyeva vṛttyā kāryaṃ karomi na ca kiñcid ahaṃ karomi //MU_2,10.43//
GSP27moksop_u:3006: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ jñānāvataraṇaṃ bhuvi /
GSP27moksop_u:3008: tad idaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śrotum adya tavānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:3015: jātas spandamayo nityam ūrmir ambunidhāv iva //MU_2,11.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3016: sṛṣṭvaivam ātataṃ sargaṃ sargasya sakalā gatīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3019: moham ālokya lokānāṃ kāruṇyam agamat prabhuḥ //MU_2,11.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3020: tato mām īśvaras sṛṣṭvā jñānenāyojya cāsakṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:3026: maharṣibhis tatas tais tu kṣīṇe kṛtayuge purā /
GSP27moksop_u:3027: kramāt kriyākrame śuddhe pṛthivyāṃ tanutāṃ gate //MU_2,11.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3032: kālacakre vahaty asmiṃs tato vigalite krame /
GSP27moksop_u:3036: tato yuddhaṃ vinā bhūpā mahīṃ pālayituṃ kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:3037: asamarthās tad āyātāḥ prajābhis saha dīnatām //MU_2,11.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3043: jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_2,11.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3045: asmād daśarathād rāma jāto 'dya tvam ihāvanau //MU_2,11.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3048: sarvasyaiva hi bhavyasya sādhor api vivekinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3050: idaṃ tv apūrvam utpannaṃ camatkārakaraṃ satām /
GSP27moksop_u:3052: bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko nāma na virajyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3054: te mahānto mahāprajñā nimittena vinaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:3057: rājate hi dhiyā jantur yuveva vanamālayā //MU_2,11.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3062: śmaśānam āpadaṃ dainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na virajyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3063: tad vairāgyaṃ paraṃ śreyas svato yad abhijāyate //MU_2,11.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3073: bhramantīha janā yāvan na paśyanti paraṃ padam //MU_2,11.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3074: yathābhūtam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraṃ tanmayīṃ dhiyam /
GSP27moksop_u:3075: parityajya paraṃ yānti nirālānā gajā iva //MU_2,11.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3077: dehamuktā mahātantur vinā jñānaṃ na naśyati //MU_2,11.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3083: cirāyāntar dahanty etā vinā yuktim anindita //MU_2,11.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3085: jñānayuktiṃ vinā kena sahyatāṃ yānti sādhuṣu //MU_2,11.39//
GSP27moksop_u:3087: duḥkhacintā naraṃ mūḍhaṃ tṛṇam agniśikhā iva //MU_2,11.40//
GSP27moksop_u:3089: na dahanti vanaṃ varṣadabdam agniśikhā iva //MU_2,11.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3092: tattvaṃ jñātum ato yatnād dhīmān eva hi dhīmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3097: yaḥ pṛcchati naraṃ tasmān nāsti mūḍhataro 'paraḥ //MU_2,11.45//
GSP27moksop_u:3099: nānutiṣṭhati yo vākyaṃ nānyas tasmān narādhamaḥ //MU_2,11.46//
GSP27moksop_u:3101: yaḥ karoti naraḥ praśnaṃ pṛcchakas sa mahāmatiḥ //MU_2,11.47//
GSP27moksop_u:3102: anirṇīya pravaktāraṃ bālaḥ praśnaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3103: adhamaḥ pṛcchakas sa syān na mahārthasya bhājanam //MU_2,11.48//
GSP27moksop_u:3107: yo vakti tam iha prājñāḥ prāhur mūḍhatamaṃ naram //MU_2,11.50//
GSP27moksop_u:3109: ahaṃ ca vaktuṃ jānāmi sa ca yogo 'yam āvayoḥ //MU_2,11.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3110: yad ahaṃ vacmi tad yatnāt tvayā śabdārthakovida /
GSP27moksop_u:3111: etad vastv iti nirṇīya hṛdi kāryam akhaṇḍitaṃ //MU_2,11.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3113: tvayi vastu lagaty antaḥ kuṅkumāmbu yathāṃśuke //MU_2,11.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3115: viśaty arthaṃ tava prajñā jalamadhyam ivārkabhā //MU_2,11.54//
GSP27moksop_u:3116: yad yad vacmi tavādeyaṃ hṛdi kāryaṃ prayatnataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3117: na cet praṣṭavya evāhaṃ na tvayeha nirarthakam //MU_2,11.55//
GSP27moksop_u:3121: ciraṃ dūrataraṃ kṛtvā pūjanīyā hi sādhavaḥ //MU_2,11.57//
GSP27moksop_u:3126: ete sevyāḥ prayatnena catvāro dvau trayo 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3128: ekaṃ vā sarvayatnena prāṇāṃs tyaktvā samāśrayet /
GSP27moksop_u:3129: etasmin vaśage yānti catvāro 'pi vaśaṃ yataḥ //MU_2,11.61//
GSP27moksop_u:3130: saviveko hi śāstrasya jñānasya tapaso dyuteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3133: yāti sthāvaratām ambu jāḍyāt pāṣāṇatām iva //MU_2,11.63//
GSP27moksop_u:3136: imāṃ jñānadṛśaṃ śrotum avaboddhuṃ ca sanmate /
GSP27moksop_u:3137: arhasy uddhṛtakarṇas tu jantur vīṇādhvaniṃ yathā //MU_2,11.65//
GSP27moksop_u:3139: tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate //MU_2,11.66//
GSP27moksop_u:3144: etad eva ca maurkhyasya paramaṃ viddhi nāśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:3145: yad idaṃ prekṣyate śāstraṃ kiñcitsaṃskṛtayā dhiyā //MU_2,11.69//
GSP27moksop_u:3147: cetas sañkocam āyāti carmāgnāv iva yojitam //MU_2,11.70//
GSP27moksop_u:3151: savikāsā matir yasya sa pumān iti kathyate //MU_2,11.72//
GSP27moksop_u:3153: guṇavatā hṛdayena virājase tvam amalena nabhaś śaśinā yathā //MU_2,11.73//
GSP27moksop_u:3158: vetsi coktaṃ ca tenāhaṃ pravṛtto vaktum ādarāt //MU_2,12.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3160: matim ātmani saṃsthāpya jñānaṃ śrotuṃ sthiro bhava //MU_2,12.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3162: vaktur guṇālī ca mayi ratnaśrīr jaladhau yathā //MU_2,12.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3165: ciram ā śaiśavād eva tavābhyāso 'sti sadguṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3167: ataś śṛṇu kathāṃ vakṣye tvam evāsyā hi bhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:3168: na hi candraṃ vinā śuddhā savikāsā kumudvatī //MU_2,12.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3169: ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3170: te ca tāś ca pade dṛṣṭe niśśeṣaṃ yānti vai śamam //MU_2,12.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3172: tad asyāṃ saṃsṛtau sādhuś cintāṃ soḍhuṃ saheta kaḥ //MU_2,12.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3177: sa ca yogas sujanena saha śāstrārthavicārāt |
GSP27moksop_u:3179: avaśyam iha hi vicāre kṛte sakaladuḥkhaparikṣayo bhavatīti mantavyam | (MU_2,12.12)
GSP27moksop_u:3181_0: vicāravaśataḥ puruṣeṇa sakalam idam ādhipañjaraṃ sarpeṇa tvacam iva paripakvāṃ parityajya
GSP27moksop_u:3181_1: vigatajvareṇa śītalāntaḥkaraṇena vinoda iva jagad akhilam ālokyate samyagdarśanavatā | (MU_2,12.13)
GSP27moksop_u:3183: viṣamo hy ayam atitarāṃ saṃsārarogo bhogīva daśati |
GSP27moksop_u:3194: na tad asti kiñcid duḥkhaṃ saṃsārī yan nāpnoti | (MU_2,12.14)
GSP27moksop_u:3196: yadi na cikitsyate tad atitarāṃ narakanagaranikaraphalānubandhinī tat tat karoti |
GSP27moksop_u:3204: tad evaṃvidhe kaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe saṃsāracapalayantre 'smin rāghava nāvahelā kartavyā |
GSP27moksop_u:3206: evaṃ cāvaboddhavyam yathā kilāsti vicārāc chreyo'vāptir iti | (MU_2,12.17)
GSP27moksop_u:3208_0: yadi naite mahānto munayo maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś ca jñānakavacenāvaguṇṭhitaśarīrās
GSP27moksop_u:3208_1: tat katham aduḥkhakṣamā api duḥkhamayīṃ tamovṛttipūrvakaṃ saṃsārakadarthanām anubhavantas
GSP27moksop_u:3211: narottamās samadhigatātmadīpakās tathā sthitā jagati vibuddhabuddhayaḥ //MU_2,12.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3213: parikṣīṇe mohe galati ca ghane 'jñānajalade parijñāte tattve samadhigata ātmany abhimate /
GSP27moksop_u:3214: vicāryāryais sārdhaṃ galitavapuṣor vā sadasator dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam //MU_2,12.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3216: prasanne cittattve hṛdi savibhave valgati pare samābhogībhūtāsv akhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3217: śamaṃ yāntīṣv antaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsv āhitarasaṃ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam //MU_2,12.21//
GSP27moksop_u:3219: rathas sphāro dehas turagaracanā cendriyagatiḥ parispando vātād aham akalitānantaviṣamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3220: paro vārvāg dehī jagati viharāmīty anaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam //MU_2,12.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3226: na śocanti na yācante na vāñchanti śubhāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:3227: sarvam eva ca kurvanti kurvanti na ca kiñcana //MU_2,13.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3228: svastham evāvatiṣṭhanti svasthaṃ kurvanti yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:3230: āyānti ca na cāyānti vanaṃ yānti na yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:3231: na kurvanty api kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca //MU_2,13.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3232: ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3235: sarvatas sukham abhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam //MU_2,13.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3237: ātmany eva na māty antar indāv iva rasāyanam //MU_2,13.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3242: tasmād vicāreṇātmānveṣṭavyaḥ upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣeṇa netarad iti | (MU_2,13.9)
GSP27moksop_u:3246: kaṣṭām apy āpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhais samatām iyāt //MU_2,13.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3247: na vyādhir na viṣaṃ nāpat tathā nāmāsti bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:3248: khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām //MU_2,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3250: maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstram anyad asti na kiñcana //MU_2,13.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3253: āpado yā duruttārā yāś ca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3254: tās tā maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭakā iva //MU_2,13.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3258: andhatām eti na punaḥ kaścin mohatamasy api //MU_2,13.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3264: yathā brahmarṣayaś cānye tathā vihara rāghava //MU_2,13.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3267: yad anantam anāyāsaṃ tat padaṃ sārasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:3275: te yānti durgamād durgaṃ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam /
GSP27moksop_u:3283: na svaptavyaṃ tu saṃsāramāyāsv iha vijānatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3285: saṃsāram imam āsādya yas tiṣṭhaty avahelayā /
GSP27moksop_u:3287: yat prāpya na nivartante yad āsādya na śocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3288: tat padaṃ śemuṣīlabhyam asty evātra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_2,13.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3289: nāsti cet tad vicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:3290: asti cet tat samuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt //MU_2,13.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3292: yadā bhavaty āśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate //MU_2,13.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3296: na mitrāṇy upakurvanti na dhanāni na bandhavaḥ //MU_2,13.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3304: na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na ca bhūyo 'bhijāyate //MU_2,13.40//
GSP27moksop_u:3308: sukhaṃ nāsty eva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivaitayoḥ //MU_2,13.42//
GSP27moksop_u:3311: jīvatā gacchatā caiva bhramatā patatā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:3323: śamenāsādyate śreyaś śamo hi paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3324: śamaś śivaṃ śamaś śāntiś śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam //MU_2,13.50//
GSP27moksop_u:3330: satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmās samā hareḥ //MU_2,13.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3335: yāni duḥkhāni yās tṛṣṇā dussahā ye durādhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3336: tat sarvaṃ śāntacetassu tamo 'rkeṣv iva naśyati //MU_2,13.56//
GSP27moksop_u:3338: na tathendau yathā śānte jane janitakautukam //MU_2,13.57//
GSP27moksop_u:3340: sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayam eva prasīdati //MU_2,13.58//
GSP27moksop_u:3341: mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:3344: tathā sukham avāpnoti śamenāntar yathā janaḥ //MU_2,13.60//
GSP27moksop_u:3347: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:3348: tat te 'tisvadate svādu netarat tāta mānase //MU_2,13.62//
GSP27moksop_u:3350: chinnāny api tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava //MU_2,13.63//
GSP27moksop_u:3351: na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3354: vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilām iva //MU_2,13.65//
