GSP27moksop_u:3357: prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3358: yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam //MU_2,13.67//
GSP27moksop_u:3359: samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yas sādhu vartate /
GSP27moksop_u:3361: anuddhatamanāś śāntas sādhu karma karoti yat /
GSP27moksop_u:3363: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:3364: na hṛṣyati glāyati yas sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.70//
GSP27moksop_u:3366: jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.71//
GSP27moksop_u:3369: sthito 'pi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
GSP27moksop_u:3370: yas suṣuptamanās svasthas sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.73//
GSP27moksop_u:3372: dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.74//
GSP27moksop_u:3374: dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.75//
GSP27moksop_u:3375: apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api /
GSP27moksop_u:3376: tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.76//
GSP27moksop_u:3377: antaśśītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati /
GSP27moksop_u:3378: vyavahārī na sammūḍhas sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.77//
GSP27moksop_u:3380: kalaṅkam eti na matis sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.78//
GSP27moksop_u:3387: śamam amṛtam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ param avalambya padaṃ paraṃ prayātāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3388: raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva //MU_2,13.82//
GSP27moksop_u:3394: vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3399: sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ //MU_2,14.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3400: na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo 'sti vipacchame /
GSP27moksop_u:3401: vicārād aśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubham āyāti dhīs satām //MU_2,14.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3402: balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam /
GSP27moksop_u:3408: mūḍhāḥ kālavaśeneha yad gatāḥ paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3410: rājyāni sampadas sphāro bhogo mokṣaś ca śāśvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3413: na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi //MU_2,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3415: phalānām atyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te //MU_2,14.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3419: avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam //MU_2,14.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3421: na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśis tamassv iva //MU_2,14.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3423: nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ //MU_2,14.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3425: tasyodety aśaniś candrān mudhā yakṣaś śiśor iva //MU_2,14.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3429: avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālās tamasā yathā //MU_2,14.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3433: parāṃ nirvṛtim abhyeti pūrṇaś candra ivātmani //MU_2,14.21//
GSP27moksop_u:3437: vicāro rājate janto rajanyām iva candramāḥ //MU_2,14.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3452: tat sadālambanaṃ cetas sphāram ābhāsam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:3453: nāstam eti na codeti kham ivātitatāntaram //MU_2,14.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3454: na jahāti na cādatte na tāmyati na śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:3455: kevalaṃ sākṣivat paśyañ jagad ātmani tiṣṭhati //MU_2,14.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3456: na ca śāmyati nāpy antar nāpi bāhye 'vatiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:3457: na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmaṇi majjati //MU_2,14.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3459: na kṣubdho nāti cākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ //MU_2,14.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3461: jīvanmuktā jagaty asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ //MU_2,14.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3462: uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrās te yāvadīpsitam /
GSP27moksop_u:3463: tanum ante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām //MU_2,14.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3464: ko 'haṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ity āpady api dhīmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3472: vivekāndho hi jātyandhaś śocyaś sarvasya durmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3490: ko 'haṃ katham ayaṃ doṣas saṃsārākhya upāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3495: na vicārād ṛte tattvaṃ jñāyate sādhu kiñcana //MU_2,14.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3496: vicārāj jñāyate tattvaṃ tattvād viśrāntir ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:3498: saphalatā phalate bhuvi karmaṇāṃ prakaṭatāṃ kila gacchata uttamāt /
GSP27moksop_u:3503: santoṣo hi paraṃ śreyas santoṣas sukham ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3508: viṣamāsv apy anudvignā na kadācana dūyate //MU_2,15.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3515: ātmanātmani santoṣaṃ yāvad yāti na mānasam /
GSP27moksop_u:3516: udbhavanty āpadas tāval latā iva manovanāt //MU_2,15.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3520: mlāne vaktram ivādarśe na jñānaṃ pratibimbati //MU_2,15.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3522: yāty asāv udito yasya nityaṃ santoṣabhāskaraḥ //MU_2,15.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3526: yas sa somyas sadācāras santuṣṭa iti kathyate //MU_2,15.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3528: kṣīrābdher iva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīr virājate //MU_2,15.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3529: pūrṇatām alam āśritya svātmany evātmanā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:3532: sthairyam āyāty ariktasya śītāṃśor iva śāśvatam //MU_2,15.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3540: toṣam eti yathā loko na tathā dhanasaṅgamaiḥ //MU_2,15.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3541: samatayā matayā guṇaśālināṃ puruṣarāḍ iha yas samalaṅkṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3542: tam amalaṃ praṇamanti nabhaścarā api mahāmunayo raghunandana //MU_2,15.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3549: rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ //MU_2,16.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3550: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti mṛtir apy utsavāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3553: jayaty eko jagaty asmin sādhus sādhusamāgamaḥ //MU_2,16.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3560: api kaṣṭatarāṃ prāptair daśāṃ vivaśatāṃ gataiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3561: manāg api na santyājyā mānavais sādhusaṅgatiḥ //MU_2,16.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3565: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ //MU_2,16.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3573: prathitā yena bhavyena na tyaktā sādhusaṅgatiḥ //MU_2,16.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3575: sarvopāyena saṃsevyās te hy upāyā bhavāmbudhau //MU_2,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3580: santoṣas sādhusaṅgaś ca vicāro 'tha śamas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:3581: eta eva bhavāmbhodhāv upāyās taraṇe nṛṇām //MU_2,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3582: santoṣaḥ paramo lābhas satsaṅgaḥ paramā gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3583: vicāraḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śamo hi paramaṃ sukhaṃ //MU_2,16.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3585: yair abhyastās ta uttīrṇā mohavārer bhavārṇavāt //MU_2,16.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3588: eko 'py eko 'pi sarveṣāṃ eṣāṃ prasavabhūr iva /
GSP27moksop_u:3601: yāvad eko guṇo nāptas tāvan nāsty uttamā gatiḥ //MU_2,16.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3603: yāvan nābhiniviṣṭaṃ te mano rāma guṇārjane //MU_2,16.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3604: devo bhavātha yakṣo vā puruṣaḥ pādapo 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3606: ekasminn eva phalite guṇe balam upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:3612: sā hi svena prayatnena yasminn eva nipātyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3613: kūle tenaiva vahati yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_2,16.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3615: varamate nijabhāvamahānadīm iha hi tena manāg api nohyase //MU_2,16.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3619: evam āttaviveko yas sa bhavān iva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:3626: muktaye jāyate jantos tasyedaṃ śrotum udyamaḥ //MU_2,17.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3628: vacasāṃ bhājanaṃ bhūtyai bhavyo bhavati nādhamaḥ //MU_2,17.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3630: triṃśad dve ca sahasrāṇi jñātā nirvāṇadāyinī //MU_2,17.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3633: svayaṃ jñātā śrutā vāpi bhrāntiśāntyaiva saukhyadā /
GSP27moksop_u:3640: vairāgyaṃ vardhate yena sekeneva marau taruḥ //MU_2,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3641: sārdhaṃ sahasraṃ granthasya yasmin hṛdi vicārite /
GSP27moksop_u:3645: svabhāvo hi mumukṣūṇāṃ narāṇāṃ yatra varṇyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3651: yasmiñ śrute jagad idaṃ śrotrāntar budhyate 'khilam /
GSP27moksop_u:3662: yathā nabhasi nīlatvam asad evotthitaṃ tathā //MU_2,17.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3664: svapne vā vyomni vā citram akarma cirabhāsuram //MU_2,17.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3665: avahnir eva vahnitvaṃ dhatte citrānalo yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:3680: ittham abhyāgato vṛddhim iti tatrocyate ciram //MU_2,17.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3683: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ tvaṃ ca sa iti bhrāntir utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:3684: ity asau śāmyatīty asmin kathyate ślokasaṅgrahe //MU_2,17.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3700: śiṣṭo granthaḥ parīmāṇaṃ tasya jñeyaṃ mahārthadam //MU_2,17.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3701: buddhe tasmin bhavec chrotā nirvāṇaś śāntakalpanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3720: tulanam eti na muktimato bata pravitatāsti na nūnam avastunaḥ //MU_2,17.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3724: asyāṃ vā citimātrāyāṃ paro bodhaḥ pravartate /
GSP27moksop_u:3725: bījād iva yato vyuptād avaśyambhāvi satphalam //MU_2,18.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3726: api pauruṣam ādeyaṃ śāstraṃ ced yuktibodhakam /
GSP27moksop_u:3729: anyat tṛṇam iva tyājyam apy uktaṃ padmajanmanā //MU_2,18.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3730: yo 'mbhas tātasya kūpo 'yam iti kaupaṃ pibet kaṭu /
GSP27moksop_u:3731: tyaktvā gāṅgaṃ purassthaṃ taṃ ko 'nuśāsati rāgiṇam //MU_2,18.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3734: śrutāyāṃ prājñavadanād buddhāyāṃ svayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3735: śanaiś śanair vicāreṇa buddhau saṃskāra āgate //MU_2,18.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3736: pūrvaṃ tāvad udety antar bhṛśaṃ saṃskṛtavākyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3739: sā yayā sneham āyānti rājāno 'jagarā api //MU_2,18.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3742: lobhamohādayo doṣās tānavaṃ yānty alaṃ śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3745: na kācana phalaṃ dhatte svabhyāsena vinā kriyā //MU_2,18.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3746: manaḥ prasādam āyāti śaradīva mahat saraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3758: samudrasyeva gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyaṃ meror iva sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:3760: sā jīvanmuktatā tasya śanaiḥ pariṇatiṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3766: śāmyanti śuddhim āyānti saumyās tiṣṭhanti sūnnate /
GSP27moksop_u:3770: dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām /
GSP27moksop_u:3771: ādhayo na vilumpanti vātāś citralatām iva //MU_2,18.24//
GSP27moksop_u:3779: na khedayati bhogaugho na cānandayati kvacit //MU_2,18.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3781: ye patanty utpatanty ambuvīcivat tān sa paśyati //MU_2,18.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3782: na dveṣṭi sampravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati /
GSP27moksop_u:3783: kāryāṇy eṣa prabuddho 'pi niṣprabuddha iva drumaḥ //MU_2,18.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3786: buddhvedam akhilaṃ śāstraṃ vācayitvā vivecya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3791: svayaṃ yas tu na vettīdaṃ śrotavyaṃ tena paṇḍitāt //MU_2,18.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3793: mokṣaprāptau tu tasyeha na kiñcid upayujyate //MU_2,18.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3798: bhramo jagad ahaṃ ceti sthita evopaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:3799: svapnamohaḥ parijñāta iva no ramayaty alam //MU_2,18.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3816: etāvaty eva ye bhūtā bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3818: śṛṇu tāvad idānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam imaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:3820: yayedaṃ śrūyate śāstraṃ tāṃ tu vistarataś śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:3825: yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopaskaraṇaṃ gṛhe //MU_2,18.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3826: yair yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntais tvaṃ mayehāvabodhyase /
GSP27moksop_u:3827: sarve sakāraṇās te hi prāpyaṃ tu sad akāraṇam //MU_2,18.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3829: varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate //MU_2,18.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3834: evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇy ākāravān katham /
GSP27moksop_u:3839: yathā jāgrat tathā svapnas siddha ābālam akṣatam //MU_2,18.58//
GSP27moksop_u:3841: ye 'rthās ta iha dṛṣṭāntās tadrūpatvāj jagatsthiteḥ //MU_2,18.59//
GSP27moksop_u:3843: granthās teṣv iyam evaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane //MU_2,18.60//
GSP27moksop_u:3845: śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vāk kila kramavartinī //MU_2,18.61//
GSP27moksop_u:3847: yatas ta eva dṛṣṭāntās tasmād bhāntīha netare //MU_2,18.62//
GSP27moksop_u:3855: upamānaṃ karoty aṅga dīpo 'rthaṃ prabhayā yathā //MU_2,18.66//
GSP27moksop_u:3861: striyoktam apy aparam athāpi vaidikaṃ vaco vacaḥpralapanam eva nāgamaḥ //MU_2,18.69//
GSP27moksop_u:3862: asmākam asti matir aṅga tayeti sarvaśāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato 'taḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3863: prātītikārthamayaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭāt saṃvedanād itarad asti na naḥ pramāṇam //MU_2,18.70//
GSP27moksop_u:3873: śāntiś śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:3883: tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:3891: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:3892: muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ //MU_2,19.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3894: vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcus sa ucyate //MU_2,19.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3896: bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam //MU_2,19.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3898: pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu //MU_2,19.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3900: nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad udāhṛtam //MU_2,19.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3902: pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvas sa eva ca //MU_2,19.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3903: sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahantāpratyayātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3904: sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā //MU_2,19.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3911: svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3912: nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_2,19.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3916: neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt //MU_2,19.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3917: manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:3925: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3926: svaṃ yathā tatra yad rūpaṃ pravibhāti tathaiva tat //MU_2,19.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3927: sarvam ātmā yathā tatra saṅkalpatvam ivāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3928: tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate //MU_2,19.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3930: draṣṭṛtvaṃ draṣṭrasadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti nāsataḥ //MU_2,19.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3932: pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ //MU_2,19.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3934: śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate 'ntaḥ //MU_2,19.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3936: yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi //MU_2,19.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3942: yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate /
GSP27moksop_u:3943: śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye //MU_2,20.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3945: samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit //MU_2,20.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3948: śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:3950: guṇāś śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3958: tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam //MU_2,20.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3963: śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam /
GSP27moksop_u:3965: viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3966: yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tadavabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi //MU_2,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3971: vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:3972: yad idaṃ tat svaśabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat //MU_3,1.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3974: kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ //MU_3,1.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3976: yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ //MU_3,1.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3982: na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt //MU_3,1.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3983: utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:3984: sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā //MU_3,1.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3985: atas te svavabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:3986: utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā //MU_3,1.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3987: idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:3989: yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:3990: tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati //MU_3,1.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3991: tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:3993: ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3995: sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan /
GSP27moksop_u:4001: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4004: na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare //MU_3,1.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4005: brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:4009: avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4011: bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:4015: jagat tvam aham ityādisargātmā dṛśyam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4016: yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate //MU_3,1.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4017: nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4020: sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ //MU_3,1.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4021: jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4022: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ //MU_3,1.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4024: tatra tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīs samudety apy aṇūdare //MU_3,1.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4025: tasmād asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam idaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:4027: yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:4029: yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:4031: tatas tatra punar duḥkhaṃ jarā maraṇajanmanī /
GSP27moksop_u:4033: idaṃ pramārjitaṃ dṛśyaṃ mayā nātrāham āsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4039: prāptaṃ bhavati he rāma tat kiṃ nāma samādhibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4041: yadi vāpi samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitiṃ vrajet /
GSP27moksop_u:4042: tad akṣayasuṣuptābhaṃ tan manye nāmalaṃ padam //MU_3,1.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4043: prāpyate sati dṛśye 'smin na ca tan nāma kenacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4048: keṣāñcit sthitim āyānti sarvair ity anubhūyate //MU_3,1.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4049: na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā rūḍhiṃ yātās samādhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4050: bhavanty agryaṃ padaṃ śāntaṃ cidrūpam ajam avyayam //MU_3,1.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4051: tasmād yadīdaṃ sad dṛśyaṃ tan na śāmyet kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:4055: yathā rasaḥ padārtheṣu yathā tailaṃ tilādiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:4058: yathodeti tathā dṛśyaṃ ciddhātor udare jagat //MU_3,1.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4060: svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ //MU_3,1.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4064: karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,1.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4065: dravyasya hṛdy eva camatkṛtir yathā sadoditāsty astamayojjhitodare /
GSP27moksop_u:4066: dravyasya cinmātraśarīriṇas tathā svabhāvabhūtāsty udare jagatsthitiḥ //MU_3,1.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4073: dhyānaikaniṣṭhas satataṃ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ //MU_3,2.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4074: sa ciraṃ jīvati yadā tadā mṛtyur acintayat /
GSP27moksop_u:4075: sarvāṇy eva krameṇāhaṃ bhūtāny admi kilākṣayaḥ //MU_3,2.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4076: evam ākāśajaṃ vipraṃ na kasmād bhakṣayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:4077: atra me kuṇṭhitā śaktiḥ khaḍgadhārā yathopale //MU_3,2.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4078: iti sañcintya taṃ hantum agacchat tatpuraṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:4079: tyajanty udyamam udyuktā na kadācana kecana //MU_3,2.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4080: tatas tatsadanaṃ yāvan mṛtyuḥ praviśati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4084: na cāśakat puro dṛṣṭam api hastaśatair dvijam /
GSP27moksop_u:4087: kim ity ahaṃ na śaknomi bhoktum ākāśajaṃ prabho //MU_3,2.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4089: mṛtyo na kiñcic chaktas tvam eko mārayituṃ balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4092: karmāṇy anviccha teṣāṃ tvaṃ sāhāyyenainam atsyasi //MU_3,2.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4094: maṇḍalāni digantāṃś ca sarāṃsi sarito diśaḥ //MU_3,2.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4098: evaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ bhrāntvā sa kutaścin na kānicit //MU_3,2.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4104: ākāśajasya karmāṇi kva sthitāni vada prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:4107: ākāśajasya karmāṇi mṛtyo santi na kānicit /
GSP27moksop_u:4108: eṣa hy ākāśajo vipro jātaḥ khād eva kevalāt //MU_3,2.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4109: ākāśād eva yo jātas sa vyomaivāmalaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4110: sahakārīṇi no santi kāraṇāṇy asya kānicit //MU_3,2.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4111: sambandhaḥ prāktanenāsya na manāg api karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:4113: tasmād ajāta evaiṣa svayambhūr aja eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4116: adya tāvad anenānyan na kiñcit karma sañcitam //MU_3,2.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4118: samādhau saṃsthito nityaṃ karmāṇy asya na kānicit //MU_3,2.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4119: prāktanāni na santy asya karmāṇy adya karoti no /
GSP27moksop_u:4122: dṛśyate 'smābhir evaitan na tv asyāsty atra karmadhīḥ //MU_3,2.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4123: deho 'sya dṛśyate 'smābhir naiṣa vetti parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4127: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi śūnyatvaṃ ca yathāmbare /
GSP27moksop_u:4128: mārute ca yathā spandas tathaiṣa parame pade //MU_3,2.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4129: karmāṇy adyatanāny asya sañcitāni na santi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:4130: na pūrvāṇy eva teneha na saṃsāravaśaṃ gataḥ //MU_3,2.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4134: kartā na pūrvaṃ nāpy adya katham ākramyate vada //MU_3,2.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4136: tadaiva rahito buddhyā svayam eva mariṣyati //MU_3,2.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4137: pṛthvyādimān aham ayam iti yasya svaniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4138: sa pārthivo bhavaty āśu grahītuṃ sa ca śakyate //MU_3,2.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4142: bhagavañ jāyate śūnyaḥ kathaṃ nāma vadeti me /
GSP27moksop_u:4143: pṛthvyādayaḥ kathaṃ santi na santi vada vā katham //MU_3,2.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4145: na kadācana jāto 'sau na ca nāsti kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:4150: tathā tad aṇu yenāsya nikaṭe 'drinibhaṃ nabhaḥ //MU_3,2.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4153: sa eṣa brāhmaṇas tasmin sargādāv ambarodare /
GSP27moksop_u:4154: svayaṃ bhātas svayambhūtvaṃ gato bhāty ajarāmaraḥ //MU_3,2.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4155: nāsya deho na karmāṇi na kartṛtvaṃ na vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:4157: prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ kiñcid asya na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4162: kutaḥ kilātra pṛthvyādeḥ kīdṛśas sambhavaḥ katham //MU_3,2.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4163: etadākramaṇe mṛtyo tasmān mā yatnavān bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:4164: grahītuṃ yujyate vyoma na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,2.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4166: brahmaiva kathito brahmaṃs tvayā me prapitāmahaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4167: svayambhūr aja ekātmā vijñānātmeti me matiḥ //MU_3,2.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4169: evam etan mayā rāma brahmaiṣa kathitas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:4171: manvantare sarvabhakṣo yadā mṛtyur haran prajāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4172: balam ety abjajākrāntāv ārambham akarot svayam //MU_3,2.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4174: yad eva kriyate nityaṃ ratis tatraiva jāyate //MU_3,2.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4178: sa cidvyomaiva no tasya kāraṇatvaṃ na kāryatā //MU_3,2.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4181: na dṛśyam asti no draṣṭā paramātmani kevale /
GSP27moksop_u:4182: svayaṃ cittvāt tathāpy eṣa svayambhūr iti bhāsate //MU_3,2.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4187: cidvyoma kevalam anantam anādimadhyaṃ brahmeti bhāti nijacittavaśāt svayambhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4188: ākāravān iva rasād iha vastutas tu vandhyātanūja iva nāsti tu tasya dehaḥ //MU_3,2.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4192: evam etan manaś śuddhaṃ pṛthvyādirahitaṃ nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4194: tad atra prāktanī nāma smṛtiḥ kasmān na kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:4195: yathā mama tathānyasya bhūtānāṃ ceti me vada //MU_3,3.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4199: brahmaṇaḥ prāktanaṃ karma yadā kiñcin na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4200: prāktanī saṃsmṛtis tasya tadodeti kutaḥ katham //MU_3,3.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4207: sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnāṃ brahmaṇo 'sty eka eva kim //MU_3,3.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4209: sarveṣām eva dehau dvau bhūtānāṃ kāraṇātmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:4213: nāsty eva bhautiko dehaḥ prathamasya prajāpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4218: yad yatas tat tad eveti sarvair evānubhūyate //MU_3,3.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4219: nirvāṇamātraṃ prathamaṃ paraṃ bodhas tad eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4220: cittamātraṃ tad evāste na yāti vasudhāditām //MU_3,3.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4226: vibhāty evam ayaṃ sargas satyānubhavavat sthitaḥ //MU_3,3.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4231: sa citsaṅkalparūpatvād udety apy atha śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4232: svāyattatvāt svabhāvasya nodeti na ca śāmyati //MU_3,3.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4235: saṅkalpa eṣa kacati yathā nāma svasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4244: manomātram ato viśvaṃ yad yatas tat tad eva hi //MU_3,3.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4245: ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:4246: tajjasyāpi na santy eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicit //MU_3,3.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4248: yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ kāryaṃ tādṛg iha sthitam //MU_3,3.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4249: kāryakāraṇatā tv atra na kiñcid upapadyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4250: yādṛg eva paraṃ brahma tādṛg eva jagattrayam //MU_3,3.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4251: manastām iva yātena brahmaṇā tanyate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:4252: ananyad ātmanaś śuddhād dravatvam iva vāriṇā //MU_3,3.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4253: manasā tanyate sarvam asad evedam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4256: brahmādayaḥ prabuddhās tu kathaṃ tiṣṭhantu tatra te //MU_3,3.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4260: manorājyaṃ jagad iti satyarūpam iva sthitam //MU_3,3.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4263: viriñco manaso rūpaṃ viriñcasya mano vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4264: pṛthvyādi vidyate nātra tena pṛthvyādi kalpitam //MU_3,3.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4268: svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ //MU_3,3.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4272: karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,3.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4273: sac cen na śāmyati kadācana dṛśyaduḥkhaṃ dṛśye tv aśāmyati na boddhari kevalatvam /
GSP27moksop_u:4274: dṛśye tv asambhavati boddhari boddhṛbhāvaḥ śāmyet sthite 'pi hi tad asya vimokṣam āhuḥ //MU_3,3.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4279: śrotum ekarase jāte jane maunavati sthite //MU_3,4.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4292: babhūvur alpasañcārā janā daśasu dikṣv api /
GSP27moksop_u:4297: deva snānadvijārcāsu kālo hy atigato bhṛśam //MU_3,4.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4298: tato vasiṣṭho bhagavān saṃhṛtya madhurāṃ giram /
GSP27moksop_u:4299: adya tāvan mahārāja śrutam etāvad astu vaḥ //MU_3,4.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4300: prātar anyad vadiṣyāma ity uktvā maunavān abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:4313: cakrur dinasamācāraṃ svaṃ sarve sveṣu veśmasu //MU_3,4.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4321: nililyire khagāś citte tadā tā vṛttayo yathā //MU_3,4.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4322: bhānor bhāsā bhūṣitair meghaleśaiḥ kiñcit kiñcit kuṅkumacchāyayeva /
GSP27moksop_u:4323: pāścātyo 'driḥ pītavāsās tamo'bdhes tārāhāraśrīyutaḥ khaṃ sametaḥ //MU_3,4.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4334: ṛṣayo bhūmipālāś ca munayo brāhmaṇās tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4337: āyayau mihikākārā tatra teṣām uṣā śanaiḥ //MU_3,4.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4346: atha prasaṅgam āsādya rāmo madhurayā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:4349: bhagavan manaso rūpaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vada me sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:4352: rāmāsya manaso rūpaṃ na kiñcid api dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4354: na bāhye nāpi hṛdaye sadrūpaṃ vidyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4355: sarvatraiva sthitaṃ caitad viddhi rāma yathā nabhaḥ //MU_3,4.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4358: sādho yad etad arthasya pratibhānaṃ prathāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4359: sato vāpy asato vāpi tan mano viddhi netarat //MU_3,4.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4360: yad arthapratibhānaṃ tan mana ity abhidhīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4361: anyan na kiñcid apy asti mano nāma kadācana //MU_3,4.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4362: saṅkalpanaṃ mano viddhi saṅkalpāt tan na bhidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4363: yathā dravatvāt salilaṃ tathā spando yathānilāt //MU_3,4.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4364: yatra saṅkalpanaṃ tatra tan mano 'ṅga tathā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4366: satyam astv atha vāsatyaṃ yad arthapratibhāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4367: tāvanmātraṃ mano viddhi tad brahmaiṣa pitāmahaḥ //MU_3,4.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4370: avidyā saṃsṛtiś cittaṃ mano bandho malaṃ tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4372: na hi dṛśyād ṛte kiñcin manaso rūpam asti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:4373: dṛśyaṃ cotpannam evaitan neti vakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ //MU_3,4.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4377: yathā dravatvaṃ payaso dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭur īdṛśam //MU_3,4.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4378: aṅgadatvaṃ yathā hemni mṛganadyāṃ yathā jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4379: bhittir yathā svapnapure tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,4.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4380: evaṃ draṣṭari dṛśyatvam ananyad iva yat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4381: tad apy unmārjayāmy āśu tvaccittādarśato malam //MU_3,4.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4382: yad draṣṭur asyādraṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyābhāve bhaved balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4383: tad viddhi kevalībhāvam ata evāsatas sataḥ //MU_3,4.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4388: trijagat tvam ahaṃ ceti dṛśye 'sattām upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:4392: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau praśānte dṛśyasambhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:4393: syāt tādṛśī kevalatā sthite draṣṭary avīkṣake //MU_3,4.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4395: sac cen na śāmyatīdaṃ vā nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4396: asattāṃ ca na vidmo 'smin dṛśye doṣapradāyini //MU_3,4.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4397: tasmāt katham iyaṃ śāmyed brahman dṛśyaviṣūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:4400: asya dṛśyapiśācasya śāntyai mantram imaṃ śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:4401: rāmātyantam ayaṃ yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati //MU_3,4.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4402: yad asti tasya nāśo 'sti na kadācana rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:4403: tasmāt tan naṣṭam apy antar bījabhūtaṃ bhaved dhṛdi //MU_3,4.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4406: itthaṃ nirmokṣadoṣas syān na ca tasyāṃśasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4408: yadi syāj jagadādīdaṃ tat syān mokṣo na kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4409: bāhyastham astu hṛtsthaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ nāśāya kevalam //MU_3,4.64//
GSP27moksop_u:4410: tasmād imāṃ pratijñāṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rāmātibhīṣaṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:4411: yām uttareṇa granthena nūnaṃ tvam avabudhyase //MU_3,4.65//
GSP27moksop_u:4413: jagacchabdasya nāmārtho nanu nāsty eva kaścana //MU_3,4.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4414: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśyajālaṃ purogatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4415: ekaṃ brahmaiva tat sarvam ajarāmaram avyayam //MU_3,4.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4416: pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ prasarati śānte śāntaṃ paraṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4417: vyomany evoditaṃ vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati //MU_3,4.68//
GSP27moksop_u:4418: na dṛśyam asti no dṛk ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4419: na śūnyaṃ no jaḍaṃ no cic chāntam evedam ātatam //MU_3,4.69//
GSP27moksop_u:4426: nāstīti kim idaṃ nāma bhavatāpi mamocyate //MU_3,4.72//
GSP27moksop_u:4427: yathedaṃ na sthitaṃ viśvaṃ notpannaṃ na ca vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4428: tathā kathaya me brahman yenaitan niścitaṃ bhavet //MU_3,4.73//
GSP27moksop_u:4432: idam ādāv anutpannaṃ sargādau tena nāsty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:4433: idaṃ hi manasā bhāti svapnādau pattanaṃ yathā //MU_3,4.75//
GSP27moksop_u:4434: mana eva ca sargādāv anutpannam asadvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4438: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:4440: sphurati gacchati valgati yācate bhavati majjati saṃharati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4441: amaratām upayāty api kevalaṃ calati cañcalaśaktitayā manaḥ //MU_3,4.79//
GSP27moksop_u:4445: bhagavan muniśārdūla kim iveha mano bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:4446: vidyate katham utpannaṃ mano māyāmayaṃ kutaḥ //MU_3,5.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4447: utpattim ādāv iti me samāsena vada prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:4448: pravakṣyasi tataś śiṣṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ vadatāṃ vara //MU_3,5.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4454: yato vāco nivartante yo muktair avagamyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4455: yasya cātmādikās sañjñāḥ kalpitā na svabhāvajāḥ //MU_3,5.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4459: vaktā smartā ṛtaṃ bhoktā draṣṭā kartā sadaiva yaḥ //MU_3,5.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4460: sad apy asad yo jagati yo dehastho 'pi dūragaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4461: citprakāśo hy ayaṃ yasmād āloka iva bhāsvataḥ //MU_3,5.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4462: yasmād viṣṇvādayo devās sūryād iva marīcayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4463: yasmāj jaganty anantāni budbudā jaladher iva //MU_3,5.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4465: ya ātmānaṃ padārthaṃ ca prakāśayati dīpavat //MU_3,5.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4466: ākāśe yaś śarīre ca dṛṣatsv apsu latāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4467: pāṃsuṣv adriṣu vāteṣu pātāleṣu ca saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,5.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4468: yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdhaṃ puryaṣṭakam itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4469: yena mūkīkṛtā mūḍhāś śilā dhyānam ivāsthitāḥ //MU_3,5.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4470: vyoma yena kṛtaṃ śūnyaṃ śailā yena ghanīkṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4471: āpo drutāḥ kṛtā yena dīpto yasya vaśād raviḥ //MU_3,5.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4475: sphuranty avirataṃ yasmin ghṛṇāv iva marīcayaḥ //MU_3,5.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4485: asaj jātam asad yena yena sat sattvam āgatam //MU_3,5.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4488: niyatir deśakālau ca calanaṃ spandanaṃ kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4492: kurvann apīva jagatāṃ mahatām anantaspandaṃ na kiñcana karoti kadācanāpi /
GSP27moksop_u:4493: svātmany anastamayasaṃvidi nirvikāre tyaktodayasthitimatis sthita eka eva //MU_3,5.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4498: jñānād eva parā siddhir na tv anuṣṭhānakhedadā //MU_3,6.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4499: atra jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ na tv anyad upayujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4501: na caiṣa dūre nākāśe nālabhyo viṣamo na ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4507: ayaṃ sa deva ity eva samparijñānamātrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4508: jantor na jāyate duḥkhaṃ jīvanmuktatvam eti ca //MU_3,6.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4511: punar doṣā na bādhante maraṇādyāḥ kadācana //MU_3,6.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4512: devadevo mahān eṣa kuto dūrād avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4516: sa devo jñāyate rāma na tapassnānakarmabhiḥ //MU_3,6.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4518: vinā rāma tapodānaṃ kleśa eva na vāstavam //MU_3,6.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4520: yad arjyate tato dānād yasyārthas tasya tatphalam //MU_3,6.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4521: rāgādyupahate citte vratādi kriyate ca yat /
GSP27moksop_u:4522: sa dambhaḥ procyate tasya phalam asti manāṅ na vā //MU_3,6.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4527: śṛṇu tat pauruṣaṃ kīdṛg ātmajñānasya labdhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:4537: bhṛśaṃ yaṃ sujanaprāyaṃ lokās sādhuṃ pracakṣate /
GSP27moksop_u:4538: sa viśiṣṭas sa sādhus syāt taṃ prayatnena saṃśrayet //MU_3,6.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4540: śāstraṃ sacchāstram ity āhur mucyate tadvicāravān //MU_3,6.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4541: sacchāstrasatsaṅgamajair vivekais tathā vinaśyanti balān malāni /
GSP27moksop_u:4542: yathā jalānāṃ katakānuṣaṅgād yathā jaḍānām abhayopayogāt //MU_3,6.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4546: ya eṣa devaḥ kathito yasmiñ jñāte vimucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4547: vada kvāsau sthito devaḥ katham enam ahaṃ labhe //MU_3,7.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4549: ya eṣa devaḥ kathito naiṣa dūre 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP27moksop_u:4550: śarīre saṃsthito nityaṃ cinmātram iti viśrutaḥ //MU_3,7.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4551: eṣa sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ na viśvaṃ tv eṣa sarvagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4552: vidyate hy eṣa evaiko na tu viśvābhidhāsti dṛk //MU_3,7.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4556: bālā api vadanty etad yadi cetanamātrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:4557: jagad ity eva kaivātra nāma syād upadeśatā //MU_3,7.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4559: cinmātraṃ cetanaṃ viśvam iti yaj jñātavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:4560: na kiñcid etad vijñātaṃ bhavatā bhavatāraṇam //MU_3,7.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4561: cetanaṃ nāma saṃsāro jīva eṣa paśus smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4563: paśur ajño hy amūrto 'pi duḥkhasyaivaiṣa bhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4566: asya sā bharitāvasthā tāṃ jñātvā nānuśocati //MU_3,7.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4568: ksīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare //MU_3,7.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4570: roddhuṃ na śakyaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu cetyaṃ śāmyatu vai katham //MU_3,7.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4573: dṛśyate paramātmā yas sa brahman vada kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,7.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4575: yad etac cetanaṃ jīvo viśīrṇo janmajaṅgale /
GSP27moksop_u:4576: etam ātmānam icchanti ye te 'jñāḥ paṇḍitā api //MU_3,7.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4578: asmiñ jñāte nāvijñātaṃ kiñcid bhavati kutracit //MU_3,7.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4579: jñāyate paramātmā ced rāma tad duḥkhasantatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4582: rūpaṃ kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4583: yasmin dṛṣṭe naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati //MU_3,7.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4585: deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyās saṃvido vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4586: nimeṣeṇaiva yan madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4589: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramo yatra sthito 'py astam alaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4590: yad anākāśam ākāśas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4591: aśūnyam iva yac chūnyaṃ yasmiñ śūnyaṃ jagat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4592: sargaughe sati yac chūnyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4594: jaḍaṃ tv ajaḍam evāntas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4598: tathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ yatra tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4605: taj jñātaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhaven nānyena karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:4606: dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu ṛte nānyā śubhā gatiḥ //MU_3,7.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4609: na cid apratibimbāsti dṛśyābhāvād ṛte kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4612: budhyate paramaṃ tattvaṃ na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,7.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4615: mune katham asattāsti kva merus sarṣapodare //MU_3,7.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4617: dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasy akhinnadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4619: pramārjayāmi te dṛśyaṃ bodhe mṛgajalaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4621: draṣṭṛtvaṃ sati dṛśye 'smin dṛśyatvaṃ saty avekṣake /
GSP27moksop_u:4622: ekatvaṃ sati hi dvitve dvitvaṃ caikatvavedane //MU_3,7.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4623: ekābhāve dvayor eva siddhir bhavati nātra hi /
GSP27moksop_u:4625: ahantādi jagaddṛśyaṃ sarvaṃ te mārjayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:4627: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4628: yat tu nāsti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśas tatpramārjane //MU_3,7.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4629: jagad ādāv anutpannaṃ yac cedaṃ dṛśyate tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4630: tat svātmany eva vimale brahma cittvāt svabṛṃhitam //MU_3,7.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4631: jagan nāma na cotpannaṃ na cāsti na ca dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4635: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ yat tasyehāstitā kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4636: kuto marau jalasarid dvitīyendau kuto grahaḥ //MU_3,7.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4637: yathā vandhyāsuto nāsti yathā nāsti marau jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4638: yathā nāsti nabhovṛkṣas tathā nāsti jagadbhramaḥ //MU_3,7.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4639: yad idaṃ dṛśyate rāma tad brahmaiva nirāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4640: etat purastād vakṣyāmo yuktito na giraiva vaḥ //MU_3,7.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4641: yan nāma yuktibhir iha pravadanti tajjñās tatrāvahelanam ayuktam udārabuddheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4642: yo yuktiyuktam avamatya vimūḍhabuddhyā kaṣṭāvaho bhavati taṃ vidur ajñam eva //MU_3,7.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4646: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4650: jagannāmnī vicārākhyād ṛte mantrān na śāmyati //MU_3,8.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4651: vadāmy ākhyāyikā rāma yā imā bodhasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:4652: tāś cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān //MU_3,8.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4653: no ced udvegaśīlatvād ardhād utthāya gacchasi /
GSP27moksop_u:4654: tat tiryagdharmiṇas te 'dya kiñcin nāpi tu setsyati //MU_3,8.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4655: yo 'yam arthaṃ prārthayate tadarthaṃ yatate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4656: so 'vaśyaṃ tad avāpnoti na cec chrānto nivartate //MU_3,8.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4658: tad dinair eva no māsaiḥ prāpnoṣi paramaṃ padam //MU_3,8.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4661: kiṃnāma tat pradhānaṃ syād yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate //MU_3,8.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4669: sthitam evāstam āyāti jagad dṛśyaṃ vicāraṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4670: yathā svapne parijñāte svapnārthād eva bhāvanā //MU_3,8.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4671: yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4674: bālasyāpi paraṃ bodhaṃ buddhir eti na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,8.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4675: yasmai nedaṃ tv abhavyāya rocate duṣkṛtodayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4676: vicārayatu yat kiñcit sa śāstraṃ jñānavāṅmayam //MU_3,8.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4678: svayam eva yathā pīte nīrogatvaṃ varauṣadhe //MU_3,8.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4679: śrūyamāṇe hi śāstre 'smiñ śrotā vetty etad ātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:4680: yathāvad idam asmābhir na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat //MU_3,8.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4687: kathayantaś ca tan nityaṃ tuṣyanti ramayanti ye //MU_3,9.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4692: brūhi yena tathaivāhaṃ yate śāstradṛśā dhiyā //MU_3,9.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4695: astaṅgataṃ sthitaṃ vyoma sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4697: ya āste vyavahartaiva sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4698: nodeti nāstam āyāti sukhe duḥkhe mukhaprabhā /
GSP27moksop_u:4700: yo jāgarti suṣuptastho yasya jāgran na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4701: yasya nirvāsano bodhas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4703: yo 'ntar vyomavad atyacchas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4704: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4707: paśyet trilokyāḥ khasamas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4708: bhoktaiva yo na bhoktaiva śuddhabodhaikatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4709: buddhas supta ivāste 'ntas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4710: nityaṃ draṣṭaiva cādraṣṭā jīvann eva mṛtopamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4712: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4715: yas sacitto 'pi niścittas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4717: parārtheṣv iva pūrṇātmā sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4720: videhamukto nodeti nāstam eti na śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4721: na san nāsan na dūrasthaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca vetarat //MU_3,9.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4722: sūryo bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4723: rudras sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmabhūḥ //MU_3,9.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4730: tejaḥ prakaṭayaty āśās tanoty āndhyaṃ tamo bhavan /
GSP27moksop_u:4731: śūnyaṃ san vyomatām eti giris san rodhayaty alam //MU_3,9.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4736: yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātaṃ vā bhām upaiṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4737: kālatrayagataṃ dṛśyaṃ tad asau sarvam eva vā //MU_3,9.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4739: katham evaṃ vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me /
GSP27moksop_u:4740: dṛṣṭir eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyeti niścayaḥ //MU_3,9.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4743: nirvāṇam etat kathitaṃ śṛṇu samprāpyate katham //MU_3,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4748: manye te sargatām eva gatā vedyavidāṃ vara //MU_3,9.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4750: vidyate cet tribhuvanaṃ tat tattāṃ samprayāntu te /
GSP27moksop_u:4752: tatra trilokatāṃ yātaṃ brahmety uktyarthadhīḥ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4755: brahmaiva jagad ity eva satyaṃ satyāvabodhinaḥ //MU_3,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4756: yathā hi hemakaṭake vicāryāpi na dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4758: jalād ṛte payovīcau nāhaṃ paśyāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:4759: vīcitvaṃ tvādṛśair dṛṣṭaṃ yat tu nāsty eva tatra hi //MU_3,9.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4760: spandatvaṃ pavanād anyan na kadācana kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:4761: spanda eva sadā vāyur jagat tasmān na vidyate //MU_3,9.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4762: yathā śūnyatvam ākāśas tāpa eva marau jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4763: teja eva yathāloko brahmaiva trijagat tathā //MU_3,9.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4772: brahma cetthaṃ svabhāvasthaṃ budhyate vada me tathā //MU_3,9.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4773: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4774: etasmiṃs tu mune siddhe na sādhyam avaśiṣyate //MU_3,9.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4778: na śakyate jhagity eva samucchedayituṃ kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4781: jagadbhrāntir yathā śāmyet tathedaṃ kathyate śṛṇu //MU_3,9.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4782: vadāmy ākhyāyikāṃ rāma yām imāṃ bodhasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:4783: tāṃ cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān //MU_3,9.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4785: yaḥ kilotpadyate rāma tena muktena bhūyate //MU_3,9.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4786: iyam itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir bhāty ajātaiva khātmikā /
GSP27moksop_u:4788: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:4791: bhavaty asad adṛśyaṃ ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati //MU_3,9.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4792: tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4794: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cākāśaṃ na dṛśyaṃ na ca darśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4795: na ca bhūtapadārthaugho yad anantatayā sthitam //MU_3,9.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4797: na san nāsan na sadasan nābhāvo bhavanaṃ na ca //MU_3,9.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4801: yaś cedaṃ yaś ca naivedaṃ devas sadasadātmakaḥ //MU_3,9.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4803: yaś śṛṇoty āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati //MU_3,9.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4808: yasyānyad asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat /
GSP27moksop_u:4809: yasyedaṃ ca jagat kāryaṃ taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,9.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4815: iyaṃ yasmiñ jagallakṣmīr alāta iva cakratā //MU_3,9.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4819: sattā nāmnaiva bhinneva vyavahārān na vastutaḥ //MU_3,9.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4820: sarvadaiva prabuddho yas supto yas sarvadaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4821: na supto na prabuddhaś ca yas sarvatraiva sarvadā //MU_3,9.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4824: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:4826: mūkopamo 'pi yo vaktā mantā yo 'py upalopamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4827: yo bhoktā nityatṛpto 'pi kartā yaś cāpy akiñcana //MU_3,9.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4829: nakiñcit saṃsthitenāpi yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat //MU_3,9.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4834: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4840: yas tvam ekāvabhāsātmā yo 'ham ete janāś ca ye /
GSP27moksop_u:4841: yaś ca na tvam abuddhātman nāhaṃ naite janāś ca ye //MU_3,9.73//
GSP27moksop_u:4844: yataḥ kālasya kalanā yato dṛśyasya dṛśyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:4845: mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsāṃ vibhāsanam //MU_3,9.75//
GSP27moksop_u:4846: kriyāṃ rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4847: yad vetsi tad asau devo yena vetsi tad apy asau //MU_3,9.76//
GSP27moksop_u:4850: ajam ajaram ajāḍyaṃ śāśvataṃ brahma nityaṃ śivam amalam anādyaṃ vandhyavedyair anindyam /
GSP27moksop_u:4851: sakalakalanaśūnyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām anubhavanam avedyaṃ vedanaṃ vittvam antaḥ //MU_3,9.78//
GSP27moksop_u:4856: bhavatv etad anākāraṃ nāma nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,10.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4857: na śūnyaṃ katham etat syān na prakāśaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4858: kathaṃ vā na tamorūpaṃ kathaṃ vā naiva khātmakam //MU_3,10.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4859: kathaṃ vā naiva cidrūpaṃ jīvo vā na kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4860: kathaṃ na buddhitattvaṃ syāt kathaṃ vā na mano bhavet //MU_3,10.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4861: kathaṃ vā na nakiñcit syāt kathaṃ vā sarvam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:4862: anayā ca vacobhaṅgyā mama moha ivoditaḥ //MU_3,10.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4865: bhinadmy enaṃ tv ayatnena naiśaṃ tama ivāṃśumān //MU_3,10.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4867: tan nāma na yathā śūnyaṃ tad idaṃ kathyate śṛṇu //MU_3,10.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4869: tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatra tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam //MU_3,10.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4871: satyo bhavatv asatyo vā yatra tatra kva śūnyatā //MU_3,10.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4873: tathā tāta jagad brahma tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam //MU_3,10.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4874: saumyāmbhasi yathā vīcir na cāsti na ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4877: sambhavaty ajadhātau tu kena nāntar vimuhyate //MU_3,10.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4880: na kadācid udetīdaṃ parasmān na ca śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4881: itthaṃrūpaṃ kevalaṃ sad brahma svātmani saṃsthitam //MU_3,10.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4884: brahmaṇy ayaṃ prakāśo hi na sambhavati bhūtajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4887: mahābhūtābhāvajaṃ tu tenātra na tamaḥ kvacit //MU_3,10.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4889: yo 'ntar asti sa tenaiva na tv anyenānubhūyate //MU_3,10.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4890: muktaṃ tamaḥprakāśābhyām ity etad ajaraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:4892: bilvasya bilvasañjñasya yathā bhedo na kaścana /
GSP27moksop_u:4893: tatheha brahmajagator na manāg api bhinnatā //MU_3,10.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4894: salile 'ntar yathā vīcir mṛdo 'ntar ghaṭako yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4895: tathā yatra jagatsattā tat kathaṃ khātmakaṃ bhavet //MU_3,10.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4897: brahma tv ākāśaviśadaṃ tasyāntassthaṃ tathaiva tat //MU_3,10.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4898: tasmād yādṛk cidākāśam ākāśād api nirmalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4900: marice 'ntar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktur na lakṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4905: yathāsthitam ato viśvaṃ suṣuptaṃ turyam eva vā //MU_3,10.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4906: tena yogī suṣuptātmā vyavahāry api śāntadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4908: ākāriṇi yathā saumye sthitas toye dravakramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4909: anākṛtau tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ pare //MU_3,10.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4912: pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati saṃsthitaṃ pūrṇam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:4913: ato viśvam anutpannaṃ yac cotpannaṃ tad eva tat //MU_3,10.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4918: paramāṇor api paraṃ tad aṇīyo 'py aṇīyasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4919: śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ tad ākāśodarād api //MU_3,10.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4922: cidrūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:4924: cidrūpānudayād eva tatra nāsty eva jīvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:4925: na buddhitā na cittatvaṃ nendriyatvaṃ na vāsanāḥ //MU_3,10.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4926: evaṃ sthitaṃ layārambhapūrṇam apy ajaraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:4933: śiṣyate yat paraṃ brahma tad idaṃ varṇyate śṛṇu //MU_3,10.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4935: yad rūpaṃ yad anākhyeyaṃ tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ //MU_3,10.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4936: nāsti dṛśyaṃ jagad draṣṭā dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat /
GSP27moksop_u:4937: bhātīti bhāsanaṃ yat syāt tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ //MU_3,10.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4938: citer jīvasvabhāvo yo yadi cetyonmukho vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4939: cinmātraṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ yat tat kāraṇakāraṇam //MU_3,10.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4941: jīvataś cetaso rūpaṃ yat tad paramam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4943: yad rūpaṃ ciracintāyās tat tadānagha śiṣyate //MU_3,10.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4944: yad vyomno hṛdayaṃ yad vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4947: syāt sthitis sā parā śāntā sattā tasyādyavastunaḥ //MU_3,10.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4948: citprakāśasya yan madhyaṃ prakāśasya ghanasya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:4949: darśanasya ca yan madhyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4951: vedanaṃ yad anādyantaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4955: avyomna eva vyomatvaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam //MU_3,10.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4957: yatrodety astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam //MU_3,10.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4959: abuddhyādau mahādarśe tad rūpaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam //MU_3,10.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4962: sthāvarāṇāṃ hi yad rūpaṃ tac ced bodhamayaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4964: brahmārkaviṣṇuharaśakrasadāśivādiśāntau śivaṃ paramam etad ihaikam āste /
GSP27moksop_u:4965: śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭam avinaṣṭam akaṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ na miśram aṇunāśritam āśritena //MU_3,10.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4969: itthaṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagan nāmāsti bhāsuram /
GSP27moksop_u:4970: mahāpralayasampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati //MU_3,11.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4972: kuta āyāti kīdṛg vā vandhyāputraḥ kva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:4973: kva yāti kuta āyāti vada vā vyomakānanam //MU_3,11.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4976: kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā //MU_3,11.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4979: jagadādy akhilaṃ dṛśyaṃ tathā nāsti kadācana //MU_3,11.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4980: na cotpannaṃ na ca dhvaṃsi yat kilādau na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4981: utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśaśabdasya kā kathā //MU_3,11.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4984: sā yathā nāśajanmādyā tathaivedaṃ na kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,11.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4989: kaṭakatvaṃ tu nāsty eva jagattvaṃ tu tathā pare //MU_3,11.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4990: ākāśe ca yathā nāsti śūnyatvaṃ vyatirekavat /
GSP27moksop_u:4991: jagattvaṃ brahmaṇi tathā nāsty evāpy upalabdhimat //MU_3,11.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4992: kajjalān na yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śaityaṃ ca na yathā himāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4993: pṛthag eva bhaved buddhaṃ jagan nāsti pare pade //MU_3,11.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4994: yathā ca śaityaṃ śaśino na himād vyatiricyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4995: brahmaṇo na tathā sargo vidyate vyatirekavān //MU_3,11.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4997: nāsty evaivaṃ jagan nāsti dṛṣṭam apy amalātmani //MU_3,11.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5000: cidākāśe cidākāśaś cittvād yaḥ kacati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5001: tad eva tena rūpaṃ svaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate //MU_3,11.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5002: ādāv eva hi yan nāsti kāraṇāsambhavāt svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5003: vartamāne 'pi tan nāsti nāśas syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,11.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5005: kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ chāyāyā ātapo yathā //MU_3,11.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5007: yat tatkāraṇam evāsti tad evettham avasthitam //MU_3,11.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5008: ajātam eva yad bhāti saṃvido bhānam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:5009: yaj jagad dṛśyate svapne saṃvitkacanam eva tat //MU_3,11.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5012: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tat sad evātmani sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5013: nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcit kadācana //MU_3,11.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5014: yathā dravatvaṃ salilaṃ spandatvaṃ pavano yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5015: yathā prakāśa ābhāso brahmaiva trijagat tathā //MU_3,11.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5016: yathā puram ivāste 'ntar vid eva svapnasaṃvidi /
GSP27moksop_u:5019: evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ brahman sughanapratyayaṃ vada /
GSP27moksop_u:5022: sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5023: ekasattve dvayor bandho muktir ekakṣaye dvayoḥ //MU_3,11.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5025: tāvad draṣṭur adraṣṭṛtvaṃ na sambhavati mokṣadam //MU_3,11.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5026: dṛśyaṃ cet sambhavaty ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:5029: pratibimbo lagaty eva sargasmṛtimayo hy ayam //MU_3,11.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5030: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva cet svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5036: asad eva yathā bhāti jagatsargātmakaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5037: śṛṇv ahaṃ kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te //MU_3,11.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5039: na viśrāmyati te tāvad dhṛdi pāṃsur yathā hrade //MU_3,11.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5043: dṛśas tvā vedhayiṣyanti na mahādrim iveṣavaḥ //MU_3,11.33//
GSP27moksop_u:5044: sa eṣo 'sty eka evātmā na dvitīyāsti kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:5045: jagad atra yathotpannaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi rāghava //MU_3,11.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5046: tasmād imāni sakalāni vijṛmbhitāni yo hīdam aṅga sakale sakalaṃ mahātmā /
GSP27moksop_u:5047: rūpāvalokanamanomananaprakāśakośāspadaṃ svayam udeti ca līyate ca //MU_3,11.35//
GSP27moksop_u:5052: yathedam utthitaṃ viśvaṃ tac chṛṇūttamayā dhiyā //MU_3,12.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5053: suṣuptaṃ svapnavad bhāti bhāti brahmaiva sargavat /
GSP27moksop_u:5054: sarvam ekaṃ ca tac chāntaṃ tatra tāvat kramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,12.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5057: tad ātmani svayaṃ kiñcic cetyatām iva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:5060: ākāśād aṇu śuddhaṃ ca sarvasmin bhāvibodhanam //MU_3,12.5//
GSP27moksop_u:5061: tatas sā paramā sattā satītaś cetanonmukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:5064: sā bhavaty ātmakalanā yadā yāntī parāt padāt //MU_3,12.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5066: tadā vastusvabhāvena tanvas tiṣṭhanti tām imāḥ //MU_3,12.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5072: etaj jālam asadrūpaṃ sad ivodeti visphurat //MU_3,12.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5076: svato ghanībhūya śanaiḥ khatanmātraṃ bhavaty alam //MU_3,12.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5086: yā saiva sparśatanmātraṃ bhāvanād bhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_3,12.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5093: bhavac caturṇām avatas tatas sata ivāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5104: na śuddhāny upalabhyante sarvanāśāntam eva hi //MU_3,12.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5109: vivartam eva dhāvanti nirvivartāni santi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5113: bījaṃ jagatsu nanu pañcakamātram asya bījaṃ parā vyavahitā citiśaktir ādyā /
GSP27moksop_u:5114: tajjaṃ tad eva bhavatīti sadānubhūtaṃ cinmātram ekam ajam ādyam ato jagacchrīḥ //MU_3,12.32//
GSP27moksop_u:5128: jhagity eva krameṇeti svapne puram ivākṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:5135: jagataḥ pañcakaṃ bījaṃ pañcakasya cid avyayā //MU_3,13.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5136: yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ viddhi tasmād brahmamayaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:5137: evam eṣa mahākāśe sargādau pañcako gaṇaḥ //MU_3,13.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5140: tad apy ākāśarūpātma kalanātma na sanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5141: na kvacin nāma tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate //MU_3,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5142: kharūpaṃ yad vikalpātma kathaṃ tat satyatām iyāt /
GSP27moksop_u:5143: atha cet pañcakaṃ brahma brahmātmakatayā tayā //MU_3,13.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5147: evaṃ na jāyate kiñcij jagaj jātaṃ ca lakṣyate //MU_3,13.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5151: ity eṣa jīvaḥ kathito vyomni khātmā yathoditaḥ //MU_3,13.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5152: jīvākāśas tv imaṃ dehaṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:5153: jīvākāśaḥ kham evāsau tasmiṃs tu paramāmbare //MU_3,13.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5155: tam evocchūnam iva sad bhāvayaty ātmanāmbare //MU_3,13.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5156: asad eva sadākāraṃ saṅkalpendur yathā śaśam /
GSP27moksop_u:5158: eka eva dvitām eti svapne svamṛtiboddhṛvat //MU_3,13.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5159: kiñcit sthaulyam ivādatte tatas tārakatāṃ vidan /
GSP27moksop_u:5161: kha eva khātmā satato 'py ayaṃ so 'ham iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5162: cittvāt pratyayam ādatte svapne tvam iva pānthatām //MU_3,13.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5164: bhāvayan yāti tadbhāvaṃ cittaṃ cetyārthatām iva //MU_3,13.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5166: antar bhāti bahisstho 'pi parvato makure yathā //MU_3,13.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5167: kūpasaṃsthaṃ yathā dehaṃ samudgakagataṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:5172: prekṣe 'ham iti bhāvena draṣṭuṃ prasaratīva khe //MU_3,13.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5174: yena paśyati tan netrayugmaṃ nāmnā bhaviṣyati //MU_3,13.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5175: yena spṛśati sāsya tvag yac chṛṇoti śrutis tu sā /
GSP27moksop_u:5176: yena jighrati tad ghrāṇaṃ sa svam ātmani paśyati //MU_3,13.29//
GSP27moksop_u:5178: yat spandati sa tad vāyuceṣṭāḥ karmendriyavrajam //MU_3,13.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5181: evam ucchūnatāṃ tasmin bhāvayaṃs tejasaḥ kaṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:5193: ity anudbhūta evāsau svayambhūs svayam utthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5196: na kiñcid api sampannaṃ na ca jātaṃ na dṛśyate //MU_3,13.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5197: tad brahmākāśam ākāśam eva sthitam aśaṅkitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5198: saṅkalpanagarākāram etat sad api naiva sat //MU_3,13.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5199: anirmitam anaṅgaṃ ca etad khe citram utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5200: akṛtaṃ cānubhūtaṃ ca na satyaṃ satyavat sthitam //MU_3,13.41//
GSP27moksop_u:5202: smṛtir na prāktanī kācit kāraṇaṃ sā svayambhuvaḥ //MU_3,13.42//
GSP27moksop_u:5203: tena yādṛk svayambhūs syāt tādṛk tajjam idaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:5207: yatra yatra yathā toye dravatvaṃ nāma vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:5208: tatra tatra tathā nānyas sargo 'sti paramātmani //MU_3,13.45//
GSP27moksop_u:5209: sṛṣṭir evam iyaṃ prauḍhā sarga evam ayaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5211: dṛśyam evam idaṃ śāntaṃ khātma nirbhitti nirbhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:5213: jagatsaṃvidi jātāyām api jātaṃ na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:5215: sarvasaṃhārakhe tv āsīd yad eva tad avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5216: nādheyaṃ tatra nādhāro na ca dṛśyaṃ na draṣṭṛtā //MU_3,13.49//
GSP27moksop_u:5217: brahmāṇḍaṃ nāsti na brahmā na ca brahmāṇḍikā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:5218: na jagan nāsti jagatī śāntam evākhilaṃ sthitam //MU_3,13.50//
GSP27moksop_u:5222: vinaśyaty asad evānte svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,13.52//
GSP27moksop_u:5225: ākāśa eva parame prathamaḥ prajeśo nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati śūnyatayā samānaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5226: sa hy ātivāhikavapur na tu bhūtarūpī pṛthvyādi tena na sad asti yadā na jātam //MU_3,13.54//
GSP27moksop_u:5231: ajātatvāc ca nāsty eva yac cāsti param eva tat //MU_3,14.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5242: ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ svayambhūr iti viśrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5245: mucyante sarva evātaḥ prāktanaṃ karma teṣu kim //MU_3,14.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5246: moktavya eva kuḍyātmā dṛśyo 'dṛśyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5247: na ca dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā sarvam eva ca //MU_3,14.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5248: praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ sarveṣām eṣa eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5249: asmād udeti jīvālī dīpālī dīpakād iva //MU_3,14.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5251: kṣmādimān iva niṣkuḍyas svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā //MU_3,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5252: asmād eva praticchandāj jīvās samprasaranty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:5253: sahakārikāraṇānām abhāvāc ca sa eva te //MU_3,14.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5255: ekam etad ato nānyaḥ parasmāt sargavibhramaḥ //MU_3,14.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5257: jīvākāśas sa evetthaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthvyādy asad yataḥ //MU_3,14.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5259: kiṃ syāt parimito jīvarāśir āho anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5261: dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva vāridheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5262: kaṇās taptāyasa iva kasmān niryānti jīvakāḥ //MU_3,14.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5264: jñātam etan mayā prāyas tad eva prakaṭīkuru //MU_3,14.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5266: eka eva na jīvo 'sti rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5268: na jīvo 'sti na jīvānāṃ rāśayas santi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:5271: na ca kāścana santīti niścayo 'stu tavācalaḥ //MU_3,14.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5272: śuddhaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ brahmāstīha hi sarvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5273: tad yathā sarvaśaktitvād vindate yāṃ svayaṃ kalām //MU_3,14.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5275: nanu mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā tām evāśu prapaśyati //MU_3,14.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5276: jīvo buddhiḥ kriyāspando mano dvitvaikyam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:5278: sābuddhaivaṃ bhavaty eva bhaved brahmaiva bodhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5279: abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśaṃ na tu sa budhyate //MU_3,14.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5281: na cāsya jñāyate tattvam abodhasyaivam eva hi //MU_3,14.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5284: sarvānantatayā tv asya na kācid bhedakalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:5285: vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tad evānubhūtitaḥ //MU_3,14.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5292: yad evecchati tat tasya bhavaty āśu mahātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5293: pūrvaṃ tu naśyatīcchā ced ato dvitvam udeti tat //MU_3,14.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5295: anenetthaṃ hi bhavatīty evaṃ tena kriyākramaḥ //MU_3,14.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5296: śaktyādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamo yaḥ prakalpitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5298: yasyā jīvābhidhānāyāś śaktyā yecchā phalaty asau /
GSP27moksop_u:5301: tat phalaṃ śaktyaśaktitvān nehitānāṃ kvacid bhavet //MU_3,14.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5308: atrānante parākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇo 'py asan /
GSP27moksop_u:5310: svayam eva camatkāro yas samāgamyate citā /
GSP27moksop_u:5312: cito yas syāc cidālokas tanmayatvād anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5313: sa eṣa bhuvanābhoga iti tasyāḥ prabimbati //MU_3,14.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5317: acetyasya prakāśasya jagad ity eva tat sthitam //MU_3,14.42//
GSP27moksop_u:5318: ākāśād api sūkṣmaiṣā yā śaktir vitatā citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5323: iyaṃ svātmani tasyaiva jagannāma tataṃ kṛtam //MU_3,14.45//
GSP27moksop_u:5324: citaś cittvam ahaṅkāras saiva rāghava kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:5325: tanmātrādi cid evāto dvitvaikatve kva saṃsthite //MU_3,14.46//
GSP27moksop_u:5326: jīvahetāv asantyāge tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti santyaja /
GSP27moksop_u:5327: śeṣaṃ sadasator madhye bhavety arthātmako bhavet //MU_3,14.47//
GSP27moksop_u:5328: citā yathādau kalitā svasattā sā tathoditā /
GSP27moksop_u:5329: abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnas sattāsatte 'tha vedmy aham //MU_3,14.48//
GSP27moksop_u:5330: citkhaṃ khaṃ jagadīhāḥ khaṃ kham abdhivibudhācalāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5332: yo yadvilāsas tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:5334: citer nityam acetyāyāś cin nāsty avitatākṛteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5335: yad rūpaṃ jagato rūpaṃ tat tatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ //MU_3,14.51//
GSP27moksop_u:5336: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro bhūtāni girayo diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5338: citaś cittvaṃ jagad viddhi nājagac cittvam asti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:5339: ajagattvād acic cit syād bhāvābhedāj jagat kutaḥ //MU_3,14.53//
GSP27moksop_u:5347: spandamātraṃ bhavet karma sa eva puruṣas smṛtaḥ //MU_3,14.57//
GSP27moksop_u:5348: jīvaś cittve parispandaḥ puṃsāṃ cittaṃ sa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5349: manas tv indriyarūpaṃ san nānānānaiva gacchati //MU_3,14.58//
GSP27moksop_u:5353: nityas satatagas sthāṇur acalo 'ham iti sthitam //MU_3,14.60//
GSP27moksop_u:5354: vivadante yathā hy atra vivadantu tathā bhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5355: bhramanto na vayaṃ tv ete jātā vigatavibhramāḥ //MU_3,14.61//
GSP27moksop_u:5367: svayam astaṅgatevājñe jñe jñānād uditā citiḥ //MU_3,14.67//
GSP27moksop_u:5368: svayaṃ jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padaṃ sauṣuptam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5370: citprakāśaprakāśo hi jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5371: cidākāśaikaśūnyatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca //MU_3,14.69//
GSP27moksop_u:5372: cidālokamahārūpaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5373: cinmārutaghanaspando jagad asti na cāsti ca //MU_3,14.70//
GSP27moksop_u:5374: cidghanadhvāntakṛṣṇatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5375: cidarkālokadivaso jagad asti na cāsti ca //MU_3,14.71//
GSP27moksop_u:5381: jagac citsarpiṣi sneho vīciś citsarito jagat //MU_3,14.74//
GSP27moksop_u:5385: atra bhedavikārādi na khe malam iva sthitam //MU_3,14.76//
GSP27moksop_u:5389: anubhūtyapalāpāya kalpitau yair dhig astu tān //MU_3,14.78//
GSP27moksop_u:5393: dhatte 'ntar akhilaṃ śāntaṃ sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā //MU_3,14.80//
GSP27moksop_u:5400: na cāsattvam acetyāyāś cito vācāpi sidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:5401: yad asti tad udetīti dṛṣṭaṃ bījād ivāṅkuram //MU_3,14.84//
GSP27moksop_u:5402: gaganam iva suśūnyabhedam asti tribhuvanam aṅga mahācito 'ntar asyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5403: paramapadamayaṃ samastadṛśyaṃ tv idam iti niścayavān bhavānubhūteḥ //MU_3,14.85//
GSP27moksop_u:5405: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:5406: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,14.86//
GSP27moksop_u:5410: jagad ākāśam evedaṃ yathā hi vyomni mauktikam /
GSP27moksop_u:5411: vimale bhāti khātmaiva jagac cidgagane tathā //MU_3,15.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5413: citstambhe na ca sotkīrṇā na cotkartātra vidyate //MU_3,15.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5415: vidi vedyā bhavantīva pare dṛśyavidas tathā //MU_3,15.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5417: jagadbhānaṃ prati sthūlāny aṇuṃ prati yathācalāḥ //MU_3,15.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5421: pṛthvyādīni na santy eva svapnasaṅkalpayor iva //MU_3,15.6//
GSP27moksop_u:5423: marunadyāṃ jalam iva na sambhavati kutracit //MU_3,15.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5430: idaṃ tv acetyacinmātrabhānor bhānaṃ nabhaḥ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:5431: tathā sūkṣmaṃ yathā meghaṃ prati saṅkalpavāridaḥ //MU_3,15.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5433: tathā jagad idaṃ svacchaṃ saṅkalpitajagat prati //MU_3,15.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5436: tasmān na kiñcid utpannaṃ jagadādīha dṛśyakam /
GSP27moksop_u:5443: nissandeho yathaiṣo 'rthaś citte viśrāntim eti te //MU_3,15.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5460: tasyāsīt subhagā bhāryā līlā nāma vilāsinī /
GSP27moksop_u:5471: paricaryāṃ ciraṃ kartum anyā ratir ivoditā //MU_3,15.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5474: jagaty ākāśapratipādanāya maṇḍapopākhyāne rājavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
GSP27moksop_u:5512: antaḥpureṣu harmyeṣu teṣu teṣu tathā tathā //MU_3,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5513: sā bālā sukhasaṃvṛddhā tasya praṇayinī priyā /
GSP27moksop_u:5518: kathaṃ svairaṃ ciraṃ kāntā rameyābdaśatāny aham //MU_3,16.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5522: pṛcchāmi tāvan maraṇaṃ kathaṃ na syān nṛṇām iti //MU_3,16.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5524: amaratvaṃ kathaṃ viprā bhaved iti punaḥ punaḥ //MU_3,16.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5528: ity ākarṇya dvijamukhāc cintayām āsa sā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5530: maraṇaṃ bhartur agre me yadi daivād bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:5533: tat kariṣye tathā yena jīvo gehān na yāsyati //MU_3,16.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5538: iti niścitya sā nātham anuktvaiva varāṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:5549: tuṣṭā bhagavatī gaurī vāgīśīdam uvāca tām //MU_3,16.36//
GSP27moksop_u:5552: parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇa varam īpsitam //MU_3,16.37//
GSP27moksop_u:5556: amba māṃ trijaganmātas trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:5557: idaṃ varadvayaṃ dehi yad iha prārthaye śubham //MU_3,16.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5558: ekaṃ tāvad videhasya bhartur jīvo mamāmbike /
GSP27moksop_u:5559: asmād eva hi mā yāsīn nijāntaḥpuramaṇḍapāt //MU_3,16.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5560: dvitīyaṃ tvāṃ mahādevi prārthaye 'haṃ yadā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:5561: darśanāya varārthena tadā me dehi darśanam //MU_3,16.41//
GSP27moksop_u:5562: ity ākarṇya jaganmātā tathāstv evam iti kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:5568: antardhim ājagāmāsyāḥ patyus tac cetanaṃ tanau /
GSP27moksop_u:5574: prāpa sā tamasāndhatvaṃ tasmin maraṇam āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:5576: kārśyam āpa kṣaṇenāsau bālā virasatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5580: atha tām atimātravihvalāṃ sakṛd ākāśabhavā sarasvatī /
GSP27moksop_u:5586: ācchādya sthāpayeha tvaṃ punar enam avāpsyasi //MU_3,17.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5587: puṣpāṇi mlānim eṣyanti no na caiṣa vinaṅkṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:5588: bhūyaś ca tava bhartāyam acireṇa bhaviṣyati //MU_3,17.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5596: tasminn eva dine saikā tasmiñ śuddhāntamaṇḍape /
GSP27moksop_u:5599: duḥkhād āhvāyayām āsa sovaca samupetya tām //MU_3,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5601: kiṃ smṛtāsmi tvayā vatse dhatse kim iti śokitām /
GSP27moksop_u:5604: kva mamāmba sthito bhartā kiṃ karoty atha kīdṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5605: samīpaṃ naya māṃ tasya naikā śaknomi jīvitum //MU_3,17.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5609: śūnyam evedam akhilaṃ jagat tatra vyavasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5610: ahaṃ tvam iti dṛśyātma nānānānaiva nirvapuḥ //MU_3,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5615: deśād deśāntaraprāptau saṃvido madhyam eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:5618: sarvātmakapadaṃ tat tad dṛṣṭvā prāpnoṣy asaṃśayam //MU_3,17.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5620: nānyathā madvareṇāśu tvaṃ tu prāpsyasi sundari //MU_3,17.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5622: ity uktvā sā yayau devī divyam ātmīyam āspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:5654: papātātha mahārambhāṃ sā tāṃ narapates sabhām /
GSP27moksop_u:5656: bhramantīṃ tatra tām agre dadṛśus te na kecana /
GSP27moksop_u:5658: tathā te tāṃ na dadṛśus sañcarantīṃ purogatām /
GSP27moksop_u:5660: prāktanān eva tān sarvān sā dadarśa purogatān /
GSP27moksop_u:5662: tadveśāṃs tanmayācārāṃs tathā tān eva bālakān /
GSP27moksop_u:5663: tā eva bālavanitās tāṃs tān eva ca mantriṇaḥ //MU_3,17.37//
GSP27moksop_u:5664: tān eva bhuvi bhūpālāṃs tāṃs tān eva ca paṇḍitān /
GSP27moksop_u:5665: tān eva narmasacivān bhṛtyāṃs tān eva tādṛśān //MU_3,17.38//
GSP27moksop_u:5666: athānyān anyapūrvāṃś ca paṇḍitān suhṛdas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5667: vyavahārāṃs tathā cānyān paurān anyāṃs tathaiva ca //MU_3,17.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5675: te 'smin nagaravāstavyāḥ kaṣṭaṃ sarve mṛtā iti //MU_3,17.43//
GSP27moksop_u:5681: āha cātīva me duḥkham āsthānaṃ dīyatām iti //MU_3,17.46//
GSP27moksop_u:5682: bhartus siṃhāsanasyāsya pārśve tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:5688: āsthānabhūmiṃ bhṛtyāś ca mārjayām āsur ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5694: ājagmur mantrisāmantās svaṃ svaṃ sthānam aninditāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5695: trailokye punar utpanne lokapālā yathā diśaḥ //MU_3,17.53//
GSP27moksop_u:5706: dadarśa tān nṛpān bhṛtyān sarvān eva yathāsthitān /
GSP27moksop_u:5708: sakalam eva hi pūrvavad eva sā samavalokya mudaṃ paramāṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:5709: nṛpatirāṣṭrajanaḥ khalu jīvatīty uditayā ca babhau śaśivac chriyā //MU_3,17.60//
GSP27moksop_u:5713: itthaṃ vinodayāmīdaṃ duḥkhitaṃ cittam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:5716: viveśa puṣpaguptasya cintayām āsa ceti sā //MU_3,18.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5718: bahir antaś cidādarśe tatra ceha ca saṃsthitāḥ //MU_3,18.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5720: yathā tatra tathehāpi bata māyeyam ātatā //MU_3,18.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5721: ādarśe bahir antaś ca yathā śailo 'nubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:5723: atra bhrāntimayas sargaḥ kas syāt kaḥ pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5725: iti niścitya tāṃ devīṃ pūjayām āsa sā tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:5730: anukampyasya no devi bhajanty udvegam uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5732: tad iyaṃ yat purā prahvā pṛcchāmi parameśvari /
GSP27moksop_u:5733: tvaṃ brūhi tvatkṛto nūnaṃ saphalo me 'sty anugrahaḥ //MU_3,18.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5735: asty ādarśo jagannāmnaḥ khād apy adhikanirmalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5738: acetyacid iti khyāto nāmnā nirbhittir agrahaḥ //MU_3,18.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5743: tatrāmba kṛtrimā kā syāt kāsau vā syād akṛtrimā //MU_3,18.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5746: kīdṛśaṃ kṛtrimatvaṃ syād yathāvat kathayeti me //MU_3,18.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5748: yathāham iha tiṣṭhāmi tvaṃ ca devi sthitāmbike /
GSP27moksop_u:5749: asāv akṛtrimas sarga iti deveśi vedmy aham //MU_3,18.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5750: yatrādhunā sa bhartā me sthitas sargas sa kṛtrimaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5754: na hi kāraṇataḥ kāryam udety asadṛśaṃ kvacit //MU_3,18.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5757: ambv ādātum aśaktā mṛd ghaṭas tajjas tadāspadam //MU_3,18.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5759: sampadyate hi yat kāryaṃ kāraṇais sahakāribhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5761: na ca tvadbhartṛsargasya kiñcit pṛthvyādi kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:5762: na bhūmaṇḍalato bhūmir jātā tatra varānane //MU_3,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5763: gatā cid ita uḍḍīya kutas syād ihabhūtalam /
GSP27moksop_u:5764: sahakārīṇi kāny eva kāraṇāny atra kāraṇam //MU_3,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5768: smṛtis sā devi madbhartus tathā sphāratvam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5769: smṛteś ca kāraṇaṃ vedmi sargo 'yam iti niścayaḥ //MU_3,18.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5771: smṛtir ākāśarūpaiva yathā tajjas tathaiva te /
GSP27moksop_u:5772: bhartṛsargo 'nubhūto hi sa kham eva tathābale //MU_3,18.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5775: tathaivemam ahaṃ manye sa sargo 'tra nidarśanam //MU_3,18.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5777: evam etad asatsargo bhartus te bhāti bhāsuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5778: tathaivāyam ihābhāti paśyāmy etad ahaṃ sute //MU_3,18.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5780: yathā patyur amūrto 'smāt sargāt sargo bhramātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5801: asmin nadīśailavanopagūḍhe sāgnis sadāras sutavān arogaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5802: gokṣīravān rājabhayād vimuktaḥ sarvātithir dharmaparo dvijo 'bhūt //MU_3,18.38//
GSP27moksop_u:5809: nāmnā tv arundhatī bhāryā bhūmivyomany arundhatī //MU_3,19.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5811: sameva sāpy arundhatyā na tu cetanasattayā //MU_3,19.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5814: sa vipras tasya śailasya sānau sarasaśādvale /
GSP27moksop_u:5824: tam ālokya mahīpālam idaṃ cintitavān asau /
GSP27moksop_u:5832: itthaṃ tataḥprabhṛty eva vipras saṅkalpavān abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:5838: mām athārādhitavatī sā tatas tvam ivāṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:5840: devi svamaṇḍapād eva jīvo bhartur mṛtasya me /
GSP27moksop_u:5841: mā yāsīd ity atas tasyās sa evāṅgīkṛto mayā //MU_3,19.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5842: atha kālavaśād vipras sa pañcatvam upāyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:5856: bhartrā saha śavībhūtā deham utsṛjya dūrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5858: nadī nikhātam iva taṃ bhartāram anusṛtya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:5860: tatrāsya viprasya sutā gṛhāṇi bhūsthāvarādīni ghanāni santi /
GSP27moksop_u:5865: sa te bhartādya sampanno dvijo bhūpatvam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5866: yāsāv arundhatī nāma brāhmaṇī sā tvam aṅgane //MU_3,20.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5867: ihemau kuruto rājyaṃ tau bhavantau sudampatī /
GSP27moksop_u:5868: cakravākāv iva navau bhuvi jātau śivāv iva //MU_3,20.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5869: eṣa te kathitas sarvaḥ prāktanas saṃsṛtibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5873: tasmād bhrāntimayaḥ kas syāt ko vā bhrāntyujjhito bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:5878: devi tvadvacanaṃ mithyā kathaṃ sampannam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:5879: kva viprajīvas svagṛhe kveme vayam iha sthitāḥ //MU_3,20.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5880: tādṛg lokāntaraṃ sā bhūs te śailās tā diśo daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:5881: kathaṃ mānti gṛhasyāntar madbhartā yeṣv avasthitaḥ //MU_3,20.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5887: tathā gṛhāntaḥ pṛthivī śailāś cety asamañjasam //MU_3,20.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5891: nāhaṃ mithyā vadāmīdaṃ yathāvac chṛṇu sundari /
GSP27moksop_u:5893: vibhidyamānām anyena sthāpayāmy aham eva yām /
GSP27moksop_u:5894: maryādāṃ tāṃ mayā bhinnāṃ ko 'paraḥ pālayiṣyati //MU_3,20.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5897: prāktanī sā smṛtir luptā yuvayor uditānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5899: yathā svapne tribhuvanaṃ saṅkalpāt trijagad yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5905: asatyād yat samutpannaṃ smṛtyā nāma tad apy asat /
GSP27moksop_u:5908: viddhi māṃ tvāṃ ca sarvaṃ vā tac ca vyomaiva kevalam //MU_3,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5915: tasminn asmin pure tanvi tavedaṃ sadanaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5916: tasmāt kim aṇumātre 'ntar gajavṛndam iva sthitam //MU_3,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5918: antar antar jagantīti kenaitan nāma saṅkhyate //MU_3,20.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5920: aṣṭamaṃ divasaṃ vipras sa mṛtaḥ parameśvari /
GSP27moksop_u:5921: gato varṣagaṇo 'smākam ataḥ katham idaṃ bhavet //MU_3,20.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5923: deśadairghyaṃ yathā nāsti kāladairghyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5924: nāsty eveti yathānyāyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu //MU_3,20.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5928: yathāvat pratibhāsasya vatse kramam imaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,20.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5933: yadaiva cetati vapus tadaivedaṃ sa cetati /
GSP27moksop_u:5934: etasyāhaṃ pituḥ putro varṣāṇīmāni santi me //MU_3,20.33//
GSP27moksop_u:5935: ime me bāndhavā ramyā mamedaṃ ramyam āspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:5936: jāto 'ham abhavaṃ bālo vṛddhiṃ yāto 'ham īdṛśaḥ //MU_3,20.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5937: bāndhavāś cāsya te sarve tathaiva viharanty api /
GSP27moksop_u:5940: na kiñcid apy abhyuditaṃ sthitaṃ vyomaiva nirmalam //MU_3,20.36//
GSP27moksop_u:5941: svapne draṣṭari yadvac cit tadvad dṛśye cid eva sā /
GSP27moksop_u:5946: na manāg api bhedo 'sti vīcīnām iva vāriṇi //MU_3,20.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5947: ato 'jātam idaṃ viśvam ajātatvād anāśi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5948: kharūpatvāc ca nāsty eva yac ca bhāti cid eva sā //MU_3,20.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5951: yasmāc cetyam ato nānyad vīcitvād iva vāritā /
GSP27moksop_u:5952: vīcitvaṃ ca na caivāsti śaśaśṛṅgavad eva hi //MU_3,20.42//
GSP27moksop_u:5953: saiva cetyam ivāpannā svabhāvād acyutāpy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:5954: tasmān nāsty eva dṛśyo 'rthaḥ kuto 'to draṣṭṛdṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,20.43//
GSP27moksop_u:5961: ajātam eva jāto 'ham iti paśyati cidvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5963: jhagity eva mṛter ante vapuḥ paśyati yauvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:5964: eṣā mātā pitā tv eṣa bālo 'bhūvam ahaṃ tv iti //MU_3,20.48//
GSP27moksop_u:5965: nānubhūto 'nubhūto vā yas syāt smṛtimayaḥ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5966: paścād udety asau tasya puṣpasyeva phalodayaḥ //MU_3,20.49//
GSP27moksop_u:5970: mṛto jāto 'ham anyo me piteti svapnadhāmni ca //MU_3,20.51//
GSP27moksop_u:5972: bhukte cābhuktadhīr dṛṣṭam ity alaṃ kitavādiṣu //MU_3,20.52//
GSP27moksop_u:5973: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti tulyaṃ vyasanam utsavaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5975: taikṣṇyaṃ yathā maricabījakaṇe sthitaṃ svaṃ stambhe 'thavā racitaputrakajālam antaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5976: dṛśyaṃ tv ananyad idam evam aje 'sti śāntaṃ kasyāsti bandhanavimokṣadṛśaḥ kutaḥ kāḥ //MU_3,20.54//
GSP27moksop_u:5985: nānubhūtaṃ na yad dṛṣṭaṃ tan mayā kṛtam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:5986: tat kṣaṇāt smṛtitām eti svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5989: ahaṃ jagad iyaṃ sargasmṛtir eveti jṛmbhati /
GSP27moksop_u:5995: kadācit smṛtitām tyaktvā pratibhāmātram eva sat /
GSP27moksop_u:6002: īpsitānīpsite tatra na staḥ kecana kasyacit //MU_3,21.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6006: anutpādamayo nityaṃ śānto 'pi na hi śāmyati //MU_3,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6007: ardhaśānto na śānto 'sau samety anyatayā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6009: saṃsāraś cāyam ābhogī param eveti niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6010: kāraṇābhāvato bhāti yad ihābhāvam eti tat //MU_3,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6013: katham abhyuditā sā syāt smaraṇīyam idaṃ vinā //MU_3,21.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6015: pitāmahasmṛtis tatra kāraṇaṃ tasya ca smṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6016: pūrvaṃ na sambhavaty eva muktatvāt pūrvajanmanaḥ //MU_3,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6017: pūrvaṃ na sambhavaty eva smaraṇīyā citis svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:6019: abhūvam aham ity anyaḥ prajānāthaḥ prajāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:6021: evam abhyudite loke na kiñcin na kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:6022: kvacid abhyuditaṃ nāma kevalaṃ cinnabhas sthitam //MU_3,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6023: dvividhāyās smṛter asyāḥ kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:6029: evaṃ na kiñcid utpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ trijagadādy api /
GSP27moksop_u:6032: aho nu paramā dṛṣṭir darśitā devi me tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:6034: idānīm aham etasyāṃ yāvat pariṇatā dṛśi /
GSP27moksop_u:6035: nābhyāsena vinā tāvad bhinddhīmaṃ devi kautukam //MU_3,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6037: taṃ sargaṃ taṃ girigrāmaṃ naya māṃ samavekṣitum //MU_3,21.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6043: evaṃsthitaṃ taṃ paśyāvas saha sargam anantaram /
GSP27moksop_u:6046: amunā devi dehena jagad anyad avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:6047: na vā kasmād atra yuktiṃ kathayānugrahagrahāt //MU_3,21.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6052: yathā tathā jagadrūpe jagattvaṃ nāsti citpade //MU_3,21.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6053: jagad ākāśam evedaṃ brahmaiva na tu dṛśyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:6054: dṛśyate kācid apy atra dhūlir ambunidhāv iva //MU_3,21.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6055: brahmaiva paśyati brahma nābrahma brahma paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:6059: yāvad abhyāsayogena na śāntā bhedadhīs tava /
GSP27moksop_u:6060: nūnaṃ tāvad atadrūpā na brahma paripaśyasi //MU_3,21.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6061: tatra rūḍhim upāyātā ime ye tv asmadādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6062: abhyāsād brahmasaṃvitteḥ paśyāmas te hi tat padam //MU_3,21.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6064: brahmaiva vātaḥ paśyāmi dehenānena tat padam //MU_3,21.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6067: tavābhyāsaṃ vinā bālo nākāro brahmatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6072: tat paśyasy etad evāśu kuru kāryavidāṃ vare //MU_3,21.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6074: sadehaṃ vā videhaṃ vā netaraṃ prati kiñcana //MU_3,21.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6076: tathā tadāprabhṛty eva niyatiḥ prauḍhim āgatā //MU_3,21.45//
GSP27moksop_u:6079: sahetīdam ahaṃ vacmi kathaṃ gantavyam amba he //MU_3,21.46//
GSP27moksop_u:6081: cetasā tat paraṃ yāmi lokaṃ tvaṃ kathayeti tu //MU_3,21.47//
GSP27moksop_u:6083: saṅkalpavyomavṛkṣas te yathā sann api khātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6084: na kuḍyātmā na kuḍyena rodhyate nāpi kuḍyahā //MU_3,21.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6086: pratibhānam atas tasmād paramād bhidyate manāk //MU_3,21.49//
GSP27moksop_u:6087: so 'yam etādṛśo deho nainaṃ santyajya yāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:6088: anenaiva tam āpnomi deśaṃ gandham ivānilaḥ //MU_3,21.50//
GSP27moksop_u:6089: yathā jalaṃ jalair vāgnir agninā vāyunānilaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6090: milaty evaṃ manodeho dehair anyair manomayaiḥ //MU_3,21.51//
GSP27moksop_u:6091: na hi pārthivatāṃ saṃvid ety apārthivasaṃvidā /
GSP27moksop_u:6095: yathā svapne yathā dīrghakāladhyāne yathā bhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6097: vāsanātānavaṃ nūnaṃ yadā te sthitim eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:6101: tam avāpnoty ayaṃ deho daśāmohe vinaśyati //MU_3,21.56//
GSP27moksop_u:6103: yad asti nāma tatraiṣa nāśānāśakramo bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:6104: vastuto nāsti yat tv eva nāśas syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,21.57//
GSP27moksop_u:6106: sarpo na naṣṭas tan naṣṭo vety evaṃ keva saṅkathā //MU_3,21.58//
GSP27moksop_u:6110: sā śilā samapāstaiva yā nehāsti kadācana //MU_3,21.60//
GSP27moksop_u:6112: iti satyaṃ vayaṃ bhadre paśyāmo nāsi paśyasi //MU_3,21.61//
GSP27moksop_u:6114: tadā tataḥprabhṛty ekaṃ svatvaṃ dṛśyam ivekṣyate //MU_3,21.62//
GSP27moksop_u:6121: nāsty eva satyānubhave tathā nāsty eva citpade /
GSP27moksop_u:6123: yathā nāsty ambare pāṃsuḥ pare nāsti tathā kalā /
GSP27moksop_u:6124: akalākalanaṃ śāntam idam ekam ajaṃ tataḥ //MU_3,21.66//
GSP27moksop_u:6125: yad vedaṃ bhāsate kiñcit tat tasyaiva nirāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:6128: etāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālam evaṃ devi vayaṃ vada /
GSP27moksop_u:6134: eṣo 'sann eva tenāntar avidyaiṣā na vidyate //MU_3,21.70//
GSP27moksop_u:6136: na mokṣo 'sti nirābādhaṃ śuddhabodhas tv idaṃ jagat //MU_3,21.71//
GSP27moksop_u:6137: etāvantaṃ yadā kālaṃ tvayaitan na vicāritam /
GSP27moksop_u:6138: tadā na samprabuddhā tvaṃ bhrāntaivārṇava ākulā //MU_3,21.72//
GSP27moksop_u:6141: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ saṃsāranāṭakam /
GSP27moksop_u:6142: yadā tadā kathaṃ kena vāsyate vāsanāpi kā //MU_3,21.74//
GSP27moksop_u:6155: anubhūto 'py ayaṃ tadvaj jāgraddeho na vāstavaḥ //MU_3,22.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6162: yeyaṃ tu jīvanmuktānāṃ vāsanā sā na vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:6164: yā suptavāsanā nidrā sā suṣuptam iti smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:6165: yat suptavāsanaṃ jāgrat sa ghano moha ucyate //MU_3,22.6//
