GSP27moksop_u:10250: avaśyaṃ bhavitā hy evam idam ittham iti sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10252: pauruṣam na parityājyam enām āśritya dhīmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:10254: apauruṣaṃ hi niyatiḥ pauruṣaṃ saiva sargagā /
GSP27moksop_u:10257: yas tiṣṭhati prāṇamarutspandas tasya kva gacchati //MU_3,62.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10259: yadi tiṣṭhati tat sādhur mukta eva kim ucyate //MU_3,62.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10261: ābhyāṃ tu śabalaḥ pakṣo duḥkhāyaiva mahātmanām //MU_3,62.33//
GSP27moksop_u:10263: nūnaṃ paramaśuddhāyāṃ tat prāptaiva parā gatiḥ //MU_3,62.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10269: etad brahmatattvaṃ sarvathā sarvadaiva sarvata eva sarvaśakti sarvākāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ sarvagaṃ sarvam eveti |
GSP27moksop_u:10270: eṣa tv ātmā sarvaśaktitvād anantaśaktitvāc ca kvacic cicchaktiṃ prakaṭayati kvacij jaḍaśaktiṃ kvacid ullāsaṃ kvacic chāntiṃ kvacit kiñcit kvacin nakiñcit prakaṭayati |
GSP27moksop_u:10271: yatra yadā yad evāsau yathā bhāvayati tatra tadā tad evāsau tathā paśyati | (MU_3,63.1)
GSP27moksop_u:10272: sarvaśakter hi yā yaiva yathodeti tathaiva sā /
GSP27moksop_u:10274: imāś śaktayo 'yam ātmety evaṃ vikalpajālaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ dhīmadbhiḥ parikalpitaṃ loke na tv ātmani vidyate bhedaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:10275: yathormitaraṅgaiḥ payasāṃ kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrair vā hemnaḥ avayavāvayavinos saṃvit kālpanikī dvidhā na vāstavī |
GSP27moksop_u:10276: yathā yac cetyate tathaiva tan na bāhyato nāntarataś cetanaṃ samudeti hi |
GSP27moksop_u:10277_0: sarvātmatvāt svam ābhāsaṃ kvacit kiñcit prapaśyati sarvākāramayaṃ brahmaivedaṃ tatra
GSP27moksop_u:10277_1: mithyājñānavadbhiś śaktiśaktimatte avayavāvayavirūpe kalpite na pāramārthike sad
GSP27moksop_u:10277_2: vā bhavatv asad vā cid yat saṅkalpayaty abhiniviṣṭā tat tatpaśyati sakalaṃ tat tat
GSP27moksop_u:10284: jīvas sañjāyate pūrvaṃ sa cittaṃ tat tato jagat //MU_3,64.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10291: tasya yat samam āpūrṇaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam acihnitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10292: tadvidām apy anirdeśyaṃ tac chāntaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_3,64.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10294: svabhāvāt spandanaṃ tat taj jīvaśabdena kathyate //MU_3,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10297: brahmaṇas sphuraṇaṃ kiñcid yad avātāmbudher iva /
GSP27moksop_u:10298: dīpasya vāpy avātasya taj jīvaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_3,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10300: svābhāvikaṃ yat sphuraṇaṃ cidvyomnas so 'ṅga jīvakaḥ //MU_3,64.9//
GSP27moksop_u:10301: yathā vātasya calanaṃ kṛśāṇor uṣṇatā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10302: śītatā vā tuṣārasya tathā jīvatvam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,64.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10304: manāksaṃvedanaṃ pūrvaṃ yat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ //MU_3,64.11//
GSP27moksop_u:10305: tad eva ghanasaṃvitti yāty ahantām anukramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:10314: cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prakṛtiś ceti nāmabhiḥ //MU_3,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10316: kurvaṃs tattāṃ vrajaty eva saṅkalpād yāti pañcatām //MU_3,64.17//
GSP27moksop_u:10320: śanais svasmāt parispandād bījam aṅkuratām iva //MU_3,64.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10325: kaścit sthāvaratām eti kaścij jaṅgamatām api /
GSP27moksop_u:10328: krameṇa padam āsādya vairiñcaṃ kurute jagat //MU_3,64.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10330: tat svabhāvavaśād eva jātam eva prapaśyati //MU_3,64.24//
GSP27moksop_u:10332: saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ paścāt karma nirmāya saṃsthitam //MU_3,64.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10333: cittvaṃ svabhāvāt sphurati citaḥ phena ivāmbhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10334: karmabhir badhyate paścād diṇḍīram iva rajjubhiḥ //MU_3,64.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10335: saṅkalpaḥ karmaṇo bījaṃ tadātmaiva hi jīvakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10339: anye kha eva ye jīvā evam evākṛtiṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10340: pūrvotpanne jagati te yānti bhūtāśritās sthitim //MU_3,64.29//
GSP27moksop_u:10342: prayānty ūrdhvam adhastād vā karma citspanda ucyate //MU_3,64.30//
GSP27moksop_u:10343: citspandanaṃ bhavati karma tad eva daivaṃ cittaṃ tad eva ca tad eva śubhāśubhādi /
GSP27moksop_u:10344: tasmād bhavanti bhuvanāni jaganti pūrvaṃ bhūtāni cāśu kusumāni taror ivādyāt //MU_3,64.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10348: etasmāt kāraṇād evaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10349: mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam //MU_3,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10357: yathā svapnas tathā citte jagat sadasadātmakam //MU_3,65.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10358: na san nāsann ayaṃ jātaś cetaso jāgato bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10360: dīrghas svapnas sthitiṃ yātas saṃsārākhyo manovaśāt /
GSP27moksop_u:10366: jīvatvād apy ahambhāvas tv ahambhāvāc ca cittatā /
GSP27moksop_u:10370: dvaitaṃ yathā nāsti cidātmatattvayos tathaiva bhedo 'sti na jīvacittayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10371: yathaiva bhedo 'sti na jīvacittayos tathaiva bhedo 'sti na dehakarmaṇoḥ //MU_3,65.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10372: karmaiva deho nanu deha eva cittaṃ tad evāham itīva jīvaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10373: sa jīva eveśvaracit sa ātmā sarvaṃ śivāt tv ekapadottham etat //MU_3,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10377: evam ekaṃ paraṃ vastu rāmānānātvam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:10378: nānātvam iva saṃyātaṃ dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā //MU_3,66.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10380: vicārya cetas tad ahambhāvahīnaṃ na śocati //MU_3,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10381: cittamātraṃ naras tasmin śānte śāntam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:10383: pattramātrād ṛte nānyat kadalyā vidyate yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10384: bhramamātrād ṛte nānyaj jagatāṃ vidyate tathā //MU_3,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:10385: jāyate bālatām eti yauvanaṃ vārdhakaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10386: mṛtiṃ svargaṃ ca narakaṃ bhramāc ceto hi nṛtyati //MU_3,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10388: yathā surāyās sāmarthyaṃ tathā cittasya saṃsṛtau //MU_3,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10389: yathā dvitvaṃ śaśāṅkādau paśyaty akṣi malābilam /
GSP27moksop_u:10391: yathā madavaśād bhrāntān kṣīvaḥ paśyati pādapān /
GSP27moksop_u:10394: bhrāntaṃ paśyati cittvāt tu cid vai dṛśyaṃ tathaiva hi //MU_3,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:10395: yadā cic cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyavibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10396: yadā na cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyayoḥ kṣayaḥ //MU_3,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10397: yac cetyate tad itarad vyatiriktaṃ cito 'sti no /
GSP27moksop_u:10398: kiñcin nāstīti saṃśāntyā citaś śāmyati cetanam //MU_3,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:10400: śāmyan vyavaharan vāpi tadā saṃśānta ucyase //MU_3,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10401: tanvī cetayate cetyaṃ ghanā cin nāṅga cetati /
GSP27moksop_u:10402: alpakṣīvaḥ kṣobham eti ghanakṣīvo hi śāmyati //MU_3,66.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10405: cic cetanena cetyatvam ity evaṃ paśyati bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:10407: svabhāvād vyatiriktaṃ tu na citaś cāsti cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:10408: spandād ṛte yathā vāyāv ataḥ kiṃ kena cetyate //MU_3,66.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10409: cetye tv asambhavaty eva kiñcid yac cetyate citā /
GSP27moksop_u:10414: amunaiva nimeṣeṇa tan mukto 'si na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,66.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10417: yatrābhilāṣas tan nūnaṃ santyajya sthīyate yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:10418: prāpta evāṅga tan mokṣaḥ kim etāvati duṣkaram //MU_3,66.21//
GSP27moksop_u:10419: api prāṇāṃs tṛṇam iva tyajantīha mahāśayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10422: prāptaṃ karmendriyair gṛhṇaṃs tyajann iṣṭaṃ ca tiṣṭha bhoḥ //MU_3,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10423: yathā karatale bilvaṃ yathā vā parvataḥ puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10425: ātmaiva bhāti jagad ity uditas taraṅgaiḥ kalpānta eka iva vāridhir aprameyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10426: jñātas sa eva hi dadāti vimokṣasiddhim ajñāta eva manasā cirabandhanāya //MU_3,66.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10431: kathaṃ vāsmin samutpannaḥ ko vāyaṃ vada me punaḥ //MU_3,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10434: yayaiva śaktyā sphurati prāptāṃ tām eva paśyati //MU_3,67.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10435: svayaṃ yāṃ vetti sarvātmā citiṃ cetanarūpiṇīm /
GSP27moksop_u:10437: svabhāvakāraṇaṃ dvitve pūrvaṃ saṅkalpya cit svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:10440: evaṃ sthite muniśreṣṭha daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10441: kim ucyate tathā karma kāraṇaṃ ca kim ucyate //MU_3,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10444: khe vāta iva tatspandāt sollāsaṃ śāntam anyathā //MU_3,67.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10445: citaś cittvaṃ bhāvitaṃ sat spanda ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10447: spandāt sphurantī cit sargo nisspandā brahma śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:10449: ya evānubhavātmāyaṃ citspando 'sti sa eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:10459: ajātam apy asadrūpaṃ paśyatīmaṃ bhramaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10461: ahaṃ mamety asadrūpam eva cetaḥ prapaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:10464: āsīd evaṃ hi cittasya sphuratīyaṃ jagatsthitiḥ //MU_3,67.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10467: śivāt prāk kāraṇāt pūrvaṃ cic cetyakalanonmukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:10468: udeti saumyāj jaladheḥ payasspando manāg iva //MU_3,67.18//
GSP27moksop_u:10472: brahmaṇas sa cidābhāsas tat sacetyam iva svayam //MU_3,67.20//
GSP27moksop_u:10473: cit sacetyocyate jīvas sa saṅkalpān mano bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10478: yathā svapne bhramaś caiva tathā cittasya saṃsṛtiḥ //MU_3,67.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10479: śuddha ātmā nityatṛpta iva śāntas samasthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10481: saṃsṛtir jāgrad ity uktaṃ svapnaṃ vidur ahaṅkṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:10482: cittaṃ suṣuptabhāvas syāc cinmātraṃ turyam ucyate //MU_3,67.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10484: turyātītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tatstho bhūyo na śocati //MU_3,67.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10485: tasmin sarvam udetīdaṃ tasminn eva pralīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10486: tatraiva tanute cedaṃ dṛṣṭau muktāvalī yathā //MU_3,67.27//
GSP27moksop_u:10488: akartry api tathā kartrī cetanāc cij jagatsthiteḥ //MU_3,67.28//
GSP27moksop_u:10493: svato bījaṃ phalādy ujjhad yathā bījaṃ punar bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10494: tathā cic cetyacittādi tyaktvā svāsthyena tiṣṭhati //MU_3,67.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10495: yady apy abodhe bodhe ca bījāntas tarubījayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10496: iva bhedo 'sti na jagadbrahmaṇor api cittayoḥ //MU_3,67.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10497: tathāpi vyajyate bodhe saty ātmatvam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10498: rūpaśrīr iva dīpena cinmātrālokam eti yat //MU_3,67.33//
GSP27moksop_u:10499: yad yan nikhanyate bhūmer yathā tat tan nabho bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10500: yā yā vicāryate 'vidyā tathā sā sā paraṃ bhavet //MU_3,67.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10502: śuddho 'pi bhāti nāneva tathā brahmodaraṃ jagat //MU_3,67.35//
GSP27moksop_u:10503: brahma sarvaṃ jagad vastu piṇḍa ekam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10506: aho citraṃ jagad idam asat sad iva bhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:10507: aho bṛhad aho svaccham aho sphuṭam aho tanu //MU_3,67.37//
GSP27moksop_u:10510: yathāsau yāti vaimukhyaṃ yathā bhavati cātmabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10511: yathā svabhāvasiddhir vā tathā kathaya me prabho //MU_3,67.39//
GSP27moksop_u:10515: hullas sabhullo ghullāṅgha iti bālahṛdi sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:10518: bhinneva ca na bhinnāsmād brahmaṇo bṛṃhaṇātmikā //MU_3,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:10519: yathā brahma bhavaty āśu jīvaḥ kalanajīvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10520: tathā jīvo bhavaty āśu mano mananavedanam //MU_3,67.43//
GSP27moksop_u:10535: sa tasya sanniveśasya tv asato 'pi satas sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10542: bhaviṣyad indriyākhyaṃ sā randhraṃ paśyati dehake //MU_3,67.54//
GSP27moksop_u:10548: tadātivāhikoktīnāṃ kaḥ prasaṅgas tad eva tat //MU_3,67.57//
GSP27moksop_u:10555: siddhāntakāla evaiṣa praśnas te rāma rājate /
GSP27moksop_u:10558: tathaivākālagīr jantos sarvaṃ kāle hi śobhate //MU_3,67.61//
GSP27moksop_u:10561: evam eṣa sa jīvātmā suptātmā samupasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10564: yaḥ karoti manorājyaṃ bhavaty āśu sa tanmatiḥ //MU_3,67.64//
GSP27moksop_u:10565: idam evam asat sadvad vidan vyomni sutātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:10567: neha prajāyate kiñcin neha kiñcana naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:10573: yathā sampadyate brahmā kīṭas sampadyate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10576: tad eva pauruṣaṃ tasmin sāraṃ karma tad eva ca //MU_3,67.70//
GSP27moksop_u:10583: sattayā brahmaṇā yad yad yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vibhāti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:10584: tat tathā dṛśyate tajjñais svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,67.74//
GSP27moksop_u:10585: yathā yad uditaṃ vastu tan na tattāṃ vinā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10586: nimeṣam api kalpo vā svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,67.75//
GSP27moksop_u:10587: alīkam idam utpannam alīkaṃ ca vivardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:10589: śuddhaṃ sarvagataṃ brahmānantam advitīyaṃ duravabodhavaśād aśuddham ivāsad ivānekam ivāsarvagam ivāvabudhyate |
GSP27moksop_u:10590: jalam anyat taraṅgo 'nyad iti bālakalpanayā bhedaḥ parikalpyata eva na vāstavaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:10591: tasmād yo 'yam ābhāti bhedas sa kevalam atattvavidbhiḥ parikalpito rajjvām ahitvam iva | (MU_3,67.77)
GSP27moksop_u:10592_0: evaṃ bhedābhedaśaktyor abhinnayor eva brahmaṇy eva sambhavāt tenātmanādvitīyenaiva
GSP27moksop_u:10592_1: dvitvam ivānītaṃ yathā salilena taraṅgakalpanayā suvarṇena kaṭakaparikalpanayaivam
GSP27moksop_u:10592_2: iti atas tena svayam evātmanātmānya iva cetyate |
GSP27moksop_u:10595: tenāhambhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ nirvikalpapratyakṣarūpaṃ yat prathamaṃ tan manaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:10599: satsu tanmātreṣu jīvena cittātmanā svayam kākatālīyavad dhastapādādimān sanniveśaḥ kalpito dṛśyata eva yad eva manaḥ kalpayati tad eva paśyati sad vā bhavatv asad vā |
GSP27moksop_u:10600: cittaṃ yat kalpayaty abhiniviṣṭaṃ tat tat paśyati sad iva pratibhāsam upāgataṃ yathā svapne | (MU_3,67.78)
GSP27moksop_u:10602: tattvāt samastasattānāṃ cinmātraṃ sarvam eva vā //MU_3,67.79//
GSP27moksop_u:10603: cinmātram eva bahir antar upary adhastān mānaprameyam iti mātṛpadaṃ ca dhatte /
GSP27moksop_u:10604: nityopaśāntam iti tena samastasattā nityaṃ sthitaṃ susamam ekam apetaturyam //MU_3,67.80//
GSP27moksop_u:10611: himādrer uttare pārśve karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī //MU_3,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10626: na kadācana sā tṛptim upāyāti mahodarī /
GSP27moksop_u:10630: meghena mṛgatṛṣṇeva tan me kṣud upaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:10631: aviruddhaiva sā yuktir yayāpadi hi jīvyate //MU_3,68.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10633: samam eva janaṃ sarvaṃ nirbādhaṃ kaḥ prabādhate //MU_3,68.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10635: tapasaiva mahogreṇa yad durāpaṃ tad āpyate //MU_3,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10642: krameṇa divasāḥ pakṣās tasyā māsartavo yayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10652: dāruṇaṃ hi tapas siddhyai viṣṭhāgnir api śītahā //MU_3,69.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10653: manasaiva praṇamyainaṃ sā tatheti sthitā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:10655: anāyasī cāyasī ca syām ahaṃ jīvasūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:10657: prāṇena saha sarveṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ surabhir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10666: anāyasī cāyasī ca vikalpaya ca me varam /
GSP27moksop_u:10668: evam astv iti tām uktvā punar eva pitāmahaḥ //MU_3,69.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10669: sūcikām āha sarge tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi viṣūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:10671: durbhojanā durārambhā mūrkhā dussthitayaś ca ye /
GSP27moksop_u:10678: himādrer uttare pārśve karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī /
GSP27moksop_u:10683: bhagavati viṣṇuśakte enāṃ daha daha paca paca matha matha hana hana utsādaya utsādaya dūrīkuru |
GSP27moksop_u:10685: viṣūcike rkhraḥ rkhraḥ rkhraḥ himavantaṃ gaccha himavantaṃ gaccha jīva |
GSP27moksop_u:10694: sādhako hi śucir bhūtvā svācāntas susamāhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10697: gata ibhagataśakravandyamāno nijapuram akṣayam agryam ujjvalaśri //MU_3,69.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10706: tato māṣaśimītulyā tatas sūcī babhūva ha //MU_3,70.3//
GSP27moksop_u:10711: sūcir dṛśyata evāsau na tv ayo nāma vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10720: dūrād eva manojñena prodgirantī mukhena kham //MU_3,70.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10729: grāsārthaṃ sūcitāṃ yātā sa cāsyā nopayujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10731: sāgrā sañcintayām āsa na sūcī tuccharūpatām /
GSP27moksop_u:10732: caittam īhitam evaikaṃ paśyanty āste yathāsukham //MU_3,70.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10738: mahāmaraṇam apy asyā rākṣasyās susukhaṃ sthitam //MU_3,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10745: anyā babhūva tallagnā sā tathā jīvasūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:10751: pāpātmikā manovṛttis sā hi tasyās tathā sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10753: evam asyās tanur jātā sūcidvayamayī hi sā /
GSP27moksop_u:10756: vedhayantī tataḥ krūrā prababhrāma diśo daśa //MU_3,70.28//
GSP27moksop_u:10757: sarvas svasaṅkalpavaśāl laghur bhavati vā guruḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10764: tatraiva sā tanus sthūlā galitā śāradābhravat //MU_3,70.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10798: na hi tīkṣṇo bahiḥ kārye nīcatvaṃ vijahāti cet //MU_3,70.49//
GSP27moksop_u:10800: dikṣv apsv iva śilāgurvī nāvaṅgavalitā satī //MU_3,70.50//
GSP27moksop_u:10808: dṛṣṭānto 'tra kṣaṇāt sūcyā pūrito jarjaraḥ paṭaḥ //MU_3,70.54//
GSP27moksop_u:10820: katham enaṃ bhinadmīti tīkṣṇānām etad īpsitam //MU_3,70.60//
GSP27moksop_u:10821: samam eva ca kauśeye kṣaume ca vasane śitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10822: jaḍaḥ ka iva vā nāma guṇāguṇam upekṣate //MU_3,70.61//
GSP27moksop_u:10831: śete kiṃ cāru maitryeva buse karaparicyutā /
GSP27moksop_u:10832: svarūpasadṛśaṃ mitraṃ kasmai nāma na rocate //MU_3,70.66//
GSP27moksop_u:10834: tiṣṭhaty ātmasamāṃ ko hi saṅgatiṃ tyaktum icchati //MU_3,70.67//
GSP27moksop_u:10850: utsavād api nīcānāṃ kalaho hi sukhāyate //MU_3,70.75//
GSP27moksop_u:10854: mṛtim ādhāsyate citrā svārthe nodeti mūḍhatā //MU_3,70.77//
GSP27moksop_u:10857: sthāpitā malam ādatte sūcī yad gharṣaṇaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:10859: sūkṣmadṛśyā vedhadātrī kṣaṇād vismṛtim eti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:10862: durjano yena tenaiva nāśito vetti duṣṭatām //MU_3,70.81//
GSP27moksop_u:10863: paṅke majjati yāti khe viharati vyomānilair diktaṭāñ śete pāṃsuṣu bhūtale pathi gṛhe haṭṭe vane 'ntaḥpure /
GSP27moksop_u:10864: haste śrotrasaroruhe 'tha mṛduni svasthorṇikāgaṇḍake randhre kāṣṭhamṛdāṃ ca nāḍihṛdaye dravyātmasattaiva sā //MU_3,70.82//
GSP27moksop_u:10866: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:10867: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,70.83//
GSP27moksop_u:10871: atha sā bahukālena karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī /
GSP27moksop_u:10874: sūcyāṃ kim iva māty antas tṛṣṇāsūcis tu durbharā //MU_3,71.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10875: cintayām āsa hā kaṣṭaṃ kim idaṃ sūcitāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:10876: sūkṣmāsmi hataśaktiś ca mayi grāso na māti ca //MU_3,71.3//
GSP27moksop_u:10877: kva me tāni viśālāni gatāny aṅgāni durdhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10879: mayy asyāṃ mandabhāgyāyāṃ manāg api na māti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:10884: duḥkhād duḥkhe nimajjāmi saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭe 'pi ca //MU_3,71.7//
GSP27moksop_u:10885: na me sakhī na me dāsī na me mātā na me pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10886: na me bandhur na me bhṛtyo na me bhrātā na me sutaḥ //MU_3,71.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10887: na me deho na me sthānaṃ na me kaścit samāśrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10890: abhāvam abhivāñchāmi so 'pi sampadyate na me //MU_3,71.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10896: vraṇeṣu preṣitāsmy antar hā me duḥkhaparamparā //MU_3,71.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10898: paraṃ kārpaṇyam āyātā jātā paravaśāsmy aham //MU_3,71.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10901: utthitas sphāravetālaḥ kurvantyāś śāntim eva me /
GSP27moksop_u:10903: kim andhayā mayā tādṛk santyaktaṃ tan mahāvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10904: yathā nāśena vā bhāvyaṃ tathodety aśubhā matiḥ //MU_3,71.17//
GSP27moksop_u:10910: aṇv apy udeti prākāśyaṃ na khadyotānusevinaḥ //MU_3,71.20//
GSP27moksop_u:10911: ataḥ kiyantaṃ no jāne kālam āvalitāpadam /
GSP27moksop_u:10922: parvatāt parvate śṛṅge nyasya pādaṃ vihāriṇī //MU_3,71.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10923: kadā me syād uruśvabhrabhāsuraṃ tan mahodaram /
GSP27moksop_u:10931: mayaiva kutapovahnau tad dagdhvā bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10935: tyajaty āśu mṛd ity ajñaḥ prāpyāpi kanakāṅgadam /
GSP27moksop_u:10938: adya nāntaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kathaṃ siṃhaiṇahastinām //MU_3,71.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10940: puroḷāśadhiyā candraṃ katham adya na dhāvathaḥ //MU_3,71.35//
GSP27moksop_u:10942: nādya siṃhādiyaukaṃ tad dhṛtaṃ romavanaṃ tvayā //MU_3,71.36//
GSP27moksop_u:10944: kasmān na me bhūṣayatho dṛgjvālāmālayā diśaḥ //MU_3,71.37//
GSP27moksop_u:10947: hā mukhendo tapasi kiṃ nādya tvaddantaraśmibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10949: hā hā hastau mahākārau tāv adya kva gatau mama /
GSP27moksop_u:10953: kvākāro 'mbarapūrakaḥ kva ca navaṃ tucchātmasūcīvapū rodorandhrasamaḥ kva cāsyakuharaḥ kvedaṃ ca sūcīmukham /
GSP27moksop_u:10954: kva grāso bahumāṃsabhārabahalaḥ kvābbindunā rodhanaṃ sūkṣmāsy etad aho mayaiva racitaṃ svātmakṣaye nāṭakam //MU_3,71.42//
GSP27moksop_u:10961: tad eva himavacchṛṅgaṃ jagāma tapase sthiram //MU_3,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10962: apaśyad evaṃ sūcītvaṃ sā tan mānasam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:10964: athātmany eva sūcītvaṃ paśyanty eva manomayī /
GSP27moksop_u:10969: marāv akasmāt sañjātā śuṣkā tṛṇaśikhā yathā //MU_3,72.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10982: babhūva tasyās svacchā yā dvitīyā tāpasī sakhī /
GSP27moksop_u:10983: enassūcīva malinā tayā paścāt kṛtaiva sā //MU_3,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10985: paścāt smayatatā dṛṣṭā sā dhūlyaivātra kevalam //MU_3,72.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10986: dhūlyāpi prekṣyate yā tām api drumalatādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10991: kausumāni rajāṃsy asyā ity āsyaṃ paryapūpuran //MU_3,72.17//
GSP27moksop_u:10993: tayā tv ahṛttvavyājena na nigīrṇaṃ mukhe 'pi sat //MU_3,72.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11006: babhūva nirmalā sūcī citsūcī pāvanī param //MU_3,72.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11007: jātā viditavedyā sā svayam eva tayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:11012: babhūva tena jvalito jajvāleva tato jagat //MU_3,72.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11013: kasyedaṃ tapasākrāntaṃ jagad ity atha vāsavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11014: nāradaṃ paripapraccha sa tasyākathayac ca tat //MU_3,72.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11017: nāgāś śvasanti vidalanti nagāḥ patanti vaimānikā jaladavāridhayaḥ prayānti /
GSP27moksop_u:11018: śoṣaṃ diśo 'rkasahitā malinībhavanti sūcyendra paśya tapasā kṣayamāyayaiva //MU_3,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11026: karkaṭyā himavatkukṣyāṃ ke bhuktā vibhavā mune //MU_3,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11029: asīt kārṣṇāyasī sūcis tasyās svam avalambanam //MU_3,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11034: yasyāṃ nāḍyāṃ na yo vāyur māti tat tām upetayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11035: tatra śūlaṃ kṛtaṃ mūlaṃ nyagrodhāgra ivotkaṭam //MU_3,73.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11036: tac charīrendriyais tāni tathānyāni bahūni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11049: yathā tathā prasphuritaṃ prati dehagṛhaṃ tayā //MU_3,73.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11054: suptaṃ medassu śubhreṣu śeṣāṅgeṣv iva śauriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:11058: ahaṃ jīvamayī sūcī syām itīcchāvareṇa sā /
GSP27moksop_u:11059: sampannā mānasī sūciś cetanī pāvanī śitā //MU_3,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11062: pītaṃ bhuktaṃ vilasitaṃ hasitaṃ dattam āhṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:11065: kṛtam ākāśarūpiṇyā na tad asti na yat tayā //MU_3,73.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11074: bahir antaś ca vāyūnām ekatvam anuyātayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11079: ayassūcyāṃ mātarīva tatra nivṛtim eti sā //MU_3,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11082: sarvo vihṛtyāpi diśas svam evāspadam āpadi /
GSP27moksop_u:11084: evaṃ prayatamānā sā viharantī diśo daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:11085: mānasīṃ tṛptim āyāti na śārīrīṃ kadācana //MU_3,73.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11086: sati dharmiṇi dharmā hi sambhavantīha nāsati /
GSP27moksop_u:11087: śarīraṃ dṛśyate yasya tasya tat kila tṛpyati //MU_3,73.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11088: atha tṛptasya dehasya smaraṇāt prāktanasya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:11091: iti sañcintya tapase deśaṃ nirṇīya cātmanā //MU_3,73.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11094: sa gṛdhras tām ayassūcīṃ kāñcid evaṃsamāśritām /
GSP27moksop_u:11095: citā tayeritaś cañcvā vṛttiṃ mana ivādadhe //MU_3,73.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11096: sūcīm ādāya gṛdhro 'sau yayau taccintitaṃ girim /
GSP27moksop_u:11098: tatrājane mahāraṇye sthāpayām āsa tām asau /
GSP27moksop_u:11108: jagāma gṛdhras svaṃ deśaṃ bhāraṃ tyaktveva bhārikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11112: na hy amūrtasya sidhyanti vinādhāraṃ kila kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11117: araṇyānyāṃ sthitā śakra tatra varṣagaṇān bahūn //MU_3,73.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11118: tasyā varārthaṃ yatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru kartavyakovida /
GSP27moksop_u:11119: cireṇa sambhṛtaṃ lokam alaṃ dagdhuṃ hi tattapaḥ //MU_3,73.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11125: sā vātasaṃvit kṣiprā vai naiva sarvagatā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:11126: paramā cid ivāvighnaṃ sahasaiva dadarśa ha //MU_3,73.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11145: vāyur ālokayann itthaṃ jambudvīpaṃ nirīkṣya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11146: tat prāpa himavacchṛṅgaṃ yatra sūcis tapasvinī //MU_3,73.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11147: śṛṅgamūrdhni mahaty ugre so 'raṇyānīm avāpa tām /
GSP27moksop_u:11157: saptadvīpasamudramudraṇasamucchūnaikadeśāśrayaṃ bhūpīṭhaṃ parito vihṛtya pavano dīrghādhvanā jarjaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11158: tāṃ prāpyāgragiristhalīm alivapurvyomāṅgalagnām iva vyāttānantadigantapūrakabṛhaddeho viśaśrāma saḥ //MU_3,73.67//
GSP27moksop_u:11163: dadarśa madhye tāṃ sūcīṃ protthitāṃ saśikhām iva //MU_3,74.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11167: paścāt tyajantīṃ hṛdaye 'py eva māntīm anāratam //MU_3,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11178: bhagavatyā mahāsūcyā aho citraṃ mahat tapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11179: ity eva kevalaṃ dhyāyan māruto gaganaṃ yayau //MU_3,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11181: siddhavṛndāny adhaḥ kṛtvā sūryamārgam upetya ca //MU_3,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11184: pṛṣṭaś ca kathayām āsa dṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ mayety asau /
GSP27moksop_u:11190: sthitā tapasvinī sūcī tapaś carati dāruṇam //MU_3,74.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11197: tad uttiṣṭhāśu gacchāmas sarva eva pitāmaham /
GSP27moksop_u:11199: iti vāteritaś śakras saha devagaṇena saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11200: jagāma brahmaṇo lokaṃ prārthayām āsa taṃ prabhum //MU_3,74.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11201: sūcyā ahaṃ varaṃ dātuṃ gacchāmi himavacchiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11203: etāvatātha kālena sā babhūva ca pāvanī /
GSP27moksop_u:11211: sā tām avekṣite 'kṣṇārāt tāpād aṅge nimajjati /
GSP27moksop_u:11214: trikoṇaṃ tapasā pūtaṃ vārāṇasyās samaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,74.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11216: vāyavaḥ pāṃsavo ye 'pi te parāṃ muktim āgatāḥ //MU_3,74.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11217: viditaparamakāraṇātha jātā svayam anu cetanasaṃvidaṃ vicārya /
GSP27moksop_u:11218: svamananakalanānusāra ekas tv iha hi guruḥ paramo na rāghavānyaḥ //MU_3,74.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11225: na kiñcid vyājahārāsmai cintayām āsa kevalam //MU_3,75.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11226: pūrṇāsmi gatasandehā kiṃ vareṇa karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:11227: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam //MU_3,75.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11230: yathā sthiteyam asmīha santiṣṭheyaṃ tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11231: satyāsatyakalām eva tyaktvā kim itareṇa me //MU_3,75.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11235: īpsitānīpsitair arthaḥ ko bhavet kalpitair mama //MU_3,75.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11237: tūṣṇīṃ sthitāṃ sa niyates sampaśyan bhagavān sthitim //MU_3,75.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11239: varaṃ putri gṛhāṇa tvaṃ kañcit kālaṃ ca bhūtale //MU_3,75.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11240: bhogān bhuktvā tataḥ paścād gamiṣyasi paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:11246: yogam eṣyasi bhūyas tvaṃ tanvā tadbījarūpiṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:11248: bādhāṃ viditavedyatvān na ca loke kariṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:11258: ity uktvā gaganatalāj jagāma devas sūcī sā bhavatu mameti kiṃ virāgaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11259: rāgo vābjajavacanārthadhāraṇe 'sminn ity antar mananamayī manāg babhūva //MU_3,75.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11260: prādeśaḥ prathamam abhūt tato 'pi hasto vyāsaṃ cāpy atha viṭapas tato 'bhramālā /
GSP27moksop_u:11262: tanmātrāṇy avikalaśaktimanti dehād udbhūtāny atha karaṇendriyāṇi samyak /
GSP27moksop_u:11263: saṅkalpadrumanavapuṣpavat samantād bīje yāny alam abhavaṃs tirohitāni //MU_3,75.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11267: athābhavad asau sūcī karkaṭī rākṣasī punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11269: nijam ākāram āsādya kiñcit pramuditā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:11273: atha sā māsaṣaṭkena dhyānād bodham upāgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:11277: atha sā kiṃ grasa iti cintayām āsa cintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11278: bhoktavyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca nyāyena na vinā mayā //MU_3,76.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11279: yad āryagarhitaṃ yad vā nyāyena na samarjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11280: tasmād grāsād varaṃ manye maraṇaṃ dehinām iha //MU_3,76.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11281: yadi dehaṃ tyajāmīmaṃ tan nyāyopārjitaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:11282: na kiñcid admi nirnyāyaṃ bhukto 'rtho hi garāyate //MU_3,76.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11283: yan na lokakramaprāptaṃ tena bhuktena kiṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:11284: na jīvitena no mṛtyā kiñcit kāraṇam asti me //MU_3,76.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11287: evaṃ sthitā maunavatī śuśrāva gaganād giram /
GSP27moksop_u:11289: gaccha karkaṭi mūḍhāṃs tvaṃ jñānenāśv avabodhaya /
GSP27moksop_u:11291: bodhyamāno bhavatyāpi yo na bodham upaiṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:11292: svanāśāyaiva jāto 'sau nyāyyo grāso bhavet tava //MU_3,76.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11300: tadanu gatavatī niśācarī sā niśi sughanāndhatamisramārgabhūmau //MU_3,76.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11335: mantriṇā saha bhūpālas tasminn avasare tadā //MU_3,77.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11338: aṭavyāṃ karkaṭī sā tau carantau rājamantriṇau /
GSP27moksop_u:11340: atha sā cintayām āsa labdho bhakṣo 'dya ho mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11341: mūḍhāv etāv anātmajñau bhāro dehaḥ kilānayoḥ //MU_3,77.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11342: ihāmutra ca nāśāya mūḍho duḥkhāya jīvati /
GSP27moksop_u:11344: apaśyatas svam ātmānaṃ mṛtir mūḍhasya jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11348: tasmād imau mayaivādya bhoktavyau bhojyatāṃ gatau /
GSP27moksop_u:11349: abhavya eva nirdoṣaṃ prāptam artham upekṣate //MU_3,77.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11350: mā kadācid imau syātāṃ guṇayuktau mahāśayau /
GSP27moksop_u:11351: tādṛṅnaravināśo hi svabhāvān me na rocate //MU_3,77.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11352: tad etau samparīkṣe 'haṃ yadi tāvad guṇānvitau /
GSP27moksop_u:11353: tad bhakṣyaṃ na karomy etau na hiṃsyā guṇinaḥ kvacit //MU_3,77.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11356: yadi naśyāmi dehena tan na bhokṣye guṇānvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11357: sukhayanti hi cetāṃsi jīvitād api sādhavaḥ //MU_3,77.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11368: ādau vicārya suguṇāguṇaleśayuktim āgas tato 'dhikataraṃ ca guṇād yādi syāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11369: kuryāt tatas samupapattivaśena daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyasya laghv atha dṛḍhaṃ dhanasambhave vā //MU_3,77.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11379: kau bhavantau mahābuddhī durbuddhī vā samāgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:11382: bho bho bhūtaka kiṃ syās tvaṃ kva tiṣṭhasi ca dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:11383: darśayāsyās tava giraḥ ko bibhety alinīdhvaneḥ //MU_3,78.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11386: na kiñcid dīrghasūtrāṇāṃ sidhyaty ātmakṣayād ṛte //MU_3,78.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11388: rājñety ukte ramyam uktam iti sañcintya sā tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11389: prakāśāyāpy adhairyāya nanāda ca jahāsa ca //MU_3,78.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11413: na tad asti vimohāya yad viviktasya cetasaḥ //MU_3,78.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11415: mahārākṣasi saṃrambho hāsātmā kim ayaṃ tava /
GSP27moksop_u:11416: laghavo hy atha vā nāryo lāghave 'py atisambhramāḥ //MU_3,78.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11417: tyaja saṃrambham ārambho nāyaṃ tava virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:11422: yuktyā ca vyavahāriṇyā so 'rthaḥ prājñena sādhyate //MU_3,78.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11425: kathayābhimataṃ kiṃ te kim arthayasi vārthinī /
GSP27moksop_u:11428: ity uktā sā tadā tena cintayām āsa rākṣasī /
GSP27moksop_u:11430: na sāmānyāv imau manye citraiveyaṃ camatkṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11434: ābhyāṃ prāyaḥ parijñāto mama bhāvo 'nayor mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11435: na vināśyau mayemau vā svayam evāvināśinau //MU_3,78.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11436: manye bhavata ātmajñau nātmajñānād ṛte matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11438: tad etau paripṛcchāmi kañcit sandeham utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11439: prāpyaṃ prāpya na pṛcchanti ye kiñcit te narādhamāḥ //MU_3,78.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11440: iti sañcintya pṛcchāyai tan nānāvasaraṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:11442: kau bhavantau narau vīrau kathyatām iti me 'naghau /
GSP27moksop_u:11445: ayaṃ rājā kirātānām asyāhaṃ mantritāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11450: rājñas tvam asi durmantrī durmantritvād arāḍ ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:11451: sadbhūpasya bhaven mantrī rājā sanmantriṇā bhavet //MU_3,78.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11453: tenāryatām upāyāti yathā rājā tathā prajāḥ //MU_3,78.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11455: tadvad rājā bhaved rājā tadvan mantrī ca mantravit //MU_3,78.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11456: prabhutvaṃ samadṛṣṭitvaṃ tac ca syād rājavidyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11457: tām eva yo na jānāti nāsau mantrī na so 'dhipaḥ //MU_3,78.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11458: bhavantau tadvidau sādhū yadi tac chreya āpsyathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11459: no ced anarthadau svasyāḥ prakṛter nādmy ahaṃ yuvām //MU_3,78.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11462: praśnāni māṃ kathaya pārthiva nātha mantrinn atrārthinī bhṛśam ahaṃ paripūrayārtham /
GSP27moksop_u:11463: aṅgīkṛtārtham adadat ka ivāsti loke doṣeṇa saṅkṣayakareṇa na yujyate yaḥ //MU_3,78.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11467: ity uktvā rākṣasī praśnān sā vaktum upacakrame /
GSP27moksop_u:11468: ucyatām iti rājñokte tān imāñ śṛṇu rāghava //MU_3,79.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11472: kim ākāśam anākāśaṃ nakiñcit kiñcid eva kim /
GSP27moksop_u:11473: ko 'ham evāpi sampannaḥ ko bhavān apy ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_3,79.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11474: gacchan na gacchati ca kaḥ ko 'tiṣṭhann eva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:11475: kaś cetano 'pi pāṣāṇaḥ kaś cidvyomani citrakṛt //MU_3,79.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11476: vahnitām ajahac caiva kaś ca vahnir na dāhakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11477: avahner jāyate vahniḥ kasmād rājan nirantaram //MU_3,79.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11479: anetralabhyāt kasmāc ca prakāśaś ca pravartate //MU_3,79.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11481: anyeṣām apy anakṣāṇām ālokaḥ ka ivottamaḥ //MU_3,79.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11483: ko jagadratnakośas syāt kasya kośe maṇer jagat //MU_3,79.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11484: ko 'ṇus tamaḥ prakāśaś ca ko 'ṇur asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11485: ko 'ṇur dūre 'py adūre ca ko 'ṇur eva mahāgiriḥ //MU_3,79.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11486: nimeṣa eva kaḥ kalpaḥ kaḥ kalpo 'pi nimeṣakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11487: kiṃ pratyakṣam asadrūpaṃ kiṃ cetanam acetanam //MU_3,79.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11488: kaś cāvāyuś ca vāyuś ca kaś śabdo 'śabda eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11489: kas sarvaṃ ca nakiñcid ca ko 'haṃ nāhaṃ ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,79.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11491: labdhaṃ nakiñcid bhavati nanu sarvaṃ ca labhyate //MU_3,79.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11495: ko 'ṇur eva bhavan māti na yojanaśateṣv api //MU_3,79.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11503: kena santyajatā sarvam aṇunā sarvam āśritam //MU_3,79.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11508: aṇau jaganti tiṣṭhanti kasmin bīja iva drumāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11513: dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ ko na paśyati netravat //MU_3,79.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11515: dṛśyāsampattaye paśyan puro dṛśyaṃ na paśyati //MU_3,79.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11516: ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ ko bhāsayati dṛśyavat /
GSP27moksop_u:11517: kaṭakādīni hemneva nigīrṇaṃ kena ca trayam //MU_3,79.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11518: kasmān na kiñcic ca pṛthag ūrmyādīva mahāmbhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11521: dvaitam apy apṛthak kasmād dravateva mahāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,79.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11522: ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ sad asac ca gatakramam /
GSP27moksop_u:11525: nityaṃ samasya kasyāntar bījasyāntar iva drumaḥ //MU_3,79.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11527: svayam ekam asadrūpam udety anudito 'pi kaḥ //MU_3,79.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11530: kenedam ātatam anekacid eva viśvaṃ kiṃsāra evam abhivalgasi haṃsi pāsi /
GSP27moksop_u:11531: kiṃdarśanena na bhavasy atha vā sad eva nūnaṃ bhavasy asamadṛg vada tatpraśāntyai //MU_3,79.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11533: yasyāgre na galati saṃśayas samūlo naivāsau kvacid api paṇḍitoktim eti //MU_3,79.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11534: enaṃ me yadi na nayiṣyathaḥ kramoktyā saṃśāntiṃ laghutarasaṃśayaṃ subuddhī /
GSP27moksop_u:11535: tad rakṣojaṭharahutāśanendhanatvaṃ nirvighnaṃ jhagiti gamiṣyathaḥ kṣaṇena //MU_3,79.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11536: paścāt tāṃ janapadamaṇḍalīṃ samantād bhāvatkīm urujaṭharā kṣaṇād grase 'ham /
GSP27moksop_u:11537: evaṃ te bhavati surājateva manye mūrkhānām atirasa eva saṅkṣayāya //MU_3,79.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11538: ity uktvā vipulagabhīrameghanāda prollāsaprakaṭagirā niśācarī sā /
GSP27moksop_u:11544: iti prokte mahāpraśne mahāmantrī giraṃ dadau //MU_3,80.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11546: śṛṇu toyadasaṅkāśe praśnam enaṃ bhinadmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:11551: cinmātram evam ātmāṇur ākāśād api sūkṣmakaḥ //MU_3,80.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11552: cidaṇoḥ paramasyāntas sad evāsad iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11553: sattāpy evam asatteva sphuratīdaṃ jagat sthitam //MU_3,80.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11556: atīndriyatvān no kiñcit sa evāṇur anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11557: sarvātmakatvād bhuṅkte ca tena kiñcin na kiñcana //MU_3,80.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11560: eṣo 'ṇuḥ paramākāśas sūkṣmaḥ khād apy alakṣitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11562: sarvātmakas syān naivāsau śūnyo bhavati karhicit /
GSP27moksop_u:11563: yad asti na tad astīti vaktonmatta iti smṛtaḥ //MU_3,80.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11564: kayācid api yuktyeha sato 'sattvaṃ na yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:11566: cinmātrāṇus sa eveha sarvaṃ kiñcid ghanaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11569: sa evedaṃ jagad dhatte jagatkoṭīs tathaiva ca //MU_3,80.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11571: prajās tasmin kacanty apsu dravatvāc cakratā iva //MU_3,80.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11574: so 'haṃ bhavann eva bhavāt sampanno dvaitavedanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11577: na tvaṃ nāhaṃ na sarvaṃ vāsarvaṃ vā bhavati svayam //MU_3,80.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11578: gacchan na gacchaty eṣo 'ṇur yojanaughagato 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:11580: na gacchaty eṣa yāto 'pi samprāpto 'pi na cāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11582: gamyaṃ yasya śarīrasthaṃ kva kilāsau prayāti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11585: antassthas sarvakartuś ca sa kathaṃ kveva gacchati //MU_3,80.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11589: cetanaś ca jaḍaś caiva tadāsau dvayam eva hi //MU_3,80.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11591: tadā cetana evāsau pāṣāṇa iva rākṣasi //MU_3,80.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11593: vicitraṃ trijagac citraṃ tenedam akṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,80.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11607: svāmī kartā pitā bhoktā khātmatvāc ca na kiñcana //MU_3,80.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11610: sa eva sarvajagati sarvatra kacati sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:11611: yadā jagat samudge 'smiṃs tadāsau paramo maṇiḥ //MU_3,80.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11615: sarvasaṃvedanāc chailā asāv evāṇur eva san //MU_3,80.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11616: tat saṃvedanamātraṃ yat tad idaṃ bhāsate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:11617: na satyam asti śailādi tenāṇāv eva merutā //MU_3,80.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11625: yatrāṇāv eva vidyante tatra dvaitaikate kutaḥ //MU_3,80.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11626: kṛtavān prāg idam aham iti buddhāv udeti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11628: duḥkhe kālas sudīrgho hi sukhe laghutaras sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:11630: niścayo ya udety antas satyo vāsatya eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:11632: na nimeṣo 'sti no kalpo nādūraṃ na ca dūratā /
GSP27moksop_u:11635: ekacitkośayor evaṃ na bhedo 'sti manāg api //MU_3,80.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11638: yāvat kaṭakasaṃvittis tāvan nāsty eva hematā /
GSP27moksop_u:11639: yāvac ca dṛśyatāpattis tāvan nāsty eva sā kalā //MU_3,80.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11647: ekaṃ pīvaram advaitaṃ tathā cidbhāsanaṃ jagat //MU_3,80.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11649: astitānāstite tatra kuḍyāder iva kaiva dhīḥ //MU_3,80.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11651: tathā jagad idaṃ bhāti ciccetyakalane kutaḥ //MU_3,80.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11653: na san nāsad yathā tadvad viddhi dīrghabhramaṃ jagat //MU_3,80.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11657: ā brahmajīvakalanād yad rūḍhaṃ rūḍham eva tat //MU_3,80.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11666: śāntaṃ samastam ajam ekam anādimadhyaṃ nehāsti kācana kalā kalanāḥ kathañcit /
GSP27moksop_u:11667: nirdvandvaśāntam atirekam anekam accham ābhāsarūpam alam ekavikāsam āssva //MU_3,80.62//
GSP27moksop_u:11671: aho nu paramārthoktiḥ pāvanī tava mantriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11675: tato na kiñcid vāyvādi kevalaṃ śuddhacetanam //MU_3,81.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11678: so 'ṇus sarvaṃ nakiñcic ca so 'haṃ nāhaṃ sa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11680: ātmā yatnaśataiḥ prāpyo labdhe 'smin na ca kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:11681: labdhaṃ bhavati tac caitat paramaṃ nāma kiñcana //MU_3,81.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11683: vikasaty udito yāvan na bodho mūlakāṣakṛt //MU_3,81.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11684: aṇunānena rūpaṃ svaṃ dṛśyatām iva gacchatā /
GSP27moksop_u:11686: anena saṃvidaṃ nānā merus tribhuvanaṃ tṛṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:11688: cidaṇor antare yad yad asti tad dṛśyate bahiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11693: tat tathā paśyatīvāsau dṛṣṭānto 'tra śiśor manaḥ //MU_3,81.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11696: aṇur eva na māty eṣa yojanānāṃ śateṣv api /
GSP27moksop_u:11698: yathā dhūrtena śiḍgena puṃsā bālaḥ pranāṭyate /
GSP27moksop_u:11703: saṃvidantar bhaved bāhye kṛtvā mervādi veṣṭitam //MU_3,81.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11707: śobhate na hi sāmyoktir merusarṣapayor iva //MU_3,81.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11711: svasattānāśapūrvo hi vinānena bhavet tu saḥ //MU_3,81.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11712: yadi sūryādikaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ekajaḍaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:11713: tataḥ kim ātmā kiṃ rūpaṃ prakāśas syāt kva vātha kim //MU_3,81.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11715: tad etad aṇunā tejo dṛṣṭaṃ bahir iva sthitam //MU_3,81.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11717: etāvān atra bhedo 'sti yad varṇe śauklyakṛṣṇate //MU_3,81.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11719: tādṛk prakāśatamasor bhedaś ceti tayos sthitaḥ //MU_3,81.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11727: tapyate bhāsayā bhāsā sarvam ābhāsyate tamaḥ //MU_3,81.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11730: arkaḥ kurvann ahorātraṃ darśayaty ākṛtiṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:11731: citis sadasatī kṛtvā darśayaty ākṛtiṃ tathā //MU_3,81.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11738: yo yo nāma rasaḥ kaścit svasattāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11739: pratibimbam ivādarśe tāṃ vinā nāsty asau svataḥ //MU_3,81.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11741: tyaktaṃ jagad asaṃvittyā saṃvittyā sarvam āśritam //MU_3,81.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11745: manāg api kṣaṇam api gajo dūrvāvane yathā //MU_3,81.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11746: tathāpy ākrāntavān viśvaṃ jñatāṃ gopayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11752: satyaṃ cinmayam evedaṃ jagad ity eva viddhy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:11760: abhuktavaty eva yathā bhuktavān aham ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:11765: pratibhāsāḥ pravartante tata eva hi jāgatāḥ //MU_3,81.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11766: yad asti yatra tat tasmāt samudeti tad eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:11771: valitau naiṣa caitābhyām aṇus svāṅgātmakaś citaḥ //MU_3,81.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11772: udāsīnavad āsīno na saṃspṛṣṭo manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:11773: eṣa bhoktṛtvakartṛtvaiḥ khātmā kurvañ jaganty api //MU_3,81.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11776: jagan na kiñcit kriyate sarvadaiva na kenacit /
GSP27moksop_u:11777: vilīyate ca no kiñcin mātrasyādy asya khaṇḍanam //MU_3,81.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11782: etad bahisstham antasstham asti śabde na vastuni /
GSP27moksop_u:11785: netraṃ dṛśyābhipātīva sad evāsad iva sthitam //MU_3,81.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11786: na ca gacchati dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭā hy asad avāstavam /
GSP27moksop_u:11787: ātmany eva na yat kiñcit tattām eti kathaṃ puraḥ //MU_3,81.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11788: dṛg eva locane sā ca vāsanā tan nijaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11790: na vinā draṣṭṛtām asti dṛśyasattā kathañcana /
GSP27moksop_u:11792: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatām eti na draṣṭṛtvaṃ vināsti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:11793: vinā pitreva tanayo vinā bhoktreva bhogyatā //MU_3,81.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11794: draṣṭur hi dṛśyanirmāṇe cittvād asty eva śaktatā /
GSP27moksop_u:11798: cetanād dṛśyanirmāṇaṃ cit kacaty asad eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:11800: kaṭakatvāvabhāse hi yathā hemno na hematā /
GSP27moksop_u:11801: satyaiva prakacaty evaṃ draṣṭur dṛśyasthitau vapuḥ //MU_3,81.65//
GSP27moksop_u:11802: draṣṭā dṛśyatayā tiṣṭhan draṣṭṛtām ujjhatīva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11806: dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā svaṃ prapaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:11810: dṛśye 'saty asti na draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ draṣṭari nāsati /
GSP27moksop_u:11811: dvayena ca vinā naikyaṃ naikyam apy asti cānayoḥ //MU_3,81.70//
GSP27moksop_u:11818: yathā na jalam ūrmyādeḥ pṛthak kiñcin manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:11819: tathaitasmāt svabhāvāṇor na kiñcit pṛthag eva hi //MU_3,81.74//
GSP27moksop_u:11828: yadi kaścid dvitīyas syāt tad ekasyaikatā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:11830: yatra nāsti dvitīyo hi tatraikasyaikatā katham /
GSP27moksop_u:11831: ekatāyām asiddhāyāṃ dvayam eva na vidyate //MU_3,81.80//
GSP27moksop_u:11832: evaṃ sthite tu yac chiṣṭaṃ tat syād riktam ihāsthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11833: tasmān na vyatiriktaṃ tadrūpaṃ drava ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,81.81//
GSP27moksop_u:11835: bījasyāntas tarur iva brahmaṇo 'ntas sthitaṃ jagat //MU_3,81.82//
GSP27moksop_u:11836: dvaitam apy apṛthak tasmād dhemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:11837: sāmyabuddhāvabodhe hi dvaitaṃ sac ca nasanmayam //MU_3,81.83//
GSP27moksop_u:11839: vyomnaś śūnyatvam evaṃ hi na pṛthag dvaitam īśvarāt //MU_3,81.84//
GSP27moksop_u:11841: nipuṇo 'nupalambho yas tv etayos tat paraṃ viduḥ //MU_3,81.85//
GSP27moksop_u:11843: etāvaj jagad etac ca paramāṇau citas sthitam //MU_3,81.86//
GSP27moksop_u:11845: spandanaṃ pavaneneva svāṅga eva dhṛtaḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,81.87//
GSP27moksop_u:11846: aho nu bhīmā māyeyam atha vā māyitā parā /
GSP27moksop_u:11853: parayā dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā jagac ca cidaṇūdare //MU_3,81.91//
GSP27moksop_u:11855: yathā tarus sthitas tadvad vikāsi cidaṇau jagat //MU_3,81.92//
GSP27moksop_u:11857: jagac citparamāṇvantar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_3,81.93//
GSP27moksop_u:11858: na dvaitaṃ na ca vādvaitaṃ na bījaṃ na ca vāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11859: na sthūlaṃ na ca vā sūkṣmaṃ nājātaṃ jātam eva no //MU_3,81.94//
GSP27moksop_u:11860: na cāsti na ca nāstīdaṃ na somyaṃ kṣubhitaṃ na ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11861: trijagaccidaṇor antas sattvaṃ vātha na kiñcana //MU_3,81.95//
GSP27moksop_u:11862: na jagan nājagad vāsti vidyate citparāṇutā /
GSP27moksop_u:11863: sarvātmikā yadā yatra yā yathodeti tat tathā //MU_3,81.96//
GSP27moksop_u:11871: dṛśyaḥ kila bise tantur adṛśyākṣṇā parātmatā //MU_3,81.100//
GSP27moksop_u:11874: etena tena mahatā paramāṇunā ca vyāptaṃ tataṃ viracitaṃ janitaṃ kṛtaṃ ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11875: viśvaprapañcaracanaṃ nabhaseva viṣvak śūnyatvam accham abhitaḥ parilabdham eva //MU_3,81.102//
GSP27moksop_u:11876: dvaitena sundarataraṃ svam anujjhateva rūpaṃ suṣuptasadṛśena parāvabodhāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11877: aikyaṃ gataṃ sthitagamāgamamuktam evam itthaṃ sthitaṃ nanu jagat paramārthapiṇḍaḥ //MU_3,81.103//
GSP27moksop_u:11885: tayā rājagirā tasyā ānanda udabhūd bhṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:11888: aho bata pavitreyaṃ bhavator bhāti śemuṣī /
GSP27moksop_u:11896: mahatām eva saṃsargāt punar duḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
GSP27moksop_u:11899: pūjanīyāv ataś śīghram īhitaṃ kathyatāṃ śubham //MU_3,82.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11905: śūlāni hṛdaye nṝṇāṃ na śāmyanti yadauṣadhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11908: nigrahārthaṃ pravṛttir me sā ca sampattim etv alam //MU_3,82.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11909: etāvad eva ca śubhe nanv aṅgīkriyatāṃ tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11910: bhūyo bhavatyā yat prāṇā hiṃsanīyā na kasyacit //MU_3,82.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11912: bāḍham evaṃ karomy adyaprabhṛty avitathaṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:11913: satyam evaṃ na kiñcid dhi hiṃsanīyaṃ mayādhunā //MU_3,82.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11916: kiṃ syāc charīravṛttyā te sthitāyā matsamīhite //MU_3,82.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11920: idānīṃ śikharaṃ gatvā tad eva dhyānaniścalā /
GSP27moksop_u:11923: yatheccham atha kālena tyakṣyāmīti matir mama //MU_3,82.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11931: viṣūcikā prāṇaharā syāṃ sūkṣmāsmīti vai mayā //MU_3,82.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11934: tvayā na guṇino hiṃsyā iti me brahmaṇā kṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11937: śamam eṣyati loke 'smin kā kathā matkṛte bhrame //MU_3,82.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11938: virataivāsmi hiṃsāto yat purā hiṃsitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11939: janasya hṛdayaṃ tena nāḍyo vaidhuryam āgatāḥ //MU_3,82.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11940: hiṃsitvā raktamāṃsāni santyaktā ye mayā janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11941: tebhyo vidhuranāḍibhyo ye jātās te 'pi tādṛśāḥ //MU_3,82.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11942: rājan viṣūcikāmantras so 'yaṃ sampanna eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:11943: na hi sattvavatām asti dussādhyam iha kiñcana //MU_3,82.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11945: mantro yo brāhmaṇā prokto rājañ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇa tam //MU_3,82.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11946: āgaccha nikaṭaṃ nadyā gacchāmas tatra bhūpate /
GSP27moksop_u:11952: jñātvā sthitau tau svācāntāv ubhāv ante nivāsinau //MU_3,82.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11956: yadā gantuṃ pravṛttāsau tadā rājābravīd vacaḥ //MU_3,82.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11958: gurus tvaṃ nau mahādevi vayasyā ca sunirvṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:11961: sauhārdaṃ sujanānāṃ hi darśanād eva vardhate //MU_3,82.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11967: rakṣo'nnam eva me tuṣṭyai na sāmānyajanāśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:11975: ādāya vadhyāñ śataśaḥ puruṣāṃs tān svasañcitān //MU_3,82.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11978: suptā nidrāṃ parityajya bhava bhūyas samādhibhāk /
GSP27moksop_u:11980: neṣyasy anyān vadhyanarān hiṃsā naiṣā ca dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11983: asatām api saṃrūḍhaṃ sauhārdaṃ na nivartate //MU_3,82.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11985: yuktam uktaṃ tvayā rājan karomy evam ahaṃ sakhe /
GSP27moksop_u:11988: ity uktvā rākṣasī tatra sampannā sā vilāsinī /
GSP27moksop_u:11990: rājann āgaccha gacchāma ity uktvā nṛpamantriṇau /
GSP27moksop_u:11991: agre gantuṃ pravṛttau tau rātrāv anusasāra sā //MU_3,82.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11992: atha te pārthivagṛhaṃ prāpya tāṃ rajanīṃ mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11999: sā babhūva niśākāle saivogrā kṛṣṇā rākṣasī //MU_3,82.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12002: yayau rājānam āpṛcchya tad eva himavacchiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12004: tatrā tṛpter bhṛśaṃ bhuktvā sukhaṃ suptvā dinadvayam /
GSP27moksop_u:12005: āsīt prabuddhā susvacchā sā samādhivatī punaḥ //MU_3,82.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12006: pañcabhir vā tribhir vāpi varṣais sā samprabudhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:12007: tat tato maṇḍalaṃ yāti tena rājñā ca pūjyate //MU_3,82.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12008: tatra viśrambhagarbhābhiḥ kathābhiḥ kañcid eva sā /
GSP27moksop_u:12009: sthitvā kālaṃ gṛhītvā tān vadhyān svāspadam ety atha //MU_3,82.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12017: kirātamaṇḍale tasmin ye ye santi mahībhṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12018: tais tais saha parā maitrī tasyās samabhijāyate //MU_3,83.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12020: rogāṃś ca yogasiddhā sā nivārayati rākṣasī //MU_3,83.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12023: adyāpi tatra ye vadhyās te tadarthaṃ mahībhujā /
GSP27moksop_u:12029: tataḥ prabhṛti tatrānyo yo yo bhavati bhūmipaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12031: yaḥ kandarāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vā na karoti nṛpo 'dhamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12042: etat te kathitaṃ sarvam upākhyānam aninditam /
GSP27moksop_u:12046: kathaṃ ca karkaṭī nāmnā yathāvad vada me prabho //MU_3,84.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12049: tāni kṛṣṇāni śuklāni haritāny ujjvalāni ca //MU_3,84.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12051: babhūva tajjā sā kṛṣṇā karkaṭī karkaṭākṛtiḥ //MU_3,84.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12054: sampannam evam ekasmād asampannam api sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:12056: bhāvinyo vīcayo vāriṇy anyānanyās sthitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12057: vartamānā api pare sṛṣṭayas saṃsthitās tathā //MU_3,84.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12058: ajvalann eva kāṣṭheṣu vahnir arthakriyāṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12061: tathā brahma karotīdaṃ nānākarteva saj jagat //MU_3,84.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12062: apy anāgata evāyam evaṃ sarga upāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12064: bījād yathānanyad api phalādy anyad ivotthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12065: cites tathānanyad api cetyam anyad ivotthitam //MU_3,84.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12067: ciccetyayoś ca vāryūrmyor iva vastuni kaścana //MU_3,84.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12069: yataḥ kutaścid uditas sa vicāreṇa naśyati //MU_3,84.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12070: bhrāntir eṣā yathāyātā tathā yātu raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:12071: jñāsyasy etat prabuddhas tvam enāṃ kevalam utsṛja //MU_3,84.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12074: cittād iyam anarthaśrīs tac ca sā cetaraś ca te /
GSP27moksop_u:12076: brahmaṇas sarvam utpannaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaiva ceti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12077: madgīrbhis samprabuddhas sañ jñāsyasy alam anindita //MU_3,84.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12080: nanu kiṃ vakṣi deveśād abhinnaṃ sarvam ity api //MU_3,84.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12084: bhedo dṛśyata evāyaṃ vyavahārān na vāstavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12087: asti tasyām īdṛśas syāt kutas saṅkalpaviplavaḥ //MU_3,84.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12093: ajñānām avabodhārthaṃ na tu bhedo 'sti vastuni //MU_3,84.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12094: asambodhād ayaṃ bhedo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12099: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate //MU_3,84.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12101: na ca dvaitaṃ sambhavati maunaṃ vā vāca ity alam //MU_3,84.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12103: vacobhedam anādṛtya yad idaṃ vacmi tac chṛṇu //MU_3,84.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12108: yaṃ śrutvā sarvam evedaṃ bhrāntimātram iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:12109: rāma niścayavān bhūtvā dūre tyakṣyasi vāsanām //MU_3,84.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12111: sarvam utsṛjya śāntātmā svātmany eva nivatsyasi //MU_3,84.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12114: evaṃ sthite jagadrūpaṃ cittam eveha jṛmbhate /
GSP27moksop_u:12117: tad eva tair vinirmuktaṃ bhavānta iti kathyate //MU_3,84.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12118: cittaṃ sādhyaṃ pālanīyaṃ vicāryaṃ kāryam āryavat /
GSP27moksop_u:12119: āhāryaṃ vyavahāryaṃ ca sañcāryaṃ dhāryam ādarāt //MU_3,84.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12120: evam abhyantare citraṃ bibharti trijagan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12121: aṇḍaṃ māyūram iva tad yathākālaṃ vijṛmbhate //MU_3,84.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12123: yaś cāsya jaḍabhāgas svas taj jagat so 'ṅga vibhramaḥ //MU_3,84.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12125: nirākṛtir ajas svapnaṃ paśyatīva na paśyati //MU_3,84.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12127: sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmavidā vetti dehaṃ śūnyaṃ na vāstavam //MU_3,84.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12131: bodhato 'sau paraṃ rūpaṃ svaṃ paśyati nirāmayam //MU_3,84.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12134: yat kathyate hi hṛdayaṅgamayopamānayuktyā girā madhuramugdhapadārthayā ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12135: śrotus tad aṅga hṛdayaṃ parito visāri vyāpnoti tailam iva vāriṇi vāry aśaṅkam //MU_3,84.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12136: tyaktopamānam amanojñapadaṃ durarthaṃ kṣubdhaṃ tvarāvidhuritaṃ vinigīrṇavarṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:12137: śrotur na yāti hṛdayaṃ pravināśam eva saṃyāti cājyam iva bhasmani hūyamānam //MU_3,84.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12138: ākhyānakāni bhuvi yāni kathāś ca yā yā yad yat prameyam uditaṃ paripeśalaṃ vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12139: dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭikathanena tad eti sādho prākāśyam āśu bhuvanaṃ sitaraśmineva //MU_3,84.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12144: yad idaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tvayi pṛcchati rāghava //MU_3,85.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12145: purā mayā hi bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kamalasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12146: ime katham upāyānti brahman sargagaṇā iti //MU_3,85.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12148: evaṃ hi mana evedam itthaṃ sphurati bhūtavat /
GSP27moksop_u:12149: calair jalāśayas sphārair vicitraiś cakrakair iva //MU_3,85.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12151: purākalpe hi kasmiṃścic chṛṇu kiṃ vṛttam aṅga me //MU_3,85.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12153: eka evāham ekāgras svasthas svām anayaṃ niśām //MU_3,85.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12154: niśānte samprabuddhas san sāndhyāṃ kṛtvā tathā vidhim /
GSP27moksop_u:12155: prajā draṣṭuṃ dṛśas sphāre vyomni yojitavān aham //MU_3,85.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12156: yāvat paśyāmi gaganaṃ na tamobhir na tejasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12158: sargaṃ saṅkalpayāmīmam iti niścitya tan mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:12172: divi krīḍanti vibudhā bhuvi krīḍanti mānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12173: dānavā bhoginaś caiva pātāleṣu sukhaṃ sthitāḥ //MU_3,85.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12180: saptalokās tathā dvīpās samudrā girayas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12182: kvacid rātritvam āyātaṃ kvacit sthiratayā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12198: itaś cetaś ca gacchanti śīryante prodbhavanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12206: evam ālokya śuddhena pareṇa svena tejasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12207: bhṛśaṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kim etat katham ity aham //MU_3,85.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12208: kathaṃ māṃsamayenākṣṇā yan na paśyāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:12211: arkaṃ tasmāj jagajjālād ekam ānīya pṛṣṭavān //MU_3,85.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12213: svāgataṃ te 'stv iti proktaṃ mayāsau kathito 'py atha //MU_3,85.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12214: kas tvaṃ katham idaṃ jātaṃ jagad ekaṃ jaganti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12215: yadi jānāsi bhagavaṃs tad etat kathayānagha //MU_3,85.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12216: ity ukto mām asāv arkas samparijñātavān atha /
GSP27moksop_u:12220: gataḥ kasmān na jānīṣe kiṃ mām īśvara pṛcchasi //MU_3,85.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12221: atha madvākyasandarbhe līlā cet tava sarvaga /
GSP27moksop_u:12222: acintitāt samutpannaṃ tac chṛṇu tvaṃ vadāmy aham //MU_3,85.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12223: sad asad iti kalābhir ātataṃ sad bhramabharabhedavimohadāyinībhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12224: pravitataracanābhir īśvarātma pravilasatīha mano mahan mahātman //MU_3,85.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12235: na babhūvātmajas tasya marubhūmes tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,86.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12236: na vyarājata sā bhāryā tasya niṣphalapuṣpitā /
GSP27moksop_u:12237: ṛjvī gaurī suśuddhāpi śūnyā śaralatā yathā //MU_3,86.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12238: tau tato dampatī khinnau putrārthaṃ tapase gireḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12241: tepāte tau tapo ghoraṃ jalāhārau tarusthitau //MU_3,86.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12243: nispandam utthitau vārkṣīṃ vṛttim āśritya saṃsthitau //MU_3,86.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12244: tasthatus tau tadā tatra tāvad vanataruvratau /
GSP27moksop_u:12245: yāvat tretā dvāparaś ca yuge dve eva te gate //MU_3,86.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12248: ājagāma tam uddeśaṃ yatra tau vipradampatī /
GSP27moksop_u:12252: tau taṃ praṇematur devaṃ tuṣārāmalam īśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:12257: varaṃ vipra gṛhāṇāśu tuṣṭo 'smi tava vāñchitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12261: bhavyā bhavantu me bhūyaś śoko yena na bādhate //MU_3,86.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12263: athaivam astv iti procya jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12265: tatas tau dampatī tuṣṭau śivāt prāpya varaṃ gṛham /
GSP27moksop_u:12270: daśa bālān madhau mugdhā vasudheva navāṅkurān //MU_3,86.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12275: atha kalena mahatā teṣāṃ tau pitarau tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:12276: sañjagmatus tanuṃ tyaktvā svāṃ gatiṃ gatikovidau //MU_3,86.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12277: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ rahitā daśa te brāhmaṇās tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12279: tatra sañcintayām āsur udvignās te vibāndhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12280: kiṃ syāt param iha śreya ūcuś cedaṃ parasparam //MU_3,86.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12281: kim iha syāt samucitaṃ bhrātaraḥ kim aduḥkhadam /
GSP27moksop_u:12282: kiṃ mahattvaṃ mahaiśvaryaṃ kiṃ mahāvibhavaṃ śubham //MU_3,86.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12283: kiyad etad anaiśvaryaṃ sāmantā hi cireśvarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12284: sāmantasampat kiṃ nāma rājāno hi maheśvarāḥ //MU_3,86.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12285: kiṃ nāma sampad bhūpānāṃ samrāḍ iha maheśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12286: kiṃ nāma sampat sāmrājyam indro hīha maheśvaraḥ //MU_3,86.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12287: kiṃ nāma vastv athendratvaṃ yan muhūrtaṃ prajāpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12288: vinaśyati na yat kalpe kiṃ syāt tad iha śobhanam //MU_3,86.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12292: rocate bhrātaras tan me brahmatvam iha netarat //MU_3,86.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12294: vacobhir aindavās tatra sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan //MU_3,86.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12297: bhrātrā tena punaḥ proktā bhrātaro bhūritejasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12298: maduktaṃ sarva evaite bhavantaḥ pālayantv alam //MU_3,86.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12300: sṛjāmi saṃharāmīti dhyānam astu cirāya vaḥ //MU_3,86.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12301: agrajeneti kathite bāḍhaṃ kṛtvā ta uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12306: brahmāhaṃ jagatas sraṣṭā kartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ //MU_3,86.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12322: taraṅgā iva toyānām imāḥ pratidiśaṃ prajāḥ //MU_3,86.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12325: ayaṃ saṃvatsaro yāta idaṃ pariṇataṃ yugam /
GSP27moksop_u:12326: sṛṣṭir iyam asau kālas tv ayaṃ saṃharaṇasya ca //MU_3,86.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12327: ayam adya gataḥ kalpo brāhmī rātrir iyaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12329: iti bhāvitayā buddhyā te dvijā aindavā daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:12338: yāvat te dehakās teṣāṃ tāpena pavanais tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12339: yayuś śoṣaṃ yathā grīṣme chinnāḥ kamalapallavāḥ //MU_3,87.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12340: jakṣus tān dehakāṃs tatra kravyādā vanavāsinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12341: itaś cetaś ca luṭhitās satphalānīva markaṭāḥ //MU_3,87.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12343: tasthuś caturyugasyānte yāvat kalpaḥ kṣayaṃ gataḥ //MU_3,87.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12348: adya prabuddhe bhavati draṣṭum icchati saṃsṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:12350: ta ete bhagavan brahman brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:12351: ta ete daśa saṃsārā manovyomani saṃsthitāḥ //MU_3,87.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12354: eṣa te kathitas sargo daśānām abjasambhava /
GSP27moksop_u:12355: brahmaṇāṃ sambhavo vyomni yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_3,87.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12356: vividhakalpanam āvalitāmbaraṃ yad idam uttamajāgatam utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12361: brāhmaṇa brahmaṇo bhānur ity uktvā brahmaṇo mama /
GSP27moksop_u:12362: brahman brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭha tūṣṇīm eva babhūva saḥ //MU_3,88.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12363: tata uktaṃ mayā tasya ciram sañcintya cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12364: bhānor bhāno vadāśu tvaṃ kim anyat saṃsṛjāmy aham //MU_3,88.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12365: etāni daśa vidyante kila yatra jaganti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12366: tatrānyo mama sargeṇa ko 'rthaḥ kathaya bhāskara //MU_3,88.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12368: nirīhasya niricchasya ko 'rthas sargeṇa te prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12370: niṣkāmād eva bhavatas sargas sampadyate prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12375: punas saṃhṛtya saṃhṛtya dinaṃ dinapatir yathā //MU_3,88.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12377: idaṃ kartavyam eveti jagan na tu ghanecchayā //MU_3,88.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12378: sṛṣṭiṃ na ca karoṣi tvam aharvyāpāram ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12380: yathāprāptaṃ hi kartavyam asaktena satā sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:12386: sargair athenduputrāṇāṃ toṣam eti jagat prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12387: tadaite toṣayiṣyanti na tvāṃ sargās sureśvara //MU_3,88.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12388: cittanetrair bhavān etān sargān paśyati no dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:12389: apaśyaṃś cakṣuṣā sargaṃ sṛṣṭam ity eva vetti kaḥ //MU_3,88.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12391: sa eva māṃsanetreṇa taṃ paśyati hi netaraḥ //MU_3,88.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12393: kaścin nāśayituṃ śaktaś cito dārḍhyāc ciraṃ sthitān //MU_3,88.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12394: karmendriyair yat kriyate tad roddhuṃ kila yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12396: yo baddhapadatāṃ yāto jantor manasi niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12397: sa tenaiva vinā brahman nānyena vinivāryate //MU_3,88.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12399: śāpenāpi na tasyāsti kṣayo naṣṭe 'pi dehake //MU_3,88.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12400: yad baddhapīṭham abhito manasi prarūḍhaṃ tadrūpa eva puruṣo bhavatīha nānyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12401: tadbodhanād itaram atra kilābhyupāyaṃ śailaugham ekam iva niṣphalam eva manye //MU_3,88.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12405: śrūyate hi purā deva magadheṣu mahīpatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12409: tasminn eva pure śiḍgaḥ kilāsīd balavān iti /
GSP27moksop_u:12414: ahalyāṃ māṃ na kasmāt sa śakro 'bhyetīti sotsukā //MU_3,89.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12416: atapyata bhṛśaṃ bālā latālūnā vaneṣv iva //MU_3,89.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12419: ayam indro 'yam indraś cety evaṃ jātapralāpayā /
GSP27moksop_u:12420: lajjāpi hi tayā tyaktā vaivaśyam upayātayā //MU_3,89.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12421: ity ārtāyā ghanasneham atha tasyā vayasyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:12422: uktam āli tavāvighnam indram apy ānayāmy aham //MU_3,89.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12424: papāta pādayos sakhyā nalinyā nalinī yathā //MU_3,89.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12426: sā vayasyā tam indrākhyaṃ yayau viprakumārakam //MU_3,89.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12429: sā tatas tena śiḍgena mahendreṇa ratiṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:12433: tatas tadanuraktā sā paśyantī tanmayaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:12435: kenacit tv atha kālena tasyā indrānurāgitā /
GSP27moksop_u:12437: indraṃ dhyāyati sā yāvat tāvat tasyā virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:12438: mukhaṃ pūrṇena candreṇa prabuddham iva kairavam //MU_3,89.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12440: cakāra bahubhir daṇḍais sa dvayor atha śāsanam //MU_3,89.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12441: tāv ubhāv api santyaktau hi santau salilāśaye /
GSP27moksop_u:12442: tuṣṭau jahasatus tatra na khedaṃ samupāgatau //MU_3,89.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12443: apṛcchat tau tato rājā khinnau sthaḥ kiṃ na durmatī /
GSP27moksop_u:12446: muhyāvo na mahīpāla svāṅgair api vikartitaiḥ //MU_3,89.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12447: vahnāv api parikṣiptāv akhinnāv evam eva tau /
GSP27moksop_u:12451: kaṣāhatāv akhinnau tāv evam eva kilocatuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12452: paṅkamagnāv akhinnau tāv evam eva kilocatuḥ //MU_3,89.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12453: anyasmāc chāsanājālāt kalpitāc ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12454: uddhṛtāv ūcatuḥ pṛṣṭau tam evārthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ //MU_3,89.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12456: na śāsanāni duḥkhāni bādhante kiñcid eva me //MU_3,89.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12457: asyāś caiva jagad rājan sarvaṃ manmayam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12458: tena nau śāsanāduḥkhaṃ kiñcid eva na bādhate //MU_3,89.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12459: mano nāma vayaṃ rājan mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12460: prapañcamātram evāyaṃ deho dṛśyata eva hi //MU_3,89.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12462: dhīraṃ mano bhedhayituṃ na manāg api śakyate //MU_3,89.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12463: kā nāma tā mahārāja kīdṛśyaḥ kasya śaktayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12465: patatūdetu vā deho yātu vā viśarārutām /
GSP27moksop_u:12467: iṣṭe 'rthe ciram āviṣṭaṃ bhaṅktuṃ dhīraṃ sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12468: bhāvā bhāvāś śarīrasthā mama śaktā na kecana //MU_3,89.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12470: tad eva paśyaty acalaṃ na śarīraviceṣṭitam //MU_3,89.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12471: na kāścana kriyā rājan varaśāpādikā api /
GSP27moksop_u:12474: manaś cālayituṃ śaktā na mahādriṃ mṛgā iva //MU_3,89.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12479: yatra yatra yathā rājaṃs tiṣṭhāmy abhipatāmi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12482: saṃsaktam idam āyāti na svabhāvād ṛte param //MU_3,89.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12484: na cālyate merur iva varaśāpabalair api //MU_3,89.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12486: na tu dhīraṃ mano rājan vijigīṣutayotthitam //MU_3,89.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12487: etāni cātra manasāṃ na ca kāraṇāni rājañ śarīraśakalāny asamutthitāni /
GSP27moksop_u:12488: ceto hi kāraṇam amīṣu śarīrakeṣu vārīva sarvavanaṣaṇḍalatāraseṣu //MU_3,89.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12489: ādyaṃ śarīram iha viddhi mano mahātman saṅkalpitā jagati tena śarīrasaṅghāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12490: ādyaṃ śarīram abhitiṣṭhati yatra tatra tat tad bhṛśaṃ phalati netarad asya puṃsaḥ //MU_3,89.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12491: mukhyāṅkuraṃ subhaga viddhi mano hi puṃso dehās tataḥ pravisṛtās tarupallavābhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12492: naṣṭe 'ṅkure punar udeti na pallavaśrīr na tv aṅkuraḥ kṣayam upaiti dalakṣayeṣu //MU_3,89.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12493: dehakṣaye vividhadehagaṇaṃ karoti svapnāvanāv iva vanaṃ navam āśu cetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12494: citte kṣate na tu karoti hi kiñcid eva dehas tatas samanupālaya cittaratnam //MU_3,89.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12495: diśi diśi hariṇākṣīm eva paśyāmi rājan priyayuvatimanastvān nityam ānandito 'smi /
GSP27moksop_u:12496: tava sukhavikṛtīnāṃ yat phalaṃ duḥkhadāyi kṣaṇam atha suciraṃ vā tan na paśyāmi kiñcit //MU_3,89.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12504: bhṛśam adya mukhe sphāraṃ dhārṣṭyaṃ maddārahāriṇaḥ //MU_3,90.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12505: pāpānurūpam apy asya śāpaṃ dehi mahāmune /
GSP27moksop_u:12506: yad avadhyavadhāt pāpaṃ vadhatyāgāt tad eva hi //MU_3,90.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12510: vināśaṃ vraja durbuddhe iti śāpaṃ visṛṣṭavān //MU_3,90.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12515: tato dvāv api saṃsaktau bhūyo jātau vihaṅgamau //MU_3,90.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12518: bhārato hi tayoś śāpas sa samartho babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:12522: akṛtrimapremarasānuviddhaṃ snehaṃ tayos taṃ prasamīkṣya kāntam /
GSP27moksop_u:12526: tenaitad vacmi bhagavan yathājātaṃ mano mune /
GSP27moksop_u:12527: anigrāhyam abhedyaṃ ca śāpair api durāsadaiḥ //MU_3,91.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12529: yujyate na na ca brahman yuktam etan mahātmanaḥ //MU_3,91.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12530: kiṃ tad asti jagaty asmin vividheṣu jagatsu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12531: tavāpi nātha nāthasya yad dainyāya mahātmanaḥ //MU_3,91.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12532: mano hi jagatāṃ kartṛ mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12533: manaḥkṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ loke na śarīrakṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,91.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12535: hantuṃ na śakyate jantoḥ pratibimbaṃ maṇer iva //MU_3,91.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12537: tvaṃ sṛṣṭveha prajās tiṣṭha buddhyākāśe 'py anantakaḥ //MU_3,91.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12540: ekaṃ dvau vā bahūn vāpi kuru sargān prajāpate /
GSP27moksop_u:12541: svecchayātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tavaindavaiḥ //MU_3,91.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12544: mayā sañcintya suciram idam uktaṃ mahāmune //MU_3,91.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12545: yuktam uktaṃ tvayā bhāno vitataṃ hi kilāmbaram /
GSP27moksop_u:12546: manaś ca vitataṃ cāpi cidākāśaś ca vistṛtaḥ //MU_3,91.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12547: tad yathābhimataṃ sargaṃ nityaṃ karma karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:12549: tat tvam evāśu bhagavan prathamo 'tra manur bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:12551: athaitat sa mahātejā mama vākyaṃ prabhākaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12553: ekena prāktane tasmin vapuṣā sūryatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12556: sasarja sakalāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ tatām abhimatāṃ mama //MU_3,91.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12557: pratibhāsam upāyāti yad yad asya hi cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12558: tat tat prakaṭatām eti sthairyaṃ saphalatām api //MU_3,91.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12560: aindavā brahmatāṃ yātā manasaḥ paśya śaktatām //MU_3,91.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12562: vayaṃ tathaiva cidbhāvāc cittatvād brahmatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,91.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12563: cittaṃ hi pratibhāsātma yac ca tatpratibhāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:12564: tad idaṃ bhāti dehādikhābhaṃ nāto 'sti dehadṛk //MU_3,91.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12568: tad evodāharanty etad dehanāmnā ghanaṃ bhrami //MU_3,91.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12570: śāntaṃ dehacamatkāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi kramāt param //MU_3,91.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12571: nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha cittvaṃ cittam idaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12578: jīvībhūya mano bhūtvā vettītthaṃ dehatāṃ mudhā //MU_3,91.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12582: aindavābjajavad rūḍhaṃ citaś cittvaṃ mano bhavet //MU_3,91.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12583: na san nāsad ahaṃrūpaṃ sattvāsattve tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12588: kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni tathā brahmaṇi saṃsthitam //MU_3,91.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12589: sarvatvād brahmaṇas sarvaṃ jaḍaṃ cinmayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12590: asmadādiśilāntātma na jaḍaṃ na ca cetanam //MU_3,91.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12593: upalabdher jaḍaṃ viddhi cetanaṃ sarvam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12594: upalambho hi sambandhāt sambandho hi samātmanoḥ //MU_3,91.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12597: citau yac cetyakalanaṃ tan manastvam udāhṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:12598: cidbhāgo 'trājaḍo bhāgo jāḍyam atra tu cetyatā //MU_3,91.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12600: iti jīvo jagadbhrāntiṃ paśyan gacchati lolatām //MU_3,91.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12601: citā sva eva bhāvo 'sau śuddhayaivaṃ dvayīkṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12602: atas sarvaṃ jagat saiva dvaitaṃ labdhāṃśam eva tat //MU_3,91.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12603: svam evānyatayā dṛṣṭvā citir dṛśyatayā vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12605: na bhrāntir asti bhramabhāṅ naivetīha hi niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12607: sarvatvāj jāḍyam astv asyāṃ citi cittvaṃ ca vetsi tat /
GSP27moksop_u:12609: ahantvādi pare tattve manāg api na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12610: ūrmyādīva pṛthak toye saṃvitsāraṃ hi tad yataḥ //MU_3,91.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12612: mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivātas tan nūnaṃ vidyata eva no //MU_3,91.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12614: vidaṃ vidur ahantādi śaityam eva yathā himam //MU_3,91.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12620: vicāryaṃ pratibhāsātma cittvaṃ cittvena vai sphuṭam //MU_3,91.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12623: yad vidyate śodhyate tad dhautaḥ kena khapādapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12624: dehādyavidyā satyā ced yukta etāṃ prati grahaḥ //MU_3,91.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12626: ye nāmopadiśanty ajñāḥ kecit te puruṣaiḍakāḥ //MU_3,91.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12627: yathaitad bhāvayet svāntaṃ tathaitad bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12629: yad yad yathā sphurati svapratibhātma cittaṃ tat tat tathā bhavati dehatayoditātma /
GSP27moksop_u:12630: deho 'yam asti na na cāham iti svarūpaṃ vijñānam ekam avagamya niriccham āssva //MU_3,91.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12631: deho 'yam eṣa ca kilāham iti svabhāvād dehārtham eva yatate tata eti nāśam /
GSP27moksop_u:12632: yakṣādikalpanavaśād bhayam eti bālo niryakṣadeśagata eva kayāpi yuktyā //MU_3,91.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12636: ity uktavān sa bhagavān mayā kamalasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12637: raghūdvaha punaḥ pṛṣṭo vākyam ākṣipya bhūtapaḥ //MU_3,92.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12639: amoghā iti tā eva kathaṃ moghīkṛtāḥ punaḥ //MU_3,92.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12641: sarvāṇy eva vimūḍhāni dṛṣṭāni kila jantuṣu //MU_3,92.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12643: abhinnau tadvad evaitau manodehau sadaiva hi //MU_3,92.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12644: atha nāsty eva vā dehaḥ kevalaṃ cetasohitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12648: manaś śāpādibhir doṣaiḥ kathaṃ nākramyate prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12649: katham ākramyate vāpi brūhi me parameśvara //MU_3,92.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12652: yat pauruṣeṇa śuddhena na samāsādyate janaiḥ //MU_3,92.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12654: sarvā eva jagaty asmin dviśarīrāś śarīriṇām //MU_3,92.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12655: ekaṃ manaśśarīraṃ tu kṣiprakāri sthitaṃ calam /
GSP27moksop_u:12661: mano nāma dvitīyo yaḥ kāyaḥ kāyavatām iha /
GSP27moksop_u:12663: pauruṣaṃ svam avaṣṭabhya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:12664: yadi tiṣṭhaty agamyo 'sau duḥkhānāṃ tad aninditaḥ //MU_3,92.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12665: yathā yathāsau yatate manodeho hi dehinām /
GSP27moksop_u:12669: pavitram anusandhānaṃ cetasā yas smaran sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12670: niṣphalās tatra śāpādyāś śilāyām iva sāyakāḥ //MU_3,92.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12671: patatv ambhasi vahnau vā kardame vā kalevaram /
GSP27moksop_u:12672: mano yad anusandhatte tad evāpnoti niścitam //MU_3,92.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12674: dadāty avighnena phalaṃ mano hi manaso mune //MU_3,92.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12676: kṛtrimendreṇa duḥkhārtir na dṛṣṭā śāsanāsv api //MU_3,92.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12682: dhyānena brahmatā prāptā yā mayāpi na khaṇḍyate //MU_3,92.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12684: cittāt svam anusandhānaṃ na tyajanti manāg api //MU_3,92.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12685: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva śāpāḥ pāpadṛśas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12686: na khaṇḍayanti tān padmapattrāghātāś śilām iva //MU_3,92.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12687: ye vāpi khaṇḍitāḥ kecic chāpādyair ādhisāyakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12690: svapne 'pi kaścid asty eva doṣajālaiḥ khalīkṛtaḥ //MU_3,92.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12691: manasaiva manas tasmāt pauruṣeṇa pumān iha /
GSP27moksop_u:12692: svakam eva svakenaiva yojayet pāvane pathi //MU_3,92.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12693: pratibhātaṃ yad evāsya tathārūpaṃ bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:12694: kṣaṇād eva manaḥ pīnaṃ bālavetālavan mune //MU_3,92.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12697: pratibhātārthatām eti kṣaṇād eva mano mune /
GSP27moksop_u:12700: manaḥ paśyaty aśuddhākṣaś candrabimbe dvitām iva //MU_3,92.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12701: yat paśyati tad evāśu phalībhūtam idaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12702: saha harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ bhuṅkte tasmāt tad eva sat //MU_3,92.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12704: dṛṣṭvā dāham avāpnoti dagdhaṃ ca paritapyate //MU_3,92.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12706: dṛṣṭvā pītvā parāṃ tṛptiṃ yāti valgati dṛpyati //MU_3,92.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12708: dṛṣṭvā lunāti lūtvā ca punar āropayaty alam //MU_3,92.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12709: itthaṃ yad eva parikalpayatīndrajālaṃ kṣipraṃ tad eva paripaśyati tāta cetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12710: nāsaj jagan na ca sad ity avagamya nūnam enāṃ dṛśaṃ vividhabhedavatīṃ jahīhi //MU_3,92.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12714: iti me bhagavatā pūrvam uktam | tad etad adya tubhyaṃ kathitam |
GSP27moksop_u:12715: tasmād asmād anākhyād brahmaṇas sarvagatāt pūrvaṃ manāṅ mananam utpadyate |
GSP27moksop_u:12716: svayam eva tad ghanatāṃ prāpya manas sampadyate |
GSP27moksop_u:12720: tena nāma yo 'yaṃ parameṣṭhī tan manastattvaṃ viddhi |
GSP27moksop_u:12721: sa manastattvākāro bhagavān brahmā saṅkalpamayatvād yad eva saṅkalpayati tad eva paśyati |
GSP27moksop_u:12723: tena brahmaṇā giritṛṇajaladhimayam idaṃ krameṇa jagat parikalpitam |
GSP27moksop_u:12724: itthaṃ krameṇa brahmatattvād iyam āgatā sṛṣṭir anyata ivāgateyam iti lakṣyate | (MU_3,93.1)
GSP27moksop_u:12727: evam utpanne jagati yā brahmaṇaś cin mananarūpiṇī sāhaṅkāraṃ parikalpya brahmatām eti |
GSP27moksop_u:12728: yās tv anyāś cicchaktayas sarvaśaktibhir abhinnā eva bhinnāḥ kalpyanta iva jagati sphāratāṃ nīte pitāmaharūpeṇa manasā samullasanti |
GSP27moksop_u:12729: ta ete sahasraśo viparivartamānā jīvā ucyante |
GSP27moksop_u:12730_0: te 'bhyutthitā eva cinnabhaso nabhasi tanmātrair āvalitā gaganapavanāntarvartinaś
GSP27moksop_u:12730_1: caturdaśavidhāyā bhūtajāter madhyād yasyā abhyāśe tiṣṭhati tasyā eva prāṇaśaktidvāreṇa
GSP27moksop_u:12730_2: praviśya śarīraṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā bījatāṃ gacchanti |
GSP27moksop_u:12731: tadanu yonito jagati jāyante tadanu kākatālīyotpannavāsanāpravāhānurūpakarmaphalabhāgino bhavanti |
GSP27moksop_u:12732: tataḥ karmaphalarajjubhir vāsanāvalitābhir baddha śarīrā bhramantaḥ patanti protpatanti ca |
GSP27moksop_u:12740: kāścid vijñātavijñānāḥ param eva padaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12742: utpattis sarvabījānām iti hi brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12775: saiva ced itarair alpair janmabhir mokṣabhāginī /
GSP27moksop_u:12776: tat tādṛśī hi sā tajjñaiḥ proktā rājasarājasī //MU_3,94.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12779: saiva sandigdhamokṣā cet sahasrair api janmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:12782: ciramokṣā hi kathitā tāmasī sā maharṣibhiḥ //MU_3,94.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12783: tajjanmanaiva mokṣasya bhāginī cet tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12785: bhāvaiḥ katipayair mokṣabhāginī cet tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12789: pūrvaṃ tu janmalakṣyāḍhyā janmalakṣyaiḥ puro 'pi cet /
GSP27moksop_u:12811: sarvā dṛśyadṛśo draṣṭur vyatiriktā na rūpataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12812: śītaraśmer iva jyotsnā svālokā iva tejasaḥ //MU_3,94.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12813: evam etā hi lokānāṃ jātayo vividhāśrayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12814: tasmād eva samāyānti tasminn eva viśanti ca //MU_3,94.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12817: itthaṃ jagatsu vividheṣu vicitrarūpās tasyecchayā bhagavato vyavahāravatyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12818: āyanti yānti nipatanti tathotpatanti bhūtaśriyaḥ kaṇaghaṭā iva pāvakotthāḥ //MU_3,94.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12819: brahmaṇas sarvaṃ samutpadyata iti pratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
GSP27moksop_u:12822: abhinnau karmakartārau samam eva parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12823: svayaṃ prakaṭatāṃ yātau puṣpāmodau taror iva //MU_3,95.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12825: sphuranti vitate vyomni nīlimna iva candrakāḥ //MU_3,95.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12827: tatra brahmaṇa utpannā jīvā ity uktayas sthitāḥ //MU_3,95.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12829: yad brahmaṇa idaṃ jātaṃ na jātaṃ veti rāghava //MU_3,95.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12830: kācid vā kalanā yāvan na nītā rāghava prathām /
GSP27moksop_u:12833: brahmedam ete jīvāś ca veti vācām ayaṃ bhramaḥ //MU_3,95.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12834: iti dṛṣṭyā nirāsaṅgād brahmaṇo jāyate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:12835: tajjaṃ tad eva tattvaṃ tu gataṃ duravabodhataḥ //MU_3,95.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12837: utpatyotpatya saṃlīnās tasminn eva pare pade //MU_3,95.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12841: tatraiva layam eṣyanti grīṣme madhulatā iva //MU_3,95.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12842: tiṣṭhanty ajasraṃ kāleṣu ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12844: puṣpāmodāv ivābhinnau pumān karma ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:12852: vītarāgair vinirṇītaṃ tac chāstram iti kathyate //MU_3,95.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12855: iyaṃ tu dṛṣṭis sakalā siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:12858: bahiṣkurvanti taṃ sarve sa ca duḥkhe nimajjati //MU_3,95.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12859: iha loke ca vede ca śrutir itthaṃ sadā prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12860: yathā karma ca kartā ca paryāyeṇeha saṅgate //MU_3,95.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12861: karmaṇā kriyate kartā kartrā karma pramīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12862: bījāṅkuravad āmnāyo loke vedokta eṣa saḥ //MU_3,95.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12863: karmaṇo jāyate jantur bījād iva navāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12864: jantoḥ prajāyate karma punar bījam ivāṅkurāt //MU_3,95.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12867: evaṃ sthite kathaṃ nāma janmabījena karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:12868: vinotpattis tvayā proktā bhūtānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt //MU_3,95.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12871: karmaṇy akāraṇe brahmañ janmādiṣu phaleṣu tu /
GSP27moksop_u:12872: karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti tvayā loke pramārjitam //MU_3,95.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12875: kiṃ tat kṛtaṃ bhavaty evaṃ bhagavan brūhi tattvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12876: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sphāraṃ chinddhi vedavidāṃ vara //MU_3,95.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12878: sādhu rāghava pṛṣṭo 'smi tvayā praśnam imaṃ śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:12879: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te yena bhṛśaṃ jñānodayo bhavet //MU_3,95.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12881: etat tat karmaṇāṃ bījaṃ phalam asyaiva vidyate //MU_3,95.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12882: yad eva hi manastattvam utthitaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12883: tad eva karma jantūnāṃ jīvo dehatayā sthitaḥ //MU_3,95.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12884: kusumāmodayor bhedo na yathā bhinnayor iha /
GSP27moksop_u:12885: tathaiva karmamanasor bhedo nāsty api bhinnayoḥ //MU_3,95.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12886: kriyāspando jagaty asmin karmeti kathito budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12887: pūrvaṃ tasya manodehaḥ karmātaś cittam eva hi //MU_3,95.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12888: na sa śailo na tad vyoma na sā diṅ na triviṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:12889: asti yatra phalaṃ nāsti kṛtānām ātmakarmaṇām //MU_3,95.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12890: aihikaṃ prāktanaṃ vāpi karma yad racitaṃ sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:12891: pauruṣo 'sau paro yatno na kadācana niṣphalaḥ //MU_3,95.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12892: brahmaṇaḥ protthitaṃ cittaṃ karma viddhīha netarat /
GSP27moksop_u:12893: tad eva janatābījaṃ viddhi rāghava netarat //MU_3,95.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12895: pūrvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ cetaḥ karma cittam ato viduḥ //MU_3,95.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12897: yā cid āhur ataś cittaṃ janatājīvatāṃ gatam //MU_3,95.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12898: manaḥ karma mano jīvaḥ kāyas tenaiva tanyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12899: ataḥ karma ca kartā ca na bhinnau tilatailavat //MU_3,95.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12900: kartṛkarmātmakāv arthāv abhinnau nityam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12901: abodhād bhedam āyātau kalpyamānau mudhaiva hi //MU_3,95.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12902: dve karmamanasī rāma mūrkhāṇāṃ na tu dhīmatām /
GSP27moksop_u:12904: paryāyaśabdāv etau hi viddhi tvaṃ cittakarmaṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:12910: uddhṛtāny eva tasmiṃs tu jīvasañjñāni tāni tu /
GSP27moksop_u:12912: manasā kriyate karma yad yat tat saphalaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:12913: manasy eva na kāyotthaṃ kartā karma manas tataḥ //MU_3,95.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12916: guṇo guṇini śauklyādiḥ paṭādau saṃsthito yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12919: tathā karma vinā cittaṃ na kiñcid upalabhyate //MU_3,95.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12926: cittaṃ sadā spandavilāsam etat spandaikarūpaṃ nanu karma viddhi /
GSP27moksop_u:12927: karmātha cittaṃ kila dharmadharmi padaṃ gate rāma paraspareṇa //MU_3,95.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12938: saṅkalpaśaktisahitaṃ yad rūpaṃ tan mano viduḥ //MU_3,96.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12940: yat tattvaṃ dviparāmṛṣṭaṃ tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ //MU_3,96.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12942: yas sadākrāntakalanas tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ //MU_3,96.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12943: bhāvas sadasator madhye nṝṇāṃ sphurati niścalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12944: kalanonmukhatāṃ yātas tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ //MU_3,96.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12946: na sambhavati loke 'smin guṇahīno guṇī yathā //MU_3,96.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12951: yā yena vāsanā yatra latevāropitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12952: sā tena phalabhūs tatra tad eva prāpyate tathā //MU_3,96.10//
