GSP27moksop_u:12954: kriyās tu vividhās tasya śākhāś citraphalās taroḥ //MU_3,96.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12956: sarvās sampādayanty etās tasmāt karma manas smṛtam //MU_3,96.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12957: mano buddhir ahaṅkāraś cetaḥ karmātha kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:12958: saṃsṛtir vāsanāvidyā prayatnas smṛtir eva ca //MU_3,96.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12959: indriyaṃ prakṛtir māyā kriyā cetītarā api /
GSP27moksop_u:12973: idaṃ tyaktvedam āyāti bālavat pelavā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:12974: vicāraṃ samparityajya tadā sā cittam ucyate //MU_3,96.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12979: pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā prāg sṛṣṭam iti niścayam /
GSP27moksop_u:12983: asty ātmatattvaṃ vimalaṃ dvitīyā dṛṣṭir aṅkitā /
GSP27moksop_u:12987: śrutvā sṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā vimṛśya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12988: indram āmodayaty eṣā tenendriyam iti smṛtā //MU_3,96.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12991: sadasattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ vāsattvam añjasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12992: sad vāsad vā vikalpaughaṃ tena māyeti kathyate //MU_3,96.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12998: svair eva saṅkalpaśatair bhṛśaṃ rūḍhim upāgatāḥ //MU_3,96.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13001: jīva ity ucyate loke mana ity api kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:13002: cittam ity ucyate caiva buddhir ity ucyate tathā //MU_3,96.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13006: manaḥ kiṃ syāj jaḍaṃ brahmann atha vāpi ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13007: ity eko mama tattvajña niścayo 'ntar na jāyate //MU_3,96.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13009: mano hi na jaḍaṃ rāma nāpi cetanatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13010: mlānā jaḍājaḍā dṛṣṭir mana ity eva kathyate //MU_3,96.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13011: madhye sadasato rūpaṃ pratibhātaṃ yad ābilam /
GSP27moksop_u:13012: jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ rāma tad etac cittam ucyate //MU_3,96.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13014: yeha sā cittam ity uktā tasmāj jātam idaṃ jagat //MU_3,96.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13016: yac cito mlānarūpiṇyas tad etan mana ucyate //MU_3,96.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13018: mana ity ucyate rāma na jaḍaṃ na ca cinmayam //MU_3,96.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13021: yathā gacchati śailūṣo rūpāṇyatvaṃ tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13022: mano nāmānyatām eti rāma karmāntaraṃ vrajan //MU_3,96.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13024: yathā yāti naraḥ karmavaśād yāti tathā manaḥ //MU_3,96.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13025: yā etāḥ kathitās sañjñā mayā rāghava cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13029: mano hi jaḍam anyasya bhinnam anyasya jīvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13034: anyathā kalpitās sāṅkhyaiś cārvākair api cānyathā //MU_3,96.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13035: jaiminīyair ārhataiś ca bauddhair vaiśeṣikais tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13037: sarvair eva hi gantavyaṃ tat padaṃ pāramātmikam /
GSP27moksop_u:13041: svaṃ mārgam abhiśaṃsanti vādinaś citrayā dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:13046: kurvāṇaḥ kartṛvaicitryam eti tadvad idaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,96.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13050: acitto hi naro loke paśyann api na paśyati //MU_3,96.57//
GSP27moksop_u:13051: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca ghrātvā bhuktvā śubhāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:13052: antar harṣaṃ viṣādaṃ ca samanasko hi vindate //MU_3,96.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13053: āloka iva rūpāṇām arthānāṃ kāraṇaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13054: badhyate baddhacitto hi muktacitto hi mucyate //MU_3,96.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13055: taṃ jaḍānāṃ varaṃ viddhi jaḍaṃ yenocyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13056: taṃ cāvagacchata jaḍaṃ mano yasya hi cetanam //MU_3,96.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13057: na cetanaṃ na ca jaḍaṃ yad idaṃ protthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13060: ābilaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhrānter bhrāntyā jagad upasthitam //MU_3,96.62//
GSP27moksop_u:13061: ajaḍaṃ hi mano nāma saṃsārasya na kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:13063: manaḥ kāraṇam arthānāṃ rūpāṇām iva bhāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13064: cittād ṛte 'nyad yad asti tad acittasya kiṃ jagat //MU_3,96.64//
GSP27moksop_u:13065: na cetanaṃ na ca jaḍaṃ tasmāj jagati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:13068: ekaṃ vicitratām etya yāti kālo yathārtubhiḥ //MU_3,96.66//
GSP27moksop_u:13070: kṣobhayanti śarīraṃ tat santu jīvādayaḥ pare //MU_3,96.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13071: darśaneṣu tu ye proktā bhedā manasi tarkataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13073: te rāma na virudhyante viśiṣyante na ca kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:13074: sarvā hi śaktayo deve vidyante sarvage yataḥ //MU_3,96.69//
GSP27moksop_u:13075: yadaivaṃ khalu śuddhāyā manāg api hi saṃvidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13076: jaḍeva śaktir uditā tadā vaicitryam āgatam //MU_3,96.70//
GSP27moksop_u:13077: ūrṇanābhād yathā tantur jāyate cetanāj jaḍaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13078: nityaṃ prabuddhāt paramād brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtis tathā //MU_3,96.71//
GSP27moksop_u:13081: jīvo manaś ca nanu buddhir ahaṅkṛtiś cety evaṃ prathām upagateyam anirmalā cit /
GSP27moksop_u:13082: saivocyate jagati cetanacittajīvasañjñāgaṇena kila nāsti vivāda eṣaḥ //MU_3,96.73//
GSP27moksop_u:13086: brahman manasa evedam ata āḍambaraṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:13087: yatas tad eva karmeti vākyārthād upalabhyate //MU_3,97.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13090: brahman manye jagaty asmin mana evākṛtiṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13093: kvacid gandharvatāṃ prāptaṃ kvacit kinnararūpi ca //MU_3,97.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13097: tadvicāraṇayā ko 'rtho vicāryaṃ mana eva naḥ //MU_3,97.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13098: tenedaṃ sarvam ābhogi jagad atyākulaṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13102: ato manye manaḥ karma tac charīreṣu kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:13103: jāyate mriyate tad dhi nātmanīdṛgvidho guṇaḥ //MU_3,97.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13104: mana evaṃ vicāreṇa manye vilayam eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:13107: mukta ity ucyate jantuḥ punar nāma na jāyate //MU_3,97.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13108: bhagavān bhavatā proktā jātayas trividhā nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:13113: ākāśā hi trayo nāma vidyante vitatāntarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13120: yenedam ātataṃ sarvaṃ cittākāśas sa ucyate //MU_3,97.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13124: cit kāraṇaṃ hi sarvasya kāryaughasya dinaṃ yathā //MU_3,97.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13125: jaḍo 'smi na jaḍo 'smīti niścayo malinaś citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13126: yas tad eva mano viddhi tenākāśādi bhāvyate //MU_3,97.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13128: kalpyate hy upadeśārthaṃ prabuddhaviṣayaṃ na tu //MU_3,97.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13129: ekam eva paraṃ brahma sarvaṃ sarvāvapūrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:13137: cito hi malinaṃ rūpaṃ cittatāṃ samupāgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13139: cittatvam asya malinasya cidātmakasya tattvasya dṛśyata idaṃ nanu bodhahīnaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13140: śuktau yathā rajatatā na tu bodhavadbhir maurkhyeṇa bandha iha bodhabalena mokṣaḥ //MU_3,97.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13144: yataḥ kutaścid utpannaṃ cittaṃ yat kiñcid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13150: sahasreṇa sa bāhūnām ādāya parighān bahūn /
GSP27moksop_u:13154: krandan palāyamāno 'sau gatvā dūram itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13173: praviśya praharaṃś caiva svayam ātmani saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,98.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13176: pṛṣṭaś ca kas tvaṃ kim idaṃ kenārthena karoṣi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:13177: kiṃ nāmābhimataṃ te syāt kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi //MU_3,98.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13178: iti pṛṣṭena kathitaṃ tena me raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:13179: nāhaṃ kaścin na caivedaṃ mune kiñcit karomy aham //MU_3,98.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13180: tvayāyam avabhagno 'smi tvaṃ me śatrur arindama /
GSP27moksop_u:13181: tvayā dṛṣṭo 'smi naṣṭo 'smi duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca //MU_3,98.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13182: iti uktvā mām asāv aṅgāny ālokya svāni tiṣṭhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:13187: krameṇa tāni tatyāja svāny aṅgāni samantataḥ //MU_3,98.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13189: tatas te bāhavaḥ paścād vakṣas tadanu codaram //MU_3,98.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13190: atha kṣaṇena sa pumāṃs tāny aṅgāni ca sambhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13191: sarvam antardhim āyātaṃ svapno bodhavato yathā //MU_3,98.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13192: vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13193: dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram //MU_3,98.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13194: so 'pi prahārān paritaḥ prayacchan svayam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:13197: punaḥ patati kuñje 'ntaḥ punar ārtaḥ palāyate //MU_3,98.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13199: ruṣṭaḥ punaḥ punas tuṣṭaḥ punaḥ praharati svayam //MU_3,98.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13201: sa mayā samavaṣṭabhya paripṛṣṭas tathaiva hi //MU_3,98.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13203: aṅgair viśīrṇatām etya yayāv alam alakṣyatām //MU_3,98.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13204: vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13205: dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram //MU_3,98.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13206: praharaṃs tadvad evāsau svayam eva palāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:13209: yāvat sa sucireṇāpi kūpād abhyutthitaś śaṭhaḥ //MU_3,98.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13210: athāham udyato gantuṃ dṛṣṭavān puruṣaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13212: avaṣṭabhya tathaivāśu tasya proktaṃ punar mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13214: kevalaṃ mām asau mūḍho naiva jānāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:13215: āḥ pāpa durdvijety uktvā svavyāpārapāro yayau //MU_3,98.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13216: atha tasmin mahāraṇye tathā viharatā mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13223: na kvacit sthitim āyānti kecid bhramaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_3,98.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13225: adyāpi vidyate yasyām itthaṃ te puruṣās sthitāḥ //MU_3,98.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13226: sā ca dṛṣṭāṭavī rāma tvayeha vyavahāriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:13227: bālyāt tu buddhitattvasya na tvaṃ smarasi rāghava //MU_3,98.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13228: sā bhīṣaṇā vividhasaṅkaṭasaṅkaṭāṅgī ghorāṭavī ghanatamogahanā ca lokaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13229: āgatya nirvṛtim abuddhihatair na tajjñair āsevyate kusumagulmakavāṭikeva //MU_3,98.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13233: kāsau mahāṭavī brahman kadā dṛṣṭā kathaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13234: ke ca te puruṣās tatra kiṃ tat kartuṃ kṛtodyamāḥ //MU_3,99.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13237: na sā mahāṭavī nāma dūre naiva ca te narāḥ //MU_3,99.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13239: tāṃ tvaṃ śūnyāṃ vikārāḍhyāṃ viddhi rāma mahāṭavīm //MU_3,99.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13241: pūrṇā nānyena saṃyuktā kevalaiva tadaiva sā //MU_3,99.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13242: tatra ye te mahākārāḥ puruṣāḥ prasaranti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13243: manāṃsi tāni viddhi tvaṃ duḥkhe nipatitāny alam //MU_3,99.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13244: draṣṭā yo 'yam ahaṃ teṣāṃ saviveko mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:13245: vivekena mayā tāni dṛṣṭāny anyāni rāghava //MU_3,99.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13246: mayā tāny eva budhyante vivekena manāṃsi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13249: manāṃsi kānicit tāni gatāny upaśamāt param //MU_3,99.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13252: ye te 'ndhakūpā gahanā narakās te raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:13253: manāṃsi tāni teṣv antar nipatanty utpatanti ca //MU_3,99.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13254: yat tat karañjagahanaṃ tat kalatrarasaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13262: praviṣṭāny andhakūpāntar nirgatāni na yāni tu /
GSP27moksop_u:13267: kānicid bahurūpāṇi yoner yoniṃ viśanti hi //MU_3,99.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13270: yair ahaṃ pumbhir abudhair durdvijeti tiraskṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13272: tvayā dṛṣṭo vinaṣṭo 'smi śatrur me tvam iti drutam /
GSP27moksop_u:13273: yad uktaṃ tad dhi cittena galatā paridevitam //MU_3,99.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13274: ruditaṃ yan mahākrandaṃ puṃsā bahvasru rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:13275: tad bhogajālaṃ tyajatā manasā rodanaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,99.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13277: cetasas tyajato bhogān paritāpo bhṛśaṃ bhavet //MU_3,99.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13279: kaṣṭam etāni santyajya kiṃ prayāmīti cetasā //MU_3,99.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13282: hasitaṃ yat tad ānandi puṃsā madavabodhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13285: cetasas tyajato rūpam ānando hi vivardhate //MU_3,99.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13289: ity aṅgāny upahāsena dṛṣṭāni svāni cetasā //MU_3,99.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13290: manaḥ prāptavivekaṃ hi viśrāntaṃ vitate pade /
GSP27moksop_u:13291: prāktanīṃ dīnatāṃ dhīraṃ hasat paśyati dūrataḥ //MU_3,99.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13293: tad viveko balāc cittam ādatta iti darśitam //MU_3,99.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13294: yad aṅgāni viśīrṇāni gatāny antardhim agrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13298: yad ātmani prahāraughaiḥ pumān praharati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13300: palāyate yat puruṣas svātmanaḥ praharan svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13302: svayaṃ praharati svāntaṃ svayam eva svayecchayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13305: svayam eva palāyante gantum utkāni tat padam //MU_3,99.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13306: yad idaṃ vitataṃ duḥkhaṃ tat tanoti svayaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13311: bhāvi duḥkham apaśyan svaṃ durlīlābhir ivārbhakaḥ //MU_3,99.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13313: kīlotpāṭī kapir duḥkham etīdaṃ hi manas tathā //MU_3,99.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13315: abhyāsāt svasthatām etya na bhūyaḥ pariśocati //MU_3,99.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13317: tadvaśād eva naśyanti sūryasyāgre himaṃ yathā //MU_3,99.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13318: yāvajjīvam anindyayā varamate śāstrārthasañjātayā pālyaṃ vāsanayā mano hi munivan maunena rāgādiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:13319: paścāt pāvanapāvanaṃ padam ajaṃ tat prāpyate śītalam yatsaṃsthena na śocyate punar alaṃ puṃsā mahāpatsv api //MU_3,99.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13323: cittam etad upāyātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13324: atanmayaṃ tanmayaṃ ca taraṅgas sāgarād iva //MU_3,100.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13325: prabuddhānāṃ mano rāma brahmaiveha na cetarat /
GSP27moksop_u:13331: sarvaśakti paraṃ brahma nityam āpūrṇam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13332: na tad asti na tasmin yad vidyate vitatātmani //MU_3,100.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13333: sarvaśaktir hi bhagavān yaiva tasmai hi rocate /
GSP27moksop_u:13334: śaktis tām eva vitatāṃ prakāśayati sarvagaḥ //MU_3,100.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13344: vṛkṣabīje yathā vṛkṣas tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam //MU_3,100.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13348: yathartau śaktayas tadvaj jīvehā brahmaṇi sthitāḥ //MU_3,100.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13350: yathā dadāti puṣpāṇi tathā cittāni lokakṛt //MU_3,100.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13351: kvacit kāścit kadācic ca tasmād āyānti śaktayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13352: deśakālāt tu vaicitryāt kṣmātalād iva śālayaḥ //MU_3,100.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13354: brahmaivedam ahaṃ tvaṃ ca jagadāśāś ca rāghava //MU_3,100.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13356: yan manāṅmananāṃ śaktiṃ dhatte tan mana ucyate //MU_3,100.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13357: piñchabhrāntir yathā vyomni payasy āvartadhīr yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13359: yad etan manaso rūpam uditaṃ mananātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:13360: brāhmī śaktir asau tasmād brahmaiva tad arindama //MU_3,100.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13361: idaṃ tad aham ity eva vibhāgaḥ pratibhāsajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13364: śabditaṃ sarvaśaktes sā śaktir brahmaiva tāṃ viduḥ //MU_3,100.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13365: manassattātmakaṃ nāma yad etan manasi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:13368: manaśśabdaiḥ prakalpyante brahmajān brahma viddhi tān //MU_3,100.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13377: jāyate naśyati tathā yad idaṃ yāti tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:13378: tad idaṃ brahmaṇi brahma brahmaṇaiva vivartate //MU_3,100.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13381: kāraṇaṃ karma kartā ca jananaṃ maraṇaṃ sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13382: sarvaṃ brahmaiva nānyo 'sti tad vinā kalanārthataḥ //MU_3,100.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13383: na lobho 'sti na moho 'sti na tṛṣṇāsti nirañjanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13384: ka ātmany ātmano lobhas tṛṣṇā moho 'thavā kutaḥ //MU_3,100.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13387: abuddhaṃ brahma yad rāma tac cittaṃ jīva ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:13392: dvīndutvam iva durdṛṣṭes sac cāsac ca samutthitam //MU_3,100.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13394: sarvatvād ātmanaś caiva kvātmā baddhaḥ kva mucyate //MU_3,100.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13396: yasya kālpanikas tasya mokṣo mithyā na satyataḥ //MU_3,100.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13398: mano yanniścayaṃ yāti tat tad bhavati nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13399: tena kālpaniko nāsti bandhaḥ katham iva prabho //MU_3,100.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13404: vastutas tu na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti mahāmate //MU_3,100.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13406: rajjvaher iva he prājña na tv abuddhamatiṃ prati //MU_3,100.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13409: ādau manas tadanu bandhavimokṣadṛṣṭī paścāt prapañcaracanā bhuvanābhidhānā /
GSP27moksop_u:13410: ityādikā sthitir iyaṃ hi gatā pratiṣṭhām ākhyāyikā bhavati bālajanociteva //MU_3,100.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13419: sā bālasya vinodāya dhātrī tasya mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:13421: kvacit santi mahātmāno rājaputrās trayaś śubhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13423: dvau na jātau tathaikaś ca garbha eva hi na sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13430: mārge glāniṃ gatā grīṣmatāpārtyā pallavā iva //MU_3,101.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13432: hā tātāmbeti śocanto mṛgā yūthacyutā iva //MU_3,101.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13437: tasmin vṛkṣatraye vṛkṣau dvau na jātau manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:13438: bījam eva tṛtīyasya svārohasya na vidyate //MU_3,101.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13439: viśrāntās te pariśrāntās tatraikasya taror adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13441: phalāny amṛtasṛṣṭāni bhuktvā pītvā ca tadrasam /
GSP27moksop_u:13442: kṛtvā gulucchakair mālāś ciraṃ viśramya te yayuḥ //MU_3,101.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13445: tatraikā pariśuṣkaiva manāg apy ambu na dvayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13447: pariśuṣkā bhṛśaṃ yāsau tasyāṃ te sasnur ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13455: dadṛśus tatra ramyāṇi trīṇi sadvibhavāni te /
GSP27moksop_u:13457: anirmite dve sadane ekaṃ nirbhitti tatra vai /
GSP27moksop_u:13458: abhittimandiraṃ cāru praviṣṭās te narās trayaḥ //MU_3,101.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13461: yatra karparatāṃ yāte dve ekā cūrṇatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13462: jagṛhuś cūrṇarūpāṃ tāṃ sthālīṃ te dīrghabuddhayaḥ //MU_3,101.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13463: droṇair navanavatyā tais tasyāṃ droṇena cāndhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13465: tato bhuktaṃ janaśatair brāhmaṇānāṃ śatais tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13466: tribhis tai rājaputraiś ca parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataiḥ //MU_3,101.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13470: etāṃ hṛdi kuru prājña vidagdhas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi //MU_3,101.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13473: eṣā hi kathitā rāma cittākhyānakathāṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:13480: saṅkalpavaśataḥ kiñcin nakiñcit kiñcid eva vā //MU_3,101.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13481: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaḥ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13488: tad idaṃ sphāratāṃ yātaṃ vyāpārair divasaṃ yathā //MU_3,101.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13489: saṅkalpajālakalanaiva jagat samagraṃ saṅkalpam eva nanu viddhi vilāsi cetyam /
GSP27moksop_u:13490: saṅkalpamātram alam utsṛja nirvikalpam āśritya niścayam avāpnuhi rāma śāntim //MU_3,101.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13494: svasaṅkalpavaśān mūḍho moham eti na paṇḍitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13497: ko 'sau saṅkalpitaḥ kena yakṣo brahmavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:13503: kutaḥ ko 'yam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ nāma kiloditaḥ //MU_3,102.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13512: abaddho baddha ity uktvā kiṃ śocasi mudhaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13515: sarvasmin brahmatattve 'smin kiṃ baddhaṃ kiṃ vimucyate //MU_3,102.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13516: anārto 'py ārtisadbhāvāc chinne 'ṅge kiṃ ca tāmyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:13518: dehe naṣṭe kṣate kṣīṇe kātmanaḥ kṣatir āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13519: bhastrāyāṃ paridagdhāyāṃ tatsthaṃ hema na naśyati //MU_3,102.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13520: dehaḥ patatu vodetu kā naḥ kṣatir upāgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13521: ko naṣṭaḥ prakṣate puṣpe āmodo vyomasaṃśrayaḥ //MU_3,102.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13524: dehaḥ patatu vodetu yātu vā gaganāntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:13528: mano nāma śarīraṃ hi jagatas sakalasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:13529: ātmaśaktiś cid asyātmā na naśyati kadācana //MU_3,102.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13531: na naśyati kadācid sa kiṃ mudhā paritapyase //MU_3,102.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13532: viśīrṇe 'bhre yathā vātaś śuṣke 'bje ṣaṭpado yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13534: saṃsāre 'smin viharato mano 'pi hi na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:13535: jñānāgninā vinā jantor ātmanāśe tu kā kathā //MU_3,102.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13538: badaraṃ hastam āyāti yathā sphuṭati kuṇḍake /
GSP27moksop_u:13539: ātmā gaganam āyāti tathā calati dehake //MU_3,102.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13541: tiṣṭhaty evam ayaṃ dehī dehe kṣīṇe nirāmayaḥ //MU_3,102.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13545: kiṃ bibheti mahābāho neha naśyati kaścana //MU_3,102.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13546: atas tvaṃ vāsanāṃ rāma mithyaivāham iti sthitām /
GSP27moksop_u:13552: eṣā kuḍyavad ākāśaṃ tuṣāram analaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13557: jagatām ākulaṃ cakṣur vyomni piñchakatām iva //MU_3,102.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13558: layam asyās svarūpaṃ tvaṃ naya rāma vicāraṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13564: svavināśakriyāṃ caitāṃ mana eva karoty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:13565: mano hy ātmavadhaṃ nāma nāṭakaṃ parinṛtyati //MU_3,102.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13567: na hi jānāti durbuddhir vināśaṃ pratyupasthitam //MU_3,102.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13573: manonāśe prayatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru mā manaso jave //MU_3,102.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13575: prabhur idam akhile vivekahīnaṃ subhaga mano mahad āpadekahetuḥ //MU_3,102.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13577: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:13578: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,102.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13581: parasmād utthitaṃ cetaḥ kaṇo lola ivārṇavāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13582: sphāratām etya bhuvanaṃ tanotīdam itas tataḥ //MU_3,103.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13583: hrasvaṃ dīrghīkaroty āśu dīrghaṃ nayati kharvatām /
GSP27moksop_u:13584: svatāṃ nayaty anyad alaṃ svaṃ tathaivānyatām api //MU_3,103.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13585: prādeśamātram api yad vastu bhāvanayaiva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:13588: nimeṣeṇaiva saṃsārān karoti na karoti ca //MU_3,103.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13589: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:13592: bhāvād bhāvāntaraṃ yāti lolatvān naṭavan manaḥ //MU_3,103.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13593: sad asattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ cāsan nayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:13597: tatas saiva kriyā cittasamīhitam alaṃ phalam /
GSP27moksop_u:13598: kṣaṇāt prayacchati latā kāle sikteva tādṛśam //MU_3,103.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13599: citrāṃ krīḍanakaśreṇīṃ yathā paṅkād gṛhe śiśuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13600: karoty evaṃ mano rāma vikalpāt kurute jagat //MU_3,103.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13602: kim ekaṃ tatpadārtheṣu rūpaṃ jagati kalpyate //MU_3,103.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13603: karoty ṛtukaraḥ kālo yathā rūpānyatāṃ taroḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13604: cittam evaṃ padārthānāṃ teṣām evānyatām iha //MU_3,103.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13607: kalpaṃ kṣaṇīkaroty etat kṣaṇaṃ nayati kalpatām /
GSP27moksop_u:13610: vilambate na ca ciraṃ na ca cittam aśaktitaḥ //MU_3,103.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13612: cetasaḥ prabhavanty ete pādapād iva pallavāḥ //MU_3,103.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13613: jalam eva yathāmbhodhir auṣṇyam eva yathānalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13614: tathā vividhasaṃrambhas saṃsāraś cittam eva hi //MU_3,103.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13616: draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyāḍhyaṃ tat sarvaṃ cittam eva vaḥ //MU_3,103.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13617: cittaṃ jaganti bhuvanāni vanāntarāṇi saṃlakṣyate svayam upāgatam ātmabhedaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13622: atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam /
GSP27moksop_u:13625: uttarāḥ pāṇḍavā nāma sphīto janapado mahān //MU_3,104.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13647: tatra śailā virājante harāḥ proddhūlitā iva //MU_3,104.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13651: caritaṃ saṃsmariṣyanti harer iva ciraṃ janāḥ //MU_3,104.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13658: jihmatāṃ yo na jānāti na dṛṣṭā yena gṛdhnutā /
GSP27moksop_u:13671: paṭhatsu ca stutīḥ puṇyāḥ puraḥprahveṣu vandiṣu //MU_3,104.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13672: sabhāṃ viveśa sāṭopaḥ kaścit tām aindrajālikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13677: saṃviveśa puro rājñas taror agre kapir yathā //MU_3,104.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13679: uvācotkandharaṃ bhūpaṃ sa padmam iva ṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_3,104.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13680: vilokaya vibho tāvad ekām iha kharolikām /
GSP27moksop_u:13681: pīṭhastha eva sāścaryāṃ vyomnaś candra ivāvanim //MU_3,104.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13682: ity uktvā bhramitā tena piñchikā bhramadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:13689: devalokonmukhas tv abdheś śakram uccaiśśravā iva //MU_3,104.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13690: sa tam aśvam upādāya pārthivaṃ samuvāca ha /
GSP27moksop_u:13693: jave jayanaśīle tu mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ //MU_3,104.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13695: rājate hi padārthaśrīr mahatām arpaṇāc chubhā //MU_3,104.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13698: sadaśvam enam āruhya bhuvanaṃ vihara prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:13700: aśvam ālokayām āsa tenokta iti pārthivaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13704: kṣaṇam ālokya piñchāśvau tasthau sa sthagitekṣaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13707: vītarāgo munir buddhaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,104.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13709: bhayāt kām apy ayaṃ bhūpaś cintāṃ cintayatīti ha //MU_3,104.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13719: stimitacakṣuṣi bhūmipatau sthite mukulitābjavanasya dhṛtā dyutiḥ //MU_3,104.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13729: patantaṃ dhārayām āsus taṃ purogā nṛpaṃ bhujaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13733: ko 'yaṃ pradeśaḥ kasyeyaṃ sabheti sa nṛpaś śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13735: athovāca sabhā deva kim etad iti sādaram /
GSP27moksop_u:13739: tvayītthaṃ saṃsthite deva vayam atyantam ākulāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13742: bhogeṣv iva vikalpeṣu keṣu te luṭhitaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,105.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13744: manas te nirmalaṃ kasmāt sambhrameṣu nimajjati //MU_3,105.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13747: sātatyena hi yaivāsya manaso vṛttir utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:13750: tavāpi hi manaś citram ālūnam iva lakṣyate //MU_3,105.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13755: iti jātāsu gīrṣv asya bhūpateḥ kāntir ānanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13756: bhūṣayām āsa śītāṃśuṃ māsānta iva pūrṇatā //MU_3,105.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13763: jālma jālaṃ jaṭālena kim etad bhavatā kṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:13766: suśaktam api me cittam ābhir mohe niveśitam //MU_3,105.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13770: kadācin moham ādatte kṣaṇaṃ matimatām api //MU_3,105.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13773: dṛṣṭavān aham etasmin bahvīḥ kāryadaśāś calāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13775: ity uktvonmukhanetreṣu sabhyeṣu sa hasann iva /
GSP27moksop_u:13786: indras svarga ivāsyāṃ tu sabhāyām adya saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,106.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13787: yāvad abhyāgato dūrāt kaścic chāmbarikas tv ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13788: rasātalād abhyutthito māyī maya iva svayam //MU_3,106.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13794: tathā calantaṃ calitas svaśvam ārūḍhavān aham //MU_3,106.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13795: gantuṃ pravṛtto mṛgayām eko 'ham atha raṃhasā /
GSP27moksop_u:13807: araṇyaṃ mahad āsādya matir me khedam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13810: āsūryāntaṃ dinaṃ tatra prakrāntaṃ sīdatā mayā //MU_3,106.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13814: astādrisānuṃ khinnaḥ khaṃ śūnyaṃ bhrāntveva bhāskaraḥ //MU_3,106.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13816: yatra sphuranti ṣaṇḍeṣu pānthānām iva bandhavaḥ //MU_3,106.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13819: pūrvād araṇyād arasāt tad dhi kiñcit sukhāvaham /
GSP27moksop_u:13820: atyantaduḥkhān maraṇād varaṃ vyādhir hi jantuṣu //MU_3,106.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13837: tatra kalpasamā rātrir mohamagnasya me gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13839: na snātavān na sthitavān na tadā bhuktavān aham /
GSP27moksop_u:13840: kevalaṃ me gatā rātris sāpadāṃ dhuri tiṣṭhataḥ //MU_3,106.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13848: ahaṃ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prātar madhupānāruṇām iva //MU_3,106.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13849: kṣaṇād ajña iva jñānaṃ daridra iva kāñcanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13851: utthāya vāravāṇaṃ ca tata āsphoṭitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13853: pravṛttas tām ahaṃ sphārāṃ vihartuṃ jaṅgalasthalīm /
GSP27moksop_u:13855: na kiñcid dṛśyate tatra bhūtaṃ jaraḍhajaṅgale /
GSP27moksop_u:13864: aham abhyāgatas tatra śarvarīm iva candramāḥ //MU_3,106.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13865: mahyam odanam āśv etad bāle balavadāpade /
GSP27moksop_u:13867: kṣud antar dahatīyaṃ māṃ bāle vṛddhim upeyuṣī /
GSP27moksop_u:13869: yācñayāpi tayā mahyam itthaṃ dattaṃ na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:13873: tayokto hārakeyūriṃś caṇḍālīṃ viddhi mām iti /
GSP27moksop_u:13877: ity uktavatyā gacchantyā skhalantyeva pade pade /
GSP27moksop_u:13879: dadāni bhojanam idaṃ bhartā bhavasi cen mama /
GSP27moksop_u:13880: loko nopakaroty arthaṃ sāmānyas snigdhatāṃ vinā //MU_3,106.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13881: vāhayaty atra me dāntān uḍḍāre pukkasaḥ pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:13883: tasyedam annaṃ bhavati bhartṛtve dīyate sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:13884: prāṇair api hi sampūjyā vallabhāḥ puruṣā yataḥ //MU_3,106.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13885: athoktā sā mayā bhartā bhavāmi tava suvrate /
GSP27moksop_u:13887: tatas tayaudanād ardhaṃ mahyam ekaṃ samarpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:13891: māṃ taḍākam ivāpūrya sā prāvṛṭśyāmalā gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13892: hastena samupādāya prāṇaṃ bahir iva sthitam //MU_3,106.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13897: sa tasyā bāḍham ity uktvā dinānte samupasthite /
GSP27moksop_u:13898: mumoca dāntāv ābaddhau kṛtāntaḥ kiṅkarāv iva //MU_3,106.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13900: vetālavad vanāt tasmād dinānte calitā vayam //MU_3,106.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13902: śmaśānād iva vetālāś śmaśānam itaran mahat //MU_3,106.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13916: jāmātāyam iti proktaṃ tayā tad abhinanditam //MU_3,106.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13923: dattātha tena sā mahyaṃ kumārī bhayadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:13925: sarabhasam abhito vinedur atra prasṛtamahāmadirāsavāś śvapākāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13926: hatapaṭupaṭahā vilāsavantas svayam iva duṣkṛtarāśayo mahāntaḥ //MU_3,106.72//
GSP27moksop_u:13933: puṣpitā sātha sampannā sthitā garbhavatī tataḥ //MU_3,107.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13934: prāsūta duḥkhadāṃ kanyāṃ vipad duḥkhakriyām iva /
GSP27moksop_u:13935: sā kanyā vavṛdhe śīghraṃ mūrkhacinteva pīvarī //MU_3,107.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13936: punaḥ prāsūta sā varṣais tribhiḥ putram aśobhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13938: punaḥ prāsūta kanyāṃ ca punar apy arbhakaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13940: tayā saha samās tatra mayā bahvyo 'tivāhitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13947: kāṣṭhabhāro vane vyūḍho yo mūrtam iva duṣkṛtam //MU_3,107.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13956: kāle kṣayaṃ gate snehe kalatre 'ghanatāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:13961: mukhaṃ jarjaratāṃ yātam indū rāhuradair iva //MU_3,107.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13968: śarāvakeṣv aṭavyāṃ ca palalaṃ pakvam ādarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13999: jālair jarjaratāṃ nītā diśaś ca sukṛtāyuṣām //MU_3,107.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14002: karabhyā iva sarpeṇa vidrutaṃ dūrato hriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:14003: dūre tyaktā dayā dehād bhujaṅgeneva kañcukam //MU_3,107.37//
GSP27moksop_u:14016: kṛṣṇadehena yaukāḍhyā kanthā skandhe mayā ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:14020: lohaliṅgā yathā rogān anarthān iva durgrahāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14021: prasūtās tatra me dārā duḥkhāny api sutān api //MU_3,107.46//
GSP27moksop_u:14024: ākruṣṭam uddhataravaṃ ruditaṃ vipatsu bhuktaṃ kadannam uṣitaṃ hatapakkaṇeṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:14025: kālāntaraṃ bahu mayopahatena tatra durvāsanānigaḍabandhagatena sabhyāḥ //MU_3,107.48//
GSP27moksop_u:14034: kalaheṣv atha kāryeṣu āgacchatsu vrajatsu ca //MU_3,108.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14037: calaṃ cintācitaṃ cakram ārūḍhe bhrānta ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:14043: saṃsāram iva kalpānto dāvāgnir iva kānanam /
GSP27moksop_u:14047: na varṣati ghanavrāte dṛṣṭanaṣṭe kvacit sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:14085: tad akāṇḍaṃ sphuṭaṃ prāpya sa deśaś śuṣkakoṭaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14097: śīrṇāḥ kecana tatraiva cchinnā iva vane drumāḥ //MU_3,109.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14100: praviṣṭāḥ kecid analaṃ jvalitaṃ śalabhā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:14101: kecic chvabhreṣu patitāś śilāś śailacyutā iva //MU_3,109.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14102: ahaṃ tu tān parityajya śvaśurādīn svakāñ janān /
GSP27moksop_u:14104: analān anilāṃś caiva rakṣakān bhakṣakān api /
GSP27moksop_u:14107: avaropya sutān skandhāt tān anarthān ivolbaṇān //MU_3,109.8//
GSP27moksop_u:14112: thutthako nāma tanayo mamaikaḥ puratas sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14115: āpta dehy āśu me māṃsaṃ pānaṃ ca rudhiraṃ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,109.12//
GSP27moksop_u:14116: punaḥ punar vadann evaṃ sa bālas tanayo mama /
GSP27moksop_u:14117: prāṇāntikīṃ daśāṃ prāptas sākrando hi punaḥ kṣudhā //MU_3,109.13//
GSP27moksop_u:14118: tasyoktaṃ hi mayā putra māṃsaṃ nāstīti bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14119: tathāpi māṃsaṃ dehīti vadaty eva sudurmatiḥ //MU_3,109.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14121: tasyoktaṃ putra manmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ sambhujyatām iti //MU_3,109.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14122: tad apy aṅgīkṛtaṃ tena dehīti vadatā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14130: mayoktaṃ tanayāsyāṃ tu citāyāṃ patitāt punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14131: utkṛtyotkṛtya bhoktavyaṃ matto māṃsaṃ kṣaṇāt tvayā //MU_3,109.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14132: ity uktvā yāvad ātmānaṃ svaṃ citāyāṃ kṣipāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:14133: luṭhito 'smi javāt tāvad asmāt siṃhāsanān nṛpaḥ //MU_3,109.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14135: bhṛśam eva prabuddho 'haṃ smṛtyā ca valitas sthitaḥ //MU_3,109.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14138: ātmodantaṃ bhavatsv ittham enaṃ kathitavān aham /
GSP27moksop_u:14145: aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyā nanu vilakṣaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:14146: ko nu śāmbariko nāma kva cāsāv agrato gataḥ //MU_3,109.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14147: sarvaśakter vicitrā hi śaktayaś śataśo vidheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14151: na ca śāmbarikottheyaṃ māyā manasi mohanī /
GSP27moksop_u:14152: arthasya gṛdhnavo hy ete nityaṃ śāmbarikāḥ kila //MU_3,109.30//
GSP27moksop_u:14155: sabhāyām avasaṃ tasyām ahaṃ rāma tadā kila /
GSP27moksop_u:14156: tena pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ mayaitan nāptataś śrūtam //MU_3,109.32//
GSP27moksop_u:14157: atibahukalanāvivardhitāṅgaṃ naya nijacittam idaṃ śamaṃ mahātman /
GSP27moksop_u:14158: śamam upagamite paraṃ svabhāve paramam upaiṣyasi pāvanaṃ padaṃ tat //MU_3,109.33//
GSP27moksop_u:14166: asad eva manovṛttir mlānā vistārayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:14168: sad eva hi mahāduḥkham asattāṃ nayati kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:14170: nayad abhyāśatāṃ dūram abhyāśaṃ dūratāṃ nayat /
GSP27moksop_u:14171: mano valgati bhūteṣu bālo bālakhageṣv iva //MU_3,110.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14179: vāsanāvalitaṃ cetas svapnavaj jāgrad eva hi //MU_3,110.9//
GSP27moksop_u:14186: atas tvaṃ mana evedaṃ naraṃ viddhi na dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:14187: jaḍo deho manas tv atra na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,110.13//
GSP27moksop_u:14188: yat kṛtaṃ manasā rāma tat kṛtaṃ viddhi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:14189: yat tyaktaṃ manasā rāma tat tyaktaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_3,110.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14191: mano vyoma mano bhūmir mano vāyur mano mahān //MU_3,110.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14192: mano yadi padārthaṃ tu tadbhāvena na yojayet /
GSP27moksop_u:14193: tatas sūryādayo 'py ete na prakāśāḥ kadācana //MU_3,110.16//
GSP27moksop_u:14194: mano moham upādatte yasyāsau mūḍha ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14195: śarīre moham āpanne na śave mūḍha ucyate //MU_3,110.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14196: manaḥ paśyad bhavaty akṣi śṛṇvac śravaṇatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:14197: tvagbhāvaṃ sparśanād eti ghrāṇatām eti śiṅghanāt //MU_3,110.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14198: rasanād rasatām eti vicitrāsv atra vṛttiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:14200: laghu dīrghaṃ karoty etat sattāsattāṃ ca gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14201: kaṭutāṃ nayati svādu ripuṃ nayati mitratām //MU_3,110.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14203: tat sad eva hi pratyakṣaṃ tanmātrānubhavād iha //MU_3,110.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14211: śīryate ca yathā tantau dagdhe sauktikamālikā //MU_3,110.25//
GSP27moksop_u:14219: anīhitaṃ ca viṣatāṃ nayaty amṛtam apy alam //MU_3,110.29//
GSP27moksop_u:14221: manas tv abhimatākāraṃ rūpaṃ sṛjati vastuṣu //MU_3,110.30//
GSP27moksop_u:14226: śuklaṃ kṛṣṇīkaroty etat kṛṣṇaṃ nayati śuklatām /
GSP27moksop_u:14230: yac cittadṛṣṭaṃ tad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tadalokitam /
GSP27moksop_u:14231: andhakāre yathā rūpam indriyaṃ nirmanas tathā //MU_3,110.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14246: manasy ullasite svapne hṛdy eva puraparvatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14247: ākāśa iva vistīrṇe dṛśyante nirmitāḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,110.43//
GSP27moksop_u:14254: vyatiriktā yathā hemno na haimavanitā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14262: yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tena tenāśu bhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14266: suratvād daityatām eti nāgatvān nagatām api /
GSP27moksop_u:14268: naratvād eti nārītvaṃ pitṛtvāt putratāṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14269: yathā kṣipraṃ prati naṭas svasaṅkalpāt tathā manaḥ //MU_3,110.54//
GSP27moksop_u:14273: saṅkalpād yonim āyāti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayābhaye //MU_3,110.56//
GSP27moksop_u:14274: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca manasi tile tailam iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:14275: tad deśakālavaśato ghanaṃ vā tanu vā bhavet //MU_3,110.57//
GSP27moksop_u:14276: tailaṃ tilasya ca krāntyā sphuṭatām eti śāśvatīm /
GSP27moksop_u:14279: kathyate tadvaśād yasmād deśakālau sthitiṃ gatau //MU_3,110.59//
GSP27moksop_u:14280: praśāmyaty ullasaty eti yāti nandati valgati /
GSP27moksop_u:14284: cāpale prasaras tasmād antar yena na dīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14285: mano vinayam ādhatte tasyālāna iva dvipaḥ //MU_3,110.62//
GSP27moksop_u:14286: na spandate mano yasya śastrastambha ivottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14294: cittaṃ calatkuvalayaṃ valayanta ete mūḍhā mahājaḍajave madamohamandāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14303: tyajann abhimataṃ vastu yas tiṣṭhati nirāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14304: jitam eva manas tena kudānta iva dantinā //MU_3,111.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14306: avastuno vastuni ca yojyate bodhyate 'pi ca //MU_3,111.4//
GSP27moksop_u:14308: chinddhi tvam ayasevāyo manasaiva mano mune //MU_3,111.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14309: ayatnena yathā bāla itaś cetaś ca yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14314: yasya duṣkaratāṃ yātaṃ dhik taṃ puruṣakīṭakam //MU_3,111.8//
GSP27moksop_u:14317: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena cittam āśv eva jīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14320: śaknuvanti na ye kartuṃ dhik tān puruṣajambukān //MU_3,111.11//
GSP27moksop_u:14327: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ brahma sampadyate tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:14333: tāṃ mahāpadavīm ekāṃ kām apy anusaraṃś ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:14334: cittaṃ cidbhakṣitaṃ kṛtvā cittvād api paraṃ bhava //MU_3,111.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14337: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya nītvā cittam acittatām /
GSP27moksop_u:14338: tāṃ mahāpadavīm ehi yatra nāsi na cetarat //MU_3,111.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14340: jetum āśu mano rāma pauruṣenaiva śakyate //MU_3,111.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14349: na kaścaneha mriyate jāyate neha kaścana /
GSP27moksop_u:14350: svayaṃ vetti mṛtiṃ dehe lokam anyaṃ gataṃ manaḥ //MU_3,111.26//
GSP27moksop_u:14351: ito yātaṃ pare loke sphuraty anyatayā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14352: na naśyaty etad āmokṣam ato mṛtibhayaṃ kutaḥ //MU_3,111.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14354: cittam āmokṣam āste 'sya rūpam anyan na vidyate //MU_3,111.28//
GSP27moksop_u:14355: sute bhrātari bhṛtyādau kleśa ākramaṇaṃ nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:14357: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca bhūyo bhūyo vicāritam /
GSP27moksop_u:14359: ṛte pathye tate śuddhe bodhe hṛdy udite citi /
GSP27moksop_u:14362: mano māraya niśśaṅkaṃ tvāṃ pramathnanti nādhayaḥ //MU_3,111.32//
GSP27moksop_u:14363: yadi ramyam aramyatve tvayā saṃviditaṃ vidā /
GSP27moksop_u:14364: chinnāny eva tad aṅgāni cittasyeti matir mama //MU_3,111.33//
GSP27moksop_u:14365: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me etāvanmātrakaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14367: chinnābhram amale vyomni yathā śaradi dhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14368: nirvikalpe pare tattve tathā nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,111.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14369: vahanti yatra śastrāgnipavanās tatra bhīr bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:14370: svāyatte mṛduni svacche kim asaṅkalpane bhayam //MU_3,111.36//
GSP27moksop_u:14371: idaṃ śreya idaṃ neti siddham ābālam akṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:14372: bālaṃ putram ivodāre manaś śreyasi yojayet //MU_3,111.37//
GSP27moksop_u:14386: tad aṇor antare vyaktaṃ vibhaktaṃ paridṛśyate //MU_3,111.44//
GSP27moksop_u:14388: santoṣamātravibhavena mano vijitya nityoditena jayam ehi nirīhitena //MU_3,111.45//
GSP27moksop_u:14390: śamitayā mitayāntar ahantayā yad avaśiṣṭam ajaṃ padam astu tat //MU_3,111.46//
GSP27moksop_u:14394: yasmin yasmin padārthe hi yena yena yathā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14408: spandasparśād ṛte vāyor yathā sattaiva nohyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14410: yat tu cañcalatāhīnaṃ tan mano mṛtam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14411: sa eva ca tapaśśāstraprasiddho mokṣa ucyate //MU_3,112.8//
GSP27moksop_u:14416: tasya cañcalatā yaiṣā hy avidyā nāma socyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14420: yat tat sadasator madhyaṃ yan madhyaṃ cittvajāḍyayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14426: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yasminn eva pade manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14427: pātyate tat padaṃ prāpya bhavaty abhyāsalohitam //MU_3,112.16//
GSP27moksop_u:14428: ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya cittam ākramya cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:14429: viśokaṃ padam āśritya nirāśaṅkas sthiro bhava //MU_3,112.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14430: bhavabhāvanayā bhagnaṃ manasaiva na cen manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14431: balād uttāryate rāma tad upāyo 'sti netaraḥ //MU_3,112.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14432: mana eva samarthaṃ vai manaso dṛḍhanigrahe /
GSP27moksop_u:14433: arājā kas samarthas syād rājño rāghava nigrahe //MU_3,112.19//
GSP27moksop_u:14435: āvartair uhyamānānāṃ dūraṃ svamana eva nauḥ //MU_3,112.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14437: unmocito na yenātmā nāsāv anyena mokṣyate //MU_3,112.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14439: tāṃ tāṃ pariharet prājñas tato 'vidyākṣayo bhavet //MU_3,112.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14441: bhāvābhāvau tatas tyaktvā nirvikalpas sukhī bhava //MU_3,112.23//
GSP27moksop_u:14443: eṣa eva manonāśas tv avidyānāśa ucyate //MU_3,112.24//
GSP27moksop_u:14444: yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tatrāsaṃvedanaṃ varam /
GSP27moksop_u:14445: asaṃvittis tu nirvāṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃvedanād bhavet //MU_3,112.25//
GSP27moksop_u:14446: svenaiva tat prayatnena puṃsas sampadyate kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:14447: bhāvasyābhāvanaṃ bhūtyai tat tasmān nityam āharet //MU_3,112.26//
GSP27moksop_u:14448: rāgādayo ye manasepsitās te buddhvaiva tāṃs tāṃs tvam avastubhūtān /
GSP27moksop_u:14449: tyaktvā tadāsthāṅkuram astabījaṃ mā harṣaśokau samupaiṣi tṛptaḥ //MU_3,112.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14453: eṣā hi vāsanā nityam asaty eva yad utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:14457: mā bhavājño bhava prājñas samyag rāma vicāraya /
GSP27moksop_u:14458: nāsty evendur dvitīyaḥ khe bhrāntyā saṃlakṣyate mudhā //MU_3,113.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14459: nātmatattvād ṛte kiñcid vidyate vastv avastu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:14462: nitye tate site śuddhe mā samāropayātmani //MU_3,113.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14463: nāsi kartā kim etāsu kriyāsu mamatā tava /
GSP27moksop_u:14464: ekasmin vidyamāne hi kiṃ kena kriyate katham //MU_3,113.6//
GSP27moksop_u:14465: mā cākartā bhava prājña kim akartṛtayeha te /
GSP27moksop_u:14466: sādhyaṃ sādhyam upādeyaṃ tasmāt svastho bhavānagha //MU_3,113.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14467: kartā saṃs tvam asaktatvād bhavākartā raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:14469: satyaṃ cet syād upādeyaṃ mithyā syād dheyam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:14472: tatra kās tāḥ kathaṃ rāma heyopādeyadṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,113.10//
GSP27moksop_u:14474: eṣā hy avidyamānaiva satīva sphāratāṃ gatā //MU_3,113.11//
GSP27moksop_u:14483: kvacid vakrā kvacid ṛjvī dīrghā kharvā sthirā calā /
GSP27moksop_u:14494: lalanā cañcalā kṣuddhā tṛṣṇā jihveva bhoginaḥ //MU_3,113.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14499: yatnād gṛhītvā dahati bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14510: rātrir vatsaravad dīrghā bhavaty asyāḥ prasādataḥ //MU_3,113.29//
GSP27moksop_u:14515: sanitambastanā citre na strī strīdharmiṇī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14520: viḍambayati tān mugdhamṛgān eva na mānuṣān //MU_3,113.34//
GSP27moksop_u:14523: ananyā cetanasyāpi nūnam anyeva ca sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:14533: jvāleva dṛśyate vṛddhitatparā na ca vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:14535: naṣṭā dīpaśikhevaiṣā na jāne kveha gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14543: manojñam api satyaṃ ca dṛśyate sad asattayā /
GSP27moksop_u:14544: amanojñam asatyaṃ ca dṛśyate 'sac ca sattayā //MU_3,113.46//
GSP27moksop_u:14545: anayopahate tv asmiṃś citrāś cetasi vibhramāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14548: ākrāmati manaḥ kṣipraṃ vihagaṃ vāgurā yathā //MU_3,113.48//
GSP27moksop_u:14552: sudhā sārdram api kṣipraṃ pravṛddhā bimbam aindavam //MU_3,113.50//
GSP27moksop_u:14554: sthāṇavas samprayacchanti mūkam apy eti yad dhiyā //MU_3,113.51//
GSP27moksop_u:14556: asyāḥ prasādād dṛśyante sarpā jagati dṛṣṭibhiḥ //MU_3,113.52//
GSP27moksop_u:14559: ādīrghaḥ kṣaṇatām eti kālas seṣṭā yathā niśā /
GSP27moksop_u:14561: na tad asti na yan nāma na karotīyam uddhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:14562: asyās tv akiñcanāyās tu śaktatāṃ paśya rāghava //MU_3,113.55//
GSP27moksop_u:14572: deham apy avijānantyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.60//
GSP27moksop_u:14583: puruṣasya na yā śaktā soḍhum īkṣitam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:14585: na yasyāś cetanaivāsti yāpy anaṣṭaiva naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14588: iyaṃ prabho vigalati kena vāsanā manoguhānilayanibaddhabhāvanā //MU_3,113.68//
GSP27moksop_u:14593: mahad āndhyam idaṃ brahman kathaṃ nāma vinaśyati //MU_3,114.1//
GSP27moksop_u:14599: avidyā yāvad asyās tu notpannā kṣayakāriṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:14603: dṛṣṭe sarvagate deve svayam eva vilīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14614: yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ sāvidyā kṣīyate ca sā /
GSP27moksop_u:14618: yac cittattvam anākhyeyaṃ sa ātmā parameśvaraḥ //MU_3,114.12//
GSP27moksop_u:14621: sarvaṃ ca khalv idaṃ brahma nityaṃ cidghanam akṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:14622: kalpanānyā manonāmnī vidyate na hi kācana //MU_3,114.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14623: na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:14624: na ca bhāvavikārāṇāṃ sattā kvacana vidyate //MU_3,114.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14627: asmin nitye tate śuddhe cinmātre nirupadrave /
GSP27moksop_u:14630: cic cetyaṃ svayam amlānā sā mlānā tan manas smṛtam //MU_3,114.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14633: ekasmin vitate śānte yā na kiñcana vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14639: nāhaṃ brahmeti saṅkalpāt sudṛḍhād badhyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14640: sarvaṃ brahmeti saṅkalpāt sudṛḍhān mucyate punaḥ //MU_3,114.23//
GSP27moksop_u:14641: saṅkalpaḥ paramo bandhas tv asaṅkalpo vimuktatā /
GSP27moksop_u:14653: nāhaṃ duḥkhī na me dehaḥ ko bandho 'syātmanaś citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14655: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na cāsthīni dehād anyaḥ paro hy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:14659: kalpyate hi yathā vyomnaḥ kālimeti svabhāvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14665: tad idaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ brahman nīlatvaṃ nabhaso vada //MU_3,114.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14667: na rāma nīlatā vyomnaś śūnyasya guṇavat sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:14674: vastu svabhāvāt tad vyomnaḥ kārṣṇyam ity avalokyate //MU_3,114.39//
GSP27moksop_u:14676: na kālimeti bodhas syād avidyātimire tathā //MU_3,114.40//
GSP27moksop_u:14677: asaṅkalpo hy avidyāyā nigrahaḥ kathito budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14681: naṣṭo 'ham iti saṅkalpād yathā duḥkhena naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14683: tathā sammūḍhasaṅkalpān mūḍhatām eti vai punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14690: kṣaṇāt sampādayanty etā rājājñām iva mantriṇaḥ //MU_3,114.47//
GSP27moksop_u:14691: tasmān mano'nusandhānaṃ bhāveṣu na karoti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14693: yad ādāv eva nāstīdaṃ tad adyāpi na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14694: yad idaṃ bhāti tad brahma śāntam ekam aniṅganam //MU_3,114.49//
GSP27moksop_u:14697: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya yatnād paramayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:14701: mama putrā mama dhanam ahaṃ so 'yam idaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:14705: paramārthena tattvajña mamāham idam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:14706: ātmatattvād ṛte manye na kadācana kiñcana //MU_3,114.55//
GSP27moksop_u:14711: sādridyūrvīnadī seyaṃ yāvidyā jñasya rāma sā /
GSP27moksop_u:14712: nāvidyā tasya tad brahma sve mahimni vyavasthitam //MU_3,114.58//
GSP27moksop_u:14714: jñena tv ekaiva nirṇītā brahmadṛṣṭir akṛtrimā //MU_3,114.59//
GSP27moksop_u:14715: mā bhavājño bhava jñas tvaṃ jahi saṃsāravāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14716: anātmany ātmabhāvena kim anya iva rodiṣi //MU_3,114.60//
GSP27moksop_u:14717: kas tavāyaṃ jaḍo mūko deho bhavati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:14733: saṃsāravāsanā ceto yadi nāma na pūrayet /
GSP27moksop_u:14737: anayā vedhitaṃ ceto bisatantāv api kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:14739: anayopahate citte rājya eva hi saṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14740: tās tā daśā jano yāti yā na yogyāś śvapākinaḥ //MU_3,114.72//
GSP27moksop_u:14745: vigatakautukasaṅgasamiddhayā yadi karoṣi sadaiva hi līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:14746: varadhiyā jagati prakṛtikriyās tad asi kena mahān upamīyase //MU_3,114.75//
GSP27moksop_u:14757: aho nu citraṃ padmotthair baddhās tantubhir adrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14759: idaṃ tad vajratāṃ yātaṃ rūpam asmiñ jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:14760: avidyayāpi yan nāma sad evāsad iva sthitam //MU_3,115.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14763: anyac ca saṃśayo 'yaṃ me mahātman hṛdi vartate /
GSP27moksop_u:14764: lavaṇo 'sau mahābhāgaḥ kiṃ tām āpadam āptavān //MU_3,115.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14767: lavaṇasya tathā dattvā tām āpadam anuttamām /
GSP27moksop_u:14768: kiṃ gataś cañcalārambhaḥ kaś cāsāv aindrajālikaḥ //MU_3,115.9//
GSP27moksop_u:14774: ceto hi karmabhāg dehe nānākāraṃ śarīradhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:14780: aprabuddham bhaved yāvan nidrāntaṃ tāvad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:14781: sambhramaṃ paśyati svapne na prabuddhaḥ kadācana //MU_3,115.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14787: karmātmeti ca yaḥ proktas sa dehī duḥkhakovidaḥ //MU_3,115.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14788: jaḍo deho na duḥkhārho duḥkhī jīvo 'vicārataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14794: udeti rauti hanty atti yāti valgati nandati /
GSP27moksop_u:14795: mana eva śarīre 'smin na śarīraṃ kadācana //MU_3,115.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14796: yathā gṛhapatir gehe rathe vā sārathir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14797: yathā bhujaṅgo bhastrāyāṃ śarīre 'smiṃs tathā manaḥ //MU_3,115.23//
GSP27moksop_u:14799: sphuraty evaṃ mano dehe sthito deho na cetasi //MU_3,115.24//
GSP27moksop_u:14801: manaḥ kartṛ mano bhoktṛ mānasaṃ viddhi mānavam //MU_3,115.25//
GSP27moksop_u:14802: atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam /
GSP27moksop_u:14804: manaḥ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte śubhaṃ vāśubham eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:14809: ahaṃ tasya kule jātas taṃ yaje manasā makham //MU_3,115.29//
GSP27moksop_u:14810: iti sañcintya manasā kṛtvā sambhāram āditaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14812: ṛtvijaś cārcayām āsa pūjayām āsa sanmunīn /
GSP27moksop_u:14813: devatā vandayām āsa jvālayām āsa pāvakam //MU_3,115.31//
GSP27moksop_u:14818: evaṃ sa lavaṇo rājā rājasūyam avāptavān /
GSP27moksop_u:14819: manasaiva hi puṣṭena yuktas tasya phalena ca //MU_3,115.34//
GSP27moksop_u:14820: ataś cittaṃ naraṃ viddhi bhoktāraṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14821: tad anādāv anāyāse satye yojaya rāghava //MU_3,115.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14822: pūrṇe cetasi sampūrṇaḥ pumān naṣṭe vinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14823: deho 'ham iti yeṣāṃ tu niścayas tair alaṃ budhaiḥ //MU_3,115.36//
GSP27moksop_u:14824: pūrṇe vivekavati cetasi samprabuddhe duḥkhāny alaṃ vigalitāni viviktabuddheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14825: bhāsvatkaraprakaṭite nanu padmaṣaṇḍe saṅkocajāḍyatimirāṇi ciraṃ kṛtāni //MU_3,115.37//
GSP27moksop_u:14832: yadā śāmbarikaḥ kāle samprāpto lāvaṇīṃ sabhām /
GSP27moksop_u:14833: tadāham avasaṃ tatra tat pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavān //MU_3,116.2//
GSP27moksop_u:14834: ahaṃ sabhyais tatas tatra gate śambarakāriṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:14835: kim etad iti yatnena pṛṣṭaś ca lavaṇena ca //MU_3,116.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14836: cintayitvā mayā dṛṣṭvā tatra yat kathitaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14837: śṛṇu tat te pravakṣyāmi rāma śāmbarikehitam //MU_3,116.4//
GSP27moksop_u:14838: rājasūyasya kartāro ye hi te dvādaśābdikam /
GSP27moksop_u:14840: ataś śakreṇa gaganād duḥkhāya lavaṇasya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14844: tasmāt pratyakṣam evaitad rāma nātra sandeho 'sti |
GSP27moksop_u:14845: mano hi vilakṣaṇānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ kartṛ bhoktṛ ca |
GSP27moksop_u:14846: tad eva nighṛṣya saṃśodhya cittaratnam iha himakaṇam ivātapena vilīnatāṃ vivekena nītvā paraṃ śreyaḥ prāpsyasi |
GSP27moksop_u:14849: avidyācittajīvabuddhiśabdānāṃ bhedo nāsti vṛkṣataruśabdayor iveti jñātvā cittam eva vilīnaṃ kuru | (MU_3,116.8)
GSP27moksop_u:14850_0: abhyudite tu cittavimalārkabimbe sakalavikalpoddāmatimirahāriṇi na tad asti rāghava
GSP27moksop_u:14850_1: yan na dṛśyate yan nāsādyate yan nātmīkriyate yan na parityajyate yan na śrīyate
GSP27moksop_u:14852: bhāvarāśis tathā bodhe sarvo yāty ekapiṇḍatām /
GSP27moksop_u:14855: evaṃ manovṛttiparikṣaye sakalasukhaduḥkhānām antaḥ prāpyata iti bhagavatā proktam |
GSP27moksop_u:14856: tat kathaṃ mahātmann aticapalavṛttes svarūpasyāsya manasas sattā bhavati | (MU_3,116.11)
GSP27moksop_u:14859: jñātvā svaśvavāra iva duraśvaṃ manas saṃyamayiṣyasi |
GSP27moksop_u:14860: iha hi tāvad brahmaṇas sarvabhūtānāṃ trividhotpattir iti pūrvam uktam |
GSP27moksop_u:14863: brahmarūpiṇī saṅkalpamayī bhūtvā yad eva saṅkalpayati tad eva paśyati |
GSP27moksop_u:14865: tatra jananamaraṇasukhaduḥkhamohādikaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ kalpayantī kalpān bahūn ārambhamantharaṃ sthitvā svayaṃ vilīyate himakaṇikevātapagatā | (MU_3,116.12)
GSP27moksop_u:14868: punar anyodeti saiva veti bhūyo bhūyo 'nusarantī saṃsāravṛttīs |
GSP27moksop_u:14870: ittham anantā brahmakoṭayo 'smin brahmāṇḍe 'nyeṣu ca samatītā bhaviṣyanti |
GSP27moksop_u:14871: santi cetarā anantā yāsāṃ saṅkhyā na vidyata eva | (MU_3,116.13)
GSP27moksop_u:14872: tatrāsyāṃ dṛṣṭau vartamānāyām īśvarād āgatya jīvo yathā jāyate yayā ca mucyate tac chṛṇu |
GSP27moksop_u:14873: brahmaṇo manaśśaktir utthitā purassthitām ākāśaśaktim avalambya tatrasthapavanānupātinī ghanasaṅkalpatvaṃ gacchati |
GSP27moksop_u:14874: tataḥ punaḥprāptabhūtatanmātrapañcakatām etyāntaḥkaraṇanāmnī satī sūkṣmā prakṛtir bhūtvā gaganapavanasamparkāt prāleyarūpatām upetya śālyoṣadhiṣu viśati |
GSP27moksop_u:14878: tena tu puruṣeṇa jātamātreṇaiva bālyāt prabhṛti vidyāgrahaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ |
GSP27moksop_u:14880: tataḥ kramāt puṃsas taveva camatkṛtir jāyate |
GSP27moksop_u:14882: tādṛgvivekavati saṅkalitābhimāne puṃsi sthite vimalasattvamayāgryajātau saptātmikāvatarati kramaśaś śivāya cetaḥprakāśanakarī nanu yogabhūmiḥ | (MU_3,116.15)
GSP27moksop_u:14892: ete pratipadaṃ baddhamūle svaṃ phalataḥ phalam //MU_3,117.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14900: etasmād aparo moho na bhūto na bhaviṣyati //MU_3,117.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14901: arthād arthāntaraṃ citte yāte madhye hi yā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14906: ajaḍā yat pratapati tat svarūpam iti smṛtam //MU_3,117.10//
GSP27moksop_u:14907: bījajāgrat tathā jāgran mahājāgrat tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:14909: iti saptavidho mohaḥ punar eṣa parasparam /
GSP27moksop_u:14910: śliṣṭo bhavaty anekākhyaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam asya ca //MU_3,117.12//
GSP27moksop_u:14911: prathamaṃ cetanaṃ yat syād anākhyaṃ nirmalaṃ citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14913: bījarūpaṃ sthitaṃ jāgrad bījajāgrat tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14914: eṣā jñapter navāvasthā tvaṃ jāgratsaṃsthitiṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,117.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14915: evaṃ prasūtasya parād ayaṃ cāham idaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:14916: iti yaḥ pratyayas svacchas taj jāgrat prāgabhāvanā //MU_3,117.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14917: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti janmāntaroditaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14918: pīvaraḥ pratyayaḥ proktaṃ mahājāgrad iti sphurat //MU_3,117.16//
GSP27moksop_u:14920: yaj jāgrato manorājyaṃ jāgratsvapnas sa ucyate //MU_3,117.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14922: abhyāsaṃ prāpya jāgrattvaṃ tad anekavidhaṃ bhavet //MU_3,117.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14923: alpakālaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam etan no satyam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:14925: sa svapnaḥ kathitas tasya mahājāgrat sthitaṃ hṛdi /
GSP27moksop_u:14928: yat kṣate vākṣate dehe svapnajāgran mataṃ hi tat //MU_3,117.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14935: jāgratsvapnaś ciraṃ rūḍho jāgrattām eva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14938: tāsām apy antar anyāś ca santy evaṃ saṃsṛtir ghanā //MU_3,117.26//
GSP27moksop_u:14940: sthite tenāyam akhilas sthito mohaś śilāghanaḥ //MU_3,117.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14941: svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ loko mohān mohāntaraṃ vrajet /
GSP27moksop_u:14946: asyās samuttarasi cāruvicāraṇābhir dṛṣṭe prabodhavimale svayam ātmanīti //MU_3,117.30//
GSP27moksop_u:14951: na yayā jñātayā mohapaṅke bhūyo nimajjasi //MU_3,118.1//
GSP27moksop_u:14953: mama tv abhimatā nūnam imā eva śubhapradāḥ //MU_3,118.2//
GSP27moksop_u:14954: avabodhaṃ vidur jñānaṃ tad idaṃ sāptabhūmikam /
GSP27moksop_u:14955: muktis taj jñeyam ity uktā bhūmikā saptakāt param //MU_3,118.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14962: āsām ante sthitā muktis tasyāṃ bhūyo na śocate /
GSP27moksop_u:14963: etāsāṃ bhūmikānāṃ tvam idaṃ nirvacanaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,118.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14964: sthitaḥ kiṃ mūḍha evāsmi prekṣe 'haṃ śāstrasajjanam /
GSP27moksop_u:14979: yat svabhāvaikaniṣṭhatvaṃ sā jñeyā turyagā gatiḥ //MU_3,118.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14982: ye hi nāma mahābhāgās saptamīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14983: ātmārāmā mahātmānas te mahat padam āgatāḥ //MU_3,118.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14985: prākṛtenāryakāryeṇa kiṃcit kurvanti vā na vā //MU_3,118.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14988: ātmārāmatayā tāṃs tās sukhayanti na kāścana /
GSP27moksop_u:14990: bhūmikāsaptakaṃ tv etad dhīmatām eva gocaram /
GSP27moksop_u:14993: sadehā vāpy adehā vā te muktā nātra saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,118.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14994: jñaptir hi granthivicchedas tasmin sati vimuktatā /
GSP27moksop_u:14996: ye tu mohād ghanāt tīrṇā na prāptāḥ pāvanaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:15004: vivekino narā loke caranta iti bhūmiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:15006: te hi dhīrās surājāno daśāsv āsu jayanti te /
GSP27moksop_u:15008: etāsu bhūmiṣu jayanti hi ye mahānto vandyās ta eva hi jitendriyaśātravās te /
GSP27moksop_u:15009: samrāḍ virāḍ api ca yatra tṛṇāyate tat sphāraṃ padaṃ jhagiti te samavāpnuvanti //MU_3,118.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15017: ahambhāvātmaka iti yathāvad brūhi me prabho //MU_3,119.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15020: ahantvam ūrmikātvaṃ ca satī tu na kadācana //MU_3,119.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15021: hema dehy ūrmikātvaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇety udite yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:15022: tad dīyate sormikeṇa tat tad asti na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,119.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15024: evaṃ cet tat prabho 'tra syād ūrmikātvaṃ tu kīdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:15027: rūpaṃ rāghava nīrūpam asataś cen nirūpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:15030: rūpaṃ tad etad evāsyāḥ prekṣitā yan na dṛśyate //MU_3,119.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15032: etāvad eva rūpaṃ yat prekṣyamāṇaṃ na lakṣyate //MU_3,119.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15033: yaś śuktau rajatākāraṃ prekṣate rajatasya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15034: na samprāpnoty aṇum api kaṇaṃ kṣīṇam api kvacit //MU_3,119.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15037: yan nāsti tasya nāstitvaṃ prekṣyamāṇaṃ prakāśate /
GSP27moksop_u:15039: asad eva ca tat kāryakaraṃ bhavati ca sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:15043: nehāsti satyaṃ no mithyā yad yathā pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:15045: sad vā bhavatv asad vāpi sudṛḍhaṃ hṛdaye tu yat /
GSP27moksop_u:15047: paramaiva hi sāvidyā māyaiṣā saṃsṛtir hy asau /
GSP27moksop_u:15049: hemny asti normikāditvam ahantādy asti nātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:15050: ahantvābhāvatas tv evaṃ svacche śānte same pare //MU_3,119.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15051: na sanātanatā kācin na ca kācid viriñcatā /
GSP27moksop_u:15052: na ca brahmāṇḍatā kācin na ca kācit surāditā //MU_3,119.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15053: na lokāntaratā kācin na ca sargāditā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15054: na merutā nāmbaratā na manastā na dehatā //MU_3,119.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15055: na mahābhūtatā kācin na ca kāraṇatā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15059: sarvaṃ śāntaṃ nirālambhaṃ jñam acchaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:15061: na san nāsan na madhyāntaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15065: tathāpi bhūyaḥ kathaya sargaḥ kim avalokyate //MU_3,119.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15067: pare śāntaṃ paraṃ nāma sthitam ittham idantayā /
GSP27moksop_u:15068: neha sargo na sargākhyā kācanāsti kadācana //MU_3,119.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15070: jalaṃ dravatvāt spandīva nisspandaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_3,119.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15071: bhāsvātmanīva kacati na kacac caiva tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:15072: bhāsate kacanaṃ bhāsāṃ paraṃ tv akacanaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,119.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15073: adha ūrdhvaṃ varjayitvā yathābdher udare payaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15074: sphuraty evaṃ pare cittvād idaṃ nāneva tatparam //MU_3,119.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15075: īṣadvidan svayaṃ cittvād anyatām iva paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15076: budhyate sarga ity eva śamāc chāmyati śāśvatam //MU_3,119.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15077: sargas tu paramārthasya sañjñety eva viniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15078: na nāsti nāyam asty antar ambarasya yathāmbaram //MU_3,119.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15084: asaṃvedanam āśāntaṃ paraṃ viddhi na taj jaḍam //MU_3,119.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15089: yad ayaṃ lakṣyate sargas tad brahma brahmaṇi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15090: nabho nabhasi viśrāntaṃ śāntaṃ śānte śivaṃ śive //MU_3,119.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15092: yathā dūram adūraṃ ca tatheśe tadatatkramaḥ //MU_3,119.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15093: asad abhyutthitaṃ viśvaṃ sad apy abhyuditaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:15098: tathā saṃvidi saṃsāras sāro 'sāraś ca bhāsate //MU_3,119.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15099: yāvad vicāradahanena samūladāhaṃ dagdhā na jarjaralateva balād avidyā /
GSP27moksop_u:15100: śākhāpratānagahanā gahanāni tāvan nānāvidhāni sukhaduḥkhavanāni sūte //MU_3,119.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15105: tvam ahantvam avidyāyāś śṛṇu rāghava kīdṛśam //MU_3,120.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15106: lavaṇo 'sau mahīpālas tadā dṛṣṭvā tathā bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:15107: dvitīye divase gantuṃ pravṛttas tāṃ mahāṭavīm //MU_3,120.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15108: yat tad dṛṣṭaṃ mayā duḥkham araṇyānīṃ smarāmi tām /
GSP27moksop_u:15109: cittādarśagatā cittvāt kadācil labhyate ca sā //MU_3,120.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15110: iti niścitya sacivais sa yayau dakṣiṇāpatham /
GSP27moksop_u:15114: athaikasmin pradeśe tāṃ bhittāv iva purogatām /
GSP27moksop_u:15116: sarvatra viharaṃs tāṃs tān vṛttāntān sakalān api /
GSP27moksop_u:15117: dṛṣṭavān dṛṣṭavāṃś caiva jñātavāṃś ca visismaye //MU_3,120.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15118: tān parijñātavāṃś cāsīd vyādhān pukkasajān puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15121: tam eva grāmakaṃ yasmin so 'bhavat puṣṭapukkasaḥ //MU_3,120.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15122: tatrāpaśyaj janāṃs tāṃs tāṃs striyas tās tāḥ kuṭīrikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15123: tān ārāmāñ jalādhārāṃs tāṃs tāṃś ca vasudhātaṭān //MU_3,120.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15124: taṃ cākāṇḍaparibhraṃśaṃ tān vṛkṣāṃs tān vṛtivrajān /
GSP27moksop_u:15126: anyāsu vṛddhāsu sabāṣpanetrāsv ārtyābhiyuktāsu ca varṇayantī /
GSP27moksop_u:15131: kṛtteśunā carmaṇi jīrṇadehāt kathaṃ kva muktā bhavatāsavas te //MU_3,120.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15133: smarāmi guñjāphaladāmahetoḥ puras svavadhvā rasahāsinas te //MU_3,120.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15135: paśyāmi putrasya kadā nu bhūyo bhayaṅkarāṇy āplutivalgitāni //MU_3,120.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15136: na tāni tāmbūlavilāsinīnāṃ mukheṣu śobhalalitāni santi /
GSP27moksop_u:15138: sutāpi nītā saha tena bhartrā yamena yāsyā yamunā samānā /
GSP27moksop_u:15142: hā rājaputrendusamāna kānta santyajya śuddhāntavilāsinīs tāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15143: ratiṃ prayāto 'si mamātmajāyāṃ na sāpi te susthiratām upetā //MU_3,120.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15145: kiṃ nāma tucchaṃ na kṛtaṃ nṛpo 'sau yad yojitaḥ pukkasakanyakāyām //MU_3,120.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15147: ubhau gatāv ekapadena nāśam āśā sahārthena yathā ca hema //MU_3,120.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15151: śokasya vegād anivāryavṛtter nāryas sadaikāyatanaṃ vināthāḥ //MU_3,120.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15153: yat prāṇanaṃ tan maraṇaṃ mahāpad yā syān mṛtir jīvitam uttamaṃ tat //MU_3,120.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15154: janair vihīnasya videśavṛtter duḥkhāny anantāni samullasanti /
GSP27moksop_u:15156: evaṃ lapantīṃ svakalatravṛddhāṃ dāsibhir āśvāsya nṛpas striyaṃ tām /
GSP27moksop_u:15157: papraccha kiṃ vṛttam ihāsi kā ca kā te sutā kaś ca patis taveti //MU_3,120.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15158: uvāca sodbāṣpavilocanātha grāmas tv ayaṃ pukkasaghoṣanāmā /
GSP27moksop_u:15159: ihābhavat pukkasakaḥ patir me babhūva tasyendusamā sutaikā //MU_3,120.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15160: sā daivayogāt patim indutulyam ihāgataṃ daivavaśena bhūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:15161: śūnye viśīrṇaṃ madhukumbham āpa vane varākī karabhī yathaikā //MU_3,120.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15162: sā tena sārdhaṃ suciraṃ sukhāni bhuktvā prasūtā tanayāṃ sutāṃś ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15167: kenacit tv atha kālena grāmake 'smiñ janeśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:15169: mahatānena duḥkhena sarve te grāmakāj janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15170: vinirgatya gatā dūraṃ tatra pañcatvam āgatāḥ //MU_3,121.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15171: tenemā duḥkhabhāginyaś śūnyā vayam iha prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:15175: bhūyo vicārayām āsa tad āścaryam anuttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:15176: bhūyo bhūyaś ca papraccha babhūvāścaryavān ati //MU_3,121.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15179: sthitvā tatra ciraṃ kālaṃ vimṛśya niyater gatīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15180: ājagāma puraṃ paurair vanditaḥ praviveśa ca //MU_3,121.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15181: prātas tatra sabhāsthāne mām apṛcchad asau nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15182: katham eṣa mune svapnaḥ pratyakṣa iti vismitaḥ //MU_3,121.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15183: yathāvastu mayā tasya tattadyuktyā sa tādṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15186: asat sattāṃ nayaty āśu sac cāsattāṃ nayaty alam //MU_3,121.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15188: katham evaṃ vada brahman svapnas satyatvam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15189: bhramabhāra ivaiṣo 'rtho na me lagati cetasi //MU_3,121.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15191: sarvam etad avidyāyāṃ sambhavaty eva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:15194: ciraṃ śīghratvam āyāti yūnas seṣṭeva yāminī //MU_3,121.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15196: asac ca sad ivodeti svapneṣv iva nabhogatiḥ //MU_3,121.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15199: vāsanāvalitaṃ ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:15200: tat tathānubhavaty āśu na sad asti na cāpy asat //MU_3,121.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15204: kṣaṇaḥ kalpatvam āyāti kalpaś ca bhavati kṣaṇaḥ //MU_3,121.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15205: viparyastamatir jantuḥ kām avasthāṃ na vāpatet /
GSP27moksop_u:15211: vṛttaṃ prāk pakkaṇe rājñaḥ kasyacil lavaṇasya yat /
GSP27moksop_u:15212: pratibhātaṃ tad etasya sad vāsad vā manogatam //MU_3,121.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15213: vismaraty api vistīrṇāṃ kriyāṃ cetaḥkṛtāṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15214: tathā kṛtām apy akṛtām iti smarati niścitam //MU_3,121.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15215: tathāpy abhuktavān asmi bhuktavān iti vetti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:15219: atha vā lavaṇenāśu dṛṣṭo yas svapnavibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15222: yathā bahūnāṃ sadṛśaṃ vacanaṃ nāma cānanam //MU_3,121.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15223: tathā svapno 'pi bhavati kālo deśaḥ kriyāpi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15228: tasyās sattvam asattvaṃ ca na san nāsad iti sthitam //MU_3,121.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15229: sat sad eva hi saṃvitter asaṃvitter na sanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:15230: nāvidyā vidyate kiñcit tailādi sikatāsv iva //MU_3,121.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15231: hemnaḥ kiṃ kaṭukatvaṃ tad anyat syād dhematāṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:15233: sambandhas sadṛśānāṃ yas sa sphuṭas so 'nubhūtidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15234: jatukāṣṭhādisambandho yas sa no samayor ataḥ //MU_3,121.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15239: bhāvās tadā vibhānty ete mithas svānubhavasthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:15242: sadṛśe sadṛśaṃ vastu kṣaṇād gatvaikatām alam //MU_3,121.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15243: rūpam āsphārayaty ekam ekatvād eva nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15245: jaḍaṃ jaḍena militaṃ jaḍaṃ sampadyate ghanam /
GSP27moksop_u:15246: na ca cijjaḍayor aikyaṃ vailakṣaṇyāt kvacid bhavet //MU_3,121.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15247: cijjaḍau cet sta ekatra na tau sammilataḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15249: dārupāṣāṇabhedānāṃ na tu hy ete cidātmakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15251: jihvayeva rasas sā ca sajātīyodayā calā /
GSP27moksop_u:15252: aikyaṃ ca viddhi sambandhaṃ nāsty asārasasārayoḥ //MU_3,121.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15258: sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyam anantam iva yat tatam //MU_3,121.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15259: viśvaṃ sanmātram evaitad viddhi tattvavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:15261: pūritaś ciccamatkāro na ca kiñcana pūritam /
GSP27moksop_u:15262: saṅkalpanagarā nṝṇāṃ mithaḥ paśyati no yathā //MU_3,121.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15263: na deśakālabodhāya tathā sargāś citi sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15269: bodhaikatvād ayaṃ sargas sattaivāsad bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:15270: senā mṛtsaṃvidā citrā mṛṇmātram iva mṛṇmayī //MU_3,121.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15271: jalam ekaṃ taraṅgādi dārv ekaṃ sālabhañjikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15273: sambandhe draṣṭṛdṛśyānāṃ madhye draṣṭur hi yad vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15275: deśād deśaṃ gate citte madhye yaś cetaso vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15278: acetanaṃ cājaḍaṃ ca tanmayo bhava sarvadā //MU_3,121.55//
GSP27moksop_u:15279: jaḍatāṃ varjayitvaikāṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ hi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:15280: akṣubdho vāthavā kṣubdhas tanmayo bhava rāghava //MU_3,121.56//
GSP27moksop_u:15282: akṣubdho vāthavā kṣubdhas svasthas tiṣṭha yathāsukham //MU_3,121.57//
GSP27moksop_u:15283: nābhivāñchati na dveṣṭi dehe kiñcit kvacit pumān /
GSP27moksop_u:15286: cittavṛttiṣu mā tiṣṭha tathā tathyātmatāṃ gataḥ //MU_3,121.59//
GSP27moksop_u:15288: tathaiva paśya cittaṃ tvam acittaiva yathātmatā //MU_3,121.60//
GSP27moksop_u:15289: yathā dṛṣadi nāsty ambu yathāmbhasy analas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15290: svātmany evāsti no cittaṃ paramātmani tat kutaḥ //MU_3,121.61//
GSP27moksop_u:15291: prekṣyamāṇaṃ na yat kiñcit tena yat kriyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15292: kṛtaṃ bhavati tan neti matvā cittātigo bhava //MU_3,121.62//
GSP27moksop_u:15296: svastham āssva nirāśaṅkaṃ paṅkeneva kṛto jaḍaḥ //MU_3,121.64//
GSP27moksop_u:15297: cittaṃ nāsty eva me bhūtaṃ mṛtam evādya veti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15299: prekṣāyām asti no cittaṃ tadvihīno 'si tattvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15303: cittaṃ dūre parityajya yo 'si so 'si sthiro bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:15308: suciram api vicāritaṃ na labdhamalam alam ātmani mānasātma kiñcit //MU_3,121.70//
GSP27moksop_u:15312: prathamaṃ jātamātreṇaiva puṃsā kiñcidvikacitabuddhinaiva satsaṅgamapareṇa bhavitavyam |
GSP27moksop_u:15313: anavaratapravāhāpatito 'yam avidyānadīnivahaś śamaśāstrasajjanasamparkād ṛte tarituṃ na śakyate |
GSP27moksop_u:15316: tato vivekavaśato vicāraṇayā samyagjñānenāsamyagvāsanāṃ tyajatas saṃsāravāsanāto manas tanutām eti |
GSP27moksop_u:15317: tena tanumānasīṃ nāma vivekabhūmim avatīrṇo bhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:15319: tadvaśād vāsanā tanutāṃ gatā yadā tadaivāsāv asakta ity ucyate |
GSP27moksop_u:15321: atha tāvad asāv asattve bhāvanātānavam abhyasyati |
GSP27moksop_u:15322: yāvat kurvann api vyavaharann api asatyeṣu saṃsāravastuṣu sthito 'pi |
GSP27moksop_u:15323: svātmany eva kṣīṇamanastvād abhyāsavaśād bāhyaṃ vastu kurvann api na karoti paśyann api na paśyati nālambate tam eva |
GSP27moksop_u:15325: tanuvāsanatvāc ca kevalam ardhasuptaprabuddha iva kartavyaṃ karoti na tu bhāvitamanaskaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:15326: tena yogabhūmim abhāvanīm adhirūḍha ity antarlīnacittaḥ katicit saṃvatsarān abhyasya sarvathaiva kurvann api bāhyapadārthabhāvanāṃ tyajati |
GSP27moksop_u:15332: manye te sarvakāryebhyo vāsanās tanutāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,122.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15334: mā gāś śokaṃ ca harṣaṃ ca tvam ātmā vigatāmayaḥ //MU_3,122.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15335: tvayy ātmani sthite svacche sarvage satatodite /
GSP27moksop_u:15337: abandhur api kasmāt tvaṃ bandhuduḥkhāni śocasi /
GSP27moksop_u:15338: advitīye sthite hy asmin bāndhavāḥ ka ivātmani //MU_3,122.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15343: ghaṭe kapālatāṃ yāte ghaṭākāśo na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15344: yathā tathā śarīre 'smin naṣṭe tvaṃ na vinaśyasi //MU_3,122.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15346: vinaśyati tathā dehe naṣṭe nātmā vinaśyati //MU_3,122.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15347: vāñchaivodeti te kasmād bhrāntir antar nirarthikā /
GSP27moksop_u:15348: advitīyo dvitīyaṃ tat kiṃ vastv ātmābhivāñchatu //MU_3,122.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15349: śravyaṃ spṛśyaṃ tathā dṛśyaṃ ramyaṃ ghreyaṃ ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:15350: na kiñcid asti jagati vyatiriktaṃ yad ātmanaḥ //MU_3,122.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15351: sarvaśaktāv imās tasminn ātmany evākhilās sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15352: śaktayo vitate vyakte ākāśa iva śūnyatāḥ //MU_3,122.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15358: rajjus tāṃ vāsanām etāṃ chinddhi rāghava yatnataḥ //MU_3,122.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15361: āgatā brahmaṇo bhuktvā saṃsāram iha līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:15362: punar brahmaiva saṃsmṛtya brahmaṇy eva vilīyate //MU_3,122.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15365: rekhāvṛndaṃ yathā parṇe vīcijālaṃ yathā jale /
GSP27moksop_u:15368: tasminn eva sthitaṃ tajjaṃ tasmād eva tad eva ca //MU_3,122.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15369: sa eṣa sarvabhūtānām ātmā brahmeti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:15370: tasmiñ jñāte jagaj jñātam ajñāte 'jñātam eva tat //MU_3,122.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15374: yaiṣā śuddhānubhūtir hi so 'yam ātmā cidavyayaḥ //MU_3,122.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15376: svābhoga eva hi jagat pṛthagvat pratibimbati //MU_3,122.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15378: yānty athāvyatirekeṇa buddhās tasmiṃs tadaiva te //MU_3,122.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15382: kiṃ mūrkha iva durbuddhe vikalpair abhibhūyase //MU_3,122.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15384: asamyagdarśino 'py asti na nāśaḥ kim u sanmateḥ //MU_3,122.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15386: cittvaṃ rāma sa vijñeyaḥ puruṣo na śarīrakam //MU_3,122.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15387: śarīre saty asati vā pumān eṣa jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:15388: jño 'py ajño 'pi sthito rāma naṣṭe dehe na naśyati //MU_3,122.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15391: manomargād atītatvād yāsau śūnyam iva sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:15392: cit kathaṃ nāma sā duḥkhais sukhair vā parigṛhyate //MU_3,122.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15393: saṃvidātmā tad asmāt tu viśiṣṭād dehapañjarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:15394: abhyastāṃ vāsanāṃ yāti ṣaṭpadaḥ kham ivāmbujāt //MU_3,122.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15395: asac ced ātmatattvaṃ tad asmiṃs te dehapañjare /
GSP27moksop_u:15396: naṣṭe kiṃ nāma naṣṭaṃ syād rāma yenānuśocasi //MU_3,122.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15397: satyaṃ bhāvaya tena tvaṃ mā moham anubhāvaya /
GSP27moksop_u:15400: svayaṃ jaganti dṛśyante sanmaṇāv iva raśmayaḥ //MU_3,122.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15408: ākāśam eṣā sampannā bhavatām api cetasi //MU_3,122.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15410: cittattvasya svabhāvāt tu tatheyaṃ jāgatī kriyā //MU_3,122.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15411: pūrvaṃ manas samuditaṃ paramātmatattvāt tenātataṃ jagad idaṃ svavikalpajālam /
GSP27moksop_u:15412: śūnyena śūnyam amalena yathāmbareṇa nīlatvam ullasati cārulatābhirāmam //MU_3,122.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15413: saṅkalpasaṅkṣayavaśād galite tu citte saṃsāramohamihikā galitā bhavanti /
GSP27moksop_u:15414: svacchaṃ vibhāti śaradīva kham āśritāyāṃ cinmātram ekam ajam ādyam anantam antaḥ //MU_3,122.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15415: karmātmakaṃ prathamam eva mano 'bhyudeti saṅkalpataḥ kamalajaprakṛtiṃ tad etya /
GSP27moksop_u:15416: nānāvidhaṃ jagad anantam idaṃ tanoti vetāladehakalanām iva mugdhabālaḥ //MU_3,122.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15417: asanmayaṃ sad iva puropalakṣyate punar bhavaty atha parilīyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15418: svayaṃ manaś citi vitataṃ sphuradvapur mahārṇave jalavalayāvalī yathā //MU_3,122.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15422: evaṃ tāvad idaṃ viddhi dṛśyaṃ jagad iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15423: ahaṃ cetyādy anākāraṃ bhrāntimātram asanmayam //MU_3,123.1 (= MT_4,1.2)//
GSP27moksop_u:15424: akartṛkam anaṅgaṃ ca gagane citram utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15428: sadrūpam api niśśūnyaṃ tejas sauram ivāmbare /
GSP27moksop_u:15431: kathārthapratibhānātma na kvacit sthitam asti ca //MU_3,123.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15446: vār budbuda ivābhogi śūnyam antas sphuradvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15448: nīhāra iva vistāri gṛhītaṃ san na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:15454: pare bhūya udety etat tata eveti kiṃ vada //MU_3,123.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15455: evambodhāḥ kim ajñās syur uta tajjñā iti sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:15458: idaṃ bīje 'ṅkura iva dṛśyam āste mahākṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:15459: brūte yaḥ param ajñatvam etat tasyātiśaiśavāt //MU_3,123.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15460: sparśe kiṃ tad asambaddhaṃ katham etad avāstavam /
GSP27moksop_u:15461: viparīto bodha eṣa vaktuś śrotuś ca maurkhyakṛt //MU_3,123.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15462: bījakāle 'ṅkura iva jagad āsta itīha yā /
GSP27moksop_u:15463: buddhis sāsatpralāpārthā mūḍhā śṛṇu kathaṃ kila //MU_3,123.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15467: bījaṃ tad bhavituṃ śaktaṃ svayambhūr jagataḥ katham //MU_3,123.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15470: sat sūkṣmam asadābhāsam asad eva hy ataddṛśām /
GSP27moksop_u:15472: gaganāṅgād api svacche śūnye tatra pare pade /
GSP27moksop_u:15474: nakiñcid yat kathaṃ kiñcit tatrāste vastv avastuni /
GSP27moksop_u:15475: asti cet tat kathaṃ tatra vidyamānaṃ na dṛśyate //MU_3,123.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15476: nakiñcidātmanaḥ kiñcit katham eti kuto 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:15477: śūnyarūpād ghaṭākāśāj jāto 'driḥ kva kutaḥ kadā //MU_3,123.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15478: pratipakṣe kathaṃ kiñcid āste chāyātape yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15479: katham āste tamo bhānau katham āste hime 'nalaḥ //MU_3,123.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15480: merur āste katham aṇau kutaḥ kiñcid anākṛtau /
GSP27moksop_u:15484: deśāntare yac ca narāntare ca buddhyādisarvendriyaśaktyadṛśyam /
GSP27moksop_u:15485: nāsty eva tattadvidhabuddhibodhe nakiñcid ity eva tad ucyate ca //MU_3,123.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15486: kāryasya tat kāraṇatāṃ prayātaṃ vaktīti yas tasya vimūḍhabodhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15487: kair nāma tatkāryam udeti tasmāt svaiḥ kāraṇaughais sahakārirūpaiḥ //MU_3,123.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15489: yad eva tat satyam anādimadhyaṃ jagat tad eva sthitam ity avehi //MU_3,123.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15495: jagadādyaṅkuras tatra yady asti tad asau tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:15498: vandhyākanyā ca dṛṣṭeha na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,124.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15500: mūlakāraṇam evātmā tat svabhāve sthitaṃ tathā //MU_3,124.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15503: atha pṛthvyādayo 'nye vā kuto 'py āgatya kurvate /
GSP27moksop_u:15505: tasmāt pare jagac chāntam āste tat sahakāraṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15506: vinā prasaratīty uktir bālasya na vipaścitaḥ //MU_3,124.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15507: tasmād rāma jagan nāsīn na cāsti na bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15510: tadā brahmedam akhilam iti sad rāma nānyathā //MU_3,124.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15512: aśāntam eva tac citte na śāmyaty eva tad yataḥ //MU_3,124.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15517: idam arkādi pṛthvyādi tathedaṃ vatsarādi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15518: ayaṃ kalpaḥ kṣaṇaś cāyam ime maraṇajanmanī //MU_3,124.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15520: ayaṃ sa sargaprārambho bhāvābhāvakramas tv asau //MU_3,124.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15523: ete ceme pariṇatā ime bhūya upāgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15526: yathā pūrvaṃ sthitaṃ śāntam ity evaṃ kacati svayam //MU_3,124.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15529: svayam antaś camatkāro yas samudgīryate citā /
GSP27moksop_u:15530: tat sargabhānaṃ bhātīdaṃ bhārūpaṃ na ca bhittimat //MU_3,124.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15531: nodyanti na ca naśyanti nāyānti na ca yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15533: ime sargāḥ prasphuranti svatas svātmani nirmale /
GSP27moksop_u:15536: āvartā iva vāmbhodher guṇino vāthavā guṇāḥ //MU_3,124.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15547: smṛtyātmā jāyate sarge smṛtyātmaiva tato jagat //MU_3,125.1 (= MT_4,3.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15551: tatsaṅkalpātma ca jagat smṛtyātmaivam idaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15553: iti sthite 'pi sā rāma tasya pūrvaprajāpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15554: sthitir na sambhavaty eva nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ //MU_3,125.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15556: na sambhavati kiṃ brahman sargādau prāktanī smṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15560: kila nirvāṇam āyātās te 'vaśyaṃ brahmatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,125.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15561: prāktanyāḥ kas smṛtes smartā tasmāt kathaya suvrata /
GSP27moksop_u:15562: smṛtir nirmūlatāṃ yātā smartur muktatayā yataḥ //MU_3,125.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15563: atas smartur abhāve sā smṛtiḥ kodetu kiṃ katham /
GSP27moksop_u:15565: nānubhūte 'nubhūte ca svataś cidvyomni yā smṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15566: sā jagacchrīr iti prauḍhā dṛśyābhāve hi citprabhā //MU_3,125.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15568: yat tad etaj jagad iti svayambhūr iti ca sthitam //MU_3,125.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15573: paramāṇuṃ prati tatas tasyāntas tādṛg eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15575: tatrāpi tādṛgākāram evaṃ praty aṇum ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:15576: dṛśyam ābhāti bhārūpam etad aṅga na vāstavam //MU_3,125.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15577: ity asty anto na saddṛṣṭer asaddṛṣṭeś ca vā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15578: asyās tv abhyuditaṃ buddham abuddhaṃ prati vānagha //MU_3,125.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15579: buddhaṃ pratīdaṃ brahmaiva kevalaṃ śāntam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:15582: tathā koṭisahasrāṇi bhānty anyāny apy aṇāv aṇau //MU_3,125.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15583: yathā stambhe putrikāntas tasyāś cāṅgeṣu putrikā /
GSP27moksop_u:15584: tasyāś ca putrikāsty aṅge tathā trailokyaputrikā //MU_3,125.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15585: na bhinnā na ca saṅkhyeyā yathādrau paramāṇavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15589: yathāṇavo vahanty arkadīptiṣv apsu rajassu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15593: sargas tu sargaśabdārthatayā buddho nayaty adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15594: sa brahmaśabdārthatayā buddhaś śreyo bhavaty alam //MU_3,125.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15595: vijñānātmā śāsitā viśvabījaṃ brahmaivādyaṃ svaṃ cidākāśamātram /
GSP27moksop_u:15596: tasmāj jātaṃ yat tad eveti vedyaṃ budhyasvāntar bodhasambodhamātram //MU_3,125.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15601: tīryate netareṇeha kenacin nāma karmaṇā //MU_3,126.1 (= MT_4,4.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15604: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpaṃ rūpiṇāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:15607: tasmiṃś chinne jagacchākhaś chinnaḥ karmatarur bhavet //MU_3,126.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15608: manas sarvam idaṃ rāma tasminn antaś cikitsite /
GSP27moksop_u:15610: tad etaj jāyate loke mano malalavākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:15611: manaso vyatirekeṇa dehaḥ kva kila dṛśyate //MU_3,126.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15616: mano moham upādatte mriyate jāyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15617: kasyacit tu prasādena badhyate mucyate punaḥ //MU_3,126.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15619: śūnya evāmbare sphāre gandharvāṇāṃ puraṃ yathā //MU_3,126.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15620: manasīdaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ sphāraṃ sphurati cāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15622: yathā tilakaṇe tailaṃ guṇo guṇini vā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15623: yathā dharmiṇi vā dharmas tathedaṃ manasi sthitam //MU_3,126.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15625: mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā tāpe saṃsāraś cittake tathā //MU_3,126.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15626: raśmijālaṃ yathā sūrye yathālokaś ca tejasi /
GSP27moksop_u:15627: yathauṣṇyaṃ citrabhānau vā manasīdaṃ tathā jagat //MU_3,126.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15628: śaityaṃ yathaiva tuhine yathā nabhasi śūnyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:15629: yathā cañcalatā vāyau manasīdaṃ tathā jagat //MU_3,126.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15630: mano jagaj jagad akhilaṃ tathā manaḥ parasparaṃ tv avirahitaṃ sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:15631: tayor dvayor manasi nirantaraṃ kṣate kṣataṃ jagan na tu jagati kṣate manaḥ //MU_3,126.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15636: ayaṃ manasi saṃsāras sphāraḥ katham iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,127.1 (= MT_4,5.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15637: yathāyaṃ manasi sphāra ārambhas sphurati sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:15645: bhogeśvaratvaṃ ca yathā tathedaṃ manasi sthitam //MU_3,127.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15650: śṛṇu rāma purā vṛttaṃ saṃvādaṃ bhṛgukālayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15653: atapyata tapo ghoraṃ kasmiṃścid bhagavān bhṛguḥ //MU_3,127.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15654: tam upāste sma tejasvī bālaḥ putro mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15656: bhṛgur varavane tasmin samādhāv eva saṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15661: triśaṅkur iva rodo'ntar avartata tadā kila //MU_3,127.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15672: manasijeṣuśatāhatam āśaye sa parirudhya manas tadanūśanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15678: ārabdhavān manorājyam idam ekaḥ kilośanāḥ //MU_3,128.1 (= MT_4,6.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15706: latāṅganāgaṇair vyāptam idaṃ tan nandanaṃ vanam //MU_3,128.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15715: iha tāvad imaṃ śakram aham āsanasaṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15718: tenābhivāditas tatra dvitīya iva vai bhṛguḥ //MU_3,128.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15719: atha sādaram utthāya śukraś śakreṇa pūjitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15722: uṣyatāṃ ciram eveha śakra ittham uvāca tam //MU_3,128.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15726: cirataram atulām avāpa tuṣṭiṃ naramatim ujjhitavān alaṃ babhūva //MU_3,128.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15730: iti śukraḥ puraṃ prāpya vaibudhaṃ svena cetasā /
