GSP27moksop_u:15731: visasmāra nijaṃ bhāvaṃ prāktanaṃ vyasanaṃ vinā //MU_3,129.1 (= MT_4,7.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15732: muhūrtam atha viśramya tasya pārśve śacīpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15735: straiṇaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagāmāsau nalinīm iva sārasaḥ //MU_3,129.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15736: tatra tāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ kāntām adhyāgatām asau /
GSP27moksop_u:15741: candrakānta iva jyotsnāṃ śītalāṃ khe vilāsinīm //MU_3,129.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15745: prātar arkanalinyor yā śobhā saiva tayor abhūt //MU_3,129.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15748: petus smaraśarās tasyā mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15753: madanaḥ kṣobhayām āsa pūraḥ kamalinīm iva //MU_3,129.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15754: atha tāṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā śukras saṅkalpitārthabhāk /
GSP27moksop_u:15755: tamas saṅkalpayām āsa saṃhāram iva bhūtakṛt //MU_3,129.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15760: teṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu gateṣv abhimatāṃ diśam /
GSP27moksop_u:15761: tasmāt pradeśād bhūlokaṃ dinānte vihageṣv iva //MU_3,129.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15763: ājagāma bhṛgoḥ putraṃ mayūrī vāridaṃ yathā //MU_3,129.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15765: viveśa bhārgavas tatra kṣīroda iva mādhavaḥ //MU_3,129.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15772: pāhi mām abalāṃ nātha dīnāṃ tvaccharaṇām iha /
GSP27moksop_u:15778: na tathā sukhayaty eṣā cetas tribhuvaneśatā /
GSP27moksop_u:15786: ity uktvā puṣpamṛdvaṅgī sā tasya patitorasi /
GSP27moksop_u:15788: tau dampatī tatra vilāsakāntau vilesatus tāsu vanasthalīṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:15804: bhṛśam ullolatāṃ nītaḥ pramathais saha śāmbhavaiḥ //MU_3,130.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15812: krīḍitaṃ kṛtahāsena rāma tena tayā saha //MU_3,130.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15828: viceratus tayor vyomni nirnīḍau vihagau yathā //MU_3,130.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15831: śālīṃs tān bhuktavān pakvān daśārṇeṣu dvijottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15835: sa tatra vavṛdhe bālas sā tatra vavṛdhe 'ṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:15836: tau pūrvadampatī jātau svarbhraṣṭāv iva bhūtale //MU_3,130.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15840: bhṛṅgekṣaṇā gatā vṛddhiṃ latā varavane yathā //MU_3,130.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15841: rājaputrī tato mālā pūjayām āsa śaṅkaram /
GSP27moksop_u:15842: labheyaṃ prāktanaṃ siddhaṃ patim ity aniśaṃ śubhā //MU_3,130.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15844: mālā dadarśa sāraṅgaṃ pitrā saha samāgatam //MU_3,130.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15848: bhartṛtve varayām āsa sā mālā mālavātmajā //MU_3,130.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15851: sa sāraṅgas tayā sārdhaṃ tasmin mālavamaṇḍale /
GSP27moksop_u:15853: atha kālena mahatā cañcalatvāc ca cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15854: apriyatvaṃ mitho yātau dampatī tau vidher vaśāt //MU_3,130.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15865: tataḥ karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā svaṃ paratra śubhāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:15866: aṅgeṣu dhīvaro jātas sa durbhāvavaśāt tadā //MU_3,130.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15867: tatra dhīvarakarmāṇi kurvan sa śaradāṃ śatam /
GSP27moksop_u:15869: duḥkhaṃ saṃsāra ity evaṃ cintayan bhāskaraṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15874: kalpam ekaṃ tu bubhuje tato vaidyādharīṃ purīm //MU_3,130.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15876: tanvā sṛṣṭau pravṛttāyāṃ bhūyo jāto munes sutaḥ //MU_3,130.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15877: tato munīnāṃ samparkāt tapasy ugre vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15879: tatra tasya samutpanno mṛgyāḥ putro narākṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15880: tatsnehena paraṃ mohaṃ punar abhyāyayau kṣaṇāt //MU_3,130.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15881: putrasyāsya dhanaṃ me 'stu guṇāś cāyuś ca śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:15884: kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ tam aharan mṛtyus sarpa ivānilam //MU_3,130.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15892: tapas tepe mahābuddhis sa rāma vigatajvaraḥ //MU_3,130.50//
GSP27moksop_u:15894: sukham atiṣṭhad asau bhṛgunandano varanadīsutaṭe dṛḍhavṛkṣavat //MU_3,130.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15898: iti cintayatas tasya śukrasya pitur agrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15901: kāyas tasya papātorvyāṃ chinnamūla iva drumaḥ //MU_3,131.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15902: manas tu cañcalābhogaṃ tāsu tāsu daśāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15916: darśayantī svakaṃ śūnyaṃ vapur akṣṇor akṛtrimam /
GSP27moksop_u:15927: mahātapastvāc ca bhṛgor na bhuktā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ //MU_3,131.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15928: yamaniyamakṛśīkṛtāṅgayaṣṭeś carati tapas sma bhṛgūdvahasya cetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15929: tanur atha pavanāpanītaraktā ciram aluṭhan mahatīṣu sā śilāsu //MU_3,131.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15936: sīmāntaṃ guṇasīmāyāḥ puṇyaṃ mūrtam iva sthitam //MU_3,132.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15937: apaśyat kevalaṃ kālaṃ kaṅkālaṃ purato mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:15957: prekṣya tac chuṣkakaṅkālam ālānam iva dantinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15960: ciram utkrāntajīvaḥ kiṃ matputro 'yam iti kṣaṇāt //MU_3,132.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15963: akāla eva matputro nītaḥ kim iti kopitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15972: virejur uditair āśāḥ kānakair iva kuṇḍalaiḥ //MU_3,132.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15974: dolām iva samārūḍhāś celuḥ petuś ca ghūrṇitāḥ //MU_3,132.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15977: sa upetya mahābāhuḥ kupitaṃ taṃ mahāmunim /
GSP27moksop_u:15980: hetunāpi na muhyanti kim u hetum vinottamāḥ //MU_3,132.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15984: yo na dagdho 'smi me tasya kiṃ tvaṃ śāpena dhakṣyasi //MU_3,132.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15986: bhuktāni viṣṇuvṛndāni kena śaptā vayaṃ mune //MU_3,132.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15987: bhoktāro hi vayaṃ brahman bhojanaṃ yuṣmadādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15988: svayaṃ niyatir eṣā hi nāvayor etad īhitam //MU_3,132.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15989: svayam ūrdhvaṃ prayāty agnis svayaṃ yānti payāṃsy adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15990: bhoktāraṃ bhojanaṃ yāti sṛṣṭiś cāpy antakaṃ svayam //MU_3,132.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15991: idam itthaṃ mune rūpam asyeha paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15992: svātmani svayam evātmā svata eva vijṛmbhate //MU_3,132.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15993: neha kartā na bhoktāsti dṛṣṭyā naṣṭakalaṅkayā /
GSP27moksop_u:15998: svayam āyānti yāntīha kalpyate hetutā vidheḥ //MU_3,132.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16000: na satye nānṛte yadvat tadvat kālasya sṛṣṭiṣu //MU_3,132.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16003: tena mā gā mune kopam āpadām īdṛśaḥ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16004: yad yathā tat tathaivāstu satyam ālokayākulaḥ //MU_3,132.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16010: sauṣuptīṃ vṛttim āśritya kayācid api nāśayā //MU_3,132.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16011: kva sā jñānamayī dṛṣṭiḥ kva mahattvaṃ kva dhīratā /
GSP27moksop_u:16012: mārge sarvaprasiddhe hi kim andha iva muhyasi //MU_3,132.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16014: avicārya jagadyātrāṃ kiṃ mūrkha iva muhyasi //MU_3,132.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16016: kiṃ mūrkha iva sarvajña mudhā māṃ śaptum arhasi //MU_3,132.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16017: dehinām iha sarveṣāṃ śarīraṃ dvividhaṃ mune /
GSP27moksop_u:16018: kiṃ na jānāsi vā deham ekam anyan mano'bhidham //MU_3,132.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16020: manas tūtthānaniyataṃ kadarthāt kṣīyate na vā //MU_3,132.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16022: kurvatā kiñcana svehāṃ deho 'yaṃ manasā tathā //MU_3,132.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16023: asat saṅkalpya kriyate sac charīraṃ vināśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16025: cittam eveha puruṣas tatkṛtaṃ kṛtam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16027: ayaṃ deha idaṃ netram idam aṅgam idaṃ śiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16029: mano hi jīvaj jīvākhyaṃ niścāyakatayā tu dhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16030: ahaṅkāro 'bhimānitvān nānātvaṃ tv idam eti hi //MU_3,132.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16031: dehavāsanayā cetas tv anyāni svāni ceddhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:16033: ālokayati cet satyaṃ tad asatyamayīṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16035: tan manas tava putrasya samādhau tvayi saṃsthite /
GSP27moksop_u:16038: prayātaṃ vaibudhaṃ sadma nīḍoḍḍīnaḥ khago yathā //MU_3,132.53//
GSP27moksop_u:16044: atha puṇyakṣaye jāte nīhāra iva śārvare //MU_3,132.56//
GSP27moksop_u:16046: sa papāta tayā sākaṃ kālapakvaṃ phalaṃ yathā //MU_3,132.57//
GSP27moksop_u:16047: vaibudhaṃ tat parityajya nabhasy eva śarīrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:16051: sūryavaṃśī nṛpaḥ pauṇḍre sauras sālveṣu daiśikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16052: kalpaṃ vidyādharaś śrīmān dhīmān atha munes sutaḥ //MU_3,132.60//
GSP27moksop_u:16054: vāsudeva iti khyātas samaṅgāyās taṭe sthitaḥ //MU_3,132.61//
GSP27moksop_u:16057: abhūd vindhyavane gopaḥ kirataḥ kekayeṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:16058: sauvīreṣu ca sāmantas traigartaś caiva daiśikaḥ //MU_3,132.63//
GSP27moksop_u:16061: ayaṃ sa putro bhavato bhūtvā mantravidāṃ varaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16063: tenāsau bhagavan brahman vyomni vidyādharo mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:16070: vāsanā tasya babhrāma nirnīḍā vihagī yathā //MU_3,132.69//
GSP27moksop_u:16077: kalpaṃ vidyādharo bhūtvā nadyā adya mahāmune /
GSP27moksop_u:16078: tapaś carati te putras samaṅgāyās taṭe sthitaḥ //MU_3,132.73//
GSP27moksop_u:16080: jagati jaraḍhayoniṣu prayāto gahanatarāsu ca kānanasthalīṣu //MU_3,132.74//
GSP27moksop_u:16085: tīre varataraṅgiṇyās tapas tapati te sutaḥ //MU_3,133.1 (= MT_4,11.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16087: tatra varṣaśatāny aṣṭau saṃsthitas tapasi sthire //MU_3,133.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16095: samaṅgāyās taṭād etya viveśa svatanuṃ bhṛguḥ //MU_3,133.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16103: tvam eva deva jānāsi tvadabhyantaravarti yat /
GSP27moksop_u:16105: matputrasyāsya bhagavan mṛtyuḥ kila na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16106: tenemaṃ mṛtam ālokya jātas sambhramavān aham //MU_3,133.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16107: akṣīṇajīvitaṃ putraṃ kālo me nītavān iti /
GSP27moksop_u:16112: kartavya iti rūḍheyaṃ sāṃsārī bhagavan sthitiḥ //MU_3,133.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16113: idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti yāvajjīvaṃ jagatkramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16115: idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti heyā yasya jagatsthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16117: kevalaṃ tānayīṃ cintām anālokya yadā vayam /
GSP27moksop_u:16118: bhagavan bhavate kṣubdhā yātās smas tena vācyatām //MU_3,133.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16120: samaṅgāyās taṭe tena dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ tanayo mayā //MU_3,133.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16121: manye jagati bhūtānāṃ dve śarīre na sarvaga /
GSP27moksop_u:16122: mana eva śarīraṃ hi yenedaṃ bhāvyate jagat //MU_3,133.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16124: samyag uktaṃ tvayā brahmañ śarīraṃ mana eva naḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16125: karoti dehaṃ saṅkalpya kumbhakāro ghaṭaṃ yathā //MU_3,133.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16126: karoty akṛtam ākāraṃ kṛtaṃ nāśayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:16127: saṅkalpena mano mohād bālo vetālakaṃ yathā //MU_3,133.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16131: puṃso manaś śarīraṃ ca kāyau dvāv iti kathyate //MU_3,133.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16133: na san nāsad iva sphāram uditaṃ netaran mune //MU_3,133.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16138: kṛśo 'tiduḥkhī mūḍho 'ham etāś cānyāś ca bhāvanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16140: mananaṃ kṛtrimaṃ rūpaṃ mamaitan na patāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:16141: iti tattyāgataś śāntaṃ ceto brahma sanātanam //MU_3,133.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16144: vāryātmani same svacche śuddhe svāduni śītale /
GSP27moksop_u:16146: tryaśras taraṅgas svaṃ rūpaṃ bhāvayan sa svabhāvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16150: utthitaṃ ca balād ūrdhvam utthito 'smīti bhāvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16151: tais tair vikalpais tadbhāvaṃ vikalpayati sābhidham //MU_3,133.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16157: bibheti vata dagdho 'smīty āttamīnaś ca kampate //MU_3,133.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16162: na cormayas te jaladher vyatiriktāḥ payorasāt /
GSP27moksop_u:16163: na caikaṃ rūpam eteṣāṃ kiñcit sann apy asanmayam //MU_3,133.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16164: na ca te nyūnadairghyādyā guṇās teṣu ca teṣu te /
GSP27moksop_u:16165: normayas saṃsthitā abdhau na ca tatra na saṃsthitāḥ //MU_3,133.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16167: naṣṭānaṣṭāḥ punar jātā jātājātāḥ punaḥ kṣatāḥ //MU_3,133.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16174: nānāśakti hi nānātvam eti svavapuṣi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:16178: jaḍā jāḍyam upādatte cittvam āyāti cinmayī /
GSP27moksop_u:16184: vyatiriktā na payaso vicitrā vīcayo yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:16185: vyatiriktā na sarveśāt samagrāḥ kalanās tathā //MU_3,133.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16187: yathaikasmiṃ sthitā bīje tathā brahmaṇi śaktayaḥ //MU_3,133.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16195: ūrṇanābhād yathā tantur yathā puṃsas suṣuptatā //MU_3,133.55//
GSP27moksop_u:16199: saṃsārān mokṣam āyāti svālānād iva vāraṇaḥ //MU_3,133.57//
GSP27moksop_u:16200: yad eva bhāvayaty ātmā satataṃ bhāvitas svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:16201: tayaivāpūryate śaktyā śīghram eva mahān api //MU_3,133.58//
GSP27moksop_u:16202: bhāvitā śaktir ātmānam ātmatāṃ nayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:16203: anantam api khaṃ prāvṛṇmihikā mahatī yathā //MU_3,133.59//
GSP27moksop_u:16204: yā śaktir uditā śīghraṃ yāti tanmayatām ajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16205: yām eva tu sthitiṃ yātas tanmayo bhavati drumaḥ //MU_3,133.60//
GSP27moksop_u:16206: na mokṣo mokṣa īśasya na bandho bandha ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16207: bandhamokṣadṛśau loke na jāne protthite kutaḥ //MU_3,133.61//
GSP27moksop_u:16208: nāsya bandho na mokso 'sti tanmayaś caiva lakṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16209: grastaṃ nityam asatyena māyāmayam aho jagat //MU_3,133.62//
GSP27moksop_u:16214: tatsthās tajjāḥ pṛthagrūpās samudrād iva vīcayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16215: tatsthās tajjāḥ pṛthaksthāś ca candrād iva marīcayaḥ //MU_3,133.65//
GSP27moksop_u:16227: kāścit tasmin mahāmbhodhau sphuranty eteṣu binduvat //MU_3,133.71//
GSP27moksop_u:16236: kāścit sthāvaratāṃ yātāḥ kāścid devatvam āgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16237: kāścit puruṣatāṃ prāptāḥ kāścid dānavatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,133.76//
GSP27moksop_u:16238: kāścit sthitā jagati kalpaśatāny analpāḥ kāścid vrajanti paramaṃ puruṣaṃ suśuddhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16239: brahmārṇavāt samuditā laharīvilolāś citsaṃvido hi mananāparanāmavatyaḥ //MU_3,133.77//
GSP27moksop_u:16244: brahmārṇavād abhinnās te satyam etan mṛṣetarat //MU_3,134.1 (= MT_4,12.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16246: na brahma vayam ity antarniścayena hy adhogatāḥ //MU_3,134.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16249: yā etās saṃvido brāhmyo mune naikakalaṅkitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16250: etat tat karmaṇāṃ bījam atha karmaiva viddhi vā //MU_3,134.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16254: tiṣṭhanti parivalganti rudanti ca hasanti ca //MU_3,134.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16257: tā etāḥ kāścid atyacchā yathā hariharādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16271: kāścid ūrdhvād adho yānti tathādhastān mahat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:16272: ūrdhvād ūrdhvataraṃ kāścid adhastāt kāścid apy adhaḥ //MU_3,134.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16279: vividhānāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ latānām iva mādhave //MU_3,135.1 (= MT_4,13.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16282: anye tu kāṣṭhakuḍyābhā mūḍhās sthāvaratāṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16290: akṣīyamāṇaṃ hi mano mohāyaiva na siddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:16291: nīhāra iva sañchādya vetāla iva valgati //MU_3,135.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16293: śarīraṃ mana eveha na tu māṃsamayaṃ mune //MU_3,135.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16296: manaśśarīreṇa tava putro yat kṛtavān mune /
GSP27moksop_u:16297: tad eva prāptavān āśu vayaṃ nātrāparādhinaḥ //MU_3,135.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16298: svayā vāsanayā loko yad yat karma karoti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16299: sa tathaiva tad āpnoti netarasyātra kartṛtā //MU_3,135.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16301: ko nāma bhuvane so 'sti tat kartuṃ yasya śaktatā //MU_3,135.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16305: uttiṣṭha bhagavan yāmo yatra te tanayas sthitaḥ //MU_3,135.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16306: sarvaṃ cittaśarīreṇa bhuktvā śukraḥ kṣaṇād iha /
GSP27moksop_u:16311: ity uktvā bhagavān kālo hasann iva jagadgatīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16312: hastād dhastena jagrāha bhṛgum indum ivāṃśumān //MU_3,135.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16313: aho nu citrā niyater vyavastheti vadañ śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16314: bhagavān bhṛgur uttasthāv udayādrer yathā raviḥ //MU_3,135.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16315: tejonidhī susamasaṅgasamutthitau tau bhātas tadā varavane satamālajāle /
GSP27moksop_u:16316: tulyodayāv iva nabhasy amale vihartum abhyudyatāv ajaladau sakalendusūryau //MU_3,135.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16317: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:16318: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,135.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16323: gantuṃ pravṛttāv avanau samaṅgāsaritas taṭam //MU_3,136.1 (= MT_4,14.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16346: śailarājaśriyaṃ sphītāṃ paśyantau tāv itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16350: dadarśātha taṭe tasyāḥ kasmiṃścit tanayaṃ bhṛguḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16365: pratibimbam agṛhṇantaṃ sitaṃ maṇim iva sthitam //MU_3,136.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16368: tam ālokya bhṛgoḥ putraṃ kālo bhṛgum uvāca ha /
GSP27moksop_u:16369: vākyam abdhidhvaninibhaṃ tava putras tv asāv iti //MU_3,136.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16370: vibudhyatām iti girā samādher virarāma saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16372: unmīlya netre so 'paśyad agre kālabhṛgū prabhū /
GSP27moksop_u:16375: samaṃ samāgatau kāntau viprau hariharāv iva //MU_3,136.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16378: atha śāntatapā nāma sa samaṅgātaṭe dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16382: yo na śāstrair na tapasā na jñānena na vidyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:16383: vinaṣṭo me manomohaḥ kṣīṇo 'sau darśanena vām //MU_3,136.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16385: yathā praharṣayanty etā mahatām eva dṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,136.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16406: na tad asti na yad bhuktaṃ na tad asti na yat kṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:16407: na tad asti na yad dṛṣṭam iṣṭāniṣṭāsu dṛṣṭiṣu //MU_3,136.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16408: jñātaṃ jñātavyam adhunā dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:16409: viśrānto 'smi ciraśrānto gato me sakalo bhramaḥ //MU_3,136.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16411: tāṃ tanuṃ tāvad āśuṣkāṃ śuṣkāṃ vanalatām iva //MU_3,136.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16412: nāsamīhitam astīha na samīhitam asti me /
GSP27moksop_u:16413: niyate racanāṃ draṣṭuṃ kevalaṃ viharāmy aham //MU_3,136.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16414: kim iti subhagam āryasevitaṃ tat sthiram anuyāmi madekabhāvabuddhyā /
GSP27moksop_u:16415: tad alam abhimatāmatair mamāstu prakṛtam imaṃ vyavahāram ācarāmi //MU_3,136.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16419: vicārayantas tattvajñā iti te jāgatīr gatīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16420: samaṅgāyās taṭāt tasmāt praceluś cañcalāṃśavaḥ //MU_3,137.1 (= MT_4,15.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16425: uvāca cedaṃ he tāta tanvī tanur iyaṃ hi sā /
GSP27moksop_u:16435: teṣu teṣu vilāseṣu tāsu tāsu daśāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:16436: tathā tā bhāvanā baddhvā kathaṃ svastho 'si dehaka //MU_3,137.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16440: kaṅkalatām upagatāt tasmād eva bibhemy aham //MU_3,137.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16454: yāti tām api rājyena jāgatena na gacchati //MU_3,137.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16458: tathā vegena calati yathā mūlāni kṛntati //MU_3,137.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16460: nāyaṃ paśyati me dehaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,137.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16462: acittatvaṃ vinā nānyac chreyaḥ paśyāmi jantuṣu //MU_3,137.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16466: diṣṭyā paśyāmy amananāṃ vane tanum imām aham //MU_3,137.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16470: bhṛguṇotpādite kāye tat tasmiṃs tasya kiṃ mune /
GSP27moksop_u:16471: mahān atiśayo jātaḥ paridevanam eva vā //MU_3,137.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16473: śukrasya kalanā rāma yāsau jīvadaśāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:16481: idamprathamam āyātā yadā sā brahmaṇas tanuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16482: tatas tāṃ prati śukreṇa tadā tat paridevitam //MU_3,137.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16484: svāṃ śuśoca tanuṃ śukras svabhāvo hy eṣa dehajaḥ //MU_3,137.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16485: kiṃ tu pradarśitaṃ tena śokavyājena dhīmatām /
GSP27moksop_u:16487: jñasyājñasya ca dehasya yāvajjīvam ayaṃ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16488: lokavad vyavahāro yat saktyāsaktyātha vā sadā //MU_3,137.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16493: yāvac charīraṃ tāvad dhi duḥkhe duḥkhaṃ sukhe sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:16496: mahātmāno hi dṛśyante nūnam antas tu śītalāḥ //MU_3,137.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16497: stambhasya pratibimbāni kṣubhyanti na vapus sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:16498: jñasya karmendriyāṇy eva kṣubhyanti na manas sthiram //MU_3,137.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16510: kuru karmāṇi kāryāṇi nūnaṃ sāmanasi sthitiḥ //MU_3,137.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16513: na tvaṃ bhāveṣu no bhāvās tvayi tāmarasekṣaṇa /
GSP27moksop_u:16516: prabhavasi yadi cetaso mahātmaṃs tad atidhiye mahate sate namas te //MU_3,137.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16519: athākṣipya vacas tasya tanayasya tadā bhṛgoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16520: uvāca bhagavān kālo vaco gambhīranissvanam //MU_3,138.1 (= MT_4,16.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16523: praviśemāṃ tanuṃ sādho nagarīm iva pārthivaḥ //MU_3,138.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16524: kāle pūrvajayā tanvā tapaḥ kṛtvānayā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16530: kalyāṇam astu vāṃ yāmo vayaṃ tv abhimatāṃ diśam /
GSP27moksop_u:16531: na kiñcid api tac cittaṃ yasya nābhimataṃ bhavet //MU_3,138.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16532: ity uktvā muñcatoḥ puṣpaṃ tayos so 'ntaradhīyata /
GSP27moksop_u:16533: taptāṃśur iva rodasyos samam aṃśubhir aṃśumān //MU_3,138.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16534: gate tasmin bhagavati tām uktvā bhavitavyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:16537: viveśa tāṃ tanuṃ bālāṃ sulatām iva mādhavaḥ //MU_3,138.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16539: papāta kampitā tūrṇaṃ chinnamūlā latā yathā //MU_3,138.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16542: sarvanāḍyas tatas tanvyās tasyāḥ pūrṇā virejire /
GSP27moksop_u:16544: nalinī prāvṛṣīvāsau madhāv iva navā latā /
GSP27moksop_u:16545: yadā pūrṇā tadā tasyāḥ prāṇāḥ pallavitā babhuḥ //MU_3,138.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16550: pitātha prāktanīṃ tasyāpy āliliṅga tanuṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16552: bhṛgur dadarśa sasnehaṃ prāktanīṃ tānayīṃ tanum /
GSP27moksop_u:16553: matto jāto 'yam ity āsthā haraty api mahāmatim //MU_3,138.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16554: matputro 'yam iti sneho bhṛgum apy aharat tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:16561: sthitvā tatra muhūrtaṃ tāv athotthāya mahāmatī //MU_3,138.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16563: ko hi nāma jagajjāta ācāraṃ nānutiṣṭhati //MU_3,138.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16564: evaṃ tau kānane tasmin pāvane bhṛgubhārgavau /
GSP27moksop_u:16569: bhṛgur apy ātmano yogye pade 'tiṣṭhad anāmaye //MU_3,138.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16570: śukro 'sau prathamam iti krameṇa jāta etasmāt paramapadād udārakīrtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16571: svenāśu smṛtipadavibhrameṇa paścād evaṃ ca pravilulito daśāntareṣu //MU_3,138.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16576: yathāsya saphalā jātā tathānyasya na kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,139.1 (= MT_4,17.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16578: idamprathamam utpannā sā tadā brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:16580: sarvaiṣaṇānāṃ saṃśāntau śuddhā cittasya yā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16581: tat sattvam ucyate saiṣā vimalā cid udāhṛtā //MU_3,139.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16585: pratyekam apy evam eva dṛṣṭānto 'tra bhṛgos sutaḥ //MU_3,139.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16588: yad idaṃ dṛśyate viśvam evam evākhilaṃ hi tat /
GSP27moksop_u:16589: pratyekam uditaṃ mithyā mithyaivāstam upaiti ca //MU_3,139.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16590: nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcana kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:16593: tathā teṣāṃ sahasrāṇi mitho 'dṛṣṭāni santi hi //MU_3,139.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16595: pṛthag yathā na dṛśyante tathaite saṃsṛtibhramāḥ //MU_3,139.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16597: santi tāni na dṛśyante mitho jñānadṛśaṃ vinā //MU_3,139.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16600: evam eva vayaṃ ceme sampannā raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:16603: na vāstavī vastutas tu saṃsthiteyam avastuni //MU_3,139.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16604: pratyekam uditaṃ viśvam evam eva mudhaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:16613: ekābhāve dvayor nāśas tac ca satyavicāraṇāt //MU_3,139.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16614: śuddhasya pratibhāso hi satyo bhavati cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16618: suvarṇo na sthitiṃ yāti malavaty aṃśuke yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:16619: ekā dṛṣṭis sthitiṃ yāti na mlāne cittake tathā //MU_3,139.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16620: pramārjanād iva maṇes tāmrasyeva ca yuktitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16626: yādṛg jagad idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śukreṇa pitṛmātṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16627: tādṛk tasya sthitaṃ citte mayūrāṇḍe mayūravat //MU_3,139.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16631: svapna evātra dṛṣṭānto dīrghasvapnas tv idaṃ jagat //MU_3,139.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16636: no vāpi yadi tan me tvaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhasi //MU_3,139.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16638: malinaṃ hi mano 'vīryaṃ na mithaś śleṣam arhati /
GSP27moksop_u:16641: ekarūpāṇi toyāni yānty aikyaṃ nābilāni hi //MU_3,139.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16642: śuddhir hi cittasya vivāsanatvam abhūtasaṃvedanarūpam ekam /
GSP27moksop_u:16643: tasyās suṣuptātmapadāt prabudhya tanmātrayuktyā parasaṅgam eti //MU_3,139.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16651: pravṛttibhājo ye jīvās te tanmātrapadaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16655: kecit pṛthak sthitim itāḥ pṛthag eva layaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16656: kecin mithas sammilitā jagatṣaṇḍās sthitāḥ kṛtāḥ //MU_3,140.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16659: mithas sa melanaṃ naiti ghanatāṃ samupāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16660: yad yad yatra yathā rūḍhaṃ tat tat paśyati netarat //MU_3,140.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16663: dehasattā bhṛśaṃ rūḍhā dehābhāvas tu vismṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16672: buddho nivartate jīvo mūḍhas sarge pravartate //MU_3,140.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16673: svabhāvaśuddhir hi yadā tadā maitrī pravartate /
GSP27moksop_u:16675: ajñas suṣuptāt sambuddho jīvaḥ kaścit svasargabhāk /
GSP27moksop_u:16677: sarge sarge pṛthagrūpaṃ santi sargāntarāṇy api /
GSP27moksop_u:16681: kadalyām anyatā nāsti yathā pattraśateṣv api /
GSP27moksop_u:16683: bījāt phalaṃ rasād bhūtvā yathā bījaṃ punar bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:16684: tathā brahma mano bhūtvā bodhād brahma punar bhavet //MU_3,140.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16687: rasasya kāraṇaṃ kiṃ syād iti vaktuṃ na yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16688: svabhāvo nirviśeṣatvāt paraṃ vaktuṃ na yujyate //MU_3,140.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16689: na cāsattā sarvamaye vaktuṃ kvacana śakyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16692: brahmājahan nijavapuḥ phalaṃ bījaṃ ca saṃsthitam //MU_3,140.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16694: na yujyate samīkartuṃ tasmān nāsty upamā śive //MU_3,140.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16695: kham eva jāyate khābhān na ca taj jāyate 'nyadṛk /
GSP27moksop_u:16696: ato na jātaṃ vā jātaṃ viddhi brahmanabho jagat //MU_3,140.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16697: dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā samprapaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:16702: netraṃ nijam ivātmānaṃ dṛśībhūtam aho bhramaḥ //MU_3,140.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16704: dṛśye dṛśyatayādṛṣṭe tv asya lābhas sudūrataḥ //MU_3,140.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16707: draṣṭā draṣṭaiva bhavati na tu spṛśati dṛśyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:16708: dṛśyaṃ ca dṛśyate tena draṣṭā rāma na dṛśyate //MU_3,140.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16709: draṣṭaiva sambhavaty eko na tu dṛśyam ihāsti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:16710: draṣṭā sarvātmako dṛśyaṃ sthitaś cet keva dṛśyatā //MU_3,140.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16711: sarvaśaktimatā rājñā yad yat sampādyate yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:16712: tat tat tathā bhavaty āśu sa evodeti tattayā //MU_3,140.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16715: cidullāsas tathā jīvo bhūtvā bhavati dehakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16718: yathodeti raso bhaumaś cit tathodety ahambhramaiḥ //MU_3,140.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16722: svādayaty evam eṣā cit pṛthak paśyati saṃsṛtīḥ //MU_3,140.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16723: yā yodeti yathā yasyā jīvaśaktes svasaṃsṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16724: tām tāṃ tathaiti sā svāntaś cid bhūtabhuvanasthitim //MU_3,140.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16727: sūkṣmayā parayā dṛṣṭyā svaṃ paśyasy anayā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:16729: bhittau nabhasi pāṣāṇe jvālāyām anile jale /
GSP27moksop_u:16731: śuddhim eti yadā cetas tadā jīvo bhavec citiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16732: śuddhā ca sā sarvagatā tena sammelanaṃ mithaḥ //MU_3,140.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16737: yad yatra cid bhāvayati tat tatrāśu bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:16738: tayā svapne 'pi yad dṛṣṭaṃ tatkāle satyam eva tat //MU_3,140.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16747: kacitaṃ kiñcid eveha vastutas tu na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:16753: antar evākhilaṃ kaścit paśyaty avikalaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:16755: svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ tatra tathā paśyan punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16757: kecit sammīlitāḥ kecid ātmany eva bhrame sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16760: taiḥ kaiścit tat tathā dṛśyam asatsvapnavad āśritam //MU_3,140.57//
GSP27moksop_u:16761: sarvātmatvāt svabhāvasya tad dṛśyaṃ satyam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:16762: sarvago vidyate yatra tatra sarvam udeti hi //MU_3,140.58//
GSP27moksop_u:16764: jīvaṣaṇḍa udety uccais tasyāntar itaro 'pi ca //MU_3,140.59//
GSP27moksop_u:16765: jīvāntar jāyate jīvas tasyāntar api jīvakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16769: vicāro yasya nodeti ko 'haṃ kim idam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:16771: vicāraḥ phalitas tasya vijñeyo yasya sanmateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16773: yathā dehopayuktaṃ hi karoty ārogyam auṣadham /
GSP27moksop_u:16775: viveko 'sti vacasy eva citre 'gnir iva bhāsuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16777: yathā sparśena pavanas sattām āyāti no girā /
GSP27moksop_u:16779: citrāmṛtaṃ nāmṛtam eva viddhi citrānalaṃ nānalam eva viddhi /
GSP27moksop_u:16780: citre 'ṅganā nūnam anaṅganaiva vācā vivekas tv aviveka eva //MU_3,140.67//
GSP27moksop_u:16781: pūrvaṃ vivekena tanutvam eti rāgo 'tha vairaṃ ca samūlam eva /
GSP27moksop_u:16782: paścāt parikṣīyata eva yatra sa pāvanas tatra vivekitāsti //MU_3,140.68//
GSP27moksop_u:16790: jīvabījaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvatra kham iva sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:16791: tena jīvodarajagaty api jīvo 'sty anekadhā //MU_4,1.2 (= MT_4,19.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16794: yo yo rāma yathā grīṣme kalkasvedād bhavet krimiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16795: tattannāma tathā cittvāt khaṃ jīvībhavati svataḥ //MU_4,1.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16796: yathā yathā yatante te jīvakās svātmasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:16798: devān devayajo yakṣayajo yakṣān vrajanti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:16799: brahma brahmayajo yānti yad atucchaṃ tad āśrayet //MU_4,1.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16800: sa śukro bhṛguputro hi nirmalatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16803: saṃvit prāpnoti tadrūpā bhavaty anyā na kācana //MU_4,1.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16806: kathaṃ ca jāgraj jāgrat syāt svapno 'jāgrat kathaṃ bhavet //MU_4,1.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16808: sthirapratyayayuktaṃ yat taj jāgrad iti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16809: asthirapratyayaṃ yat syāt sa svapnas samudāhṛtaḥ //MU_4,1.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16810: jāgrac cet kṣaṇadṛṣṭaṃ syāt svapnaḥ kālāntarasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16811: taj jāgrat svapnatām eti svapno jāgrattvam ṛcchati //MU_4,1.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16814: yad eva sthiratām eti taj jāgrad iti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16815: kṣaṇabhaṅgātmakas svapno yathā bhavati tac chṛṇu //MU_4,1.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16817: tejo vīryaṃ jīvadhātur ityādyabhidham aṅga tat //MU_4,1.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16818: vyavahārī yadā kāyo manasā karmaṇā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:16819: bhavet tadā sa sampanno jīvadhātuḥ prasarpati //MU_4,1.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16820: tasmin prasarpaty aṅgeṣu sparśāt saṃvid udeti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:16826: manasā karmaṇā vācā yadā kṣubhyati no vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16827: śānta ātiṣṭhati svaccho jīvadhātus tadā tv asau //MU_4,1.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16828: samatām āgatair vātaiḥ kṣobhyate na hṛdantare /
GSP27moksop_u:16830: tatas sarati nāṅgeṣu saṃvit kṣubhyati tena no /
GSP27moksop_u:16831: na cekṣaṇādīny āyāti randhrāṇy āyāti no bahiḥ //MU_4,1.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16832: jīvo 'ntar eva sphurati tailasaṃvid yathā tile /
GSP27moksop_u:16833: śītasaṃvid dhima iva snehasaṃvid yathā ghṛte //MU_4,1.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16836: jñātvā cetasy uparate śāmyan vyavaharann api /
GSP27moksop_u:16838: sauṣuptāt somyatāṃ yātaiḥ prāṇais sañcālyate yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:16839: sa jīvadhātus sā saṃvit tataś cittatayoditā //MU_4,1.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16841: paśyati svāntar evāśu sphāraṃ bījam iva drumam //MU_4,1.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16842: jīvadhātur yadā vātaiḥ kiñcit saṅkṣobhyate bhṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:16843: tadohyate 'mbara iva paśyaty ātmani khe gatim //MU_4,1.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16850: sevate vāsanāṃ yāṃ tāṃ so 'ntaḥ paśyati nidritaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16851: pavanaiḥ kṣobhito randhrair bahir akṣādibhir yathā //MU_4,1.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16853: saṃvidānubhavaty āśu sa svapna iti kathyate //MU_4,1.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16855: paripaśyati taj jāgrad ity āhur matimattamāḥ //MU_4,1.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16857: asati jagati naiva bhāvanīyā mṛtihṛtisaṃsṛtidoṣabhāvanī yā //MU_4,1.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16862: mayā rāghava nānyena kenacin nāma hetunā //MU_4,2.1 (= MT_4,20.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16867: mano hi hetuḥ kartṛ syāt kāraṇaṃ ca jagatsthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16869: mano hi puruṣo rāma tan niyojyaṃ śubhe pathi /
GSP27moksop_u:16871: śarīraṃ cec charīraṃ syāt kathaṃ śukro mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16873: tasmāc cittaṃ hi puruṣaś śarīraṃ cittam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:16874: yanmayaṃ ca bhavaty etat tad avāpnoty asaṃśayam //MU_4,2.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16876: yatnāt tadanusandhānaṃ kuru tattāṃ ca yāsyasi //MU_4,2.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16877: abhipatati manassthitiṃ śarīraṃ na tu vapurācaritaṃ manaḥ prayāti /
GSP27moksop_u:16878: abhipatatu tavātra tena satyaṃ subhaga manaḥ prajahātv asatyam anyat //MU_4,2.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16882: bhagavan sarvadharmajña saṃśayo me mahān ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:16883: hṛdi vyāvartate lolaḥ kallola iva sāgare //MU_4,3.1 (= MT_4,21.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:16885: mlānā saṃvin manonāmnī kutaḥ keyam upasthitā //MU_4,3.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16886: yasmād anyan na nāmāsti na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:16887: kutaḥ kīdṛk kathaṃ tasya kalaṅkaḥ kutra vidyate //MU_4,3.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16889: sādhu rāma tvayā proktaṃ jātā te mokṣabhāginī /
GSP27moksop_u:16892: samprāpsyati padaṃ proccair yat prāptaṃ śaṅkarādibhiḥ //MU_4,3.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16893: praśnasyāsya tu te rāma na kālas tava samprati /
GSP27moksop_u:16894: siddhāntaḥ kathyate yatra tatrāyaṃ praśna ucyate //MU_4,3.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16898: prāvṛṣy eva hi kekoktir yuktā śaradi haṃsagīḥ //MU_4,3.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16899: sahajo nīlimā vyomni śobhate prāvṛṣaḥ kṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:16904: karmeti rāma nirṇītaṃ sarvair eva mumukṣubhiḥ //MU_4,3.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16907: yaṃ yaṃ bhāvam upādatte mano mananacañcalam /
GSP27moksop_u:16908: taṃ tam eti ghanāmodamadhyasthaḥ pavano yathā //MU_4,3.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16909: tatas tam eva nirṇīya tam eva ca vikalpayan /
GSP27moksop_u:16910: antas tayā rañjanayā rañjayan svām ahaṅkṛtim //MU_4,3.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16912: tanmayatvaṃ śarīre tu tato buddhīndriyeṣv api //MU_4,3.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16913: yanmayaṃ hi mano rāma dehas tadanu tadvaśāt /
GSP27moksop_u:16914: tattām āyāti gandhāntaḥ pavano gandhatām iva //MU_4,3.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16919: evaṃ hi manasaḥ karma karmabījaṃ manas smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:16922: tathā spando 'sya karmākhyas tathā śākhā vimuñcati //MU_4,3.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16924: tatas tad eva cāsvādam anubhūyāśu badhyate //MU_4,3.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16925: yaṃ yaṃ bhāvam upādatte tat tad vastv iti vindati /
GSP27moksop_u:16926: tac chreyo 'nyat tu nāstīti niścayo 'sya prajāyate //MU_4,3.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16929: manobhiḥ kāpilānāṃ tu pratipattiṃ nijām alam /
GSP27moksop_u:16931: mokṣe tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16935: muktau tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16938: svāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pravivṛṇvanti svair eva niyamabhramaiḥ //MU_4,3.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16943: sarvāsām eva caitāsāṃ rītīnām eka ākaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16944: mano nāma mahābāho maṇīnām iva sāgaraḥ //MU_4,3.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16946: yad yathā manasābhyastam upalabdhaṃ tathaiva tat //MU_4,3.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16947: yas tv akṛtrima ānandas tadarthaṃ prayateta vai /
GSP27moksop_u:16952: dṛśyam ābhāsam ābhogi bandhaṃ mā bhāvayānagha //MU_4,3.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16953: māyaiṣā sā hy avidyaiṣā bhāvanaiṣā bhayāvahā /
GSP27moksop_u:16954: saṃvidas tanmayatvaṃ yat tat karmeti vidur budhāḥ //MU_4,3.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16955: draṣṭur dṛśyaikatānatvaṃ viddhi tvaṃ mohanaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:16961: svayam utpadyate sā ca saṅkalpād vyomavṛkṣavat /
GSP27moksop_u:16968: nāsattā yasya no sattā na sukhaṃ nāpi duḥkhitā //MU_4,3.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16973: sandigdhāyāṃ yathā rajjvāṃ sarpatvaṃ tadvad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:16976: tad evānyatvam ādatte kham ahorātrayor iva //MU_4,3.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16979: śūnya eva kusūle 'ntas siṃho 'stīti bhayaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:16980: śūnya eva śarīre 'ntar baddho 'smīti bhayaṃ tathā //MU_4,3.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16981: yathā śūnye kusūle 'ntaḥ prekṣya siṃho na labhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:16982: tathā saṃsārabandhārhaḥ prekṣitas san na labhyate //MU_4,3.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16983: idaṃ jagad ayaṃ cāham itīyaṃ bhrāntir utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:16984: bālānāṃ śyāmale kāle chāyā vaitālikī yathā //MU_4,3.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16986: kṣaṇād asattām āyānti sattām api punaḥ punaḥ //MU_4,3.52//
GSP27moksop_u:16992: na jñeneha padārtheṣu rūpam ekam udīryate //MU_4,3.55//
GSP27moksop_u:16993: dṛḍhabhāvanayā ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:16995: na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā /
GSP27moksop_u:16996: yad yathā yena nirṇītaṃ tat tathā tena lakṣyate //MU_4,3.57//
GSP27moksop_u:17002: na śakto jaḍabhāvena na tu rāma bhavādṛśaḥ //MU_4,3.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17003: yad yan manomaṇau rāma taveha pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:17004: tad avastv iti nirṇīya mā tenāgaccha rañjanām //MU_4,3.61//
GSP27moksop_u:17005: tad eva satyam iti vāpy abhinnaṃ paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17007: cetasi pratibimbanti ye bhāvās tava rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:17008: rañjayantv anyasaktātman mā te tvāṃ sphaṭikaṃ yathā //MU_4,3.63//
GSP27moksop_u:17009: sphaṭikam apamalaṃ yathā viśanti prakaṭatayā navarañjanā vicitrāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17010: iha hi vimananaṃ tathā viśantu prakaṭatayā bhuvanaiṣaṇā bhavantam //MU_4,3.64//
GSP27moksop_u:17015: mananaṃ tyajato jñatvāt kiñcit parigatātmanaḥ //MU_4,4.1 (= MT_4,22.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:17025: śāmyantīṣv atha tṛṣṇāsu nadīṣv iva ghanātyaye //MU_4,4.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17028: katakaṃ phalam āsādya yathā vāri prasīdati /
GSP27moksop_u:17031: viniryāti mano mohād vihagaḥ pañjarād iva //MU_4,4.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17039: vikasaty amaloddyotā prātar dyaur iva rūpiṇī //MU_4,4.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17048: taraṅgavad amī lokāḥ prayānty āyānti cābhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17051: iti tābhyāṃ samāloke ramate na sa khidyate //MU_4,4.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17052: na jāyate na mriyate kumbhe kumbhanabho yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:17053: bhūṣite dūṣite vāpi dehe tadvad ihātmavān //MU_4,4.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17055: kṣīyate vāsanā sābhre mṛgatṛṣṇā marāv iva //MU_4,4.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17056: ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ veti yāvan na pravicāritam /
GSP27moksop_u:17059: ātmabhāvanayā nedaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17063: sarvaṃ cijjyotir eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17065: aham eveti sarvatra yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17067: ahaṃ sūkṣma iti vyāpī yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17069: advitīyaś cid ity antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17071: deho 'ham iti na prājño yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17072: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimā mama /
GSP27moksop_u:17073: na dvitīyo mamāstīti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17074: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:17075: cittantur aham eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17076: nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha brahmaivāsti na cāsti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:17077: itthaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17078: yan nāma kiñcit trailokye sa eko 'vayavo mama /
GSP27moksop_u:17079: taraṅgo 'bdhāv ivety antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17081: bhāvād uparate syātāṃ sa paśyati sulocanaḥ //MU_4,4.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17082: śocyā pālyā mayaiveyaṃ svaseyaṃ me kanīyasī /
GSP27moksop_u:17083: trilokī pelavety uccair yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_4,4.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17087: ahaṃ na veti vā nūnaṃ paśyan na parihīyate //MU_4,4.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17089: kiṃ me heyaṃ kim ādeyam iti paśyan sadṛṅ naraḥ //MU_4,4.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17090: apratarkyam anābhāsaṃ sanmātram idam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:17093: na bhāvarañjanām eti sa mahātmā maheśvaraḥ //MU_4,4.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17095: yas somyas susamas svasthas taṃ naumi padam āgatam //MU_4,4.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17097: vṛttis samaiva sakalaikagater anantā tasmai namaḥ paramabodhavate śivāya //MU_4,4.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17102: śarīranagarīrājyaṃ kurvann api na lipyate //MU_4,5.1 (= MT_4,23.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:17136: sukhāyaiva na duḥkhāya paramāya hitāya ca //MU_4,5.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17138: jñasya tv iyam anantānāṃ sukhānāṃ kośapālikā //MU_4,5.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17139: na kiñcid asyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ jñasya naṣṭam arindama /
GSP27moksop_u:17141: yad enāṃ jñas samāruhya saṃsāre viharaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:17144: anayaiva hi labhyante teneyaṃ jñasya lābhadā //MU_4,5.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17147: tasyāṃ śarīrapuryāṃ hi rājyaṃ kurvan gatabhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17148: jñas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ svapuryām iva vāsavaḥ //MU_4,5.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17151: ajñānapararāṣṭraṃ ca na randhraṃ tv asya paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:17155: karoty avirataṃ snānaṃ bahir antar api kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:17161: sthitayā saṃsthitaṃ sarvaṃ kiñcin naṣṭaṃ na naṣṭayā /
GSP27moksop_u:17162: yayā puryā mahīpasya sā kathaṃ na sukhāvahā //MU_4,5.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17163: vinaṣṭe dehanagare jñasya naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:17165: vidyamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ vāyuḥ kila spṛśati nāsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:17166: yathā tathaiva dehī svāṃ śarīranagarīm imām //MU_4,5.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17167: atrastha eṣa bhagavān ātmā sarvagato 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:17175: dve kānte tiṣṭhatas tasya pārśvayos satyataikate /
GSP27moksop_u:17178: vālmīkān iva pīṭhasthaḥ pṛṣṭhād arka ivekṣate //MU_4,5.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17184: vijñāyāśvāsito maitrīm eti cauro na śatrutām //MU_4,5.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17188: prekṣyate tadvad eva jñair vyavahāramayī kriyā //MU_4,5.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17190: nīrāgam eva patati tadvat kāryeṣu dhīradhīḥ //MU_4,5.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17191: indriyāṇāṃ na harati prāptam arthaṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:17192: na dadāti tathā prāptaṃ sampūrṇo jño 'vatiṣṭhate //MU_4,5.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17197: ātmany eva na māty antas svātmanātmani jṛmbhate /
GSP27moksop_u:17207: tāḍitasya hi yaḥ paścāt sammānas so 'py anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17209: anārtena hi sammāno bahumāno na budhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:17211: pūrṇas tūpakṛto 'py anyat punar apy abhivāñchati /
GSP27moksop_u:17216: parair abaddho nākrānto na rājyaṃ bahu manyate //MU_4,5.57//
GSP27moksop_u:17217: hastaṃ hastena sampīḍya dantair dantān vicūrṇya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17221: etāvati dharaṇitale subhagās te sādhucetanāḥ puruṣāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17222: puruṣakathāsu ca gaṇyā na jitā ye cetasā svena //MU_4,5.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17224: yasyopaśāntim āgata uditaṃ tam arindamaṃ vande //MU_4,5.61//
GSP27moksop_u:17230: svāśrayaṃ prathamaṃ dehaṃ kṛtaghnā nāśayanti ye /
GSP27moksop_u:17246: tāvan niśīva vetālyo valgante hṛdi vāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17264: vivekaṃ param āśritya buddhyā satyam avekṣya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17265: indriyārīn alaṃ jitvā tīrṇo bhava bhavārṇavāt //MU_4,6.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17266: asaty eva śarīre 'smin sukhaduḥkheṣv asatsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17268: ayam aham iti niścayo vṛthā yas tam alam apāsya mahāmate subuddhyā /
GSP27moksop_u:17269: yad itarad avalambya tat padaṃ tvaṃ vraja piba bhuṅkṣva na badhyase 'manaskaḥ //MU_4,6.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17283: śrutvā rāghava tat paścād yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara //MU_4,7.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17318: tān apy antaram āsādya jaghnur gīrvāṇanāyakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17322: devās tān api tasyāśu jaghnus tena sa kopavān /
GSP27moksop_u:17324: tatrāsya māyābhītās te surā antardhim āyayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17328: vihṛtya kupitas tatra labdham āhṛtya śambaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17331: devās svargaṃ parityajya dikṣu jagmur adarśanam //MU_4,7.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17333: kriyante yatnatas tāṃs tāñ jaghnur yatnaparās surāḥ //MU_4,7.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17334: yāvad udvegam āpannaś śambaraḥ kopavān bhṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:17335: tārṇo 'bhi vātam anala iva jajvāla cocchvasan //MU_4,7.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17336: trailokyam api cānviṣya na devāṃl labdhavān atha /
GSP27moksop_u:17338: sasarja māyayā ghorān asurāṃs trīn mahābalān /
GSP27moksop_u:17342: dāmā vyālaḥ kaṭaś ceti nāmabhiḥ parilāñchitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17344: abhāvāt karmaṇāṃ te ca prāktanānām avāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17348: pāramparyeṇa te hy atra kākatālīyavad bhaṭāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17350: ardhasuptā yathā bālās svāṅgair iṅganti kevalam /
GSP27moksop_u:17351: vāsanātmābhimānābhyāṃ hīnās te tadvad eva hi //MU_4,7.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17352: nābhipātaṃ na cāpātaṃ vidus te na palāyanam /
GSP27moksop_u:17353: na jīvitaṃ na maraṇaṃ na raṇaṃ ca jayājayau //MU_4,7.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17359: tato raṇe bibhyati no vidravanti ca na sthirāḥ //MU_4,7.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17360: yadaite na palāyante devair abhihatā api /
GSP27moksop_u:17362: atibalāsuradordrumapālitā mama camūs sthiratām alam eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:17368: senāṃ sampreṣayām āsa bhūtalaṃ devanāśinīm //MU_4,8.1 (= MT_4,26.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:17394: asurān anusasrus tāñ jaladān iva vāyavaḥ //MU_4,8.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17397: te 'nyo'nyaṃ pūrayām āsuś śastrapūrair diśo daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:17504: atha devā viṣaṇṇās te kṣaṇam āśvasya vai yayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17508: praṇamya te surās tasmai tam arthaṃ śambareritam /
GSP27moksop_u:17510: tam ākarṇyākhilaṃ brahmā vicārya ca vicāravit /
GSP27moksop_u:17520: sujayā vo bhaviṣyanti jālalagnāḥ khagā iva //MU_4,9.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17524: vaśyatāṃ yānti te loke rajjubaddhāḥ khagā iva //MU_4,9.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17526: na hṛṣyanti na kupyanti durjayās te mahādhiyaḥ //MU_4,9.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17528: mahān api bahujño 'pi sa bālenāpi jīyate //MU_4,9.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17529: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ me tad ity ākalitakalpanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17530: āpadāṃ pātratām eti payasām iva sāgaraḥ //MU_4,9.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17532: sa sarvajño 'pi sarvatra parāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ gataḥ //MU_4,9.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17535: ātmano vyatiriktaṃ yat kiñcid asti jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:17540: tāvan na nāma jeyā vo maṣakāṇām ivānilāḥ //MU_4,9.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17542: jito bhavaty anyathā tu maṣako 'py amarācalaḥ //MU_4,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17543: vidyate vāsanā yatra tatra cāyāti dīnatā /
GSP27moksop_u:17545: ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamedaṃ cety evam antas svavāsanām /
GSP27moksop_u:17546: yathā dāmādayaś śakra bhāvayanti tathā kuru //MU_4,9.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17547: yā yā janasya vipado bhāvābhāvadaśāś ca yāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17552: tṛṣṇayā badhyate jantus siṃhaś śṛṅkhalayā yathā //MU_4,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17558: vāsanāṃ saviparyāsāṃ yuktyaiva tvaṃ ripoḥ kuru //MU_4,9.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17560: na śastrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na cāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ //MU_4,9.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17569: samaviṣamam idaṃ jagat samagraṃ samupagataṃ sthiratāṃ svavāsanātaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17570: calati ca laharībharo yathābdhāv ata iha saiva cikitsyatāṃ prayātā //MU_4,9.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17574: ity uktvā bhagavān devas tatraivāntardhim āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:17576: surās tv ākarṇya tadvākyaṃ jagmus svām abhito diśam /
GSP27moksop_u:17582: atha daityais saha vyomni taiḥ pātālatalotthitaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17591: yā yopaśāmyati surāsurasiddhasenā māyākṛtā punar udeti rasena saiva //MU_4,10.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17599: āsīj jagat sakalam eva susaṅkaṭāṅgam āvartibhir vividhahetinadīpravāhaiḥ //MU_4,10.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17601: āsīt kṣaṇaṃ jaladhibhiḥ kṣaṇam agnipūraiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dinakaraiḥ kṣaṇam andhakāraiḥ //MU_4,10.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17604: udapatan vasudhātalato 'surā gaganam adritaṭād iva pakṣiṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17605: atibalād apatan vibudhā bhuvi pralayacālitaśailaśilā iva //MU_4,10.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17611: viṣamāśanivarṣaṇaṃ ca te śamam anyo'nyam athāgnivarṣaṇam //MU_4,10.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17613: sasṛjuś ca samaṃ samantataḥ kakubaṅgeṣv iva puṣpavarṣaṇam //MU_4,10.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17615: dāmendraḍimbadahanāḥ pṛthupīṭhapīṭhaiḥ kīrṇāsṛjo nabhasi babhramur ākṣipantaḥ //MU_4,10.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17616: chinnaiś śiraḥkarabhujorubharair bhramadbhir ākāśakośaśalabhair aśivais tadānīm /
GSP27moksop_u:17617: āsīj jagajjaṭharam abhravarair ivograir ābhāskaraṃ sthagitadiktaṭaśailajālam //MU_4,10.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17620: bhrāntaṃ bhṛśaṃ bhramitadiktaṭam adrikūṭair ātmapramāṇaghanahetihatai raṇadbhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17621: kūjadbhir ārtibhir ivograguhaughavātaiḥ krandadbhir āpatitasiṃharavair adabhraiḥ //MU_4,10.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17638: kṛtas sa samaro devais triṃśad varṣāṇi pañca ca //MU_4,11.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17639: varṣāṇi divasān māsān daśāṣṭau pañca sapta ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17648: tadā me jīvitaṃ me 'rtha iti dainyam upāgaman //MU_4,11.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17655: sthiro bhavatu me dehas sukhāyāstu dhanaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:17656: iti baddhadhiyāṃ teṣāṃ dhairyam antardhim āyayau //MU_4,11.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17659: kathaṃ sthirā jagaty asmin bhavema iti cintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:17660: vedhitā dīnatāṃ jagmuḥ padmā iva nirambhasaḥ //MU_4,11.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17663: atha tasmin raṇe bhītyā sāpekṣatvam upāyayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17666: mandaṃ mandaṃ kila bhremuḥ kupitairāvaṇe raṇe //MU_4,11.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17669: atha pramlānasattvās te hantum agragataṃ bhaṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:17670: na śekur indhanakṣīṇā havir dagdhum ivāgnayaḥ //MU_4,11.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17677: taddaityasainyam apatat khād vidrutam itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17699: sarva eva sakalāsu saśastrāḥ pātamātrasamanantaram eva /
GSP27moksop_u:17700: dikṣu nāśam agamann asurendrāḥ pāṃsavo 'mbudhigatāḥ payasīva //MU_4,11.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17704: iti tuṣṭeṣu deveṣu dānaveṣu hateṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17706: jajvāla jvalitaḥ kopī kalpāntāgnir iva jvalan /
GSP27moksop_u:17708: śambarasya bhayād gatvā pātālam atha saptamam /
GSP27moksop_u:17712: cintā iva ghanākārā duhitṝs tu kramād daduḥ //MU_4,12.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17713: tais sārdhaṃ nītavantas te tatra dāmādayo 'vadhim /
GSP27moksop_u:17715: iyaṃ me vanitā ramyā mameyaṃ prabhuteti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17720: na praṇemur vināśāya sāmānyam iva kiṅkaram //MU_4,12.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17725: svayā vāsanayā jātās tathaiva krūrayā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17727: taj janmātha parityajya jātās suhmeṣu vāyasāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17728: tadante gṛdhratāṃ yātās tato 'pi bakatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_4,12.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17730: magadheṣv atha kīṭatvaṃ cakrus te vakrabuddhayaḥ //MU_4,12.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17736: bhūtvā bhūtvā punar naṣṭās taraṅgā jaladhāv iva //MU_4,12.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17737: bhavajaladhigatās te vāsanāvātanunnās tṛṇam iva ciram ūḍhā deharūpais taraṅgaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17738: upaśamam anuyātā rāma nādyāpy anantaṃ parikalaya mahattvaṃ dāruṇaṃ vāsanāyāḥ //MU_4,12.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17742: ataḥ prabodhāya tava vacmi rāma mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:17743: dāmavyālakaṭanyāyo mā te 'stv iti na līlayā //MU_4,13.1 (= MT_4,31.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:17755: ahaṃ na kaścid eveti mārjayitvā sukhī bhava //MU_4,13.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17763: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17764: te hy asantaḥ kathaṃ santas sampannā iti me vada //MU_4,13.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17766: evam etan mahābāho nāsad bhavati hi kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:17767: kadācit kiñcid apy etad bṛhad bhavati vā tanu //MU_4,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17768: kim asat sat sthitaṃ brūhi kiṃ tat sad vāpy asat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:17771: santa eva sthitās santo brahman vayam ime kila /
GSP27moksop_u:17772: dāmādayas tv asanto 'pi vakṣi santas sthitā iti //MU_4,13.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17774: yathā dāmādayo rāma sthitā māyāmayā iha /
GSP27moksop_u:17777: asatyā eva valgāmo yāma āyāma eva ca //MU_4,13.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17778: alīkam eva tvadbhāvo madbhāvo 'līka eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:17780: mṛto bandhur yathā svapne 'py anubhūto 'py asanmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17781: mṛto 'yam iti ca jñaptir bhaved evam idaṃ jagat //MU_4,13.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17782: eṣā hi mūḍhaviṣayā uktir eva na rājate /
GSP27moksop_u:17784: niścayo 'ntaḥ prarūḍho yas sa yatnābhyasanaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:17785: nāśam āyāti loke 'smin na kadācana kasyacit //MU_4,13.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17786: idaṃ jagad asad brahma satyam ity eva vakti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17787: tam unmattam ivonmattā vimūḍhā vihasanty alam //MU_4,13.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17791: tajjño 'jñaś ca na śaknoti śava ākramaṇaṃ yathā //MU_4,13.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17792: brahma sarvaṃ jagad iti vaktuṃ tajjñasya yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:17794: prabuddhaviṣaye hy eṣā rāma vāk pravirājate /
GSP27moksop_u:17795: buddhasyāsmīti rūpeṇa kila nāsty eva kiñcana //MU_4,13.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17796: brahmaivedaṃ paraṃ śāntam ity evānubhavan sudhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17797: apahnavas svānubhūteḥ kartuṃ tasya kva yujyate //MU_4,13.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17804: yo yanmayas tasya tasmin yujyate 'pahnavaḥ katham /
GSP27moksop_u:17806: tasmān neme vayaṃ satyā na ca dāmādayaḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:17807: asatyās te vayaṃ ceme nāsti naḥ khalu sambhavaḥ //MU_4,13.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17810: sarvaṃ sat tac ca niśśūnyaṃ nakiñcid iva saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:17811: tatra vyomni vibhāntīmā nijā bhāso 'ṅga dṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_4,13.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17814: sa ātmānaṃ yathā vetti tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:17816: na satyam api nāsatyam iha tasmāj jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:17817: yad yathā vetti cid rūpaṃ tat tathodety asaṃśayam //MU_4,13.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17819: satyāsatyāḥ kim atrāṅga tān praty api vikalpanā //MU_4,13.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17821: cid udeti yathā yāntas tathā sā tatra bhāty alam //MU_4,13.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17826: yatra prabuddhaṃ cidvyoma tatra dṛśyābhidhā kṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:17827: yatra suptaṃ tu tenaiva tatra mokṣābhidhā kṛtā //MU_4,13.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17828: na ca tat kvacid āsuptaṃ na prabuddhaṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:17829: cidvyoma kevalaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagad ity avagamyatām //MU_4,13.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17830: nirvāṇam eva sargaśrīs sargaśrīr eva nirvṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17832: paramārthe jagad iti rūpaṃ vetti svayaṃ svakam /
GSP27moksop_u:17834: na tat keśoṇḍukaṃ kiñcit sā hi dṛṣṭis tathā sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:17835: nedaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ kiñcid itthaṃ cidvyoma saṃsthitam //MU_4,13.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17836: sarvatra sarvam idam asti yathānubhūtaṃ no kiñcana kvacid ihāsti ca nānubhūtam /
GSP27moksop_u:17837: śāntaṃ sad ekam idam ātatam ittham āste santyaktaśaṅkam apabhedam atas tvam āssva //MU_4,13.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17838: śilodarākāraghanaṃ praśāntam mahācito rūpam idaṃ kham accham /
GSP27moksop_u:17839: naivāsti nāstīti dṛśau kvacit sto yac cāsti tat sādhu tad eva bhāti //MU_4,13.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17848: yadā viyogam eṣyanti śroṣyanti ca nijāṃ kathām /
GSP27moksop_u:17851: svavṛttāntam imaṃ kutra kadā kathaya te katham /
GSP27moksop_u:17867: nāmnādhiṣṭhānam ity etac chrīmat tatra bhaviṣyati //MU_4,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17870: tasmin mūrdhni girer gehaṃ ko 'pi rājā kariṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:17876: tasminn eva tadā kāle tatra rājā bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:17886: sa nṛsiṃho nṛpāmātyaś ślokair viracitām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:17888: sa kaṭaḥ krakaraś śrutvā tāṃ kathāṃ saṃsmṛtātmabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17891: tathaitya svakathāṃ śrutvā paraṃ nirvāṇam eṣyati //MU_4,14.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17895: vihārāt krakaraś ceti mokṣam eṣyanti rāghava //MU_4,14.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17909: svarūpam atyajann eva virūpam iva budhyate //MU_4,14.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17913: śāstreṇāsad idaṃ dṛśyam iti nirvāsanaṃ sthitāḥ //MU_4,14.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17915: yānti śvabhrajalāny āśu nāśubhaṃ nāśayanti te //MU_4,14.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17917: na vināśo bhavaty aṅga gacchatāṃ patatām iva //MU_4,14.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17918: idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād iti buddhimatāṃ matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17920: vetti nityam udārātmā trailokyam api yas tṛṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:17921: taṃ tyajanty āpadas sarvā rasateva jarattṛṇam //MU_4,14.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17923: brāhmam aṇḍam ivākhaṇḍaṃ lokeśāḥ pālayanti tam //MU_4,14.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17924: apy āpadi durantāyāṃ naiva rantavyam akrame /
GSP27moksop_u:17925: rāhur apy akrameṇaiva pibann apy amṛtaṃ mṛtaḥ //MU_4,14.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17927: ye śrayanti na te yānti mohāndhyasya punar vaśam //MU_4,14.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17928: avaśyā vaśyam āyānti yānti sarvāpadaḥ kṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:17929: avaśyaṃ bhavati śreyaḥ kreyaṃ yasya guṇair yaśaḥ //MU_4,14.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17930: yeṣāṃ guṇeṣv asantoṣo 'rāgo yeṣāṃ śrutaṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:17931: saty avyasanino ye ca te narāḥ paśavo 'pare //MU_4,14.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17933: teṣāṃ kṣīrasamudrāṇāṃ nūnaṃ mūrtau sthito hariḥ //MU_4,14.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17941: gītibhir gaganābhoge te jīvanti mṛtāḥ pare //MU_4,14.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17943: yathāśāstram anudvegam ācārāt ko na siddhibhāk //MU_4,14.49//
GSP27moksop_u:17944: yathāśāstraṃ viharatā tvarā kāryā na siddhiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:17950: itaḥ prabhṛti mā bhūyo gamyatām adharād adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17953: kim arthamātrayā kāryam āryāś śāstram avekṣyatām //MU_4,14.54//
GSP27moksop_u:17954: idaṃ bimbam idaṃ nimbam iti matyā vicāryatām /
GSP27moksop_u:17955: svayā parapreraṇayā yāta mā paśavo yathā //MU_4,14.55//
GSP27moksop_u:17965: āyur yaśāṃsi ca guṇāś ca sahaiva lakṣmyā phullanti mādhavalatā iva satphalāya //MU_4,14.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17970: sambhavaty eva tasmāt svaṃ śubhodyogaṃ na santyajet //MU_4,15.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17972: sarasīśānam ārādhya mṛtyur apy upanirjitaḥ //MU_4,15.2 (= MT_4,33.2)//
GSP27moksop_u:17985: na so 'sty atiśayo loke yasyāsti na phalaṃ sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:17990: duḥkhād ṛte nirābādhaṃ sukhaṃ kiñcid avāpyate //MU_4,15.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17991: aśamaḥ paramaṃ brahma śamaś ca paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:17992: yady apy evaṃ tathāpy enaṃ praśamaṃ viddhi śaṅkaram //MU_4,15.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17995: na tapāṃsi na tīrthāni na śāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:17999: adhyātmaviduṣas saṅgāt tasya sā dhīḥ pravartate /
GSP27moksop_u:18003: na cotpannaṃ na caivāsīd dṛśyaṃ na ca bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:18008: idaṃ tattvaṃ tv asattvādi kuto 'tra syāt kathañcana //MU_4,15.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18010: yat tayaiva tad evedaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate //MU_4,15.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18019: ahamādi jagad dṛśyaṃ kila nāsty eva vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18025: pramārjite 'ham ity asmin pade sārthe svayaṃ citā /
GSP27moksop_u:18030: jāḍyam eva sthitiṃ yāti na prākāśyaṃ kathañcana //MU_4,15.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18035: ayaṃ so 'ham iti sphāramohād anyat paraṃ tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18036: anarthabhūtaṃ saṃsāre na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati //MU_4,15.34//
GSP27moksop_u:18037: yat kiñcid idam āyāti sukhaduḥkham alātavat /
GSP27moksop_u:18042: mamedam iti vistīrṇās teṣām śākhās sahasraśaḥ //MU_4,15.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18050: na tantrāṇi na mantrāś ca tasyānāthasya śāntaye //MU_4,15.41//
GSP27moksop_u:18053: bimbaty ahaṅkṛtis tasmāt puṃsaḥ kevātra vācyatā //MU_4,15.42//
GSP27moksop_u:18057: nāhaṃ na ca mamārthaśrīs sukhaduḥkhe kutas sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:18060: ity antar anusandhānād ahaṅkāro na jāyate //MU_4,15.45//
GSP27moksop_u:18061: nāham ātmani nāpy asya dṛśyaśriya iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:18063: ahaṃ hi jagad ity antar heyādeyadṛśoḥ kṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:18067: saśarīro 'śarīraś ca tyakte tasmin kathaṃ bhavet //MU_4,15.48//
GSP27moksop_u:18070: dvau śreṣṭhāv itaras tyājyaś śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmi te //MU_4,15.49//
GSP27moksop_u:18071: ahaṃ sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ paramātmāham acyutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18072: nānyad astīti saṃvid yā paramā sā hy ahaṅkṛtiḥ //MU_4,15.50//
GSP27moksop_u:18074: ahaṅkārābhidhā tv asyāḥ kalpitā na tu vāstavī //MU_4,15.51//
GSP27moksop_u:18076: yadi vā saṃvid eṣāsau dvitīyāhaṅkṛtiḥ parā //MU_4,15.52//
GSP27moksop_u:18078: ahaṅkārābhidhā tv asyāḥ kalpitā na tu vāstavī //MU_4,15.53//
GSP27moksop_u:18080: ahaṅkāras tṛtīyo 'sau laukikas tuccha eva saḥ //MU_4,15.54//
GSP27moksop_u:18081: varjya eṣa durātmāsau śatrur eṣa paras smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18092: tāṃ daśāṃ samanuprāptā yā kathāsv api duḥkhadā //MU_4,15.60//
GSP27moksop_u:18094: tṛtīyāṃ laukikīm etāṃ tyaktvā cittād ahaṅkṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:18095: kimbhāvaḥ puruṣo brahman prāpnuyād ātmane hitam //MU_4,15.61//
GSP27moksop_u:18098: yathā yathā pumāṃs tiṣṭhet param eti tathā tathā //MU_4,15.62//
GSP27moksop_u:18100: tiṣṭhaty abhyeti paramaṃ tat padaṃ puruṣo 'naghaḥ //MU_4,15.63//
GSP27moksop_u:18106: anyan na paramaṃ śreya etad eva paraṃ padam //MU_4,15.66//
GSP27moksop_u:18107: bhāvād ahaṅkṛtiṃ tyaktvā sthūlām etāṃ hi laukikīm /
GSP27moksop_u:18108: tiṣṭhan vyavaharan vāpi na naraḥ prapataty adhaḥ //MU_4,15.67//
GSP27moksop_u:18115: nāhaṃ na nāma mama kiñcid apīti matvā sarvaṃ ca me sakalam apy aham eva veti /
GSP27moksop_u:18116: labdhāspadāṃ manasi saṃvidam evam īḍyāṃ nītvā sthitiṃ param upaiti padaṃ mahātmā //MU_4,15.71//
GSP27moksop_u:18120: atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi dāmādiṣu gateṣv atha /
GSP27moksop_u:18126: dāmādayas te racitā ye mayā māyayāsurāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18127: maurkhyāt tair bhāvitā yuddhe mithyaivāntar ahaṅkṛtiḥ //MU_4,16.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18129: tān athāpy ātmaśāstrajñān savivekān karomy aham //MU_4,16.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18131: nāhaṅkāraṃ prayāsyanti vijeṣyanti ca tān surān //MU_4,16.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18136: bhīmo bhāso druṭa iti nāmabhiḥ parilāñchitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18138: te sma daityā bhuvaṃ prāpya cchādayām āsur ambaram /
GSP27moksop_u:18140: ayudhyanta samaṃ devair api varṣagaṇān bahūn /
GSP27moksop_u:18142: teṣāṃ yāvad udety antar mamedam iti vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:18143: tāvat ko 'yam ahaṃ ceti vicārād yāty asatyatām //MU_4,16.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18144: asac charīraṃ cic chuddhā ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18145: vicārād ittham eteṣāṃ prodagur na bhayādayaḥ //MU_4,16.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18146: asac charīraṃ nāstīdaṃ cic chuddhaivātmani sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:18147: ahaṃ nāma na cānyo 'sti niścityety asurā babhuḥ //MU_4,16.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18152: prabhoḥ kāryam idaṃ kāryam iti saṅgaratatparaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18155: hatā bhuktā kṣatā pluṣṭā svāntraśrīr iva bhoktṛbhiḥ //MU_4,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18160: viṣṇur āśvāsayām āsa tāṃ bhītāṃ devavāhinīm /
GSP27moksop_u:18170: te hi nirvāsanā eva yadā śāntim upāgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18171: tadaiteṣāṃ gatir jātā dīpānām iva śāmyatām //MU_4,16.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18172: tasmād vāsanayā baddhaṃ muktaṃ nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18176: na satyaṃ kiñcid eveha yadbhāvo bhāvayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:18177: nāsty eva bhāvanā tasmād ity etat samyagīkṣaṇam //MU_4,16.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18179: satyāvalokanād yatra vilīnau tat paraṃ padam //MU_4,16.30//
GSP27moksop_u:18180: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ kaḥ kiṃ bhāvayatu kva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:18181: bhāvanā nāma nāsty eva etat tat samyagīkṣaṇam //MU_4,16.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18183: tad eva tadvinirmuktaṃ vimuktam iti kathyate //MU_4,16.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18185: tad evāśu śamaṃ neyaṃ mithyā yakṣa ivotthitaḥ //MU_4,16.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18190: etad rāma purā proktaṃ pitrā kamalajena me /
GSP27moksop_u:18199: jayanti te sadā śūrās sādhavo yair vinirjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:18202: upāya eka evāsti manasas svasya nigrahaḥ //MU_4,17.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18205: kim anyaiś śāstrasandarbhaiḥ śrūyatām idam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:18206: yad yat svādv aṅga tat sarvaṃ dṛśyatāṃ viṣavahnivat //MU_4,17.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18208: te hy aniṣṭāḥ parityājyās sevyamānās sukhāvahāḥ //MU_4,17.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18212: adṛṣṭarāgadveṣā sā śamam eti śanaiḥ param //MU_4,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18217: vṛddhiṃ gate ca saujanye śuklapakṣa ivoḍupe /
GSP27moksop_u:18219: dhṛtāv antar vivṛddhāyāṃ muktāyām iva kīcake /
GSP27moksop_u:18220: sthitāv antaḥ kṛtāsthāyāṃ rucāv iva niśākare //MU_4,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18230: nāśayitvā svam ātmānaṃ sādhayaty artham aiśvaram //MU_4,17.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18236: mano vyoma mano deho mano mitraṃ mano ripuḥ //MU_4,17.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18238: mana ity ucyate seyaṃ vāsanā bhavabhāginī //MU_4,17.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18243: nātmā saṃsārapuruṣo na śarīraṃ na śoṇitam /
GSP27moksop_u:18244: jaḍaṃ sarvaṃ śarīrādi dehī khavad alepakaḥ //MU_4,17.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18245: śarīre kaṇaśaḥ kṛtte nāsty anyad rudhirādikāt /
GSP27moksop_u:18246: nirbhinne kadalīstambhe nāsty anyat pallavād ṛte //MU_4,17.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18247: mano jīvaṃ naraṃ viddhi tad evākāram āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:18249: svavikalpān naras tantūn prasārya racayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:18253: yādṛgvāsanam etat syān manas tādṛk prajāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:18254: janas svapiti yaccittas tat svapne niśi paśyati //MU_4,17.28//
GSP27moksop_u:18261: manasi sphāranairmalye kāluṣyaṃ yāti na sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:18262: tathaiva sphārakāluṣye prasādo yāti na sthitim //MU_4,17.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18265: tyajaty udārāṃ na gatiṃ kṣīṇo 'py atyantam uttamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18267: neha bandho na mokṣo 'sti na badhyo na ca bandhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:18280: brāhmīṃ dṛṣṭim upādatte raṅgaṃ śuklaḥ paṭo yathā //MU_4,17.41//
GSP27moksop_u:18288: manas tiṣṭhati saṃlīnaṃ samprāptaṃ tat padaṃ tadā //MU_4,17.45//
GSP27moksop_u:18289: dṛśyadṛṣṭis sphuṭā yeyaṃ sā hy avaśyam asanmayī /
GSP27moksop_u:18290: tanmayatvaṃ ca manasas svarūpaṃ viddhi netarat //MU_4,17.46//
GSP27moksop_u:18293: ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti vinā bhāvena duḥkhadā /
GSP27moksop_u:18296: jalam eva taraṅgo 'yam ity ekatvāt kila jñatā //MU_4,17.49//
GSP27moksop_u:18300: asanmayavināśe tu kaḥ kleśo vada rāghava //MU_4,17.51//
GSP27moksop_u:18302: dṛśyate paśya tadvat tvaṃ dṛśyapañjaram ātmanaḥ //MU_4,17.52//
GSP27moksop_u:18303: avatsalād yathā bandhos sukhaduḥkhair na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:18305: tad anādi śivaṃ jñānaṃ yan madhyaṃ draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18306: tasmin satye manaś śāntaṃ pāṃsur vāyukṣaye yathā //MU_4,17.54//
GSP27moksop_u:18314: kvāpi gacchati taj jāḍyaṃ viṣaṃ mantrahataṃ yathā //MU_4,17.58//
GSP27moksop_u:18333: vicāraṇāsamadhigatātmadīpake manasy alaṃ vyapagalite ca dhīradhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18334: vilokayan kṣayabhayanīrasā gatīr gatajvaro vilasati dehapattane //MU_4,17.68//
GSP27moksop_u:18339: tan me kathaya he brahman punar bodhābhivṛddhaye //MU_4,18.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18342: na sthitāś cāpy alakṣyatvāc cittattve sṛṣṭayas tathā //MU_4,18.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18344: tathā niraṃśaś cidbhāgas sarvago 'pi na lakṣyate //MU_4,18.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18346: na satyabhūtā nāsatyā tatheyaṃ sṛṣṭir ātmani //MU_4,18.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18347: khādhārair ambudaiḥ khasthair na spṛṣṭaṃ gaganaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:18348: citsthais sargaiś cidādhārair na spṛṣtā cit parā tathā //MU_4,18.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18349: jaladhiṣv eva no mahyāṃ yathāgniḥ pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:18350: tathā puryaṣṭakeṣv eva cin na deheṣu lakṣyate //MU_4,18.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18357: cic cinoti citaṃ cetyaṃ tenedaṃ sthitam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:18358: jñe 'jñe tv anyatvam āyātam anyad astīti kalpanāt //MU_4,18.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18363: nāstam eti na codeti nottiṣṭhati na tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:18364: na ca yāti na cāyāti na ceha na ca neha cit //MU_4,18.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18365: saiṣā cid amalākārā svayam ātmani saṃsthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:18367: tejaḥpuñjair yathā tejaḥ payaḥpūrair yathā payaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18375: puryaṣṭakaṃ spandaśataiḥ karoti na karoti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:18379: dṛḍhorvī prakaṭaṃ tejas sthitimanti jaganti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:18386: yogo bhavaty avirataṃ saṃsthānena navo navaḥ //MU_4,18.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18393: na jahāti svamaryādāṃ kālo yugamayīm imām /
GSP27moksop_u:18399: punaḥ punar vilīyante jāyante ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18401: āyāti yāti paritiṣṭhati rāraṭīti svārthān upārjayati dhāvati janmarāśau /
GSP27moksop_u:18402: unmattavad vihitabhāvanam āhitehā mugdhā kṛtāntavivaśā janatā varākī //MU_4,18.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18407: svabhāvād brahmaṇas sarvāḥ punar āyānti yānti ca //MU_4,19.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18408: svatas sarvam idaṃ jātam anyo'nyaṃ hetutāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:18409: anyo'nyam api naśyac ca svata eva vilīyate //MU_4,19.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18411: tathaivedam asat sac ca cid eva paridṛśyate //MU_4,19.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18412: vyomany eva nirābhāse nidāghāt sarito yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:18415: tathaiva cittvāc ciddhātus sa evāsa iva sthitaḥ //MU_4,19.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18416: na cedaṃ sad asan nedaṃ tatsthātatsthatayā citiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18418: yena śabdaṃ rasaṃ rūpaṃ gandhaṃ jānāsi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:18419: so 'yam ātmā paraṃ brahma sarvam āpūrya saṃsthitaḥ //MU_4,19.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18424: yasmād ātmano vyatirikte vastuni siddhe sati tatrecchā pravartate |
GSP27moksop_u:18425: yatra svātmano vyatiriktaṃ na kiñcid api sambhavati tatrātmā kiṃ nāmābhivāñchatu |
GSP27moksop_u:18428: ata idam īhitam idam anīhitam ity ātmānaṃ na spṛśanti vikalpāḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18429: ato niricchatayāyam ātmā na kiñcid api karoti kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇām ekatvāt |
GSP27moksop_u:18431: na ca niricchasyātmano naiṣkarmyam abhimataṃ dvitīyāyāḥ kalpanāyā asambhavāt |
GSP27moksop_u:18433: nāsi rāmo na cārāmas tvam iyaṃ brahmasaṃsthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18436: puraḥ kṛtvā kṛtvā bahuvidham idaṃ karma tarasā tvayā prāpyaṃ kiṃ tad vada yad ucitaṃ bhūtagaṇakāt /
GSP27moksop_u:18437: akartṛtve cāsthā bhavatu tava māvāñchanamater bhava svasthasvacchas sthitataramatir dhairyajaladhiḥ //MU_4,19.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18438: gatvā sudūram api yatnavatā janena nāsādyate tad iha yena supūrṇateti /
GSP27moksop_u:18439: matveti santyaja padārthagaṇaṃ dhiyā tvaṃ tattvaṃ svam eva paramārthatayā cidātmā //MU_4,19.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18443: evaṃ sthite tajjñānāṃ yad etat kartṛtvaṃ dṛśyate yāgādiṣu vadhādiṣu vā tad asat |
GSP27moksop_u:18446: yo hy antarāsthayā manovṛtter niścaya upādeyatāpratyayo vāsanābhidhānas tat kartṛtvaśabdenocyate | (MU_4,20.2)
GSP27moksop_u:18448: vāsanānurūpaṃ spandate puruṣas spandānurūpaṃ phalam anubhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18451: kurvato 'kurvato vāpi svarge vā narake 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:18452: yādṛgvāsanam etat syān manas tad anubhūyate //MU_4,20.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18453: tasmād ajñātatattvānāṃ puṃsāṃ kurvatām akurvatāṃ ca kartṛtā |
GSP27moksop_u:18455: jñātatattvo hi śithilībhūtavāsanaḥ kurvann api phalaṃ nānusandadhāti |
GSP27moksop_u:18457: samprāptam api phalam ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti nānubhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18459: tena tattvajñaḥ kurvann api na kiñcid api karoti | (MU_4,20.6)
GSP27moksop_u:18460: ajñas tv avayavaspandanam akurvann api sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sarvam eva karmaphalam anubhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18462: mano yat karoti tat kṛtaṃ bhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18463: yan na karoti tan na kṛtaṃ bhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18464: ato mana eva kartṛ na dehaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18466: cittamaya eva cittamātra eva sthita iti | (MU_4,20.8)
GSP27moksop_u:18470: ātmavatāṃ hi tan manaḥ paramam upaśamam āgataṃ mṛgatṛṣṇājalam iva varṣati jalade |
GSP27moksop_u:18473: nānando na nirānando na calaṃ nācalaṃ sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:18474: na san nāsan na caiteṣāṃ madhyaṃ jñamananaṃ viduḥ //MU_4,20.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18475: na vāsanāmaye spandarase gaja iva palvale majjati tajjñaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18476: mūrkhasya mano bhogabhūmim eva paśyati na sattattvam | (MU_4,20.11)
GSP27moksop_u:18478: akurvann api śvabhrapatanaṃ puruṣaś śayyāsanagato 'pi śvabhrapatanavāsanāvāsite cetasi śvabhrapatanaduḥkham anubhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18479: aparas tu kurvann api śvabhrapatanaṃ paramam upaśamam upagatavati manasi śayyāsanasukham anubhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18480: evam ekaśayyāsanagatayor ekaś śvabhrapatanasyākartā kartā sampannaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18481: dvitīyaś śvabhrapatanasya kartāpy akartā sampannaś cittavaśāt |
GSP27moksop_u:18482: tasmād yaccittas tanmayo bhavati puruṣa iti siddhāntaḥ | (MU_4,20.12)
GSP27moksop_u:18483: tena tava kartur akartur vā nityam asaṃsaktaṃ bhavatu cetaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18484: na tad astv ātmatattvavyatiriktaṃ yatra saṃsaktir bhāvyate |
GSP27moksop_u:18485: yat kiñcid idaṃ jagad gataṃ tat sarvaṃ śuddhacittattvāvabhāsam evāvaihi | (MU_4,20.13)
GSP27moksop_u:18486: evambhāvasya jñātajñeyasya puṃso nāyam ātmā sukhaduḥkhānāṃ gamya iti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18487: nātmano vyatiriktā ādhārādheyadṛṣṭayo vidyante iti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18488: nātmano vyatiriktā draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyadṛśo dṛśyante iti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18489: nātmano vyatiriktam īhitam anīhitaṃ vāstīti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18492: yat kiñcid idaṃ tat sarvam aham eveti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18493: sarvatattvāvabhāsakas sarvagaś cijjyotir evāham iti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18494: nāhaṃ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ gamya iti niścaye jāte |
GSP27moksop_u:18495: vigatajvaratayā cittavṛtter līlayaiva tiṣṭhato vyavahāreṣu jñasya saṅkaṭeṣv asaṅkaṭeṣu muditaiva kevalaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanabhāgam alaṅkaroti na cintā | (MU_4,20.14)
GSP27moksop_u:18496: tena jñaḥ kurvann apy akartā sampannaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18498: nāsau pāṇipādādivikṣepasya yatnakṛtasyāpi karmaṇaḥ phalam anubhavati | (MU_4,20.15)
GSP27moksop_u:18499: etan manas sarvakarmaṇāṃ sarvehitānāṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvagatīnāṃ bījaṃ |
GSP27moksop_u:18503: mānasenāpi karmaṇā yatnakṛtenāpi jño nākramyate na vivaśīkriyate na rañjanām upaity avyatiriktatvāt | (MU_4,20.17)
GSP27moksop_u:18504: yathā bālo manasā nagarasya nirmāṇaṃ nirmathanaṃ ca kurvan nagare nirmāṇaṃ manaskṛtam akṛtam eva līlayānubhavati nopādeyatayā |
GSP27moksop_u:18506: nagaranirmathanaṃ ca manaskṛtam akṛtam iva paśyan duḥkham api līlayānubhavann api na duḥkham iti paśyati |
GSP27moksop_u:18507: evam asau paramārthajñaḥ kurvann api na lipyate eveti | (MU_4,20.18)
GSP27moksop_u:18508: sarvabhāveṣūpādeyatāyāṃ kṣīyamāṇāyāṃ jagati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ duḥkhasya |
GSP27moksop_u:18509: na copādeyaṃ kiñcid api sambhavati yad avināśi vyatiriktaṃ vātmanaḥ |
GSP27moksop_u:18510: tasmād ayam ātmā kartāpy akartā bhoktāpy abhoktā tattvataḥ | (MU_4,20.19)
GSP27moksop_u:18512: avaśyakaṃ tad asamyagdarśanamohāt na vastuta iti |
GSP27moksop_u:18515: na mokṣo 'sti na saṃsāras tv asaktamanasām iha /
GSP27moksop_u:18516: saṃsaktamanasāṃ tv antas sarvam asti yathāsthitam //MU_4,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18522: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti na badhyo 'sti na bandhanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18524: saṅkalpitā jagati bandhamatir mudhaiva saṅkalpitā jagati mokṣamatir mudhaiva /
GSP27moksop_u:18525: santyajya sarvam anahaṅkṛtir ātmaniṣṭho dhīro dhiyā vyavaharan bhuvi rāma tiṣṭha //MU_4,20.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18529: bhagavann evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭe pare brahmaṇy eva vidyamāne kuta evāvidyācitrarūpāyās sṛṣṭer āgama iti kathaya mahātman | (MU_4,21.1)
GSP27moksop_u:18532: yasmāt sarvaśakti tat tasmāt sarvaśaktayo brahmaṇi dṛśyante |
GSP27moksop_u:18533: sattvam asattvaṃ dvitvam ekatvam ādyatvam antatvam iti |
GSP27moksop_u:18535: yathā jalarāśau jalarāśaya ullāsapratyullāsair nānākāratāṃ darśayantaḥ prakaṭatāṃ gacchanti |
GSP27moksop_u:18536: tathā cidghana eva cidghanaś citaṃ cinvānas sarvāś śaktīḥ karmamayīr vāṅmayīr manomayīś cinoti bibharti janayati kṣapayati ceti | (MU_4,21.3)
GSP27moksop_u:18537: sarveṣām eva jīvānāṃ sarvāsām abhito dṛśām /
GSP27moksop_u:18539: lokāḥ parād upāyānti tasmin sthitvā viśanty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:18540: tanmayā eva satataṃ taraṅgā iva sāgare //MU_4,21.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18545: kva bhaṅgureyaṃ tajjā padārthaśrīr iti vacanaracanā | (MU_4,21.6)
GSP27moksop_u:18546: yadi cāyam ārambho brahmaṇa āpatitas tad anena tatsadṛśenaiva bhavitavyam |
GSP27moksop_u:18547: yo yasmāj jāyate sa tatsadṛśo bhavati |
GSP27moksop_u:18550: ato nirvikārād yad āgataṃ nirvikāreṇaiva tena bhavitavyam |
GSP27moksop_u:18551: athedaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ced ātmanas tan niṣkalaṅkasya kuta iyaṃ kalaṅkāpattiḥ | (MU_4,21.7)
GSP27moksop_u:18554: brahmaivedaṃ sthitaṃ nānā malam astīha nānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:18555: taraṅgormigaṇair ambhas sindhau sphurati no rajaḥ //MU_4,21.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18557: brahmamātrād ṛte vahnāv auṣṇyamātrād ṛte yathā //MU_4,21.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18559: nirduḥkhaṃ brahma nirdharma tajjaṃ duḥkham idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:18560: aspaṣṭārtham idaṃ brahman na vedmi vacanaṃ tava //MU_4,21.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18562: ity ukte tatra rāmeṇa cintayām āsa cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:18564: paraṃ vikāsam āyātā nāsya tāvad iyaṃ matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18565: kiñcin nirmalatāṃ prāptā prohyate veha vastuni //MU_4,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18568: na kaścit kasyacid doṣo nāsty avidyātmanīty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:18569: yāvan noktaṃ na viśrāntiṃ tāvad yāty eva rāghavaḥ //MU_4,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18570: ardhavyutpannabuddhes tu naitat vaktuṃ hi śobhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:18575: paścāt sarvam idaṃ brahma śuddhas tvam iti bodhayet //MU_4,21.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18579: nāsty avidyāmalam iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ mahātmanaḥ //MU_4,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18585: brahma tu sarvaśakti sarvavyāpi sarvagataṃ sarvehaṃ sarvaṃ ceti | (MU_4,21.23)
GSP27moksop_u:18586: yathendrajālinaḥ paśyasi vicitrarūpāḥ kriyā janayatas sad asattāṃ nayanti |
GSP27moksop_u:18604: kiṃ tad asti jagati babhūva bhaviṣyati vā yad īśvaro 'vyaktarūpo 'pi cittatām upetya na darśayati |
GSP27moksop_u:18605: sarvam eva sarvathā sarvatra sarvadā sambhavaty eva | (MU_4,21.26)
GSP27moksop_u:18611: aparyavasānadeśakālavati citrā hi jagati yuktayo dṛśyante |
GSP27moksop_u:18612: etāś ca yuktīr nāsāv ātmā yatnena racayati |
GSP27moksop_u:18613: na hi samudraḥ prayatnena taraṅgaracanāṃ karoti |
GSP27moksop_u:18614: na cotpannās tiraskaroti sāgara iva vīcīḥ | (MU_4,21.29)
GSP27moksop_u:18618: vaṭā iva vaṭadhānāyām ātmany eva sthitā etāś śaktayaḥ prakaṭatām āgatā hriyante 'viratam eva taraṅgavat | (MU_4,21.30)
GSP27moksop_u:18619: nātra kaścit kartā na bhoktā na vināśayiteti |
GSP27moksop_u:18620: kevalam ātmatattve sākṣiṇi nirāmaye samatayātmani nityam akṣubdhaṃ tiṣṭhati saty evaṃ sampadyate | (MU_4,21.31)
GSP27moksop_u:18621: sati dīpa ivālokas saty arka iva vāsaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18622: sati puṣpa ivāmodas svatas sampadyate jagat //MU_4,21.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18624: spandas samīraṇasyeva na san nāsad iva sthitam //MU_4,21.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18625: na kāsāñcid eva jāgatīnāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ paramārthato bhagavān bhūtavinaṣṭānāṃ punaḥkartā kṛtānāṃ vā vināśayitā |
GSP27moksop_u:18626: kevalaṃ kadācit prakaṭāḥ kadācid alpaprakaṭāḥ kadācid atiprakaṭā vana iva kusumarāśayaḥ | (MU_4,21.34)
GSP27moksop_u:18627: naśyatīha hi tad vastu nātmabhūtaṃ yad ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18628: kathaṃ naśyati tad vastu svātmabhūtaṃ yad ātmanaḥ //MU_4,21.35//
GSP27moksop_u:18632: tad ataś śatasahasraskandho vicitraśubhāśubhavalito bhuvanabhūriśākhas sphāratām eti saṃsāradrumaḥ | (MU_4,21.36)
GSP27moksop_u:18633: āśāmañjaritākṛtiṃ vivalitaṃ duḥkhāhibhir dāruṇair bhogaiḥ pallavitaṃ jarākusumitaṃ tṛṣṇālatābhāsuram /
GSP27moksop_u:18634: saṃsāraṃ viṣavṛkṣam ātmanigaḍaṃ chittvā vivekāsinā muktas tvaṃ vihareha vāraṇapatis stambhād ivonmocitaḥ //MU_4,21.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18638: utpattiḥ katham eteṣāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:18639: kiyatī kīdṛśī veti vistareṇa vada prabho //MU_4,22.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18642: yathā nāśaṃ prayānty etā yathā muktā bhavanti ca //MU_4,22.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18643: yathā ca parivardhante tiṣṭhanty antarhitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:18644: tat krameṇa mahābāho śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'nagha //MU_4,22.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18647: kalanā ghanatām etya yat kiñcid api sā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:18648: saṅkalpayati paścāt tat tattām eti manaḥpadam //MU_4,22.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18650: tanotīdam asad dṛśyaṃ brāhmīṃ dṛṣṭim iva tyajat //MU_4,22.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18652: yat tad dṛśyaṃ sthitaṃ tasmād dṛśyam ākāśam eva naḥ //MU_4,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18656: jñaptir evam iyaṃ rāma cittān nirmitim āgatā //MU_4,22.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18659: iha kāścin mahāmohā bhūtānāṃ jātayas sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18660: kāścid abhyuditajñānāḥ kāścin madhye skhalanti hi //MU_4,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18665: yat tad asty amṛtaṃ brahma sarvavyāpi nirāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:18668: ghanatām eti somye 'bdhau calatvāc cakratām iva //MU_4,22.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18671: kathaṃ vikāritā vā syāt kathaṃ cāvayavikramaḥ //MU_4,22.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18673: tena jātaṃ tato jātam itīyaṃ racanā girām /
GSP27moksop_u:18677: taṃ vinā kalpanaivānyā nāsti nāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:18679: yehā yā kalpanā yo 'rtho yaś śabdo yo 'ṅgināṃ gaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18680: tajjatvāt tanmayatvāc ca tat tat tanmayam iṣyate //MU_4,22.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18681: tajjas sa eva bhavati vahner vahnir ivotthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18682: janyo 'yaṃ janakaś cāyam ity uktau bhedakalpanā //MU_4,22.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18683: ayam asmāt samutpanna itīyaṃ yā jagatsthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18684: ādhikyaṃ tat kriyāśaktau janyaṃ janakam eva tat //MU_4,22.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18685: idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti śabdārthavibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18686: uktāv eva na devo 'sti pramite bhinnatā yataḥ //MU_4,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18689: agneś śikhāyā ekasyā dvitīyā janiketi yā /
GSP27moksop_u:18691: na janyajanakādyās tās sambhavanty uktayaḥ pare /
GSP27moksop_u:18692: ekam eva tv anantaṃ yat kiṃ kathaṃ taj janiṣyate //MU_4,22.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18693: ukter eṣa svabhāvo yad uktaivoktir anantaram /
GSP27moksop_u:18697: brahma cid brahma ca mano brahma jñānam avastu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:18698: brahmārtho brahma śabdaś ca brahma dig brahma dhātavaḥ //MU_4,22.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18699: ayam anyo 'yam anyo 'yaṃ bhāga ity antar ātmanoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18701: vahneś śikhāyā jāteyaṃ śikheti manaso hi yā /
GSP27moksop_u:18702: cāpalotthā vikalpaśrīr vastutas sā na sidhyati //MU_4,22.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18705: sarvasmāt sarvagāt tasmād anantād brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:18706: nānyat kiñcit sambhavati tad uktaṃ yat tad eva tat //MU_4,22.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18708: sarvaṃ ca khalv idaṃ brahmety eṣaiva paramārthatā //MU_4,22.34//
GSP27moksop_u:18709: evamprāyaś ca he prājña siddhāntas te bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:18715: yad idam akhilam ātataṃ kudṛṣṭyā tad upaśame tava rāma nirmalābhe /
GSP27moksop_u:18716: avitathavaradarśane bhaviṣyaty avitatham eva na saṃśayo 'tra kaścit //MU_4,22.38//
GSP27moksop_u:18717: brahmaivedaṃ sarvaṃ jagad iti pratipādanopadeśo nāma sargaḥ
GSP27moksop_u:18722: kṣaṇam āndhyam ivāpnomi kṣaṇaṃ yāmi prakāśatām /
GSP27moksop_u:18730: yathāvaj jñāsyasi svastho madvāgdṛṣṭim imām alam //MU_4,23.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18736: sa cājñeṣv eva na jñeṣu vidyate pāramārthikaḥ //MU_4,23.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18738: nīrāgaṃ brahma nirdvandvaṃ tad evedaṃ jagat sthitam //MU_4,23.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18741: vākprapañcaṃ vinā tv etad ajñānam atulaṃ tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18742: bhettum anyo'nyam uditaṃ yatnaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate //MU_4,23.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18745: śāmyati hy astram astreṇa malena kṣālyate malam /
GSP27moksop_u:18746: śamaṃ viṣaṃ viṣeṇaiti ripuṇā hanyate ripuḥ //MU_4,23.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18750: na ca vijñāyate kaiṣā paśyāścaryam idaṃ mahat //MU_4,23.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18753: aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyā saṃsārabandhanī /
GSP27moksop_u:18755: atyabhinne pade tasmiṃs tanvānā bhedam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:18758: jño bhūtvā jñeyasamprāptyā jñāsyasy asyās tvam āśayam //MU_4,23.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18759: yāvat tu na prabuddhas tvaṃ tāvan madvacasaiva te /
GSP27moksop_u:18761: yad idaṃ dṛśyatāṃ yātaṃ mānasaṃ mananaṃ mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:18762: asat tad iti yasyāntar niścayo mokṣabhāg asau //MU_4,23.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18764: sat tad brahmeti yasyāntar niścayas so 'pi mokṣabhāk //MU_4,23.22//
