GSP27moksop_u:18767: yas svapnabhramavad bhrāntam asat sad vaikaniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18768: jagat paśyaty asaktātmā na sa duḥkhe nimajjati //MU_4,23.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18778: ātmajñānād ṛte tac ca śāstrārthāt samavāpyate //MU_4,23.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18780: rāma nāsādyate tad dhi padam akṣayam acyutam //MU_4,23.30//
GSP27moksop_u:18782: nūnaṃ sthitim upāyātā samācchādya padaṃ sthitā //MU_4,23.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18783: kuto jāteyam iti te rāma māstu vicāraṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:18784: imāṃ katham ahaṃ hanmīty eṣā te 'stu vicāraṇā //MU_4,23.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18786: yata eṣā yathā caiṣā yathā naṣṭety akhaṇḍitam //MU_4,23.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18787: vastutaḥ khalu nāsty eṣā vibhāty evānavekṣitā /
GSP27moksop_u:18788: asato bhrāntibhātasya rūpaṃ jānāti kaḥ kutaḥ //MU_4,23.34//
GSP27moksop_u:18791: api śūrā api prājñās te na santi jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:18792: avidyayā ye puruṣā na nāma vivaśīkṛtāḥ //MU_4,23.36//
GSP27moksop_u:18793: tad asyāṃ rogaśālāyāṃ yatnaṃ kuru cikitsane /
GSP27moksop_u:18794: yathaiṣā janmaduḥkhena na bhūyas tvāṃ niyokṣyati //MU_4,23.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18798: bhṛśam apāsya kudṛṣṭim imāṃ balād bhava bhavārṇavapāram upāgataḥ //MU_4,23.39//
GSP27moksop_u:18804: yāṃ tāṃ kathayituṃ jātiṃ rāma rājasasāttvikīm /
GSP27moksop_u:18806: yat tad asty amṛtaṃ brahma sarvavyāpi nirāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:18808: citspandavapuṣas tasya spandaḥ kasmāccid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:18809: pradeśād ghanatām eti somyābdheś calanād iva //MU_4,24.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18810: antar abdher jalaṃ yadvat spandāt stambhavad īhate /
GSP27moksop_u:18812: ātmany evātmanā vyomni yathā sarati mārutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18815: eti tadvad asāv ātmā tat sve vapuṣi valgati //MU_4,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18816: jalāntare 'mbudher yadval lasad vāri kvacic calam /
GSP27moksop_u:18820: lakṣyate mauktikaspando yathā vyomni dṛśā dṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18823: tanmayy eva sphuraty acchā tatraivormir ivārṇave //MU_4,24.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18826: kṣaṇaṃ sphurantī sā devī sarvaśaktitayā tayā /
GSP27moksop_u:18827: cinoti svāṃ svayaṃ śaktiṃ kalendoś śītatām iva //MU_4,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18837: tathātmanaś citā rūpaṃ bhāvayantyā svam āṃśikam //MU_4,24.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18838: yathā dīpena dīpānāṃ jātānām ātmanā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:18843: cito rūpaṃ mahābāho kṣetrajña iti kathyate //MU_4,24.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18844: kṣetraṃ śarīram ity āhus tad asau vetty akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:18846: vāsanāḥ kalpayan so 'pi yāty ahaṅkāratāṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18851: deho 'sau jāyate loke mriyate 'pi ca jīvati //MU_4,24.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18856: jīvo 'haṅkāratāṃ prāptas tv ahaṅkāraś ca buddhitām /
GSP27moksop_u:18860: icchādyāś śaktayo mattāṃ gāvo vṛṣam ivonmadam /
GSP27moksop_u:18865: kaṣṭam asmi svayaṃ baddham ity ārtyā paritapyate //MU_4,24.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18866: baddham asmīti kalayad vidyātattvaṃ jahac chanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18872: kvacin manaḥ kvacid buddhiḥ kvacij jñānaṃ kvacit kriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:18873: kvacid etad ahaṅkāraḥ kvacit puryaṣṭakaṃ smṛtam //MU_4,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:18874: kvacit prakṛtir ity uktaṃ kvacin māyeti kalpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:18875: kvacin mana iti proktaṃ kvacit karmeti saṃsthitam //MU_4,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18876: kvacid bandha iti khyātaṃ kvacic cittam iti sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:18877: proktaṃ kvacid avidyeti kvacid iccheti saṅgatam //MU_4,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:18878: tad etad ābaddham iha cittaṃ rāghava duḥkhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:18889: dadhad antaḥ phalair hīnaṃ vaṭadhānā vaṭaṃ yathā //MU_4,24.44//
GSP27moksop_u:18898: duḥkhe nipatitaṃ ghore vihagaṃ vāgure yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:18905: dayeha na svamanasi yasya jāyate narākṛtis sa jagati rāma rākṣasaḥ //MU_4,24.52//
GSP27moksop_u:18909: evaṃ jīvāś cito bhāvād bhavabhāvanayā hatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18916: jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudā iva vāriṇi //MU_4,25.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18922: ekām evāśritā yoniṃ kecid yonyantaraṃ śritāḥ //MU_4,25.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18924: kecid atyantam uditāḥ kecid arkā ivoditāḥ //MU_4,25.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18942: kecit sthitās svargapure kecin narakam āsthitāḥ //MU_4,25.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18944: vātarūpe sthitāḥ kecit kecid vyomapade sthitāḥ //MU_4,25.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18945: sūryāṃśuṣu sthitāḥ kecit kecid indvaṃśuṣu sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18948: ciramuktās sthitāḥ kecin nūnaṃ pariṇatāḥ pare //MU_4,25.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18951: kecij jātā jagaty asmin kecid anyatra saṃsthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18952: kecin neha na cānyatra pare eva pade sthitāḥ //MU_4,25.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18955: kecid viśālāḥ kakubhaḥ kecin nadyo mahārayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18964: kāyāt kāyam upāyānti vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāṇḍajāḥ //MU_4,25.28//
GSP27moksop_u:18968: yāvan mūḍhā na paśyanti svam ātmānam aninditam //MU_4,25.30//
GSP27moksop_u:18969: dṛṣṭvātmānam asat tyaktvā satyām āsādya saṃvidam /
GSP27moksop_u:18970: kālena padam āgatya jāyante neha te punaḥ //MU_4,25.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18972: parameṣṭhipadaṃ prāpya kecid yānti paraṃ padam //MU_4,25.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18973: kecic chakratvam apy uccaiḥ prāpya tucchatayā dhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:18974: punas tiryaktvam āyānti tiryaktvān naratām api //MU_4,25.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18975: kecin mahādhiyas santa utpadya brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:18978: prayānti padmodbhavatām anye ca haratām api //MU_4,25.35//
GSP27moksop_u:18979: anye prayānti tiryaktvam anye ca suratām api /
GSP27moksop_u:18980: anye 'pi nāgatāṃ rāma yathaiveha tathaiva hi //MU_4,25.36//
GSP27moksop_u:18981: yathedaṃ hi jagat sphāraṃ tathānyāni jaganti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:18984: vicitrās sṛṣṭayas teṣām āpatanti patanti ca //MU_4,25.38//
GSP27moksop_u:18985: kāścid gandharvatāṃ yānti kāścid gacchanti yakṣatām /
GSP27moksop_u:18986: kāścit prayānti suratāṃ kāścid āyānti daityatām //MU_4,25.39//
GSP27moksop_u:18996: kaṇās taptāyasa iva sphuliṅgā iva pāvakāt //MU_4,25.44//
GSP27moksop_u:18997: kālād ivartavaś citrā āmodāḥ kusumād iva /
GSP27moksop_u:19000: svaka eva pade yānti vilayaṃ jīvarāśayaḥ //MU_4,25.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19001: aviralam iyam ātatā sthitoccair bhavati vinaśyati vardhate mudhaiva /
GSP27moksop_u:19009: pūrvam eva mayā proktaṃ rāma kiṃ nāvabudhyase /
GSP27moksop_u:19011: yad idaṃ hi śarīrādi jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:19013: dīrghasvapno hy ayaṃ rāma mithyaivānagha dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:19020: jīvasya taralaḥ kāya āvartaḥ payaso yathā //MU_4,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19021: bīje yathāṅkuras sphāraḥ pallavaś cāṅkure yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:19022: pallave ca yathā puṣpaṃ puṣpakośe phalaṃ yathā //MU_4,26.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19024: bahīrūpatayā rāma tato 'sty eveha sa sphuṭaḥ //MU_4,26.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19025: ya eva pratibhāso 'sya manasaḥ kila jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:19026: sa evāśu bhavaty etan mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭako yathā //MU_4,26.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19028: jagad rāghava no satyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇājalaṃ yathā //MU_4,26.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19032: yas sa eva vibhur brahmā padmakośagṛhe sthitaḥ //MU_4,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19037: yathā brahmaṃs tathā sarvaṃ vistareṇa vadāśu me //MU_4,26.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19047: tatas tadghanatāṃ yātaṃ ghanaspandaṃ kramān manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19051: manas tadghanatāṃ prāpya tato bhāvayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:19054: kṣaṇāc cinoty apāṃ śaityaṃ jalasaṃvit tato bhavet //MU_4,26.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19061: tasmiṃs tat tīvrasaṃvegād bhāvayad bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19062: sthūlatāṃ eti pākena mano bhavyaphalaṃ yathā //MU_4,26.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19064: sanniveśam athādatte tat tejas svaṃ svabhāvataḥ //MU_4,26.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19066: bhajate bhāvanāṃ sphāre niścitām ātatāṃ svataḥ //MU_4,26.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19072: nayaty upacayaṃ dehaṃ svaṃ svabhāvam ṛtur yathā //MU_4,26.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19086: avatīrṇas tadā jñānāt tasyaiva susamas smṛtaḥ //MU_4,26.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19093: dvibāhuṃ dvistanaṃ dvyakṣaṃ bahvakṣabhujam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:19097: avalokya vapur brahmā kāntam ātmīyam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:19105: līlayā kalpayām āsa citrās saṅkalpajāḥ prajāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19109: sṛṣṭir evam iyaṃ rāma sarge 'smin sthitim āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:19112: raghusuta parikalpanena nītā sthitim atulāṃ jagatīha sargalakṣmīḥ //MU_4,26.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19121: yatraitat tatra niśśūnyaṃ kevalaṃ vyoma saṃsthitam //MU_4,27.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19123: akṛtaṃ kṛtam evaitad vyomni citraṃ vicitrakam //MU_4,27.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19125: saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ caitac cakṣur ālokane yathā //MU_4,27.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19127: āvartate na sadrūpāḥ pṛthak kuḍyādayas sthitāḥ //MU_4,27.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19130: na tad asti na yan nāma cetas saṅkalpamantharam /
GSP27moksop_u:19131: na karoti na cāpnoti durgam apy atiduṣkaram //MU_4,27.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19132: sarvaśaktau pare deve kā nāma nanu śaktayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19133: na sambhavanty āvriyate yābhir antar manoguhā //MU_4,27.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19136: paśya bhāvanayā prāptaṃ manasā pādmajaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19141: jagat paśya mahābuddhe sudīrghaṃ svapnam utthitam //MU_4,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19142: na jāyate na mriyate iha kaścit kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:19144: na vṛddhim eti no nāśaṃ yatra kiñcit kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:19145: rekhātaruvane tatra kasya nāma ca khaṇḍanā //MU_4,27.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19146: bhramabhūtaṃ svakāyaṃ tvam apaśyan nipuṇaṃ dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:19149: asanta eva dṛśyante sarve brahmādayo 'py amī //MU_4,27.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19155: manomanananirmāṇaṃ na san nāsad iva sthitam //MU_4,27.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19156: brahmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam anyatāyās tv ataḥ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19157: prasaṅgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ko 'sau kva cāsau paritiṣṭhati //MU_4,27.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19158: ayaṃ girir ayaṃ sthāṇur ity āḍambaravibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19159: manaso bhāvanādārḍhyād asat sad iva lakṣyate //MU_4,27.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19162: yathā svapne mahārambho bhrāntir eva na vastusat /
GSP27moksop_u:19166: asad etad iti jñātvā mātra bhāvaṃ niveśaya /
GSP27moksop_u:19170: vastuny asati loko 'yaṃ yātu kāmam avastuni /
GSP27moksop_u:19171: yas tu vastu parityajya yāty avastu sa naśyati //MU_4,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19175: vañcyate bāla eveha na tattvajño bhavādṛśaḥ //MU_4,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19176: ya imaṃ guṇasaṅghātaṃ bhāvayan sukham īhate /
GSP27moksop_u:19177: pramārṣṭi sa jaḍo jāḍyaṃ vahnāv appratibimbite //MU_4,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19182: rāma naṣṭe jagaty asmin na kiñcid api naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:19183: yukte 'pi ca jagaty asmin na kiñcid api yujyate //MU_4,27.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19185: vṛddhiṃ vopagate brūhi kiṃ vṛddhaṃ kasya kiṃ kṣataṃ //MU_4,27.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19187: manasā tadvad evedam udety avirataṃ jagat //MU_4,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19188: na kiñcit kasyacin naṣṭam indrajālajale yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:19190: yad asat tad asat syāc cet tat kiṃ kasya kila kṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:19192: asad eva yad atyantaṃ tasmin kiṃ nāma naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:19193: nāśābhāve hi duḥkhasya kaḥ prasaṅgo mahāmate //MU_4,27.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19194: sad eva vā yad atyantaṃ tasya kiṃ nāma naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:19195: brahmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sukhaduḥkhe kim utthite //MU_4,27.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19197: saṃsāre kim upādeyaṃ prājño yad abhivāñchatu //MU_4,27.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19199: kiṃ syāt tribhuvane heyaṃ prājñāḥ pariharantu yat //MU_4,27.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19200: asat sad vā jagaj jñasya tenāsau sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19201: agamya eva mūrkhas tu tṛtīyāṃśena duḥkhitaḥ //MU_4,27.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19202: ādāv ante 'pi yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi san na tat /
GSP27moksop_u:19204: ādāv ante ca yat satyaṃ vartamāne sad eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:19205: yasya sarvaṃ sad eva syāt tasya sattaiva śiṣyate //MU_4,27.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19209: santoṣam ety anantāya duḥkhāya na sukhāya tu //MU_4,27.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19210: tasmān mā bhava bālas tvaṃ rāma rājīvalocana /
GSP27moksop_u:19212: asad idam akhilaṃ mayā sametaṃ tv iti vigaṇayya viṣāditāstu mā te /
GSP27moksop_u:19213: sad iha hi sakalaṃ mayā sametaṃ tv iti ca vilokya viṣāditāstu mā te //MU_4,27.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19215: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:19216: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_4,27.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19221: indrajāle kṣaṇād dṛṣṭe naṣṭe kā paridevanā //MU_4,28.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19223: avidyāṃśe sutādau vā kaḥ kramas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ //MU_4,28.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19224: prāpte dhane 'tha dārādau harṣasyāvasaro hi kaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19226: dhanadāreṣu vṛddheṣu duḥkhaṃ yuktaṃ na tuṣṭatā /
GSP27moksop_u:19228: yair eva jāyate rāgo mūrkhasyādhikatāṃ gataiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19229: tair eva bhogaiḥ prājñasya virāga upajāyate //MU_4,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19231: pārāvalokinas tv etair virāgaṃ yānti sādhavaḥ //MU_4,28.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19233: naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam upekṣasva prāptaṃ prāptam upāhara //MU_4,28.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19237: tathā vihara sambuddho yathā nāyāsi mūḍhatām //MU_4,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19239: samyak samaṃ na paśyanti ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ //MU_4,28.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19241: parimajjati tasyācchā na kvacin nirmalā matiḥ //MU_4,28.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19242: yasyāsad idam ity āsthā nivṛttā sarvavastuṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:19244: ahaṃ jagac caikam idaṃ sarvam eveti yasya dhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19245: āsthānāsthe parityajya saṃsthitā sa na majjati //MU_4,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19246: śuddhaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ padaṃ buddhyāvalambya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:19247: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ viśvaṃ mā gṛhāṇa vimuñca mā //MU_4,28.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19249: vyomavat tiṣṭha nīrāgaṃ rāma kāryakaro 'pi san //MU_4,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19250: yasya necchā na cānicchā jñasya karmaṇi tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19251: na tasya lipyate prajñā padmapattram ivāmbubhiḥ //MU_4,28.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19255: mā nimajjatv amagnaṃ san mā karotu karotu vā //MU_4,28.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19256: yadi te nendriyārthaśrīs svadate hṛdi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:19261: puṣpād gandham ivodāraṃ ceto rāma pṛthak kuru //MU_4,28.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19263: ye prajñānāvam ārūḍhās te tīrṇā bruḍitāḥ pare //MU_4,28.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19265: pravicāryātmanas tattvaṃ tat tvaṃ svaṃ padam āviśa //MU_4,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19267: viharanti tathā rāma vihartavyaṃ na mūḍhavat //MU_4,28.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19270: na tyajanti na vāñchanti vyavahāraṃ jagadgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:19273: na kvacit kṛpaṇā loke mahāntas tattvadarśinaḥ //MU_4,28.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19275: niyatiṃ ca na muñcanti mahānto bhāskarā iva //MU_4,28.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19278: tvam api prāptavān rāma vivekam imam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:19281: viharāsmin bhuvaḥ pīṭhe parāṃ siddhim avāpsyasi //MU_4,28.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19285: itthaṃ girā vimalayā vimalāśayasya rāmo munes sa parimṛṣṭa ivābabhāse /
GSP27moksop_u:19286: jñānāmṛtena madhureṇa virājatāntaḥ pūrṇaś śaśāṅka iva śītalatāṃ jagāma //MU_4,28.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19293: śrotuṃ tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi vacāṃsi vadatas tava //MU_4,29.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19296: atrāyaṃ mama sandeho mahātman hṛdi vartate /
GSP27moksop_u:19298: kvacid abjāt kvacid vyomnaḥ kvacid aṇḍāt kvacij jalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:19313: kasmiṃścid aṇḍe tryakṣo 'rkaḥ kasmiṃścid api vāsavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19314: kasmiṃścit puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ kasmiṃścit tryakṣa eva hi //MU_4,29.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19317: bhūr abhūn mṛṇmayī kācit kācid āsīd dṛṣanmayī /
GSP27moksop_u:19318: āsīd dhemamayī kācit kācin māṃsamayī tathā //MU_4,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19319: ihaiva kānicit tāni jaganty anyāny athānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:19323: yathā taraṅgā jaladhau mṛgatṛṣṇā marau yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:19324: kusumāni yathā cūte tathā viśvaśriyaḥ pare //MU_4,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19329: na ca vijñāyate kasmāt kālāt prabhṛti cāgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19332: pūrvāt pūrvaṃ kilābhūvaṃs tataḥ pūrvataraṃ tathā //MU_4,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19340: purastāc ca vinaṅkṣyanti bhūtvā bhūtvā yathā giraḥ //MU_4,29.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19342: ghaṭā iva mṛdo rāśāv aṅkure pallavā iva //MU_4,29.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19346: unmajjantyo nimajjantyo na satyā nāpy asacchriyaḥ //MU_4,29.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19347: jaḍā rasānvitās tanvyas tāś śevālalatā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:19353: āyānti sṛṣṭayo devāj jaladād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19354: tasmād evākhilā jātā ālokād iva dṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_4,29.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19357: iha sṛṣṭiṣu puṣṭāsu nikṛṣṭāsu ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:19367: iti catvāri sampīḍya pañcamaṃ vardhate yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:19369: kadācid apsu vāyau vā susphāre vāpi tejasi /
GSP27moksop_u:19371: tasyātha puṃso vadanāt kadācij jāyate padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:19372: kadācid aṃsāt pṛṣṭhād vā kadācil locanāt karāt //MU_4,29.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19377: kim ivāsyāṃ vada jñaptau kathaṃ sambhavatīha no /
GSP27moksop_u:19380: sauvarṇaṃ brahmagarbhaṃ ca svayam aṇḍaṃ pravartate //MU_4,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19381: kadācid eṣa puruṣo vīryaṃ sṛjati vāriṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:19382: tasmāt prajāyate padmaṃ brahmāṇḍam atha vā mahat //MU_4,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19383: tasmāt prajāyate brahmā kadācid bhāskaro hy asau /
GSP27moksop_u:19384: kadācid varuṇo brahmā kadācid vāyur abjajaḥ //MU_4,29.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19391: tās sāttvikīprabhṛtayo jātayas tv ittham āgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19393: punas sṛṣṭiḥ punar nāśaḥ punar duḥkhaṃ punas sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:19394: punar ajñāḥ punas tajjñā bandhamokṣadṛśau punaḥ //MU_4,29.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19396: dīpā iva kṛtālokāḥ praśāmyanty udbhavanti ca //MU_4,29.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19397: dehotpattau vināśe ca dīpānāṃ brahmaṇām api /
GSP27moksop_u:19398: kālenādhikatāṃ tyaktvā nāśe bhedo na kaścana //MU_4,29.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19399: punaḥ kṛtaṃ punas tretā punaś ca dvāparaḥ kaliḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19402: punaḥ punaḥ kāryadaśāḥ prātaḥ prātar ahar yathā //MU_4,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:19404: punaḥ punar idaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcana punaḥ punaḥ //MU_4,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:19406: ime bhāvās sthitā nityaṃ cidākāśe svabhāvataḥ //MU_4,29.58//
GSP27moksop_u:19408: idam asti pare tattve sarvaṃ vṛkṣa ivārtavam //MU_4,29.59//
GSP27moksop_u:19410: yad asmāj jāyate sargo dvīndutvam iva locanāt //MU_4,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:19412: tatsthā evāpy atatsthābhāś candrād iva marīcayaḥ //MU_4,29.61//
GSP27moksop_u:19413: na kadācana saṃsāraḥ kilāyaṃ nāma sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:19415: na caivedaṃ kadācit tu sādho jagad anīdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:19418: na bhaviṣyati saṃsāra idānīm iti yujyate //MU_4,29.64//
GSP27moksop_u:19420: nāsti saṃsāra ity etad upapadyata eva naḥ //MU_4,29.65//
GSP27moksop_u:19423: punaḥ punaś ca bhāvitvān na kadācid anīdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:19424: jagad ity etad apy uktaṃ na mṛṣā raghunandana //MU_4,29.67//
GSP27moksop_u:19426: vināśīdaṃ jagat sarvam iti kiṃ nopapadyate //MU_4,29.68//
GSP27moksop_u:19428: avināśi jagat sarvam ity apy avitathopamam //MU_4,29.69//
GSP27moksop_u:19429: na tad asti na yat tasminn ekasmin vitatātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:19431: punaḥ punar idaṃ sarvaṃ punar maraṇajanmanī /
GSP27moksop_u:19432: punas sukhaṃ punar duḥkhaṃ punaḥ karaṇakarmaṇī //MU_4,29.71//
GSP27moksop_u:19433: punar āśāḥ punar vyoma punas sāmbudhayo 'drayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19434: abhyudeti punas sṛṣṭiś śaśvad arkaprabhā yathā //MU_4,29.72//
GSP27moksop_u:19435: punar daityāḥ punar devāḥ punar lokāntarakramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19436: punas svargāpavargehā punar indraḥ punaś śaśī //MU_4,29.73//
GSP27moksop_u:19449: punar indrālike yāte rājyam āsvādya kesaram /
GSP27moksop_u:19465: punar anyena kālena tathaiva jagatāṃ gaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:19466: manas tanoti vai śūnye gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā //MU_4,29.88//
GSP27moksop_u:19468: sarvaṃ punar idaṃ rāma cakravat parivartate //MU_4,29.89//
GSP27moksop_u:19470: rāma satyam asatyaṃ vā nirṇīya yad ihocyate //MU_4,29.90//
GSP27moksop_u:19473: aviralam idam ātataṃ vikalpair asaduditākṛtibhir dvicandrakalpaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19474: viracitam asatā tu yan na sat taj jagad iha tena vimūḍhatā kimutthā //MU_4,29.92//
GSP27moksop_u:19479: nāvekṣante yadā satyaṃ na paśyanti śaṭhās tadā //MU_4,30.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19480: ye tu pāraṃ gatā buddher indriyair na vaśīkṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19481: ta etāṃ jāgatīṃ māyāṃ paśyanti karabilvavat //MU_4,30.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19482: nanu tāṃ jāgatīṃ māyāṃ jīvo dṛṣṭvā vicāravān /
GSP27moksop_u:19483: ahaṅkāramayīṃ āsthāṃ tyajaty ahir iva tvacam //MU_4,30.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19484: asaktatāṃ tato 'bhyetya punar nāma na jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:19485: kṣetre 'pi suciraṃ tiṣṭhad bījaṃ dagdham ivāgninā //MU_4,30.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19487: prayatante śarīrāya hitam ajñās tu nātmane //MU_4,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19488: tvam apy ajñavad ajñasya śarīrasya samīhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:19497: magadhā nāma vikhyātaś śrīmāñ janapado mahān //MU_4,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19517: ṛṣis tapasvī bhagavan vipine kena hetunā /
GSP27moksop_u:19518: kathaṃ vāpy avasat pṛṣṭhe kadambasya mahātaroḥ //MU_4,30.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19520: śaralometi vikhyātaḥ pitā tasya babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:19521: nāmnāpara iva brahmā tasminn evāvasad girau //MU_4,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19523: tena sārdhaṃ sa putreṇa nītavāñ jīvitaṃ vane //MU_4,30.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19526: eka eva vane tasmin dāśūraḥ praruroda ha /
GSP27moksop_u:19529: mlānim abhyāyayau nūnaṃ hemanta iva paṅkajam //MU_4,30.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19532: ṛṣiputra mahāprājña kim ajña iva rodiṣi /
GSP27moksop_u:19533: saṃsārasya na kasmāt tvaṃ svarūpaṃ vetsi cañcalam //MU_4,30.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19535: jāyate jīvate paścād avaśyaṃ ca vinaśyati //MU_4,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19536: yad yat kiñcid dṛśor dṛśyaṃ brahmādikam idaṃ mune /
GSP27moksop_u:19537: gantavyas tena sarveṇa vināśo nātra saṃśayaḥ //MU_4,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19538: tadarthaṃ mā kṛthā vyarthaṃ viṣādaṃ maraṇe pituḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19541: dhairyam āsādayām āsa śikhaṇḍī stanitād iva //MU_4,30.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19544: brāhmeṇa karmaṇā tasya vipine caratas tapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19548: kevalaṃ sarvam evedam api śuddhaṃ dharātalam /
GSP27moksop_u:19549: aśuddham iva paśyan sa na reme kvacid eva hi //MU_4,30.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19551: vṛkṣāgram eva saṃśuddhaṃ sthitir atrocitā mama //MU_4,30.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19552: tad idānīṃ tapas tapsye tapasā yena śākhiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:19553: khagavat sthitim āpnomi śākhāsu ca daleṣu ca //MU_4,30.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19555: juhāva tasmin protkṛtya māṃsaṃ svaṃ skandhabhittitaḥ //MU_4,30.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19558: iti sañcintya bhagavān saptārcis tasya dehavān /
GSP27moksop_u:19559: puro babhūva dīptāṃśur dīptāṃśur vākpater iva //MU_4,30.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19561: gṛhāṇa sthāpitaṃ sādho kośakośān maṇiṃ yathā //MU_4,30.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19565: nāpnomi tena vṛkṣāṇām upari sthitir astu me //MU_4,30.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19567: evam astu tam ity uktvā jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ //MU_4,30.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19568: tasminn antarhite deve kṣaṇāt sāndhya ivāmbude /
GSP27moksop_u:19571: śaśinam āptakalākulam ambujaṃ vikasitaṃ ca sitaṃ smitaśobhinā //MU_4,30.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19596: apsarobhir iva svargaṃ mañjarībhir itas tataḥ //MU_4,31.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19622: vṛtaṃ khagānāṃ vṛndena bhūtānām iva śṛṅgiṇam //MU_4,31.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19625: kaścid eva nirāśo me nārthī cāpaiti tuṣṭitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19642: puram iva gagane kadambavṛkṣaṃ khagakulanāgarasaṅkaṭaṃ dadarśa //MU_4,31.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19675: tasmiṃl latādale sthitvā vilokya kakubhaḥ kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:19680: sarvās svamanasā tena kṛtā yajñakriyāḥ kramāt //MU_4,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19687: sa dadarśaikadā tasyāṃ latāyām agratas sthitām /
GSP27moksop_u:19694: vayasyām iva puṣpāḍhyāṃ latāṃ kim adhitiṣṭhasi //MU_4,33.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19696: munim āha manohāri mugdhākṣaram idaṃ vacaḥ //MU_4,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19698: prāpyante tāni tāny āśu mahatām eva yācñayā //MU_4,33.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19705: tato dṛṣṭā mayā sarvā vayasyā madanotsave /
GSP27moksop_u:19708: anātheva kathaṃ nātha kila śocyāsmy aputrikā //MU_4,33.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19709: dehi me bhagavan putraṃ no ced deham ihāgnaye /
GSP27moksop_u:19711: tām ity uktavatīṃ tanvīṃ vihasya munipuṅgavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19712: prāha hastagataṃ puṣpaṃ tasyai dattvā dayānvitaḥ //MU_4,33.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19714: prasoṣyase sutaṃ kāntaṃ prasūnam iva sallatā //MU_4,33.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19715: kiṃ tv asau maraṇāveśapāpinyetas tvayā yataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19717: ity uktvā sa munis tanvīṃ prasannamukhamaṇḍalām /
GSP27moksop_u:19725: ayaṃ sa bhagavan bhavyaḥ kumāraḥ putra āvayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19726: kṛto mayā samagrāṇāṃ kalānāṃ kila kovidaḥ //MU_4,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19727: prabho kevalam etena jñānaṃ nādhigataṃ śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:19730: ko hi nāma kule jātaṃ putraṃ maurkhye niyojayet //MU_4,33.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19731: evaṃvadantīṃ sa munir macchiṣyam abale sutam /
GSP27moksop_u:19732: ihaiva sthāpayainaṃ tvam ity uktvā tāṃ vyasarjayat //MU_4,33.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19733: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ sa pitur antevāsitayā tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:19736: ciraṃ kālam asau tatra muniḥ putraṃ vyabodhayat //MU_4,33.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19742: jalada iva śikhaṇḍinaṃ purassthaṃ tanayam abodhayad ambare maharṣiḥ //MU_4,33.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19752: śṛṇu putra mahābuddhe vastuno 'sya samām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:19755: nāmnā svottha iti śrīmāñ jagadākramaṇe kṣamaḥ //MU_4,34.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19759: kenacit triṣu lokeṣu na mahātmā vaśīkṛtaḥ //MU_4,34.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19761: saṅkhyātuṃ naiva śakyante kallolā jaladher iva //MU_4,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19762: yasya vīryaṃ suvīryasya na śastrāstrair na pāvakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19763: kenacid bhuvane krāntam ākāśam iva muṣṭinā //MU_4,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19778: ūrdhve kecid adhaḥ kecin madhye kecin niyojitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19784: māyayā racitās tena rājñā teṣu mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:19787: karoti vividhāḥ krīḍā nīḍeṣv iva vihaṅgamaḥ //MU_4,34.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19788: triśarīras sa teṣv antas tair yakṣais saha putraka /
GSP27moksop_u:19793: puraṃ tad apy avāpnoti gandharvair iva nirmitam //MU_4,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19796: punar utpadyate tūrṇaṃ khān mahormir ivāmbhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19800: mudam etya kadācic ca svayam āyāti pīnatām /
GSP27moksop_u:19802: pibati valgati gacchati jṛmbhate sphurati bhāti na bhāti ca bhāsuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19803: suta mahāmahimā sa mahīpatiḥ patir apām iva vātarayākulaḥ //MU_4,34.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19810: ko 'sau svottha iti khyāto bhūpas tātottamākṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19811: kathitaṃ ca kim etan me tvayaitad brūhi tattvataḥ //MU_4,35.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19812: kva bhaviṣyati nirmāṇaṃ vartamāne kva gamyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:19815: śṛṇu putra yathābhūtam etat te kathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:19819: paramān nabhaso jātas saṅkalpas svottha ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:19820: jāyate svayam evāsau svayam eva vilīyate //MU_4,35.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19821: tatsvarūpam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ābhogi vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:19822: jāyate tena jātena tasmin naṣṭe vinaśyati //MU_4,35.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19837: tasminn eva jagaty asmin pure saṅkalpabhūbhujā /
GSP27moksop_u:19853: yathā kusūle mārjāro bhastrāyāṃ bhujago yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:19854: muktāphalaṃ yathā veṇāv ahaṅkāras tanau tathā //MU_4,35.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19855: kṣaṇam abhyudayaṃ yāti kṣaṇaṃ śāmyati dīpavat /
GSP27moksop_u:19858: yadā saṅkalpitaṃ vastu pura eva prapaśyati //MU_4,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19860: śreyase paramāyāsya nāśas svo na tu sambhavaḥ //MU_4,35.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19864: asattayā nāśayati kṣaṇam āndhyaṃ yathā tamaḥ //MU_4,35.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19869: svayaṃ viratim āyāti kṣaṇam eti ratiṃ kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:19872: matimantaḥ padaṃ yātā yathā putra tathā kuru //MU_4,35.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19873: trayas tv asyā mater dehā uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19881: trividhaṃ tu parityajya rūpam etan mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:19883: sarvā dṛṣṭīḥ parityajya niyamya manasā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19886: yadi vā līlayātmānaṃ śilayā cūrṇayasy alam //MU_4,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19887: yady ambudhiṃ praviśasi vaḍavāgnim athāpi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:19888: yadi vā patasi śvabhre khaḍgadhārājale 'tha vā //MU_4,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19889: haro yady upadeṣṭā te hariḥ kamalajo 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:19896: bhinne tantau na jāne te kva yānti viśarāravaḥ //MU_4,35.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19897: asat sat sadasat sarvaṃ saṅkalpād eva nānyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19898: saṅkalpāt sad asac caivam iha satyaṃ kim ucyatām //MU_4,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19899: saṅkalpyate yathā yad yat tat tathā bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:19900: mā kiñcid api tattvajña saṅkalpaya kadācana //MU_4,35.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19904: tataṃ jagadduḥkham idaṃ vyarthaṃ sadṛśam ātmanaḥ //MU_4,35.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19905: tena duḥkhāya mahate kiṃ śritena kilānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:19906: yad aduḥkhāya tat prājñās saṃśrayantīha netarat //MU_4,35.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19907: adhigataparamārthatām upetya prasabham apāsya vikalpajālam uccaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19908: adhigamaya padaṃ tad advitīyaṃ vitatasukhāya suṣuptacittavṛttiḥ //MU_4,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19912: kīdṛśas tāta saṅkalpaḥ katham utpadyate prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:19913: kathaṃ vā vṛddhim āyāti kathaṃ caiva vinaśyati //MU_4,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19916: citaś cetyonmukhatvaṃ yat tat saṅkalpāṅkuraṃ viduḥ //MU_4,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19917: leśataḥ prāptasattākas sa eva ghanatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19918: yāti cittaṃ kham āpūrya dṛḍhajāḍyāya meghavat //MU_4,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19921: saṅkalpanaṃ hi saṅkalpas svayam eṣa prajāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:19922: vardhate svata evāśu duḥkhāya na sukhāya tu //MU_4,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19924: ṛte saṅkalpato 'nyā te nāsti saṃsāritā ṛtā //MU_4,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19928: svayam abhyety asatyo 'ntas saṅkalpas te tathā bhavet //MU_4,36.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19929: asatyam eva jātas tvam asatyam abhivardhase /
GSP27moksop_u:19930: asmiñ jāte ca vijñāne asatyas san vilīyase //MU_4,36.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19931: ayaṃ so 'ham ime bhāvās sukhaduḥkhamayā mama /
GSP27moksop_u:19932: vyartham eveti sāsthas tvaṃ tenāntaḥ paritapyase //MU_4,36.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19933: asann evāsy ajāto 'si kuto janma kilāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19935: mā saṅkalpaya saṅkalpaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvaya mā sthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:19937: saṅkalpanāśane yatno na bhūyāṃs tava gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:19942: tad apy upakaroty asmin na saṅkalpaparikṣaye //MU_4,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19946: sādhyate yad asādhyaṃ tat kasya syāt kim ivāmateḥ //MU_4,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19948: bhittvā svātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ kim etāvati duṣkaram //MU_4,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19949: upaśānte hi saṅkalpe upaśāntam idaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:19951: saṅkalpo hi mano jīvaś cittaṃ dhīr atha vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:19953: saṅkalpāṃśād ṛte neha kiñcid apy asti kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:19954: tam eva hṛdayāc chinddhi kim anyat pariśocasi //MU_4,36.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19955: yathaivedaṃ nabhaś śūnyaṃ jagac chūnyaṃ tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:19957: asiddhaṃ sarvam evaitad yad asiddhena sādhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:19959: satyāsthāyām asatyāṃ tu kiṃniṣṭhā vāsanā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:19960: vāsanākṣayatas siddhis tataḥ prāpyaṃ na śiṣyate //MU_4,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19961: tasmād asad idaṃ sarvaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ helayeddhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:19962: na tu bhāvanayā tena sukhaduḥkhair na lipyate //MU_4,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19966: mano jīvas sphuraty uccair mānasaṃ nagaraṃ jagat //MU_4,36.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19967: bhaviṣyad vartamānaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca parivartayat /
GSP27moksop_u:19971: dīrgham ākāram ādāya nimeṣād yānti hrasvatām /
GSP27moksop_u:19972: grahītuṃ ca na yujyante saṅkalpā jaḍavīcayaḥ //MU_4,36.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19978: śakyate nātra sandeho nāsat sad bhavati kvacit //MU_4,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19979: san sthito yadi saṅkalpo duścikitsas tato bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:19980: kiṃ tv asadbhūta evaiṣa sucikitsas tadā bhṛśam //MU_4,36.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19982: tad etatkṣālane sādho kaḥ pravarteta durmatiḥ //MU_4,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19983: kiṃ tv etat taṇḍule śūkatuṣakambukavat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:19985: akṛtrimam api prāptaṃ bhṛśaṃ kṛtrimatāṃ suta /
GSP27moksop_u:19987: taṇḍulasya yathā carma yathā tāmrasya kālimā /
GSP27moksop_u:19988: naśyati kriyayā putra puruṣasya tathā malam //MU_4,36.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19989: jīvasya taṇḍulasyeva malaṃ sahajam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:19990: naśyaty eva na sandehas tasmād udyamavān bhava //MU_4,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19991: asatkalpair vikalpair yas saṃsāro janito mudhā /
GSP27moksop_u:19992: stokenāsau layaṃ yāti kvāsad vastu kila sthiram //MU_4,36.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19993: asattām eti saṃsāras svāṃ vyavasthāṃ vicinvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19995: nedaṃ tava na cāsya tvaṃ bhrāntiṃ putra parityaja /
GSP27moksop_u:19996: asatye satyavad dṛṣṭe bhāvanāṃ mā nyavīviśaḥ //MU_4,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19997: mama guruvibhavojjvalā vilāsā iti tava māstu vṛthaiva vibhramo 'ntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19998: tvayi sati vitatāś ca te vilāsā vilasati sarvam idaṃ tadātmatattvam //MU_4,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:20002: ity ākarṇya tadā tatra rātrāv ālapanaṃ tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20009: tāpayantaṃ pradeśaṃ taṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāskaraṃ yathā //MU_4,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20012: tataḥ kurvan kathās tena saha dāśūrabhāsvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:20058: bahunātra kim uktena na kiñcid api vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20059: pattraṃ tatra taror yatra noṣyate vā na bhujyate //MU_4,37.29//
GSP27moksop_u:20060: pattre pattre mṛgās suptā viśrāntās sughane ghane /
GSP27moksop_u:20061: kacche kacche khagā līnās tasya bhūruhabhūpateḥ //MU_4,37.30//
GSP27moksop_u:20064: tataḥ kathābhir anyābhis sa tasya tanayo mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:20067: śarvarī sā vyatīyāya muhūrta iva kāntayoḥ //MU_4,37.33//
GSP27moksop_u:20073: praviśya khaṃ munīnāṃ ca madhyaṃ svastham avasthitaḥ //MU_4,37.36//
GSP27moksop_u:20078: tasmād avāstavīṃ tyaktvā vāstavīm api rañjanām /
GSP27moksop_u:20081: āsādayiṣyasy acirāt puraṃ tad bhaviṣyasīśo bhuvaneṣu yena //MU_4,37.40//
GSP27moksop_u:20085: nāstīdam iti nirṇīya sarvatas tyaja rañjanām /
GSP27moksop_u:20086: yan nāsti tat prati kila kaivāstheha vicāriṇām //MU_4,38.1//
GSP27moksop_u:20087: dṛśyamānam athedaṃ ced asti tat tava kiṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:20088: tiṣṭhatv ātmani badhnāsi tvaṃ kilātra kim ātmatām //MU_4,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:20089: atha ced asti nāstīdam iti niścayavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:20091: nedam asti jagad rāma na ca nāsti mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:20096: mā tvam etena sambandhaṃ bhāvayānagha cetasi //MU_4,38.6//
GSP27moksop_u:20098: akartr eva tadā manye kākatālīyavaj jagat //MU_4,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:20099: kākatālīyayogena jātaṃ yat kiñcid eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:20101: na kadācid idaṃ śāntaṃ jagad rāma na ca kṣayi /
GSP27moksop_u:20102: ajasraṃ dṛśyamānatvād bhāvitvāc ca punaḥ punaḥ //MU_4,38.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20103: na kadācid idaṃ cāsti jagad rāma na cākṣayi /
GSP27moksop_u:20106: kurvāṇas sa tadā khedaṃ na kadācana gacchati //MU_4,38.11//
GSP27moksop_u:20108: īdṛśy eva sthirā dīrghā cittotthāpi na naśyati //MU_4,38.12//
GSP27moksop_u:20111: sthirāś cej jāgatā bhāvās tat tadāsthā na śobhate /
GSP27moksop_u:20113: asthirāś cej jagadbhāvās tad apy āsthā na śobhate /
GSP27moksop_u:20117: sarvakartāpy akarteva karoty ātmā na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:20118: tiṣṭhaty alam udāsīna ālokaṃ prati dīpavat //MU_4,38.17//
GSP27moksop_u:20119: kurvan na kiñcit kurute dinakāryam ivāṃśumān /
GSP27moksop_u:20120: gacchan na gacchati svasthas svāspadastho ravir yathā //MU_4,38.18//
GSP27moksop_u:20121: yataḥ kutaścid evedaṃ sampannam iva lakṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20125: tadāti bhāvanā sādho padārthaṃ prati nārhati /
GSP27moksop_u:20126: alātacakre svapne ca bhrame vā keva bhāvanā //MU_4,38.21//
GSP27moksop_u:20127: akasmād āgato jantus sauhārdasya na bhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:20128: bhramabhūtaṃ jagajjālam āsthāyāś ca na bhājanam //MU_4,38.22//
GSP27moksop_u:20130: yathā na bhāvayasy āsthām evaṃ mā bhāvaya sthitau //MU_4,38.23//
GSP27moksop_u:20132: yathā paśyasi paśya tvaṃ bhāvajātam idaṃ tathā //MU_4,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20134: yo 'si so 'si jagaty asmiṃl līlayā viharānagha //MU_4,38.25//
GSP27moksop_u:20142: jāyate vyavahāraśrīs sati deve tathā kriyā //MU_4,38.29//
GSP27moksop_u:20145: ata ātmani kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:20148: indriyāntargatatvāt tu kartā bhoktā sa eva hi //MU_4,38.32//
GSP27moksop_u:20150: yayaiva paśyasi śreyas tām āśritya sthiro bhava //MU_4,38.33//
GSP27moksop_u:20152: pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann api na lipyase //MU_4,38.34//
GSP27moksop_u:20155: yatrāhaṃ kiñcid eveha na karomīti niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20156: bhogaughakāmanāṃ tatra kaḥ karotu jahātu vā //MU_4,38.36//
GSP27moksop_u:20160: yadīcchasi sthitiṃ rāma tat tām apy uttamāṃ viduḥ //MU_4,38.38//
GSP27moksop_u:20161: ahaṃ yatra karomīmaṃ samagraṃ jāgataṃ bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:20163: yad anyena śarīraṃ me dagdham anyena lālitam /
GSP27moksop_u:20164: sa madārambha evātaḥ kaḥ khedollāsayoḥ kramaḥ //MU_4,38.40//
GSP27moksop_u:20166: ahaṃ karteti matvāntaḥ kaḥ khedollāsayoḥ kramaḥ //MU_4,38.41//
GSP27moksop_u:20169: samatā sarvabhāveṣu yāsau satyā parā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20170: tasyām avasthitaṃ cittaṃ na bhūyo duḥkham āpnuyāt //MU_4,38.43//
GSP27moksop_u:20171: atha vā sarvakartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:20172: sarvaṃ tyaktvā manaḥ pītvā yo 'si so 'si sthiro bhava //MU_4,38.44//
GSP27moksop_u:20173: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ nāhaṃ karomīdam idaṃ na tu /
GSP27moksop_u:20178: spraṣṭavyā sā na bhavyena saśvamāṃseva pukkasī //MU_4,38.47//
GSP27moksop_u:20181: kartā nāsmi na cāyam asmi sa iti jñātvaivam antas sphuṭaṃ kartaivāsmi samagram asmi tad iti jñātvātha vā niścayam /
GSP27moksop_u:20182: ko 'py evāsmi na kaścid evam iti vā nirṇīya sarvottamaṃ tiṣṭha tvaṃ svapade sthitāḥ padavido yatrottamās sādhavaḥ //MU_4,38.49//
GSP27moksop_u:20186: satyam etat tvayā brahman yad uktaṃ sūktisundaram /
GSP27moksop_u:20190: hṛdayaṅgamatāṃ yātam idānīṃ brahma me prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:20191: tvaduktibhir yathā śītaṃ dhārābhir bhūbhṛtaḥ payaḥ //MU_4,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:20192: audāsīnyād anicchatvān na bhuṅkte na karoti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:20194: kiṃ tv ayaṃ bhagavan sphāras saṃśayo me hṛdi sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20195: chinddhi taṃ tvaṃ girā brahman dīdhityendur yathā tamaḥ //MU_4,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:20196: idaṃ sat tad idaṃ cāsad ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:20198: ekasmin vitate śānte nīhāra iva bhāskare /
GSP27moksop_u:20202: kathayiṣyāmi te rāma jñāsyasy enāṃ tadaiva ca //MU_4,39.8//
GSP27moksop_u:20204: śrotuṃ praśnottarāṇy etāny alaṃ yogyo bhaviṣyasi //MU_4,39.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20207: vyarthā bhavati bāleṣu yathā rāgamayī kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20209: kasmiṃścid eva samaye kiñcit puṃso virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:20210: phalam ābhāti vṛkṣasya śarady eva na mādhave //MU_4,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:20214: na vistareṇa tenaitan na jñātaṃ bhavatā sphuṭam //MU_4,39.14//
GSP27moksop_u:20215: yadi tvam ātmanātmānam adhigacchasi tat svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:20216: etat praśnottaraṃ sādho jānāsy atra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_4,39.15//
GSP27moksop_u:20217: mayā siddhāntakāle tu prāptabodhe tvayi sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:20219: jānāty ātmānam ātmaiva kṛta ātmātmanaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:20223: bandho hi vāsanābandho mokṣas syād vāsanākṣayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20224: vāsanās tvaṃ parityajya mokṣārthitvam api tyaja //MU_4,39.19//
GSP27moksop_u:20227: tā apy antaḥ parityajya tābhir vyavaharan bahiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20230: śeṣe sthirasamādhāno yena tyajasi taṃ tyaja //MU_4,39.22//
GSP27moksop_u:20234: yas tvaṃ bhavasi sadbuddhe sa bhavāśv avilambitaḥ //MU_4,39.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20236: yas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ sa muktaḥ parameśvaraḥ //MU_4,39.25//
GSP27moksop_u:20237: samādhim atha karmāṇi mā karotu karotu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:20239: naiṣkarmyeṇa na tasyārtho na tasyārtho 'sti karmabhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20241: vicāritam alaṃ śāstraṃ ciram udgrāhitaṃ mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20242: santyaktavāsanān maunād ṛte nāsty uttamaṃ padam //MU_4,39.28//
GSP27moksop_u:20243: dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akhilaṃ bhrāntvābhrāntā diśo daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:20245: yad yad ālokyate kiñcid yatra yatra ca gamyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20246: īpsitānīpsitād anyan na tatra yatate janaḥ //MU_4,39.30//
GSP27moksop_u:20247: ye kecana samārambhā ye janasya kriyākramāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20248: te sarve dehamātrārtham ātmārthaṃ tu na kiñcana //MU_4,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:20251: idaṃ heyam upādeyam idam ity asadutthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:20253: karotu bhuvane rājyaṃ viśatv analam ambu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:20257: sarvatra pañcabhūtāni ṣaṣṭhaṃ kiñcin na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20258: pātāle bhūtale vyomni ratim eti kva dhīradhīḥ //MU_4,39.36//
GSP27moksop_u:20262: kiṃ prayacchati kiṃ bhuṅkte prāpte 'smin sakale 'pi saḥ //MU_4,39.38//
GSP27moksop_u:20266: asminn api ca yo nāśas sa vīrudhi mahāśaniḥ //MU_4,39.40//
GSP27moksop_u:20267: ātmano 'ṃśasya sarvāder yat tṛṇād api nottamam /
GSP27moksop_u:20268: tasmiñ jagattraye prāptaṃ kiṃ tad ātmavato bhavet //MU_4,39.41//
GSP27moksop_u:20270: kiyān asyā bhuvo deho yenodāraṃ prapūrayet //MU_4,39.42//
GSP27moksop_u:20271: na tad asti jagaty asmin sapātālaharālaye /
GSP27moksop_u:20272: yan nāmātmavato jñasya kiñcit kāryakaraṃ bhavet //MU_4,39.43//
GSP27moksop_u:20290: na jñaś calati bhogaughair mukhavātair ivācalaḥ //MU_4,39.52//
GSP27moksop_u:20291: tasmin kila pade rāma jñas tiṣṭhati mahonnatau /
GSP27moksop_u:20292: yasmāc candrārkadeśo 'pi naḥ pātālam iva sthitaḥ //MU_4,39.53//
GSP27moksop_u:20294: sarīsṛpān vayam iva paśyanty ūḍhān bhavārṇave //MU_4,39.54//
GSP27moksop_u:20295: na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:20297: na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:20299: na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:20301: na kecana jagadbhāvās tattvajñaṃ rañjayanty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:20304: lokaṃ tadīhitasukheṣu ratiṃ na yāti tajjñaḥ kuśevalalaveṣv iva rājahaṃsaḥ //MU_4,39.59//
GSP27moksop_u:20308: atraiva vastuny ucite śṛṇu rāghava pūrvajāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20309: kacena gāthā yā gītā bārhaspatyena pāvanīḥ //MU_4,40.1//
GSP27moksop_u:20314: tena nirviṇṇa iva sa ātmatattvād ṛte param /
GSP27moksop_u:20316: kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi kiṃ gṛhṇāmi tyajāmi kim /
GSP27moksop_u:20318: duḥkham ātmā sukhaṃ caiva kham āśās tvam ahaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20319: sarvam ātmamayaṃ jātaṃ kaṣṭaṃ naṣṭo 'ham ātmanā //MU_4,40.6//
GSP27moksop_u:20320: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ deheṣv adha ūrdhvaṃ ca dikṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:20321: ita ātmā tathehātmā nāsty anātmamayaṃ kvacit //MU_4,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:20322: sarvatraiva sthito hy ātmā sarvam ātmani saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:20323: sarvam evedam ātmaivam ātmany eva namāmy aham //MU_4,40.8//
GSP27moksop_u:20324: na tad asti na yatrāhaṃ na tad asti na yan mayi /
GSP27moksop_u:20325: kim anyad abhivāñchāmi kevalaṃ praśamāmy aham //MU_4,40.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20328: aham agnir ahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūr aham ambaram /
GSP27moksop_u:20329: yan nāhaṃ nāsti tat kiñcit sarvam evāham ātatam //MU_4,40.11//
GSP27moksop_u:20335: nāntarasthena bāhye na bhāvayan parame hṛdi //MU_4,40.14//
GSP27moksop_u:20342: śubhaṃ vastv avisaṃvādi mahān kim abhivāñchatu //MU_4,41.1//
GSP27moksop_u:20343: tiryañcaḥ paśavo mūḍhā yena tuṣyanty asādhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20344: bhogādinā kathaṃ tena ratim āyānti sādhavaḥ //MU_4,41.2//
GSP27moksop_u:20346: viśvāsaṃ yānti ye loke tair alaṃ naragardabhaiḥ //MU_4,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:20347: itaḥ keśā ito raktam itīyaṃ pramadātanuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20348: etayā toṣam āyānti sārameyā na mānavāḥ //MU_4,41.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20349: mṛn mahī dāru taravo deho māṃsaṃ dṛṣad giriḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20350: adho bhūr ambaraṃ pṛṣṭhe kim apūrvaṃ sukhāya yat //MU_4,41.5//
GSP27moksop_u:20353: sarvasyā eva paryante śubhāyā api saṃsthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20354: malinaṃ duḥkham asty eva jvālāyā iva kajjalam //MU_4,41.7//
GSP27moksop_u:20356: latā nāgendram iva tā dhārayanti na satpadam //MU_4,41.8//
GSP27moksop_u:20358: svadehanāmny asthicaye śliṣyate seti kaḥ kramaḥ //MU_4,41.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20359: sarvaṃ satyam idam rāma sthiram ajñasya tuṣṭaye /
GSP27moksop_u:20360: jñasyāsthiram asatyaṃ ca jagad rāma na tuṣṭaye //MU_4,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:20362: tāṃ parityajya bhāvāsthām ātmaikatvāj jñatāṃ vraja //MU_4,41.11//
GSP27moksop_u:20369: idaṃ jagat sughanatāṃ katham ānayati kramāt //MU_4,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:20372: brahmeti śabdam akarod brahmā tena sa ucyate //MU_4,41.15//
GSP27moksop_u:20375: tatas saṅkalpayām āsa pūrvaṃ tejo mahāprabham /
GSP27moksop_u:20381: taccharīri manas tasmiṃs tatas tejasi bhāsvare /
GSP27moksop_u:20383: sa tatas tejasas tasmād abhyudeti divākaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20387: atha brahmā mahābuddhir anyāṃs tāṃs tejasaḥ kaṇān /
GSP27moksop_u:20389: kṣaṇāt saṅkalpayām āsa dadarśa ca tathaiva tān /
GSP27moksop_u:20390: saṅkalpān antaraṃ jātān vidvāñ śabdagaṇān iva //MU_4,41.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20393: kālaṃ kālavibhaktīś ca nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20394: saritas sāgarān dvīpān diśaś śailāṃs tathāvanim //MU_4,41.26//
GSP27moksop_u:20395: devān daityān narān nāgān gandharvān yakṣarākṣasān /
GSP27moksop_u:20396: akalpayad ayaṃ brahmā taraṅgān iva sāgaraḥ //MU_4,41.27//
GSP27moksop_u:20397: teṣāṃ deśān girīṃś caiva vimānāny uttamāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:20402: te 'py anyāṃs tatra te 'py anyāṃs te 'py anyān vividhān api //MU_4,41.30//
GSP27moksop_u:20405: brāhmaṃ rūpam upādāya mano māyi mahadvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20411: manobhis tair viriñcotthair yad yathā kalpitaṃ purā /
GSP27moksop_u:20413: itthaṃ sarveṣu sargeṣu keṣucit tv atha vāpy ajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20415: moha evam ayaṃ mithyā jāgatas sthiratāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20428: anādimat paraṃ brahma smaraty ātmānam ātmanā //MU_4,41.43//
GSP27moksop_u:20433: dhyānāt kadācid bhagavān svayaṃ viramati prabhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20441: punas tat param ālambya padam āpadvivarjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:20447: na rocate 'sya santyāgo vapuṣo na ca saṅgrahaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20448: nātmā na cetaran nehā na sthitir nāsthitis tathā //MU_4,41.53//
GSP27moksop_u:20453: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ puṇyā yā mayoktā mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:20454: jātiṃ viddhi surānīke tām etāṃ sāttvikīm iti //MU_4,41.56//
GSP27moksop_u:20457: sarge sthitiṃ gate tv anyā yodeti kalanā parā /
GSP27moksop_u:20460: kācit tiryaktvam āyāti kācid āyāti yakṣatām //MU_4,41.59//
GSP27moksop_u:20462: yā yat sattvaṃ samabhyeti sā tad evāśu jāyate //MU_4,41.60//
GSP27moksop_u:20463: jātā saṃsargavaśatas tasminn eva hi janmani /
GSP27moksop_u:20465: itthaṃ gatā sthitim iyaṃ kila rāmabhadra sṛṣṭis sphuṭaṃ prakaṭasaṅkaṭakarmabandhā /
GSP27moksop_u:20470: asmin bhagavati brahmaṇy amalaṃ padam āsthite /
GSP27moksop_u:20477: manassv anyeṣu vātāntāl lolālātāt kaṇeṣv iva //MU_4,42.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20479: rāma brahmaṇi jīvaughās taraṅgā iva vāridhau //MU_4,42.5//
GSP27moksop_u:20489: tato jagati jāyante bhavanti prāṇinas sphuṭāḥ //MU_4,42.10//
GSP27moksop_u:20491: prāṇitām upagacchanti ciraṃ sthāvaratāṃ ca vā //MU_4,42.11//
GSP27moksop_u:20498: tatas teṣv atiramyeṣu candraraśmiṣu sā padam /
GSP27moksop_u:20499: karoti vihagī lolā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntareṣv iva //MU_4,42.15//
GSP27moksop_u:20506: tāḥ phalāvalayaḥ pakvā bhakṣyante yaiś śarīribhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20507: teṣv eva vīryam āgatya tiṣṭhanty apravibodhitāḥ //MU_4,42.19//
GSP27moksop_u:20510: yathā kāṣṭhe sthito vahnir yathā mṛdi ghaṭas sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20511: yathā kṣīre sthitaṃ sarpir vīrye jīvas tathā sthitaḥ //MU_4,42.21//
GSP27moksop_u:20515: tenaiva mokṣabhāgī cej janmanā tat sa sāttvikaḥ //MU_4,42.23//
GSP27moksop_u:20517: mokṣārthaṃ prāptajanmā cet tat sa rājasasāttvikaḥ //MU_4,42.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20519: rāma rājasasattvasya mokṣam āyāty asau yathā //MU_4,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:20521: sa kadācit kvacit kaścit sambhavaty anaghākṛte //MU_4,42.26//
GSP27moksop_u:20523: pravicāryās ta evāto gantavyaṃ ceha taddṛśā //MU_4,42.27//
GSP27moksop_u:20526: ye cānye vividhā mūkā mūḍhās tāmasajātayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20527: teṣāṃ sthāvaratulyānāṃ kiṃ tad rāma vicāryate //MU_4,42.29//
GSP27moksop_u:20529: ayam iha pravicāraṇayogyatām anugato nanu rājasasāttvikaḥ //MU_4,42.30//
GSP27moksop_u:20533: ye hi rājasasattvasthā etā bhuvi mahāguṇāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20534: te nityam eva muditā uditāḥ kha ivendavaḥ //MU_4,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:20535: na khedam adhigacchanti vyomabhāgā malaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20536: nāpadi mlānim āyānti niśi hemāmbujā yathā //MU_4,43.2//
GSP27moksop_u:20537: nehante prākṛtād anyad dinānyad bhāskaro yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20538: ramante sve sadācāre svārtave pādapā yathā //MU_4,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:20540: āpady api na muñcanti śaśinaś śītatām iva //MU_4,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20549: adhigamyārya sacchāstraṃ vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20551: ādāv ante ca yan nityaṃ rūpaṃ trailokyavartinām /
GSP27moksop_u:20552: padārthānāṃ tad evāśu bhāvayen netaran mudhā //MU_4,43.10//
GSP27moksop_u:20555: ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ veti saṃsāram idam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:20562: vicāram amalaṃ kṛtvā satyam evāśrayen naraḥ //MU_4,43.15//
GSP27moksop_u:20563: śarīram asthimāṃsaṃ ca tyaktvā raktādy aśobhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:20565: satye nitye tate śuddhe sarvage sarvabhāvane /
GSP27moksop_u:20566: śive sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇo yathā //MU_4,43.17//
GSP27moksop_u:20571: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tiktaṃ kaṭu ca nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20574: jāto 'yam ayam unnaṣṭa iti kaiṣājñateha vaḥ //MU_4,43.21//
GSP27moksop_u:20575: neha tan nāma vastv asti yad abhūtvā prajāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20576: na ca tan nāma vastv asti yad bhūtvā pravilīyate //MU_4,43.22//
GSP27moksop_u:20577: ābhāsamātram evedaṃ na san nāsac ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:20579: meha moho 'stu vo maurkhyān nedaṃ sad yat praṇaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:20580: na cāsad ity eva dṛḍhaṃ nirṇīyāśokitāstu vaḥ //MU_4,43.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20581: asati jagati kiṃ kileha mohas sati ca kim aṅga vimohakāraṇaṃ tat /
GSP27moksop_u:20582: jananamaraṇasaṃsthitiṣv atas tvaṃ bhava kham ivātisamas sadopaśāntaḥ //MU_4,43.25//
GSP27moksop_u:20586: dhīro vicāravāñ jantur ādāv eva mahādhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:20589: tās tā madhāv iva latā jāyante sujane sati //MU_4,44.2//
GSP27moksop_u:20605: mano muktavibhāgaṃ te muktam eva na saṃśayaḥ //MU_4,44.10//
GSP27moksop_u:20616: itarāsu tu ye jātā jātiṣv aguṇaśālinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20620: yān eva sevate jantur iha jātiguṇān sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:20626: tāmasīṃ rājasīṃ caiva jātim anyām api śritāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20628: antaś cittamaṇau svacche yad rāghava niyojyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20629: tanmayo hi bhavaty eṣa tasmāj jayati pauruṣam //MU_4,44.22//
GSP27moksop_u:20632: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:20636: hitaṃ mahāsattvatayātmanas tvaṃ vidhāya buddhyā bhava vītaśokaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20637: bhavatkrameṇaiva tato jano 'yam urvyāṃ bhaviṣyaty ativītaśokaḥ //MU_4,44.26//
GSP27moksop_u:20639: sattvasthakarmaṇi padaṃ nanu rāma rāme maiṣā karotu bhavabandhavimohacintā //MU_4,44.27//
GSP27moksop_u:20647: kathayaty evam āhlādi vasiṣṭhe pāvanaṃ vacaḥ //MU_5,1.2//
GSP27moksop_u:20656: rāme vikāsam āyāte prabhāta iva paṅkaje /
GSP27moksop_u:20661: śravaṇaṃ prati yatnena bharate mantriṇi sthite //MU_5,1.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20672: mahatā tena śabdena tirodhānaṃ muner giraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20674: munir antarayāṃ cakre svāṃ vācam atha saṃsadi /
GSP27moksop_u:20677: ghane kolāhale śānte rāmaṃ munir uvāca ha //MU_5,1.17//
GSP27moksop_u:20680: idaṃ niyatitaḥ prāptaṃ kartavyaṃ yad dvijanmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:20682: tvam apy uttiṣṭha subhaga samastāṃ savanakriyām /
GSP27moksop_u:20684: ity uktvā munir uttasthau samaṃ daśarathena saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20708: sāmantā mantriṇaś caiva vasiṣṭham atha bhūmipam /
GSP27moksop_u:20715: nagaraṃ nāgarāś caiva prātar āgamanāya te //MU_5,1.36//
GSP27moksop_u:20718: vasiṣṭhas saha viprendraiḥ pārthivair munibhis tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20723: sarvān visarjayām āsa pādopānte natān asau //MU_5,1.40//
GSP27moksop_u:20724: nabhaścarān avanicarāñ jalecarān visarjya sa stutaguṇagocarāṃś carān /
GSP27moksop_u:20725: yathākramaṃ svagṛha udārasanmunau cakāra tā dvijajanavāsarakriyāḥ //MU_5,1.41//
GSP27moksop_u:20729: te sametya gṛhaṃ vīrā rājaputrāś śaśitviṣaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20731: vasiṣṭho rāghavaś caiva rājāno munayo dvijāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20736: dadur dānāni viprebhyo bhojanāny aṃśukāni ca //MU_5,2.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20740: tata āsvādayām āsur bhojanāny ucitāni te //MU_5,2.6//
GSP27moksop_u:20744: anayan bandhubhis sārdhaṃ yāvad astaṃ yayau raviḥ //MU_5,2.8//
GSP27moksop_u:20746: peṭhus stotrāṇi puṇyāni jagur gāthā manoramāḥ //MU_5,2.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20752: vyatīyāya śanaiś śyāmā muhūrta iva sundarī //MU_5,2.12//
GSP27moksop_u:20753: tasthau rāmas tu tām eva vāsiṣṭhīṃ vacanāvalīm /
GSP27moksop_u:20755: kim idaṃ nāma saṃsārabhramaṇaṃ kim ime janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20756: bhūtānīha vicitrāṇi kim āyānti prayānti kim //MU_5,2.14//
GSP27moksop_u:20757: manasaḥ kīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ caitat prasṛjyate /
GSP27moksop_u:20758: māyeyaṃ sā kimutthā syāt kathaṃ ceyaṃ nivartate //MU_5,2.15//
GSP27moksop_u:20759: nivṛttayā ca vā kas syād guṇo doṣo 'tha vā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:20760: katham ātmani caivāyaṃ tate saṅkoca āgataḥ //MU_5,2.16//
GSP27moksop_u:20761: kim uktaṃ syād bhagavatā muninā manasaḥ kṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:20762: kim indriyajaye proktaṃ kim uktam atha cātmani //MU_5,2.17//
GSP27moksop_u:20768: pṛthak karomi payaso dhārāṃ haṃsa ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_5,2.20//
GSP27moksop_u:20769: bhogās tyaktuṃ na śakyante tattyāgena vinā dhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20770: prabhavāmo na vipadām aho saṅkaṭam āgatam //MU_5,2.21//
GSP27moksop_u:20772: sampannaṃ me giriguru maurkhyād yakṣaś śiśor iva //MU_5,2.22//
GSP27moksop_u:20774: bāleva labdhadayitā sukham āpsyati no matiḥ //MU_5,2.23//
GSP27moksop_u:20778: pade surūdḥaṃ viśramya hasiṣyāmi kadā jagat //MU_5,2.25//
GSP27moksop_u:20782: kadā saṃsārajaladhiṃ tīrtvā syām aham ajvaraḥ //MU_5,2.27//
GSP27moksop_u:20786: saṃsṛtijvara ādīrghaḥ kadā naś citta śāmyati //MU_5,2.29//
GSP27moksop_u:20788: śamam eṣyasi he buddhe svaprakāśād anantaram //MU_5,2.30//
GSP27moksop_u:20791: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti vyaktotthito bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20794: yatra tat padam ātmīyaṃ samprāpsyāmaḥ kadā vayam //MU_5,2.33//
GSP27moksop_u:20796: kaccit padaṃ tvayi manaḥ kariṣyantīti me vada //MU_5,2.34//
GSP27moksop_u:20797: hā tāta mātaḥ putreti girāṃ mā syām ahaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20799: he buddhe bhagini bhrātur arthitāṃ pūrayāśu me /
GSP27moksop_u:20801: āpad āpatati prītyā bhave sati suteva te /
GSP27moksop_u:20804: tato mumukṣor ācāra utpattīnāṃ kramas tataḥ //MU_5,2.38//
GSP27moksop_u:20806: vijñānagarbhaṃ sakalaṃ yathāvat smara he mate //MU_5,2.39//
GSP27moksop_u:20807: kṛtam api śataśo vicāritaṃ yad yadi tad upaiti na mānavasya buddhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20808: bhavati tad aphalaṃ śaradghanābhaṃ satatam ato matir eva kāryasāraḥ //MU_5,2.40//
GSP27moksop_u:20814: kiñcit tamaḥkaḍārāsu kiñcid apy aruṇāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:20817: uttasthau rāghavaś śrīmān padmaḥ padmākarād iva //MU_5,3.3//
GSP27moksop_u:20822: taṃ praṇamyāṅgane tasthus tasmiṃs te vinayānvitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20824: rājāno rājaputrāś ca ṛṣayo brāhmaṇās tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20832: yayau gṛhaṃ dāśarathaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20834: viveśa vitatāṃ tatra ramyāṃ dāśarathīṃ sabhām /
GSP27moksop_u:20836: trīṇi tasya padāny āśu tadā daśaratho nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20838: viviśus tatra te sarve nṛpā daśarathādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20839: vasiṣṭhādyāś ca munaya ṛṣayo brāhmaṇās tathā //MU_5,3.14//
GSP27moksop_u:20840: mantriṇaś ca sumantrādyā dhaumyādyāś ca vipaścitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20843: mālavādyās tathā bhṛtyāḥ paurādyāś caiva lālakāḥ //MU_5,3.16//
GSP27moksop_u:20859: nāsvādayaty abhinavātapabindubuddhyā bhrāntyā bhramiṇy alibale nabhasīva meghe //MU_5,3.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20860: puṇyo vasiṣṭhavacanaprasaraś śruto yas taṃ śaṃsati prasṛtavismayam āryaloke /
GSP27moksop_u:20862: digbhyaḥ purāc ca gaganāc ca nṛparṣisiddhavidyādharāryamunivipragaṇe viśiṣṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:20863: maunapraṇāmam abhitaḥ praviśaty aśabdaṃ sopāṃśu gauravavatā saha jātavākye //MU_5,3.26//
GSP27moksop_u:20875: hyas tvayokto ya ānandī vivikto vacasāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20878: antaś śītalayanty etā mahatām amalā giraḥ //MU_5,4.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20894: dinaṃ tad iha sālokaṃ śeṣās tv andhā dinālayaḥ //MU_5,4.12//
GSP27moksop_u:20897: ity ukte bhūbhṛtā tatra rāmābhimukham āsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20904: kaccit sarvam asarvaṃ ca sad asac ca sadoditam /
GSP27moksop_u:20909: anantam antavac caiva samyak smarasi sanmate //MU_5,4.19//
GSP27moksop_u:20910: cittam eva naro nānyad iti yat pratipāditam /
GSP27moksop_u:20912: vākyārthaś cākhilaḥ kaccit tvayā rāma vicāritaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:20923: yad ahaṃ paramodāraṃ buddhavān vacanaṃ tava //MU_5,4.25//
GSP27moksop_u:20924: yad ādiśasi tat sarvaṃ tathaiva na tad anyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:20928: tad adīnam adīnātman sarvam antaḥkṛtaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:20929: ramyaṃ puṇyaṃ vicitraṃ ca ratnavṛndam ivābdhinā //MU_5,4.28//
GSP27moksop_u:20931: śirasā dhriyate kair no siddhyai tvadanuśāsanam //MU_5,4.29//
GSP27moksop_u:20939: bhaja bhṛśaṃ vitatavrata samprati prasṛtatāṃ hatakilbiṣa māṃ prati //MU_5,4.33//
GSP27moksop_u:20946: dhāryate puruṣair nityaṃ sustambhair iva maṇḍapaḥ //MU_5,5.2//
GSP27moksop_u:20948: helayā tyajyate pakvā māyeyaṃ tvag ivoragaiḥ //MU_5,5.3//
GSP27moksop_u:20950: vicārayanti te sādho jagat pūrvāparaṃ param //MU_5,5.4//
GSP27moksop_u:20954: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñeyaṃ na tāvad adhigamyate //MU_5,5.6//
GSP27moksop_u:20958: kiṃ satyaṃ kim asatyaṃ vā bhava satyaparāyaṇaḥ //MU_5,5.8//
GSP27moksop_u:20959: ādāv ante ca yan nāsti kīdṛśī tasya satyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:20960: ādāv ante ca yan nityaṃ tat satyaṃ rāma netarat //MU_5,5.9//
GSP27moksop_u:20962: tasya mugdhapaśor jantor vivekaḥ kena janyate //MU_5,5.10//
GSP27moksop_u:20963: jāyate mana eveha mana eveha vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:20966: jñātam etan mayā brahman yathāsmin bhuvanatraye /
GSP27moksop_u:20968: yas tasyottaraṇopāyas taṃ me brūhi viniścitam /
GSP27moksop_u:20971: pūrvaṃ rāghava śāstreṇa vairāgyeṇa vareṇa ca /
GSP27moksop_u:20976: krameṇa padam āpnoti tad yat paramapāvanam //MU_5,5.16//
GSP27moksop_u:20978: indunā śītalenāntar bimbaṃ svam iva tejasā //MU_5,5.17//
GSP27moksop_u:20982: sarvān adhaḥ karoty ādhīn somyāmbha iva vālukāḥ //MU_5,5.19//
GSP27moksop_u:20983: idaṃ rukmam idaṃ bhasma parijñāte iti sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:20984: na yathā hemakārasya moho jñātātmanas tathā //MU_5,5.20//
GSP27moksop_u:20988: jñātasāre tv asandigdhamūlye kva kila mūḍhatā //MU_5,5.22//
GSP27moksop_u:20989: he janā aparijñāta ātmā vo duḥkhasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:20992: vyastīkṛtya svam ātmānaṃ svasthā bhavata māciram //MU_5,5.24//
GSP27moksop_u:20996: ūrdhvabāhur viraumy eṣa na ca kaścic chṛṇoti me //MU_5,5.26//
GSP27moksop_u:21001: samprabuddhe hi manasi svāṃ vivecayati sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:21002: naiśam arkodaya iva tamo hārdaṃ palāyate //MU_5,5.29//
GSP27moksop_u:21005: yathā rajobhir gaganaṃ yathā kamalam ambubhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21006: na lipyate 'pi saṃśliṣṭair dehair ātmā tathaiva vaḥ //MU_5,5.31//
GSP27moksop_u:21007: kardamādi yathā hemnaś śliṣṭam eva pṛthak sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21008: nāntaḥ pariṇatiṃ yāti jaḍo dehas tathātmanaḥ //MU_5,5.32//
GSP27moksop_u:21012: ete hy ajñānakasyaiva tasmin naṣṭe na kasyacit //MU_5,5.34//
GSP27moksop_u:21013: na kasyacit sukhaṃ kiñcid duḥkhaṃ ca na ca kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:21014: sarvam ātmamayaṃ śāntam anantaṃ paśya rāghava //MU_5,5.35//
GSP27moksop_u:21016: payasīva taraṅgās tāḥ piñchā vyomnīva vātmani //MU_5,5.36//
GSP27moksop_u:21017: yathā maṇir dadāty ātmacchāyās svayam akāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:21019: ātmā jagac ca sumate naikaṃ na dve na cāpy asat /
GSP27moksop_u:21021: samastaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma sarvam ātmedam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:21022: aham anyad idaṃ cānyad iti bhrāntiṃ tyajānagha //MU_5,5.39//
GSP27moksop_u:21023: tate brahmaghane nitye sambhavanti na kalpanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21026: dvitīyā kalpanā nāsti vahnau himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,5.41//
GSP27moksop_u:21028: jagajjālam ayaṃ hy ātmā svayam ātmani jṛmbhate //MU_5,5.42//
GSP27moksop_u:21029: na śoko 'sti na moho 'sti na janmāsti na janmavān /
GSP27moksop_u:21030: yad astīha tad evāsti vijvaro bhava rāghava //MU_5,5.43//
GSP27moksop_u:21031: samas svasthas sthiramatiś śāntaś śāntamanā muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21038: nādātā na parityāgī vijvaro bhava rāghava //MU_5,5.47//
GSP27moksop_u:21047: viśvaprapañcaracaneyam asatyarūpā nāsatyarūpam anudhāvati nāma tajjñaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21048: tajjño 'si śāntakalano 'si nirāmayo 'si nityodito 'si bhava sundara śāntaśokaḥ //MU_5,5.52//
GSP27moksop_u:21049: ekātapatram avanau guruṇopadiṣṭaḥ samyak prapālaya ciraṃ samayeha dṛṣṭyā /
GSP27moksop_u:21050: rājyaṃ samastaguṇarañjitarājalokas tyāgo na yukta iha karmasu nāpi rāgaḥ //MU_5,5.53//
GSP27moksop_u:21055: pravartate yaḥ kāryeṣu sa mukta iti me matiḥ //MU_5,6.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21056: pauruṣīṃ tanum āśritya kecid ete kriyāratāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21057: svargān narakam āyānti svargaṃ ca narakāt punaḥ //MU_5,6.2//
GSP27moksop_u:21059: narakān narakaṃ yānti duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam //MU_5,6.3//
GSP27moksop_u:21064: purā katipayāny eva bhuktvā janmāni rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:21065: asmiñ janmani yo muktas sa syād rājasasāttvikaḥ //MU_5,6.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21066: jāto 'sau vṛddhim abhyeti pārvaṇaś candramā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:21068: yasyedaṃ janma pāścātyaṃ tam āśv eva mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:21069: viśanti vidyā vimalā muktā veṇum ivottamam //MU_5,6.8//
GSP27moksop_u:21070: āryatā hṛdyatā maitrī somyatā muktatā jñatā /
GSP27moksop_u:21072: yaḥ kurvan sarvakāryāṇi puṣṭe naṣṭe 'tha tatphale /
GSP27moksop_u:21073: samas sa sarvakāleṣu na tuṣyati na śocati //MU_5,6.10//
GSP27moksop_u:21074: tamāṃsīva divā yānti tatra dvandvāni saṅkṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21075: śaradīva ghanās tatra guṇā gacchanti śuddhatām //MU_5,6.11//
GSP27moksop_u:21081: sa tam ekaṃ vivekena niyojayati pāvanam //MU_5,6.14//
GSP27moksop_u:21086: ye hi pāścātyajanmānas te hi suptaṃ manomṛgam /
GSP27moksop_u:21088: prathitaguṇān sugurūn niṣevya yatnād amaladhiyā pravicārya cittaratnam /
GSP27moksop_u:21089: gatim amalām upayāti mānavo 'smiñ jagati vilokya ciraṃ prakāśam antaḥ //MU_5,6.18//
GSP27moksop_u:21093: eṣa tāvat kramaḥ proktas sāmānyas sarvajantuṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:21094: imam anyaṃ viśeṣaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rājīvalocana //MU_5,7.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21096: apavargagatau rāma dvāv imāv uttamau kramau //MU_5,7.2//
GSP27moksop_u:21097: ekas tāvad guruproktād anuṣṭhānāc chanaiś śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21102: atremaṃ śṛṇu vṛttāntaṃ prāktanaṃ kathayāmi te //MU_5,7.5//
GSP27moksop_u:21104: khapatitaphalavat paraṃ vivekaṃ caramabhavā vimalaṃ samāpnuvanti //MU_5,7.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21125: yas taṃ svam ātmatattvotthaṃ niṣṣyandaṃ samupāsmahe //MU_5,8.9//
GSP27moksop_u:21130: dvayor madhyagataṃ nityam asti nāstīti pakṣayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21133: ajasram uccarantaṃ taṃ svam ātmānam upāsmahe //MU_5,8.13//
GSP27moksop_u:21134: santyajya hṛdguheśānaṃ devam anyaṃ prayānti ye /
GSP27moksop_u:21136: sarvāśāḥ kila santyajya phalam etad avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21139: badhnāti bhāvanāṃ bhūyo naro nāsau sa gardabhaḥ //MU_5,8.16//
GSP27moksop_u:21142: upaśamasukham āvahet pavitraṃ śamavaśataś śamam eti sādhucetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21143: praśamitamanasas svake svarūpe bhavati sukhe sthitir uttamā cirāya //MU_5,8.18//
GSP27moksop_u:21149: jagāma parivāraṃ svam ākarṣan svagṛhaṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:21156: pāṣāṇeṣv iva pāṣāṇa āluṭhāmi balād alam //MU_5,9.5//
GSP27moksop_u:21157: aparyantasya kālasya ko 'py aṃśo jīvyate mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21158: tasmin bhāvaṃ nibadhnāmi dhiṅ mām adhamacetasam //MU_5,9.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21159: kiyanmātram idaṃ nāma rājyam ājīvitaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:21160: kim etena vinā duḥkhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi hatadhīr yathā //MU_5,9.7//
GSP27moksop_u:21162: bālaś citrendunevāhaṃ kiṃ mudhā dhṛtimān sthitaḥ //MU_5,9.8//
GSP27moksop_u:21165: yad vastu yac ca vā ramyaṃ yad udāram akṛtrimam /
GSP27moksop_u:21166: kiñcit tad iha nāsty eva kiṃniṣṭheyaṃ dhṛtir mama //MU_5,9.10//
GSP27moksop_u:21167: dūrastham apy adūrasthaṃ yan me manasi vartate /
GSP27moksop_u:21168: iti nirṇīya bāhye 'rthe bhāvanāṃ santyajāmy aham //MU_5,9.11//
GSP27moksop_u:21170: dṛṣṭo 'dyāpi hi duḥkhāya keyam āsthā sukhaṃ prati //MU_5,9.12//
GSP27moksop_u:21171: pratyabdaṃ pratimāsaṃ ca pratyahaṃ ca pratikṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:21172: sukhāni duḥkhaviddhāni duḥkhāni tu punaḥ punaḥ //MU_5,9.13//
GSP27moksop_u:21173: punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ nibhālitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21174: atucchaṃ na tad astīha satāṃ yatrāstu saṃsthitiḥ //MU_5,9.14//
GSP27moksop_u:21175: adya ye mahatāṃ mūrdhni te dinair nipatanty adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21178: patito 'smy uparistho 'pi hā mamātman hatā sthitiḥ //MU_5,9.16//
GSP27moksop_u:21179: kasmād akasmān moho 'yam āgato dhīmato 'pi me /
GSP27moksop_u:21181: ka ime me mahābhogāḥ ka ime mama bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21184: kim imām aham artheṣu dhṛtim udvegabhāriṇīm //MU_5,9.19//
GSP27moksop_u:21185: yātu tiṣṭhatu vā sampan mamaināṃ prati ko grahaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21187: te mahāvibhavā bhogās te santas snigdhabāndhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21188: sarvaṃ smṛtipathaṃ prāptaṃ vartamāne 'pi kā dhṛtiḥ //MU_5,9.21//
GSP27moksop_u:21189: kva dhanāni mahīpānāṃ brahmaṇāṃ kva jaganti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:21194: prayātāḥ pāṃsuvad bhūpāḥ kā dhṛtir mama jīvite //MU_5,9.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21196: āsthāṃ ced anubadhnāmi tan mām astu dhig asthitim //MU_5,9.25//
GSP27moksop_u:21199: hṛtaṃ hṛtam idaṃ kasmād āyur āyatayānayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21200: paśyann api na paśyāmi sūkṣmayā kālalekhayā //MU_5,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:21202: kālakāpālinā grastāḥ kim āsthe mayi valgasi //MU_5,9.28//
GSP27moksop_u:21203: ajasram upayānty ete yānti cādyāpi vāsarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21207: kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataraṃ prāpto duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21208: adyāpi na virakto 'smi hā dhiṅ mām adhamāśayam //MU_5,9.31//
GSP27moksop_u:21210: tāni tāni vinaṣṭāni dṛṣṭāni kim ihottamam //MU_5,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:21211: yan madhye yac ca paryante yad āpāte manoramam /
GSP27moksop_u:21213: yeṣu yeṣu padārtheṣu dhṛtiṃ badhnāti mānavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21214: teṣu teṣv eva tasyāśu dṛṣṭo duḥkhodayo bhṛśam //MU_5,9.34//
GSP27moksop_u:21215: śvaś śvaḥ pāpīyasīm eva śvaś śvaḥ krūratarām api /
GSP27moksop_u:21216: śvaś śvaḥ khedakarīm eti daśām iha jaḍo janaḥ //MU_5,9.35//
GSP27moksop_u:21218: śeṣe kalatracintārtaḥ kiṃ karotu kadā jaḍaḥ //MU_5,9.36//
GSP27moksop_u:21220: asārasāraṃ saṃsāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati manmatiḥ //MU_5,9.37//
GSP27moksop_u:21222: mahākalpāt kam apy aṃśaṃ svargaṃ āpnoti nādhikam //MU_5,9.38//
GSP27moksop_u:21223: ko 'sau svarge 'sti bhūmau vā pātāle vā pradeśakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21226: ādhayo vyādhayaś caite nivāryante kathaṃ kila //MU_5,9.40//
GSP27moksop_u:21227: satye 'sattā sthitā mūrdhni mūrdhni ramyeṣv aramyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:21228: sukheṣu mūrdhni duḥkhāni kim ekaṃ saṃśrayāmy aham //MU_5,9.41//
GSP27moksop_u:21229: jāyante ca mriyante ca prākṛtāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21230: dharā tair eva nīrandhrā durlabhās sādhusādhavaḥ //MU_5,9.42//
GSP27moksop_u:21234: tādṛśāḥ puruṣā yātā mādṛśāṃ gaṇanaiva kā //MU_5,9.44//
GSP27moksop_u:21235: santi ramyatarād ramyās susthirād api ca sthirāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21237: sampadaś ca vicitrā yās tāś cec cittena sammatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21238: tat tā api mahārambhā manye nūnaṃ mahāpadaḥ //MU_5,9.46//
GSP27moksop_u:21239: āpado 'pi vicitrā yās tāś cen manasi sammatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21240: tat tā api mahārambhā manye sakalasampadaḥ //MU_5,9.47//
GSP27moksop_u:21242: mamedam ity apūrvaiva kutas tv akṣaramālikā //MU_5,9.48//
GSP27moksop_u:21249: saṃsāra eva duḥkhānāṃ sīmāntaḥ kila kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21252: ta ete 'nyāni duḥkhāni jānate madhurāṇy alam //MU_5,9.53//
GSP27moksop_u:21257: saṅkalpam eva taṃ manye saṅkalpopaśamena tat /
GSP27moksop_u:21260: parijñātāsv ihādyaiva na rame nīrasāsv aham //MU_5,9.57//
GSP27moksop_u:21263: hā hato 'smi vinaṣṭo 'smi mṛto 'smīti punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21266: manonāmā nihanmy enaṃ manasāsmi ciraṃ hataḥ //MU_5,9.60//
GSP27moksop_u:21268: aviddham āsīd adhunā viddhaṃ tu guṇam arhati //MU_5,9.61//
GSP27moksop_u:21271: vibudhais sādhubhis siddhair ahaṃ sādhu prabodhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21275: ayam aham idam eva tan mameti sphuritam apāsya balād asatyam antaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21276: ripum atimalinaṃ mano nihanmi praśamam upaimi namo 'stu te viveka //MU_5,9.65//
GSP27moksop_u:21280: iti cintayatas tasya puras sampraviveśa ha /
GSP27moksop_u:21286: snānabhūmau sthitās sajjā nadyo mūrtiyutā iva //MU_5,10.3//
GSP27moksop_u:21294: tvām eva prekṣate deva dakṣiṇārho dvijavrajaḥ //MU_5,10.7//
GSP27moksop_u:21297: śīghram uttiṣṭha bhadraṃ te niyataṃ kāryam ācara /
GSP27moksop_u:21298: na kālam ativartante mahāntas sveṣu karmasu //MU_5,10.9//
GSP27moksop_u:21301: kiyanmātram idaṃ nāma rājyaṃ sukham iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21304: ekānta eva tiṣṭhāmi saṃśānta iva vāridhiḥ //MU_5,10.12//
GSP27moksop_u:21306: tyaktvā sarvāṇi karmāṇi sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ //MU_5,10.13//
GSP27moksop_u:21309: daśāsu yāsu yāsv eva sambhramaṃ citta paśyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:21311: pravṛttaṃ san nivṛttaṃ sad bhūyo bhūyaś ciraṃ ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:21312: bhogabhūmiṣu sarvāsu citta tṛptiṃ na gacchasi //MU_5,10.16//
GSP27moksop_u:21314: bhavaty akṛtrimā tṛptir yenābhipata tat tatam //MU_5,10.17//
GSP27moksop_u:21315: iti sañcintya janakas tūṣṇīm eva babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:21319: tūṣṇīm atha kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā janako janajīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21321: kim upādeyam astīha yatnāt saṃsādhayāmi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:21323: kiṃ me kriyāparatayā kiṃ niṣkriyatayāpi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:21324: na tad asti vināśena varjitaṃ yat kiloditam //MU_5,10.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21326: satas sthirasya śuddhasya citaḥ kā nāma me kṣatiḥ //MU_5,10.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21327: nābhivāñchāmy asamprāptaṃ samprāptaṃ na tyajāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:21328: svastha ātmani tiṣṭhāmi yan mamāsti tad astu me //MU_5,10.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21330: kriyayākriyayā vāpi yat prāpyaṃ sad asat sataḥ //MU_5,10.25//
GSP27moksop_u:21331: akurvataḥ kurvato vā yuktāyuktāḥ kriyā mama /
GSP27moksop_u:21333: tad utthāya kramaprāptāṃ kāyo 'yaṃ prakṛtāṃ kriyām /
GSP27moksop_u:21334: karotv aspanditāṅgas tu kim ayaṃ sādhayiṣyati //MU_5,10.27//
GSP27moksop_u:21338: tasmin praśamam āyāte kṛtam apy akṛtaṃ nṛṇām //MU_5,10.29//
GSP27moksop_u:21339: yo niścayo 'ntaḥ puruṣasya rūḍhaḥ kriyāsv asau tanmayatām upaiti /
GSP27moksop_u:21340: anāmayaṃ me padam āgatā dhīr adhīratām antar alaṃ tyajāmi //MU_5,10.30//
GSP27moksop_u:21344: iti sañcintya janako yathāprāptāṃ kriyām asau /
GSP27moksop_u:21345: asaktaḥ kartum uttasthau dinaṃ dinapatir yathā //MU_5,11.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21352: citta cañcalavistāra ātmano na sukhāya te /
GSP27moksop_u:21353: śamam ehi śamāt tāta sukhaṃ sāram avāpya te //MU_5,11.5//
GSP27moksop_u:21355: tathā tathaiti sphāratvaṃ saṃsāras tava cittaka //MU_5,11.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21359: tasmāt tyaktvā vicitrāṃ tvaṃ cintām upaśamaṃ vraja //MU_5,11.8//
GSP27moksop_u:21361: asyāś cet sāram āpnoṣi tad enām eva saṃśraya //MU_5,11.9//
GSP27moksop_u:21363: maitad gṛhāṇa mā muñca śuddhayā viharecchayā //MU_5,11.10//
GSP27moksop_u:21364: idaṃ dṛśyam asat sad vāpy udetv astam upaitu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:21366: manāg api na sambandhas tava dṛśyena vastunā /
GSP27moksop_u:21368: asat tvam etac ca na sad dvayor evāsatos satoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21370: asad etad bhavat sac cet tathāpi kila sundara /
GSP27moksop_u:21371: saṅgas sadasatoḥ kīdṛg vada tvaṃ mṛtajīvatoḥ //MU_5,11.14//
GSP27moksop_u:21372: citta tvam atha dṛśyaṃ ca dve eva yadi sanmaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21373: sadā sthite tat prasaraḥ kuto harṣaviṣādayoḥ //MU_5,11.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21374: tasmān mā bhava mūḍhaṃ tvaṃ mā samullāsam āhara /
GSP27moksop_u:21375: akṣubdhāṃ buddhim ātiṣṭha bhavya tyaja bhavasthitim //MU_5,11.16//
GSP27moksop_u:21377: mā mohamalam āsādya mandatāṃ gaccha durmate //MU_5,11.17//
GSP27moksop_u:21378: na tad ihāsti samunnatam uttamaṃ vrajasi yena parāṃ paripūrṇatām /
GSP27moksop_u:21379: tad avalambya balād atidhīratāṃ jahihi cañcalatāṃ śaṭha re manaḥ //MU_5,11.18//
GSP27moksop_u:21383: evaṃ vicārayaṃs tatra svarājye janako nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21386: kevalaṃ susamaṃ svacchaṃ sa sadaiva vyatiṣṭhata //MU_5,12.2//
GSP27moksop_u:21387: tataḥ prabhṛty asau dṛśyaṃ nājahāra na cātyajat /
GSP27moksop_u:21395: sa dadarśākhilān bhāvāṃś cittantau maṇivat tatān /
GSP27moksop_u:21397: prahṛṣṭo na babhūvāsau kadācin na ca duḥkhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21404: arthānarthais svarājyotthair na glāyati na hṛṣyati //MU_5,12.11//
GSP27moksop_u:21405: kurvann api karoty eṣa na kiñcid api kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:21415: na tad guror na śāstrārthān na puṇyāt prāpyate padam /
GSP27moksop_u:21418: padam āsādyate rāma na nāma kriyayānyayā //MU_5,12.18//
GSP27moksop_u:21428: duṣprajñaḥ kāryam āsādya pradhānam api naśyati //MU_5,12.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21432: phalaṃ phalaty atisvādu māso bimbam ivaindavam //MU_5,12.25//
GSP27moksop_u:21433: ya eva yatnaḥ kriyate bāhyārthopārjane naraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21434: sa eva yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ pūrvaṃ prajñāvivardhane //MU_5,12.26//
GSP27moksop_u:21437: yat svargād yac ca pātālād yad rājyāt samavāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21440: nācārair na ca vā tīrthais tapasā ca na rāghava //MU_5,12.29//
GSP27moksop_u:21441: yat prāptās sampadaṃ daivīm api bhūmicarā narāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21444: jambukair vijitās siṃhās siṃhair hariṇakā iva //MU_5,12.31//
GSP27moksop_u:21445: pāmarair api bhūpatvaṃ prāptaṃ prajñāvaśān naraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21452: śikṣitaḥ pāram āpnoti nāvā naśyaty aśikṣitaḥ //MU_5,12.35//
GSP27moksop_u:21454: naraṃ nayati saṃsāre vahantī naur ivārṇave //MU_5,12.36//
GSP27moksop_u:21456: doṣā na paribādhante sannaddham iva sāyakāḥ //MU_5,12.37//
GSP27moksop_u:21457: prajñayedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ samyag evāṅga dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21458: samyagdarśinam āyānti nāpado na ca sampadaḥ //MU_5,12.38//
GSP27moksop_u:21461: padam atulam upaitum icchatā svaṃ prathamam iyaṃ matir eva lālanīyā /
GSP27moksop_u:21462: phalam abhipatatā kṛṣīvalena prathamataraṃ nanu kṛṣyate dharaiva //MU_5,12.40//
GSP27moksop_u:21469: prāpnuvanti svayaṃ prāpyaṃ te janā janako yathā //MU_5,13.2//
GSP27moksop_u:21470: tāvat tāvad vijityārīn indriyākhyān yateta ha /
GSP27moksop_u:21475: kudṛṣṭayaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare //MU_5,13.5//
GSP27moksop_u:21480: na daivaṃ na ca karmāṇi na dhanāni na bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21483: teṣāṃ mandā matis tāta nānugamyā vināśinī //MU_5,13.9//
GSP27moksop_u:21489: vikāsam ety ayaṃ dehī devaḥ prātar ivāmbujam //MU_5,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:21492: ayam evāham ity asyāṃ niśāyām udite kṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21494: ayam evāham ity asmin saṅkoce vilayaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:21497: tathā tvam api sadbuddhe vicāryāntaḥ parityaja //MU_5,13.16//
GSP27moksop_u:21499: nūnaṃ prakaṭatām eti svāloko bhāskaraḥ paraḥ //MU_5,13.17//
GSP27moksop_u:21502: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na ca nāstīti bhāvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21505: yad etan manaso rāma taṃ bandhaṃ viddhi netarat //MU_5,13.20//
GSP27moksop_u:21506: mā khedaṃ bhaja heyeṣu mopādeyaparo bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:21508: yeṣām idam upādeyam idaṃ heyam iti sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21509: vilīnā te na vāñchanti na tyajantīha netare //MU_5,13.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21511: na tāvat samatā bhāti sābhre vyomnīva candrikā //MU_5,13.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21512: avastv idam idaṃ vastu yasyeti lulitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21513: tasmin nodeti samatā śāhoṭa iva mañjarī //MU_5,13.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21517: nānānānātayā nityaṃ kim ayuktiḥ kva yuktatā //MU_5,13.26//
GSP27moksop_u:21519: cañcale sphurato yasmin kutas tasyeha somyatā //MU_5,13.27//
GSP27moksop_u:21522: dhṛtir maitrī smṛtis tuṣṭir muditā mṛdubhāṣitā /
GSP27moksop_u:21524: dhāvamānam adho bhogāṃś cittaṃ pratyāhared balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:21526: bāhyān arthān imāṃs tyaktvā tiṣṭhan gacchan svapañ śvasan /
GSP27moksop_u:21527: sarvathā sarvadā sarvān āntarāṃś ca nivārayet //MU_5,13.31//
GSP27moksop_u:21534: manasaiva manaś chittvā vismṛtya caramaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21536: moho vismṛtya saṃsāraṃ na bhūyaḥ parirohati //MU_5,13.36//
GSP27moksop_u:21537: tiṣṭhan gacchañ śvasan rāma nivasann utpatan patan /
GSP27moksop_u:21538: asad evedam ity antar niścityāsthāṃ parityaja //MU_5,13.37//
GSP27moksop_u:21539: samatām alam āśritya samprāptaṃ kāryam āharan /
GSP27moksop_u:21541: yathā sarvartuliṅgāni na bibharti bibharti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21542: kham evam iha kāryāṇi kuru mā kuru vānagha //MU_5,13.39//
GSP27moksop_u:21543: tvam eva vettā tvam ajas tvam ātmā tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21549: sa yat karoti yad bhuṅkte yad dadāti nihanti yat /
GSP27moksop_u:21552: pravartate yaḥ kāryeṣu na sa majjati kutracit //MU_5,13.44//
GSP27moksop_u:21557: siṃhavīryavaśāl labdhaṃ māṃsaṃ bhuṅkte hi jambukaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21560: bhāvayaṃś citam evaikāṃ cittām etya cid apy ataḥ //MU_5,13.48//
GSP27moksop_u:21561: jaḍaṃ yat kila nirhīnaṃ citā dīpikayojjhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21562: tan manaś śavasaṅkāśam acid uttiṣṭhate katham //MU_5,13.49//
GSP27moksop_u:21564: kalanā cittam ity uktyā kathyate śāstradarśibhiḥ //MU_5,13.50//
GSP27moksop_u:21565: yaś citaḥ kṣubdha ākāras saiveyaṃ kalanocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21566: cid evāham iti jñātvā sā cittām eva gacchati //MU_5,13.51//
GSP27moksop_u:21567: cetyena rahitā yaiṣā cit tad brahma sanātanam /
GSP27moksop_u:21568: cetyena sahitā yaiṣā cit seyaṃ kalanocyate //MU_5,13.52//
GSP27moksop_u:21569: kiñcidaspaṣṭarūpaṃ yad brahma tat saṃsthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21570: kalanām asad evaitya sad ivopasthitaṃ hṛdi //MU_5,13.53//
GSP27moksop_u:21571: cittam ity eva rūḍheha yadaiva kalanā citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21572: tadaiva cittvaṃ vismṛtya sā jaḍeva vyavasthitā //MU_5,13.54//
GSP27moksop_u:21575: saiṣā cid eva jaḍatām āgateva svaśaktitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21576: na samprabodhitā yāvad rūpaṃ tāvan na budhyate //MU_5,13.56//
GSP27moksop_u:21583: aprabuddhā jaḍā hy eṣā na kiñcid avabudhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21587: na tu saṅkalpitā yaiṣā kalaneti jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:21591: yathā śilāmayī kanyā coditāpi na nṛtyati /
GSP27moksop_u:21592: tatheyaṃ kalanā dehe na kiñcid avabudhyate //MU_5,13.64//
GSP27moksop_u:21602: kalanā tadvad eveyaṃ sphuraty ātmani saty alam //MU_5,13.69//
GSP27moksop_u:21603: yad etat spandanaṃ rāma manaso 'dhigataṃ śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21607: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti yā kalanā sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:21609: dhīś cittaṃ jīva ity etās saṅkalpasyāsatas sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21610: sañjñās saṅkalpitās tajjñair na rāma paramārthataḥ //MU_5,13.73//
GSP27moksop_u:21611: na mano no matir nāpi jīvo na ca śarīrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:21613: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ātmā kālakramas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:21617: manas tatra parikṣīṇaṃ yatra saṃvit parātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21626: kalanety ucyate neha ghaṭavad vidyate manaḥ //MU_5,13.81//
GSP27moksop_u:21628: dravyasthāyāṃ tu tad dravyaṃ prāṇarūpaṃ hi mānasam //MU_5,13.82//
GSP27moksop_u:21630: spandavedanato yat tan mana ity abhidhīyate //MU_5,13.83//
GSP27moksop_u:21634: na punar manasām asti śaktis spandāvabodhane //MU_5,13.85//
GSP27moksop_u:21636: cic citas svātmanas svasthā sarvadā sarvagaiva sā //MU_5,13.86//
GSP27moksop_u:21637: cicchaktes spandaśakteś ca sambandhaḥ kalpyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21638: mithyaiva tat samutpannaṃ mithyājñānaṃ tad ucyate //MU_5,13.87//
GSP27moksop_u:21639: eṣā hy avidyā kathitā māyaiṣā sā nigadyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21642: na kṛtaṃ cet parikṣīṇās tad imā bhavabhītayaḥ //MU_5,13.89//
GSP27moksop_u:21643: vāyutas spandaśaktir yā sā citā cetyate yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:21647: sarvagatvāc cid anyena kena sambadhyate kila /
GSP27moksop_u:21648: akhaṇḍaśakter indrasya kena syāt saha saṅgaraḥ //MU_5,13.92//
GSP27moksop_u:21650: sambandhena vinā kasya siddhaṃ tat kīdṛśaṃ manaḥ //MU_5,13.93//
GSP27moksop_u:21651: citspandayor ekatāyāṃ kiṃ nāma mana ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21653: tasmān nāsty eva duṣṭātma cittaṃ nāma jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:21656: mano mithyā samuditaṃ nāsty eva paramārthataḥ //MU_5,13.96//
GSP27moksop_u:21657: mā tvam antaḥ kvacit kiñcit saṅkalpaya mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:21658: manas saṅkalpakaṃ nāma yasmān nāstīha kutracit //MU_5,13.97//
GSP27moksop_u:21663: yasya nātmā na deho 'sti nādhāro nāpi cākaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21669: vidyamāno hi yaś śūro lokas tenābhibhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21672: anviṣṭam api no dṛṣṭaṃ kā tasya kila śaktatā //MU_5,13.104//
GSP27moksop_u:21675: maurkhyaṃ sarvāpadāṃ niṣṭhā kā hi nāpad ajānataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21676: paśya maurkhyād iyaṃ sṛṣṭir ajātenaiva janyate //MU_5,13.106//
GSP27moksop_u:21677: hā kaṣṭam atimugdheyaṃ sṛṣṭir maurkhyavaśaṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:21685: yasmāt kileyaṃ manasā na sthitenaiva kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:21688: yā śaktā na vaśīkartuṃ na sā rāmopadiśyate //MU_5,13.112//
GSP27moksop_u:21695: sukhalavavivaśā dviṣeva taptā hṛdayagatena nijena cetasaiva /
GSP27moksop_u:21696: vidhuritadhiṣaṇā na vetti satyaṃ tad avitathaṃ parimohitā mudhaiva //MU_5,13.116//
GSP27moksop_u:21701: mana eva na mūkaṃ svaṃ yayā janatayā jitam //MU_5,14.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21704: na paśyaty eva yo hy andhas tasya kaḥ khalu durmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21710: kaś śavaṃ vā śmaśānasthaṃ samupāyakathāṃ śaṭhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21711: paripṛcchati sandehe kaś ca mūrkhaṃ praśāsti vai //MU_5,14.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21714: jitam eva mano viddhi vastuto yan na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21715: nikaṭāt sā cirāstaiva yā śilā naiva vidyate //MU_5,14.8//
GSP27moksop_u:21716: mano na vijitaṃ rāma yenāsad api durdhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:21719: indriyāṇi svadharmeṣu mano nāma kim ucyate //MU_5,14.10//
GSP27moksop_u:21720: prāṇānāṃ spandinī śaktir jñā śaktiḥ paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21721: indriyāṇāṃ nijā śaktir evaṃ ko 'tra nibadhyate //MU_5,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:21722: sarvāś ca śaktayas tasya sarvaśakteḥ kilātmanaḥ /
