GSP27moksop_u:21724: kiṃ nāma jīva ity uktaṃ yenehāndhīkṛtaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:21725: cittaṃ caivāsad eva tvaṃ viddhi kāsty asya śaktatā //MU_5,14.13//
GSP27moksop_u:21727: matir me karuṇākrāntā rāma mugdheva tapyate //MU_5,14.14//
GSP27moksop_u:21728: kaḥ kilātra kutaḥ khedo yan mūrkhaḥ paritapyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21729: duḥkhāyaiva hi jāyante karabhāḥ prākṛtās tathā //MU_5,14.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21736: diśaṃ prati girīndreṣu pulindaughā vane vane /
GSP27moksop_u:21743: tāṃ kośakāraḥ kṣudhito daṃśas tam api cañcalaḥ //MU_5,14.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21744: taṃ daṃśaṃ darduro bhuṅkte vyālas tam api darduram /
GSP27moksop_u:21745: sarpam ugrakharo hanti babhruś cainaṃ nikṛntati //MU_5,14.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21746: babhruṃ hinasti mārjāro mārjāraṃ śvā nikṛntati /
GSP27moksop_u:21747: ṛkṣaḥ kauleyakaṃ hanti ṛkṣaṃ vyāghro nikṛntati //MU_5,14.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21748: siṃho 'bhibhavati vyāghraṃ śarabhas siṃham atti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21750: meghā vātair vidhūyante vāyavo giribhir jitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21752: viṣṇunā dhriyate śakro viṣṇur gacchati jantutām /
GSP27moksop_u:21757: parasparam alaṃ mohād bhakṣyate rakṣyate 'pi ca //MU_5,14.29//
GSP27moksop_u:21759: anārataṃ ca jāyante vicitrāḥ kakubhaṃ prati //MU_5,14.30//
GSP27moksop_u:21768: evam anyeṣv asaṅkhyeṣu janmasv apacayeṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21771: saṃsārasambhrame yuktā na tuṣṭir na ca duḥkhitā //MU_5,14.36//
GSP27moksop_u:21772: paṅktayas tv evam evemā vṛkṣaparṇagaṇais saha /
GSP27moksop_u:21781: mūrkhāṇām āpadam dṛṣṭvā prarudanty upalā api //MU_5,14.41//
GSP27moksop_u:21786: mano nāsti mahābāho mā mudhaitat prakalpaya /
GSP27moksop_u:21791: saṅkalpād vardhate cittaṃ tad evāśu parityaja //MU_5,14.46//
GSP27moksop_u:21792: dṛśyam āśrayasīdaṃ cet tat sacitto 'si bandhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:21793: dṛśyaṃ santyajasīdaṃ cet tad acitto 'si mokṣavān //MU_5,14.47//
GSP27moksop_u:21795: santyakta eva mokṣāya yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,14.48//
GSP27moksop_u:21796: nāhaṃ nedam iti dhyāyaṃs tiṣṭha tvam acalācalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21799: rāma dvitvamayaṃ tyaktvā śeṣasthas susthiro bhava //MU_5,14.50//
GSP27moksop_u:21801: darśanākhye svam ātmānaṃ sarvadā bhāvayan bhava //MU_5,14.51//
GSP27moksop_u:21805: avalambya nirālambaṃ madhyam adya sthiro bhava //MU_5,14.53//
GSP27moksop_u:21808: ātmasattāṃ tyajann enāṃ cetyaṃ bhāvayasi svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21809: yadā rāma tadā yāsi cittatām atiduḥkhadām //MU_5,14.55//
GSP27moksop_u:21813: yadā gacchasi saṅkalpaṃ cetyaṃ sampadyase tadā //MU_5,14.57//
GSP27moksop_u:21814: ātmano vyatiriktaṃ sac cetyam ity aṅgasaṃvidā /
GSP27moksop_u:21815: manas sampadyate duḥkhi kṣīyate tyaktayā tayā //MU_5,14.58//
GSP27moksop_u:21816: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ity antas saṃvidodaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21817: kva cettā kva ca vā cittaṃ kiṃ cetyaṃ cintanaṃ ca kim //MU_5,14.59//
GSP27moksop_u:21818: aham ātmeti jīvo 'smīty etāvac cittakaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21820: aham ātmā na jīvākhyās sattās santītarāḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:21821: ity eva cittopaśamaḥ paramaṃ sukham ucyate //MU_5,14.61//
GSP27moksop_u:21822: ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti jāte rāghava niścaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21823: asattā cetaso jātā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ //MU_5,14.62//
GSP27moksop_u:21825: manas sugalitaṃ viddhi sūryabhāsā tamo yathā //MU_5,14.63//
GSP27moksop_u:21826: manassarpaś śarīrastho yāvat tāvan mahad bhayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21831: nirādhir vigatodvegaṃ tiṣṭha nāsti bhayaṃ tava //MU_5,14.66//
GSP27moksop_u:21832: nīrāga eva nirupāñjana eva cāsmīty etāvataiva galitā tava cittasattā /
GSP27moksop_u:21833: nirduḥkham uttamapadaṃ paramaṃ gato 'si tiṣṭhopaśāntasakalaiṣaṇa evam antaḥ //MU_5,14.67//
GSP27moksop_u:21847: tīkṣṇā kṛṣṇā sudīrghā ca vahaty aṅge sadā nije /
GSP27moksop_u:21849: yāny etāni durantāni durdharāṇy uddhatāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21853: kṣaṇam ullāsam āyāti kṣaṇam āyāti śūnyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:21869: nipataty avaṭe mūḍhas tṛṣṇām anusarañ janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21871: nāpan nāpi jarā na kṣut tathā jarayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:21874: rūḍhayā bhagavān eṣa viṣṇur vāmanatāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,15.19//
GSP27moksop_u:21878: tṛṣṇāṃ parihara krūrām uragīm iva dūrataḥ //MU_5,15.21//
GSP27moksop_u:21879: tṛṣṇayā pavanā vānti śailās tiṣṭhanti tṛṣṇayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21880: tṛṣṇayaiva dharā dhātrī trailokyaṃ tṛṣṇayā vṛtam //MU_5,15.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21883: tasmād rāghava tṛṣṇāṃ tvaṃ tyaja saṅkalpavarjanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:21884: manas saṅkalpakaṃ nāsti nirṇītam iti yuktitaḥ //MU_5,15.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21885: ayaṃ nāmāham ity eva prathamaṃ tāvad āśaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21888: na bhāvayasi ced rāma tad bahujñeṣu gaṇyase //MU_5,15.26//
GSP27moksop_u:21894: atigambhīram etat tu bhagavan vacanaṃ tava /
GSP27moksop_u:21895: yad ahaṅkāratṛṣṇe tvaṃ mā gṛhāṇeti vakṣi mām //MU_5,16.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21896: yady ahaṅkārasantyāgaṃ karomi tad imaṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:21902: tat kathaṃ santyajāmy enaṃ jīvāmi ca kathaṃ mune /
GSP27moksop_u:21903: ekam arthaṃ viniścitya vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_5,16.5//
GSP27moksop_u:21906: dvividhaḥ kathyate tajjñair dhyeyo neyaś ca nāmataḥ //MU_5,16.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21907: aham eṣāṃ padārthānām ete ca mama jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21908: nāham ebhir vinā kaścin na mayaite vinā kila //MU_5,16.7//
GSP27moksop_u:21909: ity antar niścayaṃ tyaktvā vicārya manasā saha /
GSP27moksop_u:21910: nāhaṃ padārthasya na me padārtha iti bhāvite //MU_5,16.8//
GSP27moksop_u:21912: yo nūnaṃ vāsanātyāgo dhyeyo nāma sa kīrtitaḥ //MU_5,16.9//
GSP27moksop_u:21913: sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā yaṃ kṛtvā vāsanākṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21914: jahāti nirmanā dehaṃ sa neyo vāsanākṣayaḥ //MU_5,16.10//
GSP27moksop_u:21917: nirmūlakalanāṃ kṛtvā vāsanāṃ yaḥ kṣayaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21919: dhyeyaṃ taṃ vāsanātyāgaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21923: dvāv etau rāghava tyāgau samau muktapadasthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:21924: dvāv eva brahmatāṃ yātau dvāv eva vigatajvarau //MU_5,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21930: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā yas sa mukta ihocyate //MU_5,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:21932: suṣuptavad yaś calati sa mukta iti kathyate //MU_5,16.19//
GSP27moksop_u:21936: na parāmṛśyate yo 'ntas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_5,16.21//
GSP27moksop_u:21937: suṣuptavat praśamitabhāvavṛttinā sthitaṃ sadā jāgrati yena cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:21938: kalānvito vidhur iva yas sadā mudā niṣevyate mukta itīha sa smṛtaḥ //MU_5,16.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21940: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:21941: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,16.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21945: videhamuktā ye rāma te girām iha gocare /
GSP27moksop_u:21946: naiva tiṣṭhanti tasmāt tvaṃ jīvanmuktān imāñ śṛṇu //MU_5,17.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21949: yā sthitis tṛṣṇayā jantor bāhyārthe baddhabhāvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21950: taṃ bandham āhur ācāryās saṃsāranigaḍaṃ dṛḍham //MU_5,17.3//
GSP27moksop_u:21955: pūrvaṃ yasyās tu tṛṣṇāyā vartamāne ca śāśvatī /
GSP27moksop_u:21956: nirduḥkhatā niṣkalatā sā muktaiva budhais smṛtā //MU_5,17.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21957: idam astu mamety antar yaiṣā rāghava bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:21958: tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ śṛṅkhalāṃ viddhi kalanāṃ ca mahāmate //MU_5,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:21959: tām etāṃ sarvabhāveṣu satsv asatsu ca sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:21965: padārthajātaṃ nedaṃ te nāyam apy asi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:21966: kiñcit tadanyad evedam anya evāsi śāśvataḥ //MU_5,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:21967: asadabhyutthite viśve satye vā satataṃ sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:21968: tvayi tattām upagate tṛṣṇāyās saṅgamaḥ kutaḥ //MU_5,17.12//
GSP27moksop_u:21969: anyaś ca rāma manasi puruṣasya vicāriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21973: atītas sarvabhāvebhyo vālāgrād apy ahaṃ tanuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21974: iti dvitīyo mokṣāya niścayo jāyate satām //MU_5,17.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21977: ahaṃ jagac cāsad idaṃ śūnyaṃ vyomasamaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:21979: niścayeṣu caturṣv evaṃ bandhāya prathamas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21983: sarvam ātmāham eveti niścayo yo mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:21984: tam ādāya viṣādāya na bhūyo yāti te matiḥ //MU_5,17.20//
GSP27moksop_u:21985: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21986: sarvam ātmeti tenāntar niścayena na badhyase //MU_5,17.21//
GSP27moksop_u:21987: śūnyaṃ prakṛtimāye ca brahma vijñānam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:21988: śivaḥ puruṣa īśeti nityam ātmaiva kathyate //MU_5,17.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21989: sadā sarvaṃ sad evedaṃ neha dvitvānyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:21993: ṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ nityaṃ nānṛtaṃ vidyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:21994: vāry eva sakalo 'mbhodhir na taraṅgādayaḥ pṛthak //MU_5,17.25//
GSP27moksop_u:21999: ātmīye parakīye ca sarvasminn eva sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22000: naṣṭe vopacite kārye sukhaduḥkhe gṛhāṇa mā //MU_5,17.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22004: mā patotpātapūrṇāsu nadīṣv andhaḥ karī yathā //MU_5,17.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22005: dvitvaṃ na sambhavati sarvagate mahātmany ātmany athaikyam api ca dvitayoditātma /
GSP27moksop_u:22006: advaitam aikyarahitaṃ satatoditaṃ ca sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāhur atas svarūpam //MU_5,17.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22007: naivāham asmi na ca nāma jaganti santi sarvaṃ ca vidyata idaṃ nanu nirvikāram /
GSP27moksop_u:22008: vijñānamātram avabhāsata eva śāntaṃ nāsan na saj jagad ahaṃ ca sadeti viddhi //MU_5,17.32//
GSP27moksop_u:22009: paramam amṛtam ādyaṃ bhāsanaṃ sarvabhāsām ajam ajaram acintyaṃ niṣkramaṃ nirvikāram /
GSP27moksop_u:22010: vigatakaraṇajālam jīvanaṃ jīvaśaktes sakalakalanahīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām //MU_5,17.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22011: satatam uditam īśaṃ vyātate citprakāśe sthitam anubhavabījaṃ svātmabhāvopadeśyam /
GSP27moksop_u:22012: svadanam anu cito 'ntar brahma sarvaṃ sadaitat tvam aham api jagac cety astu te niścayo 'ntaḥ //MU_5,17.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22025: nodvegī na ca tuṣṭātmā saṃsāre nāvasīdati //MU_5,18.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22028: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GSP27moksop_u:22030: pṛṣṭas san prakṛtaṃ vaktā na pṛṣṭas sthāṇuvat sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22036: paraṃ padam upārūḍho bhaṅgurāṃ jāgatīṃ sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:22039: svabhāva īdṛśas teṣāṃ kathitas tava rāghava //MU_5,18.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22054: pravicārya daśās sarvā yad atucchataraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:22055: tad eva bhāvenālambya loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22057: bahis tapto 'ntar āśīto loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22059: kartā bahir akartāntar loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22060: jñātavān asi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ satyam āntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:22061: yathecchasi tayā dṛṣṭyā loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22068: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti dehinaḥ paramārthataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22070: bhrāntimātram idaṃ mohāj jagad rāghava dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22073: bandhas syāt tadabhāve tu mokṣaḥ kasya vidhīyate //MU_5,18.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22075: tattvajñānāt kṣayaṃ yāti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgadhīḥ //MU_5,18.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22076: jñātavān asi tattvaṃ svam anayā sūkṣmayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:22078: nāsi cet tvaṃ tad akhilās suhṛdbāndhavabhāvanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22080: asi cet tvaṃ tad atyantasattvavān anumīyase /
GSP27moksop_u:22083: ātmano nāsti sambandhaḥ kim enam anuśocasi //MU_5,18.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22085: na te rāmāsti sambandhaḥ kiṃ bibheṣi jagadbhramāt //MU_5,18.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22087: kas te rāghava sambandho yad etān anuśocasi //MU_5,18.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22088: tvaṃ ced babhūvitha purā tathedānīṃ bhaviṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:22089: yady atheha sthito 'sīti jñātavān asi niścayam //MU_5,18.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22091: bandhūn atītān subahūn kasmāt tvaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,18.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22093: yadi rāma tathāpi tvaṃ sadrūpaḥ kiṃ vimuhyasi //MU_5,18.39//
GSP27moksop_u:22094: purā bhūtvādya bhūtvā ca bhūyaś cen na bhaviṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:22096: tasmān na duḥkhitā yuktā prakṛte jāgate krame /
GSP27moksop_u:22097: na caiva muditā yuktā yuktaṃ kāryānuvartanam //MU_5,18.41//
GSP27moksop_u:22098: mā gaccha duḥkhitāṃ rāma sukhitām api mā vraja /
GSP27moksop_u:22101: nityaśuddhaḥ prakāśas tvaṃ jvālāyā iva koṭaram //MU_5,18.43//
GSP27moksop_u:22104: saṃsārasthitir eveyaṃ yad bhūtvā bhūyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22105: ajñenaiva na tu jñena jño 'si rāma sthiro bhava //MU_5,18.45//
GSP27moksop_u:22106: svarūpam idam asyās tu saṃsṛtes santataṃ hi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:22107: ajñānāt sphāratām eti jñānavān asi sanmate //MU_5,18.46//
GSP27moksop_u:22108: rūpaṃ kim anyad bhavatu bhramamātrād ṛte bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:22109: svapnamātrād ṛte svapne bhavaty anyo hi kaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,18.47//
GSP27moksop_u:22114: na bandhuḥ kasyacit kaścid iha no kaścid apy ariḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22115: sadā sarvaṃ ca sarvasya sarvas sarveśvarecchayā //MU_5,18.50//
GSP27moksop_u:22118: adha ūrdhvatvam āyāti yāty ūrdhvatvam adhas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22120: svargasthā narakaṃ yānti nārakā yānti viṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:22121: yoner yonyantaraṃ yānti dvīpād dvīpāntaraṃ janāḥ //MU_5,18.53//
GSP27moksop_u:22122: dhīrāḥ kārpaṇyam āyānti kṛpaṇā yānti dhīratām /
GSP27moksop_u:22125: neha samprāpyate kiñcid agnau himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,18.55//
GSP27moksop_u:22126: ye ye rāma mahābhāgā bahavo 'bahavo 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:22127: naṣṭā eveha dṛśyante te te katipayair dinaiḥ //MU_5,18.56//
GSP27moksop_u:22130: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyam ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:22133: āmūlam antaś chinnābhir bahir vihara helayā //MU_5,18.59//
GSP27moksop_u:22135: na yathaiṣi śramaṃ śrānto vāsanābhāravān yathā //MU_5,18.60//
GSP27moksop_u:22138: ayaṃ bandhur ayaṃ neti gaṇanā laghucetasām /
GSP27moksop_u:22140: na tad asti na yatrāhaṃ na tad asti na yan mama /
GSP27moksop_u:22142: nāstam eti na codeti yaś cidākāśavan mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:22143: sa sarvaṃ paśyati svasthaḥ khastho bhūmitalaṃ yathā //MU_5,18.64//
GSP27moksop_u:22144: sarvā eva hi te bhūtajātayo rāma bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22145: atyantāsaṃstutā etās tava nāma na kāścana //MU_5,18.65//
GSP27moksop_u:22146: vividhajanmaśatāhitasambhrame jagati bandhur abandhur iti kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:22147: bhramadaśaiva vivalgati vastutas tribhuvanaṃ cirabandhur abandhv api //MU_5,18.66//
GSP27moksop_u:22153: ayaṃ bandhur ayaṃ neti kathāprastāvatas smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:22154: itihāsam imaṃ puṇyaṃ sāścaryaṃ śṛṇu rāghava //MU_5,19.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22158: śṛṅgair ātatam ākāśaṃ jitavān yas samunnataiḥ //MU_5,19.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22173: muner babhūvatus tasya dvau putrāv indusundarau /
GSP27moksop_u:22175: sa tābhyāṃ saha putrābhyāṃ bhāryayā saha caikayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22177: atha kāle tayos tasya putrayor jñānavān abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:22180: maurkhyād atigato nāntaḥ padaṃ lolam ivāsthitaḥ //MU_5,19.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22192: tatyāja tanum amlānāṃ ṣaṭpadī padminīm iva //MU_5,19.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22196: puṇya eva sthite 'vyagre pāvano duḥkham āyayau //MU_5,19.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22202: kiṃ putra ghanatāṃ śokaṃ nayasy āndhyaikakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:22204: pitā tava mahāprājña gatas sārdhaṃ tvadambayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22206: tat sthānaṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad rūpaṃ viditātmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:22207: svaṃ bhāvam abhisampanne kiṃ pitary abhiśocasi //MU_5,19.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22208: kim īdṛśī tvayā baddhā bhāvaneha vimohajā /
GSP27moksop_u:22210: na saiva bhavato mātā nāsāv eva pitā tava /
GSP27moksop_u:22211: na bhavān eva tanayas tayor nissaṅkhyaputrayoḥ //MU_5,19.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22214: asaṅkhyaputrayor naiva bhavān eva sutas tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22221: tad atītā na śocyante kim ajasraṃ sahasraśaḥ //MU_5,19.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22223: paramārthena tu prājña nāsti mitraṃ na bāndhavaḥ //MU_5,19.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22224: manāg apīha hi bhrātaḥ paramārthe na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22225: mahaty api cirāt tapte marāv iva payolavaḥ //MU_5,19.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22227: svapna eva mahābuddhe dināni trīṇi pañca vā //MU_5,19.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22228: dṛṣṭyā tu pāramārthikyā putra satyaṃ vicāraya /
GSP27moksop_u:22229: neha tvaṃ naiva cedaṃ te bhrāntim antaḥ parityaja //MU_5,19.39//
GSP27moksop_u:22230: ayaṃ mṛto gataś cāham itīmā dṛṣṭayaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22237: kaḥ pitā kiṃ ca vā mitraṃ kā mātā ke ca bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22241: bandhutve bhāvito bandhuḥ paratve bhāvitaḥ paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22244: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyam ity asatkalanā kutaḥ //MU_5,20.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22246: ko 'haṃ syām iti cittena svayaṃ putra vicāraya //MU_5,20.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22247: dṛṣṭyā tu pāramārthikyā na kaścit tvaṃ na cāpy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:22248: mithyājñānam idaṃ puṇyaḥ pāvanaś ceti valgati //MU_5,20.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22249: kas te pitā kaś ca suhṛt kā mātā kaś ca vā paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22250: khasyānantavilāsasya kim asvaṃ kiṃ svam ucyatām //MU_5,20.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22251: asi cet tvaṃ tad anyeṣu yāteṣu bahujanmasu /
GSP27moksop_u:22252: ye bandhavo ye vibhavāḥ kiṃ tān api na śocasi //MU_5,20.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22254: bahavo bandhavo dhanyās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22256: haṃsasya bandhavo haṃsās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22258: bahavo bandhavo vṛkṣās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22260: bahavo bandhavas siṃhās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22261: babhūvus te sravantīṣu sarassv ambhojinīṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22262: bahavo bandhavo matsyāḥ kiṃ tān api na śocasi //MU_5,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22265: hehayeṣu ca mātaṅgas trigarteṣu ca gardabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22267: vindhyādrau pippalo bhūtvā ghuṇo bhūtvā mahāvaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:22268: mandare markaṭo bhūtvā viprāj jāto 'si kandare //MU_5,20.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22269: kosaleṣu dvijo bhūtvā bhūtvā vaṅgeṣu tittiriḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22270: aśvo bhūtvā tukhāreṣu jātas tvaṃ brāhmaṇād vane //MU_5,20.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22271: yaḥ kīṭas tālakandāntar daṃśako ya udumbare /
GSP27moksop_u:22272: yaḥ prājiko vindhyavane sa tvaṃ putra mamānujaḥ //MU_5,20.18//
GSP27moksop_u:22274: pipīlako yaṣ ṣaṇ māsān so 'yaṃ tvam anujo mama //MU_5,20.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22276: sārdhaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sādho so 'yaṃ tvam anujo mama //MU_5,20.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22278: ṣaṭpadeneva padmeṣu so 'yaṃ tvam anujo mama //MU_5,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22284: samatītās smarāmy adya tā jñānoditayā dṛśā //MU_5,20.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22285: trigarteṣu śuko bhūtvā haṃso bhūtvā sarittaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:22286: pakkaṇe vāyaso bhūtvā jāto 'ham iha kānane //MU_5,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22287: bhuktvā pulindatāṃ vindhye kṛtvā vaṅgeṣu vṛkṣatām /
GSP27moksop_u:22289: yaś cātako himagirau yo rājā puṇḍramaṇḍale /
GSP27moksop_u:22290: vyāghro yas sahyakuñjeṣu sa eveha tavāgrajaḥ //MU_5,20.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22291: yo gṛdhro daśavarṣāṇi yo mṛgo māsapañcakam /
GSP27moksop_u:22292: yas samānāṃ śataṃ siṃhas sa eveha tavāgrajaḥ //MU_5,20.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22296: vilāsā janmanāṃ bhrātas smaryante prāktanā mayā //MU_5,20.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22297: evaṃ sthite jagajjātāv āvayoś śataśo gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22298: pitaro mātaraś caiva bhrātaras suhṛdas tathā //MU_5,20.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22299: kāṃs tān samanuśocāvo na śocāvaś ca kān api /
GSP27moksop_u:22300: bandhūn kiṃ vāpi śocāva īdṛśy eva jagatsthitiḥ //MU_5,20.32//
GSP27moksop_u:22301: anantāḥ pitaro yānti yānty anantāś ca mātaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22303: kiṃ pramāṇam ataḥ putra duḥkhasyātra sukhasya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:22304: tasmāt sarvaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāvas svasthatāṃ gatau //MU_5,20.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22305: prapañcabhāvanāṃ tyaktvā manasy aham iti sthitām /
GSP27moksop_u:22306: tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha bhadraṃ te yāṃ yānti gatikovidāḥ //MU_5,20.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22311: na te duḥkhaṃ na te janma na te mātā na te pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:22312: ātmaivāsi na sadbuddhe tvam anyaḥ kaścid eva hi //MU_5,20.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22316: tajjñās tu prekṣakā eva sākṣidharme vyavasthitāḥ //MU_5,20.40//
GSP27moksop_u:22317: kartāro 'pi na kartāro yathā dīpā niśāgame /
GSP27moksop_u:22322: putrātmanātmani mahāmaṇināmunaiva santyajya sambhramam alaṃ paritoṣam ehi //MU_5,20.43//
GSP27moksop_u:22326: evaṃ prabodhitas tena tadā puṇyena pāvanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22327: prabodham āpa prākāśyaṃ prabhāta iva bhūtalam //MU_5,21.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22331: tau videhau gatasnehau dīpāv iva śamaṃ gatau //MU_5,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22333: āśāḥ kiṃ gṛhyate tābhyaḥ kiṃ vā santyajyate 'nagha //MU_5,21.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22335: upāyas tyāga evaiko na nāma paripālanam //MU_5,21.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22339: lokam ālokayan dīnaṃ mā tiṣṭhottiṣṭha rāghava //MU_5,21.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22340: eṣā brāhmī sthitis svacchā niṣkāmā vigatāmayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22341: enāṃ prāpya mahābāho vimūḍho 'pi na muhyati //MU_5,21.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22342: ekaṃ vivekaṃ suhṛdam ekāṃ prauḍhasakhīṃ dhiyam /
GSP27moksop_u:22343: ādāya viharann evaṃ saṅkaṭe 'pi na muhyasi //MU_5,21.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22345: na svadhairyād ṛte kaścid abhyuddharati saṅkaṭāt //MU_5,21.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22348: na tat tribhuvanaiśvaryān na kośād ratnadhāriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22351: patanti puruṣā yāvan manas teṣāṃ na vijvaram //MU_5,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22352: pūrṇe manasi sampūrṇaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sudhādravaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22355: āśayā riktatām eti śaradīva saro manaḥ //MU_5,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22359: na valgati mahat tasya rājate hṛdvanāntaram //MU_5,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22362: śītatā sā na śītāṃśau na himācalakandare /
GSP27moksop_u:22364: na tathā bhāti pūrṇendur na pūrṇaḥ kṣīrasāgaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22365: na lakṣmīvadanaṃ kāntaṃ spṛhāhīnaṃ yathā manaḥ //MU_5,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22372: anuttamena dhairyeṇa tena citte kṣayaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:22373: tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate //MU_5,21.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22375: na dadāsi prarohaṃ cet tad bhavān asti rāghava //MU_5,21.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22376: cittaṃ vṛttivihīnaṃ te yadā yātam acittatām /
GSP27moksop_u:22377: tadā mokṣamayīm antas sattām āpnoṣi tāṃ tatām //MU_5,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:22380: vartanaṃ vṛttir ity uktaṃ vartate cittam āśayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22381: cittavṛttim ato hy āśāṃ tyaktvā niścittatāṃ vraja //MU_5,21.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22382: yo yayā vartate vṛttyā sa tayaiva vinā kṣayī /
GSP27moksop_u:22384: praśamitasakalaiṣaṇo mahātman bhava bhavabandham apāsya muktacittaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22385: manasi nigaḍarajjavaḥ kadāśāḥ parigalitāsu ca tāsu ko na muktaḥ //MU_5,21.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22393: prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ viśrānto 'smy amale pade //MU_5,22.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22397: tiṣṭhāmy ānandavān antas sāyaṃ pūrṇa ivoḍurāṭ //MU_5,22.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22399: tṛptim eṣāṃ na gacchāmi vacasāṃ vadatas tava //MU_5,22.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22401: vibho kathaya khidyante santo nāvanataṃ prati //MU_5,22.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22403: śṛṇu rāghava te vakṣye baḍivṛttāntam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:22404: śrutena yena tena tvaṃ bodham āpsyasi śāśvatam //MU_5,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22405: asty asmiñ jagataḥ kośe kasmiṃścid diktaṭāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:22406: pātālam iti vikhyāto loko bhūmer adhas sthitaḥ //MU_5,22.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22412: kvacid danusutair vyāptaś caladbhir iva merubhiḥ //MU_5,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22418: kvacid ratnākarair vyāptaḥ pātālair itarair iva //MU_5,22.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22436: vinamanti diśas sarvā latāḥ phalanatā iva //MU_5,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22438: daśakoṭīs sa varṣāṇāṃ daityo rājyaṃ cakāra ha //MU_5,22.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22452: punas tāny eva karmāṇi lajjāyai na tu tuṣṭaye //MU_5,22.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22453: punar āliṅgyate kāntā punar eva ca bhujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22455: tam eva śuktavirasaṃ vyāpāraughaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22456: divase divase kurvan prājñaḥ kasmān na lajjate //MU_5,22.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22457: punar dinaṃ punā rātriḥ punaḥ kāryaparamparā /
GSP27moksop_u:22458: punaḥ punar ahaṃ manye prājñasyeyaṃ viḍambanā //MU_5,22.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22459: ūrmitāṃ punar āsādya punar eti nirūrmitām /
GSP27moksop_u:22460: yathā jalaṃ tathaivāyaṃ tāṃ tām eti kriyāṃ janaḥ //MU_5,22.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22464: ko 'rthas syāt tādṛśo yena punaḥ karma na gacchati //MU_5,22.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22465: kiyantam atha vā kālam idam āḍambaraṃ mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:22469: phalam ekaṃ mahodāraṃ neha paśyāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:22470: kāryam astītarat prāpte yasmin nāma na kiñcana //MU_5,22.40//
GSP27moksop_u:22471: bhogād ṛte kim atyantaṃ syād ramyam avināśi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22472: etat sañcintayāmy āśu dadhyau matvety asau baḍiḥ //MU_5,22.41//
GSP27moksop_u:22474: ātmany eva manasy arthaṃ sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ vimarśayan //MU_5,22.42//
GSP27moksop_u:22475: purā kileha bhagavān pṛṣṭo 'bhūt sa virocanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22478: yatra sarve bhramāś śāntāḥ ko 'sau sīmānta ucyatām //MU_5,22.44//
GSP27moksop_u:22481: kiṃ prāpyeha samastebhyaḥ prāptebhyas tṛptimān pumān /
GSP27moksop_u:22482: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā darśanaṃ bhūyo na tātopakaroty alam //MU_5,22.46//
GSP27moksop_u:22483: atyantabahavo 'py ete bhogā hi na sukhāvahāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22484: kṣobhayanti mano mohe pātayanti satām api //MU_5,22.47//
GSP27moksop_u:22485: tat tāta vitatānandasundaraṃ kiñcid eva me /
GSP27moksop_u:22486: tādṛk kathaya yatrasthaś ciraṃ viśrāntim emy aham //MU_5,22.48//
GSP27moksop_u:22487: ity ākarṇya purā niśākarakaraspardhāparārdhyollasatpuṣpāpūrakṛtāvaguṇṭhanapaṭasyoktaṃ tale tena me /
GSP27moksop_u:22488: pitrā svargahṛtasya sāgarataros saṃropitasyājire sphārākārarasāyanāsavasamaṃ mohopaśāntyai vacaḥ //MU_5,22.49//
GSP27moksop_u:22493: trailokyānāṃ sahasrāṇi yatra mānti bahūny api //MU_5,23.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22494: yatra nāmbhodharā nāpi sāgarā vā na cādrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22495: na vanāni na tīrthāni na nadyo na sarāṃsi ca //MU_5,23.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22496: na mahī nāpi cākāśo na dyaur no pavanādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22497: na candrārkau na lokeśā na devā na ca dānavāḥ //MU_5,23.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22498: na bhūtayakṣarakṣāṃsi na gulmā na vanaśriyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22500: nāpo na jvalanaṃ nāśā nordhvaṃ nādho na viṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:22501: nāloko na tamo nāhaṃ na harīndraharādayaḥ //MU_5,23.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22502: eka evāsti sumahāṃs tatra rājā mahādyutiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22503: sarvakṛt sarvagas sarvas sa ca tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ //MU_5,23.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22505: aghaṭaṃ ghaṭayaty āśu ghaṭaṃ vighaṭayaty alam //MU_5,23.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22506: bhoktuṃ kiñcin na śaknoti na ca jānāti kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:22507: rājārthaṃ kevalaṃ sarvaṃ karoty ajño 'pi san sadā //MU_5,23.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22511: katham āsādyate vāpi kena vādhigataḥ prabho //MU_5,23.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22512: kas sa tādṛgvidho mantrī rājā vāpi mahābalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22516: sa tatra mantrī bhagavān devāsuragaṇais suta /
GSP27moksop_u:22518: nāsau sahasranayano na yamo na dhaneśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22519: nāmaro nāsuro vāpi yadi putraka jīyate //MU_5,23.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22529: trailokyam idam ākramya samrāḍ iva vivalgati //MU_5,23.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22533: tad etat krīḍanaṃ tasya mantriṇo mantraśālinaḥ //MU_5,23.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22534: sa mantrī kevalaṃ putra tenaiva prabhuṇā yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:22535: jīyate tat sujeyo 'sāv anyathā tv acalācalaḥ //MU_5,23.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22536: tasyaiva tatprabhoḥ kāle jetuṃ taṃ mantriṇaṃ nijam /
GSP27moksop_u:22539: jetuṃ ced asti te śaktis tat parākramavān asi //MU_5,23.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22541: ime vikāsam āyānti vilīyante layaṃ gate //MU_5,23.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22543: yadi jetuṃ samartho 'si dhīras tad asi suvrata //MU_5,23.26//
GSP27moksop_u:22544: tasmiñ jite jitā lokā bhavanty avijitā api /
GSP27moksop_u:22545: ajite tv ajitā ete cirakālajitā api //MU_5,23.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22547: tajjaye yatnam ātiṣṭha kaṣṭayāpi hi ceṣṭayā //MU_5,23.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22549: trijagad api vaśīkṛtaṃ samantād atibalinā nanu helayaiva tena //MU_5,23.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22554: ko 'sau veti mahāvīrya sarvaṃ prakathayāśu me //MU_5,24.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22558: putra yuktyā gṛhīto 'sau kṣaṇād āyāti vaśyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:22559: yuktiṃ vinā dahaty eṣa āśīviṣa ivoddhataḥ //MU_5,24.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22561: rājānaṃ taṃ samālokya padam āsādayanti te //MU_5,24.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22562: dṛṣṭe tasmin mahīpāle sa mantrī vaśam eti vaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22563: tasmiṃś ca mantriṇy ākrānte sa rājā dṛśyate punaḥ //MU_5,24.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22564: yāvan na dṛṣṭo rājāsau tāvan mantrī na jīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22565: mantrī ca yāvan na jitas tāvad rājā na dṛśyate //MU_5,24.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22566: rājany adṛṣṭe durmantrī sa duḥkhāyotphalaty ati /
GSP27moksop_u:22567: mantriṇy anirjite rājā so 'tyantaṃ yāty adṛśyatām //MU_5,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22569: rājñas sandarśanaṃ tasya mantriṇaś ca parājayam //MU_5,24.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22571: dvayaṃ sampādayann etad deśam āpnoti śobhanam //MU_5,24.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22572: tvam abhyāse phalībhūte taṃ deśam adhigacchasi /
GSP27moksop_u:22573: yadi daityendra tad bhūyo manāg api na śocasi //MU_5,24.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22576: śṛṇu kaḥ putra deśo 'sau sarvaṃ prakaṭayāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:22578: rājā tu tatra bhagavān ātmā sarvapadātigaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22579: tena mantrī kṛtaḥ prājño manonāmā mahāmate //MU_5,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22580: mano viśvatayā viṣvag idaṃ pariṇatiṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:22582: tasmiñ jite jitaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ cāsāditaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:22585: yā yuktir bhagavaṃs tasya cittasyākramaṇe sphuṭā /
GSP27moksop_u:22586: tāṃ me kathaya tat tāta yayā jeṣyāmi dāruṇam //MU_5,24.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22588: viṣayān prati bhoḥ putra sarvān eva hi sarvathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22589: anāsthā paramā yaiṣā sā yuktir manaso jaye //MU_5,24.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22592: eṣā hy atyantaduṣprāpā suprāpā ca mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:22593: anabhyastā hi duṣprāpā svabhyastā prāpyate sukham //MU_5,24.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22595: sarvatas sphuṭatām eti sekasiktā latā yathā //MU_5,24.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22597: putra śālir ivāvyuptas tasmād enāṃ samāharet //MU_5,24.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22599: viratiṃ viṣayeṣv ete yāvan nāyānti dehinaḥ //MU_5,24.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22603: bhogeṣv aratir abhyāsād vṛddhiṃ neyā latā yathā //MU_5,24.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22604: puruṣārthād ṛte putra neha samprāpyate śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:22607: daivam ity ucyate loke na daivaṃ dehavat kvacit //MU_5,24.26//
GSP27moksop_u:22609: ucyate daivaśabdena sā narair eva netaraiḥ //MU_5,24.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22610: yad yatheha sadā yatra sampannaṃ phalatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:22614: yathā saṅkalpyate yad yat pauruṣeṇa tathaiva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:22616: kartr ato mana eveha yat kalpayati tat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22617: niyatiṃ yādṛśīm etat saṅkalpayati sā tathā //MU_5,24.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22618: niyatān niyatān kāṃścid bhāvān aniyatān api /
GSP27moksop_u:22621: sphuraty asmiñ jagatkośe jīvo vyomnīva mārutaḥ //MU_5,24.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22622: niyatyā rahitāṃ kurvan kadācin niyatiṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22624: tasmād yāvan manas tāvan na daivaṃ niyatir na ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22625: manasy astaṅgate sādho yad bhavaty astu tat tathā //MU_5,24.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22626: jīvo hi puruṣo jātaḥ pauruṣeṇa sa yad yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22627: saṅkalpayati loke 'smiṃs tat tathā tasya nānyathā //MU_5,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22628: puruṣārthād ṛte putra na kiñcid iha vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22629: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya bhogeṣv aratim āharet //MU_5,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22630: na bhogeṣv aratir yāvaj jāteha jayadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:22631: na parā nirvṛtis tāvat prāpyate bhavanāśinī //MU_5,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22634: abhyāsena vinā putra na kadācana duḥkhadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22645: devam ālokayed bhogād ratiṃ cāpaharet samam //MU_5,24.44//
GSP27moksop_u:22646: cittasya bhogair dvau bhāgau śāstreṇaikaṃ prapūrayet /
GSP27moksop_u:22658: prajñayā parayā ṛjvyā bhogānām īśvarasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22659: samam evātha dehasya rūpam āśv avalokayet //MU_5,24.51//
GSP27moksop_u:22662: pare dṛṣṭe vitṛṣṇatvaṃ tṛṣṇānāśe ca dṛk parā /
GSP27moksop_u:22663: ete mitho dhṛte dṛṣṭī naunāvikadaśe yathā //MU_5,24.53//
GSP27moksop_u:22668: na tapobhir na dānena na tīrthair api jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22670: kayācid api no yuktyā buddhir ātmāvalokane /
GSP27moksop_u:22675: tadvad āśvasyate sādho parame kāraṇe yathā //MU_5,24.59//
GSP27moksop_u:22676: pauruṣam yatnam āśritya daivaṃ kṛtvā sudūrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22682: bhogagarhā vicāraś ca svātmālokaś ca śāśvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22683: anyo'nyaṃ sādhayanty arthaṃ susnigdhās suhṛdo yathā //MU_5,24.63//
GSP27moksop_u:22684: pūrvaṃ daivam anādṛtya pauruṣaṃ prāpya yatnataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22685: dantair dantān prasampīḍya bhogeṣv aratim āharet //MU_5,24.64//
GSP27moksop_u:22696: deśakrameṇa dhanam alpavigarhaṇena tenāṅga sādhujanam arjaya mānapūrvam /
GSP27moksop_u:22701: etan me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ pitrā cāruvicāriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:22702: idānīṃ saṃsmṛtaṃ diṣṭyā samprabodham ahaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,25.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22703: adyeyaṃ mama sañjātā bhogān praty aratis sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:22705: punar āpūrayann āśāḥ punar abhyāharan dhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:22707: aho nu khalu ramyeyaṃ śamabhūś śītalāntarā /
GSP27moksop_u:22708: sarvā eva śamaṃ yānti sukhaduḥkhadṛśaś śame //MU_5,25.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22709: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse śame sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22713: aṅgam aṅgena sampīḍya māṃsaṃ māṃsena ca striyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22714: purāham abhavaṃ prīto yat tan mohavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,25.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22716: ākrāntam akhilaṃ bhūtajātaṃ kim iva śobhanam //MU_5,25.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22717: punas tāny eva tāny eva tatrehānyatra cātra ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22718: itaś cetaś ca vastūni nāpūrvaṃ nāma kiñcana //MU_5,25.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22719: sarvam eva parityajya parihṛtya dhiyā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:22722: sāraṃ tad api tucchena kālenāśu nigīryate //MU_5,25.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22723: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ bhṛśaṃ bālo 'bhavaṃ purā /
GSP27moksop_u:22724: yaḥ kurvan dveṣam amarais tucchayā jagadicchayā //MU_5,25.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22726: tyaktenāttena vārthas syāt ka udāro mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,25.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22731: etayā tad alaṃ me 'stu tucchayā pūrvacintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22735: ko 'yaṃ tāvad ahaṃ kiṃ syād ātmety ātmāvalokanam /
GSP27moksop_u:22737: sañcintayāmi parameśvaram āśu śukram udyatprasādam atha tena giropadiṣṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22738: tiṣṭhāmy anantavibhave svayam ātmanātmany akṣīṇam artham upadeśagiraḥ phalanti //MU_5,25.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22745: cetantaṃ jñātavāñ śiṣyaṃ baḍiṃ gurvarthinaṃ pure //MU_5,26.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22747: ānināya sa dehaṃ svaṃ ratnavātāyanaṃ baḍeḥ //MU_5,26.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22756: niyojayati māṃ vaktuṃ kāryaṃ kartum ivārkabhāḥ //MU_5,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22759: kim ihāsti kiyanmātram idaṃ kimmayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:22760: ko 'haṃ kas tvaṃ kim ete vā lokā iti vadāśu me //MU_5,26.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22762: bahunātra kim uktena khaṃ gantuṃ yatnavān aham /
GSP27moksop_u:22764: cid ihāsti hi cinmātram idaṃ cinmayam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22765: cit tvaṃ cid aham ete ca lokāś cid iti saṅgrahaḥ //MU_5,26.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22768: bhavyo 'si cet tad etasmāt sarvam āpnoṣi niścayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:22769: no cet tad bahv api proktaṃ tvayi bhasmani hūyate //MU_5,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22774: khaṃ vrajāmy aham atraite munayas sapta saṅgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22775: kenāpi surakāryeṇa vartavyaṃ tatra khe mayā //MU_5,26.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22776: rājan yāvad ayaṃ dehas tāvan muktadhiyām api /
GSP27moksop_u:22779: plutam aliśabale nabho'ntarāle taralataraṅgavad ākule grahaughaiḥ //MU_5,26.18//
GSP27moksop_u:22784: manasā cintayām āsa baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ //MU_5,27.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22785: yuktam uktaṃ bhagavatā cid evedaṃ jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:22786: cid ahaṃ cid ime lokāś cid āśā cid iyaṃ kriyā //MU_5,27.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22789: ayam āditya ity arko na citā cetyate yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:22791: iyaṃ bhūr iti bhūr eṣā citā yadi na cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22792: bhūmeḥ kiṃ nāma bhūmitvaṃ tad bhaved bhavyatāṃ gatam //MU_5,27.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22793: imā diśo diśa iti cetyante na citā yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:22794: tat kiṃ nāma diśāṃ diktvaṃ śailānāṃ vāpi kādritā //MU_5,27.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22795: idaṃ jagad iti jagac citā yadi na cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22796: tat kiṃ jagattvaṃ jagato nabhastvaṃ nabhaso 'tha kim //MU_5,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22797: kāyo 'yaṃ parvatākāraś citā yadi na cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22798: tat kiṃ nāma śarīratvaṃ śarīrasya śarīriṇām //MU_5,27.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22799: cid indriyāṇi cit kāyaś cin manaś cit tadeṣaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:22800: cid antaś cid bahiś cit khaṃ cid bhāvaś cid bhavasthitiḥ //MU_5,27.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22805: ahaṃ cid ambare bhānāv ahaṃ cid bhūtapañjare /
GSP27moksop_u:22806: surāsureṣu cid ahaṃ sthāvareṣu careṣu ca //MU_5,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22807: cid astīha dvitīyā hi kalpanaiva na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22808: dvitvasyāsambhavāl loke kaś śatruḥ kaś ca vā suhṛt //MU_5,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22810: citas tat kiṃ bhavec chinnaṃ sarvalokāvapūraṇāt //MU_5,27.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22811: citā sañcetito dveṣo dveṣo bhavati nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22815: na dveṣo 'sti na rāgo 'sti na mano nāsya vṛttayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22819: citaś cid iti yan nāma nirnāmāyā na nāma tat /
GSP27moksop_u:22823: na kartāsmi na bhoktāsmi draṣṭaivāsmi nirāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22833: ākāśavad ananto 'ham apy aṇor aṇur ātataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22836: na śaktā māṃ paricchettum bhāvābhāvā jagadgatāḥ //MU_5,27.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22837: atha vaite jagadbhāvāḥ paricchindantu mām imam /
GSP27moksop_u:22838: yathābhimatam ete hi matto na vyatirekiṇaḥ //MU_5,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22840: hriyate dīyate vāpi tat kiṃ kasya kila kṣatam //MU_5,27.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22842: cetyam asty aham evaitan na kiñcid api coditam //MU_5,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22843: kiṃ saṅkalpavikalpābhyāṃ cid acic cāham ekabhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22844: saṅkṣobhayāmy ahaṃ tāvac chāmyāmy ātmani pāvane //MU_5,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22854: baḍir arājata nirmalasattayā vighanam acchatayeva śarannabhaḥ //MU_5,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22858: atha te dānavās tatra baḍer anucarās tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22859: tadgṛhaṃ sphāṭikaṃ saudham uccair āruruhuḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_5,28.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22863: luḍaṅgādyāś ca suhṛdaḥ palmūlādyāś ca lālakāḥ //MU_5,28.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22867: saritas sāgarāś śailā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā //MU_5,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22868: sevārtham āyayus tasya taṃ pradeśaṃ tadā baḍeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22872: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakartavyāḥ praṇemus te mahāsurāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22874: mantriṇo 'tha vicāryātra kiṃ prāptam iti dānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22875: bhārgavaṃ cintayām āsur guruṃ sarvavidāṃ varam //MU_5,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22880: viśramya sa kṣaṇam iva premavān avalokya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22883: kṣipann iva sabhām āha hasan vākyam idaṃ guruḥ //MU_5,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22885: aho citram idaṃ daityās svavicāraṇayaiva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:22887: ayaṃ tad evam eveha tiṣṭhan dānavasattamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22888: svātmani sthitim āpnotu padaṃ paśyatv anāmayam //MU_5,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22893: svayam eva hi kālena prabodham ayam eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:22898: daityāś cintāṃ jahuś śuṣkāṃ mañjarīm iva pādapāḥ //MU_5,28.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22901: narā mahīm ahipatayo rasātalaṃ grahā nabhas tridaśagaṇās triviṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:22902: diśo 'drayo jalapatayaś ca kandarān vanecarā gaganacarāś ca khaṃ yayuḥ //MU_5,28.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22908: baḍau prabuddhe tad bāḍhaṃ vireje nagaraṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22910: baḍiḥ prabuddha evāsau yāvan nāyānti dānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22912: aho nu ramyā padavī śītalā pāramārthikī /
GSP27moksop_u:22913: aham asyāṃ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā parāṃ viśrāntim āgataḥ //MU_5,29.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22914: tad enām eva padavīm avalambya vasāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:22918: iti bhūyo 'pi viśrāntyai kurvāṇaṃ galitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22919: baḍim āvārayām āsur daityāś candram ivāmbudāḥ //MU_5,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22922: citaḥ kṣīṇavikalpasya kim upādeyam asti me /
GSP27moksop_u:22924: mokṣam icchāmy ahaṃ kasmād baddhaḥ kenāsmi vai purā /
GSP27moksop_u:22926: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti maurkhyaṃ me kṣayam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:22927: kiṃ me dhyānavilāsena kiṃ vādhyānena me bhavet //MU_5,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22928: na dhyānaṃ nāpi cādhyānaṃ na bhogān nāpy abhogitām /
GSP27moksop_u:22930: na me vāñchā pare tattve na me vāñchā jagatsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:22931: na me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ vibhavena me //MU_5,29.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22932: nāhaṃ mṛto na jīvāmi na san nāsann ahaṃ samaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22933: nedaṃ me naiva nānyan me namo mahyam ahaṃ hy aham //MU_5,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22934: idam astu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy atra svasaṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22935: naiva vāstu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy ātmani śītalam //MU_5,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22936: kiṃ me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyavibhavaśriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:22937: yad āyāti tad āyātu nāhaṃ kiñcin na me kvacit //MU_5,29.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22938: na kiñcid api kartavyaṃ yadi nāma mayādhunā /
GSP27moksop_u:22939: tat kasmān na karomīha kiñcit prakṛtakarma vai //MU_5,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22940: iti nirṇīya pūrṇātmā baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22945: manasā sakalāny eva rājakāryāṇi sa vyadhāt //MU_5,29.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22946: devān dvijān gurūṃś caiva pūjayām āsa pūjayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22950: ity asāv avasat tasmin rājye sakalaśāsane /
GSP27moksop_u:22951: yajñaṃ prati babhūvātha matir asya kadācana //MU_5,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22953: saha śukrādibhir mukhyais sa cakāra mahāmakham //MU_5,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22963: āpadaṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭyā samayaiva sa paśyati //MU_5,29.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22964: nāstam eti na codeti tatprajñā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22967: tanmanaś ciram ālokya bhogeṣu viratiṃ gatam //MU_5,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22969: ante viraktatāṃ prāptam upaśāntaṃ baḍer manaḥ //MU_5,29.32//
GSP27moksop_u:22971: baḍinā paridṛṣṭāni kva samāśvāsam etv asau //MU_5,29.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22975: anuśāsyam idaṃ rāma bahūn varṣagaṇān iha //MU_5,29.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22979: samprāptam āharan svastha ākāśa iva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,29.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22981: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tvam apy abhyudito bhava //MU_5,29.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22984: dve cāṣṭau caiva varṣāṇāṃ koṭīr bhuktvā jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:22985: ante vairasyam āpanno baḍir apy asurottamaḥ //MU_5,29.40//
GSP27moksop_u:22989: na kāścana tavātmīyā dūrāc chailaśilā iva //MU_5,29.42//
GSP27moksop_u:22992: cidādityo bhavān eva sarvatra jagati sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22993: kaḥ paras te ka ātmīyaḥ pariskhalasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,29.44//
GSP27moksop_u:22994: tvam ananto mahābāhus tvam ādyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22996: tvayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:22997: bodhe nityodite śuddhe sūtre maṇigaṇo yathā //MU_5,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:22998: na jāyase na mriyase tvam ajaḥ puruṣo virāṭ /
GSP27moksop_u:22999: cic chuddho janmamaraṇabhrāntayo mā bhavantu te //MU_5,29.47//
GSP27moksop_u:23001: tṛṣṇām utsṛjya bhogānāṃ bhoktaiva bhava kevalam //MU_5,29.48//
GSP27moksop_u:23004: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vyarthaṃ sukhaduḥkhaiṣaṇā na te /
GSP27moksop_u:23006: pūrvam iṣṭam aniṣṭaṃ tvam aniṣṭaṃ ceṣṭam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:23009: tayā hṛdayavartinyā punar jantur na jāyate //MU_5,29.52//
GSP27moksop_u:23010: yeṣu yeṣu pradeśeṣu mano majjati bālavat /
GSP27moksop_u:23011: tebhyas tebhyas samuddhṛtya tad dhi tattve niveśayet //MU_5,29.53//
GSP27moksop_u:23017: na maurkhyād adhiko loke kaścid astīha duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:23021: na kṛto 'nugrahas tāvan na vicārodayo bhavet //MU_5,29.58//
GSP27moksop_u:23023: nātmā prakaṭatām eti yāvan na svam avekṣaṇam //MU_5,29.59//
GSP27moksop_u:23024: tvam ātmany ātmanā rāma prasāde samavasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23030: yad upagacchasi pāsi nihaṃsi vā pibasi valgasi cinmaya vardhase /
GSP27moksop_u:23031: tad asi tena tavāstu mahāmune vigatabodhakalaṅkaviśaṅkitā //MU_5,29.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23036: śṛṇu daityeśvaras siddhaḥ prahlādas svātmanā yathā //MU_5,30.1//
GSP27moksop_u:23044: kālena suṣuve putrān aṅkurān iva mādhavaḥ //MU_5,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:23047: prahlādo nāma bhagavān pradhānātmā babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:23048: teṣāṃ madhye mahārhāṇāṃ maṇīnām iva kaustubhaḥ //MU_5,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23077: dudruvur dānavaughās te dikṣv alaṃ maṣakā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:23084: dagdhaṃ svaṃ deśam ājagmus saraś śuṣkam ivāṇḍajāḥ //MU_5,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23088: śanair āśvāsayām āsur mṛtaśiṣṭaṃ svakaṃ janam //MU_5,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23090: śokopataptamanaso 'suranāyakās te dagdhadrumā iva nirastavikāsam āsan //MU_5,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:23096: ko 'nv asmākam upāyas syād ya evehāsurāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23097: tīkṣṇāgro jāyate taṃ taṃ bhuṅkte śākhāmṛgo hariḥ //MU_5,31.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23099: sthirā babhūvur udbhinnāḥ padmā iva himācale //MU_5,31.3//
GSP27moksop_u:23107: surair viṣaya ākrānto mṛgair iva mahāvanam //MU_5,31.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23109: bāndhavā na virājante padmāḥ pluṣṭadalā iva //MU_5,31.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23115: devavad dainyam āyātāḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ //MU_5,31.11//
GSP27moksop_u:23117: vadhvas trasyanti vidhvastā mṛgyo grāmagatā iva //MU_5,31.12//
GSP27moksop_u:23123: adya tv asurabandīnāṃ surair ālokyate mukham //MU_5,31.15//
GSP27moksop_u:23131: punar merau sthitiṃ yātā mañjarya iva pādape //MU_5,31.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23134: pūrvaṃ yair eva mattātaś cāmarair upavījitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23135: sahasranayanas svarge kaṣṭaṃ tair eva vījyate //MU_5,31.21//
GSP27moksop_u:23139: na kadācana tapyante himādrer iva sānavaḥ //MU_5,31.23//
GSP27moksop_u:23153: dānavān bādhate śakro bālakān iva markaṭaḥ //MU_5,31.30//
GSP27moksop_u:23159: yo na bhīta idānīṃ sa bhayam eṣyati kā kathā //MU_5,31.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23160: upāyam ekam evemaṃ harer ākramaṇe sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:23163: sa eva śaraṇaṃ devo gatir astīha nānyathā //MU_5,31.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23164: na tasmād adhikaḥ kaścid asti lokatrayāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:23166: tasmān nimeṣād ārabhya nārāyaṇam ajaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:23169: nāpaiti mama hṛtkośād ākāśād iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,31.38//
GSP27moksop_u:23170: harir āśā harir vyoma harir urvī harir jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:23171: ayaṃ harir ameyātmā jāto harimayo hy aham //MU_5,31.39//
GSP27moksop_u:23172: aviṣṇuḥ pūjayan viṣṇuṃ na pūjāphalabhāg bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:23173: viṣṇur bhūtvā yajed viṣṇum ayaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,31.40//
GSP27moksop_u:23187: jayā sphurati me pārśve latā kalpataror iva //MU_5,31.47//
GSP27moksop_u:23192: ayaṃ mama kare śaṅkhaḥ pāñcajanyas sphuraddhvaniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23193: mūrtaṃ kham iva śabdātma kṣīroda iva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,31.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23204: imāny aham anantāni jaganti jaṭhare ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:23206: imau mahī me caraṇāv idaṃ me gaganaṃ śiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23207: idaṃ vapur me trijagad imā me kukṣayo diśaḥ //MU_5,31.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23216: ime te taijasīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mamāgrasthās surāsurāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23217: na śaknuvanti saṃsodḥuṃ cakṣurmandāḥ prabhām iva //MU_5,31.62//
GSP27moksop_u:23227: prahlāda iti sañcintya kṛtvā nārāyaṇīṃ tanum /
GSP27moksop_u:23237: tata enaṃ mahādevaṃ pūjayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23259: bhakṣyair bhojyais tathā pānair lehyaiḥ peyaiś ca picchilaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23271: tatas tataḥ prabhṛty eva prahlādaḥ parameśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:23272: tathaiva pratyahaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrṇayā //MU_5,32.23//
GSP27moksop_u:23273: atha tasmin pure daityās tataḥ prabhṛti vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23274: sarva evābhavan bhavyā rājā hy ācārakāraṇam //MU_5,32.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23275: jagāma vārttā gaganaṃ devalokam atho harim /
GSP27moksop_u:23276: viṣṇor dveṣaṃ parityajya bhaktā daityās sthitā iti //MU_5,32.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23278: gṛhītā vaiṣṇavī bhaktir daityaiḥ kim iti rāghava //MU_5,32.26//
GSP27moksop_u:23281: tatraitaṃ daityavṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur asya te /
GSP27moksop_u:23284: kim etad bhagavan daityā viruddhā ye sadaiva te /
GSP27moksop_u:23285: te hi tvanmayatāṃ yātā māyeyam iti bhāvyate //MU_5,32.29//
GSP27moksop_u:23288: prākṛto guṇavāñ jāta ity eṣā bhagavan kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23290: nopapannaṃ hi yad yatra tatra tan na virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:23292: yo yo yādṛgguṇo jantus sa tām evaiti saṃsthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:23293: sadṛśeṣv apy ajeṣu śvā na manye ramate kvacit //MU_5,32.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23294: na tathā duḥkhayanty aṅge majjantyo vajrasūcayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23297: tad eva rājate tatra jale 'mbhojaṃ na tu sthale //MU_5,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23299: varāko dānavas tucchajātir bhaktiḥ kva vaiṣṇavī //MU_5,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:23300: kamalinī paruṣoṣarabhūgatā sukhayatīha yathā na durāśrayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23301: danusuto 'pi hi mādhavabhaktimān iti kathā na tatheśa sukhāya naḥ //MU_5,32.37//
GSP27moksop_u:23308: vibudhā mā viṣaṇṇās stha prahlādo bhaktimān iti /
GSP27moksop_u:23312: guṇavān nirguṇo jāta ity anarthakramaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23313: nirguṇo guṇavāñ jāta ity āhus siddhidaṃ kramam //MU_5,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:23321: prahlādaṃ prati gīrvāṇās tatas snigdhatvam āyayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23322: mahānto yatra nodvignās tatra viśvāsavan manaḥ //MU_5,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23324: manasā karmaṇā vācā prahlādo bhaktimān iti //MU_5,33.9//
GSP27moksop_u:23327: nābhyanandad asau bhogapūgaṃ śuṣkam iva drumam /
GSP27moksop_u:23328: na cāramata kāntāsu mṛgo marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,33.11//
GSP27moksop_u:23330: nājāyata ratis tasya dṛśye sthala ivābjinī //MU_5,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:23334: cetaḥ kevalam asyāsīd dolāyām iva yojitam //MU_5,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:23345: aśaraṇaśaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam īśaṃ harim ajam īśvaram acyutaṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23353: jaḍataram ajaḍaṃ cidātmatattvaṃ jagadakhilārtiharaṃ hariṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.23//
GSP27moksop_u:23361: iti guṇabahulābhir vāgbhir abhyarcito 'sau harir asuravināśaś śrīniṣaṇṇāṃsadeśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23362: jalada iva mayūraṃ prītimān prīyamāṇaṃ kuvalayadaladehaḥ pratyuvācāsurendram //MU_5,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23370: yad udāratamaṃ vetsi tad evādiśa deva me //MU_5,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23381: vicāravān eva bhavān bhavatv iti bhavāriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:23383: kim ahaṃ nāma tāvat syāṃ yo 'smin bhuvanaḍambare /
GSP27moksop_u:23384: vacmi gacchāmi tiṣṭhāmi prayate cāharāmi ca //MU_5,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23386: yad bāhyaṃ jaḍam atyantaṃ tat syāṃ katham ahaṃ kila //MU_5,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:23387: asann abhyutthito mūkaḥ pavanais sphurati kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:23396: kevale draṣṭari kṣīṇaṃ rūpaṃ nāham acetanam //MU_5,34.14//
GSP27moksop_u:23403: ā idānīṃ smṛtaṃ satyam etat tad akhilaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23413: asāv eva hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva jāgratām /
GSP27moksop_u:23416: uṣṇo 'rkaś śiśiraś candro ghano 'drir vidrutaṃ payaḥ //MU_5,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23420: etat kāraṇam ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ nāsya vidyate //MU_5,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:23422: etasmāj jagad utpannam idaṃ śaityaṃ himād iva //MU_5,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23424: sate sakṛdvibhātāya mahyam asmai namo namaḥ //MU_5,34.28//
GSP27moksop_u:23426: guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca //MU_5,34.29//
GSP27moksop_u:23428: tat tad bhavati sarvatra netarat sad api sthitam //MU_5,34.30//
GSP27moksop_u:23429: yac citā kalitaṃ kiñcit tad āpnoti nijaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:23430: yac citā kalitaṃ neha tat sad apy astam āgatam //MU_5,34.31//
GSP27moksop_u:23432: jāgatyo vipulādarśe hy asmin vyomani bimbitāḥ //MU_5,34.32//
GSP27moksop_u:23434: etat tad dṛśyate sadbhiḥ paraṃ vyometi tanmayaiḥ //MU_5,34.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23435: etad vṛddhaṃ vṛddhimati kṣayi kṣayiṇi jāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:23436: padārthe sad asac cāpi pratibimbārkavat sthitam //MU_5,34.34//
GSP27moksop_u:23439: asmād iyam udety uccais saṃsāraracanā calā /
GSP27moksop_u:23445: asya tasya mamemāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23463: mayīdam arpyate sarvaṃ sattāṃ māṃ prāpya gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:23464: matparityaktam etac ca sad apy eva na kiñcana //MU_5,34.48//
GSP27moksop_u:23465: mayi sphāre cidādarśe pratibimbaṃ yad āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:23466: tad asti netarat tasmān matto 'nyan neha vidyate //MU_5,34.49//
GSP27moksop_u:23467: kusumeṣv aham āmodaḥ padmapattreṣv ahaṃ chaviḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23468: chaviṣv ahaṃ rūpakalā rūpeṣv anubhavo 'py aham //MU_5,34.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23469: yad yat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:23475: ghṛtaṃ yathāntaḥ payasi rasaśaktir yathā jale /
GSP27moksop_u:23477: idaṃ jagat trikālasthaṃ citi mayy eva saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:23480: sarvasthas sarvadhartā ca virāṭ samrāḍ ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,34.56//
GSP27moksop_u:23482: aprārthitaṃ me samprāptaṃ jagadrājyam idaṃ tatam //MU_5,34.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23483: aho nu vitatātmāsmi na māmy ātmātmanātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:23485: nātmany antam avāpnomi svacche 'ntas svodite svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:23488: gajo bilva ivāsyāṃ me na māti vipulaṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,34.60//
GSP27moksop_u:23490: prasaraty eva me rūpam adyāpi na nivartate //MU_5,34.61//
GSP27moksop_u:23491: ayaṃ nāmāham ity antaḥ kuto niravalambanā /
GSP27moksop_u:23493: bhavān ayam ahaṃ cāyam iti mithyaiva vibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23494: ko dehaḥ ko 'py adeho vāpy apāravapuṣaś citaḥ //MU_5,34.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23504: prāptaḥ prāpto mayātmāyaṃ jīvāmi ca jayāmi ca //MU_5,34.68//
GSP27moksop_u:23510: ajñena santarpayatā kiṃ nāma guruṇā kṛtam //MU_5,34.71//
GSP27moksop_u:23512: kiṃ nāma prāpad ucitaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kila //MU_5,34.72//
GSP27moksop_u:23515: na kiñcid yena samprāptaṃ tenedaṃ paramāmṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:23517: tyaktāmitapado mūrkho mitam eti na paṇḍitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23518: uṣṭro hi tyaktasulataḥ kaṇṭakaṃ yāti netaraḥ //MU_5,34.75//
GSP27moksop_u:23519: parāṃ dṛṣṭim imāṃ tyaktvā dagdharājye rameta kaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23521: mūrkhā eva hi te sarve babhūvur me pitāmahāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23522: imāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ parityajya ye ratā rājyasaṅkaṭe //MU_5,34.77//
GSP27moksop_u:23523: kva phullā nandanasthalyaḥ kva dagdhā marubhūmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23524: kvemā bodhadṛśaś śāntāḥ kva bhogeṣv ātmabuddhayaḥ //MU_5,34.78//
GSP27moksop_u:23525: na kiñcid asti trailokye yad rājyam abhivāñchyate /
GSP27moksop_u:23526: sarvaṃ cāsty eva cittattve tat kasmān nānubhūyate //MU_5,34.79//
GSP27moksop_u:23528: sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvatas sādhu labhyate //MU_5,34.80//
GSP27moksop_u:23531: paramā pūrṇatā śārvī jayalakṣmīś ca vaiṣṇavī /
GSP27moksop_u:23561: bhāvena bhāvam āśritya bhāvas tyajati duḥkhitām /
GSP27moksop_u:23562: prekṣya bhāvam abhāvena bhāvas tyajati tuṣṭatām //MU_5,34.97//
GSP27moksop_u:23565: yāti vācām agamyatvād asattām iva śāśvatīm /
GSP27moksop_u:23567: bhavaty ātmā tathā brahma nakiñcic cākhilaṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:23570: na samyak paśyatīdaṃ cid dṛṣṭiḥ paṭalinī yathā //MU_5,34.101//
GSP27moksop_u:23571: īhānīhāmayair antar yā cid āvalitā malaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23572: sā hi notpatituṃ śaktā pāśabaddheva pakṣiṇī //MU_5,34.102//
GSP27moksop_u:23578: varākās tena te naṣṭā maṣakāḥ kuhareṣv iva //MU_5,34.105//
GSP27moksop_u:23579: ajñāsyan yadi te tattvaṃ bhogaduḥkhārthinas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23590: uddhṛto 'si vikalpebhyo yo 'si so 'si namo 'stu te //MU_5,34.111//
GSP27moksop_u:23591: mahyaṃ tubhyam anantāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ śivātmane /
GSP27moksop_u:23593: gataghanam iva pūrṇam indubimbaṃ gatakalanāvaraṇaṃ svam eva rūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:23594: svavapuṣi muditaṃ svayaṃ svasaṃsthaṃ svayam uditaṃ svarasaṃ svayaṃ namāmi //MU_5,34.113//
GSP27moksop_u:23599: ātmaivāyaṃ idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñcij jagatīgatam //MU_5,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:23604: tiṣṭhann api hi nāsīno gacchann api na gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:23605: śānto 'pi vyavahārasthaḥ kurvann api na lipyate //MU_5,35.4//
GSP27moksop_u:23611: sthāṇor apy akriyo nityam ākāśād apy alepakaḥ //MU_5,35.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23612: manāṃsi kṣobhayaty eṣa pallavān iva mārutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23613: vāhayaty akṣapaṅktiṃ vā svāśvālīm iva sārathiḥ //MU_5,35.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23616: eṣa eva sadānveṣyas stutyo dhyātavya eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23623: dhanānām īśvarasyeva smayo garvo 'tha vā bhavet //MU_5,35.13//
GSP27moksop_u:23624: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu tailaṃ tilakaṇeṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:23627: na jñāyate cirād dṛṣṭa iṣṭabandhur ivāgragaḥ //MU_5,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:23631: āyānti dṛṣṭayas tās tā yābhir bandho vilīyate //MU_5,35.17//
GSP27moksop_u:23633: na kṛntanti manāṃsy āśā gṛhāṇīva durākhavaḥ //MU_5,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:23634: asmin dṛṣṭe jagad dṛṣṭaṃ śrute 'smin sakalaṃ śrutam /
GSP27moksop_u:23635: spṛṣṭe cāsmiñ jagat spṛṣṭaṃ sthite 'smin saṃsthitaṃ jagat //MU_5,35.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23638: vicaraty eṣa lokeṣu dīpa eva jagatsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:23639: vilasaty eṣa bhogeṣu prasphuraty eṣa vastuṣu //MU_5,35.21//
GSP27moksop_u:23641: sthitas sarveṣu deheṣu tiktatvaṃ mariceṣv iva //MU_5,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:23644: eṣa śūnyatvam ākāśe spanda eṣa sadāgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:23645: prakāśaś caiṣa tejassu payasy eṣa rasaḥ paraḥ //MU_5,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23646: kāṭhinyam avanāv eṣa auṣṇyam eṣa hutāśane /
GSP27moksop_u:23647: śaityam eṣa niśānāthe sattā caiṣa jagadgaṇe //MU_5,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23648: maṣīpiṇḍe yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śauklyaṃ himakaṇe yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23649: yathā puṣpeṣu saugandhyaṃ dehe dehapatis tathā //MU_5,35.26//
GSP27moksop_u:23650: yathā sarvagatā sattā kālas sarvagato yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23651: yathā sarvagataṃ vyoma vibhus sarvagatas tathā //MU_5,35.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23654: nityas so 'yam ahaṃ devo devānām avabodhakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23655: svayam ātmāsmi me nāsti kalanāvit kiletarā //MU_5,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:23658: sukhaduḥkhaśriyo dehe mā patantu patantu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:23659: tumbakopari dhārāś ca kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_5,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:23662: sambandhaḥ ko nu naḥ kāmair bhāvābhāvair athendriyaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23663: kena sambadhyate vyoma kena vā gṛhyate manaḥ //MU_5,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23664: śarīre śatadhā yāte khaṇḍanā kā śarīriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23665: kumbhe rugṇe kṣate kṣīṇe kumbhākāśasya kā kṣatiḥ //MU_5,35.34//
GSP27moksop_u:23667: jaḍe tasmin kṣate bodhāt kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_5,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23668: sukhaduḥkhamayī yasya vāsanā tan mano mama /
GSP27moksop_u:23669: abhavat pūrvam adyaikā sampannā nanu nirvṛtiḥ //MU_5,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:23671: anyaḥ paśyaty aho maurkhyaṃ kasyeyaṃ khalu cakrikā //MU_5,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:23672: bhuṅkte prakṛtir ādatte mano dehasya saṅkaṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23673: draṣṭātmā maurkhyam astīha na kiñcit keva me kṣatiḥ //MU_5,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:23674: na me bhogasthitau vāñchā na ca bhogavivarjane /
GSP27moksop_u:23675: yad āyāti tad āyātu yat prayāti prayātu tat //MU_5,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:23677: sukhaduḥkhāny upāyāntu yāntu vāpy aham eṣu kaḥ //MU_5,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:23678: vāsanā vividhā dehe tv astaṃ vodayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:23679: prayāntu nāham etāsu na caitā mama kāścana //MU_5,35.41//
GSP27moksop_u:23687: puṇyatām alam āyātaḥ praphulta iva rājate //MU_5,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:23691: tat prāptam adhunā yena na prāpyam iha śiṣyate //MU_5,35.47//
GSP27moksop_u:23696: stutyā praṇatyā vijñaptyā śamena niyamena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23697: labdho 'yaṃ bhagavān ātmā dṛṣṭaś cādhigatas sphuṭam //MU_5,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23699: svabhāvo bhagavān ātmā viṣṇur brahma sanātanam //MU_5,35.51//
GSP27moksop_u:23708: svayam eva tvayedānīṃ kriyāśaktyā svayaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:23711: na paśyāmi vibho dīpe jvalite timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,35.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23713: dīpasyeva praśāntasya na vedmi gatim īśvara //MU_5,35.58//
GSP27moksop_u:23717: śānte tiṣṭhāmy atisvastho nirgonāsa iva drumaḥ //MU_5,35.60//
GSP27moksop_u:23722: pramārjite 'ham ity asmin pade sārthe vicārataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23723: ko mohaḥ kāni duḥkhāni kāḥ kadāśāḥ ka ātapaḥ //MU_5,35.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23725: bhittāv eva pravartante citrehā na nabhastale //MU_5,35.64//
GSP27moksop_u:23731: mahyam ānandasarase tubhyam ātman namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.67//
GSP27moksop_u:23735: ānandāmbudhaye tubhyaṃ mahyam ātman namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.69//
GSP27moksop_u:23737: mahyam unmānasāyātmaṃs tubhyam antar namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.70//
GSP27moksop_u:23747: chinnam antar mayā taptam ayaseva balād ayaḥ //MU_5,35.75//
GSP27moksop_u:23748: indriyair indriyaṃ chittvā chittvā ca manasā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23749: ahaṅkṛtim ahaṅkṛtyā chittvā śeṣo jayāmy aham //MU_5,35.76//
GSP27moksop_u:23750: bhāvena bhāvam āmṛdya cchittvā tṛṣṇām atṛṣṇayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23753: bhāvena galite bhāve svasthas tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ //MU_5,35.78//
GSP27moksop_u:23766: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ ko 'bhūvaṃ cittam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:23768: adyāham asmi jāto 'yam aham adya mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23770: dṛṣṭo 'yam ātmā bhagavān antaś cādhigato mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23772: gatāspadaṃ gatamananaṃ gataiṣaṇaṃ tiraskṛtaṃ nipuṇam ahaṅkṛtibhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:23773: nirīhitaṃ vyapagatarāgarañjanaṃ vikautukaṃ praśamam idaṃ gataṃ manaḥ //MU_5,35.88//
GSP27moksop_u:23775: gatāḥ kṣayaṃ samadhigato maheśvaraś cidavyayo vyapagatacittam antare //MU_5,35.89//
GSP27moksop_u:23780: diṣṭyā labdho 'si bhagavan namas te 'stu cidātmane //MU_5,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:23782: ko 'nyas syād bhagavan bandhus tvadṛte bhuvanatraye //MU_5,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23783: haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvaṃ stauṣi yāsi vivalgasi /
GSP27moksop_u:23784: ayaṃ prāpto 'si dṛṣṭo 'si kiṃ karoṣi kva gacchasi //MU_5,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:23786: sarvatra lakṣyase nityam adhunā kva palāyase //MU_5,36.4//
GSP27moksop_u:23788: adūram adya sampannaṃ diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si bāndhava //MU_5,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:23789: namas te kṛtakṛtyāya kartre hartre namo 'stu te /
GSP27moksop_u:23802: na prāptas tvaṃ tvayā yena kiñcid āsāditaṃ bhavet //MU_5,36.12//
GSP27moksop_u:23805: devāyam adya labdho 'si dṛṣṭo 'sy adhigato 'si ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23806: samprāpto 'si gṛhīto 'si namas te 'stu na mucyase //MU_5,36.14//
GSP27moksop_u:23808: devo darśanarūpeṇa kathaṃ so 'ntar na dṛśyate //MU_5,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:23809: yas tvakpuṣpe spṛśan sparśagandhaṃ tailaṃ tile yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23810: sparśam antaḥ karoty eṣa sa kathaṃ nānubhūyate //MU_5,36.16//
GSP27moksop_u:23812: romāñcaṃ janayaty aṅge sa dūrasthaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_5,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:23814: svadante yasya vastūni svadate sa na kasya vā //MU_5,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:23816: ya ālepayati prītyā kasyāsau na mukhe sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23818: yo gītas sa kathaṃ hy ātmā vijñāto yāti vismṛtim //MU_5,36.20//
GSP27moksop_u:23819: saiveha deva bhogālī subhagāpīyam adya me /
GSP27moksop_u:23820: antar na svadate svacche tvayi dṛṣṭe parāpare //MU_5,36.21//
GSP27moksop_u:23823: tvayaite guravaś śailās tvayaite dyucarā dhṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23825: diṣṭyā mattām asi prāpto diṣṭyā tvattām ahaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23826: ahaṃ tvaṃ tvam ahaṃ deva diṣṭyā bhedo 'sti nāvayoḥ //MU_5,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23827: ahaṃ tvam iti śabdābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ mahātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23828: tava vā mama vā sādho sampṛktābhyāṃ namo namaḥ //MU_5,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23831: mayy ātmani same svacche sākṣibhūte nirākṛtau /
GSP27moksop_u:23837: ayaṃ saṃvidvapur ahaṃ na kvacin na kṛtāspadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23839: cirād aham ahaṃ jātas svātmalābhaś cirād ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:23840: cirād upaśamaṃ yāmi kalpasyānte jagad yathā //MU_5,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:23843: sarvātītāya sarvāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ namo namaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23844: tebhyo 'pi ca namo 'stv eva ye tvāṃ māṃ pravadanti vā //MU_5,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23848: tile tailam ivāsmiṃs tvaṃ sarvatra vapuṣi sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23849: haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvam avasphūrjasi valgasi /
GSP27moksop_u:23859: jahi mānaṃ madaṃ kopaṃ kāluṣyaṃ krūratāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23862: ko 'haṃ kiṃ tad babhūveti hasa muktācchaṭāsitam //MU_5,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:23863: te prayātās samārambhā gatās te dagdhavāsarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23866: na duḥkhair gṛhyase nāpi sukhair vyoma karair iva //MU_5,36.44//
GSP27moksop_u:23870: avabhāsakaro nityaṃ bahir antaś ca bhāskaraḥ //MU_5,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:23877: dehapuṣpe tvam āmodo dehendau tv amṛtāmṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:23878: rasas tvaṃ dehaviṭape śaityaṃ dehahime bhavān //MU_5,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23880: tvam antar asya dehasya dāruṇy agnir iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:23881: tvam apām uttamāsvādaḥ prākāśyaṃ tejasām api /
GSP27moksop_u:23882: avagantā tvam arthānāṃ tvaṃ bhāsām avabhāsakaḥ //MU_5,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:23883: spandas tvaṃ sarvavāyūnāṃ tvaṃ manohastino madaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23884: prajñānalaśikhāyās tvaṃ prākāśyaṃ taikṣṇyam eva ca //MU_5,36.53//
GSP27moksop_u:23886: dīpavat punar anyatra samudeti kuto 'pi sā //MU_5,36.54//
GSP27moksop_u:23889: bhavān ayam ayaṃ cāhaṃ tvaṃ śabdair evamādibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23890: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ līlayā stauṣi vakṣi ca //MU_5,36.56//
GSP27moksop_u:23892: yathā saṃlakṣyate vyomni tathā tvaṃ bhūtadṛṣṭibhiḥ //MU_5,36.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23898: tvayā tattvaṃ yathā paktrā māṃsānāṃ svādavedanam //MU_5,36.60//
GSP27moksop_u:23899: vidyamānāpi vastuśrīr na sthitā tvayi na sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:23901: sad apīha na sattāyai vastu nākalitaṃ tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23903: luṭhati tvāṃ vinā dehaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaḥ kṣitau /
GSP27moksop_u:23904: sann apy asattayaivātto yāmāsv iva raviṃ vinā //MU_5,36.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23906: prākāśyam āsādya yathā tamas tejo 'tha vā himam //MU_5,36.64//
GSP27moksop_u:23910: te tamāṃsīva dīpasya dṛṣṭāv eva vrajanty alam //MU_5,36.66//
GSP27moksop_u:23915: bhaṅguratvād iha sthātuṃ kālaṃ nāṇum api kṣamā /
GSP27moksop_u:23921: kṣaṇam apy asthiraṃ vastu kathaṃ kāryakaraṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:23926: sthitas san naiva gṛhṇāsi na jahāsi samasthite //MU_5,36.74//
GSP27moksop_u:23927: avivekini yo 'si tvaṃ sa bhavātman yadṛcchayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23933: jaya jāta jayājāta jaya kṣata jayākṣata /
GSP27moksop_u:23934: jaya bhāva jayābhāva jaya jeya jayājaya //MU_5,36.78//
GSP27moksop_u:23936: jayī jayāmi jīvāmi namo mahyaṃ namo 'stu te //MU_5,36.79//
GSP27moksop_u:23937: tvayi sthite mayi vigatāmayātmani svasaṃsthitau vyapagatarāgarañjane /
GSP27moksop_u:23938: kva bandhavaḥ kva ca vipadaḥ kva sampado bhavābhavau kva śamam upaimi śāśvatam //MU_5,36.80//
GSP27moksop_u:23945: śailād iva samutkīrṇo babhau svapadam āsthitaḥ //MU_5,37.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23946: tathātha tiṣṭhatas tasya kālo bahutaro yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:23947: sve gṛhe bhuvanasthasya meror iva suradviṣaḥ //MU_5,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:23984: dhiyā vilokayām āsa kadācij jāgatīṃ sthitim //MU_5,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23994: kaṣṭaṃ sṛṣṭir iyaṃ prāyo nirdaityatvam upāgatā //MU_5,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23997: mokṣākhyaṃ vigatadvandvaṃ tato yāsyati tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:24003: ākalpāntaṃ tribhuvanaṃ yad idaṃ nirmitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:24004: layam eṣyaty akāle tat tāpe himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,38.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24005: kim evam asminn ābhāse vilīya kṣayam āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:24009: akāṇḍa evam evaṃ hi jagaty upaśamaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:24013: tasmād rasātalaṃ gatvā yathāvat sthāpayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:24014: sve krame dānavādhīśam ṛtuḥ punar iva drumam //MU_5,38.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24015: vinā prahlādam atha ced itaraṃ dānaveśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24016: karomi tad asau manye devān utsādayiṣyati //MU_5,38.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24017: prahlādasya tv ayaṃ dehaḥ paścimaḥ pāvano mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:24018: ākalpam iha vastavyaṃ dehenānena tena ca //MU_5,38.19//
GSP27moksop_u:24019: evaṃ hi niyatir daivī niścitā pārameśvarī /
GSP27moksop_u:24021: tasmāt tam eva gatvāśu daityendraṃ bodhayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:24025: na vinaśyati sargo 'yam evaṃ saha surāsuraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24026: bhaviṣyati ca nādvandvaṃ tan me krīḍā bhaviṣyati //MU_5,38.23//
GSP27moksop_u:24027: sargakṣayodayāv etau susamau mama yady api /
GSP27moksop_u:24028: tathāpīdaṃ yathāsaṃsthaṃ bhavatv anyena kiṃ mama //MU_5,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24029: bhāvābhāveṣu yat tulyaṃ tannāśe tatsthitau ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:24030: yaḥ prayatnaḥ kubuddhitvāt tad vyomahananaṃ bhavet //MU_5,38.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24032: sthairyaṃ nayāmi saṃsāraṃ līlāṃ sampādayāmy aham //MU_5,38.26//
GSP27moksop_u:24033: asurapuram avāpya proddhatācāraghoraṃ kamalam iva vivasvān daityam udbodhayāmi /
GSP27moksop_u:24034: jagad idam akhilāsthaṃ sthairyam abhyānayāmi ghanavidhir iva śaile cañcalaṃ meghajālam //MU_5,38.27//
GSP27moksop_u:24038: iti sañcintya sarvātmā kṣīrodād rāma tatpuram /
GSP27moksop_u:24061: śanair ākramayām āsa gaṅgā sarvam ivārṇavam //MU_5,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24064: prāṇeṣu randhranavake pravṛtteṣv atha tasya cit /
GSP27moksop_u:24069: śanair babhūvatus tasya prātar nīle yathotpale //MU_5,39.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24073: tasmin prāṇavaśāt pūrṇe taraṅga iva vāriṇi //MU_5,39.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24076: tasminn avasare yāvad budhyasvety avadat prabhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24077: prabuddhas tāvad eṣo 'bhūd barhī ghanaravād iva //MU_5,39.20//
GSP27moksop_u:24080: sādho smara mahālakṣmīm ātmīyāṃ smara cākṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:24081: akāṇḍa eva kiṃ dehavirāmaḥ kriyate tvayā //MU_5,39.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24084: sthātavyam iha dehena kalpaṃ yāvad anena te /
GSP27moksop_u:24085: vayaṃ hi niyatiṃ vidmo yathābhūtām anindita //MU_5,39.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24089: vastavyaṃ sphuṭite kumbhe kumbhākāśena khe yathā //MU_5,39.26//
GSP27moksop_u:24093: na jagaj jvalitaṃ sādho tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.28//
GSP27moksop_u:24097: na sphuranti jagatkośe tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.30//
GSP27moksop_u:24099: kakubho na viśīryante tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:24101: sthitaṃ jaraḍhajīmūtaṃ tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24103: kalpābhrāṇi na garjanti tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24106: ime vayam ime śailā bhūtānīmāny ayaṃ bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:24107: idaṃ jagad idaṃ vyoma mā deham avadhīraya //MU_5,39.35//
GSP27moksop_u:24110: kṛśo 'tiduḥkhī mūḍho 'ham etāś cānyāś ca bhāvanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24115: kugeham iva gargaṭyo maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.39//
GSP27moksop_u:24119: anarthaugho haraty uccair maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.41//
GSP27moksop_u:24124: yo 'yaṃ dehaparityāgas tal loke maraṇaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:24125: na satā nāsatā tena kāraṇaṃ vedyavedinām //MU_5,39.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24128: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:24129: yas samas sarvabhāveṣu jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.46//
GSP27moksop_u:24131: sākṣivat paśyatīdaṃ hi jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.47//
GSP27moksop_u:24135: yenālīnaṃ kṛtaṃ ceto jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.49//
GSP27moksop_u:24138: nāntas tuṣyati nodvegam eti yo viharann api /
GSP27moksop_u:24140: śuddhapakṣaś ca śuddhaś ca haṃsaughas saraso yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24141: yasmād guṇaugho niryāti jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.52//
GSP27moksop_u:24142: yasmiñ śrutipathaṃ yāte dṛṣṭe smṛtim upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:24143: ānandaṃ yānti bhūtāni jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.53//
GSP27moksop_u:24144: yasyodayena hṛdayeṣu janāmbujāni jīvālimanti sakalāni vikāsavanti /
GSP27moksop_u:24145: tasyāvabhāti cirajīvitam akṣayendor āpūrṇateva danujeśvara netarasya //MU_5,39.54//
GSP27moksop_u:24149: sthairyaṃ dehasya dṛṣṭasya jīvitaṃ procyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24151: dvābhyām evāsi pakṣābhyām ābhyāṃ mukto mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:24152: kiṃ te maraṇam astīha kiṃ vā jīvitam asti te //MU_5,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:24154: na tvaṃ jīvasi sarvajña mriyase na kadācana //MU_5,40.3//
GSP27moksop_u:24159: prabuddho jñātavastutvād eva tvam asi nāsi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:24162: ko dehaḥ ko 'py adehas te yaṃ gṛhṇāsi jahāsi vā //MU_5,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24163: samudetu vasanto vā vātu vā pralayānilaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24165: praluṭhatsv api śaileṣu kalpāgniṣu dahatsv api /
GSP27moksop_u:24167: sarvabhūtāni tiṣṭhantu samam eva prayāntu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:24168: naśyantu vātha vardhantām ātmātmany eva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,40.10//
GSP27moksop_u:24169: kṣīyate na kṣayaṃ prāpte vardhamāne na vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:24170: na spandate spandamāne dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ //MU_5,40.11//
GSP27moksop_u:24171: dehasyāham ahaṃ deha iti kṣīṇe 'pi te bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:24172: tyajāmi na tyajāmīti kiṃ mṛṣā kalanoditā //MU_5,40.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24173: idaṃ kṛtvā karomīdam idaṃ tyaktvedam āhare /
GSP27moksop_u:24174: iti tattvavidāṃ tāta saṅkalpās saṅkṣayaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:24175: prabuddhās sarvakartāraḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti vai navam /
GSP27moksop_u:24179: śānte kartṛtvabhoktṛtve śāntir eva hi śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:24180: prauḍhim abhyāgatā saiva muktir ity ucyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,40.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24181: prabuddhāś cinmayāś śuddhās sarvam ākramya saṃsthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24182: kiṃ tyaktaṃ parigṛhṇantu kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tyajantu vā //MU_5,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24184: hīnaḥ prameyāvayavaiḥ kiṃ gṛhṇātu jahātu kim //MU_5,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24187: tatra sthitās sadā santas tvādṛśāḥ puruṣottamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24191: na ramanti hi ramyeṣu svātmany ekagatāśayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24192: nodvijante ca duḥkheṣu svātmany ekarasā yataḥ //MU_5,40.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24197: tvam ajitapadavīm upāgato 'ntaḥ kamalajavāsaram ekam eva bhuktvā /
GSP27moksop_u:24198: guṇagaṇakalitām ihaiva lakṣmīṃ vraja paramāspadam acyutaṃ mahātman //MU_5,40.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24207: ciram antar mayā deva dṛṣṭo 'sy amalayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:24208: punar bahir ayaṃ dṛṣṭyā diṣṭyā deveśa dṛśyase //MU_5,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:24209: aham āsam anantāyām asyāṃ dṛśi maheśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:24211: na śokena na mohena na ca vairāgyacintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:24213: ekasmin vidyamāne hi kutaś śokaḥ kutaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24214: kuto dehaḥ kva saṃsāraḥ kva sthitiḥ kva bhayābhaye //MU_5,41.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24216: evaṃ devāham avasaṃ vitate pāvane pade //MU_5,41.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24219: dehābhāve na duḥkhāni dehe duḥkhāni me sati /
GSP27moksop_u:24221: idaṃ sukham idaṃ duḥkham idaṃ nāstīdam asti me /
GSP27moksop_u:24222: iti dolāyitaṃ ceto mūḍham eva na paṇḍitam //MU_5,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:24225: idaṃ tyājyam idaṃ grāhyam iti mithyā manobhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24226: nonmattatāṃ nayaty antar jñam ajñam iva durdhiyam //MU_5,41.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24230: kiṃ heyaṃ kim upādeyam iti yat tyajyate na vā //MU_5,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:24234: evam āsam ahaṃ pūrvam adhunettham avasthitaḥ //MU_5,41.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24235: śamam ātmīyam āpannas sarvagātman satāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:24236: karomy ahaṃ mahādeva tubhyaṃ yat parirocate //MU_5,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24237: tvam ayaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa pūjyas tāvaj jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:24238: tan mattaḥ prakṛtaprāptāṃ pūjām ādātum arhasi //MU_5,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24247: yāvad āśv abhiṣekaṃ te svayam eva dadāmy aham //MU_5,41.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24249: siddhās sādhyās suraughās te kurvantu tava maṅgalam //MU_5,41.23//
GSP27moksop_u:24261: yāvan merur dharā yāvad yāvac candrārkamaṇḍale /
GSP27moksop_u:24266: na gantavyas tvayodvegas svarge vā narake 'tha vā //MU_5,41.31//
GSP27moksop_u:24268: prakṛtaṃ kāryam ātiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavāsanam āssva bhoḥ //MU_5,41.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24270: bhāvābhāve samaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann iha na badhyase //MU_5,41.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24272: sarvaṃ sarvatra jānāsi kim anyad upadiśyate //MU_5,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:24280: sveṣv eva yāntu viśvāsam aparasparam āhṛtāḥ //MU_5,41.38//
GSP27moksop_u:24282: danusuta vanitāvilāsaramyāṃ ciram ajitām upabhuṅkṣva rājyalakṣmīm //MU_5,41.39//
GSP27moksop_u:24296: ya etāṃ mānavā loke bahuduṣkṛtino 'pi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:24297: dhiyā vicārayiṣyanti te prāpsyanty acirāt padam //MU_5,42.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24299: yogavākyavicāreṇa ko na yāti paraṃ padam //MU_5,42.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24300: ajñānam ucyate pāpaṃ tad vicāreṇa naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:24311: naiṣaṇā tatsthitiṃ viddhi tvaṃ jīvanmuktatām iha //MU_5,42.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24322: harir ātmā hi bhūtānāṃ tasya yat pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:24323: tat tathaiva bhavaty āśu sarvatrātmaiva kāraṇam //MU_5,42.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24327: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ vapur āttaṃ tad vāsudevīyam ātmanā //MU_5,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:24335: prabādhate na dhīrāṃs tu yakṣī mantravato yathā //MU_5,42.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24336: ātmecchayaiva ghanatāṃ samupāgatāntar ātmecchayaiva tanutām upayāti kāle /
GSP27moksop_u:24342: nirvṛtās smaś śaśāṅkasya karair oṣadhayo yathā //MU_5,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:24346: prahlādas tat kathaṃ buddho na mādhavavaraṃ vinā //MU_5,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:24348: yad yad rāghava samprāptaṃ prahlādena mahātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:24349: tat tad āsāditaṃ tena pauruṣād eva nānyataḥ //MU_5,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:24350: ātmā nārāyaṇaś caiva na bhinnau tilatailavat /
GSP27moksop_u:24352: yo hi viṣṇus sa evātmā yo hy ātmā sa janārdanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24356: prahlādo hy ātmanaivaitaṃ varam arjitavān svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:24357: svayaṃ vicāraṃ kṛtavān svayaṃ vijitavān manaḥ //MU_5,43.8//
GSP27moksop_u:24366: yad yad āsādyate kiñcit kenacit kvacid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:24369: saṃsārajaladhiṃ tīrtvā pāraṃ gaccha paraṃ padam //MU_5,43.14//
GSP27moksop_u:24371: mṛgapakṣigaṇaṃ kasmāt tad asau noddharaty ajaḥ //MU_5,43.15//
GSP27moksop_u:24372: guruś ced uddharaty ajñam ātmīyāt pauruṣād ṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:24374: na harer na guror nārthāt kiñcid āsādyate mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:24377: ātmanaḥ prāpyate yat tat prāpyate na jagattrayāt //MU_5,43.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24383: tadabhāve tu gauṇas syāt pūjyapūjāmayaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,43.21//
GSP27moksop_u:24389: tasmin siddhe bhavān siddho no cet tvaṃ vanagardabhaḥ //MU_5,43.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24391: sa caiva kasmāt kriyate na svakasyaiva cetasaḥ //MU_5,43.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24393: taṃ parityajya ye yānti bahir viṣṇuṃ na te budhāḥ //MU_5,43.26//
GSP27moksop_u:24396: yo hi mukhyaṃ parityajya gauṇaṃ samanudhāvati /
GSP27moksop_u:24397: tyaktvā rasāyanaṃ siddhaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃsādhayaty asau //MU_5,43.28//
GSP27moksop_u:24398: yas tu vā sthitim evāsyām ātmajñānacamatkṛtau /
GSP27moksop_u:24405: āmram eva daśām eti sāhakārīṃ śanaiś śanaiḥ //MU_5,43.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24406: etad apy ātmanaivātmā phalam āpnoti bhāvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24408: varam āpnoti yo vāpi viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24409: tena svasyaiva tat prāptaṃ phalam abhyāsaśākhinaḥ //MU_5,43.34//
GSP27moksop_u:24418: ākārabhāsuraṃ tyaktvā bāhyam āntaram apy ajam /
GSP27moksop_u:24421: sanmātram āsvādaya sarvasāraṃ pāraṃ paraṃ prāpsyasi janmanadyāḥ //MU_5,43.40//
GSP27moksop_u:24429: asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe kosalā nāma maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:24431: tatrāsīd brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid guṇī gādhir iti śrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24433: ā bālyāt praviraktena cetasā sa vyarājata /
GSP27moksop_u:24435: kim apy abhimataṃ kāryaṃ vinidhāya sa cetasi /
GSP27moksop_u:24436: bandhuvargād viniṣkramya tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ yayau //MU_5,44.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24437: utphullakamalaṃ tatra saraḥ prāpa sa viprarāṭ /
GSP27moksop_u:24454: imāṃ drakṣyasi māyāṃ tvaṃ tatas tyakṣyasi cety ajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24455: uktvā yayāv adṛśyatvaṃ gāndharvam iva pattanam //MU_5,44.14//
GSP27moksop_u:24456: gate viṣṇau samuttasthau jalāt sa brāhmaṇeśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24460: athāsya katicit tasmin divasāni yayur vane /
GSP27moksop_u:24463: cintayan vaiṣṇavaṃ vākyaṃ maharṣir iva mānase //MU_5,44.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24464: atha snānavidhāv antarjalam eṣa cakāra ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24477: āvṛtaṃ bandhubhiḥ khinnaiḥ kurarair iva pādapam //MU_5,44.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24488: maunaṃ dhyānam ivāpannaṃ paṅkād iva vinirmitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24502: tatra te jvalane dīpte cakrus taṃ bhasmasāc chavam /
GSP27moksop_u:24504: citiś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaiś śavam āśu dadāha tam /
GSP27moksop_u:24507: dantī virandhram iva veṇuvanaṃ samantād udvāntamedurarasaṃ dalayāṃ cakāra //MU_5,44.40//
GSP27moksop_u:24514: śvapacānāṃ striyo garbhe sthitam ātmānam ākulam //MU_5,45.2//
GSP27moksop_u:24520: itaś cetaś ca gacchantam utpīḍam iva yāmunam //MU_5,45.5//
GSP27moksop_u:24542: śanair jarjaratāṃ yātaṃ vṛṣṭihīnam iva sthalam //MU_5,45.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24544: saṃsthitaṃ maṭhikāṃ parṇaiḥ kṛtvā dūre munīndravat //MU_5,45.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24549: athāpaśyad asau gādhir yāvat tasya kalatriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24559: ekadā prāpa kīrāṇāṃ maṇḍale śrīmatīṃ purīm /
GSP27moksop_u:24563: sāmantair lalanābhiś ca nāgaraiś ca nirantaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24567: mṛte rājani rājārthaṃ viharantam itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24569: tam asau śvapaco nāgaṃ kautukodārayā dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:24571: ālokayantam ādāya taṃ kareṇa sa vāraṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24595: tā enam āsane saiṃhe prāpyābhiṣiṣicuḥ kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24596: tasminn eva gaje śakram airāvaṇa ivāmarāḥ //MU_5,45.43//
GSP27moksop_u:24597: evaṃ sa śvapaco rājyaṃ prāpa kīrapurāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:24598: araṇye hariṇaṃ puṣṭam aprāṇam iva vāyasaḥ //MU_5,45.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24604: aramata sa mahadbhis tatra bhogais sarasyāṃ ravikaramadatapto vāripūrair ivebhaḥ //MU_5,45.47//
GSP27moksop_u:24606: prakṛtibhir alam ūḍhāśeṣarājatvabhāras sa gavala iti nāmnā tatra rājā babhūva //MU_5,45.48//
GSP27moksop_u:24616: kīreṣu śvapaco rājyaṃ varṣāṇy aṣṭau cakāra ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24622: eka evājiraṃ bāhyaṃ tādṛgveṣas sa niryayau /
GSP27moksop_u:24625: gāyan mṛdu vasantotthaṃ kokilānām iva vrajam //MU_5,46.8//
GSP27moksop_u:24632: uvācedaṃ ca kīreśaṃ he bandho bhoḥ kaṭañjaka /
GSP27moksop_u:24633: kva nu sthito 'si diṣṭyādya dṛṣṭo 'si cirabāndhava //MU_5,46.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24636: iha rājā bhavantaṃ vā kaccid geyakalāvidam /
GSP27moksop_u:24644: śvapace pravadaty evaṃ rājā tāvat tayā tayā /
GSP27moksop_u:24647: śvapaco 'yam iti jñātvā mlānatām alam āyayuḥ //MU_5,46.19//
GSP27moksop_u:24658: mantriṇo nāgarā nāryas tatas te taṃ mahīpatim /
GSP27moksop_u:24659: nāsprākṣur api tiṣṭhantaṃ gṛha eva śavaṃ yathā //MU_5,46.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24660: bhṛtyāś cākṛtasatkāraṃ dūra eva tam atyajan /
GSP27moksop_u:24663: dagdhaṃ sthalam ivainaṃ te bahv amanyanta nākulāḥ //MU_5,46.27//
GSP27moksop_u:24669: tasmād viśeṣeṇa janā rākṣasād iva dudruvuḥ //MU_5,46.30//
GSP27moksop_u:24672: bhṛśam āraṭate 'py asmai nālāpaṃ nāgarā daduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24674: atha sarve vayaṃ dīrghaṃ kālaṃ śvapacadūṣitāḥ /
