GSP27moksop_u:24675: prāyaścittair na śuddhās smaḥ praviśāmo hutāśanam //MU_5,46.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24676: iti nirṇīya nagare nāgarā mantriṇas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24678: jvalitāsv abhitas tāsu tārakāsv iva khe tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:24687: antrair vyomagataiś channaṃ bhāskaraṃ jaladair iva //MU_5,46.39//
GSP27moksop_u:24700: kiṃ me duḥkhitajīvena maraṇaṃ me mahotsavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24702: iti niścitya gavalo jvalite jvalane puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24704: tasmin balād gavalanāmni hutāśarāśau dehe pataty avayavākulatāṃ prayāte /
GSP27moksop_u:24705: svāṅgāvadāhadahanasphuraṇānurodhād antarjale jhagiti bodham avāpa gādhiḥ //MU_5,46.48//
GSP27moksop_u:24707: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:24708: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,46.49//
GSP27moksop_u:24716: bodham āpa śanaiś śāntas svam evonnidradhīradhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24718: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti dadarśa ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24723: anyām eva puraḥ paśyan paraṃ vismayam āyayau //MU_5,47.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24724: ko 'haṃ kim iva paśyāmi kim akārṣam ahaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:24725: evaṃ vicārayaṃś citraṃ sabhrūbhaṅgam abhūt kṣaṇam //MU_5,47.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24728: cintayām āsa ca taṭe kva me mātā kva me priyā /
GSP27moksop_u:24729: yad ahaṃ mṛtim āyāto madhye mātṛmahelayoḥ //MU_5,47.9//
GSP27moksop_u:24732: avivāho 'smi jānāmi na svarūpam api striyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24734: tasmād etad asadbhūtam ahaṃ kiṃ nāma dṛṣṭavān /
GSP27moksop_u:24736: tad āstām etad eṣā hi bandhumadhyamṛtasthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24737: māyā mohe manāg asmin na satyam upalabhyate //MU_5,47.13//
GSP27moksop_u:24740: avadhīryeti taṃ cittamohaṃ gādhir nināya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24741: dināni katicit tasmin svaka evāśrame tadā //MU_5,47.15//
GSP27moksop_u:24743: brahmāṇam iva durvāsās sa viśaśrāma saśramaḥ //MU_5,47.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24746: atha vanditasandhyau tau kṛtajapyāv ubhāv api /
GSP27moksop_u:24748: tataḥ pravavṛte śāntā tayos tāpasayoḥ kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24751: kim brahman sukṛśāṅgas tvaṃ kim iti śramavān asi //MU_5,47.20//
GSP27moksop_u:24757: tatrāham avasaṃ māsaṃ pūjyamānaḥ pure janaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24760: ihābhūc chvapaco rājā varṣāṇy aṣṭau dvijeti me //MU_5,47.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24762: rājā babhūva śvapaco varṣāṇy aṣṭāv iheti taiḥ //MU_5,47.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24763: sa evānte parijñātaḥ praviṣṭo jvalanaṃ javāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24765: iti teṣāṃ mukhāc chrutvā tasmān nirgatya maṇḍalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24768: ihāham āgatas tena śrānto 'smy atikṛśo 'smi ca //MU_5,47.28//
GSP27moksop_u:24770: iti śrutavatā tena gādhinā sa tadā dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24771: bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo 'py etad eva kathayām āsa nānyathā //MU_5,47.29//
GSP27moksop_u:24772: atha vismayavān gādhis tāṃ nītvā tatra śarvarīm /
GSP27moksop_u:24776: yan mayā sambhrame dṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ bhūtaṃ dvijena tat /
GSP27moksop_u:24777: uktaṃ mameti kiṃ nāma syān māyāśambare kramaḥ //MU_5,47.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24778: yad bandhumadhye maraṇaṃ mayā tad dṛṣṭam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24779: sā māyaiva na sandehaś śeṣe paśyāmi satyatām //MU_5,47.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24783: uttasthau bhāskaraḥ pārśvaṃ meror draṣṭum ivodyataḥ //MU_5,47.35//
GSP27moksop_u:24789: apaśyad grāmakaṃ kañcid gandharva iva pattanam //MU_5,47.38//
GSP27moksop_u:24790: dadarśa tasya paryante tam eva śvapacālayam /
GSP27moksop_u:24795: tasya kām api vairāgyapadavīm anayan manaḥ //MU_5,47.41//
GSP27moksop_u:24798: dāridryaṃ taṃ dṛḍham iva daurbhāgyam iva kuṭṭitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24799: bhraṣṭāṅgam iva daurātmyaṃ daussthityam iva khaṇḍitam //MU_5,47.43//
GSP27moksop_u:24801: dhavalair vyāptaparyantaṃ sākṣyaṃ kartum iva sthitaiḥ //MU_5,47.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24802: bhuktaṃ pītaṃ purā tena yeṣu karparakeṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:24806: ciram ālokayām āsa sa tad ātmagṛhaṃ smayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24810: tatrāpṛcchaj janaṃ sādho kaccit smarati bho bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:24811: prāg vṛttam asya grāmasya paryante śvapacakramam //MU_5,47.49//
GSP27moksop_u:24812: sarva eva hi dhīmantaś ciravṛttam api sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:24813: karastham iva paśyanti mayeti sujanāc chrutam //MU_5,47.50//
GSP27moksop_u:24815: smarasy ekaṃ kila tamoduḥkhānām iva dehakam //MU_5,47.51//
GSP27moksop_u:24816: yadi jānāsi bhos sādho tan me kathaya taṃ janam /
GSP27moksop_u:24818: bhūyo bhūya iti grāmyāḥ pṛṣṭā gādhidvijanmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:24821: yathā kathayasi brahmaṃs tat tathā na tad anyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24825: tasya vṛddhasya tat sarvaṃ kalatraṃ mṛtyur ācchinat /
GSP27moksop_u:24827: yas tato deśam utsṛjya yayau kīrapurāntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24828: varṣāṇy aṣṭāv anudvegaṃ tatra rājā babhūva yaḥ //MU_5,47.57//
GSP27moksop_u:24829: yas tatrātha parijñāya janair dūre tiraskṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24830: yathā rāśir amedhyasya yathā grāme viṣadrumaḥ //MU_5,47.58//
GSP27moksop_u:24831: tato jane 'gniṃ praviśaty ātmanā yo hutāśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:24833: kiṃ tvam ekaṃ prayatnena śvapacaṃ pṛcchasi prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:24834: kiṃ te bandhur asau kaścid abhavat saṃstuto 'tha vā //MU_5,47.60//
GSP27moksop_u:24835: evaṃ kathayato grāmyān gādhiḥ pṛcchan punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24836: sarveṣu tatra grāmeṣu māsam ekam uvāsa saḥ //MU_5,47.61//
GSP27moksop_u:24837: yathā tenānubhūtaṃ tac chvapacatvaṃ tathaiva taiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24839: avyāhataṃ sakalahūnamukhād athaitad ākarṇya samyag avalokya yathānubhūtam /
GSP27moksop_u:24840: gādhiś śaśāṅkamalavad dhṛdaye virūḍhaṃ gūḍhākṛtiḥ paramavismayam ājagāma //MU_5,47.63//
GSP27moksop_u:24845: gādhir mano hi nāyāti tṛptim āścaryadarśane //MU_5,48.1//
GSP27moksop_u:24851: adyāpi saṃsthitāḥ kalpaṃ prati meruśikhā iva //MU_5,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:24852: iha tad vānarīmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ vaṃśāṅkurais saha /
GSP27moksop_u:24855: suptam āpīya maireyaṃ tiktaṃ gajamadair navaiḥ //MU_5,48.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24860: sthalīṣv etāsu tāsv atra saha śvapacabālakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24865: nṛttaṃ tat kṛtam unnādaṃ kallolair jaladhāv iva //MU_5,48.11//
GSP27moksop_u:24870: cacāla tasmād dīrgheṇa deśāt kālena kāryavit /
GSP27moksop_u:24877: sthānāni nagare paśyan papraccha janam ādṛtaḥ //MU_5,48.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24878: sādho smarasi kaccit tvam iha śvapacam īśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24879: yadi jānāsi tat tan me kathayāśu yathāvidhi //MU_5,48.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24881: abhūd ihāṣṭau varṣāṇi śvapaco bhūmipo dvija /
GSP27moksop_u:24885: yaṃ yaṃ pṛcchaty asau gādhir janaṃ jātakutūhalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24886: tasya tasya mukhād evaṃ śṛṇoty anubhavaty api //MU_5,48.21//
GSP27moksop_u:24888: devaṃ cakradharaṃ draṣṭuṃ mandirān nirgataṃ bahiḥ //MU_5,48.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24903: idaṃ tat kīrajanatārājyaṃ prāg bhuktam adya me /
GSP27moksop_u:24905: satyasvapna ivedaṃ me jāgrato 'pi puras sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24906: na jāne kiṃ kṛtotthānā māyeyaṃ pravijṛmbhate //MU_5,48.31//
GSP27moksop_u:24907: aho nu khalu dīrgheṇa manomohena jṛmbhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:24909: hā dhik kaṣṭam abuddhaṃ me mano vāsanayā hatam /
GSP27moksop_u:24911: eṣā hi māyā mahatī tena me cakrapāṇinā /
GSP27moksop_u:24912: darśitety adhunā sādhu mayā smṛtam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,48.34//
GSP27moksop_u:24913: tad idānīṃ tathā yatnaṃ kariṣye girikandare /
GSP27moksop_u:24915: iti sañcintya nagarād gādhis taptuṃ jagāma ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24924: gādhe kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā māyā mama garīyasī /
GSP27moksop_u:24927: tapo giritaṭe kurvan kim anyad abhivāñchasi //MU_5,48.41//
GSP27moksop_u:24929: evaṃ vadantam ālokya hariṃ gādhir dvijottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24932: viṣṇum āha dvijo vākyam ambhodam iva cātakaḥ //MU_5,48.43//
GSP27moksop_u:24935: mahīṃ prātar ivādityas tāṃ me prakaṭatāṃ naya //MU_5,48.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24937: svapnavat sa kathaṃ deva jāgraty api hi dṛśyate //MU_5,48.45//
GSP27moksop_u:24945: bahir na kiñcid apy asti khādridyūrvīdigādikam /
GSP27moksop_u:24947: phalādi sphāratām eti yathaiva bahir aṅkurāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24948: bahiḥ prakaṭatāṃ yāti tathā pṛthvyādi cetasaḥ //MU_5,48.50//
GSP27moksop_u:24949: satyaṃ pṛthvyādi cittasthaṃ na bahissthaṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:24950: aṅkurasthaṃ phalaṃ vastu tasmād yasmāt phalaśriyaḥ //MU_5,48.51//
GSP27moksop_u:24952: kumbhakāro ghaṭam iva ceto hanti karoti ca //MU_5,48.52//
GSP27moksop_u:24957: tyaktāvaner viṭapino bhūyaḥ pattrāṇi no yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24958: nirvāsanasya jīvasya punar janmādi no tathā //MU_5,48.55//
GSP27moksop_u:24960: śvapacatvaṃ prakaṭitaṃ yadi tad vismayo 'tra kim //MU_5,48.56//
GSP27moksop_u:24964: kathāṃ kathitavāṃś ceti dṛṣṭavān asi vibhramam //MU_5,48.58//
GSP27moksop_u:24966: ime hūnā ime grāmā dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.59//
GSP27moksop_u:24968: janair uktaḥ kaṭañjaś ca dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.60//
GSP27moksop_u:24969: tathaiva kīranagaraṃ prāpto 'smi kathitaṃ ca me /
GSP27moksop_u:24970: kīraiś śvapacarājatvaṃ dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.61//
GSP27moksop_u:24971: evaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ mohajālaṃ dvijottama /
GSP27moksop_u:24972: yat satyam iti jānāsi yac cāsatyam avaiṣi ca //MU_5,48.62//
GSP27moksop_u:24973: vāsanāvalitaṃ cetaḥ kiṃ nāma na na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:24975: nātithir na ca hūnās te na kīrās te na tat puram /
GSP27moksop_u:24976: sarvam eva mahābuddhe vyāmohād dṛṣṭavān asi //MU_5,48.64//
GSP27moksop_u:24980: idaṃ tac chvapacāgāram iti dṛṣṭaṃ na satyataḥ //MU_5,48.66//
GSP27moksop_u:24981: tathaiva kīranagaraṃ dṛṣṭavān asi tat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24982: tathaiva nānyathā vāpi māyārthī hi bhavān dvija //MU_5,48.67//
GSP27moksop_u:24984: dikṣu pronmattaka iva vibhramaṃ manasā mune //MU_5,48.68//
GSP27moksop_u:24985: tad uttiṣṭha nijam karma kurvaṃs tiṣṭhopaśāntadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24986: na svakarma vinā śreyaḥ prāpnuvantīha mānavāḥ //MU_5,48.69//
GSP27moksop_u:24989: vibudhamunigaṇaiḥ pavitrahastair vṛta udadhiṃ nijam āspadaṃ jagāma //MU_5,48.70//
GSP27moksop_u:24993: atha gādhir gate viṣṇau punar hūnādikāñ janān /
GSP27moksop_u:24999: uvāca gādhiṃ bhagavān mayūram iva vāridaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25000: kiṃ tvaṃ prārthayase bhūyas tapaseti prasādavān //MU_5,49.4//
GSP27moksop_u:25003: tatra vyabhicaraty asmadvṛttānto na kathāsv api //MU_5,49.5//
GSP27moksop_u:25004: māyayā hūnabhūr dṛṣṭā tvayety ukto 'smi kiṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:25009: tenāṅga tava vṛttāntaṃ satyaṃ yat kathayanti te /
GSP27moksop_u:25012: tat tathā yat tvayā dṛṣṭam iṣṭakākhaṇḍatāṃ gatam //MU_5,49.9//
GSP27moksop_u:25015: tathā hi bahavas svapnam ekaṃ paśyanti mānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25021: vipra saṅkalpamātro 'sau kālo hy ātmani tiṣṭhati //MU_5,49.14//
GSP27moksop_u:25022: amūrto bhagavān kālo brahmaiva tam ajaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25023: na jahāti na cādatte kiñcit kasyacid eva saḥ //MU_5,49.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25024: laukiko yas tv ayaṃ kālo varṣakalpayugātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25025: saṅkalpyate padārthaughaiḥ padārthaughāś ca tena te //MU_5,49.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25030: ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇur jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25032: tataḥ katipayeṣv adrau māseṣv api gateṣu saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25034: dadarśa caikadā nātham āgataṃ praṇanāma tam /
GSP27moksop_u:25040: etasminn eva vimale māṃ niyojaya karmaṇi //MU_5,49.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25044: hūnakīrapure mohād dṛṣṭavāṃs tat tathā bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:25045: ity etat sambhavaty eva dṛśyate hi janair bhramaḥ //MU_5,49.25//
GSP27moksop_u:25046: hūnās tvam iva kīrāś ca dṛṣṭavantas tathā bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:25048: idaṃ tu śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathābhūtam anindita /
GSP27moksop_u:25057: kadācid apy adṛṣṭaṃ tu cetaḥ paśyati dṛṣṭavat //MU_5,49.31//
GSP27moksop_u:25059: jāgraty api tathaivāṅga dṛśyate manasā svayam //MU_5,49.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25061: pratibhām eti te gādhe kaṭañjacaritaṃ tathā //MU_5,49.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25062: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti majjati nātmavān /
GSP27moksop_u:25063: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti paśyaty anātmavān //MU_5,49.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25072: yad eva te manomātre sahasā pratibimbate /
GSP27moksop_u:25075: sthīyate cet tad ākramya tan na kiñcit prabādhate //MU_5,49.40//
GSP27moksop_u:25076: tvam uttiṣṭha gireḥ kuñje daśavarṣāṇy akhinnadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25077: tapaḥ kuru tato jñānam anantābhāvam āpsyasi //MU_5,49.41//
GSP27moksop_u:25088: aramata tadanu svāṃ prāpya sattāṃ mahātmā vyapagatabhayamoho bhogabhūmāv anicchaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25089: satatamuditajīvanmuktarūpaḥ praśāntas sakala iva śaśāṅko ghūrṇitāpūrṇacetāḥ //MU_5,49.47//
GSP27moksop_u:25099: ato vacmi mahābāho māyeyaṃ vitatety alam /
GSP27moksop_u:25102: evam asya kathaṃ brahman māyācakrasya rodhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25112: cakraṃ nābhāv avaṣṭabdhaṃ vaśam āyāti nānyathā //MU_5,50.9//
GSP27moksop_u:25115: etāṃ yuktiṃ vinā duḥkham anantam idam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25116: asyāṃ yuktau kṣaṇāt tv antaṃ gatam evāvalokaya //MU_5,50.11//
GSP27moksop_u:25121: cittāntar eva saṃsāraḥ kumbhāntaḥ kumbhakhaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:25122: cittanāśe na saṃsāraḥ kumbhanāśe na kumbhakham //MU_5,50.14//
GSP27moksop_u:25126: bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad abhajad yāti cittam acittatām //MU_5,50.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25128: karoṣi tad acittatvaṃ prāpta evāsi pāvanam //MU_5,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:25133: cetanaś cittariktaś ced bhāvitas tat kusaṃsṛteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25134: āmūlam eva dagdhāni viddhi mūlāni siddhiman //MU_5,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:25137: sā satyatā sā śivatā sā sattā pāramātmikī /
GSP27moksop_u:25138: sarvajñatā sā sā tṛptir nanu yatra manaḥ kṣatam //MU_5,50.22//
GSP27moksop_u:25139: mano yatra tu tatrāsthās tatra duḥkhasukhāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25140: sadā sannidhim āyānti śmaśāna iva vāyasāḥ //MU_5,50.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25151: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api /
GSP27moksop_u:25153: mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so 'ham iti santyajya vāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25157: palāyaneṣu yuddheṣu duḥkheṣu ca sukheṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25159: malaṃ saṃvedyam utsṛjya mano nirmathya mantharam /
GSP27moksop_u:25165: jāgraty eva hi sauṣuptīṃ bhāvayan susthirāṃ sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:25174: viṣaṃ hālāhalam api yāsyaty amṛtatāṃ tava //MU_5,50.40//
GSP27moksop_u:25180: prasariṣyati te saṃvit sūryāṃśur iva sarvataḥ //MU_5,50.43//
GSP27moksop_u:25183: tair na lajjāmahe pumbhir ye svabhāvam upāgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25185: parvatāḥ kharvatāṃ yānti puro 'drer iva dantinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25189: avastutāṃ vrajanty ete madhyāhna iva dīpakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25196: tiryagbhyaś cāpy atattvajñā rāma tucchatarās smṛtāḥ //MU_5,50.51//
GSP27moksop_u:25199: anātmajño hi durdehaḥ prasphurann api bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:25200: śava eva bhramaty uccair ātmajñas tu sacetanaḥ //MU_5,50.53//
GSP27moksop_u:25201: dūram ātmajñatā yāti citte pīvaratāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:25208: idaṃ mameti bhāvena ceto gacchati pīnatām //MU_5,50.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25225: ratiṃ gataṃ nityam asatpradeśe śarīramālāgrasanena puṣṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:25227: dūre samutsāraya sārabhūtaṃ duśceṣṭitaṃ karkaśam āraṭantam /
GSP27moksop_u:25230: bhrāntaṃ ciraṃ dehaśateṣv aṭavyāṃ svasaṃsṛtau cetanavarjiteṣu //MU_5,50.68//
GSP27moksop_u:25232: notsāritaś cittapiśācako 'yaṃ yāvat kutas tāvad ihātmasiddhiḥ //MU_5,50.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25234: ajasram acchaśvasanāśanaṃ ca sarvasya rāmābhayanāśanaṃ ca //MU_5,50.70//
GSP27moksop_u:25236: nītvā śamaṃ rāma manomahāhiṃ bhayaṃ bhṛśaṃ projjhya bhavābhayātmā //MU_5,50.71//
GSP27moksop_u:25240: uḍḍīya ced gacchati cittagṛdhro dehadrumāt tan nipuṇaṃ jayas te //MU_5,50.73//
GSP27moksop_u:25241: bhrāntaṃ vanānteṣu digantareṣu phalārthinaṃ cañcalam ākulāṅgam /
GSP27moksop_u:25242: janmāvaner janmamahīṃ prayāntaṃ saṃsārapānthaṃ janam āhasantam //MU_5,50.74//
GSP27moksop_u:25248: sotsāham utsādaya cittameghaṃ mahat phalaṃ prāpya bhavālam āḍhyaḥ //MU_5,50.77//
GSP27moksop_u:25249: granthīkṛtaṃ karmabhir ātmasṛṣṭaiś śastrair abhedyaṃ jvalanair adagdham /
GSP27moksop_u:25252: chittvā svayaṃ rāghava cittapāśaṃ yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ viharāstaśaṅkaḥ //MU_5,50.79//
GSP27moksop_u:25256: akāmanānāmamahānalena balena dagdhvā vibhayo bhava tvam //MU_5,50.81//
GSP27moksop_u:25257: cittena cetaś śamam āśu nītvā śuddhena ghorāstram ivāstrayuktyā /
GSP27moksop_u:25258: cirāya sādho tyaja cañcalatvaṃ vimarkaṭo vṛkṣa ivākṣataśrīḥ //MU_5,50.82//
GSP27moksop_u:25259: alam alam iti kṛtvā cetasā vītaśaṅkaṃ vyupaśamitamalo 'ntas sarvam ādeham eva /
GSP27moksop_u:25260: tṛṇalavalaghu paśyaṃl līlayāheyadṛṣṭyā piba vihara ramasva prāptasaṃsārapāraḥ //MU_5,50.83//
GSP27moksop_u:25269: bhūtale patitāṃ tāvad enām uddhṛtya dhāraya //MU_5,51.3//
GSP27moksop_u:25273: kṛtvā kṛtvā dhiyā dhīra dhīrayāntar vicāraya //MU_5,51.5//
GSP27moksop_u:25290: uddālako nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25298: kiṃ tat prāpyaṃ pradhānaṃ syād yad viśrāntau na śocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:25299: yat prāpya janmanā bhūyas sambandho nopajāyate //MU_5,51.17//
GSP27moksop_u:25304: idaṃ kṛtvedam apy anyat kartavyam iti kalpanām /
GSP27moksop_u:25306: kadā vikalpajālaṃ me na lagiṣyati cetasi /
GSP27moksop_u:25307: sthitam apy ujjhitāsaṅgaṃ payaḥ padmadale yathā //MU_5,51.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25321: paśyaṃś cinmātram akhilaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kadā //MU_5,51.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25329: kṣayam eṣyati kṛṣṇeyaṃ kadā me mohayāminī //MU_5,51.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25341: punaḥ punas tūpaviśya dhyānābhyāsaṃ cakāra saḥ //MU_5,51.38//
GSP27moksop_u:25352: bāhyān ābhyantarān sparśāṃs tyaktvā nidrāṃ ca tanmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25353: tamas tejaś ca no lebhe kadācic chāśvatīṃ sthitim //MU_5,51.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25355: darīṣv anvaham ugrāsu vātabhagna iva drumaḥ //MU_5,51.45//
GSP27moksop_u:25382: mṛdu meghavidhir vṛndam āmbhodam iva tatra saḥ //MU_5,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:25383: tasya prasārayām āsa pṛṣṭhe cāru mṛgājinam /
GSP27moksop_u:25388: pārṣṇibhyāṃ vṛṣaṇau dhṛtvā cakāra brāhmam añjalim //MU_5,52.6//
GSP27moksop_u:25391: ayi mūrkha manaḥ ko 'rthas tava saṃsāravṛttibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25392: dhīmanto na niṣevante paryante duḥkhadāṃ kriyām //MU_5,52.8//
GSP27moksop_u:25395: yadi yāsi mahīrandhraṃ brahmalokam athāpi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25396: tan na nirvṛtim āyāsi tvaṃ vinopaśamāmṛtam //MU_5,52.10//
GSP27moksop_u:25398: tyaja yāhi paraṃ śreyaḥ padam ekāntasundaram //MU_5,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:25402: bhramasy avirataṃ vyartham eva maṇḍūkikā yathā //MU_5,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:25404: bhramantyā bhuvanaṃ viṣvak kiṃ samāsāditaṃ tvayā //MU_5,52.14//
GSP27moksop_u:25405: yasmāt kiñcit tad āpnoṣi yasmin bhajasi nirvṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:25406: tasmiṃś citta śame mūrkha nānubadhnāsi kiṃ padam //MU_5,52.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25408: dhiyā śabdānusāriṇyā mṛgavan mā kṣayaṃ vraja //MU_5,52.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25418: sarvair etair anarthais tu vyāptasyājña kutas sukham //MU_5,52.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25420: svātmanas sahajaḥ phenas tāntavaḥ krimiṇā yathā //MU_5,52.22//
GSP27moksop_u:25422: yadi śāmyasi nirmūlaṃ tad anantā jayās tava //MU_5,52.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25424: jānann api jagaddṛṣṭīr na tyakṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi //MU_5,52.24//
GSP27moksop_u:25425: karomy atha kimarthaṃ vā tavaitad anuśāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25426: vicāraṇavataḥ puṃsaś cittam asti hi nānagha //MU_5,52.25//
GSP27moksop_u:25431: yāvat tānavam āyātaṃ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ vicāravat /
GSP27moksop_u:25432: tāvat tat kṣīṇam evāhaṃ manye śāradameghavat //MU_5,52.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25433: anuśāsanam etad yad asato naśyato 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25435: tasmāt saṅkṣīyamāṇaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmy aham asanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:25439: ayaṃ so 'ham iti vyarthaṃ durdṛṣṭir avalambitā /
GSP27moksop_u:25442: na sambhavati bilvāntar vāsitā dantino yathā //MU_5,52.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25444: tvayaiṣā tad asatpātir nainām anusarāmy aham //MU_5,52.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25448: na labdho 'sāv ahaṃ nāma kas syād ahaṃ iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.36//
GSP27moksop_u:25451: dṛśyate tasya neyattā na nāma parikalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:25452: naikatā nānyatā caiva na mahattā na cāṇutā //MU_5,52.38//
GSP27moksop_u:25453: vedanaṃ tvam asaṃvedyaṃ mayi ced duḥkhakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:25454: vivekajena bhedena tad idaṃ hanyase mayā //MU_5,52.39//
GSP27moksop_u:25455: idaṃ māṃsaṃ idaṃ raktam imāny asthīni dehake /
GSP27moksop_u:25456: ime te śvāsamarutaḥ ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.40//
GSP27moksop_u:25457: māṃsam anyad asṛk cānyad asthīny anyāni citta he /
GSP27moksop_u:25458: bodho 'nyas spandanaṃ cānyat ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.41//
GSP27moksop_u:25459: idaṃ ghrāṇam iyaṃ jihvā tvag iyaṃ śravaṇe ime /
GSP27moksop_u:25460: idaṃ cakṣur ayaṃ spandaḥ ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.42//
GSP27moksop_u:25461: yathābhūtatayā nāham asmi na tvaṃ na vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:25463: aham eveha sarvatra nāhaṃ kiñcid apīha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25464: ity eva sanmayī dṛṣṭir netaro vidyate kramaḥ //MU_5,52.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25469: nirduḥkho duḥkhayogyasya nāham asya na caiṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:25470: kaścid bhavati śailasya tatstha eva yathāmbudaḥ //MU_5,52.47//
GSP27moksop_u:25471: nāhaṃ bhūtvā tv ahaṃ hīdaṃ vacmi tiṣṭhāmi yāmi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25474: yāntu tiṣṭhantu vā dehe mamaite tu na kecana //MU_5,52.49//
GSP27moksop_u:25475: kaṣṭaṃ ko 'yam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ kenopakalpitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25480: tad ahaṃ nāma ko 'sau syād yo 'smi duḥkhena mohitaḥ //MU_5,52.52//
GSP27moksop_u:25481: sparśanāmni nije tattve yadi jātā tvag unmukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:25482: tat ko 'yaṃ syād ahaṃ nāma kupiśāca ivoditaḥ //MU_5,52.53//
GSP27moksop_u:25484: ahaṃ mṛṣṭabhug ity eṣa kutastyaḥ kutsito bhramaḥ //MU_5,52.54//
GSP27moksop_u:25488: ahaṃ ghrāteti yo mantā taṃ cauraṃ naiva vedmy aham //MU_5,52.56//
GSP27moksop_u:25490: bhāvas tasyām asatyāyāṃ yasyāsāv api sambhramaḥ //MU_5,52.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25492: pravartate bahis svārthe vāsanā nātra kāraṇam //MU_5,52.58//
GSP27moksop_u:25493: vāsanārahitaṃ karma kriyate nanu citta he /
GSP27moksop_u:25496: kurudhvaṃ karma he sarvaṃ na duḥkhaṃ samavāpsyatha //MU_5,52.60//
GSP27moksop_u:25497: bhavadbhir eva duḥkhāya vāsanā vāsitā mudhā /
GSP27moksop_u:25499: vāsanādyā dṛśas sarvā vyatiriktās tu nātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25509: eṣā hi bhavatām eva vimohāya kṣayāya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25511: he citta sarvendriyakośa tasmāt sarvendriyair aikyam upetya nūnam /
GSP27moksop_u:25512: ālokya cātmānam asatsvarūpaṃ nirvāṇam ekāmalabodham āssva //MU_5,52.68//
GSP27moksop_u:25514: abhimataparihārakāryayuktyā bhava vibhayo bhagavān bhiyām abhūmiḥ //MU_5,52.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25519: cid acetyā tadākrāntau na śaktā vāsanādayaḥ //MU_5,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:25522: tatkṛtebhyo vikārebhyo bhītiṃ tāny eva bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25523: bhūyo 'py anubhavantv antar ahaṃ hi cid alepikā //MU_5,53.3//
GSP27moksop_u:25524: cito na janmamaraṇe sarvagāyāś citaḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:25525: kiṃ nāma mriyate brūta māryate kena vāpi kim //MU_5,53.4//
GSP27moksop_u:25526: cito na jīvitenārthas sarvātmā saiva jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:25527: kiṃ prāpsyati kadātmaiṣa prāṅmṛto yadi jīvati //MU_5,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:25530: yo hy ahambhāvatāṃ prāpto bhāvābhāvais sa gṛhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:25531: ātmano nāsty ahambhāvo bhāvābhāvāḥ kuto 'sya te //MU_5,53.7//
GSP27moksop_u:25532: ahambhāvo mudhā moho manaś ca mṛgatṛṣṇikā /
GSP27moksop_u:25538: guṇā guṇeṣu vartante prakṛtiḥ prakṛtau sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:25542: evaṃ kimākṛtiḥ ko vā kimādeyaś ca kiṅkṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25543: kiṃrūpaḥ kimmayaḥ ko 'haṃ kiṃ gṛhṇāmi tyajāmi kim //MU_5,53.13//
GSP27moksop_u:25546: asaty alam ahaṅkāre sambandhaḥ kena kasya kaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25548: evaṃ brahmātmakam idaṃ yat kiñcij jagati sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:25549: brahmaivāsti tad evāsmi pariśocāmi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,53.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25550: ekasminn eva vimale pade sarvagate sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:25552: nāsty eva hi padārthaśrīr ātmaivāstīha sarvagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25553: padārthalakṣmyāṃ satyāṃ ca sambandho 'sti na kasyacit //MU_5,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:25554: indriyair indriyeṣv aṅgair mano manasi valgati /
GSP27moksop_u:25555: cid aluptavapuḥ kena sambaddhaṃ kasya kiṃ katham //MU_5,53.19//
GSP27moksop_u:25559: mamedam idam asyeti viparyastam idaṃ jagat //MU_5,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25562: ātmano vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid api vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:25563: śabdabrahmeti tat tattvam etat tad bhāvayāmy alam //MU_5,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25567: tiṣṭhāmy ātmani satyātmā śaratkhe śaradīva kham //MU_5,53.25//
GSP27moksop_u:25575: na śāmyaty arkaratnānāṃ grīṣme 'rcir iva durdhiyām //MU_5,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:25576: nāstīdam idam astīti cintā dhāvaty ahaṅkṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:25579: bhūyaḥ prayacchaty araso na pāṣāṇavad aṅkuram //MU_5,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:25583: asanmayaparispande tvam ahaṃ ceti kaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,53.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25584: idaṃ jagad udety ādāv akāraṇam akāraṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:25585: yad akāraṇam ucchūnaṃ tat sad ity ucyate katham //MU_5,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25586: aparyantaṃ purā kālaṃ mṛdi kumbha ivākṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25588: madhye naravayomātraṃ kañcit kālaṃ tu cañcalam /
GSP27moksop_u:25591: taraṅge ca nibaddhāsthā ye hatās te kudṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_5,53.37//
GSP27moksop_u:25592: prāk purastāc ca sarvāṇi santi vastūni cābhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25594: citta pūrvaṃ purastāc ca videhaṃ śāntam ity asi /
GSP27moksop_u:25595: sad asad vā khasaṃlīnaṃ madhye 'smin kiṃ tavogratā //MU_5,53.39//
GSP27moksop_u:25600: dṛśyate kṣīyate caiva rūpaṃ sadasatoś calam /
GSP27moksop_u:25601: tathaivedam iyaṃ tv eṣā kāle nyūnātiriktatā //MU_5,53.42//
GSP27moksop_u:25602: sā ca tvayā kṛtā nityaṃ citta duḥkhasukhodayaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25604: tvam apy evāsadābhāsaṃ mithyā sad iva lakṣyase /
GSP27moksop_u:25605: mṛgatṛṣṇeva tenaitat tvatkṛtaṃ sat kathaṃ bhavet //MU_5,53.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25606: yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi tat sarvaṃ dṛśyamaṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:25607: avastv iti vinirṇīya mano yāhy amanaḥpadam //MU_5,53.45//
GSP27moksop_u:25608: avastv idam iti sphāre rūḍhe manasi niścaye /
GSP27moksop_u:25613: dagdhātmakam alaṃ cittaṃ śuddhatām eti śāśvatīm //MU_5,53.48//
GSP27moksop_u:25616: manaś śatruś śarīrasya śarīraṃ manaso ripuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25620: etayor ekasaṃsthāne ratir ity eva yā kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:25621: sā vyomny ayasstriyā bhuktā dhareti kathayā samā //MU_5,53.52//
GSP27moksop_u:25624: mithoviruddhasaṃsarge ratim ety adhamo hi yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25628: tair duḥkhais tāpito deho mano hantum athecchati /
GSP27moksop_u:25630: nāsti śatruḥ prakṛtyaiva na ca mitraṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:25631: sukhadaṃ mitram ity uktaṃ duḥkhadāś śatravas smṛtāḥ //MU_5,53.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25632: deho duḥkhāny anubhavan svamano hantum icchati /
GSP27moksop_u:25633: dehaṃ manas svaduḥkhānāṃ satkośaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt //MU_5,53.58//
GSP27moksop_u:25634: evaṃ mitho duḥkhadayoś śliṣṭayoḥ kas sukhāgamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25636: manasy eva parikṣīṇe na deho duḥkhabhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25638: naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam anarthāya śarīraṃ padam āpadām /
GSP27moksop_u:25640: ete manaśśarīre hi mithaḥ pīvaratāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:25642: mitho duḥkhāya sampanne ekarūpe dvidhā sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:25644: citte kṣayiṇi saṅkṣīṇo deha ā mūlato bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:25647: mano na kṣīyate kṣīṇe dehe tat kṣapayen manaḥ //MU_5,53.65//
GSP27moksop_u:25650: prakṣīyamāṇam evedaṃ mama manye manas sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:25654: yadarthaṃ kila bhogaśrīr vāñchyate tat kalevaram /
GSP27moksop_u:25655: na me nāpi ca tasyāhaṃ ko 'rthas sukhalavena me //MU_5,53.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25656: nāhaṃ deha iti tv asmin yuktim ākarṇaya krame /
GSP27moksop_u:25657: sarvāṅgeṣv api satsv eva śavaḥ kasmān na valgati //MU_5,53.70//
GSP27moksop_u:25659: yas saṅgaṃ bhāsvatā prāpya vedmi vyomani bhāskaram //MU_5,53.71//
GSP27moksop_u:25660: jño 'haṃ me na sukhenārtho nānarthena ca duḥkhitā /
GSP27moksop_u:25661: śarīram astu vā māstu sthito 'smi vigatajvaraḥ //MU_5,53.72//
GSP27moksop_u:25662: yatrātmā tatra na mano nendriyāṇi na vāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25664: padaṃ tad anuyāto 'smi kevalo 'smi jayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:25668: svasmāt padavarād asmāl līlayā calitasya me /
GSP27moksop_u:25669: adha ākramataḥ kiñcit parivāro hy ayaṃ śubhaḥ //MU_5,53.76//
GSP27moksop_u:25676: sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvasmin sambhavaty ataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25677: sarvaṃ prati mama kṣīṇe vāñchāvāñche sukhāsukham //MU_5,53.80//
GSP27moksop_u:25679: uparamāmy aham ātmani śītale ghanalavaś śaradīva nabhastale //MU_5,53.81//
GSP27moksop_u:25683: iti nirṇīya tatayā dhiyā dhavalayā muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25695: hṛdayāgnir jvalañ jvālī dadāha malinaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25698: babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,54.8//
GSP27moksop_u:25701: na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nāśāsu tatra te /
GSP27moksop_u:25707: tad bhasma pavanādhūtaṃ sāsthi vāyur ayojayat /
GSP27moksop_u:25712: babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25714: pūraṇāt pūrako nāma prāṇānām abhavat kramaḥ //MU_5,54.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25730: saridoghā iva saro vṛkṣaṃ madhurasā iva //MU_5,54.24//
GSP27moksop_u:25731: antaḥ kuṇḍalinīṃ prāṇāḥ pūrayām āsur ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25735: atha padmāsanagataḥ kṛtvā dehe sthitiṃ dṛḍhām /
GSP27moksop_u:25740: cintayā hṛdayaṃ ninye dūrād rajjveva kīlakam //MU_5,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:25741: dhāvamānam adho mattaṃ cittam ābilam ākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:25742: balāt saṃrodhayām āsa setur jalam iva drutam //MU_5,54.30//
GSP27moksop_u:25746: śvasanaṃ śreyase deśe praśastas samayo yathā //MU_5,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25747: tilebhya iva tailāni pṛthak cakre prayatnataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25749: bāhyān sparśān aśeṣeṇa jahau dūre śanair arīn /
GSP27moksop_u:25750: sahasā kuṇḍakacchanno maṇir dūraṃ tviṣo yathā //MU_5,54.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25756: dadhāra kandharāṃ dhīrāṃ meruś śṛṅgaśikhām iva //MU_5,54.37//
GSP27moksop_u:25764: acchinan manasā śūraḥ khaḍgeneva raṇe śarān //MU_5,54.41//
GSP27moksop_u:25767: tad apy utsārayām āsa samyak svāntavivasvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:25769: tamasy uparate kāntaṃ tejaḥpuñjaṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25770: śārvare timire śānte prātas sāndhyam ivāmbudam //MU_5,54.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25771: taṃ lulāva sthalābjānāṃ vanaṃ bāla iva dvipaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25772: apibac cāpy asṛkpūraṃ vetāla iva vegataḥ //MU_5,54.45//
GSP27moksop_u:25773: tejasy uparate tasya ghūrṇamānaṃ mano muneḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25774: niśābjavad agān nidrāṃ lolaṃ kṣīvavad eva vā //MU_5,54.46//
GSP27moksop_u:25775: meghamālāṃ iva marud bālo nīlābjinīm iva /
GSP27moksop_u:25776: yāminīm iva tīkṣṇāṃśus tām apy āśu lulāva saḥ //MU_5,54.47//
GSP27moksop_u:25777: nidrāvyupaśame tasya bhāvayām āsa tan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25779: payoda iva tāpiñchaṃ nīhāram iva mārutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25780: tamo dīpa ivācchātmā tad apy āśu mamārja saḥ //MU_5,54.49//
GSP27moksop_u:25783: moham apy eṣa manasas taṃ mamārja mahāśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25786: kām apy avasthām āsādya viśaśrāma manaḥ kṣaṇam //MU_5,54.52//
GSP27moksop_u:25790: tataś cinmayatām āgād dhema nūpuratām iva //MU_5,54.54//
GSP27moksop_u:25791: cittatvam atha santyajya cittaṃ cittvaṃ tataṃ gataṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:25792: anyad eva babhūvāśu paṅkaḥ kumbhasthitāv iva //MU_5,54.55//
GSP27moksop_u:25793: cetyaṃ santyajya cic chuddhā citsāmānyam athāyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:25796: cidākāśaṃ tataṃ śuddhaṃ so 'bhavad bodhim āgataḥ //MU_5,54.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25799: śarīrāt samatīto 'sau kām apy avanim āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25806: apaśyad vyomagān siddhān amarān iva bhūriśaḥ //MU_5,54.62//
GSP27moksop_u:25809: tāni nādarayāṃ cakre siddhavṛndāni sa dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25813: jīvanmuktapadaṃ tat tad yat sa samprāptavān dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25814: tatra siddhās surās sādhyās sthitā brahmaharādayaḥ //MU_5,54.66//
GSP27moksop_u:25816: nānande na nirānande tatas tatsaṃvid ābabhau //MU_5,54.67//
GSP27moksop_u:25817: kṣaṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vā tatra labdhvā sthitiṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25818: ratim eti na bhogaughe dṛṣṭasvarga ivāvanau //MU_5,54.68//
GSP27moksop_u:25819: tat padaṃ sā gatiś śāntā tac chreyaś śāśvataṃ śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:25820: tatra viśrāntim āptasya na bhūyo jāyate śramaḥ //MU_5,54.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25821: tat padaṃ sādhavaḥ prāpya dṛśyadṛṣṭim imāṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25824: dṛśyaṃ na bahu manyante rājāno dīnatām iva //MU_5,54.71//
GSP27moksop_u:25826: kadarthād bodham āyāti na yāty evātha vānagha //MU_5,54.72//
GSP27moksop_u:25835: te tam ūcur mahātmānam uddālakamuniṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:25837: āruhyemaṃ vimānaṃ tvam ehi traiviṣṭapaṃ puraṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:25839: ākalpam ucitān bhuṅkṣva bhogān abhimatān vibho /
GSP27moksop_u:25842: paśyemās tvām upāsīnāḥ kariṇyaḥ kariṇaṃ yathā //MU_5,54.80//
GSP27moksop_u:25844: vasanta iva mañjaryas svarga eva bhavanti tāḥ //MU_5,54.81//
GSP27moksop_u:25845: evaṃ kathayatas siddhān atithīn ity asau muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25847: nābhyanandan na tatyāja tāṃ vibhūtiṃ sa dhīradhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25850: tam upāsya yayus siddhā dinaiḥ katipayais svayam //MU_5,54.84//
GSP27moksop_u:25851: jīvanmuktas sa ca munir vijahāra yathāsukham /
GSP27moksop_u:25857: kadācid ahnā māsena kadācid vatsareṇa ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25862: dṛśye 'smiṃś citraravivan nāstam āyān na codayam //MU_5,54.90//
GSP27moksop_u:25864: śaradi kham iva kāntaṃ vyātataṃ corjitaṃ ca sphuṭam amalam alekhaṃ tat vapus svaṃ babhāra //MU_5,54.91//
GSP27moksop_u:25879: dṛṣṭir eṣā hi paramā sadehādehayos sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:25882: jñasya kevalam ajñasya na bhavaty eva bodhajā //MU_5,55.7//
GSP27moksop_u:25883: asyāṃ dṛśi sthitās sarve jīvanmuktā mahāśayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25884: siddhā rasā iva bhuvi vyomavīthyām ivānilāḥ //MU_5,55.8//
GSP27moksop_u:25889: atha kālena mahatā buddhis tasya babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:25897: na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nārthe na śūnyake /
GSP27moksop_u:25911: upaśaśāma śanair divasair asau katipayais svapade vimalātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:25914: vigalitasukham ādyaṃ tat sukhaṃ prāpa yasmiṃs tṛṇam iva jalarāśāv uhyate śakralakṣmīḥ //MU_5,55.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25916: kathanaguṇam atītaṃ satyam ānandam ādyaṃ sukham asukham anantaṃ brāhmaṇo 'sau babhūva //MU_5,55.24//
GSP27moksop_u:25917: gatavati padam ādyaṃ cetasi svasvabhāvaṃ dvijatanur atha māsais sopaviṣṭā ca ṣaḍbhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25919: atha bahutarakālenainam adrer bhuvaṃ tām upayayur agakanyāsaṃyutā mātaraḥ khāt /
GSP27moksop_u:25920: abhimataphalasiddhyai saṃyutā eva sarvā analam iva śikhānāṃ paṅktayaḥ piṅgakeśyaḥ //MU_5,55.26//
GSP27moksop_u:25921: dinakarakaraśuṣkaṃ viprakaṅkālakaṃ taj jhagiti ca karakoṭau baddhakhaṭvāṅgasaṅgā /
GSP27moksop_u:25922: sakalavibudhavandyā khiṅkhinī devadevī niśi navaratanṛttā kācakāntiṃ cakāra //MU_5,55.27//
GSP27moksop_u:25923: ity uddālakadehako 'dya vilasanmāyūrabarhavrajavyālolābdalave nave vivalite mandāramālāgaṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25924: śete khiṅkhinikāmahābhagavatīlīlālalāme latājāle bhṛṅga ivāntapuṣpapaṭale paścād upāgacchati //MU_5,55.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25926: rūḍhā yasya kadācid eva vilasadramyeva sacchāyayā nāsāv eti viyogam eti ca phalenoccaistarāṃ saṅgamam //MU_5,55.29//
GSP27moksop_u:25942: tayos tu kataraś śreyān iti me bhagavan vada //MU_5,56.6//
GSP27moksop_u:25946: dṛśyair mama na sambandha iti niścitya śītalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25948: dvāv etau rāma susamāv antaś cet pariśītalau /
GSP27moksop_u:25949: antaśśītalatā yā syāt tad dhanaṃ tat tapaḥphalam //MU_5,56.9//
GSP27moksop_u:25951: tat tasya tat samādhānaṃ samam unmattatāṇḍavaiḥ //MU_5,56.10//
GSP27moksop_u:25954: vyavahārī prabuddho yaḥ prabuddho yo vane sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25955: dvāv etau puruṣau nūnam asandehapadaṃ gatau //MU_5,56.12//
GSP27moksop_u:25956: akartṛ kurvad apy etac cetaḥ pratanuvāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25958: akurvad api kartr eva cetaḥ praghanavāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25960: cetaso yad akartṛtvaṃ tat samādhānam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:25961: taṃ viddhi kevalībhāvaṃ sā śubhā nirvṛtiḥ parā //MU_5,56.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25964: avāsanaṃ sthiraṃ proktaṃ mano dhyānaṃ tad eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25965: sa eva kevalībhāvaś śāntaṃ tatraiva tat sadā //MU_5,56.17//
GSP27moksop_u:25971: svastho bhavati yenātmā sa samādhir iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,56.20//
GSP27moksop_u:25973: yathā tiṣṭhasi tiṣṭha tvaṃ tathā śaile gṛhe 'tha vā //MU_5,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25977: mahatām iha bhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ mahatām iva //MU_5,56.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25982: vyutthitaṃ cittam abhyeti bhrame śānte suṣuptatām /
GSP27moksop_u:25983: nirvāṇam eti nirvāṇaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,56.26//
GSP27moksop_u:25985: yaḥ paśyati sadātmānaṃ sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.27//
GSP27moksop_u:25986: sahātmanā sadaivedaṃ jagat paśyati no manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25987: yathā svapne tathaivāsmiñ jāgraty api janeśvara //MU_5,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25990: antarmukhamanā nityaṃ supto buddho vrajan paṭhan /
GSP27moksop_u:25991: puraṃ janapadaṃ grāmam araṇyam iva paśyati //MU_5,56.30//
GSP27moksop_u:25995: vijvarāṇām iva nṛṇāṃ bhavaty ā jīvitasthiteḥ //MU_5,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25997: bhavaty akhilajantūnāṃ yad antas tad bahis sthitam //MU_5,56.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25998: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26000: vaṭadhānāvaṭa iva antar asya yad ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26002: na bahiṣṭvaṃ na cāntastvaṃ kvacit kiñcana vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26003: yad yathā kacitaṃ cittvāt tat tathā tathyam utthitam //MU_5,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26005: karpūram iva gandhena saṅkoci pravikāsi ca //MU_5,56.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26007: bāhyatvenāntaratvena sa ca nāsan na sadvibhuḥ //MU_5,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26011: ahantādau sthite dehe bhūribhaṅgaṃ bhayaṃ tu sat //MU_5,56.40//
GSP27moksop_u:26012: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26014: yas tv ātmaratir evāntaḥ kurvan karmendriyaiḥ kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26015: na vaśo harṣaśokābhyāṃ sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26017: na śocati dhyāyati vā sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.43//
GSP27moksop_u:26019: dṛṣṭiṣv etāsu hasati sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.44//
GSP27moksop_u:26020: same pare 'sti nāhantā na jagajjanmanī mayi /
GSP27moksop_u:26022: yasyāntar asti nāhantvaṃ na vibhāgādi no mama /
GSP27moksop_u:26024: vyomasvaccho bhavan svehāṃ samyag ācaratīha yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26027: svabhāvād eva na bhayād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_5,56.48//
GSP27moksop_u:26031: tiṣṭhatūdetu vā yātu mṛtim etu nihantu vā //MU_5,56.50//
GSP27moksop_u:26038: pāpaṃ karotu sumahad bahalaṃ puṇyam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26040: nāsau kiñcin na tat kiñcit kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:26041: nāsau kalaṅkam āpnoti hema paṅkagataṃ yathā //MU_5,56.55//
GSP27moksop_u:26048: rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte gehino nirvṛtir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26050: yat karoti yad aśnāti yad dadāti juhoti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26051: na taj jñasya na tatra jño mā karotu karotu vā //MU_5,56.60//
GSP27moksop_u:26052: karmaṇāsti na tasyārtho nārthas tasyāsty akarmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:26053: yathāsvabhāvaṃ bhagavān sa ātmany eva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,56.61//
GSP27moksop_u:26054: icchās tatas samudyanti na mañjarya ivopalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:26055: yāś codyanti ca tās sarvās sa evāmbv iva vīcayaḥ //MU_5,56.62//
GSP27moksop_u:26056: sakalam idam asāv asau ca sarvaṃ jagad akhilaṃ na vibhāgitātra kācit /
GSP27moksop_u:26057: paramapuruṣapāvanaikarūpī sa sad iti tat sad akiñcid eva vāsau //MU_5,56.63//
GSP27moksop_u:26062: tad ahantvādi bhedādi deśakālādi vetty adaḥ //MU_5,57.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26065: svato yad antar ātmekṣoś cittvān mādhuryavedanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26072: tad āvartādy ahantādi bhedādy ākāritādi ca //MU_5,57.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26073: svato ya ātmavṛkṣasya śākhādis tasya vedanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26080: tad ahantādibhedena cittvād bahir iva sthitam //MU_5,57.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26082: tad ahantvādi bhedādi cetanādīti vā sthitam //MU_5,57.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26084: tad ahantvādi vittvādi jīva ity eva vetty asau //MU_5,57.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26085: antar asti yad ātmendoś cidrūpaṃ cidrasāyanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26089: paramātmamaṇeś cittvād yad antaḥ kacanaṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:26090: cetanātma tad evāntar aham ityādi vetty asau //MU_5,57.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26091: na ca kiñcana vetty antar vedyasyāsambhavād iha /
GSP27moksop_u:26093: na ca kiñcic cinoty antaś cetyasyāsambhave sati /
GSP27moksop_u:26094: vedyate na ca vā kiñcid vedyasyāsambhavād asau //MU_5,57.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26097: anayā tu vacobhaṅgyā mayā vo raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:26099: na cittam asti no cettā na jagattādivibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26102: tathāhantāditām eti jñatvāj jñaptau jña ātmani //MU_5,57.21//
GSP27moksop_u:26103: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spandas sadāgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:26105: jño jñatāyāṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ jānāti jñānabṛṃhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:26106: jñāyate tad ahantādi jīvādy apy abhijīvanaiḥ //MU_5,57.23//
GSP27moksop_u:26107: yathodeti yadā jñasya jñaptir jñānena yādṛśī /
GSP27moksop_u:26108: ananyaivānyatāṃ buddhvā sā tadā jṛmbhate tathā //MU_5,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:26110: aṇur apy asti no bhedo virūpatve jñajīvayoḥ //MU_5,57.25//
GSP27moksop_u:26111: yathā jñajīvayor nāsti bhedo rāma tathaitayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26112: bhedo 'sti na jñajagator viddhi śāntam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26113: sarvaṃ praśāntam ajam ekam anādimadhyam ābhāsanaṃ svadanamātram acetyacihnam /
GSP27moksop_u:26114: sarvaṃ praśāntam ati śabdamayī tu dṛṣṭir bodhārtham eva hi mudhaiva tad om itīdam //MU_5,57.27//
GSP27moksop_u:26121: sambhṛtaṃ hasanaṃ śārvaṃ śuklo vā cāndra ātapaḥ //MU_5,58.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26122: himādreś śṛṅgam astīha kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26124: viṣṇoḥ kṣīrodaka iva svargas surapater iva /
GSP27moksop_u:26134: tasya hemajaṭā nāma kirātās saṃsthitās tale /
GSP27moksop_u:26139: jayalakṣmyā bhuja iva yaḥ prajāyāś ca dakṣiṇaḥ //MU_5,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26141: mūrtaḥ parākrama iva mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,58.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26148: kim ārtaṃ pīḍayāmy enaṃ tilayantram ivaujasā /
GSP27moksop_u:26151: bhavaty aham ivāśeṣas tad alaṃ me vinigrahaiḥ //MU_5,58.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26152: atha vā nigrahaṃ prāptaṃ karomy etena vai vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:26153: vartate na prajaiveyaṃ vinā vāri sarid yathā //MU_5,58.18//
GSP27moksop_u:26154: hā kaṣṭam eṣa nigrāhyo diṣṭyānugrāhya eṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:26155: diṣṭyādya sukhavān asmi kaṣṭam adyāsmi duḥkhavān //MU_5,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:26156: iti dolāyitaṃ ceto na viśaśrāma bhūpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26158: athaikadā gṛhaṃ tasya māṇḍavyo munir āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:26160: tam asau pūjayām āsa papraccha ca mahāmunim /
GSP27moksop_u:26165: adya tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ nātha dhanyānāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26168: tad imaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi mamārkas timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,58.25//
GSP27moksop_u:26169: mahatāṃ saṅgamenārtiḥ kasya nāma na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:26170: sandehaṃ tu parām ārtim āhur ārtivido janāḥ //MU_5,58.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26172: kaṣanti mām alaṃ cintā gajaṃ harinakhā iva //MU_5,58.27//
GSP27moksop_u:26173: tad yathā samatodeti sūryāṃśur iva sarvagā /
GSP27moksop_u:26174: matau mama mune mānya tathā karuṇayā kuru //MU_5,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26181: vicārayendriyāṇy antaḥ kīdṛśāny atha kāni vā //MU_5,58.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26182: ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ kiṃ vā kathaṃ maraṇajanmanī /
GSP27moksop_u:26183: vicārayāntar etat tvaṃ mahattām alam eṣyasi //MU_5,58.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26186: manas svaṃ rūpam utsṛjya śamam eṣyati vijvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:26188: tiṣṭhad eva mano rūpaṃ parityakṣyati te 'nagha /
GSP27moksop_u:26190: anukampyā bhaviṣyanti śrīmantas sarva eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:26195: na nimaṅkṣyati he sādho goṣpadeṣv iva vāraṇaḥ //MU_5,58.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26196: kṛpaṇaṃ tu mano rājan pelave 'pi nimajjati /
GSP27moksop_u:26202: tāvat prakṣālyate dhātur yāvad dhemaiva śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26203: tāvad ālokyate sarvaṃ yāvad ātmaiva lakṣyate //MU_5,58.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26204: sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā svayaṃ sarvatra sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:26206: yāvat sarvaṃ na santyaktaṃ tāvad ātmā na labhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26208: yāvad anyan na santyaktaṃ tāvat sāmānyam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:26209: vastu nāsādyate sādho svātmalābhe tu kā kathā //MU_5,58.45//
GSP27moksop_u:26211: tyaktānyakāryaḥ prāpnoti tan nāma nṛpa netarat //MU_5,58.46//
GSP27moksop_u:26213: sarvaṃ kiñcit parityajya yac chiṣṭaṃ tat paraṃ padam //MU_5,58.47//
GSP27moksop_u:26215: alam apāsya manas svavapus tataḥ parivilūya ca yac chubham asti tat //MU_5,58.48//
GSP27moksop_u:26219: ity uktvā bhagavān enaṃ suraghuṃ raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:26220: yayau svām eva kakubhaṃ māṇḍavyo maunamaṇḍanaḥ //MU_5,59.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26222: dhiyā sañcintayām āsa ko nāmāham iti svayam //MU_5,59.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26223: nāhaṃ merur na me merur jagan nāhaṃ na me jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:26224: nāhaṃ śailā na me śailā na dharāhaṃ na me dharā //MU_5,59.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26225: kirātamaṇḍalaṃ nedaṃ mama nāhaṃ ca maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:26227: tyakto mayaiṣa saṅketo nāhaṃ deśo na caiṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:26228: idānīṃ nagaraṃ śiṣṭam eṣa evātra niścayaḥ //MU_5,59.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26230: gajāśvasāmantayutā purī nāhaṃ na me purī //MU_5,59.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26232: bhogavṛndaṃ kalatraṃ ca nāhaṃ naitan mamākhilam //MU_5,59.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26234: nāhaṃ rājyaṃ na me rājyaṃ saṅketo hy ayam ākulaḥ //MU_5,59.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26236: tad etat tāvad āśv antar aham ālokayāmy alam //MU_5,59.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26237: tad atra tāvan māṃsāsthi nāham etad acetanaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:26238: na caitan mama saṃśleṣam ety abjasya yathā jalam //MU_5,59.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26239: māṃsaṃ jaḍaṃ na tad ahaṃ naivāhaṃ raktam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:26240: jaḍāny asthīni naivāhaṃ na caitāni mama kvacit //MU_5,59.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26241: karmendriyāṇi naivāhaṃ na ca karmendriyāṇi me /
GSP27moksop_u:26242: jaḍaṃ yat kila dehe 'smiṃs tad ahaṃ naiva cetanaḥ //MU_5,59.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26243: nāhaṃ bhogā na me bhogā na me buddhīndriyāṇi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26244: jaḍāny asatsvarūpāṇi na ca buddhīndriyāṇy aham //MU_5,59.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26245: mūlaṃ saṃsṛtidoṣasya mano nāhaṃ jaḍaṃ hi tat /
GSP27moksop_u:26246: atha buddhir ahaṅkāra iti dṛṣṭir manomayī //MU_5,59.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26248: nāham evaṃ śarīrādi śiṣṭam ālokayāmy aham //MU_5,59.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26249: śeṣas tu cetanājīvas sa ca cetyena cetati /
GSP27moksop_u:26251: evaṃ tyajāmi saṃvedyaṃ cetyaṃ nāhaṃ hi tat kila /
GSP27moksop_u:26252: śeṣo vikalparahito viśuddhā cid ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26253: citram eṣo 'smi labdhātmā jātaḥ kālena kāryavit /
GSP27moksop_u:26256: sa eṣa bhagavān ātmā tantur muktāsv iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:26269: seyam ātmā mama vyāpī seyaṃ madavabodhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26273: idaṃ manaś śarīrādi na kiñcit api vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26274: naṣṭe na kiñcit apy asmin parinaśyati pelave //MU_5,59.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26278: babhūva dehaniṣṭhaiva na kiñcid api dehakaḥ //MU_5,59.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26279: nanv aho samprabuddho 'smi gataṃ durdarśanaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:26280: dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ akhilaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyam idaṃ mayā //MU_5,59.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26281: sarvaṃ kiñcit idaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛśyate yaj jagadgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26283: kva tau kīdṛgvidhau vāpi kiṃniṣṭhau vā kimātmakau /
GSP27moksop_u:26285: kiṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ ca vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ brahmedam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26286: aham āsaṃ mudhā mūḍho diṣṭyāmūḍho 'smy ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.34//
GSP27moksop_u:26287: kim asminn evam āloke śocyate kiṃ vimuhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26288: kiṃ prekṣyate kim kriyate sthīyate kva kva gamyate //MU_5,59.35//
GSP27moksop_u:26289: kiñcit ittham idaṃ nāma cidābhāsaṃ virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:26290: namo namas te nistattva dṛṣṭadṛśyo 'si sundara //MU_5,59.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26291: aho nu samprabuddho 'smi samyag jñātam alaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:26294: sthirasuṣuptakalātigatas tatas samasamaṃ nivasāmy aham ātmani //MU_5,59.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26308: na nirghṛṇo dayāvān no na dvandvī nāpy amatsaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26309: na sukhī nāsukhī nārthī nānarthī sa babhūva ha //MU_5,60.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26312: sarvaṃ cittattvakacanaṃ jagad ity avalokya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:26314: ullasan vilasan ghūrṇaṃs tiṣṭhan gacchañ śvasan svapan /
GSP27moksop_u:26315: abhūt sa svasamādhisthaḥ prabuddhaś cillayaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,60.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26319: sa jahau tejasākrānto rūpaṃ himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,60.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26320: viveśa param ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ kāraṇeśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:26323: alam abhavad asau paraṃ svarūpaṃ ghaṭakham ivāmbarasaṃyutaṃ mahātmā //MU_5,60.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26327: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya na manaḥ paritapyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26328: ghore tamasi nirmagnaṃ labdhadīpaś śiśur yathā //MU_5,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26337: śṛṇu tasyaiva suraghoḥ prabuddhasya satas tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:26338: parṇādasya ca rājarṣes saṃvādam imam adbhutam //MU_5,61.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26342: parigho nāma vikhyātaḥ parighas syandane yathā //MU_5,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26343: sa babhūva paraṃ mitraṃ suragho raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:26349: tadduḥkhaṃ parigho dṛṣṭvā viṣādam atulaṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:26350: tatyāja cākhilaṃ rājyaṃ dagdhaṃ grāmam ivādhvagaḥ //MU_5,61.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26356: svayaṃ śīrṇāni śuṣkāṇi tatra parṇāny abhakṣayat //MU_5,61.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26358: parṇāda iti nāmāsau prāpa madhye tapasvinām //MU_5,61.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26369: te tatra prāktane mitre pūjām akurutāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26371: aho nu mama kalyāṇaiḥ phalitaṃ bata pāvanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26372: samprāptavān ahaṃ yat tvām ity anyo'nyam athocatuḥ //MU_5,61.22//
GSP27moksop_u:26380: visrabdhāṃs tān kathālāpāṃs tā līlās tac ca ceṣṭitam /
GSP27moksop_u:26381: saṃsmṛtya prāktanaṃ sādho hṛṣyāmy eva punaḥ punaḥ //MU_5,61.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26382: jñānam etan mayā prāptaṃ tvayā jñānaṃ yathānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:26384: adya kaccid aduḥkhas tvaṃ kaccid viśrāntavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:26389: dṛṣṭyā subhaga kāryāṇi kāryāṇy eva narādhipa //MU_5,61.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26393: dharā tava phalāpūrair bhṛśaṃ dhārayati prajāḥ //MU_5,61.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26397: tvayā saro'mbhasā bandho bisānām iva bhittayaḥ //MU_5,61.34//
GSP27moksop_u:26399: pratigrāmaṃ kumāryas te gāyanty ānandadaṃ yaśaḥ //MU_5,61.35//
GSP27moksop_u:26400: kuśalaṃ tava dhānyeṣu dhaneṣu vibhaveṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26401: bhṛtyeṣv atha kalatreṣu putreṣu nagareṣu ca //MU_5,61.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26403: phalaṃ phalati puṇyākhyaṃ yad ihāmutra coditam //MU_5,61.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26406: aho bata ciraṃ kālam āvāṃ viśleṣam āgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:26408: na tā jagati vidyante sukhaduḥkhadaśās sakhe /
GSP27moksop_u:26411: bhūyo vayam api śliṣṭāś citrā hi niyatir vidheḥ //MU_5,61.41//
GSP27moksop_u:26413: bhagavan niyater asyā gatiṃ dīpagater iva /
GSP27moksop_u:26414: daivikyāḥ ko hi jānāti gambhīrāṃ vismayapradām //MU_5,61.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26415: tvam ahaṃ ca viyojyātidūre dūradaśāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26416: adya saṅghaṭitau bhūyaḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ //MU_5,61.43//
GSP27moksop_u:26417: vayaṃ tv adya mahāsattva bhṛśaṃ kuśalinas sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26420: tathā phalitam asmākaṃ na yathā vayam ākulāḥ //MU_5,61.45//
GSP27moksop_u:26423: vikirati parito rasāyanānām iva nikaraṃ madhuraṃ mahānubhāva /
GSP27moksop_u:26424: tava vacanam avekṣaṇaṃ ca puṇyaṃ paramapadapratimo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ //MU_5,61.47//
GSP27moksop_u:26431: yad yat saṃsārajāle 'smin kriyate karma bhūmipa /
GSP27moksop_u:26439: yo jño mahātman satataṃ tūṣṇīṃ vyavaharaṃś ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26444: aviśrāntasvabhāvasya kas samādhiḥ kathaṃ ca vā //MU_5,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26447: proktas samādhibhedena na tu tūṣṇīm avasthitiḥ //MU_5,62.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26454: yataḥ prabhṛti bodhena yuktam ātyantikaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26456: na hi prabuddhamanaso bhūtvā vicchidyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26457: samādhir dūram ākṛṣṭo bisatantuś śiśor iva //MU_5,62.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26458: samagraṃ dinam ālokād viramaty akṣi no yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26460: ajasram ambu vahanād yathā nadyā na rudhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26461: tathā vijñānadṛg bodhāt kṣaṇamātraṃ na rudhyate //MU_5,62.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26462: na vismaraty avirataṃ yathā kālakalā gatim /
GSP27moksop_u:26463: na vismaraty avirataṃ svātmānaṃ prājñadhīs tathā //MU_5,62.16//
GSP27moksop_u:26464: na vismarati sarvatra yathā satatago gatim /
GSP27moksop_u:26465: na vismarati niścetyaṃ cinmātraṃ prājñadhīs tathā //MU_5,62.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26467: cic ciraṃ cetyarahitaṃ cinvānāṅgaṃ tathā sthitā //MU_5,62.18//
GSP27moksop_u:26470: na sambhavati saṃsāre guṇahīno guṇī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26471: na sambhavaty ātmasaṃvidvarjito hy ātmavāṃs tathā //MU_5,62.20//
GSP27moksop_u:26474: bhedaḥ kena samādher me janyate katham eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26476: tasmāt kadācid api me na samādhimayaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26478: sarvagas sarvadaivātmā sarvam eva ca sarvathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26479: asamādhir hi ko 'sau syāt samādhir api kas smṛtaḥ //MU_5,62.24//
GSP27moksop_u:26480: nityaṃ samāhitadhiyas suśamā mahāntas tiṣṭhanti kāryapariṇāmavibhāgamuktāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26485: rājan nūnaṃ prabuddho 'si prāptavān asi tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:26502: na tad asti mune vastu yatropādeyatāsti naḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26503: yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ tāvad eva na kiñcana //MU_5,63.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26504: upādeyasya cābhāvād dheyam apy asti kiṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:26509: atucchasya tu tucchatvaṃ varjye nindāstutī budhaiḥ //MU_5,63.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26510: rāgān nindāstutī loke rāgaś ca parivāñchanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:26512: trilokyāṃ ca striyaś śailās samudrā vanarājayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26513: bhūtāni ca suśūnyāni sāro nāsty uttamas tataḥ //MU_5,63.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26518: alam ativitatair vacaḥprapañcair iyam uciteha sukhāya dṛṣṭir ekā /
GSP27moksop_u:26519: samupaśamitavāsanaṃ mano 'ntar yadi muditaṃ hi tad uttamā pratiṣṭhā //MU_5,63.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26525: tad eva rāghava śrutvā paramaṃ bodhakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:26533: yo nityam adhyātmamayo nityam antarmukhas sukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:26534: nityaṃ cidanusandhānas sa na śokena bādhyate //MU_5,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26536: nāntaḥ kalaṅkam ādatte padmo jalalavaṃ yathā //MU_5,64.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26538: na bādhyate sa manasā kariṇeva mṛgādhipaḥ //MU_5,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26539: bhogaikaśaraṇaṃ dīnaṃ na cittaṃ jñasya vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26547: avidyā samparijñātā yadaiva hi tadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:26548: sā parikṣīyate bhūyas svadate ca na bhogabhūḥ //MU_5,64.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26554: taṃ prabodham avāpnoti punar yena na muhyati //MU_5,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:26555: dināni jīvyate tāni sānandās te kriyākramāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26559: tāni mitrāṇi śāstrāṇi tāni tāni dināni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26580: paramaṃ yatnam āsthāya ciram uttārayed balāt //MU_5,64.29//
GSP27moksop_u:26581: tattvāvalokanāt kṣīṇe citte no jāyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26584: yuktis samprāpyate rāma dṛḍhā naur iva nāvikāt //MU_5,64.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26586: saphalaś śītalacchāyo na tatra nivased budhaḥ //MU_5,64.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26591: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmanātmānam uddharet /
GSP27moksop_u:26593: kim idaṃ katham āyātaṃ kimmūlaṃ kimapakṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:26595: na dhanāni na mitrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26598: saha kiñcit parāmṛśya bhavaty ātmā samuddhṛtaḥ //MU_5,64.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26616: sā parā bharitākārā sā sarvavyāpinī citiḥ //MU_5,64.47//
GSP27moksop_u:26620: turyā cet prāpyate dṛṣṭis tat tayā sopamīyate //MU_5,64.49//
GSP27moksop_u:26626: na gamyā vacasāṃ rāma hṛdy evehānubhūyate //MU_5,64.52//
GSP27moksop_u:26627: akhilam idam anantam ātmatattvaṃ dṛḍhapariṇāmini cetasi sthite 'ntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26628: bahir upaśamite carācarātmā svayam anubhūyata eva devadevaḥ //MU_5,64.53//
GSP27moksop_u:26629: tadanu viṣayavāsanāvināśas tadanu śubhaḥ paramasphuṭaḥ prakāśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26630: tadanu ca samatāvaśāt svarūpe pariṇamanaṃ mahatām acintyarūpe //MU_5,64.54//
GSP27moksop_u:26634: manasaiva manaś chittvā yady ātmā nāvalokyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26635: mamety aham iti tyaktvā tat tāmarasalocana //MU_5,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26636: nāstam eti jagadduḥkhaṃ yathā citragato raviḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26656: skandheṣu devair valitaḥ pādeṣu valito naraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26658: kandareṣu śritas siddhair nidhānair antar āśritaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26659: candaneṣu śrito nāgais siṃhaiś śṛṅgaśikhāsu ca //MU_5,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26663: sa dārujair iva surastrīgaṇair alam āśritaḥ //MU_5,65.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26673: atrer asty āśramaś śrīmān siddhaśramaharo mahān //MU_5,65.20//
GSP27moksop_u:26674: mahaty atryāśrame tasmiṃs tāpasau dvau babhūvatuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26679: tau pitroḥ pallavau śīghraṃ latāpādapayor iva //MU_5,65.23//
GSP27moksop_u:26682: nābhūtāṃ viprayuktau tau suraktāv iva dampatī /
GSP27moksop_u:26683: ekaṃ dvitvam ivāpannaṃ samam āsīt tayor manaḥ //MU_5,65.25//
GSP27moksop_u:26685: tasthatus svāśrame maune saroja iva ṣaṭpadau //MU_5,65.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26688: jagmatur deham utsṛjya tatas tau pitarau tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26689: svargaṃ jarārtāv uḍḍīya nīḍād iva vihaṅgamau //MU_5,65.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26693: lokasthitir alaṅghyā hi mahatām api mānada //MU_5,65.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26694: kṛtvaurdhvadaihikam atho vyathayābhibhūtau śokotthayā karuṇam ārtagirā vilapya /
GSP27moksop_u:26695: citrārpitāv iva nirastasamastaceṣṭau tau saṃsthitau susamaśūnyahṛdādināntam //MU_5,65.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26701: viraktau vipine kālaṃ kṣapayām āsatur dvijau /
GSP27moksop_u:26702: viyūthāv iva sāraṅgāv anāsthām āgatau parām //MU_5,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26703: jagmur dināni māsāś ca varṣāṇy atha tayos tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:26704: kramāt tāv api saṃyātau jarāṃ śvabhradrumāv iva //MU_5,66.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26706: tāv ekadā saṅghaṭitāv idam anyo'nyam ūcatuḥ //MU_5,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:26709: jagaty asmin mahābandho bhāsa svāgatam astu te //MU_5,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26711: vada kva kṣapitās sādho kaccit te vimalaṃ tapaḥ //MU_5,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26712: kaccit te vijvarā buddhiḥ kaccij jātas tvam ātmavān /
GSP27moksop_u:26713: kaccit phalitavidyas tvaṃ kaccit kuśalavān asi //MU_5,66.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26718: sādho svāgatam adyāṅga diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si mānada /
GSP27moksop_u:26719: kuśalaṃ tu kuto 'smākaṃ saṃsāre tiṣṭhatām iha //MU_5,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26720: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñeyaṃ yāvat kṣīṇā na cittabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26721: yāvat tīrṇaṃ na saṃsārāt tāvan me kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26722: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñānaṃ yāvan na samatoditā /
GSP27moksop_u:26723: yāvan nābhyudito bodhas tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26724: āśā yāvad aśeṣeṇa na lūnāś cittasambhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26725: vīrudho dātrakeṇeva tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26747: mukhaṃ dhūsaratām eti himaiḥ padmam ivāhatam //MU_5,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:26765: na jñāyate kva magneti tāta janmani janmani //MU_5,66.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26767: ceto bhramati sāmudre gartāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_5,66.33//
GSP27moksop_u:26770: idaṃ kṛtaṃ karomīdaṃ kariṣyāmīdam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:26772: ayaṃ suhṛd ayaṃ śatrur iti dvandvamahāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26775: kṣaṇād ucchūnatām eti mānamīnaḥ kṣaṇāt kṣatim //MU_5,66.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26779: jagadudaragirau luṭhañ jano 'yaṃ gatarasaparṇavad eti jarjaratvam //MU_5,66.39//
GSP27moksop_u:26784: kālenāsādya vimalaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣaṃ tato gatau //MU_5,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26785: ato vacmi mahābāho yathā jñānetarā gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26787: idaṃ bhavyamater duḥkham anantam api pelavam /
GSP27moksop_u:26790: dūrad dehaṃ hasanti svaṃ prekṣyārko janatām iva //MU_5,67.4//
GSP27moksop_u:26791: dehe duḥkhini saṅkṣubdhe kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:26792: rathe vidhurite bhagne sāratheḥ keva khaṇḍanā //MU_5,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26793: manasi kṣubdhatāṃ yāte cittvasyāṅga kim āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26794: taraṅge rajasā mlāne vaiparītyaṃ kim ambudheḥ //MU_5,67.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26795: ke bhavanty ayasāṃ haṃsāḥ payasām upalāś ca ke /
GSP27moksop_u:26796: kāś śilāḥ kila dārūṇāṃ ke bhogāḥ paramātmanaḥ //MU_5,67.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26808: saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu na tathā pañcasu kṣatiḥ //MU_5,67.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26812: etā hy ajñānamātrasya tasmin naṣṭe tad eva tāḥ //MU_5,67.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26815: ajñasyāyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭas saṃsāras satyatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26824: dvitvopalāñchitā tv anyā dussaṃvittir na vidyate //MU_5,67.21//
GSP27moksop_u:26834: tattyāgena tato mukto bhavatīti vidur budhāḥ //MU_5,67.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26839: antassaṅgo hi saṃsāre sarveṣāṃ nāma dehinām /
GSP27moksop_u:26847: asaktaṃ nirmalaṃ cittaṃ muktaṃ saṃsāry api sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:26848: saktaṃ tu dīrghatapasā yuktam apy atibandhavat //MU_5,67.33//
GSP27moksop_u:26855: akartari manasy antar akartṛtvaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:26856: śūnyacitto hi puruṣaḥ kurvann api na cetati //MU_5,67.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26857: cetasā kṛtam āpnoṣi cetasā na kṛtaṃ na tu /
GSP27moksop_u:26858: na kvacit kāraṇaṃ deho na cittam api kartṛ vai //MU_5,67.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26859: asaṃsaktam akartr eva kurvad eva mano viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26864: bahiḥ kurvann akurvan vā kartā bhoktā na hi kvacit //MU_5,67.41//
GSP27moksop_u:26865: antassaṃsaktimuktaṃ yan manas syāt tad akartṛkam /
GSP27moksop_u:26866: tad viyuktaṃ praśāntaṃ tat tad yuktaṃ tad alepakam //MU_5,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26867: tat syāt sarvapadārthānāṃ śliṣṭānāṃ niścitaṃ bahiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26869: virahitam alam antassaṅgadoṣeṇa cetaś śamam upagatam ādyaṃ vyomavan nirmalābham /
GSP27moksop_u:26870: sakalakalanamuktenātmanaikatvam eti sthiram alinibham ambho vāriṇīvālinīle //MU_5,67.44//
GSP27moksop_u:26874: kīdṛśo bhagavan saṅgaḥ kaś ca bandhāya vai nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:26875: kaś ca mokṣāya kathitaḥ kathaṃ caiṣa cikitsyate //MU_5,68.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26878: dehamātre tu viśvāsas saṅgo bandhārha ucyate //MU_5,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26880: yat sukhārthitvam antas sa saṅgo bandhārha ucyate //MU_5,68.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26881: sarvam ātmedam akhilaṃ kiṃ vāñchāmi tyajāmi kim /
GSP27moksop_u:26883: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti mā bhavantu bhavantu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26884: sukhāny asakta ity antaḥ kathyate muktibhāṅ naraḥ //MU_5,68.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26886: susamo yaḥ phalatyāgī so 'saṃsakta iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,68.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26888: yasya nāyāty asakto 'sau jīvanmuktaś ca kathyate //MU_5,68.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26890: nipuṇaṃ yaḥ parityāgas so 'saṃsaṅga iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,68.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26892: cikitsitā bhavanty aṅga śreyas sampādayanti ca //MU_5,68.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26898: tarur vahati yat tanvā tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26902: jahāti yan mṛgo dehaṃ tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26903: vīruttṛṇadaśāṃ yātā lūyante yat punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26911: saktir hi dvividhā proktā vandhyā vandyā ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:26912: vandhyā sarvatra mūḍhānāṃ vandyā tattvavidāṃ nijā //MU_5,68.19//
GSP27moksop_u:26929: manaḥ patati bhogeṣu gṛdhro māṃsalaveṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:26933: divi devā bhuvi narāḥ pātāle bhogino 'surāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26935: jāyante ca mriyante ca nipatanty utpatanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26938: sambhrāntā prabhramaty aṅga śīrṇaṃ parṇam ivāmbare //MU_5,68.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26942: adyāpi na jahātīndur jaḍimnā malinaṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,68.34//
GSP27moksop_u:26946: idam āracitaṃ citraṃ vicitraṃ paśya rāghava //MU_5,68.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26948: yad idaṃ racitaṃ citraṃ na tat satyaṃ kadācana //MU_5,68.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26950: atti tṛṣṇā śarīrāṇi tṛṇāny agniśikhā yathā //MU_5,68.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26960: jvalatāṃ narakāgnīnāṃ viddhi tena jvalanti te //MU_5,68.43//
GSP27moksop_u:26961: duḥkhajālam idaṃ rāma yat kiñcij jagatīgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26973: vidyādṛśi prodayam āgatena kṣayaṃ tv avidyāviṣayaṃ gatena /
GSP27moksop_u:26974: sarvatra saṃsaktivivarjitena svacetasā tiṣṭhati yas sa muktaḥ //MU_5,68.50//
GSP27moksop_u:26980: na saktam iha cintāsu na ceṣṭāsu na vastuṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:26981: nākāśe nāpy adhobhāge na dikṣu na latāsu ca //MU_5,69.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26983: nābhyantare na ca prāṇe na mūrdhani na tāluni //MU_5,69.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26984: na bhrūmadhye na nāsānte na mukhe na khatārake /
GSP27moksop_u:26985: nāndhakāre na cābhāse na cāsmin hṛdayāmbare //MU_5,69.4//
GSP27moksop_u:26986: na jāgrati na ca svapne na suṣupte na nirmale /
GSP27moksop_u:26987: nāsite na ca vā pīte raktādau śabale 'pi ca //MU_5,69.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26988: na sthire na cale nādau na madhye netaratra ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26989: na dūre nāntike nāṅge na padārthe na cātmani //MU_5,69.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26993: sarvatra nīrasam iva tiṣṭhatv ātmarasaṃ manaḥ //MU_5,69.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26995: vyavahāram imaṃ sarvaṃ mā karotu karotu vā //MU_5,69.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26996: akurvan vāpi kurvan vā jīvas svātmaratikriyām /
GSP27moksop_u:26997: kriyāphalair na sambandham āyāti kham ivāmbudaiḥ //MU_5,69.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26998: atha vā tam api tyaktvā cetyāṃśaṃ śāntacidghanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26999: jīvas tiṣṭhatu saṃśāntaṃ jvalan maṇir ivātmani //MU_5,69.11//
GSP27moksop_u:27000: nirvāṇam ātmani gatas satatoditātmā jīvo bhuvi vyavaharann api rāmabhadra /
GSP27moksop_u:27001: nāsaṅgam eti gatasaṅgatayā phalena karmodbhavena hasatīva ca deham ārāt //MU_5,69.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27008: antaḥpūrṇasya vadane śrīr indor iva lakṣyate //MU_5,70.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27011: nityam ātmadṛgālīno jñas svasthaś cañcalo 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:27023: jāgraty eva suṣuptastho jīvo bhavati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:27025: atra prauḍhim upāyātas turyatām eti pāvanīm /
GSP27moksop_u:27029: tāṃ ca suptadaśām etya jīvan vyavaharan naraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27031: jāgraty eva suṣuptastho yaḥ karoti jagatkriyām /
GSP27moksop_u:27034: ātmatām āgate citte kasya kiṃ bādhate katham //MU_5,70.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27036: kurvan na badhyate jīvo jīvanmuktatayā sthitaḥ //MU_5,70.16//
GSP27moksop_u:27037: sauṣuptīṃ vṛttim āśritya kuru mā kuru vānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:27039: nādānaṃ na parityāgaḥ karmaṇo jñāya rocate /
GSP27moksop_u:27041: kurvann api na kartāsi suṣuptaikasthayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:27042: akartāpi ca kartāsi yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:27043: yathā na kiñcit kalayan mañcake spandate śiśuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27044: tathā phalādy akalayan kuru karmāṇi rāghava //MU_5,70.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27046: yad yat karoti labdhātmā tasmiṃs tasya na kartṛtā //MU_5,70.21//
GSP27moksop_u:27048: antaśśītalatām eti jño rasena yathā śaśī //MU_5,70.22//
GSP27moksop_u:27050: samas sarvāsv avasthāsu bhavaty adrir yathartuṣu //MU_5,70.23//
GSP27moksop_u:27054: ghātayāśv atha vā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dhāraya śailavat //MU_5,70.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27056: prauḍhā satī turyam iti kathitā tattvakovidaiḥ //MU_5,70.26//
GSP27moksop_u:27063: prāptuṃ svāṃ padavīṃ puṇyāṃ yatnavantam imaṃ janam /
GSP27moksop_u:27068: mukta ity ucyate yogī turyātītapadaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,70.32//
GSP27moksop_u:27076: ata ūrdhvaṃ sadehānāṃ muktānāṃ vacasāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27082: turyātītāṃ daśāṃ tajjñā yathā yānty ātmakovidāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27085: citrendor iva te na staḥ kṣayodvegāv arindama //MU_5,71.6//
GSP27moksop_u:27087: mā gṛhāṇa bhramo hy eṣa śarīram iti jṛmbhate //MU_5,71.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27088: dehanāśena ko 'rthas te ko 'rthas te dehasaṃsthayā /
GSP27moksop_u:27089: bhava tvaṃ prakṛtārambhas tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsthitam //MU_5,71.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27090: jñātavān asi tat satyaṃ buddhavān asi tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:27091: prāptavān asi rūpaṃ svaṃ viśoko bhava bhūtaye //MU_5,71.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27097: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti te māstu vibhramaḥ //MU_5,71.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27099: nāmarūpādibhedās tu dūram asmād alaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,71.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27100: jalam eva yathāmbhodhir na taraṅgādikaṃ pṛthak /
GSP27moksop_u:27101: ātmaivedaṃ tathā sarvaṃ na bhūtaughādikaṃ pṛthak //MU_5,71.14//
GSP27moksop_u:27102: yathā samastāj jaladher jalād anyan na labhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27103: tathaiva jagatas sphārād ātmano 'nyan na labhyate //MU_5,71.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27104: ayaṃ so 'ham iti prājña kva karoṣi vyavasthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:27105: kiṃ tat tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā te syāt kiṃ na tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā na te //MU_5,71.16//
GSP27moksop_u:27106: na dvitvam asti no dehas sambandho na ca taiś citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27109: dehādibhis sadbhir api na sambandho vibhor bhavet //MU_5,71.18//
GSP27moksop_u:27111: na sambhavati sambandhas tathā vai dehadehinoḥ //MU_5,71.19//
GSP27moksop_u:27113: na sambhavati sambandho rāma dehātmanos tathā //MU_5,71.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27116: cinmātreṇātmanā dehas sambaddha iti yā kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27121: dehas tv anityo malavāṃs tena sambadhyate katham //MU_5,71.24//
GSP27moksop_u:27123: dehas tena na sambandho manāg eva mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,71.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27124: siddhe dvitve 'pi dehasya na sambandhasya sambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27126: ity etad eva tat satyam atraivāṅga sthitiṃ kuru /
GSP27moksop_u:27127: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti kadācit kasyacit kvacit //MU_5,71.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27128: sarvam ātmamayaṃ śāntam ity eva pratyayaṃ sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:27130: sukhī duḥkhī ca mūḍho 'smīty etā durdṛṣṭayas smṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27131: āsu ced vastubuddhis te tac ciraṃ duḥkham eṣyasi //MU_5,71.29//
GSP27moksop_u:27134: yathā śītoṣṇayor aikyaṃ kathāsv api na dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27136: yathā tejastimirayor na sambandho na tulyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:27141: yathā prajāyate vaṃśād deharandhrāt tathaiva hi //MU_5,71.34//
GSP27moksop_u:27145: pratibimbam ivādarśe citta eva ca dṛśyate //MU_5,71.36//
GSP27moksop_u:27148: yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandhasaṃvidas saṃsthitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27149: yatra cittaṃ hi tatrātmasaṃvidas saṃsthitās tathā //MU_5,71.38//
GSP27moksop_u:27151: yathā tathātmā sarvatra sthitaś cetasi dṛśyate //MU_5,71.39//
GSP27moksop_u:27152: apām avanataṃ sthānam āspadaṃ bhūtale yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27157: ātmā sarvātigatvāt tu kāraṇaṃ sad akāraṇam //MU_5,71.42//
GSP27moksop_u:27163: asattām ety alaṃ ceto dīpeneva tamaḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_5,71.45//
GSP27moksop_u:27167: etās sañjñāḥ prabho bahvyaś cetaso rūḍhim āgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27168: katham ity eva kathaya mayi mānada siddhaye //MU_5,71.47//
GSP27moksop_u:27172: ātmā spandaikarūpātmā sthitas teṣu kvacit kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:27182: jīvanāj jīva ity ukto 'hambhāvaś cāpy ahantayā /
GSP27moksop_u:27187: tad etad eva nānātvaṃ nānāsañjñābhir āgatam //MU_5,71.56//
GSP27moksop_u:27191: mohāya kevalaṃ mūḍhair vyartham arthāḥ prakalpitāḥ //MU_5,71.58//
GSP27moksop_u:27196: ekaparṇarase kṣīṇe raso naiti yathā kṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:27198: śarīrasaṅkṣaye dehī na kṣayaṃ yāti kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:27199: nirvāsanaś cet tad vyomni tiṣṭhaty ātmapade tathā //MU_5,71.62//
GSP27moksop_u:27201: mātus stanataṭāt tasya manye vetāla utthitaḥ //MU_5,71.63//
GSP27moksop_u:27202: yasya hy ātyantiko nāśas syād asāv uditas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27203: cittanāśo hi nāśas syāt sa mokṣa iti kathyate //MU_5,71.64//
GSP27moksop_u:27204: mṛto naṣṭa iti proktam anyais tac ca mṛṣā na sat /
GSP27moksop_u:27210: punas tad api santyajya prayāty anyad api kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:27211: anyasmin vitate deśe kāle 'nyasmiṃś ca rāghava //MU_5,71.68//
GSP27moksop_u:27212: itaś cetaś ca nīyante jīvā vāsanayā svayā /
GSP27moksop_u:27219: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:27220: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,71.72//
GSP27moksop_u:27224: dehe jāte na jāto 'si dehe naṣṭe na naśyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:27225: tvam ātmā niṣkalaṅkātmā dehas tava na kaścana //MU_5,72.1//
GSP27moksop_u:27227: tatraikasmin kṣate kṣīṇe dve iti vyarthakalpanā //MU_5,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27228: vināśini vinaṣṭe 'smin dehe svāṃ sthitim āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:27229: vinaśyāmīti yaḥ khedī taṃ dhig astv andhacetanam //MU_5,72.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27239: ekasmād eva viṭapād vicitrā iva putrikāḥ //MU_5,72.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27240: kāṣṭhetarat kāṣṭhanare kiñcid anyan na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27241: bhūtapiṇḍetarad dehe kiñcid anyan na vidyate //MU_5,72.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27244: ko nāmātiśayaḥ puṃsāṃ strīnāmny aparanāmni vā /
GSP27moksop_u:27249: śliṣṭayor api no rāgas tathā cittaśarīrayoḥ //MU_5,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27254: itaś cetaś ca yātāni yathā saṃśleṣayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:27260: prabodhāc cittatāṃ tyaktvā vrajaty ātmātmatāṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:27274: na kūlakāṣair jaladhir na rajobhir nabhastalam /
GSP27moksop_u:27276: gatair abhyāgatais svacchair malinaiś capalair jaḍaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27277: na rāgo nāmbudher dveṣo bhogaiś cādhigatātmanaḥ //MU_5,72.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27278: yan manomananaṃ kiñcit samagre jagati sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:27280: yad ahaṃ yac ca bhūtādi kālatritayabhāvi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:27282: yad dṛśyaṃ tad asat sad vā dṛṣṭim ekām upāśritam /
GSP27moksop_u:27283: anyat tv alepakaṃ tasmād dharṣaśokadaśe kutaḥ //MU_5,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:27284: asatyam evāsatyaṃ hi satyaṃ satyaṃ sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:27285: satyāsatyam asad viddhi tadarthaṃ kiṃ vimuhyasi //MU_5,72.31//
GSP27moksop_u:27287: na kvacin muhyati prauḍhas samyagdarśanavān iha //MU_5,72.32//
GSP27moksop_u:27291: dadāty ajñāya saṃsāraṃ jñāya mokṣaṃ sukhodayā //MU_5,72.34//
GSP27moksop_u:27293: tad dṛśyāvalitaṃ baddhaṃ tanmuktaṃ muktam ucyate //MU_5,72.35//
GSP27moksop_u:27295: kṣayātiśayamuktā cet tan muktis socyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,72.36//
GSP27moksop_u:27298: sauṣuptī dṛṣṭir eṣā hi yāty evaṃ samprakāśatām /
GSP27moksop_u:27299: evaṃ ca yāti turyatvam evaṃ muktir iti smṛtā //MU_5,72.38//
GSP27moksop_u:27302: nātmā sthūlo na caivāṇur na pratyakṣo na cetanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27303: nācetano na ca jaḍo na caivāsan na sanmayaḥ //MU_5,72.40//
GSP27moksop_u:27304: nāhaṃ nānyo na caivaiko nāneko nāpy anekavān /
GSP27moksop_u:27305: nābhyāśastho na dūrastho naivāsti na ca nāsti ca //MU_5,72.41//
GSP27moksop_u:27306: nāprāpyo nāpi ca prāpyo na cāsarvo na sarvagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27307: na padārtho nāpadārtho nāpañcātmā na pañca ca //MU_5,72.42//
GSP27moksop_u:27309: tadatītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tan na kiñcid ivehitam //MU_5,72.43//
GSP27moksop_u:27310: yathābhūtam idaṃ samyag jñasya sampaśyato jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:27311: sarvam ātmamayaṃ vidvan nāsty anātmamayaṃ kvacit //MU_5,72.44//
GSP27moksop_u:27314: sattaivāsti na vastūnāṃ yayā nāma vinā citā /
GSP27moksop_u:27317: ātmaiva netarakalākalanāsti kācid itthammatir bhava bhavātigato mahātman //MU_5,72.47//
GSP27moksop_u:27322: svo bhāvaḥ prāpyate tajjñais tajjñaiś cintāmaṇir yathā //MU_5,73.1//
GSP27moksop_u:27323: athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇu rāmānayā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27324: drakṣyasy ātmānam acalaṃ bhaviṣyasi ca divyadṛk //MU_5,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27325: ahaṃ kham aham ādityo diśo 'ham aham apy adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27326: ahaṃ daityā ahaṃ devāś śailāś cāham ahaṃ mahaḥ //MU_5,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27327: tamo 'ham aham abhrāṇi bhūsamudrādikaṃ tv aham /
GSP27moksop_u:27328: rajo vāyur athāgniś ca jagat sarvam idaṃ tv aham //MU_5,73.4//
GSP27moksop_u:27329: jagattraye 'haṃ sarvatra sa ātmaiva kila sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27330: ko 'haṃ kim anyad iha hi dvitvam ekasya kīdṛśam //MU_5,73.5//
GSP27moksop_u:27331: iti niścayavān antar nūnam ātmatayā jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:27334: kim ātmīyaṃ paraṃ kiṃ syāt kamalekṣaṇa kathyatām //MU_5,73.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27336: harṣam etu viṣādaṃ vā vināśe jño jaganmayaḥ //MU_5,73.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27340: prathamā sarvam evāham ity anyoktā raghūdvaha //MU_5,73.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27342: deho 'ham iti tāṃ viddhi duḥkhāyaiva na śāntaye //MU_5,73.11//
GSP27moksop_u:27343: atha vaitat trayam api tyaktvā sakalasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:27351: yad idaṃ darśanaṃ spandaḥ kiñcid yat saṃvidādy api /
GSP27moksop_u:27353: na san nāsad asau devo nāṇur nāpi mahān asau /
GSP27moksop_u:27354: nāpy etayor dṛśor madhyaṃ sa evedaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //MU_5,73.17//
GSP27moksop_u:27355: sa evedaṃ ca vadati sa ca vaktuṃ na yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27356: na tadanyad idaṃ naitat paśya māyām anāmayām //MU_5,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:27357: nātmāyam ayam apy ātmā sañjñābheda iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:27359: saṃsthitas sa hi sarvatra triṣu kāleṣu bhāsuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27360: sūkṣmatvāt sumahattvāc ca kevalaṃ na vibhāvyate //MU_5,73.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27365: cidātmā sarvago vyāpī na kvacin nāma na sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27367: sati puryaṣṭake tasmiñ jīvas sphurati nopalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27368: sati vāyāv iva rajas sati dīpa ivekṣaṇam //MU_5,73.24//
GSP27moksop_u:27370: sati sphuraty abhyudite bhānāv iva janaiṣaṇā //MU_5,73.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27374: deho nāśam upāyāti tat kim unnaṣṭam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,73.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27375: na jāyate na mriyate nābhivāñchati nojjhati /
GSP27moksop_u:27376: na mukto na ca baddho 'yam ātmā sarvasya sarvadā //MU_5,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:27379: anāditvān na jāto 'yam ajātatvān na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:27382: bandhābhāve 'py amuktis syād amokṣas tena sa smṛtaḥ //MU_5,73.31//
GSP27moksop_u:27387: dve eva kalane tyaktvā mokṣabandhātmike sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:27389: na mokṣo nabhasaḥ pṛṣṭhe na pātāle na bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:27391: sakalāśāsv asaṃsaktyā yas svayaṃ cetasaḥ kṣayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27393: yāvat prabodho vimalo noditas tāvad eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27396: daśa mokṣā na vāñchyante kim utaiko hi mokṣakaḥ //MU_5,73.38//
GSP27moksop_u:27397: ayaṃ mokṣas tv ayaṃ bandhaḥ pelavāṃ kalanām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:27398: parityajya mahātyāgī tvaṃ tvam eva bhavābhavaḥ //MU_5,73.39//
GSP27moksop_u:27409: idaṃ sampannam akhilaṃ tāpād iva marau payaḥ //MU_5,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27410: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro vāsanāś cendriyāṇy api /
GSP27moksop_u:27412: cittāhaṅkārayor dvitvaṃ vacasy asti na vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27413: yac cittaṃ sa hy ahaṅkāro yo 'haṅkāro mano hi tat //MU_5,74.5//
GSP27moksop_u:27414: vyatiriktaṃ himāc chauklyam iti saṅkalpyate yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27417: kṣīṇe dve eva hi yathā paṭaśauklye paṭakṣaye //MU_5,74.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27420: mokṣo me 'stv iti cintā cej jātā tad vyutthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27421: mananotke manasy uccair vapur doṣāya kevalam //MU_5,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27422: ātmany atīte sarvasmāt sarvarūpe 'tha vā tate /
GSP27moksop_u:27423: ko bandhaḥ kaś ca vā mokṣo nirmūlaṃ mananaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27428: cit sarvavyāpinī sūkṣmā na calā na ca cālyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27429: na svatas spandam āyāti devācala ivānilaiḥ //MU_5,74.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27432: tatra ko 'yaṃ mudhā moho bhavatām atiduḥkhadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27433: ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāṅgāni mamedaṃ ceti durdhiyām //MU_5,74.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27436: tatrāyam ātmā sammantā bhoktā karteti jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27448: dehasyāsya jaḍasyārthe kiṃ bhogair iti niścayī /
GSP27moksop_u:27449: bhinatty āśāmayaṃ jñānī pañjaraṃ kesarī yathā //MU_5,74.23//
GSP27moksop_u:27455: ātmany eva na māty uccaiḥ kalpasyānta ivārṇavaḥ //MU_5,74.26//
GSP27moksop_u:27457: tiṣṭhaty ātmani saṃvettā praśānta iva vāridhiḥ //MU_5,74.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27458: paraṃ dhairyam upādatte sthairyaṃ merur ivācalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27460: bhavaty ātmani nirvāṇaḥ praśānta iva dīpakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27461: dṛṣṭim āyāti paramāṃ naraḥ pītāmṛto yathā //MU_5,74.29//
GSP27moksop_u:27463: sphuraddīptir maṇir iva prayāty antaḥ prakāśatām //MU_5,74.30//
GSP27moksop_u:27466: hasaty alam atītās tāḥ pelavā divasāvalīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27476: na dadāti na cādatte na stauti na ca nindati /
GSP27moksop_u:27477: nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na śocati //MU_5,74.37//
GSP27moksop_u:27488: na himādrer na muktābhyo na rambhābhyo na candanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:27489: na tac candramasaś śaityaṃ nairāśyād yad avāpyate //MU_5,74.43//
GSP27moksop_u:27490: api rājyād api svargād apīndor api mādhavāt /
GSP27moksop_u:27493: sā parā nirvṛtis sādho nairāśyād upalabhyate //MU_5,74.45//
GSP27moksop_u:27496: goṣpadaṃ pṛthivī merus sthāṇur āśās samudgikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27500: padaṃ yasya na badhnāti kadācit kalanā hṛdi /
GSP27moksop_u:27502: idam evāstv idaṃ māstu mameti hṛdi rañjanā /
GSP27moksop_u:27503: na yasyāsti tam ātmeśaṃ tolayanti kathaṃ janāḥ //MU_5,74.50//
GSP27moksop_u:27506: na śāsteha tvam āśānāṃ viddhi mithyābhramaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:27508: kiṃ muhyasi mahābāho mūrkhavat paṇḍito 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:27509: mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so 'ham ity udbhrāntena cetasā //MU_5,74.53//
GSP27moksop_u:27510: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ nānāteha na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27511: ekarūpaṃ jagaj jñātvā dhīrai rāma na khidyate //MU_5,74.54//
GSP27moksop_u:27515: yad rūpaṃ tat samālambya padārthānāṃ sthitiṃ kuru //MU_5,74.56//
GSP27moksop_u:27517: palāyya yāti saṃsārī mṛgī kesariṇo yathā //MU_5,74.57//
GSP27moksop_u:27520: bhogā nānandayanty antaḥ khedayanti na cāpadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27521: dṛśyaśriyo haranty aṅga na jñam adrim ivānilāḥ //MU_5,74.59//
GSP27moksop_u:27525: sparśa evāsya naitābhyāṃ kim utākramaṇaṃ bhavet //MU_5,74.61//
GSP27moksop_u:27527: ramate naiṣa bhogeṣu pāntho marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,74.62//
GSP27moksop_u:27529: bhuṅkte bhogabharaṃ prājñas tv ālokam iva locanam //MU_5,74.63//
GSP27moksop_u:27531: sevitāpy aṅga dhīrasya na duḥkhāya na tuṣṭaye //MU_5,74.64//
GSP27moksop_u:27533: dve vīcyāv iva śailendraṃ kṣobhaṃ netuṃ na śaknutaḥ //MU_5,74.65//
GSP27moksop_u:27539: sukhaduḥkheṣu na kṣobham eti bhūbhṛd ṛtuṣv iva //MU_5,74.68//
GSP27moksop_u:27541: asaktamanaso nityaṃ na kiñcid api majjati //MU_5,74.69//
GSP27moksop_u:27543: bhāvāsaktyā samāsakta ukto jantur hi nānyathā //MU_5,74.70//
GSP27moksop_u:27546: sakṛtprabhātaṃ vimalaṃ yaj jñātaṃ jñātam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:27547: na hi bandhuḥ parijñātaḥ punar ajñātatāṃ vrajet //MU_5,74.72//
GSP27moksop_u:27550: na hema tāpaśuddhāṅgaṃ svābhāsam alam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:27551: kardame magnam api sat samādatte malaṃ punaḥ //MU_5,74.74//
GSP27moksop_u:27552: kṣīṇe svahṛdayagranthau na bandho 'sti punar guṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27553: yatnenāpi punar baddhaṃ kena vṛnte cyutaṃ phalam //MU_5,74.75//
GSP27moksop_u:27555: pāṣāṇaṃ ca manaś caiva sandhātuṃ kasya śaktatā //MU_5,74.76//
GSP27moksop_u:27557: parijñāya śvapākānāṃ yātrāṃ kaḥ prekṣate dvijaḥ //MU_5,74.77//
