GSP27moksop_u:30516: brahma kālatrayaṃ tac ca brahmaṇy eva vyavasthitam //MU_6,11.22//
GSP27moksop_u:30519: gṛhyate brahmaṇā brahma bhujyate brahma brahmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:30521: brahma macchatrurūpaṃ ced brahma me priyakṛd yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:30522: tad brahma brahmaṇi śliṣṭaṃ kim anyat kasya kiṃ kṛtaṃ //MU_6,11.25//
GSP27moksop_u:30527: brahma brahmaṇi saṃvettṛ brahma brahmaṇi saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30529: ghaṭo brahma paṭo brahma brahmāham idam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30534: sampannam etan ma iti mudhā syāt kalanā kutaḥ //MU_6,11.31//
GSP27moksop_u:30535: vīcyambhasos spandavator na stas tvanmanmatī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30536: tvattāmatte tathā na sto brahmaṇi spandarūpiṇi //MU_6,11.32//
GSP27moksop_u:30537: yathāvarte mṛte toye na kiñcin mriyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:30538: mṛte brahmatvam āyāte dehabrahmaṇi vai tathā //MU_6,11.33//
GSP27moksop_u:30539: yathā calācale toye tvattāmatte na tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30540: tathā jaḍājaḍe rūpe na sthite paramātmani //MU_6,11.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30541: kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemno yathāvarto jalasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30543: idaṃ hi bhūtaṃ jīvātma jaḍarūpam idaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:30544: ity ajñātātmano moho na tu jñātātmanaḥ kvacit //MU_6,11.36//
GSP27moksop_u:30546: andhaṃ bhuvanam andhasya prakāśaṃ tu sacakṣuṣaḥ //MU_6,11.37//
GSP27moksop_u:30548: śiśor eva sphuradyakṣā niśā puṃsas tu kevalā //MU_6,11.38//
GSP27moksop_u:30549: asmin brahmaghane nityam ekasmin sarvatas sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:30550: na kiñcin mriyate rāma na ca kiñcana jīvati //MU_6,11.39//
GSP27moksop_u:30558: brahmaṇo vyatiriktaṃ hi na śarīrādi vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30560: yaḥ kaṇo yā ca kaṇikā yā vīcī yas taraṅgakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30561: yaḥ pheno yā ca laharī tad yathā vāri vāriṇi //MU_6,11.44//
GSP27moksop_u:30562: yo deho yā ca kalanā yad dṛśyaṃ yau kṣayāvyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:30563: yehā yā racanā yo 'rthas tat tathā brahma brahmaṇi //MU_6,11.45//
GSP27moksop_u:30568: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ ca tvam ityādyarthotthayā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:30573: abhāvitaṃ hematayā yathā hemaiva mṛd bhavet //MU_6,11.50//
GSP27moksop_u:30574: jñātaṃ brahmatayā brahma brahmaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:30575: jñātaṃ hematayā hema hemaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_6,11.51//
GSP27moksop_u:30576: brahmātmā sarvaśaktir hi yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:30577: nirhetukaṃ svayaṃ śaktyā tat tathāśu prapaśyati //MU_6,11.52//
GSP27moksop_u:30582: bandhur evāparijñāto hy abandhur iti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30584: idaṃ tv ayuktam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30585: tasmād ayuktād vairasyād yayā kila virajyate //MU_6,11.56//
GSP27moksop_u:30586: dvaitaṃ tv asatyam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30587: tasmād dvaitāt suvairasyād yayā kila virajyate //MU_6,11.57//
GSP27moksop_u:30588: ayaṃ nāham iti jñāte sphuṭaṃ sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30590: brahmaivāham iti jñāte satyaṃ sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30591: tasmin satye nije rūpe yayāntaḥ parilīyate //MU_6,11.59//
GSP27moksop_u:30592: sarvam eveha brahmeti jñāte brahmaiva śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30593: pīte 'mṛte 'mṛtamayaḥ ko nāma na bhavet kila //MU_6,11.60//
GSP27moksop_u:30594: ceto yad evāharati tad evāśu bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:30596: yan mithyā tan mudhaiveti jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30598: sarvaṃ sad eveti tate jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30599: tasmin satye tate sphāre yayāntaḥ prāpyate sthitiḥ //MU_6,11.63//
GSP27moksop_u:30603: abandhuvat sthite 'py antas snihyaty eva balān manaḥ //MU_6,11.65//
GSP27moksop_u:30605: ātmātmany eva vimale nirvṛtiṃ vindate parāṃ //MU_6,11.66//
GSP27moksop_u:30607: bandhubhāvaṃ gate 'py antar mano yāti na nirvṛtim //MU_6,11.67//
GSP27moksop_u:30614: nitye satye tathābhūta ātmātmany eva hṛṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:30616: tāvad ātmātmanā yatnāt prakṣālyedaṃ malaṃ malaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30617: durbhāvanamalaś śāstraiś śodhyo yāvad bhavet sitaḥ //MU_6,11.72//
GSP27moksop_u:30620: sarvaṃ sakalanirmāṇaṃ kāleṣu triṣv api sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30621: nityam ekaṃ samaṃ śuddhaṃ brahmaiveti suniścayaḥ //MU_6,11.74//
GSP27moksop_u:30624: na me duḥkhaṃ na karmāṇi na mamehā na vāñchitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30625: samas svastho viśoko 'smi brahmāham iti satyatā //MU_6,11.76//
GSP27moksop_u:30626: ahaṃ raktam ahaṃ māṃsam aham asthīny ahaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30627: cid ahaṃ cetanaṃ cāhaṃ brahmāham iti satyatā //MU_6,11.77//
GSP27moksop_u:30628: ahaṃ tṛṇam ahaṃ vallī gulmo 'haṃ kānanāny aham /
GSP27moksop_u:30634: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30635: so 'yaṃ cid aham ekātmā paraṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ //MU_6,11.81//
GSP27moksop_u:30636: cid ātmā brahma sat satyam ṛtaṃ jña iti nāmabhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30641: bhedaṃ tyaktvā svam ābhāsaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayam //MU_6,11.84//
GSP27moksop_u:30643: tattvāvabhāsakaṃ svacchaṃ cidbrahmāsmi na me kṣayaḥ //MU_6,11.85//
GSP27moksop_u:30651: cittādiṣv apy abuddheṣu tac cidbrahmāham acyutaḥ //MU_6,11.89//
GSP27moksop_u:30655: yā khasthā tantuvac chaktis tac cidbrahmāsmi nirmalam //MU_6,11.91//
GSP27moksop_u:30659: yā pratītir anāgaskā tac cidbrahmāsmi sarvagaḥ //MU_6,11.93//
GSP27moksop_u:30661: śaktir udgamanī yāntas tac cidbrahmāham ātatam //MU_6,11.94//
GSP27moksop_u:30663: yāsvādasattā līnāntas tad brahma cid ahaṃ samam //MU_6,11.95//
GSP27moksop_u:30666: yāvad bhūmer dhruvas tāvad dṛṣṭisūtraṃ yad ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30667: tanmadhyasadṛśaṃ śāntaṃ nirmalaṃ cid ahaṃ tatam //MU_6,11.97//
GSP27moksop_u:30672: sarvagā prakṛtau sūkṣmarūpā bhānor iva prabhā /
GSP27moksop_u:30676: protāṅgam api guptasthaṃ dehe tantur bise yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30683: hemnīva saṃsthitā dehe cid brahmātmāsmi sarvagam //MU_6,11.105//
GSP27moksop_u:30684: padārthaughasya śailāder bahir antaś ca saṃsthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:30686: sarvāsām anubhūtīnām ādarśo yo hy akṛtrimaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30687: agamyo malalekhānāṃ tac cittattvam ahaṃ mahat //MU_6,11.107//
GSP27moksop_u:30692: ghaṭe paṭe taṭe kuḍye svadamānaṃ sadā tanau /
GSP27moksop_u:30694: uṣṇam agnau hime śītaṃ mṛṣṭam anne śitaṃ kṣure /
GSP27moksop_u:30695: kṛṣṇaṃ dhvānte sitaṃ candre cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,11.111//
GSP27moksop_u:30702: niṣkautukaṃ nirālambaṃ nirīhaṃ sarvam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30708: līnam antar bahiś cograṃ kroḍīkṛtya jagatkhagam /
GSP27moksop_u:30710: sarvaṃ yatredam asty eva nāsty eva ca manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:30725: yuktaṃ muktaṃ ca ciddīpaṃ bahir antar upāsmahe //MU_6,11.126//
GSP27moksop_u:30734: akhilam idam ahaṃ mamaiva sarvaṃ tv aham api nāham athetarac ca nāham /
GSP27moksop_u:30735: iti viditavato jagat kṣataṃ me sthiram atha vāstu gatajvaro bhavāmi //MU_6,11.131//
GSP27moksop_u:30742: na nindanti na nandanti jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā //MU_6,12.2//
GSP27moksop_u:30763: manas teṣāṃ tu nīrāgam anupādhi gatabhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:30764: asaktam uttamaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ sattvapadaṃ gatam //MU_6,12.13//
GSP27moksop_u:30765: na mamajja kvacid api saṅkaṭeṣu mahatsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30766: muhur apy upayāteṣu kulaśailas sarassv iva //MU_6,12.14//
GSP27moksop_u:30770: jaharṣa ca na bhogaughair avaśyāyair ivauṣadhiḥ //MU_6,12.16//
GSP27moksop_u:30771: te hi kevalam avyagrāḥ kurvantaḥ kāryapañjaram /
GSP27moksop_u:30774: jahṛṣur na sukhaprāptau mamlur naiva ca saṅkaṭe //MU_6,12.18//
GSP27moksop_u:30775: mumuhur na vimoheṣu mamajjur na vipatkrame /
GSP27moksop_u:30776: śuśucur na śucā śoke rurudur na bhavān iva //MU_6,12.19//
GSP27moksop_u:30783: cinmātraṃ sarvam evedam ittham ābhāsatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30784: neha satyam asatyaṃ vā kvacid apy asti kiñcana //MU_6,12.23//
GSP27moksop_u:30788: bhramasy udbhrāntacittaṃ ca somyāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,12.25//
GSP27moksop_u:30790: aho nu bhagavan nūnaṃ samyagrūpaṃ vilakṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:30792: bhrāntir astaṅgatā nūnaṃ mihikā śaradīva me /
GSP27moksop_u:30794: vyapagatamadamoho mānamātsaryamuktaś cirataram uditātmā śāntaśokaś cireṇa /
GSP27moksop_u:30795: punar asukham agacchan svacchayaikāntabuddhyā vadasi yad asi sādho tat kariṣye viśaṅkam //MU_6,12.28//
GSP27moksop_u:30810: prakārau dvāv api proktau yogaśabdena yady api /
GSP27moksop_u:30811: tathāpi rūḍhim āyātaḥ prāṇayuktāv asau bhṛśam //MU_6,13.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30813: samāv upāyau dvāv eva proktāv ekaphalapradau //MU_6,13.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30815: mama tv abhimatas sādho susādho jñānajaḥ kramaḥ //MU_6,13.7//
GSP27moksop_u:30816: yaj jñātaṃ na tad ajñātaṃ svapneṣv api punar bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:30817: jñānaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nityam eva pravartate //MU_6,13.8//
GSP27moksop_u:30819: nāyāti yogo hy atha vā vikalpo naiṣa śobhanaḥ //MU_6,13.9//
GSP27moksop_u:30820: dvāv eva kila yatnotthau jñānayogau raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:30824: mukhānilasphuraṇanirodhasambhave sthitiṃ gate nṛpasuta cetasaḥ kṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:30825: samāhitasthitir iha yogayuktitaḥ pare pade vigalitabhīr nivatsyasi //MU_6,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:30829: asti tāvad anantasya khasya kvacid ayaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:30835: so 'haṃ kadācid āsthāne svarge tiṣṭhañ śatakratoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30838: śātātapo nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ //MU_6,14.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30840: asti kalpataruś śrīmāñ śṛṅge cūḍa iti śrutaḥ //MU_6,14.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30843: tasmin nivasati śrīmān bhusuṇḍo nāma vāyasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30845: sa yathā jagataḥ kośe jīvatīha surāś ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:30846: cirajīvī tathā svarge na bhūto na bhaviṣyati //MU_6,14.9//
GSP27moksop_u:30847: sa dīrghāyus sa nīrogas sa śrīmān sa mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30848: sa viśrāntamatiś śāntas sa kāntaḥ kālakovidaḥ //MU_6,14.10//
GSP27moksop_u:30849: sa yathā jīvati khagas tatheha yadi jīvyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30850: tad bhavej jīvitaṃ puṃsāṃ dīrghaṃ cādeyam eva ca //MU_6,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:30855: bhusuṇḍas saṃsthito yatra meroś śṛṅgaṃ tad unnatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30861: sarveṣām eva rāgāṇāṃ rāśim adrāv iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30866: līlayādātum induṃ khe nītaṃ hastaṃ śikhāṅgulim //MU_6,14.19//
GSP27moksop_u:30868: khaṃ gantum iva saspandaṃ śailastham iva vāḍavam //MU_6,14.20//
GSP27moksop_u:30884: vyomnaḥ pāram iva prāptaṃ piṅgalaṃ mairavaṃ śiraḥ //MU_6,14.28//
GSP27moksop_u:30891: kalpāgam aham adrākṣaṃ śikhācakram iva sthitam //MU_6,15.1//
GSP27moksop_u:30938: tatra paśyāmy ahaṃ yāvad ekatra skandhakoṭare /
GSP27moksop_u:30944: teṣāṃ madhye sthitaś śrīmān bhusuṇḍaḥ pronnatākṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30956: suhṛd dāntas tathā mitraṃ bhṛtyaḥ putro guruḥ prabhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30957: sarvadā sarvathā nityaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya saṃstave //MU_6,15.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30958: somyaḥ prasannamadhuro rasavān mahātmā hṛdyas sarovara ivāntar akhaṇḍaśaityaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30968: bhusuṇḍas tu vasiṣṭho 'yaṃ prāpta ity avabuddhavān //MU_6,16.3//
GSP27moksop_u:30970: he mune svāgatam iti provāca madhurākṣaram //MU_6,16.4//
GSP27moksop_u:30972: mahyam āśu dadau bālamegho haimam ivotkaram //MU_6,16.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30973: idam āsanam ity uktvā navaṃ kalpatarucchadam /
GSP27moksop_u:30979: atha pādyādi dattvā sa bhusuṇḍas tuṣṭamānasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30986: kaccid asmin mahāmohe ciraṃ viharatas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:30990: tvatpādadarśanād eva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ mayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:30993: tenemaṃ pādapaṃ pādais tvaṃ pavitritavān ayam //MU_6,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:30994: jñātatvadāgamo 'py evaṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmīha yan mune /
GSP27moksop_u:30996: ity uktavān asau pakṣī bhusuṇḍaś cirajīvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31000: draṣṭum abhyāgato 'smy adya tvām eva cirajīvitam //MU_6,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31003: tad etaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi bhagavan mama tattvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31004: kasmin kule bhavāñ jāto jñātajñeyaḥ kathaṃ bhavān //MU_6,16.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31005: kiyad āyuś ca te sādho vṛttaṃ smarasi kiṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31006: kena vāyaṃ nivāsas te nirdiṣṭo dīrghadarśinā //MU_6,16.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31008: yat pṛcchasi mune sarvaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31010: yuṣmadvidhās tribhuvanaprabhupūjyarūpā ākarṇayanti yad udāradhiyo mahāntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31011: tenāśubhaṃ prakathitena vināśam eti meghasya dehavibhavena yathārkatāpaḥ //MU_6,16.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31015: atha rāma bhusuṇḍo 'sau na prahṛṣṭo na jihmadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31026: svayam iva navam āsthitaś śarīraṃ sakalabhayāpaharaḥ paraḥ prakarṣaḥ //MU_6,17.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31027: idam amalagirāha hāsaśuddhaṃ mṛdupadam ujjhitasambhramaṃ krameṇa /
GSP27moksop_u:31028: kathayitum akhilaṃ nijaṃ svarūpaṃ madhura iva stanitena mugdhameghaḥ //MU_6,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31045: yasyāsthīny eva ratnāni dehe kāntimayāni ca //MU_6,18.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31059: svajanā yasya te śailās sarasā api nīrasāḥ //MU_6,18.14//
GSP27moksop_u:31063: yathā gaṇās tathaivānyaḥ parivāro hi mātaraḥ //MU_6,18.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31070: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā /
GSP27moksop_u:31072: siddhā śuṣkā ca raktā ca utpalā ceti devatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31073: sroto dakṣiṇam āśritya bhairavaṃ rudram āśritāḥ //MU_6,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31074: sarvāsām eva mātṝṇām aṣṭāv etās tu nāyikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31075: āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaś śatasahasraśaḥ //MU_6,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31076: raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī brāhmī vārāhī vāyavī tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31077: kaumārī vāsavī saurī cetyādyās tās sahasraśaḥ //MU_6,18.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31078: āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaḥ khecarya uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31080: tāsām anugatās tv anyā bhūcaryaḥ koṭiśas sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31089: tasyās tu vāhanaṃ kāko vaiṣṇavyā garuḍo yathā //MU_6,18.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31091: vyomni melāpakaṃ cakrur ekadā samam āgatāḥ //MU_6,18.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31095: asmān umāpatir devaḥ kiṃ paśyaty avahelayā //MU_6,18.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31096: prabhāvaṃ darśayāmo 'sya punar nāsmān asau yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31099: umām eva vaśīkṛtya prokṣayām āsur ādṛtāḥ //MU_6,18.34//
GSP27moksop_u:31101: tām ālolakacāṃ devyaś cakrur odanatāṃ gatām //MU_6,18.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31112: papur udagur athoccais terur ājagmur ūṣur jahasur apur ahauṣuḥ petur uccair vavalguḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31113: nanṛtur aniśam ādus svādumāṃsaṃ ca devyas tribhuvanam apavṛttaṃ cakrur unmattanṛttāḥ //MU_6,18.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31117: ity utsave vartamāne tāsāṃ vāhās ta uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31118: tathaiva mattā jahasur nanṛtuḥ papur apy asṛk //MU_6,19.1//
GSP27moksop_u:31123: sañjātaratayo mattās sarvā haṃsyaḥ krameṇa tāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31124: remire tena kākena caṇḍakākhyena vai tadā //MU_6,19.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31125: saptānāṃ bālahaṃsīnāṃ dayito vāyasas tv asau /
GSP27moksop_u:31128: devyaś ca kṛtanṛttās tāḥ praśāntamadatāṃ yayuḥ //MU_6,19.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31129: dadur odanatāṃ yātām īśvarāya priyām umām /
GSP27moksop_u:31131: priyā me bhojane dattety evaṃ ca śaśiśekharaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31132: buddhvā babhūva ruṣito yadā mātṛgaṇaṃ prati //MU_6,19.8//
GSP27moksop_u:31133: tadā tās tāṃ samutpādya svāṅgadānena vai punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31135: tato devyo haraś caiva parivāras tathaitayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31136: sarve santuṣṭamanasas svāṃ svām upayayur diśam //MU_6,19.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31137: antarvatnyo babhūvus tā brāhmyo haṃsyo munīśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:31138: vṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur brāhmyā devyā yathāsthitam //MU_6,19.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31139: he vatsās sāmprataṃ garbhavatyo me rathakarmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:31140: na samarthā bhavatyo 'pi svairaṃ carata sāmpratam //MU_6,19.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31141: iti garbhālasā haṃsīr muktvā devī dayāparā /
GSP27moksop_u:31146: suvate sma mṛdūny aṇḍāny atha vallya ivāṅkurān //MU_6,19.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31149: aṇḍebhyas tebhya evaṃ hi jātā vayam ime mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31151: te sma jātā gatā vṛddhiṃ tasmin kamalapallave /
GSP27moksop_u:31153: mātṛbhis saha haṃsībhir brāhmī bhagavatī tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31156: tathāṅgānugṛhītās smo yathā muktā vayaṃ sthitāḥ //MU_6,19.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31158: tiṣṭhāma iti niścitya pituḥ pārśvaṃ vayaṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,19.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31160: tayā dṛṣṭāḥ prasādena saṃsthitās tatra saṃyatāḥ //MU_6,19.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31164: no ced vayaṃ bhagavatīṃ tad imāṃ bhṛtyavatsalām /
GSP27moksop_u:31167: tāta jñātam alaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31168: kiṃ tv ekāntasthites sthānam abhivāñchāma uttamam //MU_6,19.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31170: śṛṇuta vigatadoṣaṃ pāvanaṃ sthānam agryaṃ sthirataram ayi putrā nīḍakāmāḥ pravakṣye /
GSP27moksop_u:31171: vyapagatabhayamohaṃ śāntasarvapracāraṃ nivasata ciratṛptā yatra niśśaṅkam uccaiḥ //MU_6,19.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31199: tatra nīḍaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kṛtam āsīt sphuranmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:31200: devyāṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇāyāṃ yasmin kila rame sutāḥ //MU_6,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31205: tad gacchata sutā nīḍaṃ durgaṃ nākasadām api /
GSP27moksop_u:31206: bhogaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tatrasthā nirvighnaṃ samavāpsyatha //MU_6,20.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31207: ity uktvāsmān pitā tatra cucumbābhyāliliṅga ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31208: dadau devyai yad ānītam asmabhyaṃ ca tad āmiṣam //MU_6,20.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31209: tad bhuktvā caraṇau devyāḥ pituś caivābhivandya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31210: vindhyakacchād vayaṃ tasmāt sthānād ālambusāt plutāḥ //MU_6,20.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31214: svargam ullaṅghya yātās smo brahmalokaṃ munīśvara //MU_6,20.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31216: mātre ca bhagavatyai ca brāhmyai cāśu nivedya ha //MU_6,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31221: imaṃ kalpataruṃ prāpya nijaṃ nīḍaṃ praviśya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31223: jātā yathā vayam ime sthitim āgatāś ca samprāptabodham upaśāntadhiyo yathā ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31224: etat tad uktam avikhaṇḍam alaṃ mayā te śeṣeṇa māṃ samanuśādhi mahānubhāva //MU_6,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31230: tad etad vṛttam abhyāsād vartamānena varṇitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31233: nirvighnam evaṃ paśyāmi yad bhavantaṃ mune tataḥ //MU_6,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31234: idaṃ nīḍam imāś śākhā ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ drumaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31235: adya pāvanatāṃ prāptāny etāni tava darśanāt //MU_6,21.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31236: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyaṃ gṛhītvā vibhavārpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31237: nūnaṃ pāvanatāṃ nītvā śeṣeṇādiśa māṃ mune //MU_6,21.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31239: ity uktvārghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca bhūyo dattavati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:31242: iha kasmān na dṛśyante tvam evaiko hi dṛśyase //MU_6,21.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31244: tiṣṭhatām iha naḥ kālo mahān atigato mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31246: etāvatā ca kālena sarva eva mamānujāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31247: tanūs tṛṇam iva tyaktvā śive pariṇatāḥ pare //MU_6,21.9//
GSP27moksop_u:31254: ciram atyantam āsannaiḥ kathaṃ tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31256: āsannataratāṃ yātaiḥ kaccit tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31260: kathaṃ na kṣobham āyāti kalpavṛkṣo 'yam unnataḥ //MU_6,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31264: yad īdṛśeṣu dūreṣu nirjaneṣu vaneṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31265: kalpitāsyās sthitir dhātrā śūnye vā vyomadhanvani //MU_6,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31266: katham asyāṃ prabho jātau jātasya kila jīvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31269: na kadācana nīrūpair muhyāmo jāgatair bhramaiḥ //MU_6,21.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31271: kṣipāmaḥ kevalaṃ kālam asmin brahman nijālaye //MU_6,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31272: na jīvitān na maraṇāt kurmo dehasya rodhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:31275: nūnaṃ santyaktam asmākaṃ manasā cañcalaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,21.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31283: nirastacāpalaṃ śāntaṃ jātam eva mune manaḥ //MU_6,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31285: udgālair iva bhūkāko na vaivaśyaṃ vrajāmy aham //MU_6,21.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31287: paśyanto jāgatīṃ māyāṃ dhiyā dhairyam upāgatāḥ //MU_6,21.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31291: bhūyo bhūyaḥ parāmṛṣṭā neha kiñcana sanmayam //MU_6,21.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31292: sarvāṇy eva prayānty eva samāyānti ca vā na vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31293: bhagavan bhūtajālāni bhayam asmākam atra kim //MU_6,21.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31296: nojjhāmo na ca gṛhṇīmas tiṣṭhāmo naiva ca sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31297: mṛdavo 'pi bhṛśaṃ krūrā vayam asmin drume sthitāḥ //MU_6,21.33//
GSP27moksop_u:31300: netaś cetaś ca paryastaṃ lulitaṃ na ca vṛttiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:31310: nātaḥ parataraṃ kiñcin manye kuśalam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31317: mama saphalam ihādya janma sādho sakalabhayāpaharo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ //MU_6,21.43//
GSP27moksop_u:31324: bhūtānāṃ tena tiṣṭhāmas sukham asmin vanaspatau //MU_6,22.2//
GSP27moksop_u:31326: yadā jahāra tarasā nākampata tadā drumaḥ //MU_6,22.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31334: āsīj jagad atikṣubdhaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31340: yadā vavuḥ patatsiddhās tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31342: yayau garutmān amṛtaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31344: śeṣaḥ phaṇābhis tatyāja tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31352: kṛtaghna iva sanmitraṃ tadā nīḍaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,22.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31356: vāruṇīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā tadā tiṣṭhāmi dhīradhīḥ //MU_6,22.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31358: pārvatīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khe tiṣṭhāmy acalas tadā //MU_6,22.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31360: vāyavīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khaṃ plave 'caladhīs tadā //MU_6,22.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31367: kalpānteṣu tathā kasmān nānye tiṣṭhanti yoginaḥ //MU_6,22.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31369: brahman niyatir eṣā hi durlaṅghyā pārameśvarī /
GSP27moksop_u:31370: mayedṛśena vai bhāvyaṃ bhāvyam anyais tu tādṛśaiḥ //MU_6,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31372: yad yathā tat tathaitad dhi svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_6,22.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31374: asminn eva gireś śṛṅge tarur itthaṃ bhavaty ayam //MU_6,22.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31379: kiṃ kiṃ smarasi kalyāṇiṃś citram asmiñ jagattraye //MU_6,22.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31397: evaṃ caturyugaṃ sāgraṃ nīrandhrair acalair yutām /
GSP27moksop_u:31407: etāṃś cānyāṃś ca vṛttāntān saṃsmarāmi bahūn api /
GSP27moksop_u:31408: kiṃ tena bahunoktena sāraṃ saṅkṣepataś śṛṇu //MU_6,22.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31409: asaṅkhyātān manūn brahman smarāmi śataśo gatān /
GSP27moksop_u:31414: bahunāthasatīkaṃ ca kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.44//
GSP27moksop_u:31428: kalpanaṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vedānayanam eva ca //MU_6,22.51//
GSP27moksop_u:31432: bālair api hi tās tāta smaryante tāsu kiṃ grahaḥ //MU_6,22.53//
GSP27moksop_u:31452: mune te brahmaputrasya janmāṣṭamam idaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:31453: saṃsmarāmy aṣṭame sarge tv asmiṃs tvaṃ mama saṅgataḥ //MU_6,23.8//
GSP27moksop_u:31454: kadācij jāyase vyomnaḥ kadācij jāyase jalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:31457: sargo 'yaṃ tādṛśān eva trīn sargān saṃsmarāmy aham //MU_6,23.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31461: mune pañcasu sargeṣu kūrmā iva payonidheḥ //MU_6,23.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31466: reṇukātmajatāṃ gatvā ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāram imaṃ hariḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31471: daśa śukravighātāṃś ca candramaules smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31474: yugaṃ prati dhiyāṃ puṃsām ūnādhikatayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31478: punas tān eva tān evam anyān api yuge yuge /
GSP27moksop_u:31483: iti yatra dhiyā jñānaṃ haste phalam ivārpitam //MU_6,23.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31484: kṛtaṃ vālmīkinā caitad adhunā ca kariṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:31485: adya tv aprakaṭaṃ loke sthitaṃ jñāsyati kālataḥ //MU_6,23.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31487: etat tad dvādaśaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam //MU_6,23.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31488: dvitīyam etasya samaṃ bhārataṃ nāma nāmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31491: etat tu saptamaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam //MU_6,23.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31494: punas tāny eva tāny eva tathānyāni yuge yuge /
GSP27moksop_u:31502: jagattrayībhrāntir iyaṃ na kadācin na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:31503: vidyate na kadācic ca jalabudbudavat sthitā //MU_6,23.33//
GSP27moksop_u:31505: jāyate līyate cāśu lolā vīcir ivāmbhasi //MU_6,23.34//
GSP27moksop_u:31512: mamānyāni ca mitrāṇi te 'nya eva ca bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31513: anya eva navā bhṛtyā anya eva samāśrayāḥ //MU_6,23.38//
GSP27moksop_u:31519: vanaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ca śākhāṃ ca prāpya nīḍaṃ karomy aham //MU_6,23.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31522: tāte jīvati yaivābhūc chobhāsya sutaros tayā /
GSP27moksop_u:31524: nehābhūd uttarā pūrvaṃ kakum nāyaṃ ca bhūdharaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31527: dhyānānte khastha evaitat sargam ālokya vedmy aham //MU_6,23.45//
GSP27moksop_u:31529: saṃsthānam anyathā tasmin sthite yānti diśo 'nyathā //MU_6,23.46//
GSP27moksop_u:31530: na san nāsaj jagan manye bhramo 'yaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31532: putraḥ pitṛtvam āyāto mitrāṇi tv aritāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31533: strītvaṃ ca śataśo yātān puṃsaś caiva smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.48//
GSP27moksop_u:31537: sargān nirargalācārān kvacit kāṃścit smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.50//
GSP27moksop_u:31539: caturyugasahasre dve jagac chūnyaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.51//
GSP27moksop_u:31548: kathaṃ vihagarājendra dehaṃ mṛtyur na bādhate //MU_6,24.2//
GSP27moksop_u:31550: jānann api hi sarvajña brahmañ jijñāsayaiva mām /
GSP27moksop_u:31551: pṛcchasi prabhavo nityaṃ bhṛtyaṃ vācālayanti hi //MU_6,24.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31552: tathāpi yat pṛcchasi māṃ tat te prakathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31555: hṛdi na grathitā yasya mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31557: ādhayo yaṃ na bhindanti mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31559: na cañcalaṃ mano yasya taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31561: āśā yaṃ na dahanty antas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.8//
GSP27moksop_u:31563: lobhavyālo na bhuṅkte yaṃ mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.9//
GSP27moksop_u:31565: na nirdahati yaṃ kopas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31566: yantraṃ tilānāṃ kaṭhinaṃ rāśim ugram ivākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:31567: yaṃ pīḍayati nānaṅgas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31569: saṃśritā dṛḍhaviśrāntis taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31571: manāg api na lumpanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31574: na dādati na cādatte na jahāti na yācate /
GSP27moksop_u:31575: kurvad eva ca kāryāṇi cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31576: nāstam eti na codeti nasaṃsmṛti navismṛti /
GSP27moksop_u:31577: na suptaṃ na ca jāgratsthaṃ cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31581: duṣkramās te na kṛntanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31588: ādau madhye tathānte ca cirāya pari coditam /
GSP27moksop_u:31589: yac cāru madhuraṃ pathyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31591: guṇānubandhi lokyaṃ ca tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31592: peśalaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyaṃ svādu śītam apakṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:31594: yad buddheḥ param ālokyam ādyaṃ yad amṛtaṃ param /
GSP27moksop_u:31597: sasurastrīgaṇe svarge na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31599: sāmbudhau bhūtale tāta na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31601: samasta eva pātāle na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31603: jagaty asmiṃs tu sarvasmin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31605: saraktamāṃse dehe 'smin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31607: kriyāsu nityatucchāsu na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31609: cintāsu jīvakārāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31613: citrācārāsu ceṣṭāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.34//
GSP27moksop_u:31614: na varam ekamahītalarājatā na ca varaṃ vividhāmararūpatā /
GSP27moksop_u:31615: na ca varaṃ dharaṇītalanāgatā sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31616: na varam ākulaśāstravicāraṇaṃ na ca varaṃ varakāvyavivecanam /
GSP27moksop_u:31617: na varam agryakathākramacarvaṇaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:31618: na varam ādhimayaṃ cirajīvitaṃ na ca varaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛḍhamūḍhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:31619: na ca varaṃ narako na ca viṣṭapaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:31620: iti vividhajagatkramās samastāś calamatimūḍhatayā narasya rūḍhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31621: calatarakalanāhite padārthe katham upayānti ciraṃ sthitiṃ mahāntaḥ //MU_6,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:31643: ity uktavantaṃ vihagaṃ bhusuṇḍaṃ punar apy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31644: jānann apīdam avyagraḥ pṛṣṭavān krīḍayā punaḥ //MU_6,25.9//
GSP27moksop_u:31646: yathārthaṃ brūhi me sādho prāṇacintā kim ucyate //MU_6,25.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31649: mām etat parihāsārthaṃ mune pṛcchasi vāyasam //MU_6,25.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31650: atha vā bhavatām eva bhavadbhyaḥ pariśikṣitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31651: punaḥ pratyuccarāmīdaṃ kā me kṣatir upasthitā //MU_6,25.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31671: tasya yantrasya pattrāṇi mṛdūny āttāni vāyunā //MU_6,25.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31672: lasatsu teṣu pattreṣu sa marut parivardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:31675: ūrdhvādho dikṣu cānyāsu dehe 'smin prasaraty atha //MU_6,25.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31680: yānty āyānti vivalganti haranti viharanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31681: utpatanti patanty āśu tā etāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ //MU_6,25.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31682: sa eṣa hṛtpadmagataḥ prāṇa ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31683: asya kācin mune śaktiḥ praspandayati locane //MU_6,25.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31684: kācit sparśam upādatte kācid vahati nāsayā /
GSP27moksop_u:31685: kācid annaṃ jarayati kācid vakti vacāṃsi ca //MU_6,25.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31686: bahunātra kim uktena sarvam eva śarīrake /
GSP27moksop_u:31687: karoti bhagavān vāyur yantrehām iva yāntrikaḥ //MU_6,25.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31689: prāṇāpānāv iti khyātau prakaṭau tau varānilau //MU_6,25.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31690: tayor anusaran nityaṃ mune gatim ahaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31701: durlakṣyā vidyamānā ca gatis sūkṣmatarā tayoḥ //MU_6,25.37//
GSP27moksop_u:31702: aviratagatayor gatiṃ viditvā hṛdi marutor anusṛtya coditāṃ tām /
GSP27moksop_u:31703: na punar iha hi jāyate mahātman muditamanāḥ puruṣaḥ praṇaṣṭapāśaḥ //MU_6,25.38//
GSP27moksop_u:31707: jānann api mune sarvaṃ kiṃ māṃ pṛcchasi līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:31708: yathāpṛṣṭam ahaṃ vacmi tatrāpi śṛṇu me vacaḥ //MU_6,26.1//
GSP27moksop_u:31712: sabāhyābhyantare dehe tv apāno 'yam avāk sthitaḥ //MU_6,26.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31714: pravartate yas tajjñasya taṃ tāvac chreyase śṛṇu //MU_6,26.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31716: svairam evāttayatnānāṃ taṃ dhīrā recakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31718: prāṇānām aṅgasaṃsparśo yas sa pūraka ucyate //MU_6,26.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31720: yo 'ṅgaprapūraṇe sparśo vidus tam api pūrakam //MU_6,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31723: pūrakaḥ kumbhakaś caiva recakaś ca dvidhā sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31726: ye proktās sphāramatibhis tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu mahāmate //MU_6,26.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31730: vyomni nityam apānasya taṃ viduḥ kumbhakaṃ budhāḥ //MU_6,26.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31732: taṃ bāhyapūrakaṃ tv ādyaṃ vidur yogavido janāḥ //MU_6,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31734: yā vāyos taṃ vidur dhīrā aparaṃ bāhyapūrakam //MU_6,26.14//
GSP27moksop_u:31736: tāvat pūrṇāṃ samāvasthāṃ bahissthaṃ kumbhakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31740: apānasya bahis tat tam aparaṃ recakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31742: prāṇāpānasvabhāvān svān buddhvā bhūyo na jāyate //MU_6,26.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31744: svabhāvād eva vāyūnāṃ kathitā muktidā mayā //MU_6,26.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31745: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31746: ete na rodham āyānti prakṛtyā hi calo 'nilaḥ //MU_6,26.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31747: yat karoti yad aśnāti buddhyaitān samanusmaran /
GSP27moksop_u:31748: kumbhakādīn naras so 'ntas tatra kartā na kiñcana //MU_6,26.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31749: suvyagram asmin vyāpāre bāhyaṃ parijahan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31750: dinaiḥ katipayair eva padam āpnoti kevalam //MU_6,26.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31752: na badhnāti ratiṃ cetaś śvadṛtau brāhmaṇo yathā //MU_6,26.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31753: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya ye sthitāḥ kṛtabuddhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31754: prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ tair akhinnās ta eva hi //MU_6,26.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31755: tiṣṭhatā gacchatā nityaṃ jāgratā svapatā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31756: eṣā cet prekṣyate dṛṣṭis tan na bandhanam āpyate //MU_6,26.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31759: sarvārambhāṃs tyajan svasthaḥ kurvaṃś cāpi budho janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31770: prāṇas sūryo 'gnir atha vā pacaty antar idaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,26.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31776: yatra grastās tad āsādya padaṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31778: grastā tat padam āsādya na bhūyo janmabhāṅ manaḥ //MU_6,26.36//
GSP27moksop_u:31783: arkatāṃ samparityajya na yāvac candratāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31784: prāṇas tāvad vicāryāntar deśakālau na śocyate //MU_6,26.39//
GSP27moksop_u:31786: ātmano nijam ādhāraṃ na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ //MU_6,26.40//
GSP27moksop_u:31788: hṛdaye bhāskaraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,26.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31789: nākṣīṇaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bahissthaṃ siddhaye tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31790: hārdaṃ tu kṣapayed dhvāntaṃ yatkṣaye siddhir uttamā //MU_6,26.42//
GSP27moksop_u:31792: hārde tu tamasi kṣīṇe svāloko jāyate paraḥ //MU_6,26.43//
GSP27moksop_u:31796: padāt tasmād udety antaḥ prāṇārko bahirunmukhaḥ //MU_6,26.45//
GSP27moksop_u:31799: prāṇe tv astaṅgate bāhyād apānaḥ prodayet kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:31800: ātape parito naṣṭe chāyevāśu pade navā //MU_6,26.47//
GSP27moksop_u:31802: apānajanmabhūmau ca prāṇaṃ naṣṭam avaihi hi //MU_6,26.48//
GSP27moksop_u:31804: bahiḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.49//
GSP27moksop_u:31806: antaḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.50//
GSP27moksop_u:31808: svasthaṃ kumbhakam abhyasya na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,26.51//
GSP27moksop_u:31810: svasaṃsthaṃ kumbhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,26.52//
GSP27moksop_u:31811: prāṇāpānāv ubhāv antar yatraitau vilayaṃ gatau /
GSP27moksop_u:31812: tad ālambya padaṃ śāntam ātmanā nānutapyate //MU_6,26.53//
GSP27moksop_u:31814: vicārya bahir antar vā na bhūyaḥ pariśocyate //MU_6,26.54//
GSP27moksop_u:31816: deśaṃ kālaṃ ca samprekṣya na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ //MU_6,26.55//
GSP27moksop_u:31817: yatra prāṇo hy apānena prāṇenāpāna eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31818: nigīrṇo bahir antaś ca deśau kālau ca paśya tau //MU_6,26.56//
GSP27moksop_u:31820: ayatnasiddhaṃ bāhyasthaṃ kumbhakaṃ tat padaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.57//
GSP27moksop_u:31822: ayatnasiddho hy antassthaḥ kumbhakaḥ paramaṃ padam //MU_6,26.58//
GSP27moksop_u:31823: etat tad ātmano rūpaṃ śuddhaiṣā sā paraiva cit /
GSP27moksop_u:31824: etat sad asadābhāsam etat prāpya na śocyate //MU_6,26.59//
GSP27moksop_u:31826: na ca prāṇaṃ na cāpānaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.60//
GSP27moksop_u:31829: prāṇasya prāṇanaṃ proccaiḥ paraṃ jīvasya jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31831: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31832: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.63//
GSP27moksop_u:31842: ye dve yogipadādhāraṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.68//
GSP27moksop_u:31844: yac chaktirūpaṃ śaktīnāṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.69//
GSP27moksop_u:31848: yat prāpyaṃ prāṇamananāt tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.71//
GSP27moksop_u:31850: kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.72//
GSP27moksop_u:31851: yad akhilakalanākalaṅkahīnaṃ parivalitaṃ ca sadā kalāgaṇena /
GSP27moksop_u:31852: anubhavavibhavaṃ padaṃ tad agryaṃ sakalasurāvanataṃ paraṃ prapadye //MU_6,26.73//
GSP27moksop_u:31856: eṣā hi citi viśrāntir mayā prāṇasamādhinā /
GSP27moksop_u:31859: na calāmi nimeṣāṃśam api merur ivācalaḥ //MU_6,27.2//
GSP27moksop_u:31860: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31861: svapne 'pi na calaty eṣa susamādhir mamātmani //MU_6,27.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31864: api saṃrudhyate vāyur api vā salilaṃ gateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31869: ayam adyāpi bhūtānāṃ paśyañ jīvāmi dhīradhīḥ //MU_6,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31870: na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyac ca cintayāmi kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:31878: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ lapsyāmi sundaram /
GSP27moksop_u:31879: iti cintā na me tena ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31880: na staumi na ca nindāmi kvacit kiñcit kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:31881: ātmano 'nyasya vā sādho tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31882: na tuṣyati śubhaprāptau nāśubheṣv api khidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:31883: mano mama samaṃ nityaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.14//
GSP27moksop_u:31884: paramaṃ tyāgam ālambya sarvam eva sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:31885: jīvitādi mayā tyaktaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31887: mano mama mune śāntaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31888: kāṣṭhaṃ vilāsinīṃ śailaṃ tṛṇam agniṃ himaṃ nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31889: samaṃ sarvatra paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31890: kim adya mama samprāptaṃ prātar vā bhavitā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31891: iti cintājvaro nāsti tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31893: na bibhemi na hṛṣyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31894: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyaṃ mamāyam ayam anyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31895: iti brahman na jānāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31896: āharan viharaṃs tiṣṭhann uttiṣṭhann ucchvasan svapan /
GSP27moksop_u:31897: deho 'ham iti no vedmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31899: asantam iva paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31901: hastāv iva śarīrasthau tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31903: ṛju paśyāmi sarvatra tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31906: yat karomi yad aśnāmi tat tyaktvā tadvato 'pi me /
GSP27moksop_u:31907: mano naiṣkarmyam ādatte tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31908: yadā yadā mune kiñcid vijānāmi tadā tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:31909: natim āyāmi nauddhatyaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31911: daridro 'pi na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31913: bhūtavṛndaṃ hasāmy ārāt tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31915: saṃsparśaṃ na dadāmy antas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31917: suptaḥ prabuddhaḥ paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31918: kṣīṇaṃ bhinnaṃ ślathaṃ jīrṇaṃ kṣubdhaṃ kṣuṇṇaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:31919: paśyāmi navavat sarvaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31921: sarvasya priyamitraṃ ca tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.33//
GSP27moksop_u:31924: nāham asmi na cānyo me nāham anyasya kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:31925: iti me bhāvitaṃ cetas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31926: ahaṃ jagad ahaṃ vyoma deśakālakramāv aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31927: ahaṃ kriyeti me buddhis tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:31928: ghaṭaś cic cit paṭaś cit khaṃ cid vaṭaś śakaṭaś ca cit /
GSP27moksop_u:31929: cit sarvam iti me bhāvas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.37//
GSP27moksop_u:31933: ālīnam unnamitam ākuladṛśyadṛśyam ālokayan prakalayaṃś ca ciraṃ sthito 'smi //MU_6,27.39//
GSP27moksop_u:31937: etat te kathitaṃ brahman yathāsmi yad ihāsmi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31940: aho nu citraṃ bhagavan bhavatā bhūṣaṇaṃ śruteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31942: dhanyās te ye mahātmānam atyantaṃ cirajīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31944: vayam adya bhṛśaṃ dhanyās svātmodantam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31945: yathāvat pāvanaṃ buddhes sarvaṃ kathitavān asi //MU_6,28.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31947: bhavān iva jagaty asmin na mahān avalokitaḥ //MU_6,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31948: kathañcit prāpyate kaccid bhrāntveha hi mahājanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31949: na bhavān iva bhavyātmā sulabho jagati kvacit //MU_6,28.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31950: vaṃśakhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate mauktikaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31951: jagatkhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate tvādṛśas tathā //MU_6,28.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31952: mayā tu sumahat kāryam adya sampāditaṃ śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:31954: tad astu tava kalyāṇaṃ praviśātmaguhāṃ śubhām /
GSP27moksop_u:31959: tat pātraṃ mauktikārgheṇa pūrayām āsa pūrṇadhīḥ //MU_6,28.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31963: viṣṭarād aham utthāya tataḥ khagavad āplutaḥ //MU_6,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31966: mayi yāte tato dīrghe gaganādhvany adṛśyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:31968: anyo'nyaṃ mayi tasmiṃś ca taraṅgaka ivāmbudhau /
GSP27moksop_u:31969: vyomany adṛśyatāṃ yāte gatas smṛtyā munīn aham //MU_6,28.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31974: jīvaty adyāpi matimāṃs tasminn eva latādale /
GSP27moksop_u:31978: adya rāma kṛte kṣīṇe tretā samparivartate /
GSP27moksop_u:31983: śrutvā vicārya caivāntar yad yuktaṃ tat samācara //MU_6,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31985: bhavabhayabahalāṃ kusaṃsṛtiṃ sa prasabham asatsaritaṃ tariṣyatīti //MU_6,28.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31994: bhusuṇḍo 'vāptavān prāpyaṃ tathā sādhaya tat padam //MU_6,29.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31998: idānīṃ dhiyam ālambya yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,29.5//
GSP27moksop_u:32002: prabuddhās smaḥ prahṛṣṭās smaḥ praviṣṭās smas svam āspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:32003: sthitās smo jñātavijñeyā bhavanto hy aparā iva //MU_6,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:32006: bhusuṇḍacarite brahmann etasmin yat tvayā vibho /
GSP27moksop_u:32008: tat kena nāma racitaṃ kuto vā tat samutthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32009: kathaṃ vā sthitim āyātaṃ ko vā tatrāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,29.10//
GSP27moksop_u:32012: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ mayā //MU_6,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:32014: śarīrasadanaṃ rāma na kenacid idaṃ kṛtam //MU_6,29.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32018: vastutaś caika evendus sthitir dehe tathaiva hi //MU_6,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32020: asann eva vastutas sa proktas sadasadātmakaḥ //MU_6,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32021: svapnas svapnavidhau satyas tv anyadā sa mudhaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:32024: pratibhāsāvadhau tāpe jalaṃ sad asad anyadā //MU_6,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:32025: pratibhāsāvadhau dehas sann asaṃs tv anyadā smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32027: ayaṃ nāmāham ity antar gṛhītamananaṃ sthitam //MU_6,29.19//
GSP27moksop_u:32031: paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:32033: paribhramasi meruṃ vā sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32034: svapneṣv api ca yas svapnas tatra yena mahītaṭān /
GSP27moksop_u:32035: paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:32037: paribhramasi yeneha sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32039: prakaroṣi mahābāho yair dehais te kva saṃsthitāḥ //MU_6,29.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32041: nirvṛtiṃ yāsi dehena sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.26//
GSP27moksop_u:32044: idaṃ dhanam ayaṃ deho deśo 'yam iti yo bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32046: dīrghaṃ svapnam imaṃ viddhi dīrghaṃ vā cittavibhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:32048: prabodham eṣyasi yadā param ātmecchayā svayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32049: drakṣyasi tvaṃ tadā samyag idam ūrdhvād adho yathā //MU_6,29.30//
GSP27moksop_u:32051: tathaiveyaṃ hi saṅkalpakalanā kācid eva ha //MU_6,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32057: dehavac cintito dehas sthito 'nyas tadvad eva hi //MU_6,29.34//
GSP27moksop_u:32060: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena saṅkalpo hy ayam eva cet /
GSP27moksop_u:32061: anyathā bhāvyate rāma bhūyate tad ihānyathā //MU_6,29.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32062: ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāyaṃ ca saṃsāra iti bhāvite /
GSP27moksop_u:32064: bhāvitaṃ tīvravegena yad evāśu tad eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32070: vyomany eva yathā tāpasantapte dṛśyate sarit /
GSP27moksop_u:32074: bhīrur apy eti na yathā svasaṅkalpeṣu sambhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:32075: svasaṅkalpe 'pi saṃsāre na tathaiti bhayaṃ sudhīḥ //MU_6,29.43//
GSP27moksop_u:32076: sva eva hi svabhāvo 'yam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:32078: sa eva kiñcit saṃśodhyaś śuddhyā vimalatāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:32079: tasmin na dṛśyate rāma moho 'yaṃ jāgataś calaḥ //MU_6,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:32081: na gṛhṇāti malaṃ bhūyas tāmratām iva kāñcanam //MU_6,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32082: ābhāsamātram evaitan na san nāsaj jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32084: maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ svargo jñānam ajñānam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32089: nāstam eti na codeti samyagālokanān manaḥ //MU_6,29.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32090: nirṇīya sarvabhāvānām asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:32092: na nindati na ca stauti na hṛṣyati na śocati /
GSP27moksop_u:32094: avaśyam eva martavyaṃ sarvair eva hi bandhubhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32096: avaśyam eva ca mayā martavyam iti niścaye /
GSP27moksop_u:32101: anarthāya bhavaty āpac chokasyāvasaro hi kaḥ //MU_6,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:32103: idaṃ hi janatājālaṃ kim atra paridevanā //MU_6,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:32104: sat sad eva sadaivaitad asad evāsad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:32106: nāham asmi na cābhūvaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi cādhunā /
GSP27moksop_u:32108: dehāc ced anya evāhaṃ cidābhāsas tad aṅga he /
GSP27moksop_u:32109: kau tau me sadasadbhāvau yanniṣṭhaṃ paritapyate //MU_6,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:32110: iti niścayavat tv antas samyagjñānān mano muneḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32111: nāstam eti na codeti na cāntaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,29.61//
GSP27moksop_u:32114: etadartham asatye 'smin nāsthā kāryā manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:32116: asatsvapnaṃ dṛḍham idam iti nirṇīya buddhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32118: kartavyam eva kartavyaṃ yasya na pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:32123: tatas tad api santyajya nirābhāso bhavottamaḥ //MU_6,29.67//
GSP27moksop_u:32126: nāham asmi na me bhogās satyā ity abhibhāvite /
GSP27moksop_u:32128: aham eva hi vā sarvaṃ cid ity evābhibhāvite /
GSP27moksop_u:32131: yad ekam etayor vetsi ramyaṃ tad rāma saṃśraya //MU_6,29.71//
GSP27moksop_u:32132: dvābhyām evātha vai tābhyāṃ darśanābhyām ihānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:32134: yat kiñcid ucitaṃ loke yan nabhasy atha yat pare /
GSP27moksop_u:32137: tat tad eva prayāty āśu mūḍhānāṃ viparītatām //MU_6,29.74//
GSP27moksop_u:32139: padaṃ kurvanti dagdhāsu sthalīṣu hariṇā iva //MU_6,29.75//
GSP27moksop_u:32140: rāgo dveṣaś ca sarpau dvau na nilīnau manobile /
GSP27moksop_u:32141: yasya kalpataros tasmāt kiṃ nāmāṅga na labhyate //MU_6,29.76//
GSP27moksop_u:32142: ye hi prājñās suniyatā vidagdhāś śāstraśālinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32143: rāgadveṣamayās te cej jambukās tad dhig astu tān //MU_6,29.77//
GSP27moksop_u:32144: mad dhanaṃ bhuktam anyena dhanaṃ bhuktaṃ mayānyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32146: dhanāni bandhavo mitraṃ punar āyānti yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32147: kim eteṣu naraḥ prājño rajyate vā virajyate //MU_6,29.79//
GSP27moksop_u:32150: na dhanaṃ na jano nāsmi satyaṃ rāghava vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32152: ādyantayos sarvam asan madhye 'py asthiram ādhimat /
GSP27moksop_u:32153: kva badhnātu dhṛtiṃ dhīro hy anyakalpitakhadrume //MU_6,29.82//
GSP27moksop_u:32154: ekena kalpitā khe strī bhuṅkte tāṃ dūrago 'paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32160: nāsi nāyaṃ paṭo nārtho vidyate bhittibhāgavān /
GSP27moksop_u:32163: na kaścid eva parame bhavān ātmani saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.87//
GSP27moksop_u:32170: prabodham ehi paśyāccham ātmānam uditaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:32172: prabudhyasva prabudhyasva punaḥ punar ayaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32176: bodham āsādaya paraṃ prabuddho 'sy eva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:32178: na te janma na te duḥkhaṃ na doṣas te na te bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32181: ativitatam idaṃ ca somyarūpaṃ samupaśamātmani tiṣṭha he mahātman //MU_6,29.96//
GSP27moksop_u:32190: sabhābhoge sthite somye rātrāv iva mahītale //MU_6,30.3//
GSP27moksop_u:32192: śṛṇvantīṣv iva śuddhāsu patākāsu vaco muneḥ //MU_6,30.4//
GSP27moksop_u:32194: svapatsv antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca pañjareṣv ālayeṣu ca //MU_6,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:32200: virarāma munir vāri sasetv ātmarayād iva //MU_6,30.8//
GSP27moksop_u:32202: punar āha tam evārthaṃ vasiṣṭho vadatāṃ varaḥ //MU_6,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:32205: etam evāvalambyāntas tiṣṭha meha madaṃ kṛthāḥ //MU_6,30.10//
GSP27moksop_u:32209: prayatnād rodhitam api pravahaty eva vegataḥ //MU_6,30.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32210: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya balaṃ prajñāṃ ca yuktitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32213: pauruṣeṇa na yat prāptaṃ na tat kvacana labhyate //MU_6,30.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32215: nijaṃ prayatnam āśritya cittam ādau nirodhayet //MU_6,30.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32225: na tathā sthiratā dehe citrapuṃsi yathā kila //MU_6,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:32226: vināśito hi citrastho deho naśyati nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:32229: dehas tu pālito 'py uccair naśyaty eva na vardhate //MU_6,30.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32231: ye guṇāś citradehe hi na te saṅkalpadehake //MU_6,30.23//
GSP27moksop_u:32232: citradehād api jaḍād yo 'yaṃ tucchataraḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:32235: svalpasaṅkalpajād dehād api tucchataro hy ayam //MU_6,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32238: deho hi saṅkalpamayo nāyam asti na nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32239: kiṃ vyartham etadarthaṃ hi mūḍho 'yaṃ kleśabhāg janaḥ //MU_6,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:32240: yathā citramaye puṃsi kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32241: yathā saṅkalpapuruṣe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:32242: yathā manorājyamaye kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32243: yathā dvitīye śaśini kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.29//
GSP27moksop_u:32244: yathā svapnasamārambhe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32245: yathā ghanātapajale kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.30//
GSP27moksop_u:32247: tathā śarīrayantre 'smin kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32249: bhūṣite dūṣite dehe na hi kiñcic citaḥ kṣatam //MU_6,30.32//
GSP27moksop_u:32250: na cid astam upāyāti nātmā calati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:32251: na brahma vikṛtiṃ yāti kiṃ vo dehakṣaye kṣatam //MU_6,30.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32256: bhramitaṃ ca bhramadrūpaṃ patadrūpaṃ ca pātitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32257: hataṃ ca hanyamānaṃ ca vapur durvāsanāvaśāt //MU_6,30.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32258: ajñānajaṃ bhramaṃ tyaktvā satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avekṣya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32259: dhīratām alam ālambya ghanaṃ bhramam idaṃ tyajet //MU_6,30.37//
GSP27moksop_u:32260: saṅkalpena kṛto deho mithyājñānena san na san /
GSP27moksop_u:32261: asatyena kṛtaṃ yat syān na tat satyaṃ kadācana //MU_6,30.38//
GSP27moksop_u:32263: asatyām eva cemāṃ ca karoti ca jagatkriyām //MU_6,30.39//
GSP27moksop_u:32264: jaḍena rāma kriyate yat tan na kṛtam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32265: kurvann api tato deho na kartā kvacid eva hi //MU_6,30.40//
GSP27moksop_u:32266: nirīho hi jaḍo deho nātmano 'sty abhivāñchitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32267: kartā na kaścid evāto draṣṭā kevalam asy ajaḥ //MU_6,30.41//
GSP27moksop_u:32268: yathā dīpo nivātasthas svātmany eva hi tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:32270: yathā divasakāryāṇi bhāskaras svastha eva san /
GSP27moksop_u:32271: karoty evam imāṃ rāma kuru pārthivasaṃsthitim //MU_6,30.43//
GSP27moksop_u:32272: asmin hy asanmaye dehagehe śūnye samutthite /
GSP27moksop_u:32276: bhṛtyatāṃ māsya gaccha tvam ahaṅkārasya durmateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32277: asya bhṛtyatayā rāma nirayaḥ prāpyate phalam //MU_6,30.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32285: citram adyāpi te kasmād ghaṭṭitā nāśmavat sthitāḥ //MU_6,30.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32289: viharānāsthayā sādho na tavaitat kila sthiram //MU_6,30.52//
GSP27moksop_u:32293: teṣāṃ mohāmayāndhānāṃ na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ //MU_6,30.54//
GSP27moksop_u:32295: viṣavallyā iva phalaṃ tasyās syān maraṇātmakam //MU_6,30.55//
GSP27moksop_u:32297: mūrkheṇālambitaṃ yena naṣṭam evāśu viddhi tam //MU_6,30.56//
GSP27moksop_u:32303: tvam enam ālokaya mā manasā mahatāṃ vara //MU_6,30.59//
GSP27moksop_u:32309: śakyante parisaṅkhyātuṃ na tā varṣaśatair api //MU_6,30.62//
GSP27moksop_u:32314: yat karoti yad ādatte dehayantram idaṃ calam /
GSP27moksop_u:32316: vṛkṣonnatau yathā hetur akartr api kilāmbaram /
GSP27moksop_u:32324: ātmā prakāśarūpo hi nityas sarvagato vibhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32325: cittaṃ śaṭham ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi hārdaṃ bṛhattamaḥ //MU_6,30.70//
GSP27moksop_u:32328: piśāco hi manonāmā śūnye dehagṛhe sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32329: bhāyayaty eṣa duṣṭātmā mainam uttama saṃspṛśa //MU_6,30.72//
GSP27moksop_u:32331: manaḥpiśācam utsārya yo 'si sa tvaṃ sthiro bhava //MU_6,30.73//
GSP27moksop_u:32333: śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ guravo na ca mānavam //MU_6,30.74//
GSP27moksop_u:32339: iyaṃ jagadaraṇyānī śūnyā kasya na bhītaye //MU_6,30.77//
GSP27moksop_u:32341: dehagehaṃ katipayais sevyate sadbhir eva ca //MU_6,30.78//
GSP27moksop_u:32342: iha saṃśrīyate yā yā dik saiva raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:32347: dhṛtiṃ tṛṇarasai rāma mā gaccha mṛgapotavat //MU_6,30.81//
GSP27moksop_u:32349: tvam ajñānagajaṃ bhaṅktvā saiṃhīṃ vṛttim upāśraya //MU_6,30.82//
GSP27moksop_u:32351: viharanti yathā rāma tathā mā viharānagha //MU_6,30.83//
GSP27moksop_u:32355: pravicārya mahāryais svam ekam ātmānam āśrayet //MU_6,30.85//
GSP27moksop_u:32366: pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga na jāḍyaṃ na ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:32369: ayaṃ guḍa idaṃ khaṇḍam iti māyā mudhoditā //MU_6,30.92//
GSP27moksop_u:32374: nāsato vidyate bhāvo yo nāsty eveha san na saḥ //MU_6,30.95//
GSP27moksop_u:32378: tathopalas svatāniṣṭho na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ //MU_6,30.97//
GSP27moksop_u:32380: cetyasyāsambhavād ātmā na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ //MU_6,30.98//
GSP27moksop_u:32382: samāyāte na cāyāte prekṣite na ca vīkṣite //MU_6,30.99//
GSP27moksop_u:32384: bhavatas tau kathaṃ satyam aprekṣāmātrakād ṛte //MU_6,30.100//
GSP27moksop_u:32385: yac ca cetanam ātmeti jaḍaś copala ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:32387: bodhyaḥ paratare bodhe yayā yuktyā prabodhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32388: sopadeśyā na gṛhṇāti mūḍhas tat sahasā padam //MU_6,30.102//
GSP27moksop_u:32389: cittaṃ pṛthak pṛthag imāni hatendriyāṇi kartā na dṛśyata idaṃ ca gṛhaṃ mudhaiva /
GSP27moksop_u:32390: ko 'py anya eva parivalgati nissvabhāva eṣo 'ham ity alam aho mahad indrajālam //MU_6,30.103//
GSP27moksop_u:32391: lolāsu saṃsṛtiṣu bhūtaparamparāṇāṃ krīḍāsu cānyapuruṣasya cidekavṛtteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32392: tattvaṃ vicārya ramate hi mahānubhāvo mantrī yatholbaṇaviṣāsu bhujaṅgamīṣu //MU_6,30.104//
GSP27moksop_u:32393: na tvaṃ śiro na nayane na ca raktamāṃse nāsthīni naiva ca mano na ca bhūtajālam /
GSP27moksop_u:32394: mā moham ehi na śarīram asi prasannā cit tvaṃ prapannasakalāmalasarvageti //MU_6,30.105//
GSP27moksop_u:32402: śṛṇu yā kathitā pūrvaṃ mama kailāsakandare /
GSP27moksop_u:32426: taṃ pūjayan mahādevaṃ tasminn eva girau purā /
GSP27moksop_u:32455: madartham iva tām eva diśam āpatatīva ca //MU_6,31.29//
GSP27moksop_u:32467: etasmin samaye tatra yāmārdhe prathame gate /
GSP27moksop_u:32469: apaśyaṃ kānane tejo jhagity eva samutthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32479: prakaṭīkṛtadik tejas tad ālokya mayā smayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:32481: yāvat paśyāmi taṃ sānuṃ līlayaiva yadṛcchayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32489: manodṛṣṭas sa bhagavān manasaiva tato mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32491: iti kṛtvā mayā dehaḥ paryaṅkaśayanād ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32495: tatra puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā dūrād eva trilocanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32502: ānayārghyaṃ tathā pādyaṃ brahman svāgatam astu te /
GSP27moksop_u:32509: arghaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā pādyaṃ samupetyārpitaṃ mayā //MU_6,32.21//
GSP27moksop_u:32510: pādayor hastayoś caiva tanvāṃ cāsya svayambhuvaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32514: gṛhītavantau tau tāṃ me saparyām ādarāt prabhū /
GSP27moksop_u:32520: kaccit kalyāṇakāriṇyas saṃvidas te sthitāḥ pade //MU_6,32.26//
GSP27moksop_u:32534: vasato 'smin gireḥ kukṣāv apy anudvegitāsti te //MU_6,32.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32538: na kiñcid api duṣprāpaṃ na ca kāścana bhītayaḥ //MU_6,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:32540: na te santi jagatkośe praṇatiṃ ye na bibhrati //MU_6,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32541: te deśās te janapadās tā diśas te ca parvatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32545: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca saphalaṃ yena nāma tat /
GSP27moksop_u:32560: sarvāsām āpadāṃ mūrdhni dattaṃ bhūtapate padam //MU_6,32.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32561: sakaladuḥkhabhayāpahara prabho kṣaṇam apīha mayāsi na cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:32562: varada vīra maheśvara vismṛtas sukham ato nivasāmi bhavān iva //MU_6,32.47//
GSP27moksop_u:32564: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:32565: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_6,32.48//
GSP27moksop_u:32569: ity uktavantam atrāsau gaurī bhagavatī giram /
GSP27moksop_u:32570: mām uvāca jaganmātā māteva tanayaṃ priyam //MU_6,33.1//
GSP27moksop_u:32575: tayā saha kathāś citrāḥ karomy ekavayasyayā //MU_6,33.3//
GSP27moksop_u:32576: ity ukte tatra pārvatyā mayā sā gṛhiṇī svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32580: aham asmin kṣaṇe buddhyā rāma cintitavān idam /
GSP27moksop_u:32581: avyagro matprasannaś ca labdho 'yaṃ bhagavān mayā //MU_6,33.6//
GSP27moksop_u:32584: iti sañcintya sa gurur idaṃ pṛṣṭo mayānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:32585: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ candramaulinā //MU_6,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:32588: pṛcchāmi tvā mahādeva yad ahaṃ tat tvam āśu me /
GSP27moksop_u:32593: śṛṇu brahman varam idaṃ devārcanam anuttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:32594: vadāmi mucyase yena kṛtena sakṛd eva hi //MU_6,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32595: kaccit vetsi mahādevo devaḥ kas syād iti dvija /
GSP27moksop_u:32596: na devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo na ca devas trilocanaḥ //MU_6,33.13//
GSP27moksop_u:32597: na devaḥ kamalodbhūto na devas tridaśeśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32598: na devaḥ pavano nārko nānalo na niśākaraḥ //MU_6,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32599: na brāhmaṇo nāvanipo nāhaṃ na tvaṃ dvijottama /
GSP27moksop_u:32600: na devo deharūpo 'sti na devaś citrarūpadhṛt //MU_6,33.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32601: na devaḥ kalanārūpī nāpi devo bhaven matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32605: tad eva devaśabdena kathyate tat prapūjayet /
GSP27moksop_u:32613: bodhas sāmyaṃ śama iti puṣpāṇy agryāṇi tatra vai /
GSP27moksop_u:32614: śivaṃ cinmātram akalam ātmānam amalaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,33.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32615: śamabodhādibhiḥ puṣpair deva ātmā yad arcyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32618: kṛtrimārcāsu ye saktāś ciraṃ kleśaṃ bhajanti te //MU_6,33.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32619: jñātajñeyā hi ye santo bālakrīḍopamaṃ na te /
GSP27moksop_u:32623: tvam etac cetanākāśam ātmānaṃ jīvam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32624: svabhāvaṃ viddhi na tv anyat pūjyapūjātmapūjanam //MU_6,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:32626: yathā ca cetanasyaiva jīvāditvaṃ tad ucyatām //MU_6,33.28//
GSP27moksop_u:32629: tad yat svayaṃ prakacati tasya svakacanasya tu /
GSP27moksop_u:32630: svayaṃ saṃviditaṃ nāma tenedaṃ jagad ity alam //MU_6,33.30//
GSP27moksop_u:32631: ity evaṃ svapnapuravaj jagad bhāti cidātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:32632: evaṃ cidvyomamātrātma jagad acchaṃ na bhittimat //MU_6,33.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32634: cittvāt kacati sargādau yat taj jagad iti smṛtam //MU_6,33.32//
GSP27moksop_u:32635: tasmāt svapnapurākāraṃ yad idaṃ bhāsate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:32636: tatra cidvyomamātrātmany anyatā nāma kā kutaḥ //MU_6,33.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32638: cinmātram ātmā jīvaś ca cinmātraṃ bhūtasantatiḥ //MU_6,33.34//
GSP27moksop_u:32640: bhinnaṃ svapnapure cāṅga kiṃ sambhavati kathyatām //MU_6,33.35//
GSP27moksop_u:32644: tadā kila cidākāśam eva bhāti jagattayā //MU_6,33.37//
GSP27moksop_u:32646: tathedaṃ jāgradākhye 'pi svapne bhāti tad eva naḥ //MU_6,33.38//
GSP27moksop_u:32648: na kiñcit sambhavaty aṅga jagaty evam ihāditaḥ //MU_6,33.39//
GSP27moksop_u:32649: yato na sambhavaty anyac cedaṃ kiñcit tato 'khilam /
GSP27moksop_u:32650: cittvaṃ sacetyam apy etad acetyaṃ saj jagat sthitam //MU_6,33.40//
GSP27moksop_u:32654: yathā na vidyate kiñcit tathāsmin bhuvanatraye //MU_6,33.42//
GSP27moksop_u:32655: yāḥ kāścana dṛśo ye ye bhāvābhāvāḥ kilāgamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32657: sa eṣa devaḥ kathito yaḥ paraḥ paramārthataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32658: yas tvaṃ yo 'ham aśeṣaṃ vā jagad eva ca yo 'khilam //MU_6,33.44//
GSP27moksop_u:32661: saṅkalpane svapnapure śarīraṃ cidvyomato 'nyan na yathāsti kiñcit /
GSP27moksop_u:32662: tatheha sarge prathamaikasargān mune prabhṛty asti na rūpam anyat //MU_6,33.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32666: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ paramātmaiva kevalam /
GSP27moksop_u:32667: brahmaiva paramākāśa eṣa devaḥ paras smṛtaḥ //MU_6,34.1//
GSP27moksop_u:32668: tad etatpūjanaṃ śreyas tasmāt sarvam avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32669: sa devas sarvagas sarvas sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam //MU_6,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:32672: prabuddhas tvaṃ muniśreṣṭha tenedaṃ tava varṇyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32676: gandhākṣataiś ca dīpaiś ca puṣpādyaiḥ pūjayanti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:32681: yataḥ kutaścin mithyātma phalam atrārpayanti te //MU_6,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:32683: yat syād bhavādṛśe 'yogyam arcanaṃ tad vadāmy aham //MU_6,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:32684: asmadādis tu no kaścid devo matimatāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:32687: sarvasaṅkalpavalito na sarvī na ca sārvikaḥ //MU_6,34.11//
GSP27moksop_u:32689: cinmātramūrtir amalo deva ity ucyate mune //MU_6,34.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32692: brahma brahman sadasator madhyaṃ tad deva ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32693: paramātmāparābhikhyaṃ tat sad om ity udāhṛtam //MU_6,34.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32695: mahācid iti ca proktaṃ paramārtha iti śrutam //MU_6,34.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32696: sthitaṃ sarvatra sarvartu latāsv antar yathā rasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32698: yac cittattvam arundhatyā yac cittattvaṃ tavānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:32699: yac cittattvaṃ ca pārvatyā yac cittattvaṃ gaṇeṣu ca //MU_6,34.17//
GSP27moksop_u:32700: cittattvaṃ yan mamedaṃ ca cittattvaṃ yaj jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:32701: tad deva iti tattvajñā vidur uttamabuddhayaḥ //MU_6,34.18//
GSP27moksop_u:32702: pādapāṇyādimān anyo yo vā devaḥ prakalpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32703: sa cinmātrād ṛte brahman kiṃsāraḥ kila kathyatām //MU_6,34.19//
GSP27moksop_u:32704: na sa dūre sthito brahman na duṣprāpas sa kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:32705: sa saṃsthitas sadā dehe sarvatraiva ca khe tathā //MU_6,34.20//
GSP27moksop_u:32706: sa karoti sa cāśnāti sa bibharti prayāti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32707: sa niśśvasati saṃvettā so 'ṅgāny aṅgāni vetti te //MU_6,34.21//
GSP27moksop_u:32713: tasya saṃvyavahārārthaṃ sañjñā cid iti kalpitā //MU_6,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32714: sa eṣa cinmayas sūkṣmas sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32715: imaṃ bhāsuram ābhāsaṃ karoti na karoti ca //MU_6,34.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32717: imāṃ rañjayati prājña raseneva madhur latām //MU_6,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:32718: cāravo ye camatkārāś citaś citi yathāsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32719: camatkurvanti kila te ete kecin nabho'bhidhāḥ //MU_6,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:32733: citi sthiraṃ pravahati jalāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,34.34//
GSP27moksop_u:32765: manyate tanyate vastu gīyate kriyate 'pi ca //MU_6,34.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32770: cit sarvaṃ jagadārambham imaṃ prakaṭayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:32775: rūpam eti phalaṃ caiva prāvṛṭsikteva sallatā //MU_6,34.55//
GSP27moksop_u:32776: cicchāyayaiva sarvasya jāḍyaṃ śāmyaty udeti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:32778: ciccamatkṛtayo dehe na bhaveyur imā yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:32779: trailokyadehās tat ke te kān spṛśeyuḥ kimākṛtīn //MU_6,34.57//
GSP27moksop_u:32782: cidālokaṃ vinā kasya rasanāgre sphurann api /
GSP27moksop_u:32783: kathaṃ kadā prakaṭatām eti kīdṛk ca vā rasaḥ //MU_6,34.59//
GSP27moksop_u:32785: cinmañjarīṃ vinā dehavṛkṣaḥ ka iva rājate //MU_6,34.60//
GSP27moksop_u:32787: cid evāstītaran nāsti cinmātram idam utthitam //MU_6,34.61//
GSP27moksop_u:32788: ity uktavān atha tryakṣas sudhāsyandācchayā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:32790: yadi sarvagatā deva cid asty ekā tatātmikā /
GSP27moksop_u:32791: tad ayaṃ cetati sphāram ayaṃ caiva na cetati //MU_6,34.63//
GSP27moksop_u:32792: ayaṃ cidvān purā bhūtvā ciddhīnas samprati sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32795: śṛṇv etad akhilaṃ brahman yathāpṛṣṭam vadāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:32796: mahān ayaṃ kṛtaḥ praśnas tvayā brahmavidāṃ vara //MU_6,34.65//
GSP27moksop_u:32801: sa eva hi pumān kopād yathehānya iva kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:32802: bhavaty evaṃ vikalpāṅkā cit svarūpānyatāṃ gatā //MU_6,34.68//
GSP27moksop_u:32808: jīvo bhūtvā bhavaty āśu buddhiḥ paścād ahaṃ manaḥ //MU_6,34.71//
GSP27moksop_u:32812: śabalaṃ rūpam āsādya saṅkalpān yāty anāratam //MU_6,34.73//
GSP27moksop_u:32814: cij jāḍyād deham āyāti payaḥ pāṣāṇatām iva //MU_6,34.74//
GSP27moksop_u:32816: jāḍyaṃ nipuṇam āśritya saṃsāre jāyate mune //MU_6,34.75//
GSP27moksop_u:32831: uṣṭrīva madhuno binduṃ vāñchate bhāvitaṃ sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:32833: paraṃ vaivaśyam āyāti saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭaṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:32834: duḥkhād duḥkhe nipatitā vipado vipadi sthitā //MU_6,34.84//
GSP27moksop_u:32852: latā tarau khagī nīḍe vīrut sānau vane mṛgī //MU_6,34.93//
GSP27moksop_u:32854: kāntāsakho haraś śaile svarge suravaro hariḥ //MU_6,34.94//
GSP27moksop_u:32855: dinaṃ karoti tīkṣṇāṃśur varṣaty ambudharo jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:32856: karoti rajanīm indur dhatte nīraṃ mahodadhiḥ //MU_6,34.95//
GSP27moksop_u:32862: kvacic chaityaṃ himendvādi kvacit khādi nakiñcana //MU_6,34.98//
GSP27moksop_u:32863: kvacid ujjvalitākārā kvacit kṛṣṇā kvacit sitā /
GSP27moksop_u:32864: kvacin nīlātha haritā kvacid agniḥ kvacin mahī //MU_6,34.99//
GSP27moksop_u:32866: sarvatvād ekarūpaiva khād apy acchaiva sā parā //MU_6,34.100//
GSP27moksop_u:32867: cic cinoti yathātmānaṃ yena yatra yathā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:32868: tat tathāśu bhavaty amburayād vīcyāditā yathā //MU_6,34.101//
GSP27moksop_u:32869: haṃsī krauñcī bakī kākī sarasīsārasī vṛkī /
GSP27moksop_u:32870: pikī balākā hariṇī vānarī kariṇī śunī //MU_6,34.102//
GSP27moksop_u:32871: caṭikā vañjulī śārī makṣikā ṣaṭpadī śukī /
GSP27moksop_u:32872: dhīś śrīr hrīḥ prītir ārtiś ca śavarī śarvarī śaśī //MU_6,34.103//
GSP27moksop_u:32875: bibhety eṣā svasaṅkalpāt svaśabdād iva gardabhī /
GSP27moksop_u:32876: nānayā sadṛg anyāsti mugdhā bālābalā calā //MU_6,34.105//
GSP27moksop_u:32877: eṣā sā kathitā tubhyaṃ jīvaśaktir mayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:32885: jaḍarater avalokaya śaktatāṃ nijapadasmaraṇena vineha yat /
GSP27moksop_u:32891: cid vadhūḥ kṣīvasuptaiva patitāsmīty alaṃ yathā //MU_6,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:32893: yathā rodity anaṣṭaiva naṣṭāsmīti tathaiva cit //MU_6,35.2//
GSP27moksop_u:32896: cittvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ tasyās saṃsārānubhave citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32899: nāsau cin na ca tac cetyaṃ na ca tac cetyate tayā //MU_6,35.5//
GSP27moksop_u:32906: nānānānā na cāpy antar aṇāv iva sumeravaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32908: neti neti na caivārkamaṇḍale rajanī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:32910: na śūnyatāśūnyate ca śilākośa iva drumaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32913: na kaścit kasyacid doṣo jñatayaitad avāpyate //MU_6,35.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32917: na tṛṇaṃ na ca trailokyam iti svāyattatātra te //MU_6,35.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32918: svāyatta eva hy eṣo 'rtho dussādho 'bhāvanāt sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32919: yad yan na sādhyate puṃsā tat kathaṃ kila labhyate //MU_6,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32921: paramaikā parā sācchā dīpikā tejasām api //MU_6,35.16//
GSP27moksop_u:32924: ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sure /
GSP27moksop_u:32925: asure sāgare bhūte nare nāge ca saṃsthitā //MU_6,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:32926: sākṣivat tiṣṭhati satī spandate ca na kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:32927: dīpaḥ prakāśanāyaiva karoti na punaḥ kriyām //MU_6,35.19//
GSP27moksop_u:32930: nirvikalpā parā sūkṣmā cic cinoti svasaṃvidam /
GSP27moksop_u:32933: bodhatas saiva bhavati naiṣā sadasatī yataḥ //MU_6,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32934: sā paraiva cid atyacchā cintām āyāti cetanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:32937: punaḥ kanakatām eti yathā cit paramā tathā //MU_6,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32939: tathā sargam ihāgatya bodhāt svaṃ yāti cit padam //MU_6,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32942: yadā cittvāc cinoty antar anyatām asatīṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:32946: rūpādīnāṃ tu sattaiṣā cetyam evāmalaiva cit /
GSP27moksop_u:32947: dvitvaikatve tv abodhotthe bodhena vilayaṃ gate //MU_6,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:32951: tadbāhyapātitā rūpaṃ rūpabodhas tu cit parā //MU_6,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32952: tvaṅmārutau jaḍau tucchau tatsaṅgas sparśa ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32953: mananaṃ sparśasaṃvittis tatsaṃvittis tu cit parā //MU_6,35.32//
GSP27moksop_u:32955: āsāṃ tu manasā hīnaṃ vedanaṃ paramaiva cit //MU_6,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32959: mananaṃ citsvakāluṣyam ātmā cin nirmalā bhavet //MU_6,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:32960: cit prakāśātmikā nityā svātmany eva ca saṃsthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:32961: idam antar jagad dhatte sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā //MU_6,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32963: nāstam eti na codeti spandate no na vardhate //MU_6,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:32965: cij jaḍaṃ cājaḍaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvayantī svayaṃ sthitā //MU_6,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:32966: rathas tv asyās smṛto jīvo jīvasyāhaṅkṛtī rathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32967: ahaṅkṛte ratho buddhis tathā buddher mano rathaḥ //MU_6,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:32968: manasas tu rathaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇasyākṣagaṇo rathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32969: akṣaughasya ratho deho dehasya spandanaṃ rathaḥ //MU_6,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:32973: manāg api na satyātma mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat sthitam //MU_6,35.42//
GSP27moksop_u:32974: rathas tv asyās smṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ kalanāyā munīśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:32976: yatra sthitaiṣā kalanā tad eva paricopati /
GSP27moksop_u:32977: yat prayāti vanaṃ vātyā tad eva parighūrṇate //MU_6,35.44//
GSP27moksop_u:32979: tejasy asattām āyāte na rūpam iva rājate //MU_6,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:32980: prāṇe praśānte manute na mano 'ntar manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:32981: vātyāyām upaśāntāyāṃ na rajo hi vikampate //MU_6,35.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32982: yatra prāṇamarud yāti manas tatraiva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:32986: yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandho yatrāgnis tatra coṣṇatā /
GSP27moksop_u:32987: yatra prāṇo manas tatra yatrendus tatra tadruciḥ //MU_6,35.49//
GSP27moksop_u:32989: saṃvittes sphāratā cittam atas tat prāṇakoṭare //MU_6,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32991: kṣubhyatīva tu sā prāṇaspandād ity anubhūyate //MU_6,35.51//
GSP27moksop_u:32995: prāṇo 'tīte tu manane sa evāśu na copati //MU_6,35.53//
GSP27moksop_u:32996: puryaṣṭake cit paramā sve mune pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:32999: tad eva bhedaiḥ kathitam anyais svāśayakalpitaiḥ //MU_6,35.55//
GSP27moksop_u:33000: yasmād udeti phalam ākuladṛśyajālaṃ tat tan na vastvitarad ity anubhūtam uccaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33001: tasmān mano viparivarti hi dehadṛṣṭyā sarvaṃ tu tatparam avastv iti viddhi tat tvam //MU_6,35.56//
GSP27moksop_u:33007: prāktanais tair ihānyaiś ca svair manomananehitaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33009: manastvaṃ yā gatā śaktis sujaḍeva mune citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33010: sā sphuraty anayā brahman svacitā sākṣibhūtayā //MU_6,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33011: asyāḥ prasādād iha sā cit kalaṅkavatī mune /
GSP27moksop_u:33016: tathā sphurati jīvo 'yaṃ sati sarvagate pare //MU_6,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:33018: makuro bimbam ādatte dravyān nāntassthitād api //MU_6,36.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33029: cij jaḍaṃ tūrarīkṛtya rūpaṃ jīvatvam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33038: jīvo jīvati sālokaṃ dīpe sati gṛhaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:33039: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva prayānty asyāḥ prapīnatām /
GSP27moksop_u:33042: jīvo vaivaśyam āyāti taraṅgatvaṃ yathā payaḥ //MU_6,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:33043: cicchaktis sarvaśaktitvān nāhaṃ cid iti bhāvanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33050: na karoty anusandhānaṃ kuṣṭhī spandaiṣaṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.23//
GSP27moksop_u:33052: na sphuraty aparāmṛṣṭaṃ dārupattraṃ yathā bahiḥ //MU_6,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33053: nisspande padmapattre 'ntaḥ prāṇāś śāntiṃ prayānty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:33056: yāti śānte nabhovāyāv adṛśyatvaṃ yathā rajaḥ //MU_6,36.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33060: nāśaṃ puryaṣṭake yāte dehaḥ patati niścalaḥ //MU_6,36.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33062: udīritā smaraty anyad anyad vismarati svayam //MU_6,36.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33065: dehe puryaṣṭakaṃ yāvad asti tāvat sa jīvati /
GSP27moksop_u:33066: śānte puryaṣṭake deho mṛta ity ucyate dvija //MU_6,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33069: tadā puryaṣṭakaṃ śāntim upaiti gagane śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33075: saṃruddhe padmayantre hi prāṇe śāntim upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:33078: tathaiva tatraiva tadā layam eti mano mune //MU_6,36.37//
GSP27moksop_u:33082: gate gṛhajane dūraṃ gṛhaṃ saṃśūnyatām iva //MU_6,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:33090: nayaty asatyaṃ satyatvaṃ satyaṃ cāsatyatām api //MU_6,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:33091: sarvagā hi cid aṃśena jīvībhūya bhaven manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33094: hṛtsthaṃ hi vetāla iva jīva ity ucyate tadā //MU_6,36.45//
GSP27moksop_u:33095: kṣīṇe puryaṣṭake cittaṃ yadā vyomani līyate /
GSP27moksop_u:33096: tadā sphurati no deho mṛta ity ucyate 'pi ca //MU_6,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:33100: prāṇe saṃrodham āyāte mriyate mānavo mune //MU_6,36.48//
GSP27moksop_u:33101: yathā jātāni jātāni tāny athānyāni kālataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33102: vṛkṣāt parṇāni śīryante śarīrāṇi tathā nṛṇām //MU_6,36.49//
GSP27moksop_u:33103: jāyante ca mriyante ca śarīrāṇi śarīriṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:33104: pādapānāṃ ca parṇāni kā tatra paridevanā //MU_6,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:33106: itaś cānyā itaś cānyā etāsv āsthā na dhīmataḥ //MU_6,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:33108: padārtham antar ādatte nānyo hi makurād ṛte //MU_6,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:33116: kathaṃ ca tan mahādeva rūḍhaṃ sat kālaparyayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33119: sarvaśaktir hi cid brahma sad ekaṃ vidyate yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:33121: sati dvitve kilaikaṃ syāt saty ekatve dvirūpatā /
GSP27moksop_u:33122: kale dve eva cidrūpaṃ cidrūpatvāt tad apy asat //MU_6,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33124: ekaṃ vinā dvitīyaṃ na na dvitīyaṃ vinaikatā //MU_6,37.5//
GSP27moksop_u:33128: vikārādi tad evātas tatsāratvān na bhidyate //MU_6,37.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33131: taraṅgas salile 'toyam ato 'yaṃ yasya te sa naḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33132: śaśaśṛṅgasamas so 'pi yasya satyaṃ sa khāṅkuraḥ //MU_6,37.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33134: vyavacchedādi duśchedaṃ vaco vāktvāt kila dvija //MU_6,37.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33140: tac cid eveti te proktaṃ na praśno 'tra tavocitaḥ //MU_6,37.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33142: cidātmikā eva cites sattvāt sampatitās svataḥ //MU_6,37.14//
GSP27moksop_u:33143: cic ca carcitacetyeha cid brahmādyabhidhā smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:33146: taraṅgitatvam iva yan na tāvac cetyatāṃ gatam //MU_6,37.16//
GSP27moksop_u:33150: tan na nāmārham amalaṃ viṣayo na girāṃ ca tat //MU_6,37.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33151: yad idaṃ dṛśyate tasyās tal latāyā mahāciteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33154: sā jīvatvaṃ sa bāhyatvaṃ tad advi dvīva paśyati //MU_6,37.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33159: cidvapus svayam evaitad ekato yāti jīvatām /
GSP27moksop_u:33162: bhāvanāt pañcakībhūtā dravyam asmīti vetty alam //MU_6,37.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33163: tad dravyaṃ prāṇinā bhuktam āśu gacchati vīryatām /
GSP27moksop_u:33166: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yad yad vetti tat tad bhavaty alam //MU_6,37.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33178: saṅkalpayatno gandharvapuryās sṛṣṭau na tu kṣaye //MU_6,37.32//
GSP27moksop_u:33181: yat kiñcid api saṅkalpya naro duḥkhe nimajjati /
GSP27moksop_u:33182: na kiñcid api saṅkalpya sukham akṣayam aśnute //MU_6,37.34//
GSP27moksop_u:33204: bhūmipo 'smīti sañjātā yāvan nāsya hṛdi smṛtiḥ //MU_6,37.45//
GSP27moksop_u:33207: ghanapravāhā yaiva syāc cittehā saiva vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:33208: ya evoccais svaras tantryās sa evākrāmati śrutim //MU_6,37.47//
GSP27moksop_u:33209: aham eko 'ham ātmā tv ity ekāṃ bhāvaya bhāvanām /
GSP27moksop_u:33210: tayā bhāvanayā yuktas sa eva tvaṃ bhavasy alam //MU_6,37.48//
GSP27moksop_u:33211: evaṃ hy asambhavad idaṃ tv avibhāgabhāsvad brahmatvam uttamapadaṃ param eva devaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33216: itthaṃ sthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ sadasad devarūpi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33218: citeḥ kalaṅkavad rūpam iti saṃsāritāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:33221: etām eva kalāṃ buddhvā svatvābhinnāṃ vimucyate //MU_6,38.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33223: sukhaduḥkhāditāṃ dhatte nasatyāṃ sad iti kṣaṇāt //MU_6,38.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33230: dvitīye 'tha tṛtīye vā pade kim avaśiṣyate //MU_6,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33232: samastāstamaye jāte sattā keva kutaś ca kā //MU_6,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:33247: pāram āsādya viśrāntā ciraśrāntā tate pade //MU_6,38.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33248: etat te manasi kṣīṇe kathitaṃ prathamaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:33249: dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu viprendra śakter asyās supāvanam //MU_6,38.16//
GSP27moksop_u:33256: cetyāṃśonmukhatāṃ nūnaṃ tyajanty ambv iva cāpalam /
GSP27moksop_u:33259: na jaḍāṃ nājaḍāṃ sphārāṃ dhatte sattām anāmikām //MU_6,38.21//
GSP27moksop_u:33264: eṣā dvitīyā padatā kathitā tava suvrata /
GSP27moksop_u:33265: tṛtīyaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi padaṃ padavidāṃ vara //MU_6,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33270: sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā pradhānaṃ śivabhāvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33273: sā mamāpy aṅga vacasāṃ na samāyāti gocaram //MU_6,38.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33275: tiṣṭhaitasmin pade nityam iti devas sanātanaḥ //MU_6,38.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33277: satyasaṃvedanān nedaṃ na ca nedaṃ munīśvara //MU_6,38.30//
GSP27moksop_u:33278: nedaṃ pravartate kiñcin nedaṃ kiñcit nivartate /
GSP27moksop_u:33283: manāg api na bhedo 'sti satām apy asatām iva //MU_6,38.33//
GSP27moksop_u:33284: samastaṃ sac chivaṃ śāntam atītaṃ vāgvilāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33285: om ity asya ca tanmātrāt turyāṃśāt param om iti //MU_6,38.34//
GSP27moksop_u:33287: ity uktavān amaladṛk pariṇāmato 'smin sphāre pade samupaśāntaravābhirāmaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33288: tūṣṇīm atiṣṭhad amunā muninā ca sārdhaṃ saṃśāntavṛttir atha tatra muhūrtam īśaḥ //MU_6,38.35//
GSP27moksop_u:33297: niśām anāśayaṃś ceṣad īśo mām āha mānitam //MU_6,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33299: tvam artham āharāhāryaṃ pavanas spandatām iva //MU_6,39.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33300: draṣṭavyam iha yat kiñcit tad dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ śamabhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33301: na hi heyam upādeyaṃ veha paśyāmi tadvidaḥ //MU_6,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:33303: vibuddhavān yathāsthityā tvaṃ tvam eva bhavātmadṛk //MU_6,39.6//
GSP27moksop_u:33304: imāṃ dṛśyadaśām āśu bālabodhāya vā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33305: samāśritya maduktaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu tūṣṇīṃsthitena kim //MU_6,39.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33306: ity uktvā bāhyabodhasthaṃ mām avekṣya triśūladhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:33310: tadātmanām atattvānāṃ śūnyaṃ kham iva bhūruhām //MU_6,39.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33311: citā sañcetyate deho na tu sañcālyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:33312: prabhur draṣṭaiva bhavati kartā bhavati karmakṛt //MU_6,39.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33315: cālanī pāvanī śaktiś śaktis saṃvedanī citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33316: sāmūrtā khād api svacchā svasattaivātra kāraṇam //MU_6,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:33318: cidātmā khād api svaccho na vinaśyati kiṃ bhramaiḥ //MU_6,39.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33321: sad apy agragataṃ vastu pratibimbakriyāṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:33325: bodhāt kalaṅkavikalā cid eva paramā śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:33327: sa haris sa śivas so 'jas sa brahmā sa sureśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33329: sa eva sarvagātmātmā cit saṃvic cetanas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33332: ye nāma te jagaty ete brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33333: kaṇās taptāyasa iva vāridher iva bindavaḥ //MU_6,39.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33334: teṣv īṣadbhramabhūteṣu jāteṣv iva parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33338: tatas tv asyā anantāyāḥ prasṛtāyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33347: nityāhūtas sa sarvastho labhyate sarvatas svacit //MU_6,39.27//
GSP27moksop_u:33348: yāṃ yāṃ vastudaśāṃ yāsi tata eva mune śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:33350: ādyaṃ pūjyaṃ namaskāryaṃ stutyam arghyaṃ sureśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:33351: enaṃ taṃ viddhi vedyānāṃ sīmāntaṃ mahatām api //MU_6,39.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33354: sakalajantuṣu jantupadapradaṃ viditam ādyam upāsya yatavrata /
GSP27moksop_u:33355: tvam ajam ātmamayaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ bhavasi kiṃ parimajjasi dṛṣṭiṣu //MU_6,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33362: karmaṇāṃ paramaṃ karma ciddhātuṃ viddhi nirmalam //MU_6,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33371: svayaṃ bhavati rāgātmā rañjako rañjanaṃ rajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33372: svayam ākāśam apy āśu kuḍyaṃ bhavati maṇḍitam //MU_6,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33376: na kiñcid api sampannam anyad auṣṇyād ivānale //MU_6,40.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33383: kurvann eva mahākarma na karoty eva kiñcana //MU_6,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33384: dravyam apy eva nirdravyo nirdravyo 'pi hi dravyavat /
GSP27moksop_u:33386: adyāpy eṣa sadā prātaḥ prātar apy adyatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33387: na cāyam adya na prātas tv adya prātaś ca vā sadā //MU_6,40.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33390: ityādy anarthakaṃ vākyaṃ tathā satyaṃ sa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33391: na tad asti na yat sa syān na tad asti na yat tv asau //MU_6,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:33392: yasmai sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33393: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ //MU_6,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33401: kā nāma vimalā bhāsas tasmin paramacinmaṇau /
GSP27moksop_u:33402: na kacanti vicinvanti vicitrāṇi jaganti yāḥ //MU_6,41.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33414: bhāvayitvā nakiñcittvam iva khatvaṃ karoty alam //MU_6,41.8//
GSP27moksop_u:33418: idam ittham idaṃ neti niyatir bhavati svayam //MU_6,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33419: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33424: śivasyāsya jagannātha śaktayas tāḥ kathaṃ sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33425: sākṣitā kātha kiṃ tāsāṃ nṛttaṃ syāt kiyad eva vā //MU_6,41.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33430: tathā niyatisattā ca mahāsattā ca suvrata //MU_6,41.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33434: śaktayaḥ kuta etās tā bahutvaṃ katham āsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33435: udayaś ca kathaṃ deva bhedābhedaś ca kīdṛśaḥ //MU_6,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:33438: eṣā hi śaktir ity uktā nāsmād bhinnā manāg api //MU_6,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33446: yā sā paramparaitāsām eṣā niyatir ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:33470: asmin vikāravalite niyater vilāse saṃsāranāmni ciranāṭakanāṭyasāre /
GSP27moksop_u:33471: sākṣī sadoditavapuḥ parameśvaro 'yam ekas sthito na ca tayā na ca tena bhinnaḥ //MU_6,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:33475: eṣa devas sa paramaḥ pūjya eṣa sadā satām /
GSP27moksop_u:33477: ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33478: śivo haro harir brahmā śakro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ //MU_6,42.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33479: bahir antaś ca sarvātmā sadā svātmā subuddhibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33482: yena taṃ śṛṇu tattvajña śroṣyasy antaḥkramaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33484: pūjanaṃ dhyānam evātra dhyānam evātra pūjanam /
GSP27moksop_u:33510: iti sañcintya deveśam arcayed vidhivat tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33513: na dīpena na dhūpena na puṣpavibhavārpaṇaiḥ //MU_6,42.19//
GSP27moksop_u:33515: na ca kuṅkumakarpūrair bhogaiś citrair na cetaraiḥ //MU_6,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33518: etad eva paraṃ dhyānaṃ pūjaiṣaiva parā smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:33520: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan /
GSP27moksop_u:33525: dhyānam arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca śuddhasaṃvedanātmakam //MU_6,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:33526: dhyānasaṃvedanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ paraṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33527: vinā tenetareṇāyam ātmā labhyata eva no //MU_6,42.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33529: ayam ātmā mune bhuṅkte dehe bhūpo gṛhe yathā //MU_6,42.27//
GSP27moksop_u:33531: pūrṇo 'pi pūjayatv īśaṃ gopradānaṃ labheta vai //MU_6,42.28//
